duto nodhi misri noromo piero abiriyo jakobo gi joode e piny misri isreal nooro juda motelo ir josef mondo onyise oromne goshen kamano ka ne gichopo e piny goshen josef nokawo gache modhi kuno romo ni israel wuon mare kane oneno wuon mare nokwake moywak aminga israel nowacho ni josef niya koro kata katho onge wach nikech koro aseneni kendo angeyo ni pod ingima bange josef nowacho ni owetene gi jood wuon mare niya adhi nyiso farao ni owetena kod joodwa yande odak kanaan koro osebiro ira gin jokwath kendo gisekelo jambgi kod mwandugi duto emomiyo ka farao oluongou mopenjou ni tiju en ango nyaka uwachne ni chakre tindou usebedo jokwath mana kaka kwereu kuwacho kamano unuyud thuolo mar dak e piny goshen ka nikech jomisri ok ohero jokwath chakruok josef nodhi ir farao mowachone niya wuora kod owetena josea kanaan gi jambgi kod mwandugi duto kendo koro gin e piny goshen noyudo josef osekelo ji abich kuom owetene ir farao mondo ongegi mi farao nopenjogi niya tiju en ango ne gidwoke ni ruoth wan jokwath mana kaka kwerewa wasebiro mondo wadag e pinyni nimar kech ger e piny kanaan kata lek jambwa dikwaye onge koro ruoth yie mondo wadag e piny goshen farao nowacho ni josef niya kaka koro wuoru gi oweteni josebiro iri piny misri duto ni e lweti ketgi gidag kama berie moloyo ginyalo dak e piny goshen kendo kingeyo ni jomoko kuomgi gin jokwath molony ketgi mondo girit jamba bang mano josef nokelo jakobo wuon mare e nyim farao mi jakobo nogwedho farao eka farao nopenje niya jahigni adi jakobo nodwoke ni higni asewuotho e piny gin mana mia achiel gi piero adek hignigo osebedo manok kendo maricho kendo ok girom gi higni kwerewa nowuothogo e piny eka jakobo nogoyo ni farao oriti modhi bange josef nomiyo wuon mare gi owetene puothe kuonde mabeyo e misri e gweng rameses kaka farao nochiko bange nomiyo wuon mare gi owetene kod jood wuon duto chiemo duto mane gidwaro tij josef e ndalo kech kech ne ger piny ngima ne onge gi chiemo mi jomisri gi jokanaan nodoko meyomno josef nochoko pesa duto mane jomisri gi jokanaan ongiewogo cham kendo noterogi e od keno mar farao kane jomisri gi jokanaan osetieko pesagi duto jomisri nobiro ir josef mi giwachone niya miwa chiemo dipo ka watho e nyimi nikech pesawa oserumo josef nodwokogi niya ka pesau oserumo kara miyauru jambu eka amiu cham omiyo ne gitero jambgi ni josef mi nomiyogi cham kar farese gi jamni kod kenje kamano e higano nomiyogi cham nokawo jambgi duto higa moluwe ne gidok ire mi giwachone niya ruoth ok wadwar wuondi pesawa duto orumo kendo jambwa bende koro osedoko meki omiyo koro waonge gi gima wanyalo miyi mak mana dendwa gi lopwa ango momiyo watho e nyimi ineno kendo lopwa bende kethore ngiewwa kaachiel gi puothewa kuom chiemo mondo wabed wasumb farao kendo puothewa odok mage miwa kodhi mondo kik kech negwa mondo pwothewa kik kethre kuom mano josef nongiewo ni farao puothe duto mag misri nikech jomisri duto nongiewo puothegi nimar kejno ne ger kamano puothe duto nodoko mag farao josef noloko jomisri wasumbini chakre bath misri konchiel nyaka komachielo puothe jodolo kende ema ne ok ongiewo nimar jodolo ne nigi pokgi gikonyorego maa kuom farao omiyo onge gima nochuno jodolo mondo ongiew puothegi josef nowacho ni jomisri niya winjuru kawuononi asengiewou ni farao kaachiel gi puotheu bende kodhi eriuru mondo ukom e puotheu e kinde mag keyo nyaka umi farao achiel kuom abich mag cham mago modong ema nobednu kodhi kod cham munyalo chamo gi joodu kod nyithindu ne gidwoke niya ruoth isekonyowa omiyo kineno ni mano ber wabiro bedo wasumb farao kuom mano josef noketo chik ni achiel kuom abich mag chamb misri nyaka bed mag farao chikni pod dhi nyime nyaka chil kawuono puothe jadolo kende ema ne ok farao okawo jakobo olemo mogik joisrael nodak misri e piny goshen ne giyudo lowo mi gimew kendo ne ginya ahinya jakobo nodak misri kuom higni apar gabiriyo nyaka nodoko jahigni mia achiel gi piero angwen gabiriyo kane kinde mar thone ochopo machiegni noluongo josef wuode nowachone niya yie iket lweti e kind ema kikongorina ni inibedna jaadiera kendo ni initimna maber mi ok niyika misri kasetho maluwo kwerena mondo igola misri kendo idhi iyika kama oyikie kwerena josef nodwoke niya abiro timo kaka iwacho israel nowachone niya kuongrina ni initim kamano mi josef nokuongorene eka israel nokulore gi yo ka wi kitandane chakruok jakobo oguedho efraim gi manase kinde moro achien josef nowinjo ni wuon mare tuo mi nokawo yawuote ariyo manase gi efraim modhi nene ka ne onyis jakobo ni josef wuode osebiro mondo onene nochukore mobet e kitandane nowacho ni josef niya nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto nofwenyorena luz e piny kanaan moguedha nowachona ni abiro miyi nyithindo mangeny mondo nyikwayi chieng odok ogendini mathoth pinyni namigi kaka mwandugi nyaka chieng eka jakobo nomedo wacho ni josef niya yawuoti ariyo mane inywolo misri kapok abiro iri kaeri ibiro kwan ka nyithinda adier efraim gi manase biro bedo maga mana kaka reuben gi simeon nyithindo mibiro nywolo banggi ema nobed magi kata kamano korka gikeni nokwangi mana kaka joka owetegi ariyo efraim gi manase kane aduogo aa mesopotamia nabwok malich ka ne rahel meru othona e piny kanaan ka pok wachopo efrath ne ayike kuno yo madhi efrath efrath iluongo bende ni bethlehem ka ne israel oneno yawuot josef nopenje ni magi nga gini josef nodwoke ni magi e nyithinda nyasaye osemiya misri ka mi israel nowachone niya yie ikelgi mondo aguedhgi israel koro noseti ahinya wange oyuso ok onyal neno josef nokelo nyithinde ire mi nokwakogi kendo onyodhogi eka israel nowacho ni josef niya ne ok apar ni naneni kendo koro nyasaye osemiyo aneno koda ka nyithindi eka josef nogolo nyithindogo e chong israel kendo nogoyo chonge piny mokulore nyaka e lowo josef nomako lwet nyithindo ariyogo noketo efraim e bade korachwich mondo odhi obed e bad israel koracham manase noketo e bade koracham mondo odhi obed e bad israel korachwich eka noterogi ir israel israel norieyo bade korachwich moketo e wi efraim wuowi matin kendo bade koracham noketo e wi manase wuowi maduong eka noguedhogi kowacho niya nyasaye yie iguedh nyithindigi e nyasaye mane ibrahim kwara gi isaka wuora jolamo kendo e nyasaye mosetelona nyaka koroni malaika oseresa e masiche duto mondo oguedhgi noluonggi gi nyinga kod nying ibrahim kwara gi nying isaka wuora onego gimedre kendo gibed oganda maduong e piny ka ne josef oneno ni wuon mare oketo lwete korachwich e wi efraim nokecho omiyo nogolo lwet wuon mare e wi efraim moketo e wi manase kowacho ni wuon niya mano ok ber wuora ni mar jali ema duong kuom mano en ema onego iket lweti korachwich e wiye wuon mare nodagi kowacho niya angeyo mano nyathina manase bende biro bedo oganda maduong owadgi maluwe ema nobed maduong moloye kendo nyikwaye nodok ogendini mangeny israel noguedho nyithindogo chiengno kawacho niya ka joisrael dwaro gwedho ngato ginikonyre gi nyingu ka giwacho kama nyasaye mondo oguedhi kaka oseguedho efraim gi manase kamano israel nomiyo efraim obedo maduong ni manase eka israel nowacho ni josef niya ne koro atho nyasaye nobed kodu kendo nodwoku e piny kwereu ema amiyi lowo shekem mane amiyo joamor e lweny kamano inibed gi puodho achiel moloyo oweteni chakruok jakobo okoro wach kuom yawuote jakobo noluongo yawuote mowachonigi niya biuru machiegi mondo anyisu gik mabirom timorenu e ndalo biro un yawuot jakobo chokreuru buta mondo uwinji winjuru israel wuonu reuben wuoda makayo e tekona kendo kacha manyiso wuowina jasunga kendo iratego moloyo yawuota duto ijamwomri ka pi oula ok nibed gi duong nikech isetimo richo gi chi wuoru adier isenindo e kitandana midwanyo simeon gi lawi gin owete gisetimo timbe mahundu gi gigi mag lweny ok nariwra e buchegi malingling kendo ok nadonj e chokruokgi nikech ka gikecho ginego ji kendo gingado odond ruedhi ka yiem nono okuong mirimbgi nimar en mirima mager kendo makwiny anakegi e piny jakobo duto e kind joisrael juda ema oweteni biro paki inimak wasikgi gi ngutgi kendo oweteni nokulreni juda nyathi sibuor inego le eka idok kari midakie juda ichalo sibuor moriere kendo onindo piny maonge ngama hedhore chiewo juda nomak ludh loch kochunge e kind tiendene kobedo ruoth nyaka wuon loch biro rito ogendini duto chopi en jamoko omiyo otweyo kanje e kor mzabibu mana e kor mzabibu mochiek makwar olwoko lepe gi divai makwar wange onuria ka divai makwar kendo lake tar ka chak zebulun nodag e dho nam kama yiedhi gowoe kendo mbape nogi sidon isakar en kanyna maratego monindo e kind misikene noneno ni bedo gi dala en gima ber kendo oneno bende kaka pinyno ber omiyo noyie tingo misigo modoko misumba matiyo tich matek dan nobed jatend joge kamano nochal gi dhout israel mamoko dan nobed ka thuol man e dier yo thuol man gi kwiri mager kayo ombong faras mi ngat moidhe podho gi ka ngeye ruoth nyasaye arito warruok moa kuomi gad jomecho nomonji noriembgi kolawogi matek asher nobed kachamo chiemo mamit pile pinye nonyag gik mabeyo moromo ruoth chamo naftali en mwanda mae thim manywolo nyithindo mabeyo josef en yath mopidh e bath thidhiya manyago olemo mogundho kendo bedene lawore e kor ohinga jodwar nolawo josef matek ka gibaye gi asere jateko nyasach jakobo noturo atungegi kendo jakwath lwanda mar israel nochodo leche mag ogich bedegi nyasach wuoruno nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto mondo okonyi kendo oguedhi gi koth moa malo kendo gi nyithindo kod chak gidhodho gi cham kod maua gueth mag gode machon gi gik mabeyo duto mag gode mosiko duto mondo obi ni josef jal mane opog gi owetene benjamin en ondiek kech kayo gima osenego ochamo gokinyi godhiambo pod ongingo gima osemako mago e dhoudi apar gariyo mag jioisrael kendo ka ne jakobo wuongi oguedhogi nomiyo moro ka moro gueth moromo kode tho mar jakobo gi yikne eka jakobo nochiko yawuote niya kaka koro achiegni tho kaluwo kwerena yikauru kwerena e rogo man e puoth efron jahiti man makpela yo wuok chieng mar mamre e piny kanaan rogono ibrahim ema nongiewo kaachiel gi puodhono ir efron jahiti mondo obed kar yiko joge kanyo ema noyikie ibrahim gi sara chiege kod isaka gi rebeka chiege kendo kanyo ema nayikoe lea puodho kod rogo man e iye nongiew kuom johiti kane jakobo osetieko chiko nyithinde kamano nodwoko tiende e kitanda mi chunye nochot koluwo kwerene chakruok josef norudhore kuom wuon koywak kendo konyodhe eka nochiko jotichne jothieth mondo owir ringre wuon mare gi yath kik tow mi ne gitimo kamano kuom ndalo piero angwen kaka kit wiro ringre ngama otho nobet jomisri noywago israel kuom ndalo piero abiriyo kane kinde mar ywago wuon mare oserumo josef nowacho ni jodong farao niya kunyalo yie koda nyisnauru farao kama kane wuora chiegni tho nomiyo asingorane ni abiro yike e bur mane osekunyo e piny kanaan kuom mano yie adhi ayike eka abiro duogo farao nodwokone wach niya dhiyo iyik wuoru kaka nomiyo isingorine kamano josef nodhi yiko wuon mare jodong farao duto gi jodong ode kod jodong misri duto nodhi kode kaachiel gi joode gi owetene kod jood wuon mare mak mana nyithindgi matindo kende gi jambgi ema ne giweyo e piny goshen bende nodhi gi geche kod joidh farese ne en oganda maduong ahinya kane gichopo kar dino cham man atad yo wuok chieng mar jordan ne giywago wuongi malich ahinya kuom ndalo abiriyo kane jokanaan modak kuno oneno kaka jogo ywak malich atad ne giwacho niya jomisri ywak malich manade mano emomiyo nochak kanyo ni abelmizraim tiende ni ywak jomisri kanyono ni yo wuok chieng mar jordan kamano yawuot jakobo notimo gima wuongi nochikogi ne gitingo ringre nyaka kanaan mi giyike e rogo manie puodho man makpela yo wuok chieng mar mamre mane ibrahim ongiewo kuom efron jahiti mondo obedne kar yiko joge kane josef oseyiko wuon nodok misri gi owetene kod ji duto nodhi kode e liel josef omiyo chuny owetene obedo gi kue kane owete josef oneno ni wuongi osetho ne giwacho niya dipo ka josef pod nigi sadha kodwa manyalo miyo ochulnwa kuor kuom gima rach mane watimone omiyo ne gioro ni josef wach niya kane pok wuoru otho nowachonwa ni mondo wanyisi kama asayi ni oweteni richogi kaachiel gi gima mono mane gitimoni kuom mano yie iwenwa kuom tim marach mane watimo nikech wan jotich nyasaye wuoru kane josef owinjo wechego pi wange noton bange owetene nobiro ire giwegi mi gigoyo chonggi piny e nyime ka gikulore nyaka e lowo ne giwachone niya eriwa e wan wasumbi josef nowachonigi niya kik uluor ok anyal kawo kar nyasaye ne undhoga mondo utimna gima rach nyasaye noloke gima ber mondo ore ji mangeny koro ngima mana nikech wachno omiyo kik uluor abiro ritou uduto kod jouteu kamano e kaka nokueyo chunygi gi weche mamit tho mar josef josef nomedo dak misri gi joodgi nodak kuom higni mia achiel gapar moneno nyithi efraim gi nyikwaye noneno bende nyithind makir wuod manase mi nokwanogi ka nyithinde achien josef nowacho ni owetene niya koro achiegni tho nyasaye biro ritou kendo golou e pinyni moteru e piny mane osingore ni nomi ibrahim gi isaka kod jakobo bang mano nomiyo yawuot israel okuongore kowachonigi niya kuongreuru ni ndalo nyasaye nokonyue mi ua ka nyaka ukaw chokena udhigo josef notho ka en jahigni mia achiel gapar ne giwiro ringre gi yath mondo kik otow mi gikete e sanduk e piny misri kuno wuok thagruok joisrael e piny misri joisrael nodhi misri gi jakobo moro ka moro gi joode e magi reuben gi simeon gi lawi gi juda gi isakar gi zebulun gi benjamin gi dan gi naftali gi gad kod asher kar romb joka jakobogo duto noromo piero abiriyo josef noyudo ka ni misri bange achien josef gi owetene kod tiengno duto notho joisrael nonywolo nyithindo mangeny mi ginya ahinya kendo ne gipongo piny nyaka ne gibedo oganda maratego koro ruoth manyien mane ok ongeyo wach josef nochako tich e misri nowacho ni joge niya neuru joisrael osedoko oganda maduong kendo maratego koro nyalo loyowa nyaka watang mondo watamgi kik ginya nimar kapo ni lweny owuok kamoro ginyalo dok ni wasikwa mondo giked kodwa mi giring gia e pinywa kuom mano jomisri noketo joisrael e tij athwon ka nyipeche ritogi mondo giti matek eka gibed moboch mano e kaka ne gigero ni farao miech keno miluongo ni pithom gi rameses kaka nomed sandogi e kaka ne gimedo bedo mangeny kendo gilandore nyaka jomisri nodoko mosin kodgi kendo oluorogi kuom mano ne gibembo wasumbgi joisrael gi tich mapek ka gimiyo ngimagi doko matek gi tije achune mag nyono lowo gi loso matafari kod tije duto mag pur bange ruodh misri nowacho ni mond hibrania ariyo jocholo miluongo ni shifra gi pua niya ka ucholo mond johibrania mi uneno ka dhako moro onywolo nyathi wuowi neguru nyathino ka en nyathi nyako kik unege jocholo noluoro nyasaye omiyo ne gichayo chik ruoth mi ne ok ginego nyithindo machwo ruodh misri noluongo jochologo mopenjogi gimomiyo giweyo nyithindo machwo mak ginego ne gidwoke niya mond johibrania ok chal gi mond jomisri gin muchgi thoth omiyon ginywolo nyithindo piyopiyo kapok jacholo ochopo irgi kuom mano nyasaye noguedho jochologo kendo joisrael nomedo nya modoko oganda maratego ahinya nyasaye nomiyo jocholo obedo gi nyithindo kod nyikwayo nikech ne giluore bange farao nochiko joge duto niya nyithindo chwo duto johibrania onywolo mondo uwit e aora nael nyiri uwe odongi wuok nywol mar musa kendo kaka notony jalawi moro nokendo nyar dhoodgi mi chiegeno nomako ich monywolo nyathi wuowi ka noneno ni en nyathi jaber nopande kuom dueche adek kane koro ok onyal medo pande nokawo adita mochwe gi togo mi omwono gi lop chwech kod odok mondo kik chwer nopielo nyathi ei aditano eka nokete ei togo e bath aora nael nyamin nyathino nochung gi chien matin mondo one ane gima nyalo timorene eka nyar farao nobiro mondo olwokre kanyo ka jotichne manyiri wuotho e geng aora nopo koneno adita ka ni ei togo mooro misumbane manyako moro mondo odhi oome kane osekelnego noele moyudo nyathi wuowi eiye ka ywak nokeche mowacho niya nyaka bed ni en achiel kuom nyithind johibrania kane nyamin nyathi owinjo kamano nopenje niya adhi aluongni chi jahibrania moro mondo odhodhni nyathino nyar farao nodwoke ni tim kamano mi nyano nodhi moluongo mana min nyathino kane dhakono obiro nyar farao nowachone niya kaw nyathini ipidhna kendo abiro chuli kuom timo kamano mi dhakono nokawe mopidhe kane oseweyo dhoth notere ir nyar farao koro nokawe ka mare nowacho niya ne agole e pi emomiyo nochake ni musa tiende ni mogol musa oringo odhi e piny midian chieng moro kane musa osedoko ngat maduong nodhi mondo one joisrael wetene moneno kaka ichunogi gi tich matek bende noneno ka jamisri moro goyo achiel kuom johibrania wetene nongiyo koni gi koni kane ok oneno ngato nonego jamisrino mopando ringre ei kuoyo kinyne nodok moneno johibrania ariyo kagore nokwero jal mane okwinyo wadgi niya mar ango igoyo wadu jalo nodwoke ni ngano moketi jatendwa kata jangadnwa bura koso idwaro nega kaka ninego jamisri cha kane musa owinjo kamano kibaji nogoye koparo ni adier kara nyaka bed ni wachni osengere farao nowinjo gima notimore motemo mondo oneg musa musa noringo mondo odhi odag e piny midian kane ochopo e pinyno nobet e dho soko moro noyudo ka jadolo mar midian nigi nyiri abiriyo nyigo nobiro umbo pi mi giolo e mberni jamni modhoe mondo jamb wuongi omodhi jokwath moko nobiro mondo oriembgi musa nokonyogi kendo omodhonigi jambgi kane nyigo odok ir reuel wuongi nopenjogi niya ango momiyo uduogo chon kawuono ne gidwoke ni jamisri moro noresowa ka jokwath moko thagowa bende en ema nende omiyo jambwa pi reuel nopenjo nyige ni en kanye mar ango uweye kuno dhiuru uluonge obi ochiem kodwa musa noneno ni ber mondo odag gi ngatno mi reuel nomiye nyare zipora mokendo zipora nonywolo ni musa wuowi mi musa nochako ni gershom tiende ni jadak ka nochake kamano nikech noneno ni osedoko jadak e piny ok margi bange achien ruodh misri notho joisrael ne pod ngur malich kuom bedo wasumbini kendo ne giywak malit mondo ogolgi e thagruok kamano ywakgino notundo ni nyasaye kendo nowinjo ngurgi mi noparo singruok mane otimo gi ibrahim gi isaka kod jakobo noneno kaka joisrael thagore mi wachno nodonjone malit wuok nyasaye oluongo musa chieng moro musa ne kwayo jamb jethro jaduongne jadolo mar midian nongado thim gi jamni nyaka horeb god nyasaye malaika mar nyasaye nofwenyorene kanyo e ligek mach maliel e chuny bungu moro musa norange moneno ni bungu liel aliela ok wang mi nowacho niya nyaka adhi machiegni mondo ane ane hono maduongni ango momiyo bungu liel aliela ok wang kane ruoth nyasaye oneno kosudo machiegni noluonge gie chuny bungu niya musa musa musa nodwoke ni ka nyasaye nowachone niya kik imed sudo machiegni lony wuocheni nikech kama ichungieno en kama ler eka nomedo wacho niya nyasach kwereni nyasach ibrahim gi nyasach isaka kod nyasach jakobo mi musa noumo wange nikech noluoro ngiyo wang nyasaye bange nyasaye nowachone niya aseneno ratiro kaka joga thagore e piny misri asewinjo ywakgi ka gikwayo ni mondo oresgi gia e lwet joma chunogi gi tich matekno adier angeyo chandruokgi omiyo aselor mondo aresgi e lwet jomisri kendo agolgi e pinyno mondo atergi e piny maber kendo malach en piny momew kendo machiek koro jokanaan gi johiti gi joamor gi joperizi gi johivi kod jojebus ema odakie asewinjo ywak joisrael kendo aneno kaka jomisri thirogi malit omiyo koro abiro ori ir farao mondo igol joga joisrael oa e piny misri musa nowacho ni nyasaye niya nga dadhi ir farao kendo agol joisrael e piny misri nyasaye nodwoke niya anabed kodi kendo kisegolo ji misri unulama e godni mano nobed ranyisi ni ema aseori musa nowacho ni nyasaye niya ka adhi ir joisrael mawachonigi ni nyasach kweregi oseora gibiro penja ni nyinge nga nadwokgi ango nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya mantie e nyinga eka nomedo wacho niya e gima mondo iwach ni joisrael mantie oseora iru nyasaye nochako owacho ni musa niya nyaka iwach ni joisrael kama ruoth nyasaye nyasach kwereu nyasach ibrahim gi isaka kod jakobo oseora iru e nyinga nyaka chieng kendo tienge mabiro duto noluongago dhiyo mondo ichok jodong israel kanyakla kendo mondo iwachnigi ni nyasach kweregi nyasach ibrahim gi isaka kod jakobo osefwenyoreni mochiki mondo iwachnigi niya asebiro iru kendo aseneno gima jomisri timonu koro asengado wach ni nyaka agolu e piny misri kuma isandoue mi ateru e piny jokanaan gi johiti gi joamor gi joperizi gi johivi kod jojebuz odakie en piny momew kendo machiek kamano joisrael biro winjo gima iwacho bange nyaka udhi gi jodong israel ir ruodh misri kendo uwachne niya ruoth nyasaye nyasach johibrania oseromp kodwa omiyo koro yie iwe wadhi e thim kuom wuodh ndalo adek mondo watim misango ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa chutho angeyo ni ruodh misrim ok nowe udhi mak mana kochune abiro tiyo gi tekona mi nasand misri gi honni duto natim kuno eka bange noyienu mondo udhi anami jomisri geno jogi mi ka uwuok ok unudhi gi lwetu nono dhako ka dhako nodwar gik moko mag fedha kod dhahabu kaachiel gi lewni kuom jagwenggi kendo kuom dhako moro amora modak kode e ode unurwak nyithindu gi gigo kendo mano e kaka unuyak jomisri wuok musa nodwoko ruoth nyasaye niya ok gibi yie kata winjo gima awacho gibiro mana wachona ni ruoth nyasaye ne ok ofwenyoreni koro abiro timo ango ruoth nyasaye nopenje niya mano ango mitingo e lwetino nodwoke ni en luth eka ruoth nyasaye nowachone niya bole piny kane musa obole piny nolokore thuol mi musa oringe bange ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya make gi iwe musa nomake matek mi olokore luth e lwete ruoth nyasaye nowachone niya tim kamano mondo onyis joisrael ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach kweregi nyasach ibrahim gi isaka kod jakobo osefwenyoreni ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa kendo niya lweti e lawi notimo kamano kane ogolo lweteno oko nonwango kotimo dhoho kendo olokore rachar ka pe eka ruoth nyasaye nowachone ni lweti e lawi kendo mi notimo kamano kane ochako ogole oko nonwango kochango modoko mangima mana kaka dende duto ruoth nyasaye nowachone niya ka gitamore yie gi wecheni kata ka ranyisi mokwongo ok omiyo giyie ranyisi mar ariyoni nomigi yie kapo ni ok giyie gi ranyisi ariyogi kata winjo gima iwacho mondo itwom pi e aora nael ipuk piny kitimo kamano pigno nolokre remo musa nowacho ni ruoth nyasaye niya ruoth kiyie ok ngat mongeyo wuoyo e nyim ji kata mana sani koro isewuoyo kodani pod mana kamano lewa pek kendo aywayo wach ruoth nyasaye nowachone niya en nga chueyo dho dhano kata en nga miyo dhano doko momo kata ite odino en nga mamiye wang mabith kata loke muofu donge ruoth nyasaye ema atimo gigi duto emomiyo koro dhiyo anakonyi wuoyo kendo ananyisi gima onego iwachi musa ne pod odagi ka kwero ruoth nyasaye niya ruoth kiyie ngat moro nono mihero ruoth nyasaye nokecho gi musa mowachone niya harun owadu jalawi donge nitie en angeyo ni onyalo wuoyo maber ero en e yo obiro iri kendo obiro bedo mamor ahinya koneni en aema iwuo kode kinyise gima onego owachi abiro konyou wuoyo kendo nyisou gima onego utim harun biro wuoyo gi ji kari nimar en ema nobedni ka dhogi ema nibedne ka nyasaye kinyise gima onego owachi kaw ludhini nikech en ema ibiro timo kode honni musa odok misri musa nodhi ir jethro jaduongne mowachone niya yie mondo adog misri ir jowetena mondo ane ka pod gingima jethro nowachone niya ber dhi gi kue ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa e piny midian niya koro dog misri nikech jogo duto nyocha dwaro negi osetho mi musa nokawo chiege gi nyithinde kendo noketogi e kanyna modok misri kotingo luth mane nyasaye omiye ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya koro ero idok misri nyaka ine ni itimo honni asemiyi teko ni mondo itim e nyim farao abiro miyo chunye doko matek mi ok nowe joisrael thuolo mondo oa nyaka inyise ni ruoth nyasaye owacho kama israel en wuoda makayo nawachoni ni mondo iwe wuoda odhi olama nidagi omiyo koro abiro nego wuodi makayo ka ne musa pod ni e yo ruoth nyasaye nodhi ire kama nobworoe mondo onege zipora nokawo kidi mabith mongadogo wuode nyangu eka nomulo musa gi pien nongadono kowachone niya chwora mar remo eka ruoth nyasaye noweyo musa ter nyanguno ema nomiyo zipora owacho ni chwora mar remo e ndalogo ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni harun niya dhiyo e thim mondo irom ni musa nodhi moromo kode e god nyasaye kendo nonyodhe musa nonyiso harun weche duto mane ruoth nyasaye omiye mondo odhi owachi kod honni mane onego odhi otim eka musa kod harun ne jodhi mochoko jodong israel kanyakla harun nonyisogi weche duto mane ruoth nyasaye owacho ni musa kendo notimo honnigo duto e nyimgi mi ne giyie ni kara ruoth nyasaye oseoro musa adier bende kane giwinjo ni ruoth nyasaye oselimo joisrael moneno chandruokgi ne gikulore mi gilame wuok musa gi harun odhi ir farao bange musa kod harun nodhi ir farao mowachone niya ruoth nyasaye nyasach joisrael owacho kama joga odhi mondo otimna sawo e thim farao nodwokogi niya ruoth nyasaye en nga dawinj wachne mi awe joisrael dhi akia ruoth nyasaye bende ok nawe joisrael odhi ne giwachone niya nyasach johibrania oseromo kodwa omiyo yie iwe wadhi e wuodh ndalo adek e thim mondo watim misango ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa nono obiro kelonwa tho kata lweny ditiekwa farao ruodh misri nodwoko musa gi harun niya marango umono ji tiyo tijegi doguru e tiju wasumbnigi eka nomedo wacho niya jou koro ngeny moloyo jomisri eka pod udwaro mana ni mondo giwe tich odiechiengno farao nochiko jomisri jorit wasumbni kod joisrael nyipeche niya kik uchak umi joisrael tiang gilosogo matafari kaka usebedo ka utimo weuru gidhi giom tiang giwegi nyaka une ni giloso matafari kwangi romre gi mago gisebedo ka giloso kik uwe kwanno dog chien gin jonyawo emomiyo gigoyo koko ni mondo gidhi gitim misango ni nyasachgi mednigiuru tich matek mondo gibed modich kendo giwe chiko itgi e weche manono jorit nowuok kaachiei gi nyipeche mowacho ni joisrael niya farao osewacho ni ok obi medo miyou tiang ni nyaka udhi udwar tiang uwegi kamoro amora moyudoree bende nyaka ulos matafari kwangi romre gi mago muloso pile omiyo ji noke e piny misri duto ka dwaro tiang jorit ne rungogi kawacho niya odiechieng kodiechieng nyaka utiek tich momiu mana kaka nutimo e ndalo mane imiyoue tiang jodong farao nogoyo joisrael mane giketo nyipeche ka gipenjogi niya ango momiyo kawuono ok ulos matafari marom gi mago yande uloso nyipeche joisrael notero ywakgi ni farao ka giwachonigi niya ruoth ere gimomiyo itimonwa kama tiang koro pok miwa eka pod ichunowa ni mondo walos matafari goch bende igoyowa jogi iwuon ema ketho farao nodwokogi niya un jonyawo ahinya mano emomiyo ukwaya ni mondo aweu udhi utim misango ni nyasachu koro doguru e tiju ok bi miu tiang nyaka ulos mana kar kwan matafari moketnu kane nyipeche joisrael owinjo ni nyaka gilos matafari kwangi romre mana gi mago gisebedo ka giloso ne gineno ni kara gin e chandruok ne gia ir farao mi giromo gi musa kod harun noyudo ritogi mi giwachonigi niya nyasaye mondo one gima usetimo kendo okumu kuom miyo farao gi jodonge bedo mamon kodwa useketo ligangla e lwetgi mondo ginegwago musa olemo musa nodok ir ruoth nyasaye mowacho niya ruoth nyasaye ango momiyo isando jogi koro niora nango chakre kinde nabiroe ir farao awuoyo e nyingi osemana bedo kosando jogi pok itimoe gimoro mondo iresgi wuok ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya koro ibiro neno gima abiro timo ni farao abiro chune mondo owe joisrael odhi adier abiro chune ni nyaka oriembgi e pinye ruoth nyasaye oluongo musa kendo nyasaye nowuoyo gi musa mowachone niya e ruoth nyasaye nafwenyora ni ibrahim gi isaka kod jakobo ka nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ne ok aweyo gingeya gi nyinga mar ruoth nyasaye bende natimo kodgi singruok kawachonigi ni namigi piny kanaan mane ginie jodak koro asewinjo ywak joisrael jomisri oseloko wasumbni mi aseparo singruok mane atimono omiyo koro nyaka iwachni joisrael kama e ruoth nyasaye abiro golou e tije mapek jomisri oketo kuomu kendo abiro resou e tij bedo wasumbni magi narie bada mangongo kuomgi kakumogi malit mondo owaru anakawu ka joga awuon kendo anabed nyasachu mi ununge ni e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu golou e tij jomisri mapek michunou mondo uti anateru e piny mane asingora ni nami ibrahim gi isaka kod jakobo kendo anamiugo mondo obed maru e ruoth nyasaye musa noluwo ni joisrael wechegi ne ok gidewe nimar chunygi nool nikech tich matek mar bedo wasumbni eka ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya dhi nyis farao ruodh misri ni nyaka owe joisrael oa e pinye musa nodwoko ruoth nyasaye ni ka joisrael ema ok nyal winja farao diwinja nadi ngat maywayo wachni ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa gi harun ni gidhi ginyis joisrael kaachiel gi farao ruodh misri ni ruoth nyasaye osemiyogi tich mar golo joisrael e piny misri anywola joka musa gi joka harun jodong dhoud israel e magi yawuot reuben kach israel ne gin hanok gi palu gi hezron kod karmi mago e joreuben yawuot simeon ne gin jemuel gi jamin gi ohad gi jakin gi zohar kod shaul wuod dhako nyar kanaan mago e josimeon magi e nying yawuot lawi kaachiel gi nyikwagi gershon gi kohath kod merari lawi nodak higni mia achiel gi piero adek gabiriyo joka gershon ne gin dhout libni gi shimei yawuot kohath ne gin amram gi izhar gi hebron kod uziel kohar nodak higni mia achiel gi piero adek gadek yawuot merari ne gin mali kod mushi mago e dhout jolawi gi nyikwagi amram nokendo jokebed nyamin wuon mare nonywolone harun gi musa amram nodak higni mia achiel gi piero adek gabiriyo yawuot izhar ne gin kora gi nefeg kod zikri yawuot uziel ne gin mishael gi elzafan kod sithri harun nokendo elisheba nyar aminadab nyamin nashon monywologo nadab gi abihu gi eliezar kod ithamar yawuot kora ne gi asir gi elkana kod abiasaf mago e dhout joka kora eliezar wuod harun nokendo achiel kuom nyi putiel nonywolone finehas mago e jodong dhout jolawi e harun nogo kaachiel gi musa mane ruoth nysaye owachonigi niya goluru joisrael e piny misri kochangi e dhoutgi musa gi harun gogo ema nowacho ni farao ruodh misri ni mondo owe joisrael oa misri ruoth nyasaye ochiko musa kod harun kane ruoth nyasaye owuoyo gi musa e piny misri nowachone niya e ruoth nyasaye nyis farao ruodh misri weche duto abiro wachoni musa nodwoko ruoth nyasaye niya ingeyo ni ngat maywayo wach ere kaka farao diwinj wachna wuok ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya koro nge ni aseketi ka nyasaye ni farao kendo harun owadu nowuo kari ininyis harun owadu weche duto abiro chiki mondo iwachi en ema nowach ni farao ni mondo owe joisrael oa e pinye anami chuny farao doko matek kendo named timo ranyisina kod honni maga kata kamano farao ok nowinju omiyo anasand misri gi timbe madongo kakumo jomisri malich mi nagol joga joisrael e misri kochangi e dhoutgi kamano jomisri nonge ni e ruoth nyasaye katimonigi timbe madongo kendo kagolo joisrael kuomgi kuom mano musa gi harun notimo mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nochikogi e kinde mane giwuoyoe gi farao musa ne jahigni piero aboro harun ne jahigni piero aboro gadek ludh harun ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa gi harun niya kapo ni farao owachonu ni mondo utimne ranyisi moro musa mondo iwachni harun kama bol ludhi piny e nyim farao mondo olokre thuol kane musa kod harun jobiro ir farao ne gitimo kaka ruoth nyasaye nochikogi harun nobolo ludhe piny e nyim farao gi joge mi ludhno nolokore thuol kane farao oneno kamano noluongo ji mariek kod ajuoke kendo ajuoke mag misrigo bende notimo mana hono machal kamano gi bindgi ngato ka ngato nobolo ludhe piny kendo luth ka luth nolokore thuol ludh harun nomwonyo ludhegi farao ne wiye tek mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nosenyiso mo nodagi winjo weche musa gi harun masich remo ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya farao wiye tek kendo odagi weyo joisrael mondo oa dhiyo ire gokinyi kodhi e aora nael mi irite e dho aora kitingo luth mane olokore thuolcha nyis farao kama ruoth nysaye nyasach johibrania ne oora mondo anyisi ni joge oa mondo odhi olame e thim nyaka chil kawuono pok isetimo kamano omiyo koro ruoth nyasaye owacho ni ibiro ngeyo ni en e ruoth nyasaye kuom gik obiro timo abiro chwado pi aora gi luth atingoni mi pi biro lokore remo rech biro tho kendo aora biro bedo mangue marach mi jomisri ok noyud kaka modho pi aorani ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya nyis harun kama rie ludhi e wi pige duto man misri kaka aore madongo gi matindo kod yewni gi sokni pi biro lokore remo kendo piny duto nopong gi remo koda ka dapige mag yien mopa koda mag kite musa gi harun ne jotimo kaka ruoth nyasaye nochikogi harun notingo ludhe malo e nyim farao gi jodonge kendo nochwado pi aora nael mi pi duto nolokore remo rech notho kendo aora nodoko mangue marach mi jomisri ne ok nyal modho pi aorano piny misri duto nopong gi remo bange ajuoke mag misri bende notimo hono mana machal kamano gi bindgi mi wi farao nosiko matek kaka chon notamore winjo wach musa gi harun mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nosenyiso kendo noa modok e ode ka ok odewo wachgi jomisri duto nokunyo bath aora nael mondo giyud pi modho nikech ne ok ginyal modho pi aora pi nobet kolokore remo kuom ndalo abiriyo kane ruoth nyasaye osechwado aora nael wuok masich ogwende ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya dhiyo ir farao mondo inyise ni ruoth nyasaye owacho kama joga oa mondo odhi olama winji ka ok iyie timo kamano abiro kelo ogwende e pinyi duto mondo asandugo ginipong aora nael kendo giniwuog ka gidhi e odi nyaka kor nindo gi kitandani kod ut jodongi gi mag jogi kendo ei kendeni kod ei sufriecheni mitedoe makati bende ginichikre kuomi kendo kuom jogi kod kuom jodongi ruoth nyasaye nomedo wacho ni musa niya nyis harun mondo orie ludhe ewi aore gi sokni kod yewni mondo ogwende onywolre mathoth e piny misri kamano harun norieyo lwete ewi pige duto mi ogwende nobiro mopongo piny ajuoke notiyo gi bindgi mi gin bende ne gimiyo ogwende obiro e piny farao koro noluongo musa gi harun mowachonigi niya kwauru ruoth nyasaye mondo ogol ogwende oko kuoma kendo kuom joga eka awe jou oa mondo odhi otim misango ni ruoth nyasaye mi musa nowacho ni farao niya timna ngwono mondo inyisa sa monego alemnie kaachiel gi jodongi kod jogi mondo ogwende oweu kendo oa e uteu mi gidong mana e aora nael kende nodwoke niya kiny musa nowachone niya biro timore mana kaka iwacho mondo inge ni onge nyasaye moro machalo gi ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa ogwende biro weyi kaachiel gi jodongi kod jogi kendo gibiro e uteni mi ginidong mana e aora nael kende eka musa gi harun ne joa ir farao mi musa nolamo ruoth nyasaye gi chunye duto ni mondo ogwende nosekelo kuom farao oa ruoth nyasaye notimo kaka musa nokwaye mi ogwende duto mane ni e udi gi lerni kod puothe notho jomisri nochokogi tuche tuche mi piny nodoko mangue marach kane farao oneno ni oyudo yueyo wiye nochako obet matek kendo nodagi wach musa gi harun mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nosenyiso masich kikun ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya nyis harun ni mondo ochwad piny gi ludhe mi buru biro lokore kikun e piny misri duto ne giwinjo gima nowachonigi mi harun norieyo ludhe mochwadogo piny mi buru nolokore kikun kuom ji gi jamni buru duto manie misri nolokore kikun ajuoke notiyo gi bindgi ni mondo gin bende gihon kikun notamogi kikun ne ni kuonde duto kuom ji gi jamni eka ajuoke nowachoni farao niya en hond nyasaye wi farao ne pod tek kendo ne ok owinjo wach musa gi harun mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nosenyiso masich lwangni ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya dhiyo gokinyi mangich mondo irom gi farao ka dhi aora nael kendo inyise ni ruoth nyasaye owacho kama joga oa mondo odhi olama ka ok itimo kamano abiro hono lwangni kuomi gi kuom jodongi gi kuom jogi kod kuom uti kendo gibiro pongo ut jomisri kaachiel gi pinygi duto chiengno ok nahon lwangni e piny goshen kuma joga odakie mi ininge ni ruoth nyasaye kara anie pinyni kamano ok natim ni joga gima abiro timo ni jogi hononi kiny notimre kiny ruoth nyasaye notimo kamano kendo lwangni mangeny nopoto e od farao gi ut jodonge kod e piny misri duto lwangnigo noketho piny farao noluongo musa gi harun mowachonigi niya dhiuru utim misango ni nyasachu nyaka utime mana ei pinyni musa nodwoke niya ok onego watim kamano nimar timo misango ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa gi dhiang en gima kwero ni jomisri kapo ni gineno kwatimo misango kamano gibiro goyowa gi kite mwatho omiyo nyaka wadhi thim kuom wuodh ndalo adek mondo watim misango ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa mana kaka nochikowa farao nodwokogi niya abiro weyou udhi mondo utim misango ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu e thim mana ka ok udhi mabor ahinya omiyo koro kwanauru musa nowachone niya ka asedhi abiro kwayo ruoth nyasaye mondo kiny lwangni oweyi gi jodongi kod jogi kik ichak iwuondwa mi itam jowa dhi timo misango ni ruoth nyasaye musa noa ir farao molamo ruoth nyasaye mi ruoth nyasaye notimone gima nokwayo lwangni noa kuom farao gi jodonge kod joge onge kata mana lwangni achiel mane odong kata e kindeno bende wi farao nochako obedo matek mi ne ok oyie mondo joisrael oa wuok masich tho mar jamni ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya dhiyo ir farao mondo inyise ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach johibrania owacho kama joga oa mondo odhi olama ka idagi weyogi abiro kelo tho marach kuom fareseni gi kenjeni gi ngamiani gi dhogi kod rombi gi dieki jamb joisrael ok abi timonigi gima abiro timoni jamb jomisri mi onge chiach jaisrael kata achiel notho bende ruoth nyasaye oseketo odiechieng kowacho ni kiny ema notimie kamano e pinyni duto kinyne ruoth nyasaye notimo kaka nowacho mi jamb jomisri duto notho chiach joisrael ne ok otho kata achiel kane farao oneno nonyise ni onge chiach jaisrael mane otho kata achiel kata kamano wiye ne pod tek mi ne ok oyie mondo joisrael oa masich tuo buche ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa gi harun niya jukuru buch kendo gi lwetu mondo musa okir e kor yamo e nyim farao buruno biro lokore buru mayom e piny misri duto kendoo obiro kelo tuo buche malokore adhonde kuom ji gi jamni kamano ne gijuko buru e kendo mi gidhigo ir farao eka musa nokiro buruno e kor yamo mi buruno nokelo tuo buche nolokore adhonde kuom ji gi jamni ajuoke ne ok nyal piem gi musa nikech gin bende dendgi ne buche okuodo mana kaka jomisri mamoko ruoth nyasaye nomiyo wi farao odoko matek mi ne ok odewo musa gi harun mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nosenyiso musa masich pe bange ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya dhi ir farao gokinyi mangich mondo inyise ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach johibrania owacho kama joga oa mondo odhi olama wangni ka ok itimo kamano ema abiro kumi kaachiel gi jodongi kod jogi kakelonu sand duto mondo inge ni onge ngat marom koda e piny ngima ka dine arie bada mi agoyi gi tuo moro kaachiel gi jogi dikoro kari oselal aseweyi ibet mangima mana ni mondo anyisigo tekona kendo mondo humba olag e piny ngima kaka pod ithago joga kendo ok iyienigi mondo gia kiny kar sa kama naor pe malich pok one e piny misri nyaka nene koro gol chik mondo jambi kod gigi duto man oko orwak e udi nimar pe biro goyo ji kod jamni mowe oko mi gibiro tho giduto luoro nomako jodong farao moko nikech gima ruorh nyasaye nosewachono omiyo ne gikelo wasumbgi gi jambgi e udi piyopiyo joma ne ok odewo wach ruoth nyasaye noweyo wasumbgi gi jambgi mana oko ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya rie lweti kochomo polo mondo pe ogo ji gi jamni kod buya duto man piny e misri kamano musa norieyo ludhe kochomo polo mi ruoth nyasaye nooro mil polo kaachiel gi pe mi polo nogoyo piny ruoth nyasaye nomiyo pe ogoyo misri malich ka polo mil koni gi koni ne en pe marach mane pok one e piny misri nyaka nene pe nogoyo gik moko duto kaachiel gi ji kod jamni mane ni oko kuonde duto e piny misri bende nogoyo buya manie piny moturo yien duto mak mana piny goshen kende mane joisrael odakie ema ne ok ogoyo farao noluongo musa gi harun mowachonigi niya koro asekotho ruoth nyasaye e man kare kaachiel gi joga ema wasetimo marach lamnwa ruoth nyasaye nikech pe gi polo osegoyowa mohingo tekowa asingora ni abiro weyou mondo udhi ok urito gimoro kendo musa nowachone niya ka asea e dalani abiro rieyo bada kalamo ruoth nyasaye polo biro weyo mor kendo pe bende biro chok mondo omi inge ni ruoth nyasaye e wuon piny ngima angeyo ni kaachiel gi jodongi pod ok uluoro ruoth nyasaye tworo gi shairi nokethore chuth nimar noyudo ka tworo osetegno shairi ne koro eka mino ngano ne ok okethore nimar ojachiek achien musa noa ir farao mowuok e dala eka notingo bedene malo kolamo ruoth nyasaye mi mor polo gi pe norumo kendo koth bende nochok kane farao oneno ni gigo duto noserumo nochako oketho mi chunye kaachiel gi chuny jodonge nomedo mana bedo matek kamano wi farao nomedo bet matek mi notamo joisrael dhi mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nosemiyo musa owacho wuok masich bonyo ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya dhi ir farao asemiyo chunye kaachiel gi chuny jodonge obedo matek mondo anyisgi hondenagi kendo mondo unyis nyithindu gi nyikwau e ndalo mabiro kaka nene afuwo jomisri gi honnigo kamano ununge ni e ruoth nyasaye kuom mano musa gi harun nodhi ir farao mowachone niya ruoth nyasaye nyasach johibrania owacho niya pod ibiro dagi bolori e nyima nyaka kar ango joga oa mondo odhi olama ka pod itamori miyo joga thuolo mondo oa kiny nakel bonyo e pinyi kendo gibiro nur e piny kata mana lowo ok nonen ginicham gik moko duto modong mane pe ok oketho kaachiel gi yien duto ginipong uteni gi ute jodongi kod ute jogi ginibed marach moloyo gimoro amora wuoneu kata kwereu oseneno nyaka ne gibi e pinyni kane musa osewuoyo kamano noa moweyo farao jodong farao nowachone niya ngatni pod biro thagowa nyaka kar ango joisrael machwo odhi mondo olam ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi donge koro ingeyo ni misri osekethore kuom mano noom musa gi harun moduogo ir farao mi nowachonigi niya unyalo dhi mondo ulam ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nga gini biro dhi musa nodwoke niya wabiro dhi waduto joma tindo kod joma dongo nyiri gi yawuowi kaachiel gi jamni duto nimar waduto nyaka watim ni ruoth nyasaye sawo farao nowachonigi niya nyasaye mondo okonyu ka po ni ayienu udhi kaachiel gi mondu kod nyithindu nyaka bed ni uchano timo gimoro marach ooyo ok ayienu timo kamano un joma chwo kende ema unyalo dhi mondo ulam ruoth nyasaye nikech mano ema nudwaro mi noriembogi gia e nyime ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya rie badi e piny misri mondo bonyo obi ocham gik moko duto mane pe oweyo ok ochamo omiyo musa norieyo ludhe e piny misri mi ruoth nyasaye notugo yamb ugue mokudho e pinyno odiechiengno duto gotienono duto kane piny oru noyudo ka yamb ugue osekelo bonyo bonyogo nopie e piny misri mangeny nyaka nene pok one bende ok none nyaka chieng ne gipoto piny mi piny nolokore bonyo lilo kendo ne gichamo gik moko duto mane dongo e piny kaachiel gi olembe duto mane pe oweyo onge kata lith oboke mane odong e piny misri duto farao noluongo musa gi harun mowachonigi niya aseketho ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kendo ni un bende koro yie ungwonnae dichiel kendo ulam ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mondo oyie ogol masira malichni kuoma kuom mano musa noa ir farao modhi olamo ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye noloko yamono mi okudho matek kaa imbo motero bonyo e nam makwar kata achiel ne ok odong misri ruoth nyasaye nomiyo chuny farao odoko matek mi ne ok oweyo joisrael odhi masich mudho mandiwa bang mano ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya rie badi kochomo polo mondo mudho mandiwa ji muloe mana gi lwetgi oim piny misri musa norieyo bade kochomo polo mi mudho mandiwa noimo piny misri duto kuom ndalo adek onge jamisri mane nyalo neno wadgi kendo onge ngat mane owuok e ode kuom ndalo adekgo kamoro amora mane joisrael odakie ema ler ne nitie farao noluongo musa mowachone niya dhiuru ulam ruoth nyasaye mondu gi nyithindu bende nyalo dhi kodu mak mana jambu ema nyaka dong ka musa nodwoke niya ingeyo ni ema nyaka imiwa jamni mwatimogo ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa misengni miwango pep kod misengni mamoko jambwa bende nyaka wadhigo kendo onge kata achiel biro dong chien nimar dipo ka wadwaro jamni moko mwadhi lamogo ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa kuom jambwago nikech kapok wachopo kuno ok wangeyo ni wadhi lame gango ruoth nyasaye nomiyo chuny farao odoko matek mi nodagi ni kik gidhi nowacho ni musa niya aye e wanga bende kik ichak inena nikech chieng minenae kendo nitho musa nodwoke ni adier ok nachak aneni kendo wuok musa okoro tho nyithindo makayo ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya koro odong masira achiel abiro kelo ni farao gi jomisri eka noweu udhi ok mano kende noriembu mana kaka ngat riembo chiege koro nyis ji ni ngato ka ngato dichwo kata dhako mondo okwa gik molos gi fedha kod dhahabu kuom jogwenggi mi ruoth nyasaye nomiyo jomisri ogeno joisrael bende jodong farao gi jomisri duto nomiyo musa duong ahinya musa nowacho ni farao niya ruoth nyasaye owacho kama abiro wuotho kuom jomisri e dier otieno tir kendo nyithindo makayo duto manie piny misri biro tho chakre kach ruoth farao nyaka kach dhako misumba jarego kaachiel gi kach jamni duto ywak maduong pok one bende ok none biro bedo e piny misri joisrael biro bedo gi kue kata mana guok ok nogue dhano kata chiayo kamano ununge ni ruoth nyasaye oketo pogruok e kind jomisri gi joisrael bange jodongi nobi ira mi ginikulrena ka giwacho niya dhiyo un gi jou duto bang mano eka naa mi musa noa ir farao gi mirima mager ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya farao ok bi winjo wachni omiyo abiro medo timo honni e piny misri musa gi harun nosetimo honnigo duto e nyim farao ruoth nyasaye nomiyo wiye odoko matek mi ne ok onyal weyo joisrael e pinye wuok pasaka ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa gi harun e piny misri niya dueni ema biro bedonu due mokwongo mar higa nyis joisrael duto kama chieng due apar mar dueni ngato ka ngato nyaka yier nyarombo kata nyadiel ni joode tiende ni chiayo achiel ni ot ka ot kapo ni joot moro nok ahinya chiayo ngima ohingo wuon odno kod ngat modak bute nyaka riwre e chiayono nyaka upim gima ngato ka ngato nyalo chamo mondo ungego kar romb joma oromo chiayo achiel chiayono nyaka bed nyarombo kata nyadiel dichwo jahiga achiel onge songa kanuru chiayogo nyaka chop chieng mar apar gangwen mar dueni eka oganda joisrael duto mondo oneggi ka piny dwaro yuso bange gikaw remo giwirgo sisi mag dhoudi kod wi dhoudi mag udi duto nochamie jamnigo nyaka gibul ringo gotienono kendo e piny misri duto kendo naneg nyathi ka nyathi dichwo makayo mar dhano kod mar chiayo e ruoth nyasaye kendo anakum nyiseche duto mag jomisri remb nyirombego nobed kido nyiso udi mudakie kendo kaneno remono anakadhu mi masich tho magoyogo piny misri ok nomaku odiechingno nobednu chieng rapar omiyo nyaka urite ka sawo mochwere ni ruoth nyasaye kuom tiengeu duto nyaka ucham makati ok ketie thowi joisrael chieng mokwongo kod chieng mar abiriyo nyaka utim chokruok moyiedhi kuom ndalo ariyogo kik uti tich moro mak mana tij loso chiemo nyaka utim sawo mar makati ok ketie thowi nikech chiengno ema nogolie ogendu e piny misri tiengeu duto nyaka rit odiechiengno mondo obed chieng sawo mochwere chakre odhiambo mar due apar gangwen mar due mokwongo nyaka odhiambo mar due piero ariyo gachiel ema unuchamie makati ok ketie thowi kuom ndalo abiriyogo kik thowi bedie uteu nikech ngat mochamo gimoro moketie thowi nongad kare oko kuom oganda joisrael bed ni en japiny kata jadak kik ucham gimoro moketie thowi nyaka ucham mana makati ok ketie thowi kamoro amora mudakie musa noluongo jodong israel duto mowachonigi niya ngato ka ngato mondo odhi oyier nyarombo kata nyadiel ni joode mondo unegi kutimogo pasaka eka ukaw oboke mag owino ulutie remo manie tawo kendo uwirgi wi dhoudi kod sisi mag dhoudi kik ngato kuomu wuog oko nyaka okinyi ruoth nyasaye biro wuotho e piny misri duto mondo oneg jomisri enokadh dhoot ka dhoot moneno remo e wiye kendo e sisi mage kendo ok nowe malaika maneko donje uteu mondo onegu rituru chikegi mochwere kaachiel gi nyithindu ka udonjo e piny ruoth nyasaye musa otieko wuoyo joisrael nogoyo chonggi piny molemo ne gidhi mi girito wechego kendo gitimo gima ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa gi harun masira mogik tho nyithindo makayo e dier otienono tir ruoth nyasaye nonego nyithindo yawuowi makayo duto chakre kach ruoth farao nyaka kach ngat motue e jela kaachiel gi nyithindo makayo duto mag jamni farao gi jodonge kod jomisri duto nochiew gotienono kendo ulam ruoth nyasaye kaka usekwayo jambu bende kawuru uago bende lamnauru mondo ayud gueth jomisri norungo joisrael mondo oa e pinygi piyopiyo ka giwacho niya waduto wabiro tho ka ok ua omiyo joisrael nokawo sufriache mag makati motingo mogo modwal mapok oketie thowi ne giboyogi gi nenggi mi gitingogi e gokgi noyudo ka joisreal osekwayo jomisri lewni kod gik moko molos gi fedha kod dhahabu kaka musa nosechiko ruoth nyasaye nomiyo jomisri ogeno joisrael mi ne gimiyogi gik moko duto mane gikwayo kamano e kaka ne giyako jomisri joisrael owuok misri joisrael nochako wuoth rameses kochomo sukoth mara sawo mar makati ok ketie thowi musa nowacho ni joisrael niya nyaka upar odiechieng uwuokie misrini nikech ruoth nyasaye ogolou gi tekone maduong e piny mane ubedoe wasumbini makati moketie thowi nyaka ne gichopo e mbap piny kanaan onduetni angwen romre gi debe achiel wuok pi owuok e lwanda kwan oganda duto mar joisrael nowuok e thi sin mi giwuotho matintin kaka ruoth nyasaye ne chikogi ne gibworo refidim pi modho ne onge kuno mano nomiyo ji odhaw gi musa ka giwachone niya miwa pi wamodhi musa nodwokogi ni marango udhaw koda ango momiyo utemo ruoth nyasaye ji ne riyo oloyo malich omiyo ne giywakne ka giwacho niya ere gimomiyo nigolowa misri gi nyithindwa kod jambwa mondo riyo obi onegwa kane musa owinjo kamano nokwayo ruoth nyasaye gi chunye duto kopenjo niya abiro timo ango gi jogi nimar gichiegni goya gi kite ruoth nyasaye nodwoke niya kaw jodong israel moko mondo itelgo e nyim ji kitingo ludhi mane ichwadogo aora nael anachung e nyimi kanyo lwanda man horeb inichwad lwandano mi pi nowuogie mondo ji omodhi musa notimo kamano e nyim jodong israel nochako nying kanyo ni masa tiende ni tem bende nochake ni meriba tiende ni dhaw nikech joisrael nodhaw kode kanyo kendo otemoe ruoth nyasaye ka gipenjo niya ruoth nyasaye ni koda koso oonge joisrael okedo gi joamalek joamalek nobiro refidim momonjo joisrael mi musa nowacho ni joshua niya yier jomoko mondo kiny udhi ukednwago gi joamalek abiro chung ewi got katingo luth mane nyasaye omiya joshua notimo kaka musa nochike mi nokedo gi joamalek musa gi harun kod hur ne joidho ewi got e kinde duto mane musa otingo bedene malo joisrael ne loyo kane odwoko bedene piny joamalek ema ne loyo kane bede musa koro ojony harun gi hur ne joketone kidi mobetie ka gitingo bedene koni gi koni malo ne gisiro bedene kamano nyaka chieng opodho mi joshua noloyo joamalek monegogi bange ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya ndik gima osetimoreno e kitabu mondo e ndalo mabiro ji opar wachno bende inyis joshua ni abiro miyo wi ji duto wil chuth gi joamalek musa nogero kendomarmisango mi nochake ni jehovanisi tiende ni ruoth nyasaye e bandecha eka nowacho niya akuongora e bwo bandech ruoth nyasaye ni ruoth nyasaye biro kedo gi joamalek nyaka chieng wuok jethro obiro limo musa jethro jadolo mar midian kendo jaduong musa nowinjo gik moko duto mane nyasaye osetimo ni musa gi joisrael kendo kaka ruoth nyasaye nogologi misri kane musa oriembo zipora chiege jethro nokawo nyareno kaachiel gi yawuote ariyo gershom gi eliezer musa nosewacho niya jadak e piny ok marwa omiyo nochako wuode achiel ni gershom tiende ni jadak bende nosewacho niya nyasach wuora en jakonyna mane oresa ka farao dwaro nega omiyo nochako wuode machielo ni eliezer tiende ni nyasaye en jakonyna jethro nobiro ir musa e god nyasaye kuma ne musa obworoe kokelone chiege gi yawuote noter ne musa wach ni jaduongni jethro biro iri gi chiegi kod yawuoti musa nowuok modhi romone nokulorene kendo onyodhe mi gimosore kane gisedonjo e hema musa nonyise duto mane ruoth nyasaye osetimo ni farao kendo ni jomisri nikech nohero joisrael bende nonyise thagruok mane giyudo e yo kendo kaka ruoth nyasaye noresogi jethro koro ne mor ahinya kowinjo ngwono mane ruoth nyasaye otimo ni joisrael koresogi kuom jomisri nowacho niya opak ruoth nyasaye mane oresou e lwet jomisri kendo e lwet farao koro angeyo ni ruoth nyasaye duong moloyo nyiseche duto nikech osereso joisrael e loch mar jomisri kuma ne iritogie gi achaye bange jethro notimo ni nyasaye misango miwango pep kod misengni mamoko harun gi jodong isarel duto ne jobiro mochamo sawono gi jethro e nyim nyasaye yiero mar jongad bura rapar mar chik kinyne musa nobet piny mondo oyal ji mi ji nochung kolwore chakre okinyi nyaka odhiambo kane jethro oneno tich mangeny mane musa timo ni ji nopenje niya ango momiyo itiyo tijegi ni jogi duto ka kendi ka ji ochung kolwori chakre okinyi nyaka odhiambo musa nodwoke niya nyaka atim kamano nikech ji biro ira mondo onge gima nyasaye dwaro ka ngato odonjo ni wadgi gikelo wachno ira mondo angad buchgi bende anyiso ji buche gi chike mag nyasaye jethro nowachone niya gima itimoni ok ber ibiro mana ol kaachiel gi jogi duto tijni ngeny omiyo ok inyal time kendi angadni rieko mondo nyasaye okonyi onego ibed jachung ni ji e nyim nyasaye kiterone ywakgi bende onego ipuonjgi chike kod buche kendo inyisgi yore monego giluw kod gik monego gitim nyaka iyier ji mariek kendo moluoro nyasaye kuom ji duto nyaka gibed joadiera kendo ok nyal chamo asoya gin ema mondo iketgi jotend ji jomoko kuomgi onego rit ji alufu achiel achgiel moko ji mia mia kendo moko ji piero abich abich moko ji apar apar jogi ema mondo ongad ni ji bura pile buche matek kende ema ginyalo kelo iri moko matindo gingad kendgi kipogo ting kodgi kamano tiji biro dong moromi kitimo gima awachoni nyasaye biroo konyi mi ok ibi ol kendo ji duto nyalo dok miechgi piyo ka buchegi oserumo musa nowinjo wach jaduongne motimo kaka nowachone noyiero joma riek kuom joisrael duto moketogi jotelo mag ji alufu achiel achiel gi mag ji mia mia gi mag ji piero abich abich kod mag ji apar apar jotelogo ne ngado bura ni ji kinde duto buche matek kende ema ne gitero ir musa mago matindo ne gingado kendgi giwegi bange musa noweyo jaduongne oa modok thurgi wuok joisrael e got sinai e due mar adek kane joisrael osewuok misri ne gichopo e thim sinai ne giwuok refidim mi gitundo e thim sinai kuma ne gibworoe momanyore gi got musa noidho godno ir nyasaye mi ruoth nyasaye noluonge gie got mowachone niya nyis nyikwa jakobo joisrael kama nuneno gima natimo ni jomisri kendo kaka nakelou ira ka atingou kaka ongo tingo nyithinde e bwombe koro ka unuluora murit singruok atimo kodu unubed joga awuon aseyiero kuom ogendini duto nikech piny duto en mara unubed oganda mowal matiyona ka jodolo mano e wach onego inyis joisrael omiyo musa nodhi mochoko jotend joisrael kanyakla monyisogi weche duto mane ruoth nyasaye osewachone ji duto nodwoke rat niya wayie timo gik moko duto ruoth nyasaye osewacho mi musa nodwoko ni ruoth nyasaye wach mane ji owacho eka ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya abiro biro iri ka ei bor polo mapek mondo awuo kodi ka ji winjo mondo gen gigenigo kik rum musa nonyiso ruoth nyasaye gima ji nodwoko ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya dhiyo ipuodh ji kawuono gi kiny kendo inyisgi gilwok lepgi orucha nyaka gibed moikore nikech odiechiengno ema ruoth nyasaye nalor ewi got sinai kama ji duto nonenae nyaka iket tong molworo got kendo iwach ni ji niya neuru ni ok uidho got kata mana nyono tike ka ngato omulo got nyaka nege ka unege kik umule gi lwetu goyeuru mana gi kite kata chieleuru mana gi asere timuru kamano ni dhano kata ni le mak mana ka tung oywak eka ji nyalo dhi e got musa nolor oa e got moduogo ir ji nopuodhogi kendo ne gilwoko lepgi nowachonigi niya ikreuru kendo kik uriwru gi mon mondo orucha oyud ka usepuodhoru chieng mar adek kane piny oru polo ne mor kendo mil ewi got bende ne nitie bor polo mapek kendo tung maywak mi ji duto mane nie kambi nokirni musa notelo ni ji ka gia e kambi gidhi romo gi nyasaye mi ne gichung e tiend got sinai wi got duto notimo iro nikech ruoth nyasaye noselorie ka en ei mach iro ne dhuolore kendo ji duto ne kirni malich ywak tung nomedore kendo e kinde ka kinde mane musa wuoyo nyasaye ne dwoke gi mor polo ruoth nyasaye nolor mochung ewi got sinai kendo noluongo musa kanyo mi musa noidho modhi ire nowacho ni musa niya lor idhi isiem ji dipo ka gikadho tong mondo gibi ginena nono gibiro tho mangeny kata mana jodolo bende moyienigi chopo ira nyaka ne ni opuodhore nono abiro mwomora kuomgi musa nodwoko ruoth nyasaye ni ji ok nyal biro ewi got sinai ku nikech iwuon ema nisiemowa matek kichikowa ni mondo waket tong ni got mondo wawalego osik maler ruoth nysaye nowachone niya lor mondo idhi iom harun jodolo kaachiel gi ji kik kadh tong ka giidho ira nono abiro mwomora kuomgi omiyo musa nodhi ir ji mowuoyo kodgi wuok chike apar rapar mar chik nyasaye nowuoyo kowacho wechegi e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mane ogolou e piny misri kuma ne ubedoe wasumbni kik ubed gi nyasaye moro mak mana kik ulos kido moro mopa kata gima chalo gi gimoro manie polo malo kata manie piny mwalo kata mana manie pi e bwo piny kik ukulrunigi kata lamogi kik ulamgi nikech ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nyasaye janyiego akumo nyithind joma ochaya nikech richo jonywolgi nyaka tieng mar adek gi mar angwen tienge gana gi gana mohera kendo momako chikna ahero gi hera mosiko kik uluong nying ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kayiem nono nimar anakum ngato ka ngato mokonyore gi nyinga e yo ok ni kare paruru chieng sabato kendo uwale ni ruoth nyasaye nyaka uti tijeu duto kuom ndalo auchiel chieng mar abiriyo en chieng yweyo mowal ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu chiengno un kaachiel gi yawuotu kod nyiu kata wasumbu machwo gi mamon kata jambu kata mana jodak manie miechu kik ti tich moro nimar ruoth nyasaye mochweyo polo gi piny kod nam kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie igi kuom ndalo auchiel chieng mar abiriyo noyueyo mano emomiyo ruoth nyasaye noguedho chieng sabato kowale mondo obed maler luor wuoru gi meru eka mondo idag aminga e piny ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro miyou kik ineki kik iterri kik ikwal kik ihang ni ngato wach kik igomb od ngato kata chi ngato kata misumba ngato kata dher ngato kata kanj ngato kata gimoro amora ngato nigo luoro omako joisrael rapar mar chik kane ji duto oneno ka polo mor kendo mil bende kane giwinjo ka tung ywak kendo gineno ka got dum iro ne gikirni mi gichung gi chien ne giwacho ni musa niya ema mondo iwuo kodwa wabiro winjo wachni ka nyasaye ema owuoyo kodwa wabiro tho musa nodwokogi niya kik uluor nimar nyasaye osebiro mana ni mondo otemu kendo omi usik kuluore mondo kik utim richo ji nochung gi chien musa kende ema nosudo machiegni gi bor polo mapek mane nyasaye nie iye chike mag kende mag misango ruoth nysaye nowacho ni musa niya nyis joisrael kama koro ungeyo ni asewuoyo kodu gie polo kik ulos nyiseche mag fedha kata mag dhahabu mondo ulam kaachiel koda nyaka ulosna kendomarmisango mar lowo kendo utimie misengni miwango pep kod misengni mag sawo mutimo gi rombu kod dhou kamoro amora achiko ni mondo ulamae anabie kendo naguedhue kapo ni uloso na kendomarmisango gi kite kik ugere gi kite mopa nikech kupayogi umiyo kendono bedo mogak kik ngato dhi e kendonamarmisango koidho raidhi nimar dipo ka duge oneno wuok chike mag rito wasumbini rapar mar chik chike nyaka imi joisrael e magi ka ngato ongiewo misumba jahibrania misumbano notine kuom higni auchiel e higa mar abiriyo nyaka oweye oa mak ochulo gimoro kane obiro kapok okendo enodog kende kane obiro kosekendo enodog ir chiege ka ruodhe ema omiye dhako mi onywologo nyithindo dhakono gi nyithindogo nyaka dong ni ruodhe ngatno noa kende kapo ni misumbano ohulo ratiro niya ahero ruodha gi chiega kod nyithinda omiyo ok adwar ruodhe nyaka tere e nyim nyasaye kendo e dhoot kata e si dhoot mi otuch ite gi riw kendo ngatno nobed misumbane nyak chieng ka ngato ongiewo nyar ngato mondo obed misumbane ok nowe nyakono oa kaka iweyo wasumbini machwo ka ok otoyo ruodhe manongiewe ka dwaro kende ruodheno nyaka weye mondo ngato oware ok oyiene mondo ongiewe ni japiny moro nikech osewuonde ka odwaro ni mondo wuode okende nyaka osewe kaka dosew nyare owuon ka omedo dhako machielo nyaka one ni pod omiyo mokwongono chiemo gi lewni kendo onindo e ode ka ok otimne gik moko adego nyaka oweye oa mak ochulo gimoro chike mag timbe mahundu ngato ka ngato mogoyo wadgi monego en bende nonege ka obothne onyalo ringo mondo odhi oresre kuma abiro nyisou ka ngato okinyo wadgi monego maroyiem unugole kata mana e kendona mar misango mondo onege ngat mogoyo wuon kata min nyaka negi ngat mokwalo dhano nyaka negi kata da bed ni oyud kosengiewe kata koyud ka pod en kode ngat mokuongo wuon kata min nyaka negi ka ji dhaw mi ngato ogoyo wadgi gi kidi kata gi adhong jal mogono ok otho obedo matuo e pien kendo bange ochango koro onyalo wuotho oko kata mana kosirore gi luth jal mane ogoyeno ok nobed gi bura nyaka ochul gimoro kuom kinde jalo oseketho kendo nyaka one ni othiedhe mochango chuth ka ngato ogoyo misumbane dichwo kata madhako gi luth motho e wago nyaka kume ka misumbaneno obet mangima kuom ndalo achiel kata ariyo ok nokume nikech misumba en mwandu ruodhe ka chwo moko gore mi moro otuomore kuom dhako yach mi dhakono iye okirore tuo moro ok oluwe ngat mohinyeno nyaka chul gima chwor dhakono dwaro ka jongad bura oyiego e kinde akinda ngato ohinyo wadgi kum nyaka bed maromre gi hinyruok ngima kar ngima wang kar wang lak kar lak tielo kar tielo wengo kar wengo lero kar lero kendo chwat kar chwat ka ngato ogoyo wang misumbane dichwo kata madhako motucho nyaka owe ni misumbaneno thuolo mondo oa kar chule pesa mar wangeno kata ka ngato omuko lak misumbane nyaka owene thuolo mondo oa kar chule lakeno chike momako weg gik moko ka rwath ochwowo dichwo kata dhako moro monego nyaka go rwadhno gi kite mi tho kendo ringre kik cham wuon rwadhno ok noyud kum ka rwadhno osebedo ka chwowo ji kendo osesiem wuongo otamore tueye mi onego ngato wuongo bende nyaka negi ka buch tho oloki moketne chudo nyaka ochul gimoro amora mowachne mondo owargo ngimane ka rwath onego nyathi moro bed ni en wuowi kata nyako chik achielno ema nyaka tigo ka rwath onego misumba dichwo kata madhako wuon rwadhno nyaka chul ruodh misumbano fedha moromo nu kilo kendo rwadhno nyaka go gi kite mi tho ka ngato oelo dho bur moweyo nono kata ka okunyo bur ok oumo dhoge mi rwath kata faras onyumoree nyaka ochul chiayono enochul wuon chiayo pesa chiayo mothono nodongne ka rwadh ngato onego rwadh ngat machielo ji ariyogo nyaka lok rwath mangimano pesa mondo gipogre kendo ring chiayo mothono bende nyaka gipogre ka ongere ni rwadhno jachwow rwedhi wetene wuongo nyaka chul rwath kar rwadhno chiayo mothono dongne wuok chike moket kuom chulo gima okethi ka ngato okwalo rwath kata rombo mi oyango kata ongiewo nyaka ochul rwedhi abich kar rwadhno kata rombe angwen kar rombono nyaka ochule te ka jakuogno jachan nyaka ongiewe ka misumba mondo pesa mongieweggo obed chudo kar gima osekwalo ka oyude gi chiayono ka pod ngima kata bed ni en rwath kata kanyna kata mana rombo nyaka ochul nyadiriyo ka ojuk jakuo katuro ot mi onege ok noyal ngat monegeno e buch nek ka gima kamano otimore ka chieng osewuok nyaka yal ngat monegeno e buch nek ka ngato kwayo jamni e puoth cham kata e puoth mzabibu moweyo jambe ochamo puoth ngat machielo nyaka ochul chamgo gi cham mabeyo kata ochul olembego gi olembe mabeyo mag puothe owuon ka mach omuoch kendo olandore momako yugi kendo owango tuche mag cham mobeti kata cham pok oka kata mana puodho ngima ngat momoko majno nyaka chul kar gik mokethogo ka ngato omiyo wadgi pesa kata gimoro ni mondo okanne mi okwal gigo e od wadgino koyud jakuogno nyaka ochul gik mokwalgo nyadiriyo ka ok oyude nyaka wuon odno dhi e nyim nyasaye mondo okuongre ni ok okawo gino gimoro amora mochachni kata rwath kata kanyna kata rombo kata law kata gimoro amora mokwany ji ariyo laro nyaka ter wachne e nyim nyasaye jal nyasaye onyiso ni e jaketho nyaka chul wadgi mokehoneno nyadiriyo ka ngato oriembo ni wadgi kanyna kata dhiang kata rombo kata chiayo moro amora mi chiayono otho kata ohinyore kata ope e kwath ka ngama neno onge ngat mane oriembnegono nyaka kuongre e nyim nyasaye konyiso ni en ok okawe ka oyud ni ok okwale adier wuongo nyaka wachno kamano kendo ngatno ok nochule ka okwal chiayono kuome nyaka ochul wuongo ka ondiek ema onege nyaka okel ringe modong mondo ji one nikech ok onego ochul gima ondiek ema onego ka ngato oholo chiach wadgi bange chiayono ohinyore kata otho ka wuongo onge jal moholono nyaka chule ka chiayono ohinyore kata otho ka wuongo nitie jaholono ok chule ka en gima ichuloe gimoro euon chiayono noyud mana chudono kende chike mag dak gi mag dini ka ngato osero nyako ngili pok okendi mi oriworego nyaka okende ka wuon nyako odagi ni ngatno ok kend nyare nyaka ngatno chul pesa moromo nywomo nyako ngili kik uwe dhako jajwok bed ngima nyaka unege ngato moterore gi chiayo nyaka negi ngato motimo liswa ni nyasaye moro ok ruoth nyasaye nyaka negi kik uthag jadak kata kik uthire nikech un bende ne un jodak e piny misri bende kik uthag chi liel kata nyathi kich ka uthagogi mi giywakna mondo akonygi anawinjgi kendo anakech kodu mi anakel lweny unuthoe kamano mondu nodong mond liete kendo nyithindu nobed kiye ka iholo ngata moro jachan pesa kik ikaw kuome ohala ka jahol pesa kata ka ngato osingoni lawe nyaka idwokne lawno kapok chieng opodho nikech mano e lawe kende moumorego ka ok itimo kamano ere gima donindie ka oywakna ni mondo akonye anawinje nikech angwon kik uyany nyasaye kendo kik ukuong jotendu kik utamru miya chiwo moa kuom chambu kata kuom divai kata kuom mo yawuotu makayo bende nyaka umiya kendo utim kamano gi jambu bende nyaka gibed gi mingi kuom ndalo abiriyo chieng mar aboro unumiyagi unubed ji mowalna omiyo kik ucham ringo ondiek onego oko e thim nyaka uwite mana ni guogi wuok bura makare kendo madiera kik ijig wach kendo kik ikony ngat jaketho kibedo janeno mar miriambo kik itim gimoro marach mana nikech iluoro koma ji ngenyie kata kik iketh bura mana nikech idwaro chwako koma ji ngenyie bende kik idog ni ngat modhier kayiem kineno dher jasiki kata kanje karingo lal nyaka igenge mi idwoke ni wuongo ka iyudo kanj ngat moro mamon kodi kopodho gi misike nyaka ikony wuongo chunge kata dabed ni ok idwar konye kik uketh buch jachan kiyale beduru mabor gi wach mar miriambo kendo kik umi ngat onge ketho ngadne buch tho nimar ok nawe ngat motimo marach machalo kamano kik ucham asoya nikech asoya mono kata ngat maber wacho adiera kendo owito buch ngat onge gi ketho kik usand jodak nikech ungeyo paro jodak nigo nimar un bende ne un jodak e piny misri higa mar sabato kod chieng sabato unyalo puro lopu kuom higni auchiel kendo kayo gik monyakie e higa mar abiriyo nyaka uwe onindi mak opure mondo jou modhier ocham gik moloth kuno le mae thim nocham gik joma odhier oweyo kuno puotheu mag mzabibu gi mag zeituni bende nyaka uwe kamano unuti kuom ndalo auchiel chieng mar abiriyo kik uti mondo dhou gi kenjeu oyue kendo mondo chuny wasumbu kod chuny jodak oduogi mak uru weche duto asenyisou kik ulam nyiseche mamoko kendo kik umul nyinggi sewni adek madongo wuok rapar mar chik nyaka utimna sawo didek e higa unurit sap makati ok ketie thowi kaka nachikou kuchamo makati ok ketie thowi kuom ndalo abiriyo e kinde moketie e due mar abib ni mar dueno ema ne uae misri kik ngato bi e nyima gi lwete nono kukayo cham nmane uchwoyo e lopu nyaka utim sap keyo kukelona cham mukwongo kayo bende unutim sap olembe e giko higa ka usepono olembe puotheu mag mzabibu kod mag zeituni kinde adekgo e higa jou machwo duto nyaka bi e nyima ruoth nyasaye e kinde utimonae misango gi chiayo kik uchiw gimoro moketie thowi kendo kik uwe bor chiayo motimnago misango dong nyaka piny ru mak uwango pep cham mabeyoe moloyo mukwongo kayo nyaka ukel e od ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kutedo nyadiel kik uolie cha min mare malaika mar ruoth nyasaye oor mondo otel ni joisrael koro aoro malaika mondo otelnu e yo koritou nyaka kuma aseiko nyaka uwinj wachne kendo utim kaka owacho kik utamru winje nikech kutamoru kamano ok nowenu richo kamano nimar ema kode ka uwinjo wachne mutimo duto mawachonu anakednu gi wasigu kendo anathag joma thagou malaikana notel e nyimu kendo noteru e piny joamor gi johiti gi joperizi gi johivi kod jojebus odakie mi anatiek ogendinigo kik ukulru ni nyiseche jogo kata kik ulamgi bende kik utim gik jogo timo nyaka uketh nyisechegi chuth kendo nyaka umuk sirni maggi gilamo lamauru ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mi anaguedhu gi chiemo kod pi bende anatiek tuoche duto kuomu onge dhako iye nokirre e pinyu kendo onge nobed migumba bende anami udag aminga anaor kihondko otel nyimu mondo ochand joma dwaro kedo kodu mi anami wasiku duto ringu bende anaor luoro mondo otel nyimu kendo luoro nogo noriemb johivi gi jokanaan kod johiti mondo owenu thuolo ok nariembgi duto e higa achiel nimar dipo ka piny odong nono molokore thim kendo ondiegi dinywolre mi thagu anariembgi matintin nyaka chop kusemedoru mangeny moromo kawo pinyno duto anayar tong pinyu kochakore e nam makwar nyak nam maduong manie tong jofilistia kendo kochakore e thim man yo milambo nyaka aora yufrate anami ulo jopinyno mi unuriembgi kik utim kodgi winjruok kendo kik ulam nyisechegi kik uwe gidag e pinyu nimar dipo ka gimiyo uketho e nyiuma mi ulamo nyisechegi mano dilokrenu obadho wuok joisrael otimo winjruok gi nyasaye noyudo ka ruoth nyasaye osewacho ni musa niya bi ira e got kaachiel gi harun gi nadab gi abihu kod jodong israel piero abiriyo kapok uchopo machiegni kulreuru mondo ulem kendi musa ema nichop machiegni koda jomokogo ok nosud ira bende onge ngato angata noidh kodi ku musa nodhi monyiso ji chike kod buche duto mag ruoth nysaye ji duto nodwoke niya wayie timo gik moko duto ruoth nyasaye osewacho musa nondiko chike duto mag ruoth nyasaye kinyne gokinyi nogero kendomarmisango e tiend got kendo nochungo kite apar gariyo mag rapar maromre gi kar romb dhout israel apar gariyo eka nooro yawuowi moko joisrael monego rwedhi mi gitimogo ni ruoth nyasaye misengni miwango pep kod misengni mag sawo musa nokawo remo moko moolo e tewni remo modong nokiro e kendo marmisango bange nokawo kitabu mondikie weche mag singruokgo mosomo matek mondo ji duto owinji giduto ne giwacho niya wayie winjo ruoth nyasaye kendo wanatim duto mosechiko bang mano musa nokawo remo mokiro kuom ji kowacho niya e remo mar singruok mane ruoth nyasaye osemiyo utimo kode kaluwore gi weche manie kitabuni musa gi harun gi nadab kod abihu kaachiel gi jodong israel piero abiriyo nodhi e got moneno nyasach israel nochung ewi gima chalo gi laro molos gi kit ombo marieny mana ka polo ruoth nyasaye ne ok ohinyo jodong israelgo ne gineno ruoth nyasaye mi gichiemo kode kendo gimetho musa e got sinai ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya bi ira e got ku mondo ibed ka abiro miyi kite mopamore asendikoe buche kod chike mondo ipuonj ji musa kaachiel gi joshua jatichne nodhi e god nyasaye noyudo musa osewacho ni jodong israel niya ritwauru ka nyaka waduogi harun kod hur eki odong kodu ngato ka ngato man gi wach modwaro loso mondo odhi irgi kamano musa nodhi ewi got kendo bor polo noimo got duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye nolor ewi got sinai mi bor polo noimo got kuom ndalo auchiel chieng mar abiriyo ruoth nyasaye noluongo musa gi e bor polo duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye ne chalo ni joisrael mana ka mach maduong maliel ewi got musa nodonjo e bor polono modhi ewi got kendo nobet kuno kuom ndalo piero angwen odiechieng gotieno wuok nyasaye okwayo joisrael mondo okelne chiwo wuok ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya nyis joisrael mondo okelna chiwo kendo ichokna chiwo moro amora kuom ji duto moyie golo kuom herogi gik onego ichok e magi dhahabu gi fedha kod mula kaachiel gi law mambulu kod marathuol kod makwar kod law katana maber gi yie diek gi piende rombe molok gi range makwar gi piende monyong gi yiend shita gi mor taya kod gik mangue ngar gi kite mibiro keto e law dolo miluongo ni efod kod law agoko bang mano gigerna kama ler mondo adag kodgi nyaka gere kaachiel gi gige duto kiluwo mana kido abiro nyisi sanduk mar rapar wuok los sanduk borne oromo mita achiel lachne nu mita kendo borne modhi malo bende nu mita bawe gi dhahabu maler oko gi iye kendo ilosne laini mar dhahabu molwuoro bethene duto thedhne ratege angwen mag dhahabu kendo ketgi e tiendene angwen ratege ariyo nobed e bathe konchiel ariyo e bathe komachielo los ludhe ariyo gi yiend sida mi ibawgi gi dhahabu kendo irwakgi e ratege manie bath sanduk koni gi koni mondo otinggo sanduk ludhego nyaka sik ei ratege ok ogolgi oko ketie kite ariyo mag rapar abiro miyi losne raum mar dhahabu borne oromo mita achiel lachne nu mita obed karngwono kaw dhahabu ithedhgo kido ariyo machalo gi malaika miluongo ni kerubi mondo gibed gimoro achiel gi raum mondo obed kar ngwono kerubi achiel nobed e dho raum konchiel kendo achiel e dhoge komachielo ginibed ka giyaro buombegi malo mondo gigeng raum kendo ginimanyre ka gingiyo wi raum ket raumno e dho sanduk iye ketie kite ariyo mag rapar abiro miyi kanyo ema naromie kodi kendo ka ewi raum e kind kerubi ariyo manie wi sandug rapar anamiyi chikena duto iter ni joisrael mesa mar makati miketo e nyim nyasaye pile wuok los mesa gi yiend sida borne romo mita achiel lachne nu mita kendo borne modhi malo bende nu mita bawe gi dhahabu maler kendo ilosne laini mar dhahabu molworo bethene duto chue mithe alwora lachne romo tat lwedo achiel kendo ichue dir mitheno gi dhahabu ilo ratege angwen mag dhahabu kendo ichomgi e tunge angwen mag mesa kama tiendene nitie mondo otingego ratege norwakie ludhe mitingego nobed e mithe ilo ludhego gi yiend sida kendo ibawgi gi dhahabu gin ema noting kodgi mesano los tewni gi kikombe gi agulni kod agwetni mitiyogo kitimo misengni miolo piny gigo duto nyaka los gi dhahabu maler makati miketo e nyima pile nyaka bed e mesano ndalo duto rachung taya mar dhahabu wuok ilo rachung taya gi dhahabu maler tiende kod kore mondo ilo gi dhahabu mothedhi kendo maupe mogorie kaachiel gi thiepegi kod obokegi nyaka los obed gimoro achiel kode nobed gi bede auchiel moa e bathe koni gi koni adek e bathe konchiel kendo adek e bathe komachielo moro ka moro nyaka bed gi maupe adek mogor kaachiel gi thiepegi kod obokegi machal gi thiep oyungu e kor taya hie nyaka bedie maupe angwen man gi thiepe kod oboke machalo gi thiep oyungu bede ariyo ariyo mag rachungino nyaka bed gi maua achiel e bwogi maupego gi bedego kod rachungino nobed gimoro achiel mothedh gi dhahabu maler bende ilo teyni abiriyo ni rachungi kendo iketgi malo mondo giliel ka gimenyo yo ka nyime rangis teyni kod tepe nyaka los gi dhahabu maler nyaka ikonyri gi kilo piero abich mag dhahabu maler kuom loso rachungino kaachiel gi gige duto nyaka ine ni ilosogi machal gi kido mane onyisi ewi got wuok hema maler wuok los hema maler gi pasia apar mag law katana maber nyaka gor kuomgi kido mar kerubi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar jatwengo olony ema ogoro bor pasia ka pasia nyaka bed mita apar gangwen lachne mita ariyo kendo giduto nyaka gibed maromre abich kuomgi noriw kaachiel kendo abich modong bende noriw kamano nyaka ilo tonde mambulu piero abich e riak pasia matung kuom pasia abich mokwongo kendo tonde piero abich moko e riak pasia matung kuom pasia abich modong tondego nyaka bed momanyore bende ilo ramekni piero abich mag dhahabu kendo iriwgo pasia ariyo momanyorego mondo hema maler obed gimoro achiel los hema gi pasia apar gachiel mag yie diek mondo obed hema oko maumo hema maler bor pasia ka pasia nyaka bed mita apar gabich lachne mita ariyo giduto nyaka gibed maromre riw pasia abich kaachiel kendo auchiel modong bende iriw kamano bange ban pasia mar auchiel mondo obed e dho hema gi malo los tonde piero abich e riak pasia matung kuom pasia abich kendo tonde piero abich moko e riak pasia matung kuom pasia auchiel bende los ramekni piero abich mag mula kendo irwakgi e tonde mondo iriwgo hema obed gimoro achiel bath hema modong koliero nyaka geng tok hema maler kamano hema maoko biro bedo mabor moloyo pasia maiye gi nu mita koni gi koni omiyo obiro liero mondo ogeng hema maler bende los raum mar piende imbe molok gi range makwar mondo oumgo hema maokono kendo raum machielo molos gi piende monyong mondo obed ewi mokwongono nyaka ilo ni hema maler sirni mag yiende shita bor mar siro ka siro nyaka bed mita abich lachne nu mita siro ka siro nyaka bed gi tiendene ariyo moriw kaachiel sirni duto mag hema maler nyaka los machal kamano kiloso sirnigo nyaka ilo piero ariyo migerogo sisi mar hema maler mochomo yo milambo kendo ilo rachungi piero angwen mag fedha mirwakoe sirnigo rwak tiende ariyo mag siro mokwongo e rachungi ariyo kendo itim kamano gi sirni duto sisi mar hema maler mochomo yo nyandwat bende nyaka ilosne sirni piero ariyo kaachiel gi rachungi piero angwen mag fedha rwak siro ka siro ei rachungi ariyo ariyo bende los sirni auchiel ni tok hema maler koma odok yo podho chieng kaachiel gi ariyo mamoko mibiro keto e konde ariyo man yo ka tok hema maler sirni mag kondego nyaka riw gi ratego achiel chakre ka tiendegi nyaka malo sirni ariyogo duto nyaka los machal kamano ginibed sirni aboro kod rachungi apar gauchiel mag fedha siro ka siro mondo orwak ei rachunge ariyo ariyo los rariw apar gabich gi yiend shita rariw abich obed mag sirni mag bath hema maler konchiel kendo abich mamoko obed mag sirni molosgo ka toke mochomo yo podho chieng rariw ka rariw madiere mondo okadh e kor sirni koa tung konchiel nyaka tung komachielo nyaka gibaw sirnigo gi dhahabu kendo iketnigi ratege mag dhahabu mondo omak rariwgo bende nyaka ibaw gi dhahabu kamano nyaka ilo hema maler kiluwo mana kido mane onyisi ewi got twang pasia mar law katana maber nyaka jatuengo molony gor kuome kido mag kerubi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar ngaw pasiano gi rangaw mag dhahabu e sirni angwen mag yiend shita mobaw gi dhahabu kendo morwak ei rachungi angwen mag fedha kiseliere e rangawgo eka iket sandug rapar e toke gi yo ka iye kamano pasiano nopog kind ka maler kod kama ler moloyo bange ket raum ewi sandug rapar ei kama ler moloyo mesa nyaka ket yo nyandwat gi yo ka oko mar pasia rachung taya iket momanyore gi mesa yo milambo mar hema maler los ni dho hema pasia mar law katana maber nyaka gorie maradadi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar los ni pasiano sirni abich gi yiend shita mi ibaw gi dhahabu kendo iketnigi rangaw mag dhahabu kod rachunge abich mag mula wuok kendomarmisango wuok los kendomarmisango gi yiend shita borne gi lachne mondo obed mita ariyo gi nu nyaka ilosne konde angwen e kondene mondo gibed gimoro achiel kode kendo ibawe gi mula bende losne agulni mag golo buru kod mo kaachiel gi rajow gi tewni gi rachwow kod tep mach giduto nyaka ilosgi gi mula losne gimoro mar mula machalo gi singenge kendo ikelne ratege achiel achiel mag mula e kondene angwen kete e bwo ndiri molworo kendomarmisango gi yo ka piny mondo ochop mana e kor kendomarmisango los ni kendono ludhe mag shita kendo ibawgi gi mula norwakgi e ratege man e bath kendo koni gi koni mondo otingego nyaka ilo kendomarmisango gi bao iye mondo obed thuolo ka sanduk lose mana kaka ne onyisi ewi got laru mar hema maler wuok los laru ni hema maler koma odok yo milambo nyaka bed gi pasia mar law katana maber borne romo mita piero abich mongaw e sirni piero ariyo morwak e rachungi piero ariyo mag mula rangaw kod ratege miriwogo sirnigo nyaka bed mag fedha kamano koma odok yo nyandwat bende nyaka bed gi pasia borne romo mita piero abich mongaw e sirni piero ariyo morwak e rachungi piero ariyo mag mula rangepi kod ratege miriwogo sirni bende nyaka bed mag fedha lach laru modok yo podho chieng nyaka bed gi pasia borne romo mita piero ariyo gabich mongaw e sirni apar morwak e rachungi apar lachne koma omanyo yo wuok chieng bende borne nyaka rom mita piero ariyo gabich e dir rangach koni gi koni nyaka bedie pasia borne romo mita abiriyo gi nu pasia ka pasia nyaka ngaw e sirni adek morwak e rachungi adek e dhoranga laru iketie pasia mar law law katana maber mogorie maradadi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar pasiano nongaw e sirni angwen morwak e rachungi angwen sirni duto molworo laru nyaka bed gi ratege mag fedha kod rachungi mag mula kamano bor laru biro bedo mita piero abich lachne mita piero ariyo gabich kendo borne modhi malo mita ariyo gi nu pasiano nyaka los gi law katana maber kendo rachungi duto nyaka bed mag mula gik moko duto mibiro tiyogo e hema maler kaachiel gi loyene duto kod mago mag laru nyaka los gi mula tich rito taya tim jolawi iwuon nyaka ichik joisrael mondo okelni mor zeituni maliw mondo oliel e taya pile tayano nyaka bed ei hemb romo nyasaye romoe gi joge gi yoka oko mar pasia mogengo sandug rapar harun gi yawuote nyaka rite pile mondo oliel e nyim ruoth nyasaye chakre odhiambo nyaka piny ru chikni omako joisrael kod nyikwagi nyaka chieng wuok lep jodolo wuok iwuon nyaka iluong harun owadu gi yawuote nadab gi abihu gi eleazar kod ithamar kuom joisarael mondo iket obed jodolona twangni harun owadu lep dolo mondo
