omedu duong gi chia nyis jotich molony asemiyo rieko olos ni harun lewni morwako kokete jadolona lewni monego gilos e magi law agoko gi law dolo miluongo ni efod gi aroya gi law akor mogorie maridadi kaachiel gi kilemba kod okanda ginibed lewni maler harun owadu gi yawuote rwako ka tiyona tich dolo nyaka losgi gi dhahabu kod usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar kod law katana maber bende gilos law dolo miluongo ni efod gi dhahabu kod usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar kod law katana maber jatuengo molony oloso obed gi misibe ariyo mitueyego gok gi yo ka nyime kod yoka chien okanda man kuome nyaka chue machal kode kendo en bende nyaka lose gi dhahabu kod usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar kod law katana maber kaw kite ariyo mag berul mondo indikie nying yawuot israel e kidi mokwongo ndikie nying auchiel nying auchiel modong ndik e kidi mar ariyo kaluwore gi nywolgi ngat molony e goro kidi ema nyaka ndik nying yawuot israel e kite ariyogo eka ichomgi e otunge mag dhahabu tuegi e misib efod obed rapar mar yawuot israel harun noting nyinggi e goke ka rapar e nyim ruoth nyasaye los otunge mag dhahabu kod thiwni ariyo mag dhahabu maler molos ka tol mokadi kendo ituegi kuom otungego jatuengo molony ema nyaka los law agoko mar ngado bura gi dhahabu kod usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar kod law katana maber mana kaka olos efod borne obed lwedo achiel lachne bende lwedo achiel kendo mondo obane diriyo nyaka ichan laini angwen mag kite nengogi tek laini mokwongo nobedie sardius gi topaz kod karbunkel laini mar ariyo ketie emerald gi safir kod diamond laini mar adek ketie jasinth gi agat kod amethust kendo laini mar angwen ketie berul gi oniks kod jasper kidi ka kidi mondo orwak e otunge achiel achiel molos gi dhahabu kitego nyaka ndikie nying mag dhoudi apar gariyo kaka igoro tere migoyogo sei kidi ka kidi mondo ondikie nying mag dhoudi apar gariyogo los ni law agoko thiwni mag dhahabu maler mokadi ka tol bende los ratege ariyo mag dhahabu kendo iketgi e riak law agoko gi malo koni gi koni tue tonde ariyo mag dhahabugo e ratege manie riak law agoko koni gi koni dho tondego komachielo tue e otunge ariyo kande kamano e kaka itud law agoko gi misibe miriwogo ka nyim efod gi katoke los ratege ariyo mag dhahabu kendo iketgi e riak law agoko gi yo ka malo gi ka iye koni gi koni nyaka gibed momanyore gi efod bende ilo ratege ariyo moko mag dhahabu mi iketgi yo ka mwalo e dho misibe ariyo mag gok efod kama otwanggigo e okanda eka iriw ratege mag law agoko gi ratege mag efod gi tol mambulu mondo law agoko obed ewi okanda gi malo mondo kik ogonyre kamano ka harun donjo kama ler nobed kotingo nying yawuot israel e law agoko mar ngado bura e kore ka rapar e nyim ruoth nyasaye kinde duto koro mogik nyaka iket ombulu miluongo ni urim gi thumim ei law agoko mar ngado bura mondo gibed e kor harun kodonjo e nyim ruoth nyasaye ka harun donjo e nyim ruoth nyasye nobed kotingo gik ngado bura ni joisrael e kore los aroya mar umo efod gi law mambulu nyaka obed gi otuch e diere wich wuokie aluora mar otuchno duto nyaka twang gi pien mondo kik yiech twang gik monginore ka machunga molos gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar e riak lawno alwora kendo iketie gara mag dhahabu e kindgi e kindgi kamano gik monginorego nobed mokikore gi garago e laini achiel alwora mar riake mogik piny harun nyaka rwak aronyano kotiyo tich dolo mondo garago owinj ka odonjo kama ler e nyim ruoth nyasaye kendo kowuok kamano ok notho los gima opamore ka san gi dhahabu maler kendo indikie ni mowal ni ruoth nyasaye wechego nyaka gor kaka igoro tere migoyogo sei itueye gi tol mambulu kendo ikete ka nyim kilemba gima opamoreno nyaka bed e wi harun kendo kamano e kaka enopwodh ketho moro dipo kobetie kuom mich maler joisrael ochiwo ni ruoth nyasaye omiyo gino nyaka bed e wiye kinde duto mondo ruoth nyasaye oyie chiwogo itwang law akor mar katana maber kendo ilo kilemba bende gi law katana maber kod okanda mogoye maradadi los ni yawuot harun kendhe gi okendni kod kilembni mondo omedgi duong gi chia gigi imi harun owadu gi yawuote eka iwirgi gi mo kendo iwalgi mondo gibed jodolona ilosnigi sirweche mag law katana machopo e thochgi mondo oim duggi harun gi yawuote nyaka rwakgi ka gidonjo e hemb romo kata ka gidhi e kendomarmisango mondo giti tich dolo kamano ok ginikethi kendo ok ginitho chikni omako harun gi nyikwaye nyaka chieng wuok keto harun gi yawuote e tich dolo tim jolawi kiwalo harun gi jowuote mondo obed jodolona nyaka itim kama kaw nyarwath kod imbe ariyo maonge gi songa bende ikaw makati kek moted gi mo kod chapat mowirie mo magi duto nyaka los gi mok ngano mayom ok oketie thowi iketgi e odheru kendo ikelgigo bende ikel nyarwath gi imbe ariyo kande bange ikel harun gi yawuote e dho hemb romo kendo ilwokgi eka ikaw lewni kande gin kandhu gi aroya maumo efod gi efod wuon kod law agoko irwak ni harun kendo ituene efod gi okandane sidhne kilemba kendo ituene gima opamore cha en osimbo maler eka ikaw mor wir iol e wiye kiwalego bang mano ikel yawuote mi irwaknegi aroche kendo ituenigi okanda e nungogi bende isidhnigi kilemba mano e kaka iniket harun gi yawuote e tichgi kendo ginibed jodolo mosiko nyaka chieng kel nyarwath e nyi hemb romo kendo harun gi yawuote oket luetgi e wiye eka iyange e nyim ruoth nyasaye e dho hemb romo kanyo kaw rembe moko imien gi lith lweti e tunge kendomarmisango remo duto modong iol e tiend kendono eka ikaw boche duto mogawo jambich gi atel man kuom chuny kod nyirokene kaachiel gi boche mogawogi kendo iwanggi e kendomarmisango ring nyarwath kod piene kaachiel gi ich iwang e tok kambi oko nikech en misango mar golo richo bang mano ikaw achiel kuom imbe kande kendo harun gi yawuote oket luetgi e wiye eka iyange kendo ikaw rembe ipuk e kor kendomarmisango ipoge lemo lemo kendo ilwok jambi iye kod tiendene mi iketgi kaachiel gi ringe moko kod wichne eka iwang imno duto e kendomarmisango mano en misango miwango pep ni ruoth nyasaye en tik mangue ngar moa kuom misango miwango ni ruoth nyasaye kaw im mar ariyo kendo harun gi yawuote oket luetgi e wiye eka iyange kendo ikaw rembe moko mondo imien e harun makorachwich kod yawuote korachwich kod lith luetegi mathuon makorachwich kod lith tiendegi mathwon bende remo modong ipuk e kor kendo marmarmisango koni gi koni kaw remo moko manie wi kendomarmisango kod mor wir mi ikir kuom harun gii yawuote kendo kuom lepgi kamano harun gi yawuote kaachiel gi lepgi nodok maler kaw bor im gi sembe kod boche mogawo ich gi atel man kuom chuny gi nyirokene kaachieel gi boche mogawogi kod em makorachwich ni mar en im mirwakogo jodolo bang mano ikaw makati achiel gi kek achiel moted gi mo kod chapat achiel mogol e odheru motingo makati ok ketie thowi man e nyim ruoth nyasaye ket mago duto e lwet harun kendo e lwet yawuote kendo iyieggi e nyim ruoth nyasaye eka ikawgi e lwet harun gi yawuote kendo iwanggi e kendomarmisango kaachiel gi misango kmiwango pep mondo gidum tik mangue ngar moa kuom misango miwango ni ruoth nyasaye bange ikaw agoko im mane orwakgo harun kendo iyiege e nyim ruoth nyasaye en ema nobed lembi kuom chiayono ipuodh agoko im mane orwakgo harun gi yawuote kiyiege e nyim ruoth nyasaye em imno moket tenge ni jodolo bende itim kamano mago nobed lemo harun gi yawuote yudo kuom joisrael nyaka chieng en lemo moket tenge ni jodolo joisrael golo kuom misengni mag sawo en mich nyaka gichiw ni ruoth nyasaye lep harun mag dolo nyaka dong ni yawuote bang thone mondo girwak kiwirogi kendo kiketogi e tich dolo wuod harun noket kare e tich kendo nobed kadonjo e hemb romo mondo oti e kama ler nyaka rwakgi kuom ndalo abiriyo kaw im morwakgo jodolo inegi eka ited ringe kamoro mowal ni nyasaye mi harun gi yawuote nocham ringono kaachiel gi makati modong ka gin e dho hemb romo ginicham gigo mane opwodhgo richogi kirwakogi kendo kiwalogi ngato ok jadolo kik chamgi nimar gin gik maler kapo ni ringo kata makati moko odong nyaka okinyi nyaka wanggi kik chamgi nimar gin gik maler tim ni harun gi yawuote mana kaka asechiki kamano ketogi e tich nokaw ndalo abiriyo odiechieng kodiechieng kuom ndalo abiriyo duto nyaka itim misango mar golo richo gi nyarwath mondo opwodhgo richo kamano inipwodh kendomarmisango kitimo misango mar golo richo kuome kendo iniwire gi mo kiwalego ni tich nyasaye nyaka ipwodh kendomarmisango kuom ndalo abiriyo mondo obed maler moloyo gimoro amora mogere kuome nodok mowal ni ruoth nyasaye misengni mitimo pile kwan gik inichiw e kendomarmisango gin e magi odiechieng kodiechieng nyaka itim misango gi nyirombe ariyo hikgi achiel achiel ineg nyarombo achiel gokinyi machielo ineg godhiambo kichiwo nyarombo mokwongo nyaka ichiw bende mogo mayom moromo ondweto moruw gi mo maliw moromo lita ariyo bende nyaka ichiw divai moromo lita ariyo ka misango miolo piny godhiambo ineg nyarombo machielo kendo ichiwe kaachiel gi misango mar cham kod misango miolo piny mana kaka nende ichiwo gokinyi mondo odum tik mamit en misango miwango ni ruoth nyasaye misangono nyaka bed kitimo e dho hemb romo e nyim ruoth nyasaye kuom tienge duto nyaka chieng kanyo ema ruoth nyasaye nabed karomoe kodu kendo losoe kodi kanyo bende ema naromie gi joisrael kendo duongna maler nomi kanyono bedo maler anaguedh hemb romo kod kendomarmisango obed maler bende anawal harun gi yawuote mondo obed jodolona anadag gi joisrael mi anabed nyasachgi kendo dakna kodgino nomi ginge ni e ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi manogologi misri adier ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi wuok kendomarmisango miwangoe obani wuok los kendomarmisango mar wango ubani gi yiend shita borne gi lachne obed nu mita maromre borne modhi malo obed mita achiel tungene nyaka bed gimoro achiel kode bawe duto gi dhahabu maler kendo ichuene ndiga mar dhahabu molworo bethene duto losne ratege ariyo ariyo mag dhahabu kendo iketgi e bwo ndigano e konde ariyo man koni gi koni mondo irwakie ludhe mitingego nyaka ilo ludhego gi yiend shita kendo ibawgi gi dhahabu ket kendono e nyim pasia mogengo sandug rapar kama nobed karomoe kodu harun nyaka wang ubani mangue ngar e kendono okinyi kokinyi koiko teyni kendo odhiambo kodhiambo komokogi kamano ubani nobed kiwango e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyaka chieng kendono kik wangie ubani ok owinjore kata misango miwango pep kata mar cham kata mana mano miolo piny harun nyaka mien tunge kendono gi remb chiayo mitimogo misango mar golo richo higa ka higa kopwodhego nyaka tim kamano dichiel e higa kuom tienge duto mondo opuodhego kendono nobed maler moloyo mowal ni ruoth nyasaye chiwo joisrael warogo ngimagi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya kikwano joisrael ngato ka ngato nyaka chul ruoth nyasaye chiwo mowarogo ngimane mondo kik giyud masira e ndalo mikwanogie ngato ka ngato mokwan nyaka chul nu shekel mondo obed chiwo ni ruoth nyasaye shekel achiel oromo gera piero ariyo kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich nyasaye ngato ka ngato mokwan hike oromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo nyaka chul ruoth nyasaye chiwono kuchulo ruoth nyasaye chiwo muwarogo ngimau ngat jamoko ok nochul mangeny moloyo bende ngat jachan ok nochul morem pesa joisrael chiwo kar ngimagi nyaka itigo e hemb romo pesa muchiwo kar ngimaugo nomi ruoth nyasaye paro joisrael karaya mar lwok molos gi mula ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya los karaya mar lwok gi mula rachungine bende mar mula kete e kind hemb romo gi kendomarmisango mi iolie pi mondo harun gi yawuote olwokgo luetegi gi tiendegi pile ka gidonjo e hemb romo nyaka gilwokre gi pigno kamano mondo kik githo bende ka gidhi e kendomarmisango mondo gitiye kendo giwangie misango ni ruoth nyasaye nyaka gilwok luetegi gi tiendegi mondo kik githo mano nobed chik mochwere momako harun gi nyikwaye kod tiengegi duto mor wir kod ubani ruoth nyasaye nochako owacho ni musa niya ikaw gik mangue ngar mabeyo machal kama manemane manumu moromo kilo apar gi dalasini moromo kilo abich gi ondago bende kilo abich gi kasia kilo apar duto nyaka pim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich nyasaye kod mor zeituni moromo lita abiriyo gigo ema mondo ilosgo mor wir maler mangue ngar mana kaka jalos gik mangue ngar loso mano nobed mor wir maler morno iwirgo hemb romo gi sandug rapar kod mesa gi gige kod rachung taya gi gige kod kendomarmisango miwangoe ubani gi mar misango miwango pep kaachiel gi gige kod karaya mar lwok gi rachungine kamano nyaka ipwodh gigo mondo obed maler ahinya gimoro amora mogere kuomgi nobed mowal ni ruoth nyasaye bende iwir harun gi yawuote kiwalogi mondo gibed jodolona wach ni joisrael kama morni nobed mor wir maler kuom tiengeu duto kik konyruok kode kuom wiro joma ok jodolo bende kik ulos mo moro machal kode em mo mowal maler kendo nyaka obednu kamano ngato angata nolos mo machal kamano kata manowir kode ngat ok jadolo nyaka ngad kare oko kuom jowetene ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya kaw gik kiwango ngue ngar machalo duogo gi sare gi mieny kod ubani maler pimgi maromre kendo iketie chumbi mondo ilosgo ubani mangue ngar kaka jalos gik mangue ngar loso nobed gima ler kendo mowal ni tich nyasaye kaw moko iswag mayom mondo iket e nyim sandug rapar ei hemb romo kama naromie kodu enobednu gima ler ahinya ubani molos e yo makama kik ukonyrugo e yoru uwegi nyaka obednu gima ler ahinya mowal ni ruoth nyasaye ngato angata nolos ubani machal kode kamano mondo otigo e yore owuon nyaka ngad kare oko kuom jowetene wuok ruoth nyasaye oluongo bezalel gi oholiab wuok ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya ngeni aseyiero bezalel wuod hur ja juda aseponge gi roho mara mondo obed gi lony kod nyalo kaachiel gi rieko mar ngeyo tije duto mag lwedo kaka goro kido mabeyo mag dhahabu gi fedha kod mula kendo ngado kite michomo kaachiel gi payo bao kata tich moro amora mar lwedo bende aseyiero oholiab wuod ahisamak ja dan mondo okonye kendo asemiyo jotich duto molony rieko mondo olos gigo duto masechiki ginilos hemb romo kod sandug rapar gi raumne kod gik moko duto mag hema kaka mesa gi gige kod rachung taya mag dhahabu maler gi gige kod kendomarmisango miwangoe ubani gi mar misango miwango pep gi gige kod karaya mar lwok gi rachungine kod lep dolo malich mag harun jadolo gi mag yawuote girwako ka gitiyo tich dolo kod mor wir gi ubani mangue ngar mar kama ler ka giloso gigo duto nyaka giti mana kaka asenyisi oket chieng sabato mondo obed ranyisi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya nyis joisrael kama nyaka urit chieng sabatona nikech chieng yueyono en ranyisi manie kinda kodu kaachiel gi nyikwau nyaka chieng mondo unge ni e ruoth nyasaye mopuodhou kuom mano nyaka urit sabato nikech en chieng moket mondo obednu maler ka ngato ok orite nyaka nege ngato angata motiyo chiengno nyaka ngad kare oko kuom jowetene unyalo tiyo tijeu kuom ndalo auchiel chieng mar abiriyo en chieng yueyo maler mowal ni ruoth nyasaye ngato angata manoti chieng sabato nyaka negi joisrael nyaka rit chieng sabato kuom tiengegi duto kaka chieng gisesingore rito nyaka chieng en ranyisi mochwere manie kinda kod joisrael nimar ruoth nyasaye nachueyo polo gi piny kuom ndalo auchiel chieng mar abiriyo naweyo tich mayueyo kane ruoth nyasaye osetieko wuoyo gi musa e got sinai nomiye kite mopamore ariyo mag rapar gin e kite ariyo mane nyasaye ondikoe gi lith lwete wuok nyaroya molos gi dhahabu rapar mar chik kane ji oneno ni musa osedeko e got ka pok olor piny ne gichokore kuom harun mi giwachone niya bi ilosnwa nyasaye mondo otelnwa nikech wakia gima osetimo ngat musano mane ogolowa e piny misri harun nodwokogi niya deduru bonje mag dhahabu mondu gi yawuotu kod nyiu orwako mondo ukelna mi ji duto nogolo bonjegi motero ni harun nokawo bonjego molenyo eka noolo e gimoro mokuny iye e kido mar nyaroya molosogo nyaroya joisrael nowacho niya e nyasaye mane ogolowa e piny misri kane harun owinjo gima giwachono nogero kendomarmisango e nyim nyaroyano eka nogoyo milome kowacho niya kiny wanatim sawo mwamiyogo ruoth nyasaye duong kinyne ji nochiew gokinyi mangich motimo lisweche miwango pep kendo ne gikelo lisweche mag sawo ne gibet piny mondo gichiem kendo gimethi bange ne gia malo mondo gitugi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya lor piyopiyo nikech jou mane igolo misri osetimo marach piyopiyo nono giseweyo yo mane achikogi ni mondo giluw mi giseloso nyaroch dhahabu mondo gilam gisekulorene kendo gisetimone liswa ka giwacho niya joisrael e nyasaye nogolowa e piny misri ruoth nyasaye nomedo wacho ni musa niya aserango jogi maneno ni gin joma wigi tek koro weya mondo atiekgi gi mirimba mager bange anamiyi doko oganda maduong musa nohombo ruoth nyasaye nyasache kowachone niya ruoth nyasaye ango momiyo iwango jogi gi mirimbi donge gin jogi mane igolo misri gi teko maduong ango momiyo imiyo jomisri biro wacho niya ruoth nyasaye nogolo joisrael misri mana ni mondo otimnigi marach konegogi e gode kendo otiekgi chuth yie iwe mirimbi mager kendo ilok paroni mondo kik ikel masirani kuom jogi par jotichni ibrahim gi isaka kod israel kendo kaka nikuongorinigi gi nyingi iwuon kiwacho niya anamiu nyikwayo mangeny ka sulue e polo kendo anamigi pinyni duto kaka nasingora ni nobed margi nyaka chieng omiyo ruoth nyasaye noloko parone mi koro ne ok okelo ni joge masira mane osewacho musa nowichore molor oa e got kotingo kite ariyo mag rapar e lwete kitego nondiki koni gi koni ne gin tich nyasaye kendo ndiko mane ni kuomgi ne mar nyasaye joshua nowinjo ka ji goyo koko mowacho ni musa niya awinjo mahu mar lweny e kambi musa nodwoke niya mano ok agoro mar joma oloyo lweny bende ok en ywak mar joma olo e lweny en mana koko mar joma wer kane musa osesudo machiegni gi kambi noneno nyaroya kendo noneno ji kamiel mi nokecho malich nowito kitego piny e tiend got mobarore nokawo nyaroya mane ji oselosono mowango norege molokore buru eka nokire e pi momiyo joisrael pigno omodho nopenjo harun niya ango ne jogi otimoni momiyo imiyo gitimo richo maduong kama harun nodwoke niya ruoth kik ikechi ingeyo angeya kaka chuny jogi richo ne giwachona niya losnwa nyasaye mondo otelnwa nikech wakia gima osetimo musani nogolowa e piny misri omiyo nawachonogi mondo joma nigi dhahabu oded oko ne gimiya dhahabugo mabolo e mach mi nyaroyano ema owuok kane musa oneno ka ji osenjawni nikech harun noseweyo ni wasikgi thuolo mondo ojargi nochung e dhoranga kambi mogoyo koko niya eke joma ni kor ruoth nyasaye biuru ira mi jolawi duto nochokore ire nowachonigi niya ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel owacho ni ngato ka ngato kuomu mondo orwak liganglane kendo ongad e dier kambi koa e dhorangach koni nyaka dhorangach kocha ngato ka ngato mondo oneg owadgi gi osiepne kod ngat modak bute jolawi notimo kaka musa nosechikogi kendo chiengno ji alufu adek notho eka musa nowachonigi kendo niya kawuono usewaloru ni tich nyasaye chuth nikech usenego yawuotu kod oweteu omiyo ruoth nyasaye oseguedhou tinende kinyne musa nowacho ni ji niya usetimo richo maduong koro abiro idho got mondo adhi ir ruoth nyasaye kamoro onyalo yie weyonu richou ka akwaye kamano musa nodok ir ruoth nyasaye mowachone niya yie iwinj wachna jogi osetimo richo maduong ahinya giseloso nyasaye mar dhahabu mondo gilam koro yie iwenigi richogi ka ok iyie timo kamano kara yie iruch nyinga oko e kitabu misendiko ruoth nyasaye nodwoko musa niya ngat motimo richo e nyima ema naruch nyinge e kitapa koro dhiyo mondo itel ni ji nyaka kuma nasenyisi malaikana notel nyimi kinde biro chopo anakumgie kuom richogi bange ruoth nyasaye nogoyo joisrael gi tuo kuom lamo nyaroya mane harun oloso wuok ruoth nyasaye ochiko joisrael mondo oa e got sinai ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya wuoguru kaachiel gi joma nigolo misri kendo udhi e piny mane asingora ni nami ibrahim gi isaka kod jakobo kawachonigi ni nami nyikwagi pinyno anaor malaika mondo otel nyimu kendo anariemb jokanaan gi joamor gi johiti gi joperizi gi johivi kod jojebus anateru e piny momeu kendo machiek awuon ok nadhi kodu nimar dipo ka atiekou e yo nikech un ji tokgi tek kane joisrael owinjo wach magerno ne gichako ywak mi onge ngat norwako bonjene ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya nyis joisrael ni gin joma tok gi tek kendo ka da bed ni anyalo wuotho kodu kata kuom sa matin kende datieku te koro mondo gilony bonjegi eka abiro ngeyo gima anyalo timo nigi omiyo joisrael nogonyo bonjegi e got horeb kanyo kendo ne ok gichako girwakogi hemb romo nyasaye romoe gi joge musa ne thoro golo hema e kambi kendo guro oko mochwalore nochake ni hemb romo kendo ngato angata mane dwaro penjo nyasaye wach ne dhi kanyo kinde duto kane musa wuok dhi e hemano ji duto ne malo kendo ngato ka ngato chung e dho hembe ka rango musa nyaka donj e hema kane musa osedonjo e hema bor polo ne lor piny kendo chung e dho hema ka ruoth nyasaye wuoyo gi musa kane ji oseneno ka bor polo ochung e dho hema kamano ne gikulore giduto ngato ka ngato e dho hembe owuon kamano ruoth nyasaye ne wuoyo gi musa wang gi wang mana kaka ngato wuoyo gi wadgi bange musa ne duogo e kambi joshua wuod nun wuowi mane kone ne dong mana e hema ruoth nyasaye osingore ni obiro bet kod joisrael musa nowacho ni ruoth nyasaye niya en adier ni isenyisa mondo atel ni jogi nyaka piny kanaan pok inyisa ngat ibiro orago bende isewacho ni ingeya maber kendo imor koda ka imor koda kamano koro akwayi mondo ipuonja yoreni mondo angeyi kendo imed bedo mamor koda bende nge malongo ni jogi gin jogi ruoth nyasaye nodwoke niya abiro dhi kodi awuon kendo anamiyi kue musa nowachone niya ka iwuon ok idhi kodwa kik igolwa ka nikech ka ok idhi kodwa ere kaka ji nyalo ngeyo ni imor kodwa ka idhi kodwa jogi kaachiel gi nobed joma opogore gi dhoudi duto manie piny mi ruoth nyasaye nodwoko musa niya abiro timo mana kaka isekwayo nikech amor kodi kendo angeyi maber musa nokwayo ruoth nyasaye niya yie inyisa duongni maler ruoth nyasaye nodwoke ni abiro miyo berna duto kadh buti kendo anahul nyinga jehova mana kiwinjo anaher ngat adwaro hero gi hera mosiko bende anakech jalo adwaro kecho nomedo wacho ni musa ni ok inyal neno wanga nikech onge dhano nyalo neno wanga mi pod obed mangima eka nodhi nyime kowachone niya nitie kamoro buta ka bi ichung e wi lwanda ka duongna maler kadho abiro keti e gek lwanda kendo anaumi gi lweta nyaka akadhi eka nagol lweta mi inine mana ngeya wanga ok nine wuok kite ariyo mamoko rapar mar chik ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya pa kite ariyo machal gi mane igoyo piny mobarore kande mondo andikie weche mane ni e kite mokwongogo kiny iikri gokinyi mondo ibi e got sinai ichung kuno kendo irita ngato kik idh kodi kuno bende ngat moro kik bed kamoro amora ewi godno kata mana jamni kik kwa e alwora ne kuom mano musa nopayo kite ariyo machal gi mokwongo kinyne gokinyi nodhi ewi got sinai kaka ruoth nyasaye nosechike kotingo kitego eka ruoth nyasaye nolor e bor polo mochung bute kanyo mi ohulo nyinge jehova nokadho e nyim musa kowacho gi dwol maduong niya jehova ruoth nyasaye nyasaye jangwono kendo makecho ji iya ok wang piyo kendo anyiso hera mosiko kod adiera arito singruokna masetimo gi ji gana gi gana kendo aweyonigi rochruokgi gi kethogi kod richogi kata kamano ok akwan jaketho ka ngama ler akumo nyithindo gi nyikwayo nyaka tieng mar adek kod mar angwen nikech richo kweregi musa nokulore piny piyopiyo molemo nowacho niya ruoth nyasaye kimor koda adier koro akwayi mondo idhi kodwa jogi tokgi tek kata kamano yie iwenwa kethowa gi richowa kendo ikawwa ka mwanduni iwuon nyasaye ochako otimo singruok gi joisrael wuok rapar mar chik ruoth nyasaye nowacho niya koro adwaro timo kodu singruok abiro timo honni madongo ka jou neno nyaka nene pok otim e piny ngima kata e oganda moro ji duto un e kindgi biro neno gima ruoth nyasaye anyalo timo nikech abiro timonu gima lich kuom mano rituru chike abiro miyou kawuono eka abiro riembo joamor gi jokanaan gi johiti gi joperizi gi johivi kod jojebus mondo owenu thuolo ritreuru mondo une ni ok utimo winjruok moro gi jo piny mudhiyeno nono gilokorenu obadho nyaka umuk kendegi mag liswa kendo uketh sirni maggi milamo mag kite gi mag yien kik ulam nyasaye moro machielo ni mar ruoth nyasaye nyinga en nyasaye janyiego kendo nyasaye janyiego adier ritreuru mondo kik utim winjruok gi jopinyno nikech ka gilamo nyisechegi kendo gitimonigi liswa gibiro lwongou mi kamoro dipo ka uchamo chiemb liswechegi yawuotu bende dikend nyigi mondgigo dilam nyisechegi mi gimi yawuotu weya kendo lam nyisechegigo kik ulos nyiseche mag mula mondo ulam rituru sawo mar makati ok oketie thowi kaka asechiki nyaka ucham makati ok ketie thowi kuom ndalo abiriyo e ndalo mar abib nikech dueno ema ne ua e piny misri nyithindo makayo chwo duto mag dhano kata mag jamni gin maga ngima kanyna makayo unyalo waro gi nyarombo ka ok udwar ware nyaka tur ngute ngato ka ngato nyaka war ngima wuode makayo kendo onge ngat nobi ira gi lwete nono unuti kuom ndalo auchiel chieng mar abiriyo nyaka uyue kata obedo ni en kinde mag pur kata mag keyo nyaka urit sap jumbe tiende ni sap chiwo mar cham mokwongo nyak bende nyaka urit sap pono olembe e giko higa jou machwo duto nyaka bi e nyima didek e higa ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel nimar kaseriembonu ogendini weg pinyno kendo ayaro pinyu onge wasigu notem kawo pinyu e kinde adek mubiro biroe e nyima higa ka higa e kinde mutimoe misango ni chiayo kik uchiw gimoro moketie thowi kendo kik uwe ring chiayo motimgo sap pasaka dong nyaka piny ru mak uwango te cham mabeyoe moloyo mukwongo kayo nyaka ukel e od ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kitedo nyadiel kik uolie cha min ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya ndik wechego nikech gin ema atimogo singruok kodi kaachiel gi joisrael omiyo musa nobet gi ruoth nyasaye kanyo kuom ndalo piero angwen odiechieng gotieno ok ochiemo kata metho kendo nondiko weche mag singruokno e kitego ne gin chike apar musa olor oa e got sinai kane musa lor e got sinai kotingo kite ariyo mag rapar wange ne rieny nikech nosewuoyo gi ruoth nyasaye kata kamano ne ok ongeyo ni wange rieny kamano harun gi joisrael duto norango musa moneno ka wange rieny mi ne giluor sudo bute musa noluongogi mi harun gi jodong oganda nodok ire moloso kodgi bang mano joisrael duto nodhi irgi machiegni kendo musa nomiyogi chike duto mane ruoth nyasaye omiye e got sinai kane musa osetieko wuoyo kodgi nogengo wange gi law e kinde duto mane musa donjo e hemb ruoth nyasaye mondo olos kode nogolo lawno e wange nyaka owuog oko pile kane owuok mondo onyis joisrael weche duto nochike ni mondo owachi ne gineno wange ka rieny eka bange nogengo wange kendo nyaka odonj e hema mondo owuo gi ruoth nyasaye wuok chike mag sabato musa noluongo joisrael duto mowachonigi niya ruoth nyasaye osechikou ni mondo uti kama unyalo tiyon kuom ndalo auchiel chieng mar abiriyo nyaka bednu chieng yueyo maler nimar en sabato mowal ni ruoth nyasaye ngato angata motiyo chiengno nyaka negi kik umok kata mana mach e miechu chieng sabato chiwo mokel ni ruoth nyasaye wuok musa nowacho ni joisrael duto niya ruoth nyasaye nosechiko ni mondo uchiwne mich ngato ka ngato moyie timo kamano mondo okelna chiwo mag dhahabu kod mula gi nanga mambulu gi maralik kod makwar gi law katana maber gi yie diek gi piende rombe molok gi range makwar gi piende monyong gi yiend shita gi mor taya kod gik mangue ngar milosogo mor wir gi ubani mangue ngar gi kite mag oniks kod kite moko miketo kuom law dolo miluongo ni efod kendo kuom law agoko gik moket e hema maler wuok jotich duto molony man kuomu mondo obi kendo olos gik moko duto mane ruoth nyasaye ochiko ginilos hema maler gi hembe maoko kod raumne gi ramekni mage gi bepene gi raripene gi rachungine kod sanduk gi ludhene mitingegoo gi raumne kod pasia mogenge gi mesa kod ludhene gii gige duto gi makati miketo e nyim nyasaye pile kod rachung taya machiwo ler kod gige duto gi teyni mage kod mor taya gi kendomarmisango miwangoe ubani kaachiel gi ludhene kod mor wir gii ubani mangue ngar gi pasia manie dho hema kod kendomarmisango miwango pep kaachiel gi ndiri mare molos gi mula gi ludhene kod gige duto gi karaya kod rachungine gi pasia mag laru gi sirni kod rachungigi gi pasia mar dhoranga laru kod loye mag hema gi loye mag laru kod tondegi kaachiel gi lewni malich jodolo tiyogo kama ler gin lep lemo harun jadolo gi yawuote rwako ka gitiyo tich dolo ji okelo chiwo oganda joisrael duto nowuok oa ir musa ngato ka ngato noyie golo chiwo ni ruoth nyasaye notimo kamano mondo olosgo hemb romo gi gik moko duto mitiyogo kanyo kaachiel gi lep lemo mon gi chwo nobiro kendo ngato ka ngato noyie golo chiwo nokelo ngaga gi sitadi gi bony gi mula kod gimoro amora maber mar dhahabu ji duto nokelo ni ruoth nyasaye chiwo mag dhahabu bende ngato ka ngato nokelo gima en go kaka nanga mambulu kata maralik kata makwar kata law katana maber kata yie diek kata piende rombe molok gi range makwar joma ne nyalo chiwo mich mag fedha gi mag mula nokelo ni ruoth nyasaye kendo jii duto mane ni gi yiend shita mane inyalo losogo gimoro amora bende nokelo mon duto mane olony e wicho nowiyo usi mambulu gi maralik gi makwar mokelo kaachiel gi law katana maber bende mon duto mane olony e tich wiyo yie diek nowicho gi chuny achiel jodongo nokelo kite mabeyo mag oniks gi kite miketo kuom efod kendo kuom law agoko kaachiel gi gik mangue ngar kod mor taya gi mor wir kod mor ubani mangue ngar joisrael duto machwo gi mamon mane oyie golo chiwo ni tich duto mane ruoth nyasaye osechiko musa ni mondo otim nokelo ni ruoth nyasaye michgi luong mar bezalel gi oholiab wuok musa nowacho ni joisrael niya ruoth nyasaye oseyiero bezalel wuod uri wuod hur ja juda oseponge gi rohone mondo obed gi lony kod nyalo kaachiel gi rieko mar ngeyo tije duto magh lwedo kaka goro kido mabeyo mag dhahabu gi fedha kod mula kendo ngado kite michomo kaachiel gi payo bao kata tich moro amora mar lwedo ruoth nyasaye osemiyo bezalel gi oholiab wuod ahisamak ja dan teko mondo gipuonj ji tich lwedo osemiyogi rieko mathoth mar tiyo tije duto mag lwedo kaka tich goro kite gi mar kwoyo nanga gi mar twengo gi usi mambulu gi maralik gi mar loso law katana maber kod mar chweyo nanga gin ji manyalo timo tich moro amora wuok bezalel gi oholiab kod jotich molony duto mane ruoth nyasaye osemiyo rieko kod ngeyo mar loso gik moko duto midwaro mondo olosgo kama ler nyaka los gigo duto mana kaka ruoth nyasaye osechiko ji okelo chiwo mangeny musa noluongo bezalel gi oholiab kod joma olony e tijegi mane ruoth nyasaye osemiyo rieko kendo mane oyie konyo tich mi nonyisogi mondo gichak tich nomiyogi chiwo mane joisrael okelo mondo olosgo kama ler joisrael nomedo mana kelo chiwo ni musa okinyi kokinyi nyaka joma ne olony e tije mopogore opogore mane loso kama ler noweyo tijegigo mobiro ir musa ka giwachone niya ji kelo gik mangeny moloyo kar midwaro kuom tich mane ruoth nyasaye ochiko ni mondo otim omiyo musa nogoyo milome e kambi kokwero ji duto niya ngat dichwo kata dhako kik med loso gimoro mitiyogo e kama ler kamano ji noweyo kelo gik moko gik mane osekel ne ngeny mohewoo tieko tich loso hema maler wuok jotich molony ema noloso hema maler ne gilosone pasia apar mag law katana maber mogoe kido mag kerubi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar mana kaka jatuengo molony goro bor pasia ka pasia ne romo mita apar gangwen lachne mita ariyo kendo giduto ne giromre abich kuomgi noriw kaachiel kendo abich modong bende noriw kamano ne giloso tonde piero abich mambulu e riak pasia matung kuom pasia abich mokwongo kendo tonde piero abich moko e riak pasia matung kuom pasia abich modong tondego nobedo momanyore bende ne giloso ramekni piero abich mag dhahabu mi giriwogo pasia ariyo momanyorego mondo hema maler obed gimoro achiel ne giloso pasia apar gachiel mag yie diek mondo obed hema maoko maumo hema maler bor pasia ka pasia ne romo mita apar gabich lachne mita abich lachne mita ariyo giduto ne giromre ne giriwo mita abich kaachiel kendo auchiel modong bende ne giriwo kamano ne giloso tonde piero abich e riak pasia matung kuom pasia abich kendo tonde piero abich moko e riak pasia matung kuom pasia auchiel bende ne giloso ramekni piero abich mag mula mane giriwogo hema mondo obed gimoro achiel ne giloso raum mar piende imbe molok gi range makwar mondo giumgo hema maoko kendo raum machielo molos gi piende monyong mondo obed ewi mokwongono ne giloso ni hema maler sirni gi yiend shita bor siro ka siro ne romo mita abich lachne nu mita siro ka siro ne nigi tiende ariyo moriw kaachiel sirni duto mag hema maler nolos machal kamano ne gipayo sirni piero ariyo mondo gilosgo sisi mar hema maler mochomo yo milambo kod rachungi piero angwen mag fedha mane girwako e sirnigo ne girwako siro mokwongo e rachungi ariyo kendo ne gitimo kamano e sirni duto sisi mar hema maler mochomo yo nyandwat bende ne gilosone sirni piero ariyo kaachiel gi rachungi piero angwen mag fedha ne girwako siro ka siro ei rachungi ariyo ariyo bende ne giloso sirni auchiel ni tok hema maler koma odok yo podho chieng kaachiel gi ariyo mamoko mane giketo e konde ariyo man yo ka tok hema maler ne giriwo sirni mag kondego gi ratego achiel chakre ka tiendgi nyaka malo kendo sirni ariyogo nolos machalre kamano ne gin sirni aboro kod rachungi apar gauchiel mag fedha siro ka siro norwak ei rachungi ariyo ariyo ne giloso rariw apar gabich gi yiend shita rariw abich nomako sirni mag bath hema maler konchiel kendo abich mamoko nomako sirni e bathe komachielo abich modong nomako sirni mane olosgo ka toke mochomo yo podho chieng ne giloso rariw ka rariw madiere mondo okadh e kor sirni koa tung konchiel nyaka tung komachielo ne gibawo sirnigo gi dhahabu kendo ne giketonigi ratege mag dhahabu mondo omak rariw rariwgo bende ne gibawo gi dhahabu ne gitwango pasia mar law katana maber mi gigoyoe kuome kido mag kerubi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar mana kaka jatuengo molony goro ne giloso ni pasiano sirni angwen mag yiend shita mi gibawo gi dhahabu kendo ne gilosone rachungi angwen mag fedha ne gitwango ni dho hema pasia mar law katana maber mi gigoyoe maradadi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar ne gibawo wi sirnigo kod ratege molworogi gi dhahabu rachungi abich mirwako e sirnigo nolos gi mula wuok loso sanduk mar nyasaye wuok bezelel noloso sanduk gi yiend shita borne oromo mita achiel lachne nu mita kendo borne modhi malo bende nu mita nobawe gi dhahabu maler iye gi oko kendo nolosone ndiga mar dhahabu molworo bethene duto nothedhone ratege angwen mag dhahabu moketo e tiende angwen ratege ariyo nobet e bathe konchiel ariyo e bathe komachielo noloso ludhe ariyo gi yiend shita mobawo gii dhahabu kendo norwakogi e ratege manie bath sanduk koni gi koni mondo gibed mag tinge bende nolosone raum mar dhahabu maler borne oromo mita achiel lachne nu mita obed kar ngwono nothedho kerubi ariyo mag dhahabu mondo obed gimoro achiel gi raum kerubi achiel noketo e dho raum konchiel kendo achiel e dhoge komachielo ne gibedo ka bwombegi oyarore kochomo malo mondo ogeng raum kendo ne gimanyore ka gingiyo raum loso mesa mar makati wuok bezalel noloso bende mesa gi yiend shita borne oromo mita achiel lachne nu mita kendo borne modhi malo bende nu mita nobawe gi dhahabu maler kendo nolosone ndiga mar dhahabu molworo bethene duto nochueyo mithe alwora lachne oromo tat lwedo achiel kendo nochueyo dir mitheno gi dhahabu nothedhone ratege angwen mag dhahabu moketo e kendo angwen mag mesa kama tiendene nitie mondo obed mag tinge ratege mane orwakie ludhe mitingego noket e mithe noloso ludhego gi yiend shita mobawo gi dhahabu bende noloso gik mitiyogo e mesa kaka tewni gi kikombe gi agulni kod aguetni mitiyogo gitimo misengni miolo piny gigo duto noloso gi dhahabu maler loso rachung taya wuok noloso rachung taya gi dhahabu maler tiende gi kore noloso gi dhahabu mothedhi kendo maupe nogorie kaachiel gi thiepege kod obokegi nobedo gimoro achiel kode ne en gi bede auchiel moa e bathe koni gi koni adek e bathe konchiel kendo adek e bathe komachielo bedenego moro ka moro ne nigi maupe adek molos gi thiepegi kod obokegi machal gi thiep oyungu e kor rachung taya hie ne nitie maupe angwen man gi thiepe kod oboke machal gi thiep oyungu bedene ariyo ariyo ne nigi maua achiel achiel e bwogi maupego gi bedego kod rachungi nobedo gimoro achiel mothedh gi dhahabu maler bende noloso ni rachungino teyni abiriyo gi rangis teyni kod tewni mago duto noloso gi dhahabu maler rachung taya kod gige duto nolos gi dhahabu maler moromo kilo piero abich loso kendo miwangoe ubani wuok noloso kendo miwangoe ubani gi yiend shita noromre koni gi koni borne ne nu mita kendo lachne bende nu mita borne modhi malo mita achiel tungene nobedo gimoro achiel kode nobawe duto te gi dhahabu maler kendo nochueyo laini mar dhahabu molworo bethene duto nolosone ratege ariyo ariyo mag dhahabu moketo e bwo laini e konde ariyo man koni gi koni mondo orwakie ludhe mitingego ludhego noloso gi yiend shita mobawo gi dhahabu noloso bende mo maler mar wir kod ubani maler mangue ngar wuok loso kendomarmisango wuok bezalel noloso kendomarmisango miwango te gi yiend shita borne gi lachne ne mita ariyo gi nu maromre borne modhi malo ne mita achiel gi nu noloso tungene e kondene angwen mobedo gimoro achiel kode kende nobawe duto gi mula noloso gik moko duto mitiyogo e kendomarmisango kaka agulini gi rajope gi tewni gi rachwow kod tegni mag mach gigo duto noloso gi mula bende nolosone kendono gimoro mar mula machalo gi singenge moketo e bwo ndiri molwore gino nochopo mana e kore gi yo ka malo nothedho ratege angwen mag mula moketo e konde angwen mag gima chalo gi singengeno mondo orwakie ludhene noloso ludhego gi yiend shita mobawo gi mula norwakogi e ratege manie bath kendomarmisango koni gi koni mondoo gibed mag tinge nolose gi bepe moweyo iye thuolo ka sanduk loso karaya mar mula wuok nolenyo mula mag rangi mane okawo kuom mon mane tiyo e dho hemb romo mi olosogo karaya mar lwok kod rachungine loso laru mar hema maler wuok bende noloso laru kuma odok yo milambo noketoe pasia molos gi law katana maber borne romo mita piero abich nongawogi e sirni piero ariyo morwak e rachungi piero ariyo mag mula rangaw kod ratege miriwogo sirnigo nolos gi fedha koma odok yo nyandwat noketoe pasia borne romo mita piero abich nongawogi e sirni piero ariyo morwak e rachungi piero ariyo mag mula koma odok yoo podho chieng noketoe pasia borne romo mita piero ariyo gabich mongaw e sirni apar kod ratege apar rangaw kod ratege miriwogo sirni nolos gi fedha bor mar koma odok yo wuok chieng ne romo mita piero ariyo gabich e dir rangach koni gi koni nolieroe pasia borne oromo mita abiriyo gi nu pasia ka pasia nongaw e sirni adek morwak e rachungi adek pasia mag laru duto notwang gi law katana maber rachungi norwakie sirni molos gi mula rangaw kod ratege mag sirni nolos gi fedha kendo nobaw wi sirnigo gi fedha ratege mag sirni duto mag laru bende nolos gi fedha pasia mar dhoranga laru nolos gi law katana maber mogoe kido gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar borne ne romo mita apar borne modhi malo mita ariyo gi nu maromre gi pasia mar laru ne ongawe e sirni angwen morwak e angwen mag mula rangawgi nolos gi fedha kendo wigi kod rategegi nobaw gi fedha loye duto mag hema maler kod mag laru nolos gi mula kar romb chumbe molosgo hema maler magi e kar romb gik mane musa oketo e lwet jolawi mane tiyo e bwo ithamar wuod harun jadolo mondo olosgo hema maler nyinge moro en hemb rapar bezalel wuod uri wuod hur jajuda noloso gik moko duto mane ruoth nyasaye ochiko musa oholiab wuod ahisamak ja dan ema ne konye oholiab nolony e tich goro kite gi twengo kod tich goyo maradadi e law katana gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar kar romb dhahabu duto mane otigo kuom loso kama ler ne romo kilo alufu achiel gi mia ariyo kod piero adek kipimo gi rapim mitiyogo e tich nyasaye dhahabugo duto nochiw ka mich mowal ni ruoth nyasaye kar romb fedha mane ji ogolo e kinde mane ikwanogie ne romo kilo alufu angwen gi mia abich kod piero aboro kipimo gi rapim mitiyogo e tich nyasaye fedhago ema ne ochok ka ne ngato ka ngato mokwan ogolo nusshekel nimar kar romb joma ne okwan hikgi oromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo ne alufu mia auchiel gadek kod mia abich gi piero abich nu shekelno nopim gi rapim mitiyogo tich nyasaye kilo alufu angwen gi mia abich kod piero abich mag fedhago nolosgo rachungi mag kama ler kod mag pasia kilo alufu angwen gi mia abich kod piero abichgo ema nolosgo rachungi mia achiel ka rachung ka rachung kawo kilo piero angwen gabich gi nu kilo piero adek mag fedha mane odong nolosgo rangaw kod ratege mag sirni kendo nobawgoo wi sirni mula mane ji ochiwo ka mich mowal ni ruoth nyasaye noromo kilo alufu adek gi mia abich mago bezalel nolosogo rachungi mag dhoranga hemb romo kendo nolosogo kendomarmisango mar mula kod gima chalo gi singenge kaachiel gi gik moko duto mitiyogo e kendono bende nolosogo rachungi duto mag laru gi mag sirni mane ni e dhoranga laru kaachiel gi loye duto mag hema maler kod mag laru wuok loso lep jodolo wuok ne gitiyo gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar kuom loso lewni malich mane jodolo rwako ka gitiyo kama ler kendo kuom loso ni harun lep lemo kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa ne giloso law dolo miluongo ni efod gi dhahabu kod usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar kendo gi law katana maber ne gipamo dhahabu nyaka odoko mareprep mi ne gilire matindotindo kendo ne gikade ka tol mondo jatwengo molony oti kode kaachiel gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar kod law katana maber ne giloso ni efod misibe ariyo mitweyego e gok gi yo ka nyime kod kangeye okanda mane ni kuome nolos machal kode kendo en bende nolose gi dhahabu kod usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar kod law katana maber kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa ne giloso kite mag berul mi gichomo e otunge mag dhahabu mondikie nying yawuot israel e yo jagoro molony goroe noketogi e misib efod ka rapar mar dhout israel mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa ne giloso law agoko e yo jatuengo molony tuengoe ka gitiyo gi dhahabu kod usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar kod law katana maber mana kaka niloso efod ne gilose maromre mi gibane diriyo borne ne romo lwedo achiel lachne bende lwedo achiel ne gichano kuome laini angwen mag kite nengogi tek laini mokwongo noketie sardius gi topaz kod karbunkal laini mar ariyo ne mar emarald gi safir kod diamond laini mar adek noketie jasinth gi aget kod amethust laini mar angwen ne mar berul gi oniks kod jasper kidi ka kidi norwak e tunge mar dhahabu kitego nondikie nying dhout israel apar gariyo nogorgi ka kido moro ka moro ne nigi nying achiel achiel mag dhoudi apar gariyogo ne giloso ni law agoko thiwni mag dhahabu maler molos ka tol mokadi ne giloso otunge ariyo kod ratege ariyo mag dhahabu eka ne giketo ratege ariyogo e riak law agoko gi malo koni gi koni ne gitueyo thiwni ariyo mag dhahabu e ratege kande mane ni e riak law agoko koni gi koni dho tondego komachielo ne gitueyo e otunge ariyo ka kamano e kaka ne gitudo law agoko gi misibe miriwogo ka nyim efod gi ka toke ne giloso ratege ariyo mag dhahabu mi giriedo e riak law agoko gi yo ka mwalo kod yoka iye koni gi koni kama omanyore gi efod bende ne giloso ratege ariyo moko mag dhahabu mi girwako yo ka mwalo e dho misibe ariyo mag gok efod kama otuanggigo e okanda ne gitueyo ratege mag law agoko e ratege mag efod gi tol mambulu mondo law agoko olier e okanda gi malo kendo kik ogonyre mano e kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa ne giloso aroya mar umo efod gi law achiel mambulu notuch diere wich wuokie kendo aluora mar kama otuchino notwang gi pien mondo kik yiechi e riak lawno aluorane ne gitwango gik monginore ka machunga molos gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar kod law katana maber bende ne giloso gara mag dhahabu mi giketo e riak lawu aluora e kind gik monginorego kamano gara nokikore gi gik monginore onginore e laini achiel e aluora mar riak lawno mogik piny lawno nirwako pile kitiyo tich dolo kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa ne gitwango kandhe ni harun gi yawuote kendo ne gilosonigi kilemba gi ogute gi sirweche kod okanda gigo duto nolos gi law katana maber mogoe maradadi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar eyo jagoro molony goyoe mago duto ne gitimo mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa ne giloso gima opamore ka san gi dhahabu maler mondo obed osimbo maler kendo ne gindiko kuome ni mowal ni ruoth nyasaye wechego nogor mana e yo jagor kidi goroe ne gitueyone tol mambulu mondo oketego e kilemba gi yo ka malo mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa tich loso hema maler orumo wuok tije duto mag hema maler en hemb romo nyasaye romoe gi joge norumo joisrael notimo gik moko duto mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa ne gikelo ni musa hema maler gi hema oko kod gige duto kaka ramekni gi bepe gi rariw gi sirni kod rachungi gi raum molos gi piende imbe molok gi range makwar kod raum molos gi piende monyong kod pasia mogengo sanduk gi sandug rapar gi ludhene gi raum kod mesa gi gige duto gi makati miketo e nyim nyasaye pile kod rachung taya molos gi dhahabu maler kaachiel gi teyni miketo kuome gi gige duto kod mor taya gi kendo mar dhahabu gi mor wir gi umani mangue ngar gi pasia mar dho hema kod kendomarmisango molos gi mula gi gire mar mula machalo gi singenge gi ludhene kod gige duto gi karaya kod rachungine gi pasia mag laru gi sirni mage kod rachungine kaachiel gi pasia man e dhoranga laru gi tondene kod loyene gi gik moko duto mitiyogo tich hema maler en hemb romo ne gikelo bende lewni motwang malich jodolo tiyogo e kama ler tiende ni lep lemo mag harun jadolo kod lep yawuote girwako ka gitiyo tich dolo joisrael nosetimo tije duto mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa musa norango gik moko duto mane giseloso moneno ni giselosogi mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nosechiko omiyo noguedhogi wuok chungo hema maler kendo walogi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya chieng due achiel mar due mokwongo nyaka ichung hema maler en hemb romo ket sandug rapar e iye kendo igeng sanduk gi pasia kel mesa e iye kendo ichanie gik moko duto monego obedie rachung taya bende ikel mi imok teyni man kuome ket kendo miwangoe ubani e nyim sandug rapar kendo igeng dho hema maler gi pasia ket kendomarmisango e nyim dho hema maler en hemb romo ket karaya e kind hemb romo gi kendomarmisango mi iolie pi bange ichielne laru aluora gi pasia kendo ilier pasia moro mondo ogeng dhoranga laru eka ikaw mor wir iwirgo hema maler kod gik moko duto manie iye kamano inipuodhe kaachiel gi gige duto mondo obed gima ler ahinya bange iwir kendomarmisango kaachiel gi gige duto mondo obed maler ahinya bende iwir karaya kaachiel gi rachungine mondo iwalego bange ikel harun gi yawuote e dho hemb romo kendo ilwokgi gi pi eka irwak harun gi lep dolo kendo iwire gi mo kiwale mondo obed jadolona bang mano ikel yawuote machiegni kendo irwaknigi kandhe wirgi mana kaka isewiro wuongi mondo gin bende gibed jodolona wirno biro miyo gibedo jodolona kaachiel gi nyikwagi kuom tiengegi duto nyaka chieng musa notimo gik moko duto mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike omiyo chieng due achiel mar due mokwongo e higa mar ariyo ka ne gia misri nochungo hema maler nochunge kama nochano rachungi morwakoe bepe kendo noketo raripene mochungogo sirni noyaro hema maoko e wi hema maler mi noume gi raumne kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike nokawo kite mag rapar moketo e sanduk norwako ludhe e ratege mag sanduk eka noyieyo raum e wiye noketo sanduk e hema maler mogenge gi pasia kamano nogengo sandug rapar kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike noketo mesa e hemb romo gi yo ka oko mar pasia koma ochomo yo nyandwat mochanoe makati miketo e nyim ruoth nyasaye pile mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike noketo rachung taya e hemb romo gi yo milambo koma omanyore gi mesa moketo teyni kuome e nyim ruoth nyasaye mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike noketo kendomardhahabu e hemb romo gi yo ka oko mar pasia mowangoe ubani mangue ngar mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike nogengo dho hema maler gi pasia kendo noketo kendomarmisango e dho hema maler en hemb romo notimoe misango mar mogo mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike noketo karaya mar lwok e kind hemb romo gi kendomarmisango mooloe pi lwok musa gi harun gi yawuote ne lwokoe lwetegi gi tiendegi ka gidonjo e hemb romo kata ka gidhi e kendomarmisango mana kaka nyasaye nochiko musa noliero pasia e aluora duto mar laru mogengogo hema maler kaachiel gi kendomarmisango kendo noliero pasia moro e dhoranga laru bor polo olor ewi hemb romo kwan kamano musa notieko tich duto mi bor polo noimo hemb romo kendo duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye noponge musa ne ok nyal donjo e hemb romo nikech bor polo ne ni kanyo bende nikech duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye noponge e wuodh joisrael duto ne ginyalo dhi e kambi moro mana ka bor polo oa e hema maler kane bor polo ok oa ne ok gidhi nyime gi wuoth ne girito nyaka chieng moro oa kamoro amora mane joisrael dhiye bor polo mar ruoth nyasaye nosiko ewi hema maler godiechieng gotieno mach ne liel ei bor polono kendo joisrael duto ne nyalo nene tim jolawi misengni miwango pep ruoth nyasaye noluongo musa mowuoyo kode gi e hemb romo nyasaye romoe gi joge kowachone niya nyis joisrael ni ka ngato kuomgi chiwo chiayo mondo otimna misango chiayono nyalo bet dhiang kata diel kata rombo ka ngato chiwo dhiang mondo otimgo misango miwango pep nyaka obed rwath maonge songa enochiwe e dhoranga hemb romo e nyim ruoth nyasaye mondo ruoth nyasaye oyie kode nyaka oket lwete ewi chiayono mi ruoth nyasaye noyie gi misangono mondo obed gima opwodhnego richone eka noneg rwadhno e nyim ruoth nyasaye kendo jodolo joka harun nokaw remo kendo nokir e bethe duto mag kendomarmisango manie dho hemb romo bang mano noyang chiayono kendo nopoge lemo lemo joka harun jadolo nomok mach e kendomarmisango kotimogo misango mi giniketie yien ginichan lemogo kod wich gi bor e yien moket e majno jambich gi tielo nyaka lwok gi pi eka jadolo nowanggi kaachiel gi lemo duto e kendomarmisango kotimogo misango miwango pep mondo odum mamit ni ruoth nyasaye ka ngato ochiwo rombo kata diel mondo otimgo misango miwango pep nyaka obed im kata nyuok maonge songa nyaka onege e nyim ruoth nyasaye e bath kendomarmisango koma ochomo yo nyandwat kendo jodolo joka harun nyaka kir remo e bethe duto mag kendomarmisango eka ngatno nopog ringo lemo lemo mi jadolo nocham lemogo kaachiel gi wich kod bor kuom yien moketi e mach manie kendomarmisango jambich gi tielo nyaka lwok gi pi eka jadolo nochiwgi kaachiel gi lemo duto e kendomarmisango mondo otimgo misango miwango pep tikne dum mamit ni ruoth nyasaye ka ngato chiwo winyo mondo otimgo ni ruoth nyasaye misango miwango pep nyaka ochiw mana akuch odugla kata nyathi akuru jadolo nokel chiwono e kendomarmisango kendo nochod wiye eka owange e kendo marmisango rembe nyaka bi mi chuer e kor kendomarmisango nyaka ogol oswakone kaachiel gi gik manie iye mi owit e bath kendomarmisango komma ochomo yo wuok chieng kama ipukoe buru nyaka obambe ok ogolo buombene oko eka owange ewi yien moket e mach manie kendomarmisango en misango miwango pep madum mamit ni ruoth nyasaye tim jolawi misengni mag cham ka ngato timo ni ruoth nyasaye misango mar cham nyaka ochiw mogo mayom kendo ool mo kuome mi omedie ubani eka nokele ni jodolo joka harun kendo jadolo achiel nojuk mogo sanja moruw gi mo mi nowang kaachiel gi ubani duto ka rapar e kendomarmisango mano en misango miwango mondo tikne odum mangue ngar ni ruoth nyasaye mogo gi mo modong kuom chiwono nobed mar harun gi yawuote en gima ler moloyo nimar ogole kuom misango miwango ni ruoth nyasaye ka ichiwo gima otedi mondo otimgo misango mar cham nyaka obed makati matindotindo ok ketie thowi molos gi mogo mayom modwal gi mo kata chapat ok ketie thowi mowir gi mo ka en gima ochiel e tawo nyaka obed mar mogo mayom moruw gi mo ok oketie thowi nyaka ginginge madundedunde kendo olie mo mano en misango mar cham ka ichiwo gima otedi e sufuria mondo otimgo misango mar cham nyaka obed mar mogo mayom modwal gi mo kel ni ruoth nyasaye misango molos kamano kendo imiye jadolo mi jadolo notere e kendomarmisango enopog moko mondo owang e kendomarmisango ka rapar en misango miwango mondo tikne odum mangue ngar ni ruoth nyasaye gima odong kuom chiwono nobed mar harun gi yawuote en gima ler moloyo nikech ogole kuom misango miwango ni ruoth nyasaye misengni duto mag cham muchiwo ni ruoth nyasaye nyaka bed ok oketie thowi bende kutimo ni ruoth nyasaye misango miwango kik thowi kata mor kich bedie gigo unyalo chiwo ni ruoth nyasaye ka misango mar chamb agwela kik wanggi e kendomarmisango kaka iwango misango madum tik mangue ngar misengni duto mag cham mutimo nyaka ketie chumbi majiwo singruok mane utimo gi nyasaye kamano chumbi nyaka keti e misengni duto mutimo ka utimo ni nyasaye misango mar cham gi cham mokwongo nyak nyaka uchiw cham manyien molodi kendo moyoki nyaka uolie mo kendo uketie ubani mano en misango mar cham jadolo nokaw cham moko moruw gi mo mi nowang kaachiel gi ubani duto ka rapar en misango miwango ni ruoth nyasaye tim jolawi misengni mag sawo ka ngato chiwo rwath kata dwasi mondo otimgo ni ruoth nyasaye misango mar sawo nyaka obed mana dhiang onge songa ngatno nyaka ket lwete ewi dheno kendo oyange e dho hemb romo jodolo joka harun nokaw remo kendo nokir e bethe duto mag kendomarmisango achiel kuom jodologo nyaka kaw boche duto mag jambich gi nyiroke gi boche mogawogi man oguro kod jwala mabor man ewi chuny gi nyiroke mi owanggi ni ruoth nyasaye ka misango miwango pep joka harun nowanggi e kendomarmisango ewi misango miwango pep man e yien moket e mach mondo obed misango miwango madum mamit ni ruoth nyasaye ka ngato chiwo diel kata rombo mondo otimgo ni ruoth nyasaye misango mar sawo nyaka obed dichwo kata dhako maonge songa ka im ema otimogo misango nyaka okele e nyim ruoth nyasaye mi oket lwete e wiye kendo oyange e nyim hemb romo eka joka harun nokaw remo kendo nokir e bethe duto mag kendomarmisango bang mano ngatno nyaka pog boche duto kaka sembe mongad gie lihumblu gi boche mag jambich kod nyiroke kaachiel gi boche mogawogi man oguro kod jwala mabor man ewi chuny gi nyiroke mondo obed misango miwango ni ruoth nyasaye jadolo nowang mago duto e kendomarmisango ka chiemo michiwo ni ruoth nyasaye ka chiwo otimogo misangono en diel nyaka ochiwe e nyim ruoth nyasaye mi oket lwete ewi chiayono kendo oyange e nyim hemb romo eka joka harun nokaw remo kendo nokir e bethe duto mag kendomarmisango bang mano ngatno nyaka pog boche duto mag jambich kod nyiroke kaachiel gi boche mogawogi man oguro kod jwala mabor man ewi chuny gi nyiroke mondo obed misango miwango ni ruoth nyasaye jadolo nowang mago duto e kendomarmisango madum mamit boche duto gin mag ruoth nyasaye enobed chik mochwere kuom tienge duto kamoro amora mudakie ni kik ucham bor kata remo tim jolawi misengni mag golo richo ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya nyis joisrael ni magi e chike omako ngato angata oboth mi oketho chikna moro amora mi otimo gimoro chikgo okwero ka jadolo maduong oketho mi okelo chola kuom joisarel nyaka ochiw ni ruoth nyasaye nyarwath maonge songa mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo kopwodhogo ketho osetimono enokel nyarwadhno e dho hemb romo e nyim ruoth nyasaye mi noket lwete e wiye kendo noyange kanyo eka nokaw rembe moko mi okel ei hemb romo enolut lith lwete e remono kendo nokir nyadibiriyo e nyim pasia maler e nyim ruoth nyasaye bang mano jadolono nomien remo moko e tunge kendo mar misango miwangoe ubani e nyim ruoth nyasaye ei hemb romo nopuk remo duto modong e tiend kendomarmisango miwango pep manie dho hemb romo boche duto mogol kuom nyarwadhno nyaka ket tenge gin boche mag jambich kod nyiroke kaachiel gi bocho mogawogi man e bath oguro kod jwala mabor man ewi chuny gi nyiroke mago noket tenge mana kaka iketo boche mogol kuom boche mitimogo misengni mag sawo jadolo nyaka wang bochego e kendomarmisango miwango pep pien nyarwadhno gi ringe duto kaachiel gi wiye kod tiendene gi jambiye kod owuoche tiende ni nyarwadhno duto noting kendo noter oko mar kambi kama owe ni puko buch kendomarmisango mi nowange kanyo te e mach mar yien e pidh buruno ka oganda israel duto odoko joketho kakia mi gitimo gimoro chik ruoth nyasaye okwero mi wachno ok ongere achien ofwenyore nyaka gichiw nyarwath mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo mi gikele e nyim hemb romo eka jodong oganda noket lwetgi ewi nyarwadhno e nyim ruoth nyasaye kendo noyange kanyo jadolo maduong nokaw remo moko kendo nokel ei hemb romo eka nolut lith lwete e remono kendo nokir nyadibiriyo e nyim pasia maler e nyim ruoth nyasaye bang mano nomien remo moko e tunge kendomarmisango man e nyim ruoth nyasaye ei hemb romo kendo nopuk remo duto modong e tiend kendomarmisango miwango pep man e dho hemb romo eka nokaw boche duto mag nyarwadhno mi nowanggi e kendomarmisango nowang nyarwadhno mana kaka iwango rwath mitimogo misango mar golo richo kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodhnigi kethogi mi nowenigi enogol nyarwadhno oko mar kambi kendo nowange mana kaka nowang rwath machielo cha mano en misango mar golo richo ni oganda ka jatelo moro oketho chik moro amora mar ruoth nyasaye nyasache kakia mi odoko jaketho bange onyise ni oseketho chik nyaka ochiw nywok maonge songa mondo otimgo misango enoket lwete ewi chiayono kendo noyange e nyim ruoth nyasaye kama iyangoe chiayo mitimogo misango miwango pep en misango mar golo richo eka jadolo nogwel remb chiayono gi lith lwete mi nomien e tunge kendomarmisango miwango pep remo duto modong nyaka puk e tiend kendono enowang boche duto e kendomarmisango mana kaka iwango boche mag misengni mag sawo kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodh ketho ngato mi nowene ka ngato angata oketho chik moro amora mar ruoth nyasaye nyasache kokia mi odoko jaketho bange onyise ni oseketho chik nyaka okel diel maonge songa mondo otimgo misango maonge songa mondo otimgo mosango mar golo richo kopwodhogo ketho mosetimono enoket lwete ewi chiayono kendo noyange e nyim ruoth nyasaye kama iyangoe jamni mitimogo misengni miwango pep eka jadolo nogwel remo gi lith lwete mi nomien e tunge kendomarmisango miwango pep remo duto nyaka puki e tiend kendono enogol bochene duto mana kaka igolo boche mag jamni mitimogo misengni mag sawo mi jadolo nowanggi e kendomarmisango mondo odum mamit ni ruoth nyasaye kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodh ketho ngatno mi nowene ka ngato ochiwo rombo mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo nyaka obed rombo nyaburi maonge songa enoket lwete e wiye kendo noyange mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo kama iyangoe jamni mitimogo misengni miwango pep eka jadolo nogwel remo gi lith lwete mi nomien e tunge kendo mar misango miwango pep remo duto nopuk e tiend kendono enogol boche duto mana kaka igolo boche mag rombe mitimogo misengni mag sawo eka nowang bochego ewi misengni miwango ni ruoth nyasaye kopwodhogo ketho ngatno osetimo mi nowene tim jolawi ka omi ngato okuongore mondo ohul gima oseneno kata mosewinjo otamore hulo en bende odoko jaketho kendo nyaka ochul ka ngato omulo gimoro makuero kaka le makuero motho bed ni en le maoko kata mopidhi kata gima mol motho kata ka ogere kuom gimoro amora makuero moa kuom dhano ka ok ongeyo mi ofwenyo achien enodok jaketho kata ka ngato omwomore mokuongore ka ok ongeyo mondo otim gima rach kata gima ber e wach moro ji thoro mwomoree kakuongore mi ofwenyo achien enodok jaketho ka achiel kuom buchegi omako ngato mi ohulo kaka oseketho nyaka okel ni ruoth nyasaye chiayo madhako rombo kata diel kuom keto mosetimono mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo eka jadolo nopwodhnego kethoneno mi nowene ka ngato odhier ok onyal yudo kata mana chiayo moro matin enokel ni ruoth nyasaye akuch odugla ariyo kata nyithi akuru ariyo kuom richo mosetimono akuru achiel notimgo misango mar golo richo machielo notimgo misango miwango pep enokel ni jadolo winygo kendo nokuong ochiw winyo monego timgo misango mar golo richo mi jadolo nomin wiye ok nochod chuth enokir remb winyono moko e kor kendomarmisango remo modong nyaka bi mi chuer e tiend kendono en misango mar golo richo winyo machielo notimgo misango miwango pep kaka chik dwaro kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodhnigo ngatno kethone mi nowene ka ngato ok nyal kata mana chiwo akuch odugla ariyo kata nyithi akuru ariyo kuom richone nyaka ochiw kilo angwen mag mogo mayom mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo kik oolie mo kata kik oketie ubani nikech en misango mar golo richo enokel ni jadolo mogono mi jadolo nojuk sanja ka rapar mondo owang e kendomarmisango ewi misengni miwango ni ruoth nyasaye kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodh ni ngatno ketho mosetimo kuom chikego mi nowene misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya ka ngato oboth moketho mi ok ochiwo gima onego ochiw ni ruoth nyasaye nyaka okelni ruoth nyasaye im maonge songa mondo otimgo misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi nengo imno nyaka pim gi shekel mar fedha mitiyogo e tich nyasaye en misango mar golo ketho bende nyaka ochul nengo mar gima ne ok ochiwo ni ruoth nyasaye komedoe achiel kuom abich mar nengono enochiwe ni jadolo mi jadolo nokaw imno kendo notimgo misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi mi ketho ngatno nowene ka ngato oketho motimo gima ruoth nyasaye okwero dni ok ongeyo ni osetimo kamano pod en mana jaketho nyaka okel ni jadolo im maonge songa mondo otimgo misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi kendo jadolo nopwodhnego ketho mosetimo kokia mi nowene en misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi nikech ngatno oseketho mobedo gi gowi e nyim ruoth nyasaye tim jolawi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya ka ngato oketho motimo gima rach e nyim ruoth nyasaye mokuongore gi miriambo kowuondo wadgi kuom gima nomiye mondo okan kata kuom gima osingne kata kuom gima osekwalo kata kosechamo malang kata kokwanyo gimoro oriamboe odoko jaketho omiyo nyaka ochul gima osekwalo kata mosechamo malang kata nomiye mondo okan kata mane olal okwanyo kata gimoro amora mane okuongoree gi miriambo enochul gino pep chieng mochiwoe misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi komedoe achiel kuom abich mar nengo gino bende enokel ni ruoth nyasaye im maonge songa nengone opim ni oromo timogo misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi jadolo notimnego misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi mi nowene kuom gimoro amora notimo mosemiyo obedo jagowi chike mag misengni mamoko ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya koro nyis harun gi yawuote ni chik mar misango miwango pep ema misango miwango pep nyaka bed e kendo mar misango otieno duto nyaka okinyi bende mach nyaka sik ka liel kanyo bange jadolo norwak law katana maber kod sirwari mondo ogenggo duge eka nogol buch misango mach osewango e kendomarmisango mi noket e bath kendono bange nolok lepe moko eka nogol buru e kambi mi oter oko kama oyangi mach nosik ka liel e kendo mar misango ok otho okinyi kokinyi jadolo nyaka ketie yien mondo oliel eka ochanie misango miwango pep kendo owangie boche mag misengni mag sawo mach nyaka sik ka liel e kendo mar misango ok otho ngang e chik mar misango mar cham joka harun nochiwe e nyim ruoth nyasaye e dho kendomarmisango achiel kuom jodolo nojuk mogo sanja moruw gi mo kaachiel gi ubani duto moketie enowang sanja mojukono ka rapar e kendomarmisango mondo odum mangue ngar ni ruoth nyasaye modong harun gi yawuote nocham maonge thowi e laru mar hemb romo en kama oyang ni ruoth nyasaye mogono asemiyo joka harun ka migapgi kuom misengni motimna kiwango gi mach en gima ler moloyo mana ka misango mar golo richo kendo ka misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi joka harun duto machwo nyalo chame ka migapgi kuom misengni mowang ni ruoth nyasaye mano en chik mochwere kuom tiengeu duto gimoro amora mogerer kuom misengnigo nodok mowal ni ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya mich harun gi yawuote nochiw ni ruoth nyasaye chieng mowire nobed mogo moromo kilo angwen en misango mar cham mapile nu mogono nochiw gokinyi nu machielo nochiw godhiambo notede gi mo e tawo eka inikele ka oseruwore maber mi inichiwe konginjore matindotindo mondo otimgo misango mar cham madum mamit ni ruoth nyasaye nyakwar harun ka nyakwar harun mobedo jadolo maduong ema nochiwe mano en chik mochwere nyaka chieng nowange ni ruoth nyasaye ka misango miwango pep misengni duto mag cham jodolo chiwo nyaka wang pep kik chamgi kata matin ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya nyis harun gi yawuote ni chik mar misango mar golo richo ema chiach misango mar golo richo nyaka yang kama iyangoe jamni mitimogo misengni miwango pep en gima ler moloyo jadolo motimo misangono ema nochame e laru mar hemb romo en kama oyang ni ruoth nyasaye gimoro amora mogere kuom misangono nobed mowal ni ruoth nyasaye ka remb misangono okirore e nanga nyaka lwoke kama oyang ni ruoth nyasaye agulu motedie ring misango mar golo richo nyaka negi ka aguch mula ema otedee nyaka rudhe kendo lawe gi pi ngato angata dichwo jaodgi jadolo nyalo chamo misangono en gima ler moloyo ka remb chiayo motimgo misango mar golo richo okel e hemb romo mondo opwodhgo richo e kama ler misangono ok nocham nowange mana gi mach tim jolawi e chik mar misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi en gima ler moloyo chiach misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi nyaka yang mana kama iyangoe jamni mitimogo misengni miwango pep kendo rembe nyaka kir e bethe duto mag kendomarmisango jadolo nokaw bochene duto kaka sembe gi boche moumo jambich kod nyiroke kaachiel gi boche mogawogi man oguro kod jwala mabor manie wi chuny kod nyiroke enochiwgi kowangogi e kendomarmisangoo mondo obed misango miwango ni ruoth nyasaye en misango mipwodhogo kethoo mar gowi ngato ka ngato dichwo jaodgi jodolo nyalo chame nyaka chame kama owal ni ruoth nyasaye nikech en gima ler moloyo nitie chik achiel moriwo misango mar golo richo kod misango pipwodhogo ketho mar gowi misengnigo nodong ni jadolo motimogi kopwodhogo richo jadolo motimo misango miwango gi chiayo ngato ochiwo nodong gi pien chiayono bende misango ka misango mar cham motedi e kendo kata mochiel e sufuria kata e tawo nodong ni jadolo matime misengni mamoko duto mag cham moruw gi mo kata ok oruw gi mo joka harun duto nopogre maromre chik mar misango mar sawo michiwo ni ruoth nyasaye ema ka ngato ochiwe ka gir erokamano nyaka omedie makati ok oketie thowi moted gi mo gi chapat maonge thowi mowirie mo kod kek matindotindo moted gi mogo mayom modwal gi mo bende nyaka medie makati moketie thowi kek achiel kuom misango ka misango nyaka yiegi e nyim ruoth nyasaye enodong ni jadolo kiro remb misango mar sawo e kendo mar misango ring misango mar sawo nyaka cham chieng mochiwee ok nowe kata matin nindi nyaka okinyi ka ngato otimo misango mochopogo kuongruok kata otimo atima kuom herone jodolo nyaka chame chieng mochiweno kod kinyne ka ringo moko odong nyaka chieng mar adek nyaka wangie e mach ka ring misango mar sawo ocham nyaka chieng mar adek nyasaye ok noyie gi ngat mochiweno kata misango bende ok nochiw ka gima ber enobed gima kwero kendo ngat mochame nobed jaketho ringo aringa ogere kuom gima ogak ok nocham nyaka wange gi mach ngato angata ok ogak nyalo chamo ringo ngat mogak kochamo ring misango mar sawo mochiw ni ruoth nyasaye nongad kare oko kuom ogandagi ka ngato ogere kuom gimoro mogak bed ni en dhano kata le kata gimoro amora makuero bange ochamo ring misango mar sawo mochiw ni ruoth nyasaye nongad kare oko kuom ogandagi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa ni mondo onyis joisrael kama kik ucham bor chiayo moro amora bor chiayo motho athoya kende kata ondiek onego unyalo konyorugo e tich moro kik uchame ngato angata mochamo bor chiayo lembe moko nono osetimgo misango miwango ni ruoth nyasaye nyaka ngad kare oko kuom ogandagi kik ucham remo moro amora bed ni en mar winyo kata mar le kamoro amora mudakie ngato angata mochamo remo nongad kare oko kuom ogandagi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa ni mondo onyis joisrael kama ngato angata mobiro mondo otim misango mar sawo nyaka pog lemo moko obed misango michiwo ni ruoth nyasaye en owuon nokel ni ruoth nyasaye boche miwango gi mach kod agoko iyiego e nyim ruoth nyasaye jadolo nowang bochego e kendomarmisango agoko nodong ni harun gi yawuote bende unumi jadolo em korachwich mar chiayo ka chiayo motimgo misango mar sawo jaka harun machiwo remo kod boche mag misango mar sawo ema nokaw emno agoko kod em mag chiayo ka chiayo joisrael timogo misengni mag sawo amiyo harun jadolo kod yawuote mondo obed mich moyiedhi migolo kuom joisrael nyaka chieng mano en lemo momus harun gi yawuote kuom misengni miwango chakre chieng mane oketgie jodolo mag ruoth nyasaye chieng mane owirgieno ruoth nyasaye nogolo chik ni joisraell nyaka mi jodolo migepego mano en chik momako joisrael nyaka chieng mago e chike mag misango miwango pep gi mag misango mar cham gi mag misango mar golo richo gi mag misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi gi mag misengni mitimo chieng miketo jadolo e tich kod mag misengni mag sawo ruoth nyasaye nomiyo musa chikego e got sinai chieng mane ochikoe joisrael mondo ochiwni ruoth nyasaye misengni maggi ka gin e thim sinai tim jolawi oket harun kod yawuote e tich dolo wuok ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya kaw harun gi yawuote kendo kaw lep dolo gi mor wir gi rwath mitimogo misango mar golo richo gi imbe ariyo kod odheru motingo makati ok ketie thowi bende ichok oganda joisrael duto e dho hemb romo musa notimo kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike mi joisrael nochokore e dho hemb romo eka nonyiso ji niya gima adwaro timoni ema ruoth nyasaye nochiko nokelo harun gi yawuote mi olwoko gi pi bang mano norwako ni harun kandhu mi otweyone okanda e nungone kendo norwakone aroya gi law efod kotueyo gi okanda mar efod notueyone law agoko moketo ombulu miluongo ni urim gi thumim e iye eka nosidhone kilemba kendo oketone dhahabu mopamore en osimbo maler e nyim kilemba kaka ne ruoth nyasaye ochike bange musa nokawo mor wir mowirogo hema maler kod gik moko duto mane ni e iye kopwodhogi ni tich nyasaye bende nokiro mo moko dibiriyo e kendomarmisango mowire kaachiel gi gige duto kod karaya mar lwok gi rachungine kopwodhogi ni tich nyasaye noolo mo moko ewi harun mi owire kokete e tich dolo eka nokelo yawuot harun morwakonigi kendhe kendo otueyonigi okanda mi osidhonigi kilemba kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike bang mano musa nokelo rwath mane idhi timgo misango mar golo richo mi harun gi yawuote noketo lwetgi e wiye eka musa nonege nokawo remb rwadhno mi omieno e tunge kendomarmisango gi lith lwete mondo opwodhego eka nopuko remo modong e tiend kendomarmisango mi owalo ni ruoth nyasaye kotimoe misango mipwodhogo richo bange nokawo boche mag jambich gi jwala mabor man ewi chuny kod nyiroke gi boche mogawo nyiroke mi nowangogi e kendomarmisango rwadhno duto tiende gi piene gi ringe kod owuoche nogolo oko mar kambi mowango pep kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike eka musa nokelo im mane ibi timgo misango miwango pep harun gi yawuote noketo lwetgi ewi imno eka musa nonege nokawo remo mokiro e bethe duto mag kendomarmisango ne opogo imno lemo lemo mowango wiye gi lembe duto kod bochene eka nolwoko jambich kod tielo e pi mowangogi e kendomarmisango mano ne misango miwango pep mondo odum mamit ni ruoth nyasaye kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa bang mano musa nokelo im machielo mar keto jadolo e tich harun gi yawuote noketo lwetgi e wiye eka musa nonege nokawo remo momieno e harun korachwich kendo e lith lwete mathwon korachwich kendo e lith tiende mathwon korachwich eka nokelo yawuot harun momieno remo e itgi korachwich gi lith lwetgi mathwon korachwich kod lith tiendgi mathwon korachwich bange nokiro remo modong e bethe duto mag kendomarmisango eka nokawo boche duto kaka sembe gi boche mogawo jambich gi jwala mabor man ewi chuny kod nyiroke gi boche mogawo nyiroke kaachiel gi em korachwich eka nodhi e odheru motingo makati ok ketie thowi mane ni e nyim ruoth nyasaye mokawoe makati achiel ok ketie thowi gi kek achiel moted gi mo kod chapat achiel moketogi e wi boche gi em korachwich gigo duo noketo e lwet harun gi yawuote mondo ochiw ka mich moyiedhi bange nochako okawogi e lwetgi mowangogi kaachiel gi misango miwango pep e kendomarmisango mano ne misango mar keto jodolo e tich miwango gi mach mondo odum mamit ni ruoth nyasaye musa nokawo agoko mochiwo ka mich moyiedhi mano ne e lembe kuom im mar keto jodolo e tich kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike nokawo mor wir moko gi remo moko mane ni ewi kendo mar misango mokiro kuom harun gi lepe mag dolo kendo kuom yawuote gi lepgi mag dolo musa nowachoni harun gi yawuote niya teduru ring imno e dho hemb romo kendo uchame kuno kaachiel gi makati manie odheru motingo gik miketogo jodolo e tich mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nochika niya harun gi yawuote nyaka cham ringono ringo kod makati modong nyaka uwang pep gi mach kuom ndalo abiriyo kik ua e dho hemb romo nyaka ndalo mar ketou e tich dolo rum nimar nyasi mar ketou e tich dolo kawo ndalo abiriyo kaka wasepwodhou kawuononi e kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko ni mondo otim omiyo koro beduru e dho hemb romo odiechieng gotieno kuom ndalo abiriyo kutimo gima ruoth nyasaye ochiko mondo kik utho mano e kaka ruoth nyasaye nochika kamano harun gi yawuote notimo gik moko duto mane ruoth nyasaye omiyo musa ochikogi tim jolawi harun otimo misengni chieng mar aboro musa noluongo harun gi yawuote kod jodong israel nowacho ni harun niya kaw nyarwath mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo kod im otimgo misango miwango pep mondo ikelgi e nyim ruoth nyasaye jamnigo nyaka bed maonge songa bange chik joisrael mondo okaw nywok otimgo misango mar golo richo kendo gikaw nyaroya gi nyarombo hikgi achiel achiel maonge songa mondo otimgo misango miwango pep kendo gikaw rwath gi im mondo otimgo misengni mag sawo e nyim ruoth nyasaye kaachiel gi misango mar cham moruw gi mo nimar ruoth nyasaye biro fwenyorenu tinende ne gikelo gik mane musa ochikogigo duto e nyim hemb romo kendo oganda duto nosudo mochung e nyim ruoth nyasaye eka musa nowacho niya e gima ruoth nyasaye osechikou mondo utim mondo duongne maler ofwenyrenu nowacho ni harun ni sud kendomarmisango mondo itim misango mar golo richo kod misango miwango pep mondo ipwodhrigo kendo ipwodhgo joodi bange itim misango gi jamni oganda ochiwo kipwodhogo oganda kaka ruoth nyasaye ochiko omiyo harun nosudo kendomarmisango mi onyango nyarwath mibi timgo misango mar golo richone owuon yawuote nokelone remo mi olutoe lith lwete kendo omienogo tunge mag kendomarmisango remo modong nopuko e tiend kendo nokawo boche gi nyiroke kod jwala mabor man ewi chuny mag chiayo mane otimgo misango mar goolo richo mowango e kendomarmisango kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa ringo gi pien notero oko mar kambi mowango pep bang mano harun noyango chiayo mane ibi timgo misango miwango pep kendo yawuote nogamone remo mokiro e bethe duto mag kendomarmisango eka ne gigamone lemo mag chiayono kaachiel gi wich mi ne owangogi e kendomarmisango nolwoko jambich kod tielo mi nowangogi e kendomarmisango kaachiel gi misango miwango pep eka nokelo gik mane ji ochiwo mokawo nywok mane ibi timgo misango mar golo richo ni oganda noyange kendo nopwodhogo richogi kaka ne opwodho richone owuon bang mano nokelo chiayo mane ibi timgo misango miwango pep mi notiyo kode kaka chik dwaro eka nokelo mogo mane ibi timgo misango mar cham kendo nojuko sanja mowango e kendomarmisango kaachiel gi misango mar okinyi miwango pep bange noyango rwath kod im mane ibi timgo misango mar sawo ni oganda mi yawuote nogamone remo mokiro e bethe duto mag kendomarmisango ne gikawo boche mag rwath gi sembe mar im gi boche mogawo jambich kod nyiroke gi boche mogawo nyiroke kaachiel gi jwala mabor man ewi chuny mi giketogi ewi agoko mag jamnigo eka ne giwangogi e kendomarmisango harun nokawo agoko gi em korachwich mi ochiwo e nyim ruoth nyasaye ka mich moyiedhi kaka musa nochiko bange harun notingo lwete malo kochomo oganda moguedhogi eka nolor oa kama notimoe misengni mag golo richo gi misengni miwango pep kod mag sawo musa gi harun nodonjo e hemb romo kane giwuok oko ne giguedho ji mi duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye nofwenyore ni ji duto mach nomwuoch e nyim ruoth nyasaye mowango misango miwango pep kaachiel gi boche mane nie kendomarmisango kane ji duto oneno kamano ne gikok mi gipodho piny auma tim jolawi richo mag nadab kod abihu nadab gi abihu yawuot harun nokawo tepgi mag mach mi giketoe mach eka ne gioloe ubani ne gidonjo e nyim ruoth nyasaye mi giyiegoe mach ok ni kare mane ruoth nyasaye ok ochiko mondo ochiwne mi mach nomwoch e nyim ruoth nyasaye motiekogi pep kamano ne githo kanyo e nyim ruoth nyasaye bang mano musa nowacho ni harun niya e gima nyasaye nowuoyoe niya joma sudo buta nyaka nge ni ngama ler kendo nyaka gimiya duong e nyim ji duto harun noling alinga thi ka dhoge omoko musa nooro wach mi oluongne mishael gi elzafan yawuot uziel owadgi wuon harun kod yawuote eleazar gi ithamar niya biuru uting ringre oweteu ugol oko mondo oa kama ler omiyo ne gibiro mi gitingogi gi lepgi kendo gigologi oko mar kambi kaka musa nosechikogi chike moko momako jodolo bange musa nowacho ni harun kod yawuote eleazar gi ithamar niya kik uwe wiu yugno kendo kik uyiech lepu manyiso ni uywak nimar dipo ka utho mi ruoth nyasaye okecho gi oganda duto joweteu joisrael nyalo ywago joma ne ruoth nyasaye otieko gi mach un kik ua e dho hemb romo nono utho nimar osewiru gi mor wir mar ruoth nyasaye mi ne gitimo kaka musa nowacho ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni harun niya kod yawuoti kik umadh kongo kata gimoro mamero ji ka udhi e hemb romo nono utho mano en chik momako nyikwau nyaka chieng nyaka umak chikno kupogo gik mowal ni ruoth nyasaye kod gik moko nono kendo kupogo gik mokwer kod gik ok okwer kendo kupuonjo joisrael chike mane ruoth nyasaye omiyogi gi dho musa pok jodolo musa nowacho ni harun gi yawuote modong eleazar gi ithamar niya kawuru mogo modong kuom misango mar cham miwango gi mach ni ruoth nyasaye mondo ucham maonge thowi kendomarmisango nikech en gima ler moloyo mano emomiyo nyaka uchame kama ler nimar en pokni kaachiel gi yawuoti pok onogo ogol kuom misengni miwango ni ruoth nyasaye nikech kamano e kaka nochika un gi yawuotu unucham agoko gi em mar mich moyiedhi michiwo ni ruoth nyasaye nyaka uchamgi kamoro amora mowal ni ruoth nyasaye nimar osemiugi kuom misengni mag sawo joisrael timo em kod agoko nyaka kel kaachiel gi boche mag misengni miwango ni ruoth nyasaye mondo obed mich moyiedhi michiwo ni ruoth nyasaye bange em gi agoko nodongni gi nyithindi kaka poku mosiko nyaka chieng nikech ruoth nyasaye ochiko kamano musa nopenjo wach diel mane otimgo misango mar golo richo mi ne onyise ni osewange omiyo mirima nomake gi eleazar kod ithamar yawuot harun mane odong nopenjogi niya marango ne ok uchamo misango mar golo richo kama ler en misango maler moloyo ne omiugo mondo ugolgo richo mar oganda joisrael kupwodhogi kuom richogi e nyim ruoth nyasaye ne ok ukelo rembe ei kama ler omiyo ne onego uchame ei kama ler kaka nochika harun nodwoko musa niya kawuono yawuota osetimo ni ruoth nyasaye misango mar golo richogi giwegi kod misango miwango pep kata kamano neye gima osetimorena koro ka da acham misango mar golo richo kawuono bende datimo maber e nyim ruoth nyasaye kane musa owinjo kamano noneno ni harun ni kare tim jolawi le joisrael nyalo chamo gi mago makuergi rapar mar chik ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa gi harun ni mondo onyis joisrael kama unyalo chamo kit le moro amora kata kit chiayo moro amora ombongne opogore ariyo kendo nyamo kambula kik ucham mago ombonggi opogore ariyo ok nyam kambula kata mago manyamo kambula ombonggi ok opogore ariyo nyaka ukuer ngamia gi terere kod apuoyo nikech kata ginyamo kambula kamano ombonggi ok opogore ariyo mbidhi bende nyaka ukuer nikech kata ombongne opogore ariyo kamano ok onyam kambula kik ucham lego kata mana mulogi ka gisetho kik umulgi unukwangi ka gik makuero kuom gik modak e thim unyalo chamo mago duto man gi thuokgi kod kagahla bed ni gidak e pi chumbi kata e pi maonge chumbi nyaka ukuer mago duto maonge gi thuokgi kata kagahla kata ka gin gik matindo manywolore kata ka gin gik madongo ginibednu gik makuero ok omuchamgi kendo kata mana mago motho nobednu gik makuero gimoro amora modak e pi maonge thuoke kata kagahla nobednu gik makuero winy nyaka kuer e magi ongo gi koga gi kwasi gi otenga kod kit okunekune duto gi kit agak duto gi udo gi nyatawo gi okok kod kit olith duto gi tula matin gi osou gi tula maduong gi tula ite dongo gi mbusi gi achuth gi nyamnaha gi kit nganga duto gi cherwa kot oliktik gik mahuyo kanyakla duto kendo wuotho gi tiende angwen nobednu gik makuero mak mana mago tiendegi ochomore e ogwendegi mondo gichikrego kuom gik makamago unyalo chamo kit bonyo madongo duto gi git osialo duto gi kit onjiri duto kod kit dede duto gik moko duto mahuyo kanyakla kendo man gi tiende angwen nobednu gik makuero ka ngato omulo gik makamago obedo mogak kendo gimoro amora mogere kuomgi ka gisetho nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo ngat motingogi ka gisetho nyaka lwok lepe nosik kogak nyaka odhiambo unukuer le duto ombonggi ok opogore ariyo kendo ok nyam kambula kendo ngato angata momulogi nobed mogak bende unukuer le duto man gi tiende angwen wuotho ka nyono piny gi tiendegi kaka paka kata guok ngat momulogi ka gisetho nobed mogak
