nyadibiryo e nyim ruoth nyasaye gi lith lwete korachwich eka nokaw mo moko modong e tat lwete kendo nowir e dho ngat mipwodhono korachwich kendo e lith lwete mathwon korachwich kendo e lith tiende mathwon kotachwich mana kuonde nomienie remb misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi mo modong e tat lwet jadolo nool ewi ngat mipwodhono mondo opuodhego jadolono nokaw winyo achiel kuom winy mane ngatno okelo kata bed ni gin akuch odugla kata gin nyithi akuru mi notimgo misango mar golo richo machielo notimgo misango miwango pep bende enotim misango mar cham kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodh ngatno e nyim ruoth nyasaye mano e chik moket ni ngat modhier man gi tuo mar dhoho kendo ok nyal yudo chiwo mitimogo misengni piwodhego ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa gi harun niya ka usedonjo e piny kanaan abiro miyou mondo udagie mi akelo gimoro marach momiyo kor ot moro opur wuon odno nyaka dhi ir jadolo kendo nyise ni gima rach ni e ode jadolo nyaka gol chik mondo gik moko duto manie odno ogol ka pok odhi range nono gigo duto obedo mogak bange jadolo nodonj e odno mondo orangi ka onwango ni kuonde gigo nitie olokore ratiglo kata makwar kendo nenore ni odonjo e kor ot nyaka owuog oko e dhot kendo olor odno kuom ndalo abiriyo chieng mar abiriyo nyaka oduogi mi ochak orang ot koyudo ka gima rachno oselandore e kor ot nyaka ogol chik mondo kite gino nitie ogol oko kendo owiti e tok dala kamoro ok ler bang mano nogol chik mondo ochwer kor odno duto gi yo ka iye kendo gipuk lowo gichwero e tok dala kamoro ok ler eka giniket kite manyien kuonde gisegoloe moko ka mi gimwon ot gi lowo manyien ka gino ochako owuok molandore kosegol kite ka kendo ochuer kor ot mi ochak omwon jadolo nyaka duog rang odno ka oyudo ni gino oselandore mano nyiso ni en gima rach ka dhoho kuom mano odno obedo mogak kendo nyaka muke mi kitene gi yiende kod lope ter e tok dala mi wit kamoro ok ler ngato angata mane oyudo odonjo e odno e kinde mane olore nobed mogak nyaka odiambo kendo ngato angata osenindo e odno kata ochiemoe nyaka lwok lepe ka jadolo odhi morango odno kendo oyudo ni gino ok oselandore bang mwone nongad wach ni odno osepwodhi nikech gima rachno orumo jadolo nyaka kaw winy ariyo matindo kendo kaw yiend sida gi usi makwar kod owino opwodhgo ot mondo odok maler eka noneg winyo achiel e agulu motingo pi aora kendo nokaw yiend sida gi owino kod usi makwar kaachiel gi winyo mangima cha mi nolutgi e remb winyo mosenegno kendo e pi malerno mi nokir nyadibiriyo kuom ot kamano e kaka nopwodh ot kokonyore gi remb winyo gi pi maler gi winyo mangima gi yiend sida kaachiel gi owino kod usi makwar winyo mangima nowe ring dhi e thim kosepwodho ot kamano ot nodok maler mano e chik man kuom tuo dhoho kido mopogore opogore kod tuo mawuok buk gi pur mamako nanga kata mamako ot gi kuonde mobokore e del kata moluro kata mamarmar chikno nyiso kaka ipogo gik mogak kod gik ok ogak en chik mar tuo dhoho gi mar gik mopur tim jolawi gik machuer e dend ngato mamiyo obedo mogak ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa gi harun ni mondo onyis joisrael ni ka nyot ngato owuok kata koyudo tuo nyach machuer gima chuerno bedo mogak kata ka nyajno chuer kata kodinore ngatno ogak kendo chik mar gakne kuom chuer kamano chalo kama kitanda ngat dende chuer kamano onindoe kata gimoro amora mobetie bedo mogak ngato angata momulo kitandano nyaka lwok lepe kendo lwokre nosik kogak nyaka odhiambo bende ngato angata mobet kama ngat dende chuer osebetie nyaka lwok lepe kendo lwokre nosik kogak nyaka odhiambo ngato angata momulo ngat dende chuer nyaka lwok lepe kendo lwokre nosik kogak nyaka odhiambo ka ngat dende chuer ongulo olawo kuom ngato ngat mongul kuome olawno nyaka lwok lepe kendo lwokre nosik kogak nyaka odhiambo gimoro amora ngat dende chuerno obetie ka en e wuoth bedo mogak ngato angata momulo gima ngatno osebetie nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo kendo ngato motingo gik kamago nyaka lwok lepe kendo lwokre nosik kogak nyaka odhiambo ngato angata ngat dende chuer omulo ka pok ologo nyaka lwok lepe kendo lwokre nosik kogak nyaka odhiambo gimoro amora mochue gi lowo ngat dende chuer omulo nyaka negi ka en gima olos gi bawo nyaka lawe gi pi ka ngat dende chuerno ochango nyaka owe ndalo abiriyo kadhi kopwodhore nolwok lepe kendo nolwokre gi pi maler eka nopwodhre chieng mar aboro nokaw akuch odugla ariyo kata nyithi akuru ariyo mi nobigo e dho hemb romo e nyim ruoth nyasaye kendo nomigi jadolo jadolo nokaw akuru achiel mi notimgo misango mar golo richo machielo notimgo misango miwango pep kamano nopwodh ngatno e nyim ruoth nyasaye kaka chik dwaro kuom gak mar chuer ka nyot ngato owuok nyaka olwok dende duto gi pi kendo nosik kogak nyaka odhiambo nanga moro amora kata pien moro amora nyodo otonie nyaka lwoki kendo nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo chikno bende omako dhako ngato oriworego giduto ji ariyogo nyaka gilwokre ginisik ka gigak nyaka odhiambo ka dhako odhi e due nobed mogak kuom ndalo abiriyo kendo ngato angata momule nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo gimoro amora monindoe kata mobetie e kindego nobed mogak ngato angata momulo kitanda dhakono kata momulo gimoro mosebetie nyaka lwok lepe kendo lwokre nosik kogak nyaka odhiambo kata ka omulo gima nie kitanda dhakono kata man kama obetie nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo ka ngato oriwore gi dhakono mi rembe omiene nobed mogak ka dhako moro chuer kuom ndalo mogwarore e kinde ok odhi e due kata ka ochuer aminga mokadho kaka ojadhi e due nobed mogak e kinde mochwerieno duto mana kaka ndalo modhi e due kitanda moro amora monindoe kata gimoro amora mobetie e kindeno nobed mogak mana ka kitanda monindoe kodhi e due ngato angata momulo gigo nobed mogak omiyo nyaka olwok lepe kendo olwokre nosik kogak nyaka odhiambo ka dhakono ochango nyaka owe ndalo abiriyo kadhi bange nobed maler chieng mar aboro nyaka okaw akuch odugla ariyo kata nyithi akuru abiriyo mi oter ni jodolo e dho hemb romo jadolo nokaw akuru achiel mi notimgo misango mar golo richo machielo notimgo misango miwango pep kopwodho dhakono e nyim ruoth nyasaye kaka chik dwaro kuom gak mar chuer kamano e kaka unusiem joisrael kuom bet mogak nimar dipo ka gidwanyo kar dakna maler manie kindgi mi githo nikech gakgino mano en chik momako ngat moyudo nyach machuer kata nyote owuok mi odoko mogak bende en chik mamako dhako modhi e due kaachiel gi ngato angata bed ni en dichuo kata dhako dende chuer kod ngat moriwore gi dhako mogak tim jolawi chieng pwodhruok mar oganda joisrael kane yawuot harun ariyo kande osetho kuom chiwo mach ok ni kare e nyim ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya nyis harun owadu ni kik okadh pasia mi odonj e kama ler e nyim raum sandug muma miluongo ni kar ngwono mak mana e kinde moketi nono otho nikech afwenyora gi e bor polo man ewi raum e kinde ka kinde harun donjoe kama ler nyaka okel nyarwath mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo kod im mondo otimgo misango miwango pep enorwak law dolo mabor gi sirwari mondo ogenggo duge kendo notue misip e nungone kendo nosidh kilemba e wiye mago duto nobed mag katana maber gin lep dolo omiyo harun nyaka lwokre ka pok orwakogi enokaw nyuogi ariyo kuom oganda joisrael mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo kendo im achiel mondo otimgo misango miwango pep nyaka otim misango mar golo richo gi rwath mondo opwodhrego kaachiel gi joode bang mano nokaw nyuogi ariyo kende nokelgi e nyim ruoth nyasaye e dho hemb romo nyaka ogo ombulu kuomgi mondo diel achiel obed mar ruoth nyasaye machielo obed mar azazel eka nokaw diel ombuch ruoth nyasaye olwar kuome mi notimgo misango mar golo richo diel ombuch azazel olwar kuome nokel ka ngima e nyim ruoth nyasaye mi nopwodhe eka noriembe odhi e thim ir azazel harun nyaka chiw rwath mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo kopwodhorego kaachiel gi joode enokaw tap mach moketie mach mogol e kendomarmisango manie nyim ruoth nyasaye kaachiel gi ubani mangue ngar moromo lwedo ariyo mi nokel ei kama nogeng gi pasia eka nool ubani e majno e nyim ruoth nyasaye mondo ich ubani oim sandug rapar mondo kik otho enokaw remb rwath mi nokir gi lith lwete e bath raum koma ochomo yo wuokchieng kendo nokir remono nyadibiriyo gi lith lwete e nyim raum bang mano noyang diel mitimogo misango mar golo richo ni oganda joisrael mi noter rembe ei kama ogeng gi pasia kendo nokir remono ewi raum kendo e nyim raum mana kaka nokiro remb rwath mano e kaka enopwodh kama ler kuom timbe mogak joisrael osedwanyego kendo kuom timbe mane giweyogo ruoth nyasaye tiende ni richogo duto kamano bende e kaka nopwodh hemb romo manie diergi kama timbegi ogakie onge ngat moro machielo manobed ei hemb romo chakre sa harun donjo ei kama ler mondo opwodhre owuon kendo opwodh joode kod oganda duto mar joisrael nyaka sa owuokie kosetieko tich pwodhruok duto bange nowuog oko e kendomarmisango manie nyim ruoth nyasaye mi nopwodh kendono nokaw remb rwath moko kod remb diel moko mi nomiengo tunge duto mag kendomarmisango kendo nokir remo moko nyadibirioyo gi lith lwete e kendomarmisango kamano nopuodhe kuom timbe mogak mag joisrael mi nomi obed maler ka harun osetieko pwodho kama ler gi hemb romo kendomarmisango nokel diel mangima e nyim oganda enoket lwetene duto ewi diendno kendo nohul richo duto mag joisrael gi timbe mane giweyogo ruoth nyasaye tiende ni richogi duto enowe richogo duto ewi diendno eka nomiye ngat manoyud obet ka rito mondo otere e thim kamano diendno noting richo duto mag joisrael e thim kuma bor ngatno noweye kuno mondo odhi adhiya bang mano harun nodonj e hemb romo mi nolony lep katana mane orwako kodonjo e kama ler kendo nowegi kanyo eka nolwokre gi pi kamoro moyang ni nyasaye kendo norwak lepe mag dolo mi nowuog oko mondo otim misangone owuon miwango pep kod mar oganda joisrael kamano nopwodhre kendo nopwodh ji bende enowang boche chiayo motimogo misango mar golo richo e kendomarmisango ngat mane oriembo diel ka tero ir azazel kik donj e kambi nyaka chop olwok lepe kendo olwokre rwath gi diel motimgo misengni mag golo richo kendo rembgi oseter ei kama ler mondo opwodhgo richo nogol ringi gi piendegi kod owuochgi oko e tok kambi kama nyaka wanggie pep ngat owangogi nyaka lwok lepe kendo lwokre eka bange onyalo dwogo e kambi koro chik momakou nyaka chieng ema due apar mar due mar abiriyo un joisrael kaachiel gi jopinje mamoko modak kuomu nyaka utue chiemo kendo kik uti tich moro nikech chiengno ema nogolnue richou mondo upwodhru kamano unupuwodhru kuom richou duto e nyim ruoth nyasaye chiengno en chieng sabato moyiedhi nyaka uyueye kendo nyaka utueye chiemo en chik momakou nyaka chieng jadolo mowir kendo moketi kar wuon mare e tij dolo ema notimnu pwodhruok enorwak lep dolo mag katana maber kendo enopwodh kama ler gi hemb romo kod kendomarmisango eka nopwodh jodolo kod oganda joisrael duto mano nobed chik momakou nyaka chieng mondo upwodh joisrael dichiel e higa kuom richogi kamano musa nochopo chike mag ruoth nyasaye tim jolawi misengni nyaka tim kamoro achiel kende ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa ni mondo onyis harun gi yawuote kaachiel gi joisrael duto ni ruoth nyasaye ochiko kama ka jaisrael moro amora onego dhiang kata rombo kata diel ei kambi kata oko mar kambi ok okelo e dho hemb romo mondo otimgo ni ruoth nyasaye misango e nyim hema maler mar ruoth nyasaye nokwane ka ngama oneko osechuero remo omiyo nyaka ngad kare oko kuom ogandagi chikni oketi mondo joisrael okel ni ruoth nyasaye jamni ginego oko nyaka gikelgi ni jadolo e dho hemb romo mondo gitim kodgi misengni mag sawo ni ruoth nyasaye jadolo nokir remo e kendomarmisango mar ruoth nyasaye man e dho hemb romo kendo nowang boche mondo odum mamit ni ruoth nyasaye ka joisrael nego jamni kik gimed timo misengni ni jochiende gilamo ka gidwanyorego mana kaka dhako moweyo chwore dwanyore gi chwo mamoko mano nobed chik momakogi kaachiel gi nyikwagi nyaka chieng ruoth nyasaye nomedo wacho ni musa mondo owach ni joisrael niya ka jaisrael moro amora kata japiny moro modak kuomu otimo misango miwango pep kata misango moro amora ook okelo e dho hemb romo mondo otimnigo ruoth nyasaye misango nongad kare oko kuom ogandagi ruoth nyasaye okwero chamo remo ka jaisrael moro amora kata japiny moro modak kuomu ochamo remo anabed jasike mi nangad kare oko kuom ogandagi nikech ngima gimoro ni e rembe achiwo remo mondo otimgo misango e kendomarmisango mondo upwodhrugo nimar remo tiende ni ngima ema ipwodhogo richo mano emomiyo asekwero joisrael kaachiel gi jopinje moko modak kuomgi ni kik gicham remo ka jaisarel moro amora kata japiny moro modak kuomu odhi duar momako le kata winyo minyalo chamo nyaka ool rembe piny kendo oik gi lowo nikech ngima gimoro ni e rembe mano emomiyo asekwero joisarel mondo kik ocham remb gimoro nikech ngima gino ni e rembe ngat mochamo remo nongad kare oko ngato angata bed ni en jaisrael kata japiny moro modak kuomu mochamo gimoro motho athoya kende kata ondiek onego nolwok lepe kendo nolwokre nosik kogak nyaka odhiambo eka bange nobed maler ka ok olwoko lepe kendo ok olwokore noyud kum kuom kethone tim jolawi okwer terruok gi timbe kamago ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa ni mondo onyis joisrael kama e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kik utim timbe jomisri mane udak e pinygi kata kik utim timbe jokanaan aterou e pinygi kik ulu chike jogo duto nyaka urit chikena kendo uluw yorena e ruoth nyasaye omiyo nyaka urit chikena gi buchena ka ngato orito yudo ngima e ruoth nyasaye kik ngato moro kuomu terre gi dhako moro watne e ruoth nyasaye kik ikuod wi wuoru kuom terruok gi meru en meru omiyo kik ikuod wiye kik iterri gi chi wuoru nikech kitimo kamano ikuodo wi wuoru kik iterri gi nyameru hie kata gi nyameru ngat machielo onywolo bed ni onywole dala kata kamoro machielo kik iterri gi nyar wuodi kata gi nyar nyari nikech kitimo kamano ikuodo wiyi iwuon kik iterri gi nyameru ot machielo en nyameru omiyo kik ikuod wiye kik iterri gi wayu nikech en gi wuoru gin remo achiel kata kik iterri gi nyamin meru nikech en gi meru bende gin remo achiel kik iterri gi chi owadgi wuoru nikech kitimo kamano ikuodo wi wuoruno kik iterri gi chi wuodi nikech kitimo kamano ikuodo wiye kik iterri gi chi owadu nikech kitimo kamano ikuodo wi owaduno kik iterri gi dhako moro nyare bende iterorigo kata kik ikaw nyar wuod dhakono kata nyar nyar dhakono mondo iterrigo nimar dipo kiriwori gi rembi iwuon mano en richo maduong kik ikaw nyamin chiegi mondo obed nyieke mi iriwri kode ka nyamin pod ngima kik iriwri gi dhako ka ni e due kik iterri gi chi wadu mi omi idok mogak kik ichiw nyathini moro ni nyasaye manono miluongo ni molek nikech kitimoo kamano ikwedo nying nyasachu e ruoth nyasaye kik inind gi ngama dichwo kaka dinind gi ngama dhako nikech mano kwero kik iterri gi chiayo moro mi omiyi ibed mogak dhako bende kik yie mondo chiayo moro oriwre kode mano en gima mono kik udwanyru kutimo timbe kamago nikech timbego ema nomiyo ogendini abiro riembo mondo owenu thuologi odoko joma odwanyore mano e kaka pinyno nodoko mogak mi ne akume nikech richogo omiyo nongogo joma odakie oko un nyaka urit chikena onge ngato kuomu notim timbe makuerogo bed ni en jaisrael kata jadak nono pinyno ongogou oko kuom dwanye mana kaka nongogo oganda mane okuongonu dakie oganda mane okuongonuno notimo timbe makuerogo mi ne gimiyo pinyno odoko mogak ngato angata motimo achiel kuom timbe makuerogo nongad kare oko kuom ogandagi emomiyo rituru chikna kendo kik uluw timbe makuero mane weg pinyno otimo kapok ubiro kamano ok nudok mogak e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu tim jolawi chike mag timbe makare ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa ni mondo onyis joisrael niya nyaka ubed joma ler nikech ruoth nyasaye nyasachu aler ngato ka ngato kuomu nyaka luor min gi wuon kendo nyaka rit sabato maga e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kik uluw nyiseche manono kendo kik uthedh nyiseche mag nyinyo mondo ulam e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ka uyango chiayo mondo utimgo ni ruoth nyasaye misango mar sawo neguru chiayono kaka chik dwaro mondo ruoth nyasaye oyie kodu nyaka chame mana chieng mitimoe misangono kata kinyne ringo modong nyaka chieng mar adek nyaka wang e mach ka ochame chieng mar adek ruoth nyasaye ok noyie kode nikech ne en gima kuero ngato angata mochame nyaka yud kum kuom kethone nikech osechayo gima ler mar ruoth nyasaye ngatno nongad kare oko kuom ogandagi ka ukayo cham e puotheu kik uke nyaka giko puotheu kata kik uhul abang tiang bende kik upon olembeu mag mzabibu mutiek pep kata kik ukwany mago molwar piny nyaka uwegi ni joma odhier kod jodak e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kik ikwel kata kik iwuond wadu kata kik imaye e yor wuond kik ikuongri gi nyinga kiwuondo ngato nimar kitimo kamano ichayo nying ruoth nyasaye nyasachu e ruoth nyasaye kik idhir wadu kata kik imaye gire bende nyaka ichul jatich mana e odiechieng motiyonieno kik iyany ngat ite odino kata kik iket gimoro e nyim muofu dochwanyre luoruru nyasachu e ruoth nyasaye kik iket bura kuom dok ni jachan kata kuom luoro ngama duong ngad ni wadu bura kare kichung e adiera kik iwuoth koni gi koni kiketho nying jou kata kik ihangne wadu wach kodonjne e buch nek e ruoth nyasaye kik imak sadha gi wadu nyaka inyise kethone wang gi wang mano eka ok dibed jaketho kik ichul kuor kata kik ibed mamon gi jowadu nyaka iher wadu kaka iherori iwuon e ruoth nyasaye nyaka urit chikena kik uwe jamni mopogore opogore luwre kendo kik uchwo kothe ariyo mopogore opogore e puotheu bende kik urwak lewni molos gi usi ariyo mopogore opogore ka ongiew misumba nyako ni ngat moro mondo okendi mi ngato oterore kode ka pok owar nyakono kata ka pok omiye thuolo mondo odhi nyaka non wachno ok noneg nyako kod ngat moterore kodeno nikech pod en misumba ngat moterore kodeno nyaka kel im e nyim ruoth nyasaye e dho hemb romo mondo otimgo misango mar golo ketho mar gowi jadolo notim misango e nyim ruoth nyasaye gi imno mondo opwodh ni ngatno richone eka nowene richo mosetimono ka usedonjo e piny abiro miyou mi upidho yath moro amora olembe inyalo cham nyaka ukwan olembego ka gima kuero kendo ok unuchamgi kuom higni adek e higa mar angwen olembe duto nobed chiwo maler ni ruoth nyasaye kendo mano nomi gibed gik inyalo cham e higa mar abich unyalo chamo olembego kutimo kamano ginimed nyak moloyo e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kik ucham ringo man gi remo kik upor wach kata kik ubed ajuoke kik utit wiu kata yie tiku kik usar dendu kuywago ngama otho kata kik usar kido moro kuomu e ruoth nyasaye kik umi nyiu bed jochode mi lokre ohodho dipo ka pinyu okethore mi richo opongo nyaka urit sabato maga kendo uluor kama ler mara e ruoth nyasaye kik udhi ir jonyakalondo kata kuom ajuoke moko nikech kutimo kamano udoko mogak e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nyaka uchung ni ngama duong wiye oti lwar kumiye duong kendo uluor ruoth nyasaye nyasachu e ruoth nyasaye ka japiny moro odak kuomu kik uthage nyaka urite mana kaka wuodu kendo uhere mana kaka uheroru uwegi nikech un bende ne un jodak e piny misri e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kik uketh chik kuom gimoro mipimo borne kata mipimo pekne kata mana mipimo ngeny mare nyaka ubed gi rapim makare mipimogo gik moko e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mane ogolou e piny misri nyaka urit chikena kendo uluwgi e ruoth nyasaye tim jolawi kum miyudo kuom ketho chik ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa ni mondo onyis joisrael niya ka jaisrael moro amora kata japiny moro modak kuomgi ochiwo nyathine moro ni nyasaye moro manono miluongo ni molek nyaka neg ngatno joisrael duto nogoye gi kite nyaka otho kendo awuon nabed jasike mi nangad kare oko kuom ogandagi nikech osechiwo nyathine ni molek kodwanyogo kama ler mara kendo kochayo nyinga maler ka ji otemo fwayo wach ngat mochiwo nyathine ni molek mi ok ginege awuon nabed jasik ngatno kaachiel gi dhoodgi duto anangad kargi oko kuom ogandagi kaachiel gi jogo duto maluwe kendo madwanyore ka lamo molek ka ngato oweya modwanyore gi jonyakalondo kod ajuoke moko kaka dhako weyo chwore kendo dwanyore gi chwo mamoko nabed jasik ngatno kendo nangad kare oko kuom ogandagi kuom mano puodhreuru ubed maler nikech ruoth nyasaye nyasachu aler nyaka urit chikena kendo uluwgi nimar e ruoth nyasaye mapwodhou ka ngato oyanyo wuon mare kata min mare nyaka nege rembe nodong e wiye nikech oseyanyo wuon gi min ka ngat oterore gi chi wadgi ngatno kaachiel gi dhakono nyaka negi ngat moterore gi chi wuon oelo dug wuon mare giduto ji ariyogo nyaka neggi kendo rembgi nodong e wigi ka ngato oterore gi chi wuode nyaka neggi giduto ji ariyogo nikech gisetimo gima mono rembgi nodong e wigi ka ngato onindo gi dichwo wadgi ka ngama terore gi dhako giduto gitimo gima kuero nyaka neggi kendo rembgi nodong e wigi ka ngato okendo nyako moro kaachiel gi min nyakono mano richo maduong nyaka wanggi gi mach giduto mondo richo maduong makamano kik bed kuomu ngat moterore gi chiayo moro amora nyaka negi chiayono bende nyaka negi ka dhako moro odhi ir chiayo moro mondo oterre kode nyaka neg dhakono kaachiel gi chiayono noneggi duto kendo rembgi nodong e wigi ka ngato okawo nyamin mare nyar wuon kata nyar min mi giterore mano en wichkuot marach nyaka neggi ka ji duto neno ngatno oseterore gi nyamin omiyo nyaka kume ka ngato oriwore gi dhako ka nie due okuodo wi dhakono nikech oseelo kama rembe wuokie dhako bende oseelo kama rembe wuokie giduto nyaka ngad kargi oko kuom ogandagi kik iterri gi nyamin meru kata gi wayu nikech mano en ketho wat joma timo kamano nyaka yud kum ngat moterore gi chi owadgi wuon mare okuodo wi wuon mareno omiyo giniyud kum noneggi kendo nyinggi nolal nono kuom ogandagi ka ngato oterore gi chi owadgi otimo gima ogak kendo okuodo wi owadgi nyinggi nolal nono kuom ogandagi nyaka urit chikena gi buchena duto kendo uluwgi mi piny akelou mondo udagie kik ngogu oko kik uluw timbe ogendini ariembonu mondo owenu thuolo ne gitimo gik marichogo duto mi asin kodgi omiyo nawachonu ni abiro miyou pinygi maber kendo momewno mondo ukaw e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mosepogou gi ogendini mamoko omiyo un bende nyaka upog le mi chamo gi le makuero kod winy michamo gi winy makuero kik udok mogak nikech le kata winy kata gimoro amora mamol nimar aseketo pogruok e kindu kodgi ka ahulonu ni gin gik makuero unubed jogo maler nikech ruoth nyasaye aler asepogou gi ogendini mamoko mondo ubed joga ngato angata kuomu dichwo kata dhako janyakalondo kata ajuoga moro amora nyaka go gi kite mi otho kendo rembe nodong e wiye owuon tim jolawi chike moket ni jodolo ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa ni mondo onyis jodolo joka harun ni kik jadolo moro amora tim gimoro ni ringre jadhoodgi moro motho dimi obed mogak mak mana ka ngatno watne hie kaka min kata wuon kata wuode kata nyare kata owadgi kata nyamin mare hie nyako ngili pok okendi ka nyamin mareno osekendi kik otimne gimoro dimi obed mogak jodolo kik liel yie wigi atuota ka ginyisogo ni giywak kata kik gitit yie tikgi kata kik gisar dendgi nyaka gibed joma owal ni nyasachgi kendo kik gicha nying nyasachgi nikech gin ema gitimo misengni miwango ni ruoth nyasaye misengnigo gin chiemb nyasachgi emomiyo nyaka gibed maler jadolo kik kend ohodho kata nyaka maonge gi ringre kata dhako chwore oriembo nimar en ngat maler mowal ni nyasache unuwale ni ruoth nyasaye nikech en e jachiw chiemo ni nyasachu nyaka ukwane ka ngama ler nikech ruoth nyasaye apuodho jodolo aler ka nyar jadolo odwanyore modoko ohodho omiyo wuon mare bedo mogak nyaka wang nyakono gi mach mi tho jadolo maduong e kind owetene en jadolo moseol mo e wiye mi owal mondo orwak lep dolo kik wiye koyuothore kata kik yiech lawe konyisogo gi iye owang ok nodonj kama ngat motho nitie dimi obed mogak bed ni en wuon kata min kik owuog oa kama ler nikech dipo ka omiyo kama ler mar nyasache obedo mogak nimar osewale gi mor wir mar nyasache e ruoth nyasaye jadolo maduong nyaka kend nyako ngili ok nokend nyako chwore otho kata chwore oriembo kata onge gi ringre kata ohodho nyaka okend mana nyako ngili moa e dhoodgi mondo kik nyithinde bed mogak kuom kiko remb jo lawi kata remb jomoko nono nikech e ruoth nyasaye mapwodho jadolo maduong ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa ni mondo onyis harun niya kuom tiengeu duto onge ngat mongol nobi mondo ochiw chiemo ni nyasache ngato angata rangol kik sud machiegni bed ni en muofu kata en puth kata ka dende kamoro okethore kata ka gimoro otwi e dende kata ka tiende kata ka bade ongol kata ka thur wiye obiro kata ka orachiero kata ka wange dhuth kata ka en gi aput kata adhola machuer kata ka en buoch nyakwar harun moro amora rangol ok nosud machiegni mondo otim ni ruoth nyasaye misango miwango kaka orangol kamano kik osud machiegni mondo ochiw chiemo ni nyasache onyalo chamo chiemb nyasache bed ni ogol chiemo kuom gik maler kata kuom gik maler moloyo kik osud machiegni gi pasia kata gi kendomarmisango nikech dipo ka omiyo kuondena maler obedo mogak ni mar orangol e ruoth nyasaye mapwodhogi kamano e kaka musa nowuoyo gi harun kaachioel gi yawuote kod joisrael duto tim jolawi chike mag misengni ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya nyis harun gi yawuote ni nyaka giritre ahinya ka gitiyo gi mich maler joisrael chiwona nono gichayo nyinga maler e ruoth nyasaye wachnigi ni ka ngato moro mogak osudo machiegni gi chiwo maler joisrael walo ni ruoth nyasaye nangad kare oko e nyima mano en chik momakou nyaka chieng e ruoth nyasaye nyakwar harun moro amora man gi tuo mar dhoho kata man gi nyach machuer kik cham chiwo maler ka pok opwodhe koro magi e joma obedo mogak ngat momulo gimoro mosegere kuom gima otho kata ngat nyote owuok kata ngat momulo gimoro mamol kata ngat momulo ngat mogak ngato angata momulo achiel kuom gik makamago nobed mogak nyaka chieng podhi kendo ok nocham chiwo malergo ka pok olwokore ka chieng osepodho nobed maler eka bang mano onyalo chamo chiwo malergo nikech gin chiembe kik ocham gima otho athoya kende kata chiayo ondiek onego nikech kotimo kamano obedo mogak e ruoth nyasaye jodolo nyaka rit chikna nono gidoko joketho mi githo kuom chayo nyinga e ruoth nyasaye mapwodhogi ngato angata ok jadolo kik cham chiwo maler kata en wendo molimo jadolo kata en mana jatichne mondiki misumba jadolo ongiewo nyalo chamo chiwogo kendo wasumbni monywol e dalane nyalo chamo chiemben ka ngat ok jadolo okendo nyar jadolo nyakono ok nocham mich moyiedhi mogol kuom chiwo maler ka chwore otho kata ka chwore oriembe kendo oonge gi nyathi mi oduogo dak e dalagi onyalo chamo chiemb wuon mare ngama ok jadolo kik cham chiemono ka ngato ochamo gimoro maler mochiw ni ruoth nyasaye kokia enochul jadolo gino komedoe achiel kuom abich jadolo kik keth chiwo maler joisrael walo ni ruoth nyasaye ka giyie ni joma ok jodolo chamogi dimi jogo bed joketho kendo yud kum nikech e ruoth nyasaye mapwodho gigo ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa ni mondo onyis harun kod yawuote kaachiel gi joisrael duto niya ka jaisrael moro amora kata japiny moro modak kuomu okelo chiwo mondo ochopgo kuongruok kata kaka chiwo mokelo kuom herone owuon mi ochiwe ni ruoth nyasaye ka misango miwango pep mondo ruoth nyasaye oyie kode nyaka ochiw chiayo maonge songa bed ni en rwath kata rombo kata diel kik uchiw chiayo man gi songa nimar ruoth nyasaye ok nyal yie kode ka ngato otimo misango mar chiwo gi dhiang kata gi rombo mondo ochopgo kuongruok kata kaka chiwo okelo kuom herone owuon nyaka obed chiayo malongo maonge songa eka ruoth nyasaye noyie kode kik uchiw ni ruoth nyasaye chiayo moro muofu kata rangol kata man gi songa kata kalanga kata man gi aluny kata bur kik uket chiayo kamano e kendomarmisango mondo obed misango miwango ni ruoth nyasaye rwath kata rombo magana unyalo timogo misango ngato chiwo ok noyie kode kuom timo misango michopogo kuongruok chiayo mendene otore kata ogol kata opuodi kik chiw ni ruoth nyasaye tim kamano okwer e pinyu bende kik uyie kawo chiayo makamano kuom japiny moro mondo ochiw ni nyasachu ka chiembe ka gingol kamano gin gi songa mosiko omiyo ok digimi ruoth nyasaye yie kodu ruoth nyasaye owacho ni musa niya ka onywol nyaroya kata nyarombo kata nyadiel ok onego poge gi min nyaka ndalo abiriyo rum kochiwe ni ruoth nyasaye ka misango miwango chakre chieng mar aboro ka dhi nyime noyie kode kik uneg dhiang gi nyathine kata rombo gi nyathine odiechieng achiel ka uchiwo ni ruoth nyasaye misango mar erokamano chiweuru kaka chik dwaro mondo ruoth nyasaye oyie kodu nyaka chame duto chiengno kendo gimoro kik dong nyaka chop okinyi e ruoth nyasaye nyaka urit chikena kendo uluwgi e ruoth nyasaye kik ucha nyinga maler joisrael nyaka mi nyinga maler duong e ruoth nyasaye mapwodhou kendo mane ogolou e piny misri mondo obed nyasachu e ruoth nyasaye tim jolawi sewni moketi kwan ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa mondo onyis joisrael niya sewni ruoth nyasaye oketo e magi gin chokruok maler nyaka ogonigi milome nikech gin sewni maga aseketo unuti tijeu kuom ndalo auchiel chieng mar abiriyo en chieng yueyo moyiedhi en odiechieng chokruok maler kik utimie tich moro amora nikech en sabato mar ruoth nyasaye kuonde duto mudakie sewni ruoth nyasaye oketo e magi gin chokruok maler ka kindegi ochopo nyaka ugo milome maggi due apar gangwen due mokwongo chakre odhiambo en chieng pasaka mar ruoth nyasaye sap makati ok ketie thowi mar ruoth nyasaye chakore tarik apar gabich mar dueno unucham makati ok ketie thowi kuom ndalo abiriyo chieng mokwongo mar jumano unubed gi chokruok maler kendo ok unuti tijeu pile unuchiw ni ruoth nyasaye misengni miwango kuom ndalo abiriyo chieng mar abiriyo bende nobedie chokruok maler kendo ok unuti tijeu mapile ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa mondo onyis joisrael niya ka uchopo e piny abiro miyou mi ukayoe cham nyaka ukel ni jadolo cham mukwongo kayo higa ka higa jadolo nochiwgi e nyim ruoth nyasaye ka mich moyiedhi chieng moluwo sabato mondo ruoth nyasaye oyie kodu chieng onogo muchiwoe michno nyaka uchiw ni ruoth nyasaye nyaim hike achiel maonge songa mondo otimgo misango miwango pep misango mar cham michiwo gi imno nobed mogo mayom moromo kiliko abiriyo moruw gi mo misango nyaka wang mondo odum tik mamit ni ruoth nyasaye misango miolo piny nobed divai moromo lita achiel kik ucham makati kata cham molodi kata manumu ka pok ochopo chieng michiwoe ni nyasachu michne chakre chieng maluwo sabato mukeloe cham mar mich moyiedhi nyaka ukwan jumbe abiriyo chieng maluwo sabato mar abiriyo nobed chieng mar piero abich chiengno unutim misango mar cham gi cham mar higa manyien nyaka ukel makati ariyo mugolo e miechu kaka mich moyiedhi nyaka losgi gi mogo mayom moromo kilo abiriyo moketie thowi kendo nyaka chiwgi ni ruoth nyasaye ka chamb agwela bende nyaka uchiw makati gi nyirombe abiriyo maonge songa kendo hikgi achiel achiel gi nyarwath achiel kod imbe ariyo ginibed misango miwango pep mitimo ni ruoth nyasaye unuchiwgi kaachiel gi misango mar cham kod misango miolo piny mondo obed misango miwango madum tik mamit ni ruoth nyasaye bende nyaka uchiw nyuok achiel mitimogo misango mar golo richo kod nyiimbe ariyo hikgi achiel achiel mitimogo misengni mag sawo jadolo nyaka chiwgi e nyim ruoth nyasaye ka mich moyiedhi kaachiel gi makati mag chamb gwel ginibed mich moyiedhi michiwo e nyim ruoth nyasaye kendo ginidong ni jadolo unugo milome mar chokruok maler chieng onogo kendo ok unuti tijeu mapile mano en chik momakou gi nyikwau nyaka chieng kamoro amora mudakie ka ukayo cham e puotheu kik uke nyaka giko puotheu kata kik uhul abang tiang nyaka uwegi ni joma odhier kod jodak e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa mondo onyis joisrael niya due achiel mar due mar abiriyo nobednu chieng yueyo unugoe milome gi tung mondo obed chokruok maler kik utim tijeu mapile chiwuru ni ruoth nyasaye misango miwango ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa mondo onyis joisarel niya due apar due mar abiriyono nobednu chieng migolonue richo enobed chokruok maler nyaka uriye kech kendo uchiwie ni ruoth nyasaye misango miwango chieng onogo kik uti tich moro amora nikech en chieng pwodhruok migolonue richo e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachu emomiyo ngato ka ngato ok oriyo kech chiengno nyaka ngad kare oko kuom ogandagi anatiek ngat motiyo tich moro amora chiengno kangade oko kuom ogandagi kik uti tich moro mano en chik momakou gi nyikwau nyaka chieng kamoro amora mudakie chiengono nobednu sabato mar yueyo maber omiyo nyaka uri kech chakre odhiambo mar due ochiko nyaka odhiambo mar due apar kik uti ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa mondo onyis joisrael bende ni chakre due apar gabich mar due abiriyono sap kiche mar ruoth nyasaye nobedie kuom ndalo abiriyo chieng mokwongo nobedie chokruok maler kik utiye tijeu mapile kuom ndalo abiriyogo nyaka uchiw ni ruoth nyasaye misengni miwango chieng mar aboro chokruok maler nobedie chiengno bende unuchiw ni ruoth nyasaye misango miwango en chokruok mitiekogo nyasi omiyo kik uti tijeu mapile mago e sewni ruoth nyasaye oketo nyaka ogoe milome ni gin e chokruok maler michiwoe ni ruoth nyasaye misengni miwango kod misengni miwango pep kod misengni mag cham gi misengni mag sawo gi misengni miolo piny moro ka moro gi chienge ewi mago nitie sabato mag ruoth nyasaye kod chiwou moko duto gi mich muchopogo kuongruok mau kod mago muchiwo ni ruoth nyasaye kuom herou chakre due apar gabich nogo due mar abiriyo bang keyo nyaka utim sap ruoth nyasaye kuom ndalo abiriyo chieng mokwongo nobed chieng yueyo mowal chieng mar aboro bende kamano chieng mokwongono unukaw olembe mag yien mabeyo gi bede othidhe kod bede yien motimo otie kaachiel gi bede yien matwi e tiend aore mi unubed mamor e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kuom ndalo abiriyo nyaka utim sawoni ni ruoth nyasaye kuom ndalo abiriyo higa ka higa en chik momakou gi nyikwau nyaka chieng e due mar abiriyo nyaka utimie sawoni uduto un joisrael nyaka ubed e kiche kuom ndalo abiriyo mondo omi nyikwau opar kaka namiyo joisrael odak e kiche ka ne agologi e piny misri e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mano e kaka musa nonyiso joisrael sewni ruoth nyasaye oketo tim jolawi tich rito taya wuok ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya chik joisrael mondo okelni mor zeituni maler mondo ool e taya mondo taya oliel pile oko mar pasia magengo sandug rapar e hemb romo harun nyaka rit taya mondo osik ka liel pile e nyim ruoth nyasaye chakre odhiambo nyaka okinyi mano en chik momakou gi nyikwau nyaka chieng pile harun nyaka rit teyni man kuom rachung taya maler mar dhahabu mochung e nyim ruoth nyasaye makati miketo e nyim nyasaye pile nyaka ukaw mogo mi utedgo makati apar gariyo moro ka moro oted gi mogo moromo kilo abiriyo nyaka uchangi e laini ariyo e mesa maler mochung e nyim ruothh nyasaye auchiel e laini ka laini unuket ubani maler e laini ka laini mondo obed rapar mar makati michiwo ni ruoth nyasaye ka misango miwango chieng sabato ka chieng sabato harun nochan makatigo e nyim ruoth nyasaye gin mich joisrael osingore ni nochiw nyaka chieng makatigo nodong ni harun gi nyikwaye kendo ginichamgi kamoro moyang ni ruoth nyasaye nikech en mich maler moloyo en pok migolone nyaka chieng kuom misengni miwango ni ruoth nyasaye buch yanyo nyasaye ne nitie ngat moro e kambi joisrael min mare ne nyar israel wuon mare ne jamisri nying min mare ne shelomith nyar dibri jadan jalo nodhi modhaw gi jaisrael moro nokwonge koyanyo nying maler mar ruoth nyasaye omiyo ne gikele ir musa ne gikete e od tuech ka girito gima ruoth nyasaye biro nyisogi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya gol ngat moseyanyono oa e kambi mondo ji duto mane owinje koyenyo oket lwetgi e wiye bange joisrael duto ogoye gi kite nyaka otho nyaka iwach ni joisrael ni ngato angata moyanyo nyasache noyud kum kuom kethone ngat moyanyo nying ruoth nyasaye nyaka negi oganda joisrael nyaka goye gi kite motho bed ni en jadak kata jaisrael ema ohulo nying malerno nyaka nege chike mag chulo kuor ka ngato ogoyo wadgi monego en bende nyaka nege ka ngato ogoyo chiayo motho nyaka ochul chiayo kar chiayono ka ngato ohinyo wadgi momiyo songa notimne mana kaka osetimono lero kar lero wang kar wang kendo lak kar lak nyaka hiny ngatno mana kaka osehinyo wadgi ngat mogoyo chiayo monego nyaka chul chiayo ngat mogoyo wadgi monego en bende nonege nyaka kum jadak mana kaka ikumo jaisrael nimar e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ka ne musa osewacho ni joisrael kamano ne gigolo ngat ne oyenyono oa e kambi mi gigoye gi kite nyaka otho ne gitimo mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa tim jolawi higa mar sabato gi higa mar mor ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa e got sinai mondo onyis joisrael niya ka usechopo e piny abiro miyou pinyno nyaka rit sabato kimiyogo ruoth nyasaye duong kuom mano higni auchiel unyalo chuoyo puotheu kendo loso yiendu mag mzabibu kendo kayo chambu gi pono olembeu higa mar abiriyo en sabato maler mimiyogo ruoth nyasaye duong piny nyaka yueye e higano kik uchwo puotheu kata kik ulos yiendu mag mzabibu kik uka orowe kendo kik upon mzabibu manyak kendgi e yien mane ok ulosogo nikech en higa maler piny yueyoe kata kamano gik piny ochiego e hik sabato nobed chiembu kendo chiemb wasumbu machwo gi mamon gi mar jotichu kod wendu kendo mar jambu gi le mae pinyu gik moko duto piny ochiego nobed chiembu nyaka ukwann sabato abiriyo mag higni en higni abiriyo nyadibiriyo tiende ni higni piero angwen gochiko due apar due mar abiriyo e higano en chieng pwodhruok unugo tung e pinyu duto kamano unuwal higa mar piero abich kugoyo milome mondo obed higa miweyoe jopinyu duto thuolo higano nobed higa mar mor ngato ka ngato nodogie pinygi ir joodgi higa mar piero abichno nobednu higa mar mor kik uchuoye kata kik ukae orowe kendo kik uponie mzabibu monyak anyaka e yien mane ok uloso ni mar en higa mar mor nyaka uwal maler ni ruoth nyasaye unucham gik monyak e lowo e higa mar mor nogono ngato ka ngato kuomu nodog thurgi ka ngato ngiewo lop wadgi kik ngato wuond wadgi nyaka kwan higni chakre higa mar mor mokadho kendo nengo noket maromre gi higni pod ibiro keyoe ka hignigo ngeny nochul nengo mamalo ka ginok nochul nengo mapiny nikech cham mibiro kayoe ema ongiewo kik ngato kuomu wuond wadgi mondo uluor nyasachu nikech e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu rituru chikena kendo uluwgi eka unudag e pinyno gi kue lowo nochieg cham mi unuchiem muyieng kendo unudag gi kue kapo ni upenjo gima ubiro chamo e higa mar abiriyo ka ok uchuoyo kata ka ok ukeyo nadwoku kama abiro guedhou e higa mar auchiel mi piny nochieg cham moromou chamo kuom higni adek kuchuoyo e higa mar aboro noyud ka pod uchamo cham machon unubed kuchamo cham machon nyaka chop uka cham manyien mar higa mar ochiko ka ngato ongiewo lowo kuom wadgi lowono ok nobed mare nyaka chieng nikech e wuon lowo un un mana jodakna e pinyu duto unuyie mondo puodho nosengiew owar ka wadu moro odoko modhier mi ongiewo lope moro watne machiegni nyaka war lowono ka ngatno onge gi watne manyalo waro lowono en owuon onyalo ware koyudo pesa enokwan higni chakre higa nongiewe mi nochul ngat nongieweno pesa moromo higni modong nyaka higa mar mor chopi eka nokaw lope odok mare kendo ka ok onyal ware lowono nodog e lwet ngat ne ongiewe cha nyaka chop higa mar mor e higa mar mor lowono nowe odog ni wuon mi wuongo nokawe ka ngato oyie mi wadgi ongiewo ode mar dak manie dala mochiel gi ohinga onyalo ware mana ka higa achiel pok orumo nyaka ne ngiewe higano duto enobed gi thuolo mar ware ka ok oware ka higa pok orumo odno nosik kobedo mar ngat mane ongiewe kaachiel gi nyikwaye nyaka chieng ok noweye odog ni wuon e higa mar mor udi manie mier ok ochiel gi ohinga nokwan mana kaka ikwano lowo gin gik inyalo waro kendo e higa mar mor ginidog ni wegi jolawi nobed gi thuolo mochwere mar waro udi manie miechgi ka jalawi moro ok yowaro ode manie dalagi odno nyaka dogne e higa mar mor nimar udi manie miech jolawi e mwandugi e piny israel puothe molworo miechgi ok nyal ngiew nikech gin mwandugi nyaka chieng ka jaisrael wadu odoko modhier ok onyal konyore nyaka okonye mana kaka unyalo konyo japiny moro kata wendo kendo nodag kodu kuhole gimoro kik ukaw kuome ohala luoruru nyasachu kendo uyie owadu odag kodu kik uhole pesa mondo uyudie ohala kata kik ukaw ohala kuom chiemo muhole e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mane ogolou e piny misri mondo omiu piny kanaan kendo mondo obed nyasachu ka wadu odoko modhier kendo obiro iri mi ingiewe kik ikete mondo otini ka misumba mondo obedi kaka jatich michulo kendo kaka wendo modak kodi enotini nyaka chop higa mar mor eka nowe tiyoni mi nodog gi nyithinde kuom joodgi kendo e lop kwerene joisrael gin wasumbni maga mane agolo e piny misri emomiyo ok onego ngiewgi kaka ingiewo wasumbni kik isand jaisrael waduno nyaka iluor nyasachu kudwaro wasumbni machwo kata mamon unyalo ngiewogi kuom ogendini mokiewo kodu bende unyalo ngiewo nyithind jodak man kuomu kod joodgi monywol e piny mi ginibed mwandu kendo unyalo weyogi ni yawuotu kusetho unyalo loko jogo wasumbu nyaka chieng joisrael weteu kik usand ka ja piny moro modak kuomu odoko jamoko wadu moro odoko modhier mi odhi ir ngatno kata ir jaodgi moro mi ongiewe thuolo nitie mar ware owadgi moro nyalo ware kata owadgi wuon mare kata wuod wuon kata watne moro amora bende onyalo warore owuon koyudo pesa enogo nengo gi jal mane ongieweno ka gikwano higni chakre higa mane ongiewe nyaka chop higa mar mor pesa monego dwok ni ngat nongieweno nyaka bed maromre gi misara dine ngatno ondikogo jatich kuom higni ngatno osetiyonego enoware gi pesa maromre gi higni modong chop higa mar mor ka hignigo ngeny enochul pesa mangeny ka ginok nochul pesa matin nyaka rit ngatno machal gi jatich mondiki bende kik uyie mondo ngat mane ongieweno osande ka ngatno ok owar e kinde modong ka pok higa mar mor ochopo nyaka weye odhi kaachiel gi nyithinde e higa mar mor nikech joisrael gin wasumbini maga gin maga nagolo e piny misri e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu tim jolawi gueth miyudo kuom winjo chik rapar mar chik kik ulos kido mar nyasaye nono kendo kik uchung kido mopa kata siro milamo kidi moro amora mopa kik bed e pinyu mukulorune kulamo nikech e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nyaka urit sabatona kendo uluor kama ler mara e ruoth nyasaye ka uwuotho e yorena mi urito chikena kendo uluwogi anakelnu koth e kinde mowinjore mi pinyu nochieg cham kendo yiendu nonyag olembe unudin cham nyaka e kinde miponoe mzabibu kendo unupon mzabibu nyaka kinde michwoyoe unuyud chiemo moromou kendo unudag e pinyu gi kue anakel kue e pinyu mi ununind maonge luoro anatiek ondiegi e pinyu kendo lweny ok nomi pinyu kethre unuriemb wasiku kendo ununeggi jou abich nobed gi teko mar riembo ji mia achiel kendo jou mia achiel nobed gi teko mar riembo ji gana apar mi unutiek wasiku anabed ka aguedhou mi anami unyuol kendo unya mathoth kendo anachop singruok duto natimo kodu chambu machon nie dereu noromu chamo nyaka chop kinde uwitogie mondo uyud kama ukanoe cham manyien analos kar dakna kuomu kendo ok najuangu anawuoth e dieru koni gi koni mi nabed nyasachu kendo unubed joga e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nogolou e piny misri mondo uwe bedo wasumb jomisri aseturo lodi ne otuenu mi omiyo koro uwuotho tir kum miyudo kuom tamruok winjo chik rapar mar chik ka utamoru winja kendo ok urito chikenago duto mi udagi buchena kendo ok uluwo yorena mi uketho singruok ne atimo kodu ngeuru malongo ni anatimnu kama anapou gi masira kendo gi tho marach kod tuo mayuyo wang kendo miyo del dhi chambu muchwoyo ok nokonyu nimar wasiku ema nochamgi anabed mosin kodu mi wasiku nonegu unubed e bwo loch joma mon kodu kendo unubwogru gi ngwech kata ka onge joma lawou ka pod utamoru winja bang gigo duto anamed kumou nyadibiriyo kuom richou anaketh sunga mar wich teko un go anami polo malo rieny ka chuma kendo piny mwalo dok matek ka mula unuketh tekreu nono kuchwoyo nimar chambu ok nochiegi kata mana yiendu bende ok nonyag olembe ka pod upiem koda mutamoru winja nakelnu masiche nyadibiriyo marom gi richou anaor ondiegi mondo omak nyithindu mi ginineg jambu kendo ginimi udong manok bende wangyore duto muluwo notho ka gigo duto ok omiyo uduogo ira usiko ka upiem koda bende napiem kodu kendo namiu kum nyadibiriyo nikech richou anakel lweny kuomu mondo achulgo kuor kuom ketho singruok ne atimo kodu kendo kata kuchokoru e miechu anagou gi tuoche kendo wasiku nomaku anami chiembu doko manok mi agulu achiel norom mon apar tedoe ginipimnu chiemo mana e rapim kendo kata kuchiemo ok unuyieng ngang ka bang mago duto pod udagi winja kendo usiko kupiem koda bende nasik kapiem kodu gi mirimba mager mi nakumu nyadibiriyo nikech richou kar chamo ringo unucham mana yawuotu gi nyiu anaketh kuonde hembko mau kendo anamuk kendeu mag ubani anadhur ringreu motop mag nyisecheu manono kendo najwangu analok miechu gundni mi anaketh kuondeu mag lemo kendo ok anayie ngweyo tik misengni mau madum mamit anaketh pinyu mi wasiku mobiro dakie nohum nono anakeu e kind ogendini kendo nakel lweny kuomu mi pinyu nodong gunda kendo miechu nokethre chuth e kinde duto pinyu odong gunda kendo udak e piny wasiku pinyu nonind mak opur mondo ochul sabato ne ok urito ka pinyu odong gunda kamano enonind mak opure korito sabato ne ok oyueyoe kudak kuno jou modong ka ngima e piny wasikgi anago gi kihondko mi kata mana ka giwinjo ka yamo kwadho oboke giniringi ka joma wasigu lawo kendo kata obedo ni onge ngama lawogi ginipodh piny kendo ginituomre kendgi giwegi mana ka joma ichadho gi ligangla unubed maonge gi teko mar siro wasiku karu nolal nono e kind ogendini kendo piny wasiku nonangu jou modong ka ngima e pinje mag wasiku nobed ka dendgi dhi adhiya nikech richogi kendo nikech richo mag kweregi mana kaka notimore ni kweregi bange ginihul richogi gi richo kweregi ne omiyo giweya kaachiel gi richo mane omiyo gidoko wasika nabed mamon kodgi kendo natergi e piny wasikgi bange chunygi ok oyie timo kaka adwaro nobolre kendo giniyud kum kuom richogi eka anapar singruok ne atimo gi jakobo kendo gi isaka kod ibrahim kendo napar pinyu piny nodong gunda ka joma odakie oseaye kendo nonind ok opure mondo ochul sabato duto ne ok oyueyoe giniyud kum kuom richogi nimar ne gichayo chikena kendo gidagi luwogi kata kamano ka gin e piny wasikgi ok nawitgi kendo ok najwanggi kata tiekogi chuth mi aketh singruok mane atimo kodgi nimar e ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi aherogi omiyo anapar singruok mane atimo gi kweregi ne agolo e piny misri ka ogendini neno mondo ruoth nyasaye abed nyasachgi mago e chike gi buche ne ruoth nyasaye omiyo musa e got sinai mondo joisrael oluw tim jolawi chike mag walo gik moko ni ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa ni mondo onyis joisrael niya ka ngato okuongore ni obiro chiwo ngato ni ruoth nyasaye eka bange oyudo ni ok onyal chopo kuongruokno nengo monego owargo ngatno e ngama dichwo hike ni e kind piero ariyo gi piero auchiel nowar gi shekel piero abich mag fedha gin shekel mitiyogo e tich nyasaye ngama dhako hike rom kamano nowar gi shekel piero adek ka hik ngatno ni e kind higni abich gi higni piero ariyo noware gi shekel piero ariyo ka en ngama dichwo shekel apar ka en dhako ka hike pok ochopo abich osekadho due achiel noware gi shekel abich ka en nyathi mawuowi nyako shekel adek ka ngatno hike piero auchiel kata mokadho kanyo kendo en ngama diichwo noware gi shekel apar gabich ka en dhako shekel apar ka ngat mokuongoreno odhier ahinya ok nyal chulo nengo moketne noter ngat nokuongore ni ochiwono e nyim jadolo mi jadolo nogo nengone maromre gi pesa ngat mokuongfore nyalo chulo ka ngato okuongore ni obiro chiwo ni ruoth nyasaye chiayo minyalo timogo misango gima ochiwono doko mowal ni ruoth nyasaye ngatno ok nyal wile mondo oket moro kare bed ni orach kata ober bende ok onyal wile gi gimoro nono kapo ni olok chiayo moro kar manochiw chiayo mokwongo kaachiel gi mowilego nodok mowal ni ruoth nyasaye ka chiayo ngatno okuongore ni obiro chiwo ogak ok nyal timgo misango ni ruoth nyasaye chiayono nyaka kel e nyim jadolo mi jadolo nogo nengo moromo kode nengo jadolo oketo ema oromo ka ngatno dwaro waro chiayono nyaka omedie achiel kuom abich mar nengone ka ngato ochiwo ode mondo obed moyang ni ruoth nyasaye jadolo nyaka go nengo moromo kode kendo nengo jadolo ogoyono ema oromo ka ngato mane ochiwo ode dwaro waro odeno nyaka omed achiel kuom abich mar nengone eka ot nodongne ka ngato ochiwo ni ruoth nyasaye lope moro nyaka go nengone maromre gi kodhi michwoyego nengo lowo minyalo chwoyo gi kodhi moromo kilo abiriyo nobed shekel piero abich ka ochiwo lopeno e higa mar mor nengone nosiki mana kamano ka ochiwe ka higa mar mor oserumo jadolo nokwan higni modong nyaka higa mar mor chak chop mi nogo nengo maromre gi higni modonggo ka ngat mane ochiwo puothe dwaro waro puotheno nyaka ochul nengo mogoneno komedoe achiel kuom abich eka puodhono nodongne ka ok odwar waro puodhono kata ka oseuse ni ngat machielo ok nyal ware ka higa mar mor ochopo mi owe puodhono nobed gima ler ka puodho moyang ni ruoth nyasaye chuth nodong ni jadolo ka mwandune ka ngato ochiwo ni ruoth nyasaye puodho moro mosengiewo chutho puodhono ok mare owuon jadolo nogo nengo maromre gi higni modong nyaka higa mar mor chopi mi ngatno nochiw pesago mana odiechiengno en pesa mowal ni ruoth nyasaye ka higa mar mor osechopo puodhono nodog ni ngat mane ongiewe kuome en wuon lowo hie nengo ka nengo nopim gi shekel mitiyogo e tich nyasaye shekel achiel romre gi gera piero ariyo chiayo mokwong nywolo kik ngato chiw ni ruoth nyasaye nikech gik moko duto mokwong nywolo gin mag ruoth nyasaye bed ni gin dhok kata rombe gin mag ruoth nyasaye ka en chiayo mogak ok nyal timgo misango ni ruoth nyasaye enoware e nengo migoyone komedoe achiel kuom abich mar nengone kata ka ok oware nyaka ngiewe e nengo miketo kata kamano gima ngato oweyo ni ruoth nyasaye chuth kuom gik moko en go bed ni en dhano kata chiayo kata lowo ok onyal waro kata ngiewo nikech gima owe ni ruoth nyasaye chuth en gima ler moloyo ngato angata mowe ni ruoth nyasaye chuth ok nowar nyaka nege anega achiel kuom apar mag gik moko duto piny onyago bed ni gin cham kata olembe gin mag ruoth nyasaye kendo gin gik maler mowalne ka ngato dwaro waro gimoro kuom achiel kuom apar mag gige nyaka omedie achiel kuom abich mag gigo bende chiayo mar apar ka chiayo mar apar mokalo e bwo ludh jakwath kokwanogi nobed mowal ni ruoth nyasaye bed ni gin dhok kata rombe kik ngato non ni gibeyo kata giricho bende ok nolokgi gi moko kapo ni owilo chiayo moro gi machielo chiayo mar aparno kaachiel gi mowilegono nobed gik maler chuth kendo ok nowargi mago e chike mane ruoth nyasaye omiyo musa e got sinai mondo musa omi joisrael kwan joisrael okwan e thim sinai chieng mokwongo mar due mar ariyo e higa mar ariyo kane joisrael osewuok e piny misri ruoth nyasaye nowuoyo gi musa e hemb romo e thim sinai kowachone niya dhiyo ikwan oganda joisrael duto e dhoutgi kaluwore gi kweregi kendo indik nying ngato ka ngato dichwo hike oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo moromo dhi e lweny un gi harun nyaka undik nyinggi malongo kuchanogi e ogendini mag lweny nyaka okaw ngato achiel jatelo e dhoot ka dhoot mondoo okonyu e tijno magi e nying jogo ogogo e dhood reuben en elizur wuod shedeur e dhood simeon en shelumiel wuod zurishadai e dhood juda en nashon wuod aminadab e dhood isakar en nathaneel wuod zuar e dhood zebulun en eliab wuod helon kuom joka josef en elishama wuod amihud e dhood efaraim kod gamaliel wuod pedazur e dhood manase e dhood benjamin en abidan wuod gideoni e dhood dan en ahiezer wuod amishadai e dhood asher en pagiel wuod okran e gad en eliasaf wuod reuel dhood naftali en ahira wuod enan mago ne jotelo mochung ni oganda duto e dhoutgi kendo ne gin jodongo mag dhout israel musa gi harun nokawo joma osehul nyinggigo kendo ne gichoko oganda joisrael chieng mokwongo mar due mar ariyo ne gichano anywolagi e dhoutgi kaluwore gi kweregi ka kindiko nying ngato ka ngato dichwo hike oseromoo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo kaka ruoth nyasaye nosechiko musa kamano e kaka musa nokwano joisrael e thim sinai ne ochan joreuben wuod israel maduong e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi kindiko nying ngato ka ngato dichwo hike oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo moromo dhi e lweny kar rombgi ne alufu piero angwen gauchiel gi mia abich josimeon e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi kindiko nying ngato ka ngato dichwo hike oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo moromo dhi e lweny ne alufu piero abich gochiko gi mia adek jogad e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi kindiko nying joma chwo duto hikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo oromo dhi e lweny ne alufu piero angwen gabich gi mia auchiel kod piero abich jojuda e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi kindiko nying joma chwo duto hikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo oromo dhi e lweny ne alufu piero abiriyo gangwen gi mia auchiel joisakar e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi kindiko nying joma chwo duto hikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo oromo dhi e lweny ne alufu piero abich gangwen gi mia angwen jozebulun e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi kindiko nying joma chwo duto hikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo oromo dhi e lweny ne alufu piero abich gabiriyo gi mia angwen joka josef jo dhood efraim e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi kindiko nying joma chwo duto hikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo oromo dhi e lweny ne alufu piero angwen gi mia abich joka josef jo dhood manase e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi kindiko nying joma chwo duto hikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo oromo dhi e lweny ne alufu piero adek gariyo gi mia ariyo jobenjamin e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi kindiko nying joma chwo duto hikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo oromo dhi e lweny ne alufu piero adek gabich gi mia angwen jodan e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi kindiko nying joma chwo duto hikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo oromo dhi e lweny ne alufu piero auchiel gariyo gi mia abiriyo joashur e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi kindiko nying joma chwo duto hikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo oromo dhi e lweny ne alufu piero angwen gachiel gi mia abich jonaftali e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi kindiko nying joma chwo duto hikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo oromo dhi e lweny ne alufu piero abich gadek gi mia abich mago e kwan joisrael mane musa gi harun kod jodong dhout israel apar gariyogo ochano ka jaduong ka jaduong ochung gi dhoot ka dhoot joisrael hikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo oromo dhi e lweny ne ondik nyinggi e dhout kweregi kar rombgi ne alufu mia auchiel gadek gi mia abich gi piero abich okel jolawi e tich mar rito hema maler nying jolawi kaluwore gi kweregi ne ok ondiki nikech ruoth nyasaye nosewacho ni musa niya kik ikwan jolawi kaka ikwano joisrael mamoko kendo kik indik nyinggi kodgi iketgi e tich rito hema maler gi gige duto gin kende ema ginibed jorit hema maler kendo ginigur hembegi molwore koni gi koni ka hema maler dhi kamoro jolawi ema nopudhe kendo kochopo kama gidhiye gin ema onego gigure ka ngato angata ok owal ni tijno osudo hema maler nyaka nege joisrael mamoko duto nyaka gur hembegi dhoot ka dhoot e kambine kendo e bwo bandeche jolawi nogur hembegi e alwora mar hema maler mar rapar mondo mirimba kik bi kuom oganda duto mag israel kamano jolawi ema nobed karito hema maler mar rapar joisrael notimo mana kaka ne ruoth nyasaye ochiko musa kwan cheno mar dhout joisrael e kambegi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa gi harun kama joisrael nyaka buor ka ngato ka ngato ni e bwo bandech jatendgi kendo e bwo bandech dhoodgi ginigur hembegi molworo hemb romo kendo momanyore kode koro magi e dhoudi manogur hembegi yo wuok chieng e nyim hemb romo jojuda nobed e bwo bandech kambigi kochan e ogendgi mag lweny jatendgi en nashon wuod aminadab ogandane mar lweny romo ji alufu piero abiriyo gangwen gi mia auchiel joisakar ema nogur hembegi machiegni gi jojuda jatendgi en nethaneel wuod zuar ogandane romo ji alufu piero abich gangwen gi mia angwen butgi jozebulun ema nobedie jatendgi en eliab wuod helon ogandane mar lweny romo ji alufu piero abich gabiriyo gi mia angwen kamano ji duto manie kambi mar jojuda kochan e ogendgi romo alufu mia achiel gii piero aboro gauchiel gi mia angwen ka oganda joisrael duto chako wuoth gin ema gikwongo magi e dhoudi nobed yo milambo joreuben nobed e bwo bandech kambigi kochan e ogendgi mag lweny jatendgi en elizur wuod shedeur ogandane mar lweny romo ji alufu puero angwen gauchiel gi mia abich josimeon ema nobed butgi jatend josimeon gogo nobed shelumiel wuod zurishadai ogandane mar lweny romo ji alufu piero abichh gochiko gi mia adek bange jogad ema nobedie jatendgi en eliasaf wuod reuel ogandane mar lweny romo ji alufu piero angwen gabich gi mia auchiel gi piero abich kamano ji duto manie oganda joreuben kochan e ogendgi mag lweny romo alufu mia achiel gi piero abich gachiel kod mia angwen gi piero abich gin ema giniwuog mar ariyo banggi hemb romo ema nowuogi ka kambi jolawi osiko kargi e dier kambe mamoko ka giwuotho ginichanre mana kaka kambegi ochanore ka ngato ka ngato ni e bwo bandeche dhoudi nobed yo podho chieng e magi joefraim nobed e bwo bandechgi kochan e ogendgi mag lweny jatendgi en elshama wuod amihud ogandane mar lweny romo ji alufu piero angwen gi mia abich jomanase ema nobed butgi jatend jomanase en gamaliel wuod pedazur ogandane mar lweny romo ji alufu piero adek gariyo gi mia ariyo bang jogo jobenjamin ema nobedie jatendgi en abidan wuod gideoni ogandane mar lweny romo ji alufu piero adek gabich gi mia angwen kamano ji duto manie kambi joefraim kochan e ogendgi mag lweny romo ji alufu mia achiel gaboro gi mia achiel gin ema giniwuog mar adek dhoudi nobed yo nyandwat e magi jodan nobed e bwo bandech kambigi kochan e ogendgi mag lweny jatendgi en ahiezel wuod amishadai ogandagi romo ji alufu piero auchiel gariyo gi mia abiriyo joashur ema nobed butgi jatendgi en pagiel wuod okram ogandane mar lweny romo ji alufu piero angwen gachiel gi mia abich jonaftali ema nobed dhoodno jatendgi en ahira wuod enan ogandane romo ji alufu piero abich gadek gi mia angwen kamano ji duto manie kambi jodan romo alufu mia achiel gi piero abich gariyo gi mia auchiel gin ema giniwuog achien e bwo bandechegi kochangi e ogendgi mag lweny mago e joisrael mane okwan kaluwore gi dhoutgi kar romb ji duto e kambi kochan e ogendgi mag lweny romo ji alufu mia auchiel gi adek gi mia abich gi piero abich kane ikwano joisarel jolawi ne ok kwan nikech kamano e kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa joisrael notimo mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa ne gibworo e bwo bandechegi kendo ne giwuotho e bwo bandechegigo ka ngato ka ngato nigi joodgi e dhoodgi mana kaka nonyisgi kwan kar romb jolawi gi tijegi magi ne e nyikwa harun gi musa e kinde mane ruoth nyasaye wuoyoe gi musa e got sinai yawuot harun ne nadab wuowi maduong gi abihu gi eleazer kod ithamar mago e nying yawuot harun mane obiro moketi e tij dolo nadab gi abihu notho e nyim ruoth nyasaye nikech ne giwango ubani ok ni kare e nyim ruoth nyasaye e thim sinai ne githo ka pok ginywolo nyithindo omiyo eleazer gi ithamar ne jokawo tij dolo ka wuon gi pod ngima ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya kel jolawi machiegni kendo iketgi giti ni harun nyaka gitine kendo giti ni oganda duto e nyim hemb romo ka gitiyo tich lemo e kama ler ginibed ka girito gik moko duto mitiyogo e hemb romo kendo giniti tich lemo e kama ler ni joisrael iniket jolawi e teko harun gi yawuote mondo gibed joma ochiwne kuom oganda joisrael harun gi yawuote ema inimi tich dolo ngat ok jadolo motiyo tich dolo nyaka negi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya aseyiero jolawi kuom joisrael kar nyithindo makayo duto mond israel onywolo kuom mano jolawi gin joga nimar nyithindo duto makayo gin maga chieng mane anego nyithindo duto makayo e piny misri ne awalo nyithind israel makayo duto obed maga bed ni gin mag dhano kata mag le gin maga e ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye ne ochako owacho ni musa e thim sinai niya ndik nying jolawi machwo duto chakre jadue achiel kadhi nyime kichanogi e dhoutgi kaluwore gi kweregi omiyo musa nondiko nyinggi kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike kendo nying yawuot lawi e magi gershon gi kohath kod merari joka gershon e dhoutgi gin libna gi shimei joka kohath e dhoutgi gin amram gi izhar gi hebron kod uziel joka merari e dhoutgi gin mali kod mushi mago e dhout lawi kaluwore gi kweregi e dhood gershon ne nitie joka libni kod joka shimei mago ne dhout gershon kendo kar romb jogi machwo mane okwan chakre jadue achiel kadhi nyime ne alufu abiriyo gi mia abich dhout gershon ne oket yo podho chieng e tok hema maler jatendgi ne eliasaf wuod lael kuom tich hemb romo joka gershon ne omi tich rito hema maler kaachiel gi gik miumego kod pasia mar dhood hemb romo gi pasia mag laru gi mag rangach midonjogo e laru mar e aluora mar hema maler gi aluora mar kendomarmisango kod gik moko duto mitiyogo kanyo e dhood kohath ne nitie joka amram gi joka izhar gi joka hebron kod joka uziel mago ne dhout kohath kendo kar romb jogi machwo nokwan chakre jadue achiel ka dhi nyime ne alufu aboro gi mia achiel gin ema ne gin jorit kama ler dhoutgi noket yo milambo e bath hema maler jatendgi ne en elizafan wuod uziel kendo ne omigi tich rito sandug muma gi mesa gi rachung taya gi kende mag misango gi gik moko duto mitiyogo e lemo kod pasia gi gige duto jaduong jotend jolawi duto ne eleazer wuod harun jadolo en ema nokete jatelo mar rito hema maler e dhood merari ne nitie joka mali gi joka mushi mago ne e dhout merari kendo kar romb jogi machwo mane okwan chakre jadue achiel kadhi nyime ne alufu auchiel gi mia ariyo jatendgi ne zuriel wuod abihail kendo noketgi yo nyandwat mar hema maler joka merari ne omi tich rito frembe gi rariw gi sirni gi rachungi mag hema maler kaachiel gi gige duto kod gik moko duto mitiyogo kanyono gi sirni molworo laro kod rachungigi gi loyegi kod tondegi mogik musa gi harun kod joka harun noket e nyim hema maler yo wuok chieng mar hemb romo gin ema ne omigi tich rito kama ler ni joisrael ngato angata ok jadolo mane nyalo sudo machiegni nyaka ne negi kar romb jolawi machwo mane musa ondiko nyinggi e dhoutgi kaka ne ruoth nyasaye ochiko ne alufu piero ariyo chakre jadue achiel kadhi nyime nyasaye okawo jolawi kar joisrael machwo makayo ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya ndik nying joisrael machwo makayo duto chakre jadue achiel kadhi nyime kendo ikwan kar rombgi e ruoth nyasaye unuwalna jolawi kar joisrael machwo makayo kamano bende unuwalna jamb jolawi kar jamni makayo mag joisrael musa nondiko nying joisarel machwo makayo duto chakre jadue achiel kadhi nyime kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike kar rombgi ne alufu piero ariyo gariyo gi mia ariyo gi piero abiriyo gadek ruoth nyasaye nochako owacho ni musa niya kaw jolawi kar joisrael machwo makayo duto kendo kaw jamb jolawi kar jambgi jolawi nyaka bed joga e ruoth nyasaye joisarel machwo makayo ngeny moloyo jolawi gi ji mia ariyo kod piero abiriyo gadek omiyo nyaka uwar joma odonggo gi shekel abich abich kipimo gi shekel mitiyogo e tich nyasaye shekel achiel romre gi gera piero ariyo pesa mowargigo unuchiw ni harun gi yawuote ka ne gisetieko waro joma kayo mane odong musa nokawo pesa mowargigo kar romb pesago ne shekel mag fedha alufu achiel gi mia adek kod piero achiel gabich kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich nyasaye nochiwo pesago ni harun gi yawuote kaka ne ruoth nyasaye owachone kamano notimo gima ne ruoth nyasaye ochike kwan tije momus jolawi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa gi harun niya kwanuru jolawi joka kohath e dhoutgi kaluwore gi kweregi kundiko nying joma hikgi nie kind piero adek gi piero abich monego ti tich lemo e hemb romo tich momus joka kohath e hemb romo en tich maler moloyo ema ka udaro kambiu harun gi yawuote nyaka bi mi lor pasia mogengo kama ler moloyo kendo giumgo sandug rapar eka giume gi piende monyong kendo giboye gi law mambulu bange girwakne ludhe mitingego ginipedh law mambulu e mesa miketoe makati e nyim nyasaye pile kendo giniketie tewni gi tegni gi kikombe kod agwetni mitiyogo kitimo misengni nilo piny makati michiwo pile bende nyaka bed ewi mesano bang mano nyaka gipedh law makwar ewi gigo kendo gichak giumgi duto gi piende monyong eka girwak ludhe mitingego ginikaw law mambulu giumgo rachung taya gi teyni mage gi rangisni gi rajow kod gik mitingogo mor taya ginibo rachung taya kod gige duto gi piende monyong kendo ginitinge koliero e luth ginipedh law mambulu e mesa mar dhahabu kendo giniume gi piende monyong bange ginirwakne ludhe mitingego ginikaw gik moko duto mitiyogo e kama ler mi giket e law mambulu kendo giumgi gi piende monyong eka ginitinggi ka giliero e luth ginijow buru e kendomarmisango mi gium kendono gi law maralik eka giniket kuome gik moko duto mitiyogo e tich dolo kaka tep mach gi rachwow gi rajow gi tewni kod gik moko duto mag kendo mar misango giniume gi piende monyong kendo ginirwakne ludhe mitingego pile ka kambi dar joka kohath nyaka bi mondo oting hema maler kod gige duto kik gibi ka pok harun gii yawuote otieko umogi bende kik gimul gimoro amora maler nono githo mago duto gin gik hemb romo joka kohath ema tingo eleazer wuod harun jadolo ema norit mor taya gi ubani mangue ngar gi mor wir kod misango mar cham michiwo pile hema maler gi gik moko duto manie iye tiende ni kama ler kod gige bende en ema noriti ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa gi harun niya kik uwe dhood joka kohath rum mi lal kuom jolawi wetegi nyisgiuru ni ka gisudo machiegni gi gik maler gima onego tim mondo kik githo ema harun gi yawuote ema nyaka donji mondo omi ngato ka ngato tije kod gima onego ngatno ting joka kohath kik donj nikech dipo ka gigoyo wanggi kuom gik maler mi githo ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya kwan joka gershon e dhoutgi kaluwore gi kweregi kindiko nying joma hikgi ni e kind piero adek kod piero abich monego ti e hemb romo tije momigi kod gik onego giti e magi giniting pasia mag kama ler kendo giniting hemb romo gi law miumego kaachiel gi piende monyong moluow kuome gi pasia mar dhood hemb romo gi ragengni mag laru gi mag pasia mar rangach midonjogo e laru mar aluora mar hema maler gi aluora mar kendomarmisango gi tondegi kod gik moko duto mitiyogo gin ema omigi tich rito gigo harun gi yawuote ema nochan tije duto mag joka gershon kod gik onego giting mano e tich momus joka gershon e hemb romo ithamar wuod harun jadolo ema nobed jatendgi nyaka ikwan joka merari e dhoutgi moluwore gi kweregi kindiko nying ji duto hikgi ni e kind piero adek gi piero abich monego ti e hemb romo gik onego giting kaka tichgi e hemb romo e magi frembe mag hema maler gi rariw mage gi sirni mage gi rachungi gi sirni mag laru molworo hema gi rachungine gi loyegi gi tondegi kod gik moko duto mitiyogo kanyo nyaka pog ni ngato ka ngato gik onego giting mago e tije momus joka merari e hemb romo ithamar wuod harun jadolo ema nobed jatendgi musa gi harun kod jodong oganda joisrael nokwano joka kohath e dhoutgi kaluwore gi kweregi ka gindiko nying ngato ka ngato hike ni e kind piero adek gi piero abich moromo tiyo e hemb romo kar rombgi kochan e dhoutgi ne alufu ariyo gi mia abiriyo gi piero abich mano ne e kar romb joka kohath mane tiyo e hemb romo musa gi harun nokwanogi mana kaka ne ruoth nyasaye omiyo musa onyisogi joka gershon hikgi ne ni e kind piero adek gi piero abich ne tiyo e hemb romoo nondik nyinggi kaluwore gi kweregi kar rombgi e dhoutgi kaluwore gi kweregi ne alufu ariyo gi mia auchiel gi piero adek mago e joka gershon mane tiyo e tich hemb romo kendo mane musa gi harun ondiko nyinggi kaka ruoth nyasaye nosechikogi joka merari hikgi ne ni e kind piero adek gi piero abich mane oromo tiyo e hemb romo ne ondik nyinggi e dhoutgi kaluwore ki kweregi kar rombgi e dhoutgi ne alufu adek gi mia ariyo musa gi harun nondiko nying joka merarigo ka gichanogi e dhoutgi kaka ruoth nyasaye nomiyo musa ochikogi mano e kaka musa gi harun kod jodong israel nondiko nying jolawi duto e dhoutgi kaluwore gi kweregi ne gin joma hikgi ni e kind piero adek gi piero abich mane tiyo tije mopogore opogore e hemb romo kendo mane tingoo gik hemb romo kar rombgi duto ne alufu aboro gi mia abich kod piero aboro musa nondiko nying ngato k ngato kuomgi kaka ne ruoth nyasaye ochike kaluwore gi tijegi kod gik mane onego giting mano e kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa mondo otim kwan ogol joma ogak e kambi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya chik joisrael ni joma nigi tuo dhoho kata man gi nyach machuer kata mogak nikech omulo gimoro motho mondo ogol e kambi nyaka uketgi gidag oko mar kambi bed ni gin chwo kata mon mondo kik gidwany kambeu kuonde adake kodu omiyo joisrael nogolo joma nigi tuoche kamago e kambi mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nonyiso musa chik mar chudo kuom ketho ruoth nyasaye nochako owacho ni musa mondo onyis joisarel kama ka ngato otimo marach ni wadgi mi oketho e nyim ruoth nyasaye bed ni en dichwo kata dhako mano omiyo obedo jaketho kendo en gi gowi nyaka ochul nyaka ohul ketho mosetimono kendo nyaka ochul ngat mokethoneno gima oromo gi kethono komedoe achiel kuom abich ka ngatno osetho oonge gi jaodgi mahie dichul kuom kethono chudono kaachiel gi im jadolo pwodhogo jakethono nobed mar ruoth nyasaye kendo nodong ni jadolo mich moyiedhi duto joisrael kelo nobed mag jadolo enokaw mich moyiedhi duto bende gimoro amora momiye nobed mare chik mar tieko chich ruoth nyasaye nochako owacho ni musa ni mondo onyis joisrael niya nyalo bet ni chi ngato oketho koterore gi ngato ka chwore kia kodwanyore kamano lingling onge janeno kata kaonge ngama ojuke bange gimoro otimore momiyo chwore ochich kode nyaka chwore tere ir jadolo bed ni dhakono osedwanyore adier kata chwore chich mana kode kayiem chwore nyaka kel mogo mayom moromo kilo abiriyo kaka chik dwaro kik oolie mo bende kik oketie ubani nimar en misango mar cham mitiekogo chich tiende ni misango mifwenyogo adiera jadolo nokel dhakono e nyim ruoth nyasaye eka notwom pi maler gi tawo kendo nojuk lop dier ot mar hema maler mi noruw gi pigno kosekelo dhakono e nyim ruoth nyasaye nogony yie wiye eka noket misango mar cham mifwenyogo adiera e lwete en misango mar cham mitiekogo chich jadolo noting pi mar muma mafwenyo adiera e lwete owuon bang mano nomi dhakono kuongre kowachone niya ka ngato ok oseterore kodi kendo ok iseketho kidwanyori chi chwori pi mar muma mafwenyo adierani kik hinyi ka en adier ni iseketho kidwanyori mi ngato oterore kodi chi chwori ruoth nyasaye mondo omi iyi okirre kata omi ibuog nyathi ka kindeni mar nywol pok ochopo kibedogo ranyisi ni jou kuom wach kuongruok pigni mondo odonj e iyi kendo omi iyi okirre kata omi ibuog nyathi ka kindeni mar nywol pok ochopo ka jadolo osemiyo dhakono okuongore kamano dhakono nodwok ni obed kamano eka jadolo nondik weche mag kuonggo e kalatas nolwokgi gi pi mar muma mafwenyo adiera bange nomi dhakono pigno omodhi mi donj e iye jadolo nokaw misango mar cham mitiekogo chich e lwet dhakono mi nochiwe e nyim ruoth nyasaye ka mich moyiedhi bang mano nokel mogono e kendo mar misango mi nojuk sanja kendoo nowang ka rapar e kendomarmisango eka nochak omi dhakono modh pigcha ka en adieri ni osedwanyore koterore en chi chwore ka jadolo osemiye pigno omodho iye nokirre kata nobuogi ka kindene mar nywol pok ochopo kendo nyinge nobed mokwong e nyim jogi ka dhakono ok osedwanyore kendo adier oler ok noyud hinyruok nonywol anywola maber mano e chik mar weche mag chich ka chi ngato oketho mi odwanyore kata ka chwore ochich achicha kode nyaka okele e nyim ruoth nyasaye mi jadolo timne kaka chikno dwaro dichwo nobed maonge ketho chiege nyaka yud kum kuom kethone kwan chik moket ni ngat mowal ni ruoth nyasaye ka janazir ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa ni mondo onyis joisrael niya ngato angata okuongore ni obiro bedo janazir tiende ni ngat mowal ni ruoth nyasaye ok nomadh kongo kata gimoro mamero ji bed ni en dichwo kata dhako ok nomadh gik kamago kata gimoro amora molos gi mzabibu bende ok nocham mzabibu manumu kata motuo e kinde duto okuongore ni obiro bedo janazirno ok nomul gimoro amora moa kuom yadh mzabibu kata matin e kindeno duto bende mirich ok noka wiye nowe yie wiye dongi kendo nokadgi akada nyaka ndalo mag kuongruok norum enoritre maler ni ruoth nyasaye ok nosud machiegni gi ngat motho dimi obed mogak bed ni en wuon kata min kata owadgi kata nyamin yie wiye maboyogo ema nyiso ni osewale ni ruoth nyasae enoritre maler ni ruoth nyasaye ndalo duto mag kuongruokne ka ngato otho bute apoya mogere kuome mi omiyo yie wiye ogak nyaka oliel wiye bang ndalo abiriyo chieng moket ni ipwodhee chieng mar aboro nyaka okel ni jadolo akuch odugla ariyo kata nyithi akuru ariyo e dho hema miromoe gi nyasaye jadolo nokaw akuru achiel mi notimgo misango mar golo richo machielo notimgo misango miwango pep mi nopwodh ngatno kuom gak mane oyudo kuom ngat motho eka janazir nochak opidh wiye chiengno kowalore manyien ni ruoth nyasaye kuom ndalo duto mane okuongoree kendo nokel nyaim hike achiel mondo otimgo misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi kinde mane oyudo osetieko e walruokneno ok nokwan nikech yie wiye mane nyiso ni owale ne odoko mogak chik momako janazir chieng kindene mar walruok orumo ema nyaka tere e dho hemb romo kendo nochiw ni ruoth nyasaye nyaim hike achiel maonge songa mondo otimgo misango miwango pep gi rombo swini maonge songa mondo otimgo misango mar sawo gi odheru motingo makati ok ketie thowi moted gi mo kod chapati bende ok ketie thowi mowir gi mo kaachiel gi misengni mag cham kod misengni miolo piny kaka chik dwaro jadolo nochiw gigo duto e nyim ruoth nyasaye eka notim ni ngatno misango mar golo richo kod misango miwango pep im cha notimgo ni ruoth nyasaye misango mar sawo kaachiel gi makati manie odheru bende nochiw misango mar cham gi misango miolo piny janazirno noliel wiye e dho hemb romo kendo nokaw yie wiye yande owalno mi owangie mach mitimogo misango mar sawo bang mano jadolo nokaw bad im kosetedi kaachiel gi makati ok ketie thowi mogol e odheru kod chapat achiel ok ketie thowi mi noketgi e lwet janazirno koselielo yie wiye mane owalego eka jadolo nochiwgi ni ruoth nyasaye ka mich moyiedhi lemogo kaachiel gi agoko kod em michiwo ni ruoth nyasaye ka mich moyiedhi gin gik maler omiyo gidong ni jadolo bang timo mago duto janazirno koro nobed gi thuolo mar madho divai mano e chik momako janazir osekwongore kendo mano e misango nyaka otim ni ruoth nyasaye kuom walruokne ka ok okwan gik mamoko onyalo chiwo nyaka ochop kuongruokne duto kaluwore gi chik mar walruokne weche mag gueth jadolo onego oguedhgo ji ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa ni mondo onyis harun niya ka iguedho joisrael magi e weche nyaka ikonyrigo ruoth nyasaye mondo oguedhu kendo oritu ruoth nyasaye mondo orienynu kendo ongwonnu ruoth nyasaye mondo orangu maber kendo okelnu kue kamano e kaka ginihul nyinga ni joisrael kendo naguedhgi kwan chiwo jotend israel owalogo kendomarmisango chieng mane musa otieko chungoe hema maler nowirogo gi mo mowale ni tich nyasaye kaachiel gi gige duto kod kendomarmisango gi gige duto jodong israel jotend dhoutgi mane okonyo musa e tich kwano joisrael nogolo chiwo chiwo mane gikelo e nyim ruoth nyasaye e magi geche auchiel moum wigi kaachiel gi rwedhi apar gariyo ruodhi ariyo ariyo nochiwo gari achiel achiel kendo ruoth ka ruoth nochiwo rwath achiel kane gikelo gigo e nyim hema maler ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya kaw gik gisechiwogo nikech ibiro tiyo kodgi e hema miromoe gi nyasaye migi jolawi kaka tich ngato ka ngato dwaro omiyo musa nokawo geche kod ruedhi momiyo jolawi nomiyo joka gershon geche ariyo gi ruedhi angwen moromo tichgi joka merari nomiyo geche angwen gi ruedhi aboro kaka tijgi dwaro ithamar wuod harun jadolo ema nobedo jatend jogo joka kohath ne ok omiyo gimoro nikech tich mane omigi ne mar tingo gik maler mane nyaka ting mana e gokgi kane owir kendomarmisango gi mo jodongo nokelo chiwogi e nyim kendono mondo owalego ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya jodongo ochiw michgo mar walo kendomarmisango ni tich nyasaye ka jaduong ka jaduong kelo michne chieng achiel achiel chieng mokwongo nashon wuod amonadab jajuda ema nokelo chiwo mare nochiwo nyalaro mar fedha pekne romo shekel mia achiel gi piero adek kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich nyasaye gi tawo mar fedha pekne shekel piero abiriyo giduto ne gitingo mogo moruw gi mo mitimogo misango mar cham bende nochiwo kikombe mar dhahabu pekne shekel apar ubani pongo gi nyarwath gi im gi nyaim hike achiel mitimogo misango miwanngo pep gi nywok mitimogo misango mar golo richo kod rwedhi ariyo gi imbe abich gi nywogi abich kod nyiimbe abich hikgi achiel achiel jamnigo duto ne ibiro timogo misango mar sawo mago e chiwo mane nashon wuod aminadab ogolo chieng mar ariyo nethaneel wuod zuar jatend joisakar nokelo chiwo mare nochiwo nyalaro mar fedha pekne romo shekel mia achiel gi piero adek kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich nyasaye gi tawo mar fedha pekne shekel piero abiriyo giduto ne gitingo mogo moruw gi mo mitimogo misango mar cham bende nochiwo kikombe mar dhahabu pekne shekel apar ubani opongo gi nyarwath gi im gi nyaim hike mar sawo mago e chiwo mane ahira wuod enan ogolo gik mane jodong israel ochiwo mondo owalgo kendo mar misango chieng mane iwire e magi nyilerni mag fedha apar gariyo gi tewni mag fedha apar gariyo kod kikombe mag dhahabu apar gariyo pek mar nyalaro ka nyalaro ne romo shekel mia achiel gi piero adek pek mar tawo ka tawo shekel piero abiriyo kamano pek mag gigo duto ne romo shekel alufu ariyo gi mia angwen kipimoo gi rapim mitiyogo e tich nyasaye kikombe apar gariyo ubani opongogo moro ka moro pekne ne romo shekel apar kipimo gi rapim mitiyogo e tich nyasaye kamano kar romb pek dhahabu mag kikombego ne romo shekel mia achiell gi piero ariyo kar romb jamni duto mitimogo misango miwango pep ne ruedhi apar gariyo gi imbe apar gariyo gi nyiimbe apar gariyo hikgi achiel achiel achiel kaachiel gi misengni mag cham michiwo kodgi kaka chik dwaro kod nywogi apar gariyo mitimogo misango mar golo richo kar romb jamni mitimogo misango mar sawo ne rwedhi piero ariyo gangwen gi imbe piero auchiel gi nywogi piero auchiel kod nyiimbe oiero auchiel hikgi achiel achiel mago e gik mane ochiw mondo owalgo kendo mar misango chieng mane iwire kane musa odonjo e hemb romo mondo owuo gi nyasaye nowinjo dwond nyasaye ka wuoyo kode ewi raum mar sandug rapar miluongo ni karngwono e kind kido ariyo machalo gi malaika miluongo ni kerubi kwan harun oketo teyni e rachungi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa mondo onyis harun niya ka iketo teyni abiriyo e rachungi changi mondo girieny ka gimenyo kanyim rachungi omiyo harun noketo teyni mondo orieny kamenyo kanyim rachungi mana kaka ne nyasaye ochiko musa kor rachungi kaachiel gi bedene kod thiepene ne othedhi gi dhahabu musa nolose mana machal gi kido mane ruoth nyasaye onyise walo jolawi ni ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye nochako owacho ni musa niya pog jolawi kuom dhout israel mamoko mondo ipwodhgi e kaka nipwodhgi kir kuomgi pi mapwodho richo nyaka giliel dendgi duto kendo gilwok dendgi mi gidok mopwodhore bang mano gikaw nyarwath mondo otimgo misango miwango pep nikaw nyarwath machielo mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo eka nikel jolawi e dho hemb romo michok oganda duto mar israel kanyakla ka isekelo jolawi e nyim ruoth nyasaye inimi joisrael ket lwetgi e wigi bang mano harun nochiw jolawi e nyim ruoth nyasaye ka mich moyiedhi moa kuom joisrael kendo nowalgi ni tich ruoth nyasaye jolawi noket lwetgi ewi ruedhi kande rwath achiel notimgo misango mar golo richo machielo notimgo ni ruoth nyasaye misango miwango pep mondo opwodhgo ni jolawi richogi bange iniket jolawi e nyim harun gi yawuote kichiwogi ni ruoth nyasaye ka mich moyiedhi kamano iniwal jolawi kuom dhout israel mamoko mi ginibed joga ka isepwodho jolawi kichiwogi ka mich moyiedhi kamano ginidonj e hemb romo mondo gitiye nimar osewalgi chuth kuom joisrael duto asetimogi joga ka akawogi kar nyithind israel duto makayo nikech nyathi moro amora dichwo mokwong nywol e israel en mara bed ni en nyathi dhano kata nyathi chiayo chieng mane anegoe nyithindo makayo e piny misri nawalo nyithindo makayo duto e piny israel mondo obed maga koro asekawo jolawi kargi aseketo jolawi e lwet harun gi yawuote ka joma owal kuom joisrael mondo oti tich lemo ni joisrael e hemb romo kendo opwodhnigi richogi mono kik joisrael tho ka sudo machiegni gi kama ler musa gi harun kaachiel gi joisarel duto nochopo chike duto mane nyasaye omiyo musa kuom tich walo jolawi jolawi e nyim harun gi yawuote kamano musa notimo ni jolawi mana kaka ruoth nyasaye noochike higni jalawi onego otieki e tich ruoth nyasaye nochako owacho ni musa niya chik moketi ni jolawi ka jalawi oseromo polo ochungie ne gichako wuoth mana ka ruoth nyasaye ochikogi kendo ne giguro hembegi mana ka ruoth nyasaye ochikogi mi gibed kanyo kuom kinde duto mane bor polo ni ewi hema maler kane bor polo obet aminga ewi hema maler joisrael nosiko ka lemo alema e nyim ruoth nyasaye kendo ne ok gidhi nyime gi wuoth kamano bende kane bor polo obet ewi hema maler mana kuom ndalo manok ne giguro hembegi kendo
