piero abiriyoka nodong chien e kambi kata obedo ni gin ne ok gidhi e hema kamano roho nobiro kuomgi mi gidhumore e kambi wuowi moro noringo odhi ir musa monyise ni eldad kod medad jodhumore e kambi eka joshua wuod nun mane oyudo osetiyo ni musa chakre tinne nowacho niya jaduong musa kwergi musa nodwoke niya iywaga ni gimaya duong koso mad joruoth nyasaye duto dok jonabi kendo ruoth nyasaye migi teko mar roho bang mano musa gi jodong israel nodok e kambi ruoth nyasaye okelo aluru ruoth nyasaye notugo yamo mokelo aluru koa yo podho chieng kendo alurugo ne huyo gi piny maromo mita achiel koa e joma jowuoro nikech kanyono ema ne giyikoe joma ne wuoch ringo omako miriam gi harun jokuodho musa joisrael noa kibrothhataava modhi hazeroth kendo kane gin kuno kwan miriam gi harun ne jochako kuodho musa nikech nyar kush mane okendo ne giwacho niya musa kende ema ruoth nyasaye osewuoyogo koso wan donge osewuoyo kodwa ka iwacho adier musa ne en ngat mamuol ahinya moloyo ji duto manie piny ruoth nyasaye nowinjo kaka jogo kuodhe mi nopoyo musa gi harun kod miriam gi wach niya wuoguru un ji adek udhi e hemb romo kamano ji adekgo nowuok modhi eka ruoth nyasaye nolor e siro mar bor polo nochung e dho hema mi oluongo harun gi miriam kendo ka ne gibiro e nyime nowachonigi niya winjuru wechena ka de ni musa en mana janabiu dafwenyorane kendo dawuoyo kode e lek jatichna musa ok en janabi kamano en kende e jaadiera kuom joga duto en awuoyo kode wang gi wang kende mana moyangore onge ngero enone kit ruoth nyasaye ere kaka uhedhoru kuodho jatichna musa mirima nomako ruoth nyasaye kodgi mi oa kendo kane bor polo oa e hema kamano dhoho nomako dend miriam molokore marachar ka pe kane harun olokore monene nokwayo musa niya jaduong lamnwa kik iwe wachul gop richo kata obedo ni wasetimo gima ofuwo kendo marach kamano kik iwe miriam chal gi nyathi monywol kosetho bath dende konchiel gimoro ochamo omiyo musa noywak niya ruoth nyasaye gima kama kik timre akwayi ni yie ichange ruoth nyasaye nodwok niya ka da bed ni wuon mare ema ongudho olawo e wange donge da obedo gi wichkuot kuom ndalo abiriyo kuom mano keteuru kar kende oko mar kambi kuom ndalo abiriyo eka mondo oduoge kamano noket miriam nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya joote mondo odhi ocheng piny kanaan abiro miyo joisrael jootego nyaka bed jotelo ngato ka ngato ochung ni dhoot ka dhoot omiyo musa noorogi kapod gin e thim paran mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike giduto ne gin jotend joisrael kendo magi e nyinggi e dhood joreuben ne en shamua wuod zakur e dhood josimeon ne en shafat wuod hori e dhood jojuda ne en kaleb wuod jefune e dhood joisakar ne en igal wuod josef e dhood joefraim ne en hoshea wuod nun e dhood jobenjamin ne en palti wuod rafu e dhood jozebulun ne en gadiel wuod sodi e dhood jojosef tiende ni dhood jomanase ne en gadi wuod susi e dhood jodan ne en amiel wuod gemali e dhood joasher ne en sethur wuod mikael e dhood jonaftali ne en nabi wuod vosfi e dhood jogad ne en geuel wuod maki mago e nying joma musa nooro mondo odhi ocheng piny kanaan hoshea wuod nun nochako ni joshua kane musa dwaro orogi mondo gidhi gicheng pinyno nowachonigi niya chikuru yo milambo mar pinyno bange uidh e piny gode chenguru kaka pinyno chalo kendo ka ji modak kuno rateke kata nyap bende kata ka ginok kata gingeny ranguru ane ka kit piny gidakieno ber kata rach kendo kata ka mier gidakie ochiel motegno kata mayomyom bende kata ka pinyno omew kata otwo kata ka yien nitie kata onge dhiuru gi chir kendo ukel olemb pinyno moko noyudo ka en ndalo mzabibu nyakie kamano ne gidhi mi gichengo pinyno chakre thim zin nyaka rehob man kama idonjogo hamath ne giidho ka gingado piny milambo mi gichopo hebron kuma ne ahiman gi sheshai kod talmai nyikwa anak odakie hebron noger higni abiriyo kapok oger zoan man e piny misri bange ne gichopo e holo mar eshkol tiende ni saga mar mzabibu mi gingado bad mzabibu monyago saga achiel kendo ji ariyo notinge koliero e luth bende ne gipono olemb komamanga kod ngowo ne ochak kanyo ni holo mar eshkol nikech kanyo ema joisrael nongadoe saga mar mzabibu bang ndalo piero angwen ne gidwogo kadesh e thim paran ka gia chengo pinyno mi gibiro ir musa gi harun kod oganda joisrael duto ne gipimonigi wach kendo ne ginyisogi olembe mag pinyno ne giwacho ni musa niya ne wadhi mwawuotho e piny mane iorowa mi wanwango ni en piny maber kendo momew kendo magi e olembe manyak kuno jopinyno rateke kendo miechgi ochiel motegno malich kendo ne waneno nyikwa anak kuno gi joamalek modak e piny milambo gi johiti gi jojebus kod joamor modak e piny gode kod jokanaan modak e dho nam kendo e bath aora jordan kaleb nokwayo ji e nyim musa mondo oling kowacho niya wadhiuru piyopiyo mondo wakaw pinyno nikech wan gi teko mwanyalo kawego joma noyudo osedhi kode kuno nowacho niya ooyo ok wanyal monjo jogo nikech gitek moloyowa kuom mano weche mane giwacho ni joisrael kuom piny mane gia chengono nonyoso chuny ji nikech ne giwacho niya piny nyocha wadhi chengono en piny manyalo mwonyo ngato angata modhi dakie bende ji duto waneno kuno gin joma rabede kane wagoyo wangwa kuom jonefili ne waneno ka wachalo mana dede bende mano e kaka ne wachalonigi joanak gin nyikwa nefili kwan joisrael oweyo ruoth nyasaye kane giwinjo weche jogo oganda joisarel duto noywak matek otienono duto ka chunygi lit giduto ne gingur ni musa gi harun ka giwacho niya mad ne watho e piny misri kata e thimni ere gima omiyo ruoth nyasaye okelowa e pinyni mondo watho e lweny kendo omak mondwa gi nyithindwa donge diber ka wadok misri eka ne gimedo wacho niya wayier ngato mondo odwokwa misri musa gi harun ne jopodho piny mana e nyim oganda joisrael joshua wuod nun kod kaleb wuod jefune mane gin ji ariyo kuom joma nochengo piny kanaan noyiecho lepgi mi owacho ni oganda duto niya piny mane wadonjoe kendo wachengono en piny maber sidang ka ruoth nyasaye mor kodwa obiro terowa e piny maber kendo momewno mi omiwago kik uwe ruoth nyasaye bende kik uluor jopinyno nimar wabiro mwonyogi amwonya tipo nyocha ogengogi osea wan ruoth nyasaye ni kodwa omiyo kik uluorgi kar dwokogi oganda joisrael nobwogogi mana ni goyogi mana gi kite sano duong mar ruoth nyasaye nothinyorenigi duto e hemb romo ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya jogi biro chaya kamano nyaka karango pod gibiro tamore gena marom nadi eka asetomonigi ranyisi mangeny abiro goyogi gi tuo bende ok abi kwanogi ka joga gi nyikwayi natimu oganda maduong kendo mangeny moloyogi musa nodwoko ruoth nyasaye niya ruoth nyasaye jomisri ongeyo ni ema nigolo joisrael kuomgi gi tekoni iwuon kendo gibiro nyiso jokanaan kamano gin bende koro gisewinjo ni idak e dier jogi kendo ni gineni wang gi wang gingeyo bende ni bor polo mari ochung ewi joisrael ka itelonigi e siro mar bor polo godiechieng gotieno itelonigi e siro mar mach kuom mano ka inego jogi duto rat ogendini mosewinjo humbi biro wacho niya ruoth nyasaye osetieko jogi e thim nikech kelogi e piny mane osingorenigi otame omiyo e sa monego inyisie tekoni machal gi weche mane iwacho niya ruoth nyasaye ok kech piyo kendo onyiso herane mosiko koweyo ni ji kethogi gi richogi kata kamano ok okwan jaketho ka ngama ler okumo nyithindo nyaka tieng mar adek kod mar angwen nikech richo kweregi omiyo kaka ngwononi thoth ni jogi richogi mana kaka isetimo chakre misri nyaka koroni nyasaye okumo joisrael rapar mar chik ruoth nyasaye nodwoko musa niya koro asewuoyonigi kaka ikwaya kaka antie kendo kaka duongna nopong piny duto akuongora ni onge kata mana ngat achiel kuom joma oseneno duongna kod honni mane atimo e piny misri kendo e thim none piny mane asingora ni nami kweregi gisetema kendo gisetamore winja nyadipar omiyo onge kata ngat achiel kuom joma nochayago none pinyno jatichna kaleb ema osebedo gi chuny maber nimar oseluwa gi chunye duto kuom mano abiro kele e piny mane osedhiye mi nyikwaye nokaw en piny pap joamalek kod jokanaan odakie kuom mano kiny nyaka uwichru mi udogi e thim kuluwo yo ochomo nam makwar ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa gi harun niya asewinjo ka joisarel ngurna anyalo ngwono ni oganda marachni nyaka karango wachnigi ni awacho kakuongora ni kaka antie abiro chopo mana weche asewinjo kuwacho ngato ka ngato nyinge nondiki e kweno cha chakre jahigni piero ariyo kadhi nyime chokene biro dong e thimni nikech usengurna onge ngato kuomu nodonj e piny mane akuongora katingo bada ni nobed maru mak mana kaleb wuod jefune gi joshua wuod nun nyikwau mane uwacho ni nobed joma omak e lweny ema abiro kelo e piny usedagino mi ginidagie maber un uduto chokeu nodong e thim nyithindu biro digni e thim kuom higni piero angwen nyaka ngatu mogik tho kuno ka gichulogo richo mane utimo kuom weya ne ubet ka urango pinyno kuom ndalo piero angwen omiyo unuchul richou kuom higni piero angwen ka higa achiel ikwano kar ndalo achiel mi ununge kaka ajok kodu ruoth nyasaye asewuoyo kendo abiro timo ni oganda marach moseriworeni gima asewachono gibiro rumo mana e thimni adier ka ema gibiro thoe jombetre apar maricho otho joma musa nooro mondo ocheng piny kendo mane oduogo mi omiyo oganda duto ochako ngurne tho nonego e nyim ruoth nyasaye nikech ne gikelo wach marach joshua wuod nun gi kaleb wuod jefune kende ema nokwo kuom joma nodhi chengo pinyno joisrael olo horma rapar mar chik kane musa onyiso joisrael gima ruoth nyasaye owacho ne gimuoch gi ywak kinyne ne giwuok kogwen mi gidhi ewi gode mag piny motingore ka giwacho niya wayie ni wasebedo joketho omiyo koro wan e yo wadhi kuma ruoth nyasaye owacho musa nodwokogi niya marango umedo ketho chik ruoth nyasaye tim makamano ok nyal kelo gima ber kik umed dhi nyime gi wuoth nimar ruoth nyasaye ok nobed kodu kendo wasiku biro loyou joamalek gi jokanaan nie nyimu kendo gibiro negou ruoth nyasaye ok nyal bedo kodu nikech useweyo luwe kata kamano pod ne gihedhore ahedha idho gode mag piny motingoreno sandug muma kata mana musa ne ok owuok kodgi e kambi jo amalek gi jokanaan nodak e godego nomwomore kuomgi moriembogi ka rodhogi nyaka horma kwan chike moketi mag misengni ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa mondo onyis joisrael niya ka usedonjo e piny abiro miyou mondo udagie unutim ni ruoth nyasaye misengni miwango ginyalo bedo misengni miwango pep kata misengni michopogo kuongruok kata ngato timo kuom herone kata mitimo e ndalo mag sewni moketi ka uwango ni ruoth nyasaye jambu ka misango dum tik mamit kamano ngat machiwo misangono nyaka chiw bende misango mar cham mar mogo moromo kilo adek moruw gi mo lita ariyo bende nyaka uchiw lita ariyo mar divai obed misango miolo piny kuom nyarombo ka nyarombo mutimogo misango miwango pep kata misango mar sawo ka chiayo mitimogo misangono en im mogo mitimogo misango mar cham nyaka bed kilo apar gangwen moruw gi mo moromo lita adek kendo divai mitimogo misango milo piny nyaka bed moromo lita adek kamano e kaka unutim ni ruoth nyasaye misango madum tik mamit ka nyarwath ema utimogo ni ruoth nyasaye misango miwango pep kata misango michopogo kuongruok kata misango mar sawo nyaka uchiw bende mogo moromo kilo apar moruw gi mo moromo lita angwen mondo otimgo misango mar cham kod divai moromo lita angwen mondo otimgo misango milo piny gigo duto nobed misango miwango mondo odum tik mamit ni ruoth nyasaye mano e gima nyaka utim ni rwath ka rwath kata ni im ka im kata ni nyarombo ka nyarombo kata bed ni utimo misengni gi jamni adi ciayo ka cjiayo nyaka timne kamano ngato ka ngato jaisrael nyaka rit chikego ka otimo misango miwango mondo odum tik mamit ni ruoth nyasaye ka japiny moro man kuomu kata modak kodu chuth otimo misango miwango mondo odum tik mamit ni ruoth nyasaye nyaka otim mana kaka utimo en mana chik achiel omakou kaachiel gi japiny moro modak kuomu kendo omako nyikwau nyaka chieng un gi jodak uchalru e nyim ruoth nyasaye chik achielno ema omakou machalre gi japiny moro modak kuomu ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa mondo onyis joisrael niya ka usedonjo e piny abiro teroue mi uchamo chiemb pinyno nyaka uchiw ni ruoth nyasaye mich moyiedhi ka utedo makati gi mok cham mukwongo kayo nyaka uket makati achiel tenge obed mich moyiedhi mana kaka uketo tenge cham mukwongo dino nyaka uchiw ni ruoth nyasaye mich moyiedhi mugolo kuom makati mukuongo tedo mano en chik momakou gi nyikwau nyaka chieng ka uketho ka ukia mi uweyo chik moro amora kuom chike mane ruoth nyasaye omiyo musa gin chike duto momakou gi nyikwau nyaka chieng kendo mane ruoth nyasaye omiyou gi lwet musa chakre chieng mokwongo e gima nyaka utim ka oganda duto ema oketho ka kia kamano nyaka gichiw nyarwath mondo gitimgo misango miwango pep mondo odum mamit ni ruoth nyasaye kaachiel gi misango mar cham kaachiel gi miolo piny mitimego kaka chik dwaro bende nyaka gichiw nywok mondo gitimgo misango mar golo richo eka jadolo nopwodh oganda duto mar israel mi nowenigi richogi nikech ne giketho mana ka gikia kendo gisetimo ni ruoth nyasaye misango miwango bende gisetimo misango mar golo richo e nyim ruoth nyasaye kuom ketho mane giketho ka gikia kuom mano oganda joisrael duto kaachiel gi jopinje mamoko modak kuomu nowenigi kethogi nimar oganda duto ema noketho ka ngat achiel kende ema oketho ka kia nyaka ochiw diel swini hike achiel mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo kendo jadolo nopwodh ni ngatno kethone e nyim ruoth nyasaye mi nowene en chik achiel kende momako ngat oketho ka ok ongeyo bed ni en japiny kata jadak ngato angata oketho goyiem oyanyo ruoth nyasaye bed ni en jaisrael kata japiny moro modak kuomu nyaka ngad kare oko kuom ogandagi nimar osechayo wach ruoth nyasaye kendo oseketho chikne ngat kamano nyaka ngad kare oko chuth kendo kethoneno nobed e wiye owuon oneg ngat oyud ka tiyo chieng sabato e kinde mane joisrael ni e thim ne oyud ngat moro ka modo yien chieng sabato joma ne ojuke komoto nokele e nyim musa gi harun kod oganda duto mar israel ne gikete e od tuech nikech ne ok gingeyo malongo gima onego timne eka ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya ngatno nyaka negi oganda duto nyaka goye gi kite oko mar kambi kuom mano ne gigole oko mi gigoye gi kite giduto nyaka otho mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa usi momin miketo e riak law ruoth nyasaye nochako owacho ni musa mondo onyis joisrael niya un kaachiel gi nnyikwau nyaka umin usi mondo uket e riak lepu achiel kuom usi momingo nyaka bed mambulu kamano e kinde duto unenoe usi mambuluno nupar chike duto mag ruoth nyasaye mo unumakgi kendo ok unuluw yore maricho wengeu gi chunyu nyalo teroue usi mominno nobed ranyisi maparonu chikena duto mondo uritgi kendo ubed joma ler mowal ni nyasachu e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mane ogolou e piny misri mondo obed nyasachu e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kwan korah gi dathan kod abiram jonganyo korah wuod izhar wuod kohath wuod lawi kod joreuben dathan gi abiram yawuot eliab kod wuod peleth ne jotamore bet e bwo musa kendo joisrael mia ariyo gi piero abich jotend oganda kendo joma ogen bende ne ni kodgi e wachno ne giriwore giduto ni musa gi harun mi giwachonigi niya marango uhedhoru moloyo ngato ka ngato kuom oganda joisrael owal ni ruoth nyasaye kendo ruoth nyasaye ni kodgi giduto ere gima omiyo ukaworu moloyo jo ruoth nyasaye duto kane musa owinjo kamano nopodho piny auma bange nowacho ni korah gi joge niya kiny gokinyi ruoth nyasaye nohul ngat ngate adier kod ngat mowalne kendo monego timne misengni ngat ruoth nyasaye oyiero ema notim misengni ni ruoth nyasaye korah gima nyaka utim kaachiel gi jogi duto e kiny ukaw tepe ubani uket mach e igi mi uolie ubani e nyim ruoth nyasaye ngat kiny ruoth nyasaye oyiero e ngat mowalne un ema uhedhoru moloyo un jolawi musa nochako owacho ni korah niya winjuru un jolawi donge en gima ber ka ruoth nyasaye osepogou kuom dhout israel mamoko kokelou bute mondo urit tije mag hema maler mar ruoth nyasaye kuchung e nyim oganda jo ruoth nyasaye kendo kutiyonigi osekelou machiegni kode un kaachiel gi jolawi weteu koro eka udwaro ni mondo ubed jodolo bende mano emomiyo kaachiel gi jogi duto useriworu ka ukwedo ruoth nyasaye uparo ni harun nigi teko manade omiyo onego uywagne kamano musa nooro wach mondo oluongne dathan gi abiram yawuot eliab ne gidwoko niya ok wabi iparo ni gol mane igolowago e piny maber kendo momew mondo watho e thim ka en gima tin koso pod idwaroe mana ni nyaka ibed jatendwa gima rach moloyo en ni ok isekelowa e piny maber kendo momew bende ok isemiyowa puothe cham gi mag mzabibu mondo obed mawa iparo ni inyalo wuondo ji machal kodwa kama ooyo ok wabi kane musa owinjo wechegigo mirima mager nomake mi owacho ni ruoth nyasaye niya kik idew ngur gingurgono pok amayogi kata mana kanyna achiel bende pok atimo marach ni ngato angata kuomgi musa nochako owacho ni korah niya kiny ibi e nyim ruoth nyasaye kaachiel gi jogi kod harun bende ngato ka ngato kuomu nyaka kaw tap mach kendo oketie ubani eka inikel jogi kaachiel gi tepegi mia ariyo gi piero abich e nyim ruoth nyasaye kendo un gi harun bende nyaka ukel tepeu kuom mano ngato ka ngato nokawo tape moketoe mach kendo oolo e ubani musa gi harun nodhi mochung e dho hemb romo korah bende nochoko joge duto mi gichung ka gimanyore gi ji ariyogo e dho hema bange duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye nothinyore ni oganda duto mar israel kendo ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa gi harun niya chunguru mabor gi ogandani mondo atiekgi dichiel ka diemo wang ne gipodho piny auma ka giwacho niya nyasaye nyasach ngima bende mirima nyalo maki gi oganda duto mana nikech richo mar ngato achiel ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya wach ni ji mondo osud gi chien oa hembe mag korah gi dothan kod abiram kamano musa nodhi ir dothan gi abiram kendo jodong israel noluwo bange eka nowacho ni oganda duto niya suduru mabor gi hembe mag ji marichogi kik umul girgi moro amora nono urumo nikech richogi kuom mano oganda duto noa kama ne korah gi dothan kod abiram nitie koro noyudo ka dothan gi abiram josewuok mochung e dho hembegi kaachiel gi mondgi gi nyithindgi kod jogi musa nowacho nigi niya ubiro ngeyo ni ruoth nyasaye ema noora mondo atim gigi duto ok ni aketora awuon ka jogi otho mana kaka ji duto tho kara ruoth nyasaye ok oseora ka ruoth nyasaye otimo hono mi bur obarore matut kendo piny ongamo dhoge momuonyogi kaachiel gi mwandugi duto mi gidhi e bur ka gingima eka ununge ni ne gichayo ruoth nyasaye kane dho musa pok olwar lowo mane jogo ochungie nobarore kongamo dhoge momwonyogi gi hembegi kod ji duto mane luwo korah kaachiel gi mwandugi duto ne gidhi e bur ka gingima mi lowo oumogi kod mwandugi duto kendo gidwono nono kuom oganda joisrael ne giywak mi joisrael duto mane ni machiegni kanyo oringo ka kok niya neyeuru kaka piny biro mwonyowa ruoth nyasaye nooro mach mowango ji mia ariyo gi piero abich mane oyudo wango ubani kande bange ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya nyis eleazer wuod harun jadolo mondo ogol tepe mag ubani e buch mach kendo opuk mach man e igi kuma bor nikech gin gik maler adier tewni mag joma timo richo mi oyudo kum mar tho ler nikech osechiwgi e nyim ruoth nyasaye omiyo nyaka uthedhgi mopamore mondo oumgo kendo mar misango ginibed rapar ni joisrael kamano eleazer jadolo nokawo tepe ubani mag mula ji mane mach owango ochiwo ne othedhgi rauom mar kendomarmisango mondo obed rapar ni joisrael ni ngato angata ok jadolo kendo ok jaka harun kik wang ubani ni ruoth nyasaye nono otho mana kaka korah kod joge mago duto notimore mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nomiyo musa ochiko eleazar kinyne oganda duto mar israel nongur ni musa gi harun ka giwachonigi gisemiyo jo ruoth nyasaye moko otho e sa mane gichokoree ka gingur ni musa gi harun ne giwichore ka gichiko hemb romo mi gineno ka bor polo oime kendo duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye nothinyore kanyo musa gi harun ne jobiro e nyim hema kendo ruoth nyasaye nowachonigi niya chunguru mabor gi jogi mondo atiekgi dichiel ka diemo wang ne gipodho piny auma eka musa nowacho ni harun niya kaw tapi mar ubani iketie mach moa e kendomarmisango kendo iolie ubani mi idhi kode piyopiyo ir oganda mondo ipwodhnigi richogi mirima mager mar ruoth nyasaye osechopo kendo tho osechako nego ji omiyo harun nokawo tape mar ubani kaka musa nochike mi noringo odhi ir oganda joisrael kendo noyudo ka tho osechako nego ji adier ne oketo ubani e tawo mi opwodho ni ji richogi kochung e kind joma osetho gi joma ngima mi tho norumo ji alufu apar gangwen gi mia aboro notho ka ok kwan joma ne otho nikech ketho mar korah kane tho oserumo harun nodok ir musa e dho hemb romo kwan ludh harun ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya nyis joisrael mondo jotend dhoot ka dhoot omiyi luth achiel achiel duto ludhe apar gariyo moro ka moro ondikie nying jatelo ka jatelo kuom ludh dhood lawi mondo indikie nying harun nimar luth ka luth nyaka bed mar jatelo ka jatelo eka iketgi duto e hema e nyim sandug rapar kama aromoe kodu kendo ngat ludhe oloth e ngat ayiero mano e kaka abiro tieko ngur joisrael ngurnigo kuom mano musa nowuoyo gi joisrael mi jatend dhoot ka dhoot nomiye luth duto ludhe apar gariyo koriwore gi mar harun musa noketogi e nyim ruoth nyasaye ei hemb rapar kinyne ka ne odonjo e hema noyudo ka ludh harun ludh dhood lawi ema oloth adier noloth mogolo ite kod thiepe kendo onyago olembe eka musa nogolo ludhego oko monyiso joisrael duto ne ginenogi gi wanggi kendo jatelo ka jatelo nokawo mare ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya dwok ludh harun e nyim sandug rapar obed ranyisi siemo joma wigi tek duto mondo owe ywakna chuth eka ok ginitho musa notimo mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike bange joisrael nowacho ni musa niya waserwenyo waduto warumo ngato angata kuomwa mosudo machiegni gi hema maler mar nyasaye biro tho wabiro tho waduto koso kwan pok jodolo gi jolawi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni harun niya gi yawuoti kaachiel gi jodhoodu duto ema unubed ka urito tich kama ler kendo gimoro amora marach motimore kuome nobed wachu gimoro amora motimore marach kuom tich dolo nobed wachni kaachiel gi yawuoti iniwe jodhoodu joka lawi bed kodu kendo konyu kutiyo gi yawuoti e nyim hemb rapar ginibed ka gikonyou mi gitiek tije duto mag hema kik gisud machiegni gi gik maler kata gi kendomarmisango nono githo kaachiel gi un bende ginibed kodu kendo ginikaw ting duto mag rito hema e yo moro amora onge ngat ok jadolo nosud machiegni kodu un uwegi unubed kutiyo tije mag kama ler kod tich dolo e kendomarmisango mondo mirima mager mar ruoth nyasaye kik bi kuom joisrael kendo awuon asepogo joweteu jolawi kuom dhout israel mamoko duto mondo achiwnugi ka joma owalna mondo orit hema gi yawuoti kende ema nyaka uti tichu mar dolo mitimo e kendomarmisango kendo mitimo e tok pasia tich dolono e tich amiyou ngato angata ok jadolo motiyo tich dolo nyaka negi ruoth nyasaye nochako owacho ni harun niya awuon aketo e lweti mich duto tiende ni chiwo maler duto joisrael okelo amiyigi ka pokni kaachiel gi nyikwayi kaluwore gi chik mochwere gima ogol kuom chiwo moro amora maler moloyo ok owang e kendomarmisango nobed mari gi nyikwayi bed ni en misango mar cham kata mar golo richo kata mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi mochiwna ka mich maler moloyo unuchame kaluwore gi chik mar chamo gik maler moloyo kendo ngato angata kuomu dichwo nyalo chame enobed gima ler gik joisrael chiwo ka mich moyiedhi bende nobed mau achiwonugi kaachiel gi yawuoti kod nyigi kaluwore gi chik mochwere ngato angata mae odi ok ogak nyalo chamogi amiyou mo maber gi divai manyien mabeyo duto gi cham mabeyo tiende ni cham agwela mochiw ni nyasaye olembe duto mokwong pon e pinyu mokel ni ruoth nyasaye nobed mau ngato angata mae odi ok ogak nyalo chamogi gimoro amora mochiw ni ruoth nyasaye chuth e israel nobed maru nyithindo makayo duto michiwo ni ruoth nyasaye nobed mau bed ni gin mag dhano kata mag le nyaka war nyitnindo duto makayo mag dhano kod mag le ok ler ka gisetieko due achiel nyaka wargi gi shekel abich abich mopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich nyasaye shekel achiel oromo gera piero ariyo kik wariw nyithindo makayo mag dhok kata mag rombe kata mag diek nimar gin jamni maler nyak ukir rembgi e kendomar misango kendo uwang bochegi kutimogo misango miwango mondo odum tik mamit ni ruoth nyasaye ringgi nodongnu mana kaka agoko gi em korachwich mag mich moyiedhi dongnu mich duto mag gik maler joisrael chiwo ni ruoth nyasaye amiyo gi yawuoti kod nyigi kaluwore gi chik mochwere mano en singruok mosiko ok kethre ruoth nyasaye otimo kodi kaachiel gi nyikwayi bende ruoth nyasaye nomedo wacho ni harun niya ok nibed gi lowo mopogni e piny joisrael ok ginipogni kata lithe matin nimar e mwanduni kendo e pokni jolawi amiyo achiel kuom apar mag gik moko duto obed pokgi kuom tich rito hemb romo joisrael ok nochak osud machiegni gi hema nono githo jolawi ema nobed ka tiyo tich hema kendo gimoro amora marach motimore kuome nobed wachgi mano e chik momakou gi nyikwau nyaka chieng ok giniyud lowo moro mopognigi kuom joisrael nimar amiyogi achiel kuom apar mag gik moko joisrael chiwo ni ruoth nyasaye mondo obed mwandugi mano emomiyo anyisogi ni ok giniyud lowo mopognigi kuom joisrael ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya nyis jolawi kama ka joisrael chiwonu achiel kuom apar mag mwandugi amiyou ka poku un bende nyaka uchiw ni ruoth nyasaye achiel kuom apar mag gigo chiwono nokwan mana ka cham mogol kar dino kata divai mogol kar bicho mano e kaka unugol ni ruoth nyasaye chiwo mogol kuom achiel kuom apar duto uyudo kuom joisrael chiwo mugolo ni ruoth nyasayeno nyaka umi harun jadolo kuom chiwo duto muyudo unugolie mich michiwo ni ruoth nyasaye nyaka uchiw mana mabeyo moloyoe kuomgi bende wach ni jolawi niya ka usegolo ni ruoth nyasaye mich mabeyo moloyo kuom poku modong nobednu ka cham mogol kar dino kata divai mogol kar bicho unyalo chamogi kamoro amora gi joodu en e pok muyudo kuom tiyo e hemb romo ka usegolo ni ruoth nyasaye gik mabeyoe moloyo kamano ok unubed joketho kuom wachno kendo ok nobed ni udwanyo gik maler joisrael ochiwo dimi utho kwan chike mag pwodho joma ogak ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa gi harun mondo onyis joisrael chik moseketno kowacho miya wachnigiuru ni mondo gikel ni musa dhiang malando ha maonge songa kendo pok otuene jok nyaka ichiwe ni eleazar jadolo mondo ogole oko yo wuokchieng mar kambi kendo onege kuno eleazar jadolo nogwel remo gi lith lwete kendo nokir nyadibiriyo kochomo yo ka nyim hemb romo nyaka wang dheno mana e wange koneno piene gi ringre gi rembe kod owuoche duto nyaka wang jadolo nokaw yiend sida gi owino kod usi makwar mi nobolgi e chuny mach dhiang wangie bange enolwok lepe kendo nolwokre gi pi eka onyalo donjo e kambi kata kamano pod nosik kogak nyaka chieng podhi ngat mowango dheno nolwok lepe kendo nolwokre en bende nosik kogak nyaka chieng podhi bang mano ngat ok ogak nojow buch dheno mi nodhi oole oko mar kambi kamoro maler nyaka kan buruno mondo oganda joisrael olosgo pi mar pwodhruk nikech dheno otimgo misango mar golo richo ngat mane ojowo buch dheno nyaka lwok lepe en bende nosik kogak nyaka chieng podhi chikni omako joisrael nyaka chieng kaachiel gi jopinje mamoko modak kuomgi ngat momulo ngat motho nobed mogak kuom ndalo abiriyo enopwodhre gi pi pwodhruok chieng mar adek gi chieng mar abiriyo nosik kogak ngato momulo ngat motho ok nopwodhre ochido hema maler mar ruoth nyasaye ngatno nongad kare oko kuom joisrael pi pwodhruok ne ok kir kuome omiyo osiko kogak ka ngato otho e hema chik moketi ema ngato angata modonjo e hemano kata ngato angata manie hemano nobed mogak kuom ndalo abiriyo kendo agulu manie hemano dhoge ni nono ok oum bende nobed mogak kata ka ngat man oko omulo ngat moneg e lweny kata ngat otho athoya kata omulo choke dhano kata mana liel obedo mogak kuom ndalo abiriyo kuom gak kamano ginikaw buch misango mar golo richo mi giruw gi pi aora manie agulu bange ngat ok ogak nokaw owino mi nolut e pigno eka nokir e hema kod e gik moko manie iye kaachiel gi ji duto tho ngatno oyudo kanyo ngat momulo choke dhano kata ngat monegi kata ngat motho athoya kata momulo liel bende nokir pigno kuome ngat ok ogak nyaka kir pigno kuom ngat mogak chieng mar adek gi chieng mar abiriyo mi chieng mar abiriyo nodok mopwodhore kuom gakne nolwok lepe kendo nolwokre eka nobed maler ka chieng opodho ka ngat ogak ok opwodhore nyaka ngad kare oko kuom ogandagi nimar dochid kama ler mar ruoth nyasaye pi pwodhruok ok okir kuome omiyo osiko kogak chikno omakou nyaka chieng ngat makiro pi pwodhruok nyaka lwok lepe kendo ngato angata momulo pigno nobed mogak nyaka chieng podhi gimoro amora ngat mogak omulo bedo mogak kata ngat momulo gino bende bedo mogak nyaka chieng podhi kwan pi owuok e lwanda wuok e due mokwongo oganda joisrael duto nochopo e thim zin kendo ne gibet kadesh kuom kinde mogwarore kanyo ema miriam nothoe moyikee pi ne onge ni joisrael kanyo omiyo ne gichako ngur ni musa gi harun ne gidhaw gi musa ka giwacho niya mad ne watho kaachiel gi jowetewa mane otho e nyim ruoth nyasaye ere gima omiyo isekelo oganda mar ruoth nyasaye e thimni mondo wathoe kaachiel gi jambwa ango momiyo nigolowa misri kikelowa kama rach kata cham kata ngowo kata mzabibu kata komamanga ok nyagie bende onge kata mana pi dwamodhi musa kod harun nodhi e hema miromoe gi nyasaye e nyim joisrael ne gipodho piny auma mi duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye nothinyore ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya kaw ludhi kendo gi harun owadu uchok joisrael kanyakla kendo chik lwanda mondo ogol pi ka ji duto neno kamano inigol pi e lwanda mondo oganda omodhi kaachiel gi jambgi musa nokawo ludhno e nyim ruoth nyasaye mowuokgo kaka ruoth nyasaye nosechike bange musa gi harun nochoko oganda kanyakla e nyim lwandano musa nowachonigi niya winjuru un joma tokgi tekgi uparo ni nyaka wagolnu pi e lwandani koso eka notingo bade mogoyo lwandano diriyo gi ludhe pi nobubni mangeny mi oganda nomodho kaachiel gi jambgi ruoth nyasaye nowachi ni musa gi harun niya ne ok ugena moromo nyiso joisrael ni ngama ler kuom mano ok unyal tero ogandani nyaka piny mane asingora ni namigi mago e sokni mag meriba kama ne joisrael odhawie gi ruoth nyasaye mi nonyisogi ni en ngama ler tiend meriba en dhaw joedom otamo joisrael kadho e pinygi kane joisrael ni kadesh musa nooro joote ir ruodh edom kowacho niya owadu israel owacho kama ingeyo malongo chandruok duto mwaseyudo kendo kaka kwerewa nodhi misri mi wasedak kuno kuom higni mangeny jomisri nothagowa malit mana kaka ne githago kwerewa kane waywak ni ruoth nyasaye mondo okonywa nowinjo ywakwa mooro malaika mogolowa misri omiyo koro wan kadesh dala en tong pinyi wakwayi ni yie wakadhi e pinyi ok wananyon puotheu mag cham kata mag mzabibu kendo ok wanamodh e sokniu wanaluw mana ndach ruoth kendo ok wanabar korachwich kata koracham nyaka wakadh pinyi joedom nodwoke niya ok unyal kadho e pinywa nono wamonjou joisrael nowacho niya donge wabiro mana luwo ndara kata ka wan gi jambwa wamodho piu wanachulu omiyo wewauru wangad angada joedom ne ok oyienigi mondo gikadhi kendo ne giwuok gi jolweny mathoth mondo girad kodgi kamano joedom notamo joisrael kadho e pinygi mi joisrael notando moluwo komachielo harun otho e got hor oganda joisrael nowuok kadesh modhi e got hor ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa gi harun e got hor man tong piny edom niya harun biro tho mi luw kwerene ok nodonji e piny nasingora ni nami joisrael nikech nudagi rito chikna kuom pi meriba kaw harun kod eleazar wuode mondo uidhgo got hor eka ilony lep harun mondo irwakni eleazar wuode harun notho mana kanyo koluwo kwerene musa notimo kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike mi ne giidho got hor ka oganda duto neno nolonyo lep harun morwako ni eleazar wuod harun harun notho ewi got kanyo bange musa gi eleazar nolor piny oa e got kane oganda joisrael oneno ni harun osetho ne giywage kuom ndalo piero adek kwan jokanaan omonjo joisrael kane jakanaan ruodh arad mane odak yo milambo mar pinyno owinjo ni joisrael biro koluwo yor atharim nomonjogi momako jomoko kuomgi eka joisrael nokuongore ni ruoth nyasaye kawacho niya ka ichiwo jogi e lwetwa wabiro ketho miechgi chuth ruoth nyasaye nowinjo kwayogi mi ochiwo jokanaan e lwetgi ne gitiekogi kendo giketho miechgi chuth mi gichako kanyo ni horma tiende ni keth thuond mula bange ne gia got hor ka giluwo yor nam makwar malworo piny edom ne gichako ngur ka gin e yo mi giywak ni nyasaye kod musa ka giwacho niya ere gimomiyo usegolowa e piny misri mondo watho e thimni kama onge chiemo kata pi chiemo marachni ojogowa eka ruoth nyasaye nooro thuonde man gi kwiri mager mokayo joisrael kendo onego ji mangeny omiyo ji nobiro ir musa mowachone niya ne waketho kuom ngur ni ruoth nyasaye kod yie ikwanwa ruoth nyasaye mondo ogol thuonde oko kuomwa kuom mano musa nokwayonigi ruoth nyasaye mi ruoth nyasaye nowachone niya los thuond mula igur e luth mabor ka ngato thuol okayo mi orango thuond mulano nochangi kamano musa noloso thuond mula moketo e luth ni ka ngato thuol okayo mi orango thuond mulano chango joisrael owuotho kalworo piny moab joisrael nodhi nyime gi wuoth moguro kambi kamoro miluongo ni oboth bange gia oboth mi gidhi giguro kambi iyeabarim e thim man yo wuokchieng mar piny moab ka ne gia kanyo ne gidhi mi giguro kambi e hoho mar zared eka ne gia arnon e thim momakore gi piny joamor aora arnon ne ni e tong piny jomoab gi piny joamor mano emomiyo kitap lwenje mag ruoth nyasaye wuoyo kuom vaheb man sufa kod hohni man kuno niya arnon kod hohni motimo thidhya gi piny maridore kochomo mier mag ar kod tong piny moab joisrael noa aora arnon modhi beer tiende ni soko mano e soko mane ruoth nyasaye owuoyo kuome ni musa niya chok ji kaachiel mondo ami pi chiengno ema joisrael nowerie niya soko bubni oko waweruru ni soko en soko mane jodongo okunyo gi ludhe kod odungnigi mi obedo chiwo manie thim ne gia beer mi gidhi nahaliel kendo ne gia nahaliel mi gidhi bamoth bang bamoth ne gidhi e holo man piny moab ewi got pisga kama inyalo nenogo thim joisrael oloyo sihon rapar mar chik joisrael nooro joote ir sihon ruodh joamor ka gikwaye niya yienwa mondo wakadh e pinyi ok wananyon puotheu mag cham kata mag mzabibu bende ok wanamodh e sokniu wanaluw mana ndach ruoth nyaka chop wakadh pinyi sihon ne ok oyie mondo joisrael okad e pinye ne ochoko joge duto mi owuok mondo oked gi joisrael e thim nodhi nyaka jahaz momonjogi kuno joisrael nonegogi oyokre mokawo pinygi chakre aora arnon nyaka aora jabok en tong piny joamon kuma ne giyudoe ka weg pinyno rateke kuom mano joisrael nokawo miech joamorgo duto modakie miego ne gin heshbon kod mier matindo mage hesbon ne dala maduong mar sihon ruodh joamor mane oyudo osekedo gi ruodh moab machon mi okawo pinye nyaka aora arnon mano emomiyo jower nochuogo wer niya biuru heshbon biuru wageruru dala sihon obed kaka chon nimar mach nomuoch heshbon ee mach noliel e dala sihon noketho ar dala moab kendo notieko gode mag arnon yaye moab uromo un jokemosh kemosh oseriembo yawuote moringo kendo osemiyo sihon ruodh amor omako nyige nyikwagi orumo chakre heshbon nyaka dibon mach pod liel kochomo medeba kamano joisrael nokawo piny joamor modakie joisrael oloyo og ruodh bashan rapar mar chik eka musa nooro joote mondo odhi ocheng jazer mi joisrael nokawe kaachiel gi mier matindo mage kendo ne giriembo joamor mane oyudo odak kuno bange ne giwichore mi giluwo yo mochomo bashan og ruodh bashan kod joode duto nobiro edrei mondo oked kodgi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya kik iluore nimar asechiwe e lweti kaachiel gi joge duto kod pinye timne mana kaka nitimo ni sihon ruodh joamor mane odak heshbon kamano joisrael nonego og kaachiel gi yawuote kod joge duto nyaka ne onge kata ngat achiel modong mi ne gikawo pinye gidakie kwan balak oluongo balaam joisrael nodhi moguro kambi e piny moab mamwalo man yo wuokchieng mar aora jordan kama omanyore gi jeriko balak wuod zipor nowinjo gima ne joisrael otimo ni joamor jomoab bende kihondko malich nomako nikech ne gineno ka joisrael ngeny ahinya omiyo ne giwacho ni jodong midian niya oganda maduong malichni biro nangowa mana kaka dede nango lum balak wuod zipor mane ruodh moab e kindego nooro joote ir balam wuod beor mane oyudo ni pethor aora yufrate e piny joamav kowachone niya oganda maduong moa e piny misri osebiro mi opongo piny kendo othunga marach omiyo bi piyo mondo ikuonggi nikech gingeny ahinya mohewowa bange dipo ka aloyogi mi ariembogi oko e pinywa nikech angeyo ni joma igwedho yudo gueth joma ikwongo yudo kuong jodong moab gi midian ne jokawo gik michulo jokor mi gidhi ir balaam kendo ginyise kaka balak oorogi balaam nowachonigi niya ninduru ka otienoni kendo abiro wachonu gima ruoth nyasaye onyisa kuom wachni kuom mano jodong moabgo nonindo ka balaam eka nyasaye nofwenyore ni balaam mopenje niya joma olimigo oa kanye balaam nodwoke niya balak wuod zipor ruodh moab ema oseorogi ira konyisa ni oganda maduong osea e piny misri mopongo piny omiyo odwaro ni mondo adhi akuongnegi eka dipo ka oloyogi mi oriembogi nyasaye nowacho ni balaam niya kik idhi kodgi bende kik ikuong jogo nikech gin joma oguedhi kuom mano kane balaam ochiew gokinyi nonyiso jodongo mane balaam ooro niya doguru thuru nimar ruoth nyasaye osekwera ni kik adhi kodu omiyo jodong moabgo noa modok ir balak monyise ni balaam osedagi biro kodgi eka balak nochako ooro jodongo moko mangeny kendo madongo moloyo mane oseoro mokwongo ne gibiro ir balaam mi giwachone niya balaam wuod zipor oorowa mondo wanyisi kama kik gimoro moni biro ira nikech abiro miyi duong miwuoro kendo anatimni gimoro amora miwacho omiyo nyaka ibi mondo ikuongna jogi balaam nodwoko jodong balak niya kata ka bed ni balak dwaro miya fedha gi dhahabu duto manie ode ok anyal chayo chik ruoth nyasaye nyasacha e yo moro amora kata kamano ninduru ka gotienoni kaka ne jou mokwongo ka onindo mondo awinj ane gima nyien ruoth nyasaye nyalo nyisa kuom wachno nyasaye nofwenyore ni balaam gotieno mowachone niya ka jogo osebiro luongi dhi kodgi nyaka itim mana gima abiro wachoni omiyo kane balaam ochiew gokinyi nogawo kanje modhi gi jodong moab malaika kod kanj balaam kata kamano ruoth nyasaye nokecho nikech balaam ne dhi omiyo kane balaam biro koidho kanje ka en gi jotichne ariyo malaika mar ruoth nyasaye nobiro mochung e nyime mondo ogengne kik okadhi kane kanyna oneno malaika kochung e yo gi ligangla nobaro moweyo yo balaam nochwade mondo oduog e yo eka malaika mar ruoth nyasaye nodhi mochung kamoro yo dinygo e kind puothe mag mzabibu kama ochiel gi ohinga koni gi koni kanyna noneno malaika kochung kanyo mi norere e ohinga kendo odiyo tiend balaam e ohingano mi balaam nochako chwade bang mano malaika mar ruoth nyasaye nosudo modhi ochung kamoro madiny ngato ok nyal baroe korachwich kata koracham kane kanyna oneno malaika kanyo nonindo gi balaam piny mi mano nomiyo balaam mirima mochwade gi ludhe eka ruoth nyasaye nomiyo kanyna owuoyo ka penjo balaam niya koro igoya didek ere gima aseketho balaam nowachone niya isebedo kichanda kendo ka dabed ni gi ligangla dikoro asenegi kanyna nopenjo balaam niya donge e kanji isebedo kiidho pile bende asetimonie gima kamano nyaka nene balam nodwoke ni ooyo eka ruoth nyasaye noyawo wang balaam moneno malaika mar ruoth nyasaye kochung e yo gi ligangla nokulore mopodho piny auma e nyim malaika malaika nopenje niya ere gima omiyo inyalo goyo kanji didek kamano ne abiro mondo agengni ne ichoma mana tir ka kanji nende onena didek mobaro oa e yo ka da bed ni ok obaro dikoro asenegi mi aweye odhi balaam nowacho ni malaika mar ruoth nyasaye niya aseketho ne ok angeyo ni ichung e nyima e yo mondo igengna koro ka wuodhani ok berni ayie dok dala malaika mar ruoth nyasaye nowachone niya dhiyo adhiya gi jogo nyaka iwach mana gima abiro nyisi omiyo balaam nodhi adhiya gi jodong balak balaam gi balak kane balak owinjo ni balaam biro nowuok modhi nyaka ar e piny moab aora arnon manie tong pinye mondo oromne balak nopenjo balaam niya donge naoroni joote ndalo mangeny mondo oluongi ango ne omoni biro koso ne iparo ni ok anyal miyi duong balaam nodwoke niya eri asebiro koro ere teko ango dawachgo gimoro amora wach moro amora nyasaye omiya ema abiro wacho kamano balam ne jodhi gi balak nyaka kiriathhuzoth mi balak oyango dhok gi rombe ni balaam kod jodongo ne ni kode balaam oguedho joisrael kinyne gokinyi balak nokawo balaam motero ewi got miluongo ni bamothbaal kuma ne onyalo nenogo oganda joisrael duto kwan eka balam nowacho ni balak niya gerna kende abiriyo mag misango ka kendo kelna ruedhi abiriyo gi imbe abiriyo balak notimo kamano mochiwo rwath achiel gi im achiel e kendo ka kendo mar misango eka nowachoni balaam niya aseloso kende abiriyo mag misango kendo asechiwo rwath achiel gi im achiel e kendo ka kendo balaam nowacho ni balak niya chung e bath misango misechiwo iweya adhi kenda kamoro dipo ka ruoth nyasaye ofwenyorena kendo gimoro amora mowachona abiro nyisi kamano nowuok modhi kendo nyasaye nofwenyorene monyise weche onego owachi kowachone niya dog ir balak kendo iwachne mana kaka anyisi omiyo nodok moyudo balak kochung e bath misango mane osechiwo kaachiel gi jodong moab duto eka ne balaam ohulo wach moa kuom nyasaye kama balak ruodh moab oseoma aram piny gode man wuok chieng kowachona niya bi mondo ikuongna joka jakobo bi ikwer joisrael ere kaka dakwong joma nyasaye ok osekuongo ere kaka dakwer joma ruoth nyasaye ok osekwero anenogi kachung ewi lwendni maboyo kendo arangogi gi ewi gode aneno oganda modak kar kende ok oseriwore gi ogendni mamoko ere ngama nyalo kwano oganda joka jakobo kata manyalo riwo kar romb joisrael weuru atho kaka joma kare tho kendo abed achiel kodgi bang mano balak nowacho ni balaam niya mano ango misetimono ne aluongi mondo ikuongna wasika koro isemana guedhogi balaam nodwoke niya donge nyaka awach mana gima ruoth nyasaye osenyisa eka balak nowachone niya bi mondo ateri kamoro machielo inyalo nenogo mana bath joisrael konchiel ok giduto mondo ikuongnagi kanyo kamano ne otero balaam e paw zofim ewi got pisga kendo nogeroe kende abiriyo mag misango mi ochiwoe rwath achiel gi im achiel e kendo ka kendo eka ne balaam owacho ni balak niya chung misango misechiwo adhi romo gi nyasaye kucha ruoth nyasaye nofwenyore ni balaam monyise gima onego owachi kowachone niya dog ir balak kendo iwach mana kaka anyisi omiyo nodok moyudo ka balak ochung e bath dhano doriambi ooyo ok en dhano dolokre osewuoyo donge obiro timo kaka owacho adier obiro chopo gima osehulo osechika mondo achiw gueth omiyo abiro chiwo gueth ok anyal loko guethno onge ketho moseyudo kuom joka jakobo ooyo onge richo moseneno kuom joisrael ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi ni kodgi en ema giyie ni en e ruodhgi nyasaye nogologi e piny misri tekone chalonigi gi teko jowi tim ajuoke onge kuom joka jakobo adier timbe ndagla onge kuom joisrael koro e sa monego wanyisie joka jakobo joisrael niya neyeuru gima nyasaye osetimonu ogandagi chalo gi sibuor dhako mokichore kendo ojuol ka sibuor dichwo ok onyal nindo piny ka pok ochamo gima onego momadho rembe eka balak nowacho ni balaam niya ka ok idwar kuongogi kara ber mondo kik iguedhgi bende balaam nodwoke niya donge ne anyisi ni nyaka atim gik moko duto ruoth nyasaye ochika balak nowachone niya bi mondo ateri kamoro machielo dipo ka nyasaye oyie mi ikuongonagi kanyo kamano notero balaam ewi got peor momanyore gi jeshimon eka balam ne onyise mondo olosne kende abiriyo mag misango kanyo kendo ochiw ruedhi abiriyo kod imbe abiriyo balak notimo kaka ne balam onyise mi ochiwo rwath achiel gi im achiel e kendo ka kendo kwan koro kaka balam nongeyo ni ruoth nyasaye dwaro ni mondo oguedh joisrael ne ok odhi mondo otim tim ajuoke kaka ne osetimo mokwongo nowichore mochomo thim kendo kane ongicho noneno joisrael koguro kambigi kochanore e dhoutgi eka teko mar nyasaye nobiro kuome mi ohulo kama e wach madier mar balaam wuod beor mana ngat wange bith kendo winjo weche nyasaye en wach ngat wange oyepo kendo neno fwenyruok moa kuom ngat nyalo gik moko duto joka jakobo mano kaka hembeu beyo joisrael kar daku longo hembeu chalo gi yiend othidhe mopidhi e laini maboyo kendo chalo gi puothe mae bath aora kaka yien mabeyo ruoth nyasaye opidho kendo kaka yiend sida mae dho pi pi mae dapigeu biro bubni oko kendo kothu nochal gi nembe madongo mondo ruodhu obed maduong moloyo agag kendo lochne oyud duong nyasaye mane ogolou e piny misri tekone chalo gi teko jowi uchamo ringre ogendini wasiku bende urado chokegi kendo uturo lembgi matindotindo uchalo gi sibuor madhako manindo piny onge ngama hedhore chiewo joma guedhou mondo oyud gueth joma kuongou mondo oyud kuong balaam okoro wach kane balak owinjo wechego nokecho ahinya gi balaam mi ne okeyo lwetene kowacho ni balaam niya ne aluongi mondo ikuongna wasika koro iseguedhogi mana nyadidek omiyo wuogi idhi thuru ne asingora ni damiyi duong mangongo koro ruoth nyasaye osemoni yudo duongno balaam nodwoke niya donge ne anyiso jooteni mane ioro ira ni kata dibed ni balak dwaro miya fedha kod dhahabu duto manie ode ok anyal chayo chik ruoth nyasaye ka atimo dwarona awuon bed ni en gima ber kata gima rach abiro wacho mana gima ruoth nyasaye onyisa koro adok ir jowa ka pok adhi nyaka anyisi gima joisrael biro timo ni jogi e ndalo mabiro kamano balaam nohulo wach moa kuom nyasaye kama e wach madier mar balaam wuod beor mana wach ngat wange bith kendo mawinjo weche nyasaye en wach ngat mongeyo rieko mar ngama duong moloyo ngat wange oyepo kendo neno fwenyruok moa kuom ngama nyalo gik moko duto anene ok sani kendo angiye ok machiegni sulue nobi koa kuom joka jakobo kendo ludh duong nowuog kuom joisrael obiro goyo oganda lweny mag jomoab kendo nolo joma sungore obiro loyo piny edom e lweny mi okaw kendo joseir wasike nobed mage joisrael biro timo timbe chir ee joka jakobo biro loyo wasikgi onge ngat nodong ar ka ngima eka balaam norango piny amalek mi ohulo kama oganda mane okwongo betie ne joamalek mogik ginirum chuth eka norango jokeni mi owacho niya yaye un jokain kata obedo ni kar daku otegno kendo udak malo ewi gode obiro wang uparo ni unyalo dak e nyima kanyo nyaka karango ne ochako ohulo kendo niya yaye mago jokanye machokore malogo gin mony moa saipras gibiro ketho asuria kendo giniketh eber kata gin bende gibiro rumo chuth bang mano balaam nowuok modok thurgi balak bende nodhi kwan joisrael olamo baalpeor kane joisrael ni shitim ne gichako terore gi nyi moab mane luongogi e sep misengni mane gitimo ni nyisechegi ne gidhi mi gichamo chiemogo kendo gilamo nyiseche jomoab kane joisrael ochako lamo baalpeor kamano ruoth nyasaye nokecho kodgi mowacho ni musa niya ter jotend oganda ewi got idhir olwar piny mondo otho e nyima odiechieng alanga mondo mirimba mager oa kuom joisrael omiyo musa nowacho ni jongad bura mag israel niya ngato ka ngato kuomu nyaka neg joge moselamo baalpeor noyudo jaisrael moro okelo nyar midian e hembe ratiro ka musa kod oganda duto neno ka noyudo giywak e dho hemb romo kane finehas wuod eleazar wuod harun jadolo onene nowuok e oganda mokawo tong kendo odonjogo e ot iye kodwaro jaisraelno nochwowe gi tong moriwe kaachiel gi nyakono eka tho mane oyudo ogoyo joisrael orumo noyudo ka thono osenego ji piero ariyo gangwen ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya finehas wuod eleazar wuod harun jadolo osemiyo mirima mane go gi joisrael orumo nikech mirima mosemake kodgi chal gi mara mano emomiyo kata obedo ni ne gi nyiego kod joisrael nikech aherogi ahinya ne ok atiekogi dhi iwach ni finehas ni asingorane ni obiro bedo jadolo nyaka chieng asingorane en kaachiel gi nyikwaye ni ginibed jodolo nyaka chieng nikech osebedo gi mirima nyiso ni ohero nyasache mi opwodho joisrael kuom richogi jaisrael mane onegi kaachiel gi nyar midian niluongo ni zimri wuod salu jatend dhoot achiel kuom dhout josimeon nyar midian ne onegno nyinge ne kozbi nyar zur ne jatend dhout midian moko ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya sanduru jomidian kendo uneggi nikech ne githagou gi timbegi mag amara mane gitimo peor kendo kuom wach kozbi nyargi nyar jatend midian mane oneg ndalo mane yamb tho obiro nikech gima notimore peor kwan okwan joisrael e piny moab bang yamono ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa gi eleazar jadolo wuod harun niya kwanuru oganda joisrael e dhoutgi kundiko joma hikgi oromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo kendo moromo dhi e lweny musa gi eleazar nochoko ji duto hikgi piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo e piny moab mamwalo e bath aora jordan kama omanyore gi jeriko kaka ruoth nyasaye nosechiko musa joisrael mane owuok misri e magi joreuben wuod israel makayo kochan e dhoutgi ne joka hanok gi joka palu gi joka hezron gi joka karmi mago ne dhout reuben kar romb joma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero angwen gi mia abiriyo kod piero adek wuod palu ne eliab yawuot eliab ne nemuel gi dathan kod abiram gin e dothan gi abiram mane joma ogen e oganda ne gipiem gi musa kod harun mi giriwore gi jokorah mondo gipiem gi ruoth nyasaye bange piny nongamo dhoge mi omwonyogi kaachiel gi korah mi ogandagi norumo kendo mach nowango ji mia ariyo gi piero abich kande ne gidoko ranyisi siemo ji kata kamano jokorah ne ok otho duto josimeon kochan e dhoutgi ne joka nemuel gi joka jamin gi joka jakin gi joka zera kod joka saulo mago ne dhout joka josimeon kar romb joma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero ariyo gariyo gi mia ariyo jogad kochan e dhoutgi ne joka zefon gi joka hagi gi joka shuni gi joka ozni gi joka eri gi joka arod kod joka arieli mago ne dhout jogad kar romb joma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero angwen gi mia abich yawuot juda ne er gi onan gi shela gi perez kod zera er gi onan notho e piny kanaan jojuda kochan e dhoutgi ne joka shela gi joka perez kod joka zera dhout perez ne joka hezron gi joka hamul mago ne dhout juda kar romb joma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero aabiriyo gauchiel gi mia abich joisakar kochan e dhoutgi ne joka tola gi joka pua gi joka jashub kod joka shimron mago ne dhout isakar kar romb joma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero auchiel gangwen gi mia adek jozebulun kochan e dhoutgi ne joka sered gi joka elon kod joka jaleel mago ne dhout zebulun kar romb joma ondik nyingi ne alufu piero auchiel gi mia abich yawuot josef ne manase gi efraim jomanase kochan e dhoutgi ne joka makir gi joka gilead gilead ne wuod makir dhout gilead ne jezeer gi joka helek gi joka asriel gi joka shekem gi joka shemida kod joka hefer zelofehad wuod hefer nonywolo mana nyiri kende nyingi ne mala gi noa gi hogla gi milka kod tirza mago ne dhout manase kar romb joma ne ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero abich gariyo gi mia abiriyo joefraim kochan e dhoutgi ne joka shuthela gi joka beker kod joka tahan dhood shuthela ne joka eran mago ne dhout efraim kar romb joma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero adek gariyo gi mia abich mago duto ne joka josef kochan e dhoutgi jobenjamin kochan e dhoutgi ne joka bela gi joka ashbel gi joka ahiram gi joka shufam kod joka hufam yawuot bela ne ard gi naaman dhout bela ne joka ard gi joka naaman mago ne dhout benjamin kar romb joma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero angwen gabich gi mia auchiel jodan kochan e dhoodgi ne joka shuham mano ne dhood dan kar romb joka shuhan ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero auchiel gangwen gi mia angwen joasher kochan e dhoutgi ne joka imna gi joka ishvi kod joka beria dhout beria ne joka heber gi joka malkiel bende asher ne nigi nyako nyinge serum mago ne dhout asher kar romb joma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero abich gadek gi mia angwen jonaftali kochan e dhoutgi ne joka jazeel gi joka guni gi joka jezer kod joka shilem mago ne dhout naftali kochan e utgi kar romb joma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero angwen gabich gi mia angwen kamano kar romb joisrael duto ne ji alufu mia auchiel gi achiel kod mia abiriyo gi piero adek piny nyaka pog gi ombulu ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya nyaka pog piny gi dhoudi mana maromre gi kar joma ondik nyinggi oganda maduong inimi lowo maduong oganda matin nimi matin oganda ka oganda nopogne lowo maromre gi kar romb joma ondik nyinggi kata kamano unupog piny mana gi ombulu mi dhoot ka dhoot noyud lowo maromre gi kar romb nying joma ondik e dhoodgi lowo nopog gi ombulu ni ogendni madongo gi matindo bende dhood lawi jolawi mondik nyinggi kochan e dhoutgi ne joka gershon gi joka kohath kod joka merari dhout lawi ne joka libni gi joka hebron gi joka mali gi joka mushi kod joka korah kohath ne wuon amram chi amram ne nyinge jokebed nyar lawi mane lawi onywolo misri jokebed nonywolo ni amram nyithindo nyinggi harun gi musa kod miriam nyamingi yawuot harun ne nadab gi abihu gi eleazar kod ithamar nadab gi abihu notho nikech ne giyiego mach ok ni kare e nyim ruoth nyasaye kar romb jolawi chwo chakre ja due achiel kadhi nyime ne alufu piero ariyo gadek nondik nyinggi mopogore gi dhout israel mamoko nikech ne ok opognigi lowo kaka ipogo ni dhout israel mamoko kaleb gi joshua kende ema odong mago e nying joisrael mane musa gi eleazar jadolo ondiko e piny moab mamwalo e bath aora jordan kama omanyore gi jeriko onge jaisrael moro kata achiel mane musa gi harun jadolo okwano e thim sinai mane okwan e kweno mar ariyoni nimar ruoth nyasaye nosewacho ni nyaka githo giduto e thim onge ngato kuomgi mane pod ngima mak mana kaleb wuod jefune kod joshua wuod nun kwan kwayo mar nyi zelofehad bang kweno nyi zelofehad nobiro zelofehad ne wuod hefer wuod gilead wuod makir wuod manase wuod josef nying nyirigo ne mala gi noa gi hogla gi wuowi mwandune nyaka dong ni nyare ka oonge gi nyako mwandune nyaka dong ni owetene ka oonge gi owetene mwandune dong ni omine wuongi ka wuon onge gi ominene mwandune dong ni watne moro machiegni masemiyo joisrael ka isenene ibiro tho miluw kwereni mana kaka harun owadu notho nikech nutamoru rito chikna kane oganda joisrael piem koda e sokni manie thim zin kendo ne ok unyiso oganda ni ngama dhoot musa nooro jolwenygo gi finehas wuod eleazar jadolo mane otingo gik lemo mag kama ler kod tunge migoyo mondo ji ogo sigich lweny ji alufu achiel achiel noa e dhoot ka dhoot ne gikedo gi jomidian kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa mi ginego jogi machwo duto bende ne ginego evi gi rekem gi zur gi hur kod reba mane ruodhi abich mag midian kaachiel gi balaam wuod beor joisrael nomako mond jomidian gi nyithindgi kendo ne giyako jambgi kod mwandugi duto ne giwango miechgi duto kod kuondegi mag buoro bange ne gikawo jamni kod gik moko duto mane giyako kaachiel gi joma ne gimako mi gitero ir musa gi eleazar jadolo kod oganda joisrael e kambi mane ni e piny moab mamwalo aora jordan kama omanyore gi jeriko chik mar pwodho gik moyaki musa gi eleazar jadolo gi jodong oganda duto nodhi romo ni jolwenygo e dho kambi oko musa nokecho gi jotend ogend lweny madongo gi matindo mane duogo koa e lweny mopenjogi niya ere gimomiyo useweyo mongi mak unego donge ungeyo ni ka ne balaam osea gweng peor mongo ema nobet kawuondo joisrael mondo owe ruoth nyasaye mi mano nomiyo tho ogoyo oganda ruoth nyasaye emomiyo neguru nyithindo machwo duto kaachiel gi mon duto uwe nyiri pok ongeyo chwo mondo ukaw ngato ka ngato kuomu moseneko kata mosemulo ngat motho nyaka dong oko mar kambi kuom ndalo abiriyo gudreuru chieng mar adek kod chieng mar abiriyo kendo upwodh joma umako e lweny bende pwodhuru lewni manyalo tamo mach wango kaka dhahabu gi fedha gi mula gi nyinyo gi opanga kod lisasi nyaka uketi e mach eka obed maler kata kamano nyaka pwodhgi gi pi mar pwodhruok bende gimoro amora mach nyalo ketho nyaka lwok e pigno chieng mar abiriyo nyaka ulwok lepu mi ubed maler eka bange unyalo dwogo e kambi gik moyaki opogi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya un gi eleazar jadolo kod jodong dhout oganda mondo ukwan jamni gi gik moko moyaki kaachiel gi joma omak e lweny bange poguru gigo maromre e kind jolweny mane odhi kedo kod ji duto mane odong kuom mago mopogni jolweny ugolie achiel kuom mia abich modong ugolie achiel kuom piero abich abich bed ni gin ji kata dhok kata kenje kata rombe omi jolawi jorit hema maler mar ruoth nyasaye musa gi eleazar jadolo ne jotimo kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa gik moyaki ka ok okwan mago mane jolweny okawo e magi rombe alufu mia auchiel gi piero abiriyo gabich gi dhok alufu piero abiriyo gariyo kod kende alufu piero auchiel gachiel kaachiel gi nyiri alufu piero adek gariyo pok ongeyo chwo kamano gik mane omi joma ne okedo e lweny ne rombe alufu mia adek gi piero adek gabiriyo kod mia abich gi dhok alufu piero adek gauchiel kod kenje alufu piero adek gi mia abich kaachiel gi ji alufu apar gauchiel kuom mano pok mane ogol mondo ochiw ni ruoth nyasaye ne rombe piero abiriyo gariyo gi dhok mia auchiel gi piero abiriyo gabich kod kenje piero auchiel gachiel kaachiel gi ji piero adek gariyo musa nomiyo eleazar jadolo pok mane ogol ni ruoth nyasaye kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike gik mane odong ni joisrael tiende ni mago mane musa oketo tenge komiyo jolweny pokgi ne rombe alufu mia adek gi piero adek gabiriyo gi mia abich gi dhok alufu piero adek gauchiel kod kenje alufu piero adek gi mia abich kaachiel gi ji alufu apar gauchiel kuom gik mane opogni oganda joisraelgo musa nogolo achiel kuom piero abich abich bed ni gin ji kata jamni momiyo jolawi mane jorit hema maler mar ruoth nyasaye kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike bange jotend ogend lweny madongo gi matindo nobiro ir musa nowachone niya jaduong wasekwano jolweny mawa duto mwayudo ni gintie gite kuom mano wasekelo gik molos gi dhahabu mane wayako kaka thiwni gi manyonge gi tere gi stadi kod tigo mondo wachiw ni ruoth nyasaye ka gik mwawarogo ngimawa eka musa gi eleazar jadolo nokawo gik molos gi dhahabugo kuom jotelo madongo gi matindo pek chiwo mar dhahabu mane gimiyo ruoth nyasaye noromo kilo mia ariyo nimar jalweny ka jalweny noseyako kamano musa gi eleazar jadolo noyudo dhahabu kuom jotend ogend lweny madongo gi matindo mi ne gikelo e hema miromoe gi nyasaye mondo ruoth nyasaye opargo joisrael kwan joreuben gi jogad kod nu jomanase omi piny man yo wuok chieng mar aora jordan rapar mar chik joreuben kod jogad ne ni gi jamni mangeny kendo kane gineno ka piny jazer kod piny gilead ni gi lege mabeyo ne gibiro ir musa gi eleazar jadolo kod jodong oganda mi giwacho nigi niya piny motingo ataroth gi dibon gi jazer gi nimra gi heshbon gi eleale gi sebam gi nebo kod beon ruoth nyasaye osekawo ka joisrael neno en piny man gi lek maber mar jamni kendo ungeyo ni wan jopith jamni kuom mano ka uyie kodwa miwauru pinyno obed marwa kik wangad aora jordan musa nopenjo jogad kod joreubengo niya udwaro ni mondo joweteu odhi oked e lweny ka un udong ka ere gimomiyo unyoso chuny joisrael mondo kik ngad loka odhi e piny ruoth nyasaye osemiyogi mano e gima ne wuoneu otimo kane aorogi ka wan kadeshbarnea mondo gidhi gicheng piny kanaan ne gidhi mi gichengo pinyno nyaka holo mar eshkol kane gidwogo ne ginyoso chuny joisrael ni ok ginyal dhi kawo piny mane ruoth nyasaye osemiyogi mirima mager nomako ruoth nyasaye chiengno mi okuongore niya joisrael osedagi luwa gi chunygi duto omiyo onge kata ngato achiel jahigni piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo mane owuok misri manone piny mane asingora ni ibrahim gi isaka kod jakobo kaleb wuod jefune jakenizi kod joshua wuod nun kende ema nodonj e pinyno nikech giseluwo ruoth nyasaye gi chunygi duto ruoth nyasaye nokecho gi joisrael mi ne omiyo gidigni e thim kuom higni piero angwen gi nyaka tieng mane oketho e nyimeno otho duto koro kendo uluwo mana timbe wuoneu un joma timbegi richo pod biro mana medo mirimb ruoth nyasaye kuom joisrael nimar ka udagi luwe obiro jwango oganda joisrael duto e thim kendo un ema ubiro miyo girum bang kinde matin ne gidwogo ir musa mi giwacho niya wadwaro gero abilni ni jambwa ka kod mier mondo mondwa gi nyithindwa odagie bange wanyalo dhi e lweny mondo waked ka watelo ni joisrael nyaka chop gikaw piny gidhi dakie e kinde pod wadhi kedo mondwa gi nyithindwa nyalo dak e mier mochiel motegno gi ohinga jo pinyni ok nyal monjogie ok wanaduogi ka pok jaisrael ka jaisrael oyudo lowo mopogne wan ok wadwar mondo opognwa piny kodgi loka machielo mar aora jordan nikech osepognwa lopwa yo wuok chiengchieng mar jordan lokani musa nodwokogi niya ka unyalo rito singruok musesingorugoni mi uyie kedo e nyim ruoth nyasaye kendo jou duto jolweny ongado aora jordan e nyim ruoth nyasaye mi gibet kuno nyaka chop ruoth nyasaye riemb wasike mokawo pinyno un udwog ka kendo unubed maonge ketho e nyim ruoth nyasaye kendo e nyim joisrael mi pinyni nobed maru e nyim ruloth nyasaye ngeuru ni ka ok utimo kamano unubed joketho e nyim ruoth nyasaye kendo richou nokelnu kum kuom mano geruru mier ni mondu kod nyithindu kendo uger abilni ni jambu nyaka utim mana kaka usesingoru jogad gi joreuben nodwoko musa niya jaduong wan jogi omiyo wabiro timo kaka ichikowa nyithindwa gi mondwa kod jambwa duto biro dong e miech gilead ka jowa duto jolweny biro ngado aora mondo odhi oked e nyim osechikowa waduto mwaromo dhi e kedo wabiro ngado loka cha e nyim ruoth nyasaye lopwa nobed mana loka jordan koni omiyo musa nomiyo jogad gi joreuben kod nu jomanase wuod josef piny sihon ruodh joamor gi piny og ruodh bashan duto kaachiel gi miechgi kod gwenge mokiewo kodgi jogad nogero dibon gi ataroth gi aroer gi atrothsafan gi jazar gi jogbeha gi bethnimra kod bethharan duto mier mochiel motegno gi ohinga kendo ogerie abilni mag jamni joreuben nogero heshbon gi eleale gi kiriathaim gi nebo gi baalmeon mane nyinge oloki kod sibma mago e nying mane gichako mier mane gigerogo joka makir wuod joisrael niya kusengado aora jordan mudonjo e piny kanaan yieruru mier moko mondo obed kuonde ngat moneko kobothne nyalo tonyie miergo nobed miech tony ngat moneko nyalo tonyie koringo ngat madwaro ngato oboth monego nyawadgi onyalo tonyie bed ni en jaisrael kata wendo kata japiny moro modak kuomu ka ngato ogoyo wadgi gi gima olos gi nyinyo mi otho ngat mogoyeno doko janek omiyo nyaka nege ka ngato nigi kidi e lwete nyalo nego ngato mi ogoyogo wadgi motho en janek kendo nyaka nege kata ka ngato nigi gimoro molos gi yien e lwete manyalo neko mi ogoyogo wadgi motho en janek omiyo nyaka nege owadgi ngat monegno nyaka neg janekno koyudo mondo ochulne kuor ka ngato odhiro wadgi goyiem kata ka odiro gimoro mogoye kata kogoye adhong motho nyaka nege nikech en janek owadgi ngat monegno nyaka neg janekno koyudo kapo ni odhiro wadgi ok gimonrego kata ka ochiele gi gimoro ka ok en gi paro mar goye kata ka oboth mobolo kuome kidi manyalo neko ka ok onene mi otho kendo ka en adier ni ok gimonre kendo ne ok odwar hinye oganda nyaka yal wachno e kind janek gi owadgi ngat monegi kaluwore gi chikegi eki oganda nyaka kony janekno kuom kuor owadgi ngat monegi dochulone mi gidwoke e dala tony kuma ne otonyie mokwongo enobed kuno nyaka jadolo maduong tho kapo ni chieng moro janekno okadho tong mar dala tony mi owadgi ngat mane onego cha oyude monege owadgi ngat mane onegono onge gi ketho janek nyaka sik mana e dala tony nyaka jadolo maduong tho ka jadolo maduong osetho eka onyalo dok thurgi mago nobednu chik mochwere kamoro amora mudakie ngat moneko nyaka ngadne buch tho mana kuom dho joneno wach janeno achiel kende ok oromo ngado ni ngato buch tho kik uyie janek mongadne buch tho warre nyaka nege bende kik uyie ngat mopondo e dala tony warre mi dog dag e dala kapok jadolo maduong otho kik uketh pinyu gi remo kamano nikech remo ketho piny kendo pinyu ok nyal pwodhore kuom gak mar remo mochuer mak mana ka opwodhe gi remb ngat mane ochuero remono kik uchid pinyu mudakie kendo bende adakie nimar ruoth nyasaye adak e kind joisrael kwan chik kend mar nyiri opognigi lop wuonegi jodong dhout gilead wuod makir wuod manase achiel kuom dhout josef nodhi ir musa gi jotend oganda kod jodong dhout israel mowacho niya jaduong ruoth nyasaye nochiki mondo ipog ni joisrael lowo gi ombulu bende nochiki mondo ipog lowo dine owadwa zelofehad oyudo ni nyige kapo ni moro kuom nyirigo okendi e dhood jaisrael moro lowo mopogne biro lal kuom lop kwerewa mi nomiye dhoot okendie nyakono kamano lopwano dilal ka higa mar mor ochopo e piny israel lowono nomi dhoot mokendie nyakono mi nolal chuth kuom lop kwerewa kane musa osengeyo gima ruoth nyasaye dwaro nonyiso joisrael niya joka josef ni kare kendo kama e kaka ruoth nyasaye osechiko kuom wach nyi zelofehad ginyalo tedo ni ngato angata gihero mak mana ni nyaka bed ni okendgi e dhoodgi onge lop jaisrael moro amora nowuog e dhoodgi kimiyo dhoot machielo ngato ka ngato e israel nyaka sik mana gi lop wuon mare nyar israel moro amora opogne lop wuon mare nyaka kendi mana e dhoodgi kamano ngato ka ngato e israel nosik e lop kwerene onge lowo noa e dhoot moro kimiyo dhoot machielo dhoot ka dhoot nosik gi lope kuom mano mala gi tirza gi hogla gi milka kod noa nyi zelofehad notimo kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa mi gitedo mana ni yawuot omine wuongi nokendgi e dhood manase wuod josef kendo lopgi nosik mana e dhood kweregi mago e chike mane ruoth nyasaye omiyo musa onyiso joisrael e piny moab mamwalo e bath aora jordan kama omanyore gi jeriko rapar mar chik musa oparo ni joisrael singruok mane nyasaye otimonigi horeb magi e weche mane musa owacho ni joisrael duto kane gin e thim manie holo yo wuokchieng mar aora jordan kuno nomanyore gi suf ka paran nie bathe konchiel tofel gi laban gi hazeroth kod dizahab e bathe komachielo en wuodh ndalo apar gachiel kia horeb nyaka kadeshbarnea kiluwo yo mokadho e piny gode mag seir chieng mokwongo mar due mar apar gachiel e higa mar piero angwen bang wuok misri musa nonyiso joisrael weche duto mane ruoth nyasaye osechike mondo owachnigi mano notimore kane oseloyo sihon ruodh amor mane odak heshbon kod og ruodh bashan mane odak ashtaroth gi edrei e piny moab loka jordan kuno ema musa nongadoe bura e chunye ni mondo onyis ji tiend chikni nowacho niya ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa nowuoyo kodwa horeb mowachonwa kama usebet e godni moromo omiyo koro chakuru wuoth mondo udhi e piny gode mag joamor kendo uked gi joma odak machiegni kodgi e holo mar aora jordan gi piny gode kod piny pewe gi piny man yo milambo kod dhonam tiende ni piny kanaan kod piny lebanon duto nyaka aora maduong mar yufrate aseikonu pinyno omiyo dhiuru mondo ukawe en e piny mane ruoth nyasaye osingore ni nomi kwereu ibrahim gi isaka gi jakobo kod nyikwagi oyier jongad bura wuok e kinde nogo nawachonu niya tinguru pek ok anyal tingo kenda nikech ruoth nyasaye nyasachu osemiyo unya ahinya koro ungeny mana ka sulue mae polo ruoth nyasaye nyasach kwereu onego mi umed nya nyadi gana gi gana moloyo kaka uromoni kendo oguedhu kaka nosingore tich bedo jatendu kod ngado buchu osedoko mapek mohewa kuom mano yieruru ji man gi rieko kendo molony mondo oketgi jotend dhoutu ne udwoka ni uyie gi gima nawachonu omiyo nakawo ji man gi rieko kendo molony maketo mondo oritu moko kuomgi naketo jotend ji gana moko jotend ji mia mia moko jotend ji piero abich abich kod ji apar apar kendo moko bende naketo jotelo mopogore opogore e dhoutu duto e kinde nogo nachiko jongad bura mau niya un ema onego uyal buche mag joweteu kendo nyaka ungad bura kare e kind ngato gi wadgi kata bed ni ngatno en jaisrael wadu kata en jadak nyaka ubed jaratiro kungado bura kendo nyaka uwinj wach ngat modhier mana kaka uwinjo wach jamoko kik uluor wang ngato nikech ngado bura en mar nyasaye kapo ni uneno ka bura moro tek ahinya ok unyal ngado kelnagouru mondo ayale chieng onogo bende nachikou kuom gik moko duto monego utim oor jombetre koa kadeshbarnea odhi ocheng piny kanaan kwan bange ne wawuok horeb kaka ruoth nyasaye nochikowa mi ne wawuotho e thim maduong kendo malich kaka ne uneno cha kwadhi e piny gode mag joamor mi wachopo kadeshbarnea eka nawachonu ni koro wasechopo e piny gode mag joamor ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa miyowa ruoth nyasaye nyasachu oseikonu piny uneno e nyimuno omiyo dhiuru mondo ukawe kaka ruoth nyasaye nyasach kwereu nosingorenu kik chunyu nyosre kata kik ubed maluor kane uwinjo kamano nubiro ira uduto muwachona niya mondo waor jomoko mondi nyimwa odhi ochengnwa pinyno eka gidwoknwa wach ka ginyisowa yo onego waluw kod mier man kuno ne ayie gi wachuno mi ayiero jou apar gariyo ka ngato achiel achiel ochung ni dhoot ka dhoot ne giwuok mi giwuotho e piny gode nyaka holo mar eshkol mi gichengo gwengno ne gikawo gik monyak e pinyno mi gikelonwa ka ginyisowa ni piny ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa dwaro miyowano en piny maber ahinya kata kamano nudagi dhi kuno kendo nutamoru winjo chik ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ne ungur e hembeu kuwacho niya ruoth nyasaye ok oherowa emomiyo osegolowa misri mondo oketwa e lwet joamor otiekwa ango wabiro yudo kuno ka wadhi jowetewa mane waoro osenego chunywa ka wachonwa ni ji man kuno rabede kendo boyo mohewowa bende ginyisowa ni mier man kuno dongo kendo nigi ohinga maboyo mochopo e polo kendo nyikwa anakim bende gineno kuno nanyisou ni chunyu kik nyosre kendo kik uluor jogo ruoth nyasaye nyasachu e jatendu kendo en ema obiro kedonu mana kaka nokedonu e misri cha bende kane un e thim nuneno kaka ne ruoth nyasaye nyasachu otingou e wuodhu duto nyaka nuchopo kaeri mana ka ngama tingo nyathine kata obedo kamano pod nutamoru atama geno kuom ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mane telo nyimu mondo onginu kuonde mane unyalo bworoe gotieno notelo nyimu kobet ei mach mondo onyisu kuma onego uluw godiechieng notelonu kobet e bor polo nyasaye okumo joisrael kwan kane ruoth nyasaye owinjo wecheugo mirima nomake mokuongore niya onge kata ngat achiel kuom tieng marachni none piny maber mane asingora ni nami kweregi mak mana kaleb wuod jefune en ema none pinyno kendo anamiye kaachiel gi nyikwaye piny osenyonono nikech osebedo ka oluwa gi chunye duto gima nutimono nomiyo ruoth nyasaye okecho koda bende mowachona niya kata bende ok inidonji e pinyno joshua wuod nun matiyoni ema nodonj kuno kuom mano jiwe mondo obed motegno nimar en ema nomi joisrael okaw pinyno nyithindu pod tindo mane uparo ni nobed joma nomak e lweny kendo mapok ongeyo pogo ber gi rach ema nodonj e pinyno gin ema namigi pinyno kendo ginidagie omiyo chakuru wuoth mondo udog e thim kuchomo nam makwar olo joisrael horma kwan eka nudwoka niya waseketho e nyim ruoth nyasaye omiyo koro wabiro dhi mondo wamonj pinyno kaka ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa ochikowa omiyo ngato ka ngato kuomu nokawo gi lwenje kuparo ni en gima yot monjo piny godeno ruoth nyasaye nowachona niya kwergi kik gidhi gikedi nimar ok nabed kodgi omiyo wasikgi biro loyogi nanyisou kamano ne ok udewo nudagi winjo wach ruoth nyasaye mudhi umonjo piny gode mana gi wiu matek joamor modak e piny gode nowuok kedo kodu mi ginur kuomu mana ka kich kendo ne gikeyou e gweng seir mi giriembou nyaka horma bang mano nuduogo muywak e nyim ruoth nyasaye ne ok onyal winjo ywaku kendo ne ok onyal dewou mano ema omiyo nudak kadeshbarnea kuom ndalo mangeny rapar mar chik higni mane joisrael otieko e thim bange ne wamako yo mangado thim kwachomo nam makwar kaka ruoth nyasaye nochikowa kendo ne wadigni e piny gode mag seir kuom ndalo mangeny nyaka ruoth nyasaye nokona niya usebedu kudigni e piny godegi moromo omiyo koro wichreuru uchom yo nyandwat wach ni ji kama bang kinde manok ubiro ngado e piny joweteu nyikwa esau modak seri ginibed maluor ka ginenou un nyaka une ni ok ukwinyogi nikech ok namiu pinygi kata matin nono nimar piny gode mag seir asemiyo esau ka mwandune unyalo yudo chiemo gi pi kuomgi nyaka uchul nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasachu oseguedhou kuom gik moko duto usetimo oseritou ka uwuotho e thim malichni kuom higni piero angwengi duto ruoth nyasaye nyasachu osebedo kodu kendo onge gima usechando kamano ne wakadho mi waweyo jowetewa nyikwa esau modak seir kendo ne waweyo yo mochomo elath gi eziongeber mi ne wawichore mwamako yo mochiko thim moab eka ruoth nyasaye nowachona niya kik umonj jomoab kendo kik ukwinygi nikech ok namiu pinygi kata matin mondo obed mwanduu nimar asechiwo dala mar ar ni nyikwa lut mondo obed mwandugi joemim mane oganda maratego ahinya kendo mane nigi ji mangeny nosedak kuno e kinde moko ne gin joma raboche mana ka joanakim ji ne luongogi ni jorefaim mana kaka niluongo joanakim jomoab ne luongogi ni joemim mokwongo johori nodak seir nyikwa esau notiekogi mokawo pinygi kendo odakie mana kaka joisrael notimo e piny mane ruoth nyasaye omiyogi mondo obed mwandugi ruoth nyasaye nodhi nyime kowachona niya wuothuru mondo ungad holo mar zere mi ne wangado ne wasetieko higni piero adek gaboro chakre kinde mane wawuokie kadeshbarnea nyaka wangado holo mar zered e kindeno tieng mar jolweny ne koro osetho duto mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nosekuongore ruoth nyasaye ema nokelonigi masira motiekogi pep onge kata ngatgi achiel mane odong e kambi kane jolwenygo duto osetho te ruoth nyasaye nowachona niya kawuono ubiro ngado tong mar moab e dala mar ar kendo kuchopo e piny jomoab kik ukwinygi kata kik umonjgi nikech ok namiu pinygi mondo obed mwanduu nimar asechiwe ni nyikwa lut pinyno bende ikwano ka piny jorefaim jorefaim nosedak kuno mokwongo joamon ne lwongogi ni jozamzumim ne gin oganda maratego ahinya kendo mane nigi ji mangeny ne gin joma raboche mana ka joanakim ruoth nyasaye notiekogi kane gitemo gengo ni joamon mane monjogi mi joamon nokawo pinygi mi odakie mano notimore mana kaka ruoth nyasaye notimo ni johori mane otemo gengo ni nyikwa esau mane odak seir notieko johorigo mi nyikwa esau nokawo pinygi kendo pod gidakie nyaka chil kawuono joavim mane odak e mier matindo gaza jokaftor ema notieko mokawo pinygi modakie eka ruoth nyasaye nodhi nyime kowachone niya wuothuru mondo ungad holo mar arnon nimar asechiwo sihon jaamor ruodh heshbon e lwetu kaachiel gi pinye koro donjuru e pinye mondo uked kode chakre kawuono abiro miyo ogendni duto e piny ngima luorou ahinya kata ka giwinjo mana humbu gibiro kirni ka kihondko omakogi joisrael oloyo sihon kwan omiyo kane pod wan e thim kedemoth naoro joote ir sihon ruodh heshbon kakwaye gi ngwono niya yie mondo wakadh e pinyi wabiro luwo mana yo tir ok wabaro korachwich kata koracham bende wabiro ngiewo kuomu chiemo mwachamo kod pi mwamodho omiyo yienwa mondo wakadhi mana kaka nyikwa esau modak seir kod jomoab modak ar ne jo yienwa mwakadho bang mano wanyalo ngado jordan mondo wadonj e piny ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa miyowa kata kamano sihon ruodh heshbon nodagi miyowa thuolo mondo wakadhi nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nomiyo toke odoko matek mondo ochiwe kaachiel gi pinye e lwetu kendo uneno ka pinyno pod marwa nyaka chil kawuono kuom mano ruoth nyasaye nowachona niya biuru nikech koro adwaro chiwo sihon kaachiel gi pinye e lwetu monjeuru mondo ukaw pinye kamano sihon gi joge nowuok morado kodwa jahaz ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa nochiwe e lwetwa mi wanege kaachiel gi yawuote kod joge duto kinde nogono bende ema ne wakawoe mier mage duto mwaketho chuth kendo wanego ji duto mane odakie chwo gi mon kod nyithindo onge ngato kata achiel mane waweyo ka ngima jamni kaachiel gi gik mane wayako e mier mane waloyo kende emane wakawo onge dala mane nyalo sirowa chakre aroer e dho holo mar arnon kod dala man e holo hie nyaka chop gilead adier ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa ema nochiwo gik moko duto e lwetwa kata kamano nomako chik ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa gi chunyu duto mi ok umonjo piny joamon ji yo ka holo mar jabok kata mana gi yo ka miechgi manie gode rapar mar chik joisrael oloyo og ruodh bashan kwan bange ne wawuok mi wamako yo mochomo piny bashan eka og ruodh bashan kaachiel gi joge duto ne jowuok mondo oked kodwa edrei ruoth nyasaye nowachona niya kik uluor og nimar asechiwe kaachiel gi joge kod pinye e lwetu timneuru mana kaka nutimo ni sihon ruodh joamor mane odak heshbon kamano ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa nochiwo og ruodh bashan kaachiel gi joge e lwetwa mi ne wanegogi duto ok waweyo kata ngat achiel ka ngima e kindeno bende ne wakawoe gweng argob duto man e piny og ruodh bashan ne wakawo mier mage duto onge kata achiel mane odong ne gin mier piero auchiel mochiel motegno gi ohinga maboyo moketie dhorangeye man gi thipe kod lodi bende ne wakawo mier moko matindo mangeny ok ochiel dala ka dala ne wanegoe ji duto modakie chwo gi man kod nyithindo mana kaka watimo ni miech sihon ruodh heshbon jamni kod mwandu duto mane nie miego ne wayako kamano e kaka ne wakawo pinje mag ruodhi ariyo mag joamor mane ni loka jordan yo wangchieng chakre holo mar arnon nyaka got hermon josidon lwongo got hermon ni sirion joamor luonge ni senir ne wakawo mier duto manie piny gode motarore kaachiel gi piny gilead kod piny bashan nyaka saleka gi edrei miech og ruodh bashan og ruodh bashan kende ema nodong kuom jorefaim sandug liende molos gi kite maratenge pod ni raba dala joamor nyaka chil kawuono borne chiegni romo mita abich lachne mita ariyo joreuben gi jogad kod nu jomanase omi piny man yo wuokchieng mar jordan kwan kane wakawo pinyno ne apogo ni joreuben gi jogad piny man yo nyndwat mar arwer e bath holo arnon kod nu mar piny gode man gilead kaachiel gi mier duto mane ni kuno nu piny gilead komachielo kod bashan piny og napogo ni nu jomanase piny bashan duto niluongo ni piny jorefaim jair nyakwar manase nokawo gweng argob duto nyaka tong jogeshur gi jomaakath pod nitie mier moko e bashan kuno miluongo ni havothjair tiende ni miech jair napogo ni joka makir piny gilead joreuben gi jogad napogonigi piny mochakore gilead nyaka dier holo mar arnon kendo nyaka holo mar jabok motingo tong gi piny joamon kaachiel gi piny manie holo mar aora jirdan chakre nam galili nyaka nam araba miluonmgo ni nam kado man yo podhochieng mar got pisga e kinde nogono nachiko dhoudi ariyo gi nusgo kama ruoth nyasaye nyasachu osemiyou pinyni mondo obed mwanduu jolwenju duto nyaka dong e oganda lweny kendo otel e nyim joisrael weteu mak mana mondu gi nyithindu kod jambu ema mondo odong e mier masemiyougo angeyo ni un gi jamni mathoth ka ruoth nyasaye osekonyo oweteu kaka osekonmyou mi gikawo piny man loka jordan ruoth nyasaye nyasachu miyogi mi gidakie eka unyalo dok e piny asemiyouni ngato ka ngato e dalane chiengno bende nachiko joshua niya nuneno gi wangu gima ruoth nyasaye nyasachu notimo ni ruodhi ariyo kande ruoth nyasaye biro timo mana kamano ni pinje duto mubiro donjoe kusengado aora jordan kik uluorgi nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ema biro kedonu ruoth nyasaye ok oyie mondo musa odonj e piny kanaan chieng onogono nakwayo ruoth nyasaye niya ruoth nyasaye isechako nyisa duongni gi tekoni onge nyasaye moro amora e polo kata e piny tekone nyalo romo gi tekoni kata manyalo timo timbe madongo mitimogi akwayi ni yie angad jordan mondo aneye piny maber man loka cha kod piny gode mabeyo kaachiel gi piny lebanon ruoth nyasaye nokecho koda ahinya nikech gik musetimo omiyo notamore winjo kwayona nodwoka nioya mano oromo kik ichak iwuo koda kendo kuom wachno dhiyo ewi got pisga mondo irang yo nyandwat gi yo milambo kendo irang yo wuokchieng gi yo podhochieng inyalo mana neno pinyno gi wangi iwuon ok ningad jordan ket joshua mondo okaw kari ijiwe kendo imiye teko nimar en ema obiro telo ni
