orit chik musa nomedo wacho niya koro un joisrael winjuru chike gi buche apuonjou kendo umak eka unubed mangima kendo unudonj e piny ruoth nyasaye nyasach kwereu nomiu mudagie kik umed gimoro kuom gik achikou kata kik ugol gimoro kuomgi rituru chike mag ruoth nyasaye adimba mana kaka amiyougi nuneno gi wangu gima ruoth nyasaye nyasachu notimo baalpeor nonego jou moko duto mane lamo baal nyasach peor un mane upadoru kuom ruoth nyasaye nyasachu pod ungima uduto nyaka chil kawuono asepuonjou chike gi buche kaka ruoth nyasaye nyasacha nochika mago duto nyaka urit e piny mudhi donjoe kendo kawo ritgiuru adimba nimar mano biro nyiso ogendini mamoko ni uriek ka giniwinj chikegi eki giniwach niya onge oganda moro mariek ka oganda maduongni giniwach kamano nimar onge oganda moro kata bed ni oduong manade nyasache nyalo sudo machiegni kode kaka ruoth nyasaye sudo machiegni kodwa e sa asaya walame onge oganda moro kata bed ni oduong manade man gi chike kod buche makare machal gi chik aseketo e nyimu tinendeni musa oparo ni joisrael gima notimore horeb beduru kutang kendo neuru ni wiu ok owil gi gik museneno gi wangu kik uwe gia e chunyu ka pod ungima hulgiuru ni nyithindu kendo ni nyikwau nyaka uparnigi gik mane otimore chieng mane uchung horeb e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachu cha ka ruoth nyasaye wachona ni chokna ji e nyima ka mondo giwinj kawuoyo kodgi kendo gipuonjre luora e ngimagi duto nusudo machiegni mi uchung e tiend got got ne wang gi mach matundo e polo e mudho mandiwa gi rumbi kod ongwengo mopoto bange ruoth nyasaye noloso kodu gie majno muwinjo dwol mawuoyo ne ok uneno kit gimoro amora dwol kende ema nuwinjo nohulonu ratiro singruok koro notimo kodu kochikou mondo urit singruokno tiende ni rito chike apar mane ondiko kuom kite ariyo mopamore bende e sano ruoth nyasaye nochika ni mondo apuonju chike gi buche nyaka udhi urit e piny mudhi donjoe mondo ukauw osiem joisrael ni kik lam gik maket chieng mane ruoth nyasaye owuoyo kodu horeb gie mach ne ok uneno kit gimoro amora omiyo ritreuru matek ni kik udonj e richo mar loso kido maket bed ni en gima chal gi dichwo kata gi dhako kata mana machal gi chiayo kata gi winyo kata gi gima mol kata gi rech bende kungiyo polo muneno gik moko duto mantie kaka chieng gi due kod sulue kik gimoro ywau mondo ukulrunigi kata ulamgi gik kamago ruoth nyasaye osechiwo ni ogendini mamoko e piny duto ka gik gilamo un e oganda ruoth nyasaye nokawo mogolo misri e sand mager ka mach makakni ni mondo ubed joge owuon kaka pod un nyaka chil kawuono ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nokecho koda nikech un mi okuongore ni ok nangad aora jordan kata donjo e piny maber omiyou mondo obed maruno nyaka atho e pinyni mak angado jordan un ubiro dhi loka mondo ukaw piny maberno ritreuru mondo une ni wiu ok owil gi singruok mane ruoth nyasaye nyasachu osetimo kodu kik ulos kido moro amora maket kukethogo chik mar ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasachu en mach matieko gik mowango kendo en nyasaye janyiego ka usedak e pinyno aminga munywolo nyithindu gi nyikwau beduru motang mondo kik udonj e richo kuom loso kido moro amora maket koro aluongo polo gi piny mondo obed janeno ni ka timbeu obedo maricho e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kamano mokecho kodu unurum piyopiyo kendo ok nudag aminga e piny koro ungado jordan mondo udhi ukaw notieku chuth ruoth nyasaye noriembu kendo nokeu e kind ogendini mamoko mi nudong ji manok e kindgi kuondego unulamie nyiseche molos gi yien kata gi kidi ok nyal neno kata winjo wach kata chamo gimoro tik gimoro bende ok ginyal winjo kudwaro ruoth nyasaye nyasachu gi chunyu duto gi adiera kuonde moterouego unuyude mogik ka gigi otimorenu mi udonjo e masira unudog ir ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kendo unurit chikene ruoth nyasaye nyasachu en nyasaye mangwon omiyo ok nojwangu kata kethou ok nokethu kendo wiye ok nowil gi singruok notimo gi kwereu kokuongore koro penjuru ane gima notimore e higni machon ndalo mane pok onywolu chakre kinde mane nyasaye ochueyoe dhano e piny bende penjuru ane wach chakre tung piny nyaka tung piny ka gima duong kamano oseneye kata osewinjie bende nitie oganda moro mosewinjo dwond nyasaye kawuoyo gie mach kaka usewinjo kendo pod ngima koso nitie nyasaye moro mosetemo golo oganda moro kuom oganda machielo mane oselokogi wasumbni bende nyasaye moro osetimo timbe madongo gi ranyisi kod honni kokedo gi teko maduong kendo komiyo ji luoro kod kibaji ruoth nyasaye nyasachu notimonu gik kamago kogolou misri mana kuneno gi wangu mago duto ruoth nyasaye notimo mondo onyisu ni en nyasaye onge nyasaye moro mak mana en ne oyienu winjo dwonde gie polo mondo opuonjugo bende noyienu neno maye malich ei majno nohero kwereu moyiero nyikwagi omiyo en owuon nogolou misri gi tekone maduong kendo noriembo ogendini madongo kendo mohewou gi teko ni mondo udonj e pinygi kendo ukaw obed maru kaka pod en nyaka chil kawuono kuom mano koro beduru gi adiera kendo unge ni ruoth nyasaye en nyasaye kendo onge nyasaye moro e polo kata e piny emomiyo rituru buche kod chike nyasaye amiyou kawuono eka un kaachiel gi nyikwau unubed maber kendo unudag aminga e piny ruoth nyasaye nyasachu miyou mondo obed maru nyaka chieng miech tony man yo wuokchieng mar aora jordan bange musa noyiero mier adek e piny man yo wuokchieng mar aora jordan mondo obed kuonde ka ngato oboth monego wadgi yande ok gimonrego onyalo pondoe kochopo e achiel kuom miergo oreso ngimane miergo ne bezerethim manie piny gode motarore mane joreuben nyalo pondoe gi ramothgilead manie piny gilead mane jogad nyalo pondoe kod golan manie piny bashan mane jomanase bende nyalo pondoe hoho momanyore gi bethpeor e piny sihon ruodh amor modak heshbon musa gi joisrael noloyo ruodhno kane gisea misri mi ne gikawo pinye kaachiel gi piny og ruodh bashan ruodhigo ne mag joamor mane odak e piny man yo wuokchieng mar jordan pinyno nochakore aroer man e bath holo mar arnon nyaka got sirion bende iluongo ni hermon kaachiel gi piny pap duto man yo wuokchieng mar aora jordan nyaka nam kado gi wang gie mach ewi godno chutho nachung e kindu gi ruoth nyasaye e sechego mondo eka akownu weche ruoth nyasaye nikech nuluoro mach mi ne ok uidho godno ruoth nyasaye nowacho niya e ruoth nyasaye nyasachun nogolou e piny misri kuma ne ubedoe wasumbini kik ubed gi nyasaye moro mak mana kik ulos kido moro mopa kata gima chalo gi gimoro manie polo malo kata manie piny mwalo kata mana manie pi mae bwo piny kik ukulrunigi kata lamogi kik ulamgi nikech ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nyasaye janyiego akumo nyithind joma ochaya nikech richo jonywolgi nyaka tieng mar adek gi mar angwen tienge gana gi gana ruoth nyasaye kaka ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nochikou nyaka uti tijeu duto kuom ndalo auchiel chieng mar abiriyo en chieng yueyo mowal ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu chiengno un kaachiel gi yawuotu kod nyiu kata wasumbu machwo gi mamon kata ruethu kata kata kenjeu kata dhou kata mana jodak manie miechu kik ti tich moro mano en ni mondo wasumbu machwo gi mamon oyue kaka un bende uyueyo paruru malongo ni un uwegi ne un wasumbni e piny misri ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nogolou kuno gi teko mathoth kod bat morie mano emomiyo ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nochikou ni mondo urit sabato luor wuoru gi meru kaka ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nochikou eka mondo udag aminga kendo udhi maber e piny ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro miyou kik ineki kik iterri kik ikwal kik ihang ni ngato wach kik igomb chi ngato kata od ngato kata puoth ngato kata misumba ngato kata dher ngato kata kanj ngato kata gimoro amora mar ngato luoro omako joisrael wuok ruoth nyasaye nomiyou chikego ka uchokoru uduto e got noloso gi dwol maduong gie mach ei rumbi kod ongwengo mopoto eka noweyo wuoyo bange nondiko chikego e kite ariyo mopamore momiya kane uwinjo dwol ka wuok e mudho got wang jotend dhoutu gi jodongu nobiro ira mowachona niya ne ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa osenyisowa duongne maler gi tekone kendo wasewinjo dwonde kawuok ei mach omiyo koro wangeyo ni kara nyasaye nyalo wuoyo gi dhano mi dhano chak bed abeda mangima kata kamano kik wawit ngimawa nimar mach malich cha nyalo mana wangowa mi tiekwa kwachako wawinjo dwond ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa kendo wabiro tho nikech onge ngat moro amora mosewinjo dwond nyasaye mangima kawuok e mach kaka wasewinjo pod ngima ema inyalo sudo machiegni mondo iwinj weche duto ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa dhi wacho bange iduog iwachnwa gigo duto mowachoni eka wanawinjgi kendo wanamakgi ruoth nyasaye nowinjo gima nuwachona mokona niya asewinjo gima ji owachoni gin kare da ber ka gisiko gi chuny moluora kendo morito chikena duto eka mondo gin gi nyikwagi gidag maber nyaka chieng dhiyo kendo iwachnigi mondo gidog e hembegi dong koda ka mondo ahulni chike gi buche nyaka ipuonjgi girit e piny amiyogi mondo gidagie ruoth nyasaye nyasachu osemiyou chikegi omiyo ritgiuru maber luwuru yo ruoth nyasaye nyasachu osechikou mak ubaro koracham kata korachwich bange eka unubed maber kendo unudag aminga e piny udhi kawo rapar mar chik chik maduong moloyo koro magi e chike kod buche mane ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ochika mondo apuonju uriti e piny mubiro donjoe kendo kawo mondo obed maru e ngimau duto un kaachiel gi nyikwau nyaka uluor ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kendo urit buchene gi chikene amiyou kawuono bange eka unudag maber aminga omiyo un joisrael winjuru kendo rituru chikego mondo udag maber kendo unya e piny maber kendo momewno mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nyasach kwereu nosingorenu winjuru un joisrael ruoth nyasaye e nyasachwa en e ruoth nyasaye kendo en kende e nyasaye heruru ruoth nyasaye nyasachu gi chunyu duto gi parou duto kendo gi tekou duto chike amiyou kawuonogi kanuru e chunyu kendo puonjgiuru nyithindu bende twaguru kuomgi e mier kata kuwuotho e yo kata kudhi nindo kata kuchiew gokinyi tuegiuru ka ranyisi e lwetu kendo miengiuru e lend wangu ka kido bende ndikgiuru e sirni mag dhoutu kendo kuom rangeyeu osiem joisrael ni kik gitamre mako chik ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nokelu e piny mane osesingore ni kwereu ibrahim gi isaka kod jakobo ni nomiu en piny man gi mier mangeny madongo miwuoro mane ok ugero kod udi mopong gi kit gik moko duto mabeyo un ne ok uketoe en gi sokni mokuny e lwanda un ne ok ukunyo kod puothe mag olemb mzabibu kod mag zeituni mane ok upidho kusechiemo muyieng kik wiu wil gi ruoth nyasaye mane ogolou e piny misri kuma ne ubedoe wasumbni luoruru ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kendo utine ka ukuongoru nyaka ukuongru mana gi nyinge kik uluw nyiseche mag ogendini mokiewo kodu nikech kuluwogi ruoth nyasaye modak e dieru biro kecho kodu ahinya mi dotieku e wang piny nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasachu en nyasaye janyiego kik utem ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kaka nuteme ka un masa nyaka urit malongo chike ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kaachiel gi wechene kod buchene moko mane omiyou timuru gik makare kendo mabeyo e nyim ruoth nyasaye mondo udag maber mi udonj kendo ukaw opiny maber mane osesingore kokuongore ni kwereu obiro riembonu wasiku duto mondo owenu thuolo kaka nosingore e ndalo mabiro ka yawuotu nopenju ni weche gi buche kod chike mane ruoth nyasaye omiyou tiendgi ango nudwokgi niya ne wan wasumb farao e piny misri ruoth nyasaye nogolowa kuno gi teko maduong kendo nosando piny misri gi farao kod joge duto kokelonigi masiche madongo gi ranyisi kod honni kaka ne waneno nogolowa kuno mondo oterwa e piny mane osesingore ni kwerewa ni nomiwa ruoth nyasaye nochikowa ni mondo warit chikegi duto kendo ni mondo waluore eka dwadag maber ndalo duto kendo domed ritowa ka warito chikegi duto e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa obiro kwanowa ka joma kare rapar mar chik joisrael onego obed joma owal ni ruoth nyasaye wuok ka ruoth nyasaye nyasachu oterou mondo ukaw piny ubiro dhiyoeno noriembnu ogendini abiriyo madongo kendo marateke moloyou gin johiti gi jogirgash gi joamor gi jokanaan gi joperizi gi johivi kod jojebus kosechiwogi e lwetu kamano muloyogi nyaka uneggi duto kik utim kodgi winjruok bende kik uwe mak utiekogi kik uyie yawuotgi okend nyiu bende kik yawuotu kend nyigi nimar kutimo kamano nyigo nolok chuny yawuotu mondo kik lam ruoth nyasaye olam mana nyiseche mamoko mano dimi ruoth nyasaye kech kodu kendo tieku piyopiyo kuom mano onego utimnigi mana kama mukuru kendegi mag liswa kendo kethuru sirni maggi milamo mag kite gi mag yien mi uwang kido mag nyisechegi manono nimar un joma owal ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ruoth nyasaye nyasachu noyierou e kind ji duto mae piny mondo ubed ogandane moyiero uparo ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu noparou moyierou nikech ungeny moloyo ogendini mamoko duto koso ooyo ka adier un e oganda matinie moloyo noyierou mana nikech noherou kendo nikech norito singruok mane otimo ni kwereu mano emomiyo nogolou gi tekone maduong e piny mane unie wasumbini moresou e lwet farao ruodh misri omiyo koro ngeuru ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu en nyasaye en nyasaye jaadiera kendo marito singruokne kuom tienge gana gi gana mag jii mohere kendo momako chikene koherogi gi hera mosiko jogo mochaye kendo ok ohere otieko chuth piyopiyo ok odeko nyaka umak chikene gi buchene amiyou kawuononi kendo uritgi gueth miyudo kimako chik tim jolawi rapar mar chik kuwinjo chikegi kendo uritogi ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro rito singruok mane otimo gi kwereu kendo obiro siko koherou enoheru kendo enogwedhu mi enomi unya mathoth enoguedhu gi nyithindo mangeny kod gik manyak e pwotheu kaka ngano gi divai kod mo kendo enoguedhu gi jamni mangeny e piny nosingore ni kwereu ni nomiu unubed joma ogwedhi moloyo ogendini mamoko duto ok nobedie bwoch kata lur kuom jou kata kuom jambu ruoth nyasaye notiek tuoche duto kuomu bende ok nokelnu tuoche maricho mane goyou e piny misri wasiku ema nokelne tuochego tiekuru ji duto ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro chiwo e lwetu kik uwegi bende kik ulam nyisechegi nikech kutimo kamano mano dibednu obadho dipo ka uwacho niya ogendinigi ngeny mohingowa ere kaka dwariembgi kata kamano kik uluorgi paruru gik ruoth nyasaye nyasachu notimo ni farao kendo ni piny misri ngima paruru timbe madongo mane uneno gi wangu kod ranyisi gi honni kaachiel gi teko maduong mane ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ogolougo misri gi bat morie kamano e kaka obiro timo ni ogendini duto muluorogo bende obiro miyogi kihondko mondo otiek joma pod odong kata mago mopondo kamoro amora kik luoro maku kukedo kodgi nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasachu en nyasaye maduong kendo malich ni kodu obiro riembonu ogendinigo matintin nyaka girum ok unutiekgi dichiel nimar dipo ka ondiegi onywolore mangeny mothagou ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nochiw ogendinigo e lwetu kendo ok nowenigi thuolo nyaka chop girum te enochiw ruodhi mag ogedinigo e lwetu mi unumi kargi lal chuth kendo onge kata ngat achiel kuomgi nosiru unutiekgi pep nyaka uwang kido mag nyisechego manono kendo kik ugomb fedha gi dhahabu gibawogo nyisechegigo bende kik ukawgi kutimo kamano enobednu obadho nimar gigo gin gik makuero e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kik ukel gimoro amora makuero e miechu nikech kutimo kamano un bende unubed joma okwedi nyaka ubed mosin kod gik kamago kendo ukwangi ka gik makuero nikech gin gik nyaka utiek marum chuth rapar mar chik piny maber joisrael biro kawo nyaka urit chike duto amiyou kawuononi mondo ubed mangima mi unya kendo udonj e piny mane ruoth nyasaye osingore ni nomi kwereu odagie paruru wuoth mabor mane ruoth nyasaye nyasachu otelonue kuom higni piero angwen ka un e thim nodwokou piny kotemougo mondo onge ane ka unyalo rito chikene adier nodwokou piny kendo nomiyo kech okayou eka bange nomiyou manna mondo ucham en chiemo mane pok uneno kendo kwereu bende ne ok oneno notimo kamano mondo onyisugo ni dhano ok bed mangima nikech chiemo kende obedo mangima gi weche duto mawuok e dho ruoth nyasaye kuom higni piero angwen go duto lepu ne ok oti kata tiendu ne ok okuot nyaka unge ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ne rieyou mondo opuonju mana kaka ngato puonjo nyathine rituru chike ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mondo uwuoth e yorene kendo umiye duong nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasachu terou e piny maber motimo aore gi sokni kendo man gi kuonde pi wuokie ewi gode kendo e holni en piny machiego cham kaka ngano gi shairi kendo machiego mzabibu gi ngowo gi zeituni kod olembe mamoko bende mor kich ngenyie en piny unubedie gi chiemo mangeny kendo onge gima unuchandie bende en piny man gi kite miloso nyinyo mula bende unyalo kunyo e godene kusebedo gi chiemo mangeny moromou pakuru ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kuom piny maber mosemiyouno osiem joisrael ni kik wi nyasaye kik wiu wil gi ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kendo kik uwe rito chikene gi buchene amiyou kawuononi kusebedo gi chiemo mangeny moromou kendo usegero udi mabeyo mudakie mi jambu gi fethu gi dhahapu kod mwanduu duto omedore kik ubed josunga mi wiu wil gi ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mane ogolou misri kuma nubedoe wasumbni nimar notelonu e thim maduong kendo malich kuma otwo onge pi kendo thuonde man gi kwiri maricho kod thomoni opongo en ema nomiyo pi owuoknu e lwanda motegno bende nomiyou manna mane kwereu pok ongeyo mondo ucham e thim notimo kamano mondo odwokugo piny kotemou eka bange ogwedhu emomiyo kik uwach ni tekou gi riekou ema osemiyo uyudo mwandugo paruru ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nimar en ema omiyou teko mar yudo mwandu kamano ochopo singruok mane omiyo kwereu kokuongore kapo ni wiu owil gi ruoth nyasaye nyasachu muluwo nyiseche mamoko mi ulamogi kendo ukulorunigi akuongora kawuono ni natieku onge kiawa adier ka ok uluoro ruoth nyasaye nyasachu notieku mana kaka ogendini obiro tieko ka odonjo e pinyni rapar mar chik ruoth nyasaye biro tieko ogendini modak e piny kanaan winjuru un joisarel kawuono ubiro ngado jordan mondo udhi ukaw piny ogendini marateke kendo madongo moloyou kaachiel gi mier mochiel gi ohinga mochopo e polo gin joma dongo kendo maboyo nyikwa anakim kaka ungeyo nimar usewinjo ka iwacho niya ere joma nyalo siro nyikwa anakim ubiro ngeyo kawuono ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ema otelonu kachalo mach matieko gik mowango obiro tiekogi en owuon kendo obiro loyonugi kuom mano ubiro riembogi kendo tiekogi piyopiyo mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nosingorenu ka ruoth nyasaye nyasachu riembo jogo mondo owenu thuolo kik uwach ni timbeu mabeyo ema osemiyo ruoth nyasaye okelou e pinyni ok timbeu mabeyo kata dimbruok ungo ema omiyo ubiro donjo e piny jogo mondo ukaw en mana nikech richo mag ogendinigo emomiyo ruoth nyasaye nyasachu riembogi mondo giwenu thuolo kochopogo singruok notimo gi kwereu ibrahim gi isaka kod jakobo kuom mano koro ngeuru ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ok miu piny momewni nikech timbeu mabeyo nimar ka adier un joma tokgi tek joisrael onganyo ni ruoth nyasaye ka gin horeb wuok paruru wiu ok owil kaka numiyo ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mirima e thim chakre chieng ne uwuokie misri nyaka chieng mane uchopoe ka usebedo kutamoru winjo ruoth nyasaye nukwinye e got horeb mokecho kodu kendo odwaro tiekou noyudo ka asedhi ewi got mondo akaw kite mopamore mag singruok ruoth nyasaye otimo kodu mi ne abet ewi got kuno kuom ndalo piero angwen odiechieng gotieno ka ok achiem kata ok amadh gimoro eka ruoth nyasaye nomiya kite ariyo mopamore mondik gi lith lwete weche duto mane ruoth nyasaye owachonu gie mach ewi got chieng chokruok ondiki e kitego kane ndalo piero angwengo orumo ruoth nyasaye nomiya kite ariyo mopamore mag singruokgo kowachona niya lor piny piyopiyo ia e got nikech jou mane igolo misri osetimo marach piyopiyo nono giseweyo yo mane achikogi ni mondo giluw mi giloso kido mar dhahabu moleny mondo gilam bang mano ruoth nyasaye nowachona niya aserango jogi ayudo ni gin joma tokgi tek mondo atiekgi kendo ami nyinggi olal e piny duto bange anamiyi doko oganda maratego kendo maduong moloyogi kamano nawichora mi alor piny kaa ewi got mane oyudo wang ka atingo kite mopamore mag singruok e lweta naneno ni useketho e nyim ruoth nyasaye kuom loso kido mar nyaroya gi dhahabu moleny kendo ni piyopiyo nono useweyo yo mane ruoth nyasaye ochikou mondo uluw omiyo nakawo kite ariyo mopamorego mawito piny gi lwetena ariyo mi ne ginginyore matindotindo e nyimu eka nariera piny e nyim ruoth nyasaye kuom ndalo piero angwen odiechieng gotieno kaka nasetimo e kinde mokwongo mi ariyo kech ka ok achiem kata ok amadh gimoro nikech richo duto mane usetimo kuketho e nyim ruoth nyasaye kendo kumiye mirima naluoro mirima mager mar ruoth nyasaye mane chiegni tiekou ruoth nyasaye nochako owinjo ywakna ruoth nyasaye nokecho gi harun ahinya kendo nodwaro tieke e sano en bende ne alemone eka nakawo gima nukethogo en kido mar nyaroya mane uloso mi awango e mach ne atoye matindotindo mi arege molokore buru kendo nakawo buruno makiro e aora mamol koa e got bende numiyo ruoth nyasaye mirima ka un tabera gi masa kod kibrothhataava kendo kane un kadeshbarnea ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nowacho ni mondo udhi ukaw piny momiyou nudagi winjo wachne kendo ne ok ugeno kuome bende ne ok urito chikne usebedo kudagi ruoth nyasaye chakre chieng mokwongo mane angeyoue nariera piny e nyim ruoth nyasaye kuom ndalo piero angwen odiechieng gotieno nimar nosewacho ni odwaro tiekou nalamo ruoth nyasaye kakwaye niya ruoth nyasaye ruodha kik itiek jogi nimar gin mwanduni mane iwaro gi tekoni maduong mi igolo misri gi bat motegno par jotichni ibrahim gi isaka kod jakobo kendo kik idew wich teko gi kethruok kod richo mag jogi nikech ka ok kamano weg piny mane igolowae biro wacho niya ruoth nyasaye osetero joge e thim mondo otho kuno nikech osin kodgi kendo nikech ok onyal terogi e piny mane osesingore ni nomigi ruoth nyasaye jogo gin jogi kendo mwanduni iwuom mane igolo e piny misri gi tekoni maduong kod bat morie rapar mar chik kite ariyo mamoko wuok ruoth nyasaye nowachona niya pa kite ariyo machal gi mane igoyo piny mobarore kande mondo ibigo ira ewi got bende los sanduk mar bao weche mane andiko kuom kite mokwongo mane ibaro kande ema abiro ndiko kuom kitego kendo iniketgi e sandugno kuom mano naloso sanduk gi yiend shita kendo napayo kite ariyo machal gi mokwongo ka mi adhi ewi got katingo kite ariyogo e lweta ruoth nyasaye nondiko kuom kitego chike apar mane osewachonu gie mach ewi got chieng chokruok mana kaka nosendiko e kite mokwongo ka mi nomiyagi eka nadwogo iru kaa ewi got mi aketo kitego ei sanduk mane aloso kaka ruoth nyasaye nochika kendo gisebedo kanyo nyaka chil kawuono joisrael noa e gweng sokni mag jojaakan mi giwuotho matintin ka gidhi mosera eka harun notho moyike kuno mi eleazar wuode nodoko jadolo kare ne gia kuno mi gidhi gudgoda eka ne gia gudgoda mi gidhi jotbatha piny motimo aore e kindego ruoth nyasaye nowalo jo dhood lawi mondo obed joting sandug muma mare kendo obed jodolo mage ka giguedho ji e nyinge mana kaka pod gitimo nyaka chil kawuono mano emomiyo jolawi onge gi piny mopognigi ka mwandugi kaka opog ni dhout israel mamoko ruoth nyasaye nyasachu owuon e mwandugi mana kaka nosesingorenigi nabet ewi got kuom ndalo piero angwen odiechieng gotieno mana kaka nasetimo mokwongo mi ruoth nyasaye nochako owinjo kwayona moyie ni ok obi tiekou nowachona niya chak wuoth kitelo ni ji mondo gidhi gikaw piny mane asingora ni nami kweregi gik nyasaye dwaro kuom joge koro un joisrael ango ruoth nyasaye nyasachu dwaro kuomu donge odwaro mana ni mondo uluore kendo uwuoth e yorene duto kuhere kendo kutiyone gi chunyu duto ubiro timo kamano kurito chikene gi buchene duto amiyou kawuono mondo okonyu ruoth nyasaye nyasachu e wuon polo duto kata polo man malo manadi kaachiel gi piny bende kod gik moko duto manie iye kata kamano ruoth nyasaye ne pod rito kwereu nikech noherogi mi banggi noyiero mana un nyikwagi kuom ogendini moko duto mondo ubed joge kaka pod ubet nyaka chil kawuono kuom mano koro nyaka uyie mako singruok gi chunyu duto kendo kik umed bedo joma tokgi tek nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasachu en nyasaye moloyo nyiseche duto kendo ruoth moloyo ruodhi duto en nyasaye maduong kendo malich miwuoro en kende e nyasaye miluoro ok dew wang ngato kendo ok cham asoya ongado bura kare ni mond liete kendo ni nyithi kiye ohero jodak kendo omiyogi chiemo gi lewni omiyo un bende onego uher jodak man kuomu nimar un bende ne un jodak e piny misri nyaka uluor ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kendo ulame gi chunyu duto bende kukuongoru mana gi nyinge en ema nyaka upake nimar en nyasachu mosetimonu timbe madongo kendo malich useneno gi wangu kane kwereu odhi misri ne gin mana ji piero abiriyo kende koro ruoth nyasaye osemiyo unya ka sulue mae polo rapar mar chik duong mar ruoth nyasaye heruru ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kendo nyaka urit chikene gi buchene ndalo duto kawuono paruru puonj mane uyudo kuom ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nimar kata obedo ni nyithindu pok oneno kata pok ongeyo puonjno un ungeye bende paruru duong mar ruoth nyasaye gi tekone kod bade morie gi ranyisi kod timbe mane otimo e piny misri kosandogo farao kaachiel gi pinye duto donge nuneno gima notimo gi jolwenj misri gi faresegi kod gechegi kane oyudo gilawou nomiyo pi nam makwar oimogi motiekogi pep bende paruru gik mane otimonu e thim nyaka nuchopo kaeri kod gima notimo ni dathan kod abiram yawuot eliab jareuben kendo kaka piny nongamo dhoge momwonyogi kaachiel gi joodgi gi hembegi kod ji duto mane gingo mana ka joisrael duto neno un uwegi useneno timbe madongo kendo malich ruoth nyasaye osetimo gueth joisrael biro yudo e piny kanaan nyaka urit chike duto amiyou kawuono mondo ubed gi teko kendo ukaw piny ubiro donjeno kamano unudag aminga e piny maber kendo momew mane ruoth nyasaye osingore ni nomi kwereu gi nyikwagi piny ubiro donjoe mondo udagieno ok chal gi piny misri kuma ne uaye nimar kuno kane usechwoyoe cham bange nusombo pi uole mana kaka itimo ni puoth alot piny udonjoe mondo udagieno en piny motimo gode gi holni kendo en piny koth ruoth nyasaye nyasachu rito pinyno maber kendo orange pile pile e higa ngima omiyo kurito chike amiyou kawuonogi mi uhero ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kendo utiyone gi chunyu duto enokelnu koth e ndalo chwiri gi ndalo opon mondo uyud cham gi mzabibu kod mo enomi lum lodhi e legeu mondo jambu ocham kendo un bende unuyud chiemo moromou ritreuru mondo kik ulal mi uti ni nyiseche moko kendo ulamgi kutimo kamano mirimb ruoth nyasaye noliel kuomu ka mach mi enomi koth rum piny ok nochieg cham kendo karu nolal nono piyopiyo e piny momew ruoth nyasaye nomiuno kanuru wechegi e chunyu kutueyogi ka ranyisi e lwetu kendo kuketogi e lend wengeu ka kido puonjuru nyithindu wechegi kendo twaguru kuomgi ka un e mier kata kuwuotho e yo kata kudhi nindo kata kuchiew ndikgiuru e sirni mag dhoutu kendo kuom rangeyeu mondo un gi nyithindu udag aminga e piny ruoth nyasaye nosingore ni nomi kwereu obed maru nyaka chieng ka urito chike amiyougi adimba mi uhero ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kendo uwuotho e yorene duto kuketo chunyu kuome obiro riembonu ogendinigo mondo owenu thuolo mi unukaw pinje mag ogendini madongo kendo marateke moloyou kamano kamoro amora tiendu onyono nobed maru kendo mbap pinyu nochakre e thim yo milambo nyaka piny lebanon yo nyandwat kendo chakre aora yufrate yo wuok chieng nyaka nam mediterania yo podho chieng onge kata ngato achiel nonyal sirou kendo ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nomi ji luorou mi kibaji nogogi kuonde duto mudhiye mana kaka nosingorenu kawuono aketo gueth kod kuong e nyimu ka urito chike mag ruoth nyasaye nyasachu amiyou kawuono ubiro yudo gueth ka ok uritogi mi ubaro kuweyo yo asechikou kawuono mondo uluw mulamo nyiseche mamoko ok ungeyo ubiro yudo kuong ka ruoth nyasaye nyasachu oseterou e piny mudhiye mondo ukaw obed maru uhul weche gueth e got gerizim weche mag kuong uhul e got ebal godego ni yo podho chieng mar aora jordan kama omanyore gi gilgal yadh e yo mochiko piny jokanaan koro uchiegni ngado aora jordan mondo udonj e piny ruoth nyasaye nyasachu miyou mondo ukaw obed maru ka usekawe mudakie nyaka une ni urito chike gi buche amiyou kawuononi yasachu osetieko ogendini udonjo e pinygi mi ukawo kargi kendo udak e pinyno beduru kutang mondo kik uluw timbegi nono gilokorenu obadho ka osetiekgi mi giweyonu thuolo kamano kik upenjru ni ere yo mane ogendinigi lamoe nyisechegi mondo wan bende watim mana machal kamano kamano kik ulam ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kaka gilamo nyisechegi nikech ruoth nyasaye mon gi timbe makuero gilamogo nyisechegi nimar gise kata mana wango ni nyisechegigo yawuotgi gi nyigi ka misango neuru ni urito gik moko duto machikou kik umedie gimoro kata kik ugolie gimoro rapar mar chik ka jakor wach kata jalek moro ohonore e kindu mokoro ni ranyisi kata hono moro biro timore mi ranyisi kata hono mowuoyeno otimore kendo bange owachonu ni mondo udhi uluw nyiseche mamoko ok ungeyo kendo ulam kik uwinj wachne ruoth nyasaye nyasachu temou mondo onge ane kuhere gi chunyu duto luwuru ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kumiye duong kendo kurito chikene winjuru gima owacho kendo lameuru kupadoru kuome nyaka neg jakor wachno kata jalekno nimar osewuoyo marach kodwaro ni mondo utamru winjo wach ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mane oresou kagolou misri kama nubedoe wasumbni ngatno osetemo witou mondo uwe yo mane ruoith nyasaye nyasachu ochikou mondo uluw kunege kamano eka unugol richo kama kuomu ka owadu hie kata wuodi kata nyari kata chiegi mihero kata mana osiepni migeno osemi lingling kawachoni ni mondo idhi ilam nyiseche mamoko ok ingeyo kata kwereni bende ne ok ongeyo gin nyiseche mag ogendini moluorou bed ni gin mabor kata machiegni kik iyie kata mana winjo wachne kik iwinji nyaka inege anega mak iweye kata ikeche kata ichwake ema nyaka ikwong keto lweti kuome eka bange jou duto nokonyi nege unugoye gi kite nyaka otho nimar notemo hoyou mondo uwe ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mane ogolou misri kuma nubedoe wasumbni joisrael duto nowinj wachno mi ginidok maluor kendo gima rach makamano ok nochak otimre kuomu kuwinjo ni joweteu acheje osehoyo joma odak e dala moro ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro miyou mondo udagie ka giwachonigi ni mondo gidhi gilam nyiseche mamoko un ok ungeyo nonuru wachno matut koyud ni gima kuero kamano osetimore kuomu adier nyaka uneg joma odak e dalano duto kaachiel gi dhok kendo uketh chuth gik moko duto manie dalano nyaka uchok mwandu duto mag dalano kanyakla kendo uket e laru manie dier dalano eka uwang dala duto kaachioel gi gik moko duto manie iye ka misango miwango pep ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu dalano ok noger kendo nodong gunda nyaka chieng kik ukaw gimoro kata achiel kuom gik monego keth chuthgo eka mirima mager mar ruoth nyasaye norum mi notimnu ngwono kendo nomi unya kaka nosingore ni kwereu ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro timo kamano kuwinjo dwonde kendo urito chikene amiyou kawuono kendo kutimo gik malongo e nyime rapar mar chik kit ywak ruoth nyasaye ok dwar un e nyithind ruoth nyasaye nyasachu omiyo kik usar dendu kata kik uliel nyiem wengeu kuywago ngat motho nikech un joma ler mowal ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ruoth nyasaye noyierou kuom ogendini duto manie piny mondo ubed joge owuon le joisrael nyalo chamo gi mago makuergi tim jolawi kik ucham gimoro makuero jamni gi le munyalo chamo e magi dhiang gi rombo gi diel gi nyakech gi ogunde gi ngawo gi diend thim gi puro gi omoro kod nyambaja unyalo chamo kit jamni gi kit le duto ombonggi opogore ariyo kendo nyamo kambula mak mana ni kik ucham mago nyamo kambula ombonggi ok opogore ariyo kata mago ombonggi opogore ariyo ok nyam kambula kaka ngamia gi apuoyo kod terere mago nyamo kambula ombonggiu ok opogore omiyo nyaka ukwangi ka gik makuero mbidhi bende kik ucham nikech kata ombongne opogore kamano ok onyam kambula omiyo en gima kuero kik ucham lego kata mulogi kik umulgi ka gisetho unyalo chamo rech duto man gi thuokgi kata man gi kagahla kik ucham rech moro amora maonge gi gigo nimar ka en kamano en gima kuero unyalo chamo winy duto ok kuero mago kuero kik ucham e magi ongo gi koga gi kwasi gi kalamindi gi okunekune gi otenga gi winy machal kamago kod kit agak duto gi udo gi nyatawo gi okok kod kit olith duto gi tula matin gi tula maduong kod tula ite dongo gi mbusi gi achuth gi osou kod nyamnaha gi kit nganga duto gi cherwa kod oliktik gik mahuyo mangeny kanyakla gin gik makuero omiyo kik uchamgi unyalo chamo gik mahuyo ok kuero kik ucham gima otho kende nimar un joma ler mowal ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu gima kamano unyalo miyo jopinje mamoko modak kodu mondo ocham kata unyalo ngiewe gi jopinje mamoko kutedo nyadiel kik uolie cha min mare chike mag chiwo mar achiel kuom apar higa ka higa nyaka uket tenge achiel kuom apar mag gik moko duto monyak e puotheu kaka cham gi divai gi mo kaachiel gi nyithind jambu duto mokwong nywol chamgiuru e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kama obiro yiero mondo nyinge obedie kamano ubiro puonjoru luoro ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ndalo duto ka ruoth nyasaye nyasachu oseguedhou gii gik mangeny kendo ngatu moro odak mabor gi kama ruoth nyasaye biro yierono ok onyal tingo gigo motundgo kuno onyalo lokogo pesa moter kuno kosetundo kuno onyalo ngiewo gima ohero gi pesago bed ni en ring dhiang kata ring rombo divai kata kongo unuchiem kuno gi joodu kumor e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachu dhiuru gi jolawi modak kodu ni mar dhood lawi ok opogne piny kaka opognu bang higni adek ka higni adek keluru achiel kuom apar mag gik monyaknu e higano kendo uket e dhorangeyeu mondo jolawi onge gi piny mopognigi kod jopinje mamoko gi nyithindo kiye kod mond liete modak kodu oyud chiemo moromogi kutimo kamano nyasaye noguedh gik moko duto mutimo rapar mar chik higa miweyoe gope bang higni abiriyo ka higni abiriyo nyaka uwe gopeu duto ji nigo unuwegi kama ngato ka ngato nyaka gope jaisrael owadgi oseholo kuome ok nochune mondo ochul nikech higa ruoth nyasaye oketo mondo oweyee gope osechopo jo pinje mamoko unyalo chuno mondo ochul gope gingo gopeu joisrael weteu nigo nyaka uwenigi kuluoro ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kendo urito chikene amiyougi jochan ok nobedie kuomu e piny omiyou mondo obed mwanduu ruoth nyasaye nyasachu noguedhu ahinya ka ruoth nyasaye nyasachu oseguedhou kaka nosingore ni notim ji moa e pinje mangeny biro holo gik moko kuomu un ok nuhol gimoro kuomgi pinje mangeny nobed e bwo lochu un ok nubed e bwo lochgi kapo ni nitie joisrael weteu moko jochan e dalau moro e piny ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro miyou kik iu bed makwar mutamru konyogi ubednigi mangwon mi uholgi gimoro amora gichando kata dabed ni higa mar abiriyo miweyoe gope chiegni chopo kik ubed gi ich lit mutamru miyogi gimoro jogo diywag ni ruoth nyasaye mi dubed joricho nyaka umigi gik gidwarogo mabup kendo gi chuny maler kutimo kamano ruoth nyasaye biro guedhou kuom gik moko duto mutimo pile ubiro bedo gi jochan e pinyu mano emomiyo achikou ni mondo ubed mangwon ni joisrael weteu jochan kata manie chandruok chike mag rito wasumbni wuok ka ingiewo jahibrania wadu dichwo kata dhako mondo obed misumbani enotini kuom higni auchiel e higa mar abiriyo nyaka iweye odhi kik iweye odhi gi lwete nono mak ikowe mabup gi jamni kod cham gi divai bed ne mangwon mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nyasachu osebedoni mangwon paruru ni ne un wasumbni e piny misri ruoth nyasaye nyasachu noresou mano emomiyo amiyou chikni ka misumbanino ohero dak kodi mi owacho ni ok odwar weyo dalani nikech oheri kaachiel gi joodi ikaw riw ituchgo ite kitenoe dhoot eka nobed misumbani kuom ngimane duto chikno oriwo koda ka misumba dhako bende kapo ni iweyo ni misumba thuolo odhi onge gima inyalo ywago nimar ka dine indiko jatich dine ichulo msara nyadiriyo moloyo ting mane ikawo kirito misumbano kamano ruoth nyasaye nyasachu noguedh gik moko duto mitimo chike mag walo jamni makayo waluru kach jambu machwo duto ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kik uket ruedhi jou okuongo nywolo e tich bende kik ungad yie imbe rombu okuongo nywolo giga ka giga nyaka utergi kuma ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro yiero mondo uchamgi kaachiel gi jouteu e nyim ruoth nyasaye kuno ka chiayo moro nigi songa kata ka osuto kata ka en muofu kata ka en gi mbala moro marach manade kik timgo misango ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu unyalo chame e miechu joma ogak kaachiel gi joma ok ogak nyalo chamo ringono mana ka gima en ring ogunde kata ring mwanda remo kik ucham oleuru piny mana ka pi rapar mar chik sewniu adek madongo wuok nyaka utim sap pasaka e due mar abib nimar dueno ema ne ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ogolou e misri gotieno nyaka uneg nyarombo kata nyadiel kata nyaroya kutimogo misango mar pasaka ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kama obiro yiero mondo nyinge obedie kik ucham sawono gi makati moketie thowi kuom ndalo abiriyo unucham mana makati ok ketie thowi en ranyisi mar sandruoku nikech nuwuok misri kurikni mano nobednu rapar mochwere muparogo chieng mane uwuokie misri kik ubed gi thowi kamoro amora e pinyu kuom ndalo abiriyogo bende ring chiayo muyango godhiambo e odiechieng mokwongo mar sawo kik nind nyaka okinyi mak uwango pep kik uyang jamni mag pasaka e mier ruoth nyasaye nyasachu dwaro miyou mak mana kama obiro yiero mondo nyinge obedie nyaka uyanggi godhiambo ka chieng podho e sa mane uwuokie misri nyaka uted ringgi kendo ucham kama ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro yiero kinyne nyaka udog e miechu chamuru makati ok ketie thowi kuom ndalo auchiel chieng mar abiriyo nyaka ubed gi chokruok kaka ruoth nyasaye nyasachu dwaro kendo kik uti tich moro amora chiengno kwanuru jumbe abiriyo chakre ndalo michako kayoe cham bang jumbego nyaka utim sap jumbe kaka ruoth nyasaye nyasachu dwaro kukelo chiwo ngato golo kuom dwarone maromre gi gueth ruoth nyasaye nyasachu guedhougo un kaachiel gi yawuotu kod nyiu gi wasumbu machwo kod mamon gi jolawi modak e miechu gi jopinje mamoko gi nyithindo kiye kod mond liete modak kodu nubed mamor e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kama obiro yiero mondo nyinge obedie paruru ni ne un wasumbni e piny misri mano emomiyo nyaka une ni urito chikego kusetieko kayo ngano kendo pono mzabibu nyaka utim sap kiche kuom ndalo abiriyo unutim sawono gi mor kaachiel gi yawuotu gi nyiu kod wasumbu machwo gi mamon gi jolawi kod jopinje mamoko gi nyithi kiye kod mond liete modak kodu nyaka utime ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kaka obiro yiero nimar unubed mamor ka ruoth nyasaye nyasachu oguedho gik monyak e puotheu kod gik moko duto mutimo jou machwo duto nyaka bi e nyim ruoth nyasaye didek e higa ka higa mondo otim sewni adekgo kama ruoth nyasaye biro yiero gin sap makati ok ketie thowi gi sap jumbe kod sap kiche onge ngat nobi e nyim nyasaye gi lwete nono ngato ka ngato nyaka kel gima romre gi gueth ruoth nyasaye nyasachu oseguedhego chike mag ndalo bura unuyier jangad bura kod jotend dhoutu e mier duto ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro miyou kendo nyaka gingad ni ji bura kare kik ungad buch amwor kata buch nyakonchiel bende kik ucham asoya nimar asoya mono kata mana ngat mariek wacho adiera kendo wito buch ngat onge ketho nyaka une ni uluwo mana adiera kende kutimo kamano unudag aminga e piny ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro miyou kik upidh yath moro amora milamo kendomarmisango mubiro gero ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kata kik uchung siro milamo nimar gin gik ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ok dwar rapar mar chik kik utim misango ni ruothn nyasachu gi rwath kata rombo kata diel man gi mbala kata songa nikech gima kamano en kuero e nyim ruoth nyasaye kapo ni unwango ngat dichwo e dala moro amora ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro miyou kotimo gima rach e nyim ruoth nyasaye mi oketho singruok kendo odagi chikna kolamo kendo okulore ni nyiseche mamoko kata ni wangchieng kata ni due kata ni gimoro amora manie kor polo nyaka unon wachno maber ka ofweny malongo ni gima rach kamano osetimore adier e israel nyaka ukel ngat motimo kamano e dhoranga dala mi ugoye gi kite nyaka otho kata da bed ni en dhako kata en dichwo kik ungad ni ngato buch tho ka nitie mana janeno achiel kende unyalo ngadone buch tho mana ka nitie joneno ariyo kata adek joneno ema nyaka kwong goyo ngat kamano gi kite eka ji duto bende nogoye kamano e kaka unupwodhru kuom richo kamano kapo ni unwango buche matek ok unyal ngado nyaka udhi piyopiyo kama ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro yiero buchego nyalo bet mag nek kata mag laro gimoro kata mag gorruok unudhi ir jodolo jolawi man kuno kendo ir jangad bura muyudo ka nie tich kuno mondo unyisgi wachno kendo gin ema giningad bura gima giwachonu kama ruoth nyasaye biro yierono ema nyaka utim nyaka une ni utimo mana kaka giwachonu ok uweyo kata matin ngato angata modagi wach jadolo matiyo ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kanyo kata modagi wach jangad bura nyaka negi kamano e kaka unupwodh joisrael kuom richo kamano kutimo kamano ji duto nowinj wachno mi ginibed maluor kendo onge ngat nochak otim wichteko chike mag tich ruoth ka usedonjo e piny ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro miyou mondo ukaw udagie mi uparo ni mondo uket ruoth oritu kaka ogendini duto moluorou timo nyaka uket mana ngat ruoth nyasaye nyasachu noyiernu ngat uketo ruothno nyaka bed mana jaisrael wadu kik uket ngat ok jaisrael kik ruodhno bed gi farese mangeny bende kik oor joisrael misri mondo oomne farese moko ni eka omed bedo gi farese mangeny nimar ruoth nyasaye nokwerou ni kik udog kuno kendo ngang kik obed gi mon mathoth nikech mano dipo koketho parone mwandu bende kik obedgo mangeny kosekete ruoth nyaka ondik weche duto mag chik kogologi e kitap chik jadolo jolawi nigo nyaka obed gi kitabuno kendo nyaka osome pile e ndalo duto mag ngimane mondo opuonjrego luoro ruoth nyasaye nyasache korito chike gi buchego duto kotimo kamano ok nosungre ni jowadgi kendo ok nowe mak orito chikego kata matin bange en kaachiel gi nyikwaye ginibed ruodhi mag israel aminga rapar mar chik pok jodolo gi jolawi yudo jodolo jolawi tiende ni dhood lawi duto ok noyud pinygi giwegi kaka dhout israel mamoko ginibed ka giyudo pokgi mana kuom misengni motim ni ruoth nyasaye kendo kuom dir mwandu muchiwo ni ruoth nyasaye kaka ok giniyud piny mopognigi ka mwandugi ruoth nyasaye owuon ema nobed mwandugi kaka nosingore ka ji timo misango gi rwath kata gi rombo kata gi diel nyaka gimi jadolo bat gi lem duto kod chino kaka lembgi bende nyaka umigi cham mukwongo kayo gi divai mukwongo loso gi mor zeituni mokwongo nyak kaachiel gi yie rombu mukwongo ngado nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasachu oseyierogi kuom dhoutu duto mondo gin kaachiel gi nyikwagi giti e nying ruoth nyasaye nyaka chieng ka jalawi moro modak e achiel kuom miech israel obiro kuom herone kama ruoth nyasaye biro yiero mi otiyo tich dolo e nying ruoth nyasaye nyasache kaka jolawi wetene tiyo e nyim ruoth nyasaye kanyo nyaka oyud pok maromre kodgi ka ok okwan mwandu monego ocham e dala wuon mare nyasaye osiemo joisrael ni kik giluw timbe ogendini mamoko kusedonjo e piny ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro miyou kik upuonjru luwo timbe makuero mag ogendini mamoko modak e pinyno kik uyie ni ngato kuomu wang wuode kata nyare ka gir misango bende kik bedie jakor kata jambofwa kata jadil kata jandagla kata ajuok nyakalondo kata japenj jochiende wach joma kamago ruoth nyasaye okwedo kendo timbegi makuerogo ema omiyo ruoth nyasaye nyasachu riembo ogendinigo mondo owenu thuolo ruoth nyasaye nyasachu dwaro mondo utine gi chunyu duto nyasaye osingore ni nomi joisrael janabi machal gi musa ogendini ubiro kawo pinygigo oyie gi weche jombofwa kod weche jokor un ruoth nyasaye nyasachu okwerou ni kik utim gik kamago ruoth nyasaye nyasachu noyier janabi moro ka kuom jou uwegi kendo nyaka uwinj wachne mano e gima nukwayo ruoth nyasaye nyasachu chieng mane uchokore horeb kuwacho niya owinjore kik wachak wawinj duond ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa bende ok onego wachak wane mach maduong kama kendo nono wabiro tho eka ruoth nyasaye nowachona niya gima giwachono ni kare abiro yieronigi janabi kaka kuom ogandagi giwegi abiro keto wechena e dhoge kendo enowachnigi weche duto achike ngato angata modagi winjo wachna janabino wacho noyal janabi nohedhre wacho wach moro e nyinga ok achike ni mondo owachi kata nowuo e nying nyiseche mamoko nyaka negi e kaka unyalo ngeyo wach ok oa kuom ruoth nyasaye ka janabi owacho wach moro e nying ruoth nyasaye bange wachno ok ochopo kare mano nyiso ni ok en wach ruoth nyasaye osewuoyo mana gi tekone owuon omiyo kik umiye duong rapar mar chik miech tony kwan joshua ka ruoth nyasaye nyasachu osetieko ogendini obiro miyou pinygi udakie unuyier mier adek manie pinyno poguru pinyno didek kendo ulosie yore mondo ka ngato onego wadgi nyalo luwo kadhi tony e achiel kuom miego ngat moboth monego wadgi ok gimonrego ema nyalo ringo dhi kuno mondo ore ngimane ranyisi mar nek moboth kamano chal kama ngato nyalo dhi e bungu gi wadgi mondo otong yien ka onyigore gi le kongudo mi wi le obwodhore oa e loge mogoyo wadgino monego ngatno nyalo ringo dhi e achiel kuom miego mondo ore ngimane ka ok uloso yorego kata ka miego bor gi kar nek ngat dwaro chulo kuor dipo kolawo janek ka pod mirimbe liet mi ojuke kendo onege chutho janekno ok owinjore negi nikech ne ok gimonre gi wadgi mane onegono mano emomiyo achikou mondo uyier mier adek kapo ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu oyaro pinyu mi omiyou piny duto mane osingore ni kwereu ni nomiu nyaka umed yiero mier moko adek kuom mago adier enomiu pinyno kuketo chunyu kuom rito chik amiyou kawuononi mi uhero ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kuwuotho e yorene pile kuyiero miego remb joma onge ketho ok nochuer e piny ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro miyou obed mwanduu kendo richo mar chuero remo ok nobed kuomu ka ngato nigi sigu gi wadgi mi obutone eka opoye kendo ogoye motho mi bange oringo odhi e achiel kuom miego jodong dalagi nyaka ji moko mondo oome mi kete e lwet owadgi jal monegono mondo onege ka chulonego kuor kik ukeche nyaka ugol ketho mar chuero remb ngat ok oketho oko kuom piny israel kamano unudag maber kiepe machon ka udak e lowo mubiro yudo e piny ruoth nyasaye nyasacu dwaro miyou kik ngato kuomu gol kidi kwereu noketo manyiso kiepe gi wadgi chik moket ni joneno wach janeno achiel kende ok nyal mi ngad ni ngato bura kuom ketho moro kata kuom richo moro wach nyaka ngere malongo e nyim joneno ariyo kata adek ka ngato obedo janeno mar miriambo mana ni mondo ohiny wadgi kuom ketho moro ji ariyogo nyaka chung e nyim ruoth nyasaye kendo e nyim jodolo gi jongad bura jongad bura nyaka non wachno matut ka giyudo ni janenono hango ni wadgi wach nyaka utimne mana kaka odwaro timo ni wadgino mano e kaka unupwodhru kuom richo kamano bange jou moko duto nowinj wachno mi ginidok maluor kendo gima rach kamano ok nochak otimre kuomu kik ukech jaketho ngima nyaka chul kar ngima wang kar wang lak kar lak lwedo kar lwedo kendo tielo kar tielo rapar mar chik chike mag lweny kudhi kedo gi wasiku muneno ogandagi ka duong moloyo maru kendo nigi farese kod geche lweny kik uluorgi nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nogolou misri ni kodu ka uchiegni rado kodgi jadolo nowuogi e nyim ogandau mar lweny kendo nowach niya un joisrael winjuru kawuono uyuoro machiegni mondo uked gi wasigu kik chunyu nyosre kendo kik uluor kibaji bende kik gou kuneno wasikugo nikech ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ema dhi kodu mondo okednu kendo olonu wasigu jodongo bende nowach ni jolweny niya ka ngat moro kuomu osegero ot manyien pok orwako onego odog dala nimar dipo ka otho e lweny mi ngat machielo ema orwako odno kata ngat mosepidho mzabibu pok ochamo olembgi bende onego odog dala nimar dipo ka otho e lweny mi ngat moro nono ema ochamo olembego bende ka nitie ngato mosenywomo nyako pok okawo onego odog dala nimar dipo ka otho e lweny mi ngat moro ema okawo chiege jodongo nomed wuoyo gi jolweny kawacho niya bende kapo ni nitie ngama luor kata chunye onyosore onego odog dala nikech dipo ka omiyo jowetene obedo maluor ka en ka jodongo osetieko wuoyo eka noket jotend lweny kuchopo machiegni gi dala mudhi kedogo penjuru jodalano ka gidwaro timo kodu winjruok mar kue ka giyie timo kodu winjruok mi giyawonu dhoranga dala nyaka uchun ji duto munwango dalano e mondo otinu ka gidagi timo kodu winjruok mi gichako kedo kodu lworuru dalano kendo ka ruoth nyasaye nyasachu okete e lwetu nyaka uneg chwo duto man kanyo unyalo kawo mon gi nyithindo kendo yako jamni kod gik moko duto manie dalano mi ukonyru gi gik ruoth nyasaye oseketo e lwetugo kaka uhero timuru kamano ni mier duto man mabor gi pinyu mak mana miech ogendini mokiewo kodu ema kik utimnigi kamano e miech ogendini ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro miyougo kik uweyee kata gimoro achiel ka ngima johiti gi joamor gi jokanaan gi joperizi gi johivi kod jojebus nyaka utiek chuth kaka ruoth nyasaye nyasachu osechiko timuru kamano mondo kik gipuonju luwo timbegi makuero gitimo ni nyisechegi nimar timbe kamago gin richo e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ka uselworo dala moro kuom kinde malach mondo ukaw kik utong yiend dalano mi ukethi unyalo mana chamo olembgi kik utonggi nimar yath ok en dhano unyalo kedogo unyalo ngado kata tongo yien ungeyo ni olembgi ok cham mi ugergo raidhi kod gi lweny mamoko mondo umonjgo dala mukedogo nyaka ukaw rapar mar chik gima itimo kuom wach nek ka janek ok oyudi ka oyud ringre ngat motho ka oriere e pap e piny ruoth nyasaye nyasachu dwaro miyou ngat monege ok onge jodongu gi jou jongad bura nyaka dhi opim bor mae kind kama ringruokne nitie gi miech gwengno mondo onge ni ere dala machiegni gi kanyo jodong dala machiegni gi ringruokno nyaka yier nyaroya pok otiyo tich moro kata pok oywayo jok ginikele e holo moro ok pur man gi aora ok dwon kendo ginitur ngute kanyo jodolo jolawi bende nyaka bedie nikech ruoth nyasaye nyasachu oseyierogi mondo gitine kendo giguedh ji e nyinge gin ema omigi tich ngado buche ji laroe gimoro kod buche goruok duto bange jodongo duto mag dala machiegni gi ringruokno nyaka log lwetgi kuom nyaroya mosetur ngute e holo cha ka giwacho niya wan ne ok wachuero remoni kata ngat nochuere bende ne ok waneno ruoth nyasaye yie iwe richo mag jogi israel isewaro kendo kik iyie mondo remo onge gi ketho miengi kamano ginipuodhre kuom richo mar chuero remono mano e kaka unugol remo onge gi ketho kuomu kutimo gima ber ruoth nyasaye dwarono kaka irito mon momak e lweny kusekedo gi wasiku mi ruoth nyasaye nyasachu oketogi e lwetu kendo umako jomoko udhigo mi ngato kuomu oneno dhako moro jaber kuomgi doher mondo okendi onyalo kawe akawa motere dala bang mano noliel wiye mi ongad koke kendo olony lewni mane omakego dhakono nodag e dala ngatno koywago min gi wuon kuom due ngima eka ngatno nyalo loke dhako kapo ni bange ojok kode onyalo weye odhi kuma ohero ok nongiewe gi ngato kata loke misumba nikech oseriwore kode pok wuowi makayo ka ngato nigi mon ariyo achiel ohero machielo ok ohero dhako ok oherono ema onywolone wuowi makayo kendo kinde modwaro lamo nie yawuowi ochopo kik okaw wuod dhako moherono ka wuode makayo kar wuod dhako ok ohero adier e wuowi makayo nyaka omi wuode makayo duongne mar nywol kopogone pok nyadiriyo moloyo yawuote mamoko kata dabed ni en wuod dhako mocha kamano nimar en e wuode motieko wuowine omiyo duong mar nywol en mare wuowi achach kapo ni ngato nigi wuowi wiye tek kendo achach ok nyal winjo jonywolne kata da gikume nyaka gimake mi gitere e nyim jodongo e dhoranga dala giniwach ni jodongo niya wuodwani wiye tek kendo en achach ok otim gima wawachone bende timbene richo kendo ojamer eka jodalano duto nyaka goye gi kite nyaka otho mano e kaka unupodhru kuom richo kamano mi joisrael duto nowinj wachno kendo nobed maluor chike moko mopogore opogore ka osengad ni ngato buch tho mi onege kendo olier ringre e yath ringreno kik kanyo otienono duto nyaka yike chieng onogo mondo kik uketh piny ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro miyou ka mwanduu nikech ngat molier e yath okuong e nyim nyasaye rapar mar chik kineno dher wadu moro kata rombone ka ringo lal kik iweye nyaka igenge mi idwoke ni wuongo kopo ni wuongo ok jagwengu kata ka ok ingeye nyaka iter chiayono e dalani kendo irite nyaka wuongo nwange kuomi eka idwoknego nyaka itim kamano ni kanj wadu kata ni lawe kata ni gimoro amora molalne kik iweye orweny kineno kanj wadu moro kata dhere kopodho e yo kik iwe mak ikonyo wuongo chunge dhako kik rwakre ka dichwo dichwo bende kik rwakre ka dhako nimar joma otimo kamano okwedi e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kapo ni iyudo od winyo man gi nyithindo kata tong e yath manie dir yo kata man piny e lowo ka mingi butnoe kik ikaw mingi kaachiel gi nyithinde nyaka iwe mingi dhi ikaw mana nyithinde kende kamano inibed maber kendo nidag aminga ka igero ot nyaka iriw rageng e lak tado gi yo ka oko mondo kik ngato podhi koa ewi tatino mi kel bura mar remo kuom odi kik ipidh kodhi moro amora e puothi mar mzabibu nimar kitimo kamano gik kodhino onyago kaachiel gi olembe mag mzabibu nyaka chiw ni ruoth nyasaye kik ipur gi dhiang kod kanyna e kwer achiel kik irwak law molos gi usi mar yie rombo mokik gi usi mar katana nyaka iket usi momin e konde angwen mag lawi mar abola chike moko mag kend ka ngato okendo chiege bange ojok kode mi ohangone wach kendo oketho nyinge kowacho ni nokawe ok oyude gi ringre jonywol nyakono nyaka dhi ir jodongo e dhoranga dala ka gitero gima nyiso ni nyargino ne nigi ringre eka wuon nyako nowachni jodongo niya namiyo ngatni nyara mondo okendi koro ojok kode omiyo osehangone wach kendo oketho nyinge kowacho ni ne ok oyude gi ringre kata kamano e gima nyiso ni nyara ne nigi ringre bang mano noyar law mane oywego ringre nyakono e nyim jodong dala jodongogo nyaka chwad ngatno kendo goye faini pesa moromo fedha mia achiel mondo omi wuon nyako nikech ngatno oseketho nying nyar israel nyakono nosik kode kendo ok noriembe nyaka chieng ka en adier ni nyakono ne onge gi ringre kendo oonge gima nyiso ni ne en gi ringre nyaka tere e dhood wuon mare kendo jodalagi nogoye gi kite nyaka otho nimar osekelo wichkuot e piny israel kochodo ka pod en e dala wuon mano e kaka unupwodhru kuom richo kamaano ka onwang ngato ka terore gi chi wadgi nyaka neggi giduto mano e kaka unupwodh joisrael kuom richo kamano ka ngato onwango nyako moro minywomo mi oterore kode e dala nyaka ukelgi giduto e dhoranga dala mi ugogi gi kite nyaka githo nyaka neg nyakono nikech kata obedo ni ne en e dala kamano ne ok ogoyo uwi mondo okonye ngatno nyaka neg kuom kuodo wi chi wadgi mano e kaka unupwodh ogandau kuom richo kamano ka ngato oyudo nyako moro minywomo mi omako kendo oterorego gi thwon oko e pap ngatno kende ema nyaka negi kik utim gimoro ni nyako nikech en ok osetimo gimoro moromore gi buch tho nimar ngatno nomake oko e pap omiyo kata obedo ni nogoyo uwi onge ngat mane nyalo konye tim kamano chalo gi tim ngat momonjo wadgi monego ka ngato omako nyako ok nywom mi oterorego bange ofwenygi nyaka ngatno chul wuon nyako pesa moromo fedha piero abich bende nyaka okend nyakono nikech osemiye wichkuot kendo ok onyal riembe nyaka chieng kik ngato ter chi wuon mare nimar kotimo kamano okuodo wi wuon rapar mar chik joma ok oyienigi bet e chokruok mar jonyasaye ngat nyangetane otore kata duongne ongad oko kik donj e chokruok mar joruoth nyasaye kimirwa kik donji e chokruok mar joruoth nyasaye nyaka nyikwaye mar apar joamon gi jomoab kata mana nyaka nyikwagi mar apar kik donj e chokruok mar joruoth nyasaye ok ginidonj e chokruokno nikech ne ok giromonu gi chiemo kata gi pi kane uwuok misri bende nikech ne giluongo balaam wuod beor modak pethor manie piny mesopotamia mondo okuongu ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ne ok odewo wach balaam mi noloko kuongno obedonu mana gueth nikech noherou kik udwar gima dikelnigi kue kata gima dikelnigi dongruok e ndalou duto kik ukaw joedom ka joma okwedi nikech gin joweteu bende kik ukaw jomisri ka joma okwedi nikech ne udak e pinygi ndalo moko nyikwagi mar adek ema nyalo donjo e chokruok mar joruoth nyasaye rito ler e kambi ka un e kambi ndalo lweny kik utim gimoro mochido ka ngat moro kuomu ogak nikech nende olekore gotieno nyaka owuog oa e kambi mobed oko kochopo odhiambo nyaka olwokre eka oduog e kambi ka chieng podho nyaka ubed gi kamoro oko mulosorue kendo kudhi kanyo nyaka udhi gi rapur ukunygo bur mi ka uselosoru uiko nyaka utim kamano nikech ruoth nyasaye nyasachu wuotho kuonde duto e kambiu mondo oritu kendo omiu loyo wasiku emomiyo kambiu nyaka bed maler mondo kik ruoth nyasaye nwangie gimoro marach dimi oweu chike mopogore opogore ka misumba moro opondo koa e piny moro mi oringo obiro iru kik uduoke ni ruodhe nyaka uweye odag e pinyu e dala moro amora mohero kik uloke misumba onge nyar israel moro kata wuod isreal moro manyalo bedo jachode e od lemo pesa dhako moro kata dichwo moro oyudo kuom chode kik kel e od ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mondo ochopgo kuongruok nikech pesa moyud kamano okwedi e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kik imi jaisrael wadu chul ohala kuom gima oholo bed ni en pesa kata chiemo kata gimoro amora monego dwok gi ohala inyalo kawo ohala kuom gima iholo japiny moro nono ok kuom jaisrael wadu kuluwo chikno ruoth nyasaye nyasachu noguedhu kuom gik moko duto mutimo e piny ubiro donjoe mondo udagie kikuongori kuom wach moro nyaka ichop kuongruokno piyopiyo nikech ka ok itimo kamano ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nobandhi wachno kendo nibed jaketho ka ok ikuongori ok iketho kikuongori ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kuom heroni iwuon nyaka irit kendo ichop gima iwachono ka idonjo e puoth ngato mar mzabibu inyalo chamo mzabibu kaka ihero kik ikaw moko iago bende kidonjo e puoth ngato mar cham inyalo jako ajaka cham gi lweti kik ika gi pala rapar mar chik chike mar weyo dhako ka ngato okendo chiege bange oyudo ni ok ohere nikech osetimo gimoro ok owinjore onyalo ndiko barup weruok momiye kendo oriembe bange ka dhakono osea nyalo bet ni ngato ochako okende obedo chiege ka chwore mar ariyono bende ojok kode mondiko barup weruok momiye kendo oriembe kata ka chwore mar ariyono otho chwore mokwongo mane oriembe cha kik chak kawe mi loke chiege kendo nikech koro osedokone mogak tim kamano en kuero e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kendo dikel richo e piny ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro miyou obed mwanduu ka ngato okendo kik tere e lweny kata e tich moro amora onego obed dala kuom higa achiel komiyo chiege mor chike mopogore opogore kik ngato mak pong rego kata mana nyapong ka gir singo nikech mano chalre gi nego dhano ka oyud ngato kokwalo jaisrael wadgi mi oloke misumbane kata ongiewe gio ngato nyaka neg jakuogno mano e kaka unupwodhru kuom richo kamano kuom weche mag tuo dhoho nyaka utim mana kaka jodolo jolawi biro chikou nimar namiyogi chikena duto nyaka uriti paruru gima ne ruoth nyasaye nyasachu otimo ni miriam ka ne usewuok misri kiholo jaisrael wadu gimoro kik idonj e ode kikawo gir singo nyaka irit mana gi oko mondo ngat jagopino ema okelni gino ka en ngat jachan mi omiyi lawe mar abola ka gir singo kik inind e laweno nyaka idwoknego ka pok chieng opodho mondo onindie kamano ngatno noguedhi kendo ruoth nyasaye nyasachi nokwan gima itimono ka gima ber kik itim marach ni jatich moro modhier machandore kataa obedo ni en jaisrael kata jadak nyaka imiye pokne pilepile kapok chieng opodho nimar en jachan kendo pokneno ema konye ka ok itimo kamano onyalo ywakni kuom ruoth nyasaye mi dibed jaketho kik neg wuone nikech richo mag nyithinde kata kik neg nyithindo nikech richo mag wuonegi ngato ka ngato noneg mana nikech richone owuon kik ungad buch amwor ni jodak kata ni nyathi kich bende kik ukaw law dhako chwore otho ka gir singo paruru nii ne un wasumbni e piny misri ruoth nyasaye nyasachu noresou mogolou kuno mano emomiyo achikou ni mondo utim kamano ka ikayo cham e puothi mi wiyi owil gi cham moko motue kuno kik idog iom nyaka iwegi ni jodak gi nyithindo kiye kod mond liete mondo ruoth nyasaye nyasachu oguedhi kuom gik moko duto mitimo ka iseyiengo yiendi mag zeituni mondo olembe olwar kik ichak iyienggi kendo nyaka iwe modong ni jodak gi nyithi kiye kod mond liete ka isepono mzabibu e puothi kik ichak ipon kendo nyaka iwe modong ni jodak gi nyithi kiye kod mond liete paruru ni ne un wasumbni e piny misri mano emomiyo achikou ni mondo utim kamano rapar mar chik ka ji ariyo larore e wach moro mi gibiro mondo oyalgi nyaka jongad bura ngad nigi bura kare ka giweyo ngat onge gi ketho gikumo jaketho ka ongad ni ngat jakethono buch chweto nyaka onind piny e nyim jangad bura mi chwade nyaka chwade maromre gi kethone kar kwan kiboko kik kadh piero angwen nono dipo ka chweto ohingo jaisrael waduno mi oyudo wichkuot marach e nyimu kik itue dho dhiang ka ywayo lodi madiemo cham chik mar tero dhako ka owete odak kanyakla mi achiel kuomgi otho ka ok oweyo nyathi wuowi ngat moro nono ok jadalano ok nyal tero chiege owadgi chwor dhakono ema nyaka riwre kode mi loke chiege kendo timne gik moko duto owinjore yuor dhako tim nyathi wuowi dhakono okwongo nywolo nyaka kaw nying wuon mare mothono mondo nyinge kik lal e israel ka owadgi ngat mothono ok dwar tero chi owadgino dhakono nyaka dhi ir jodongo e dhoranga dala kar bura mondo onyisgi niya yuora otamore chungo wi owadgi e israel kendo odagi timona gima owinjore yuor ngato tim ni chi owadgi ka jodong dala owinjo kamano nyaka giluong ngatno kendo giwuo kode e wachno ka owachonigi malongo ni ok odwar kawe chi owadgino nyaka dhi ire e nyim jodongo mi lony wuore e tiende kendo ngudh wange olawo bang mano dhakono nyaka wach niya e kaka watimo ni ngat modagi chungo wi owadgi e israel jood ngatno noluong ni jood ngat olony wuore chike mamoko ka ji ariyo gore mi chi ngat achiel kuomgi odhi konyo chwore momako duong ngat machielono nyaka ngad lwet dhakono oko ok ukeche kik ibed gi rapim mopogore opogore e mifuki moro duong moro tin bende kik ibed gi rapur mopogore opogore e odi moro duong moro tin nyaka ubed gi rapim kod rapur malongo kendo makare mondo udag aminga e piny ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro miyou joma timo gik kamago kawuondo ji okwedi e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasaye ochiko joisrael mondo otiek joamalek paruru gima ne joamalek otimonu e yo ka uwuok e piny misri ne gibutonu mi gimonjou gi ka ngeu ka uol kendo ujony mi ginego joma nodong chien ok gidewo luoro nyasaye emomiyo ka ruoth nyasaye nyasachu osemiyou kue kuom wasiku duto molworou e piny obiro miyou mondo obed mwanduu kik wiu wil mak utieko joamalek mi nyinggi lal e piny rapar mar chik chike mag chiwo gik mokwongo nyak ka usechopo e piny ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro miyou mondo obed mwanduu mi udak kuno nyaka ngato ka ngato kaw gik moko duto mokwongo nyak e pinyno kendo ket e atonga mi dhigo kama ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro yiero mondo nyinge obedie nyaka odhi ir jadolo man kanyo kendo owachne niya ahulo ni ruoth nyasaye nyasacha kawuono ni asechopo e piny mane ruoth nyasaye osingore ni kwerewa ni nomiwa bang mano jadolo nokaw atonga e lwet ngatno mi noket piny e nyim kendomarmisango mar ruoth nyasaye eka ngatno nowach e nyim ruoth nyasaye niya kwara ne en jaaram bayo abaya onge gi kar dak ne odhi e piny misri kane pod joge nok mi gidak kuno bange ne ginya mi gidoko oganda maratego man gi ji mangeny jomisri nosandowa monyorowa kendo oketowa e tich misumba malit ne waywak ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach kwerewa mondo okonywa mi nowinjo ywakwa kendo oneno thagruok gi nyor mane inyorowago kod tich matek mane watiyo kuom mano nogolowa e piny misri gi teko maduong kod bat morie kendo gi timbe madongo kod ranyisi gi honni nokelowa kaeri momiyowa piny maber kendo momewni ruoth nyasaye mano emomiyo akeloni gik mokwongo nyak e lowo misemiya eka noket atongano piny e nyim ruoth nyasaye mi okulorene piny mondo olame bange un gi jolawi kod jopinje mamoko modak kuomu nyaka utim sawo mondo upargo gik mabeyo duto ruoth nyasaye osetimonu kaachiel gi jou chike mag chiwo achiel kuom apar mag gik monyak ka usetieko choko achiel kuom apar mag gik monyak e higa mar adek en higa michiwoe achiel kuom apar mar gik manyak nyaka uchiw gigo ni jolawi gi jopinje mamoko modak kuomu kaachiel gi nyithindo kiye kod mond liete mondo gibed gi chiemo moromogi e miechu bang mano ngato ka ngato nowach e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachu niya asegolo gik mowalni e oda mi amiyo jolawi gi jopinje mamoko gi nyithindo makiye kod mond liete mana kaka nichika wiya ok osewil kata ok aseketho chikni moro kata achiel pok achamo gik mowalnigo e ndalo aywago ngat motho kata gologi e oda ka agak kendo ok asechiwogi ni ngat motho ruoth nyasaye asemako chikni katimo gik moko duto midwaro rang piny gie polo kar dakni maler mondo iguedh jogi israel kod piny maber kendo momew misemiyowa kaka nikuongori ni kwerewa joisrael nyaka bed oganda mowal ni ruoth nyasaye kawuono ruoth nyasaye nyasachu chikou mondo urit chikegi gi buchegi duto nyaka uritgi gi chunyu duto usehulo tinende ni ruoth nyasaye e nyasachu kendo ni ubiro luwo yorene murit chikene gi buchene kendo uwinj wachne ruoth nyasaye bende osehulo tinende ni un e joge owuon marito chikene duto kaka nosingorenu obiro tingou malo moloyo ogendini mamoko duto mane ochueyo mondo nyinge oyud duong gi pak kod huma kamano unubed oganda mowal ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mana kaka nosingore rapar mar chik ndiko chike e got ebal kane musa nigi jodong israel nochiko ji niya rituru chike duto amiyou kawuono kendo chieng ungado aora jordan kudhi e piny ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro miyou uchung kite madongo kendo umwongi ndikuru kuomgi weche duto mag chikni mondo udonji e piny maber momew ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nosingore ni kwereu ni nomiu ka usengado aora jordan unuchung kitegi e got ebal mana kaka achikou kawuono kendo umwongi geruru kendomarmisango kanyo ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu gi kite ok opa gi chuma kendo mar ruoth nyasayeno nyaka ger gi kite ok opa bende utimie ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu misengni miwango pep timuru misengni mag sawo kendo chiemuru kanyo mi ubed mamor e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ndikuru malongo weche duto mag chikni kuom kitego musa kod jodolo jolawi nowacho ni joisrael duto niya chikuru itu maber un joisrael tinendeni usedoko joruoth nyasaye nyasachu winjuru ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kendo rituru chikene gi buchene amitou kawuono weche mag kuong nyaka hul e got ebal chiengno ema musa nogoloe chik kowacho ni ji niya ka usengado aora jordan josimeon gi jolawi gi jojuda gi joisakar gi jojosef kod jobenjamin nyaka chung e got gerizim mondo oguedh ji joreuben gi jogad gi joasher gi jozebulun gi jodan kod jonaftali mondo ochung e got ebal kihulo weche mag kuong bang mano jolawi nowach nii joisrael duto gi dwol maduong niya okuong ngat moloso kido mar nyasaye manono mar bao kata mar chuma kata bed ni oketo gino kama opondo mano en tim makuero e nyim ruoth nyasaye okuong ngat mochayo wuon kata min okuong ngat moketho kiepe gi wadgi okuong ngat mowuondo muofu mi obaro oweyo yo okuong ngat moketho buch japiny moro modak kodu kata buch nyathi kich kata buch chi liel okuong ngat moterore gi chi wuon nikech oelo dug wuon mare okuong ngat moterore gi le moro amora okuong ngat moterore gi nyamin hie kata nyamin nyar wuon okuong ngat moterore gi mar mare okuong ngat mogoyo wadgi lingling okuong ngat mochamo asoya mondo oneg ngat onge gi ketho okuong ngat ok orito kata ok ochopo weche duto mag chikni bang kuong ka kuong ji duto nyaka duok ni obed kamano rapar mar chik gueth miyudo kuom rito chik tim jolawi rapar mar chik ka uluoro ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kendo urito adimba chikene duto amiyou kawuono enotingu malo moloyo ogendini duto mag piny kendo guethgi duto biro bironu noguedhu kamoro amora untie ka un e dala kata ka un oko noguedhu gi nyithindo mangeny kendo gi cham mogundho kod jamni mathoth noguedh atongeu gi dakuondeu noguedhu kudonjo e dala kendo kuwuok ruoth nyasaye noket wasiku momonjou e luetu kendo unulogi muriembgi ginirad kodu ka gin oganda achiel giniringu ka gike e sidienje abiriyo ruoth nyasaye noguedh dereu kaachiel gii tich luetu duto e piny obiro miyou kurito chike ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kendo uwuotho e yorene obiro miyo udoko joge owuon maler kaka nosesingorenu ogendini duto mag piny none ni un jo ruoth nyasaye mi giniluoru ruoth nyasaye biro miyo udhi maber ubiro bedo gi nyithindo mangeny kendo gii jamni mathoth kod cham mogundho e piny mane ruoth nyasaye osingore ni kwereu ni nomiu ruoth nyasaye biro golo koth e polo kar kenone mondo ochwenu e ndalo mowinjore kendo obiro guedho gik moko duto mutimo ogendini mangeny biro holo gik moko kuomu un ok nuhol kuomgi kurito chike mag ruoth nyasaye nyasachu anyisou kawuono mondo urit matek kendo ka ok utamoru chikego mi udagi lamo nyiseche mamoko ruoth nyasaye biro ketou jotelo ok joma itelonigi kamano ubiro dhi nyime maber kendo ok nudog chien kuong miyudo kuom tamruok mako chik tim jolawi ka ok uluoro ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mi udagi rito chikene gi buchene amiyou kawuono kuong gi duto biro makou nokuongu kamoro amora untie ka un e dala kata ka un oko nokuong atongeu gi dakuondeu nokuongu kuom nywol kendo kuom cham kod kuom jamni nokuongu kudonjo e dala kendo kuwuok ruoth nyasaye noornu kuong gi chandruok kod kum ketho gik moko duto mutimo nyaka otieku mi urum ka diemo wang kuom timbeu maricho kendo nikech useweye ruoth nyasasye biro goyou gi tuoche nyaka tieku ua e piny mudonjoe mondo ukaw ruoth nyasaye biro goyou gi kahera gi midhusi gi tuo akuodi kod guonyo kendo kelonu oro mi cham rochre ewi dongo gigo duto biro thagou nyaka urum polo norieny ka mula piny nodok matek ka chuma kar kelo koth ruoth nyasaye nomi lowo gi buru chwenu mana ka koth nyaka tieku ruoth nyasaye noketu e lwet wasiku mi ginilou unurad kodgi ka un oganda achiel unuringi kuke e sidienje abiriyo mi unubed joma pinje duto wuoro ringreu nobed chiemb winy gi le kendo onge ngat noriembgi ruoth nyasaye biro goyou gi tuo buche mag misri gi akuodi kendo gi kalanga kod guonyo ok nyal thiedhi obiro goyou gi tuo mar neko kendo lokou muofni gi joma morundore unubed kumulo godiechieng mana kaka muofu mulo kendo ok nuchop kuma udwaro dhiyoe nothiru kendo noyaku e ngimau duto kendo onge ngat nokonyu unukend mon jomoko nono ema nonind kodgi unuger udi ok nudagie unupidh mzabibu ok unucham olembegi unune dhou kiyango ok unubil ringgi nomau kenjeu kuneno ok nodwoknugi rombeu nomi wasiku onge ngama nokonyu yawuotu gi nyiu nokaw kendo nomi jopinje mamoko ongiew mana kuneno mi siso nolou kodgi ok nubed gi teko mar timo gimoro oganda moro ok ungeyo nocham gik monyak e puotheu kendo unubed joma othir malich e ngimau duto gigo biro miyo udoko joneko ruoth nyasaye biro goyo chongeu kod tiendeu gi buche ok nyal thiedhi ginilandre e dendu duto ruoth nyasaye biro terou kaachiel gi ruoth mubiro yiero kuom oganda un ok ungeyo kata kwereu bende ne ok ongeyo kendo kuno unulamie nyiseche mamoko mag yien kod mag kite nyingu nolokre ka ngero kendo gima ji jaro kendo nyiero ubiro chwoyo kodhi mangeny e puotheu unuka matin nimar bonyo biro chamogi unupidh mzabibu kendo unudogi ok unuka olembgi kata madho divachgi bende ok unumadhi nikech kudni nokethgi yiend zeituni noyudre e pinyu kuonde duto ok unuwirru gi mogi nimar ginilwar piny ka pok gichiek ununywol yawuowi gi nyiri ok ginisik kodu nikech notergi e tuech yiendu duto kod gik monyak e puotheu bonyo notiek pep jopinje mamoko modak kuomu biro medo dongore molou un ubiro dok piny ginibed gi gik giholou un ok nubed gi gima duholgi ginibed jotelo un unubed joma itelonigi masichego duto biro lawou mi maku nyaka tieku nikech kane ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ochikou mondo urit chikene gi buchene ne ok uwinjo wachne masichego nobednu ranyisi mochwere kendo ni nyikwau nikech ne ok utiyo ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu gi mor kendo gi ilo kuom chiwone mogundho emomiyo unuti ni wasigu ruoth nyasaye biri oro mondo omnju kech nokau kendo riyo nolou unuwuoth duge kendo nuchand gimoro amora ruoth nyasaye noket jok mar nyinyo e ngutu nyaka otieku ruoth nyasaye biro kelo kuomu oganda moro moa kuma bor dhogi ok nuwinji ginimuomre kuomu mana kaka ongo muomore kuom nyagweno ogandano nobed mager ahinya ok ginidew joma oti kendo ok ginikech nyithindo ginicham jambu gi chambu ok giweyonu cham kata divai kata mo kata mana chiayo moro kuom jambu nyaka urum ginilwor mier duto ryuoth nyasaye nomiu mondo gikau nyaka gimuk ohinga maboyo kendo motegno muparo ni dugengrugo wasikugo nokelnu chandruok malich ahinya e ndalo giluoro e miechu mi unucham kata mana nyithindu uwegi ruoth nyasaye nyasachu omiyou kata mana ngat malongo kendo mangwonie moloyo biro bedo iye kwar gi wadgi kata mana chiege mohero kaachiel gi nyithinde modong mi notamre pogonigi ringre nyithinde mochamo nimar onge gimoro machielo nodongne nikech chandruok malich wasiku biro kelonu e ndalo giluoroe miechu bende kata mana dhako malongo kendo mangwonie moloyo bende nyaka nene ok wuoth gi tiende biro bedo iye kwar gi chwore mohero kaachiel gi nyithinde mi notamre pogonigi bieche kata mana nyathi mosenywolo nikech chandruok malich wasigu biro kelone e ndalo giluoroe miechu duto ka ok urito chike duto mondiki e kitabuni kendo ok luoro nying ruoth nyasaye nyasachu en nying maduong kendo malich ubiro kelo kuomu kendo kuom nyikwau masiche malich kendo miwuoro kod tuoche mayuayo ji kuom kinde malach ruoth nyasaye nokel tuoche duto mag misri mane uluoro kendo ginisik kuomu bende nokel kuomu tuoche kod masiche ok ondik e kitap chikni nyaka urum kata obedo ni ungeny ka sulue manie polo kamano ji manok kuomu kende ema nodong nikech ne ok uwinjo wach ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ruoth nyasaye nobed mamor kokethou kendo kotiekou mana kaka nobedo mamor koguedhou kendo omiyo unya mi nogolu gi thuon e piny udonjoe mondo ukau ruoth nyasaye nokeu e kind ogendini chakre tung piny konchiel nyaka tung piny komachielo kendo kuondego duto unulamie nyiseche mag yien kod mag kite un ok ungeyo kata kwereu bende ne ok ongeyo ka un e kind ogendinigo ok nuyud kue unuriwni e kindgi kendo ruoth nyasaye nomi ubed gi parruok gi wenge mojony kod chuny mokuyo ok ununge gima biro timorenu kendo unubed gi kihondko odiechieng gotieno mi ok ununge sa thou kihondkono gi gik mubiro neno nomi uwach okinyi kokinyi ni yaye mad obed odhiambo odhiambo kodhiambo unuwach ni yaye mad obed okinyi ruoth nyasaye nodwoku misri gi yiedhi kata obedo ni nosingore ni ok nudog kuno kendo unuhonru ni wasiku mondo ongiewu ka wasumbni onge ngama nongiewu rapar mar chik mago e weche mag singruok mane ruoth nyasaye ochiko musa mondo omi joisrael otim kane gin e piny jomoab singruokno ne omedi kuom singruok mane otimo kodgi horeb singrouk mane nyasaye otimo gi joisrael e piny moab musa noluongo joisrael duto mowachonigi niya ne uneno gi wangu gik moko duto mane ruoth nyasaye otimo e piny misri ni farao gi jodonge kod pinye duto timbe madongo mane unenogo ne gin ranyisi gi honni kata kamano nyaka chop sani ruoth nyasaye pok omiyou chuny mar ngeyo kata wang mar neno kata mar winjo ruoth nyasaye osetelonu e thim kuom higni piero angwen lepu kata wuochu pok oti bende ok usechamo makati kata madho divai kata gimoro mamero ji notimonu kamano mondo ungego ni en e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ka ne uchopo ka sihon ruodh heshbon kod og ruodh bashan ne jomonjowa ne waloyogi ne wakawo pinygi mi wamiyo joreuben gi jogad kod nu jomanase mondo obed mwandugi nyaka urit weche mag singruok adimba mondo udhi maber kuom gik moko duto mutimo kawuono uchung e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachu koda ka jotend dhoutu gi jodongu gi jotendu mamoko kod joisrael duto chwo gi mon kod nyithindo kaachiel gi jopinje mamoko modak kuomu kata mana joma modonu yien kendo umbonu pi uikoru mondo ukuongru kutimo singruok ruoth nyasaye nyasachu dwaro timo kodu kawuono ruoth nyasaye dwaro mondo oloku joge kendo mondo obed nyasachu kaka nonyisou kendo kaka nosingore ne kwereu ibrahim gi isaka kod jakobo ok un kende ema amiyou utimo singruokni ji duto mochung kodwa ka e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa kaachiel gi ji duto maonge kodwa ka kawuono bende amiyo otimo singruokni ungeyo kaka ne wadak e piny misri kendo kaka ne wakadho e pinje mag ogendini mamoko bende nuneno gik makuero gilamo kod kido mag nyisechegi manono mag yien gi mag kite kod mag fedha gi mag dhahabu kapo ni nitie ngato kuomu dichwo kata dhako kata ka nitie joot kata dhoot moro madwaro weyo lamo ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa mondo odhi olam nyiseche mag ogendini mamoko mano nyalo bedone chakruok mar masira gi lit ka ngatno owinjo weche mag singruokni mi owuondore e chunye ni onge gima biro time kata koluwo timbene mag wich teko mano nokel masira maduong ruoth nyasaye ok nowe ni ngatno richone kendo mirimbe mager noliel kuome mi kuong duto mondiki e kitabuni nomake kendo ruoth nyasaye noruch nyinge oko ruoth nyasaye nopoge kuom dhout israel duto mi nosande kaka kuong duto mondik e kitabu mar chikni dwaro e ndalo mabiro nyikwau kod joma oa e pinje mamoko maboyo none masiche kod tuoche mane ruoth nyasaye osetimo e pinyni piny duto nowang gi mach kendo notim chumbi ok nyal pidhie kata mana lum bende ok notwiye nokethre mana ka sodom gi gomora kod adma gi zeboim mane ruoth nyasaye otieko gi mirimbe mager bange ogendni duto nopenjre ni ango momiyi ruoth nyasaye osetimo gima kama e pinyni ere tiend mirima magerni nodwokgi niya mano osetimore nikech joisrael ne ok oriti singruok mane ruoth nyasaye nyasach kweregi otimo kodgi kane gin e piny misri ne gilamo nyiseche mamoko mane ok gingeyo kendo mane ruoth nyasaye ok omiyogi mondo gilam mano emomiyo mirimb ruoth nyasaye nobedo mager kuom pinyni mi nokeloe kuong duto mondik e kitabuni osedhuologi gi lop tiendgi e pinygi gi mirimbe mager mi oterogi e piny machielo pod gintie nyaka chil kawuono nitie gik moko mopondo gin mag ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa gik moelnwa tiendgi ema omiwa kaachiel gi nyikwawa nyaka chieng omiyo wanyalo timo gik moko duto chikni dwaro rapar mar chik gik onego ji tim mondo oduog ir ruoth nyasaye mi oguedhgi ka gueth kod kuong aketo e nyimugo duto udhi nyime maber kendo enochak ochoku kendo kanyakla kogolou e pinje duto mane okeyoue kata obedo ni osekeyou e tung piny gi tung piny kamano nochak ochoku kaachiel kendo ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nodwoku e piny kwereu mondo udagie enomi unya mangeny kendo ubed gi mwandu mathoth moloyo kwereu ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nomi chunyu gi chuny nyikwau tim gik odwaro mondo uhere gi chunyu duto kendo gi adiera eka ubed mangima bange ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nolok kuonggo duto ni wasiku kendo ni joma sandou unuchak uluor ruoth nyasaye kendo mi unurit chikene duto amiyou kawuonogi ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nomedu mwandu mangeny moloyo unubed gi nyithindo mathoth gi jamni mangeny kod cham mogundho enobed mamor komiyou mwandu mana kaka nobedo mamor komiyo kwereu mwandu mana ka uluore murito chikene gi polo mondo oomnwa chikno kendo opuonjwa eka warite bende ok en loka nam dimi uwach ni ngama dingadnwa nam mondo okelwago mi opuonjwa eka warite wach nyasaye chiegni kodu ahinya kendo en mana e dhou kendo e chunyu omiyo ritogo yot neuru kawuono aketo gik moko ariyo e nyimu mondo uyier gin ngima gi ber kata tho gi rach ka umako chik ruoth nyasachu amiyou kawuono muhere kuluwo yorene kendo urito nolal nono kendo ok unudag aminga e piny ubiro donjoe mondo ukaw kusengado aora jordan koro aluongo polo gi piny mondo obed joneno ni aseketo gik moko ariyo e nyimu mondo uyier gin ngima gi gueth kata tho gi kuong yieruru ngima mondo udag maber kaachiel gi nyikwau heruru ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kuwinjo wachne kendo kuketo chunyu kuome mano nomi ubed mangima kendo udag aminga e piny mane osingore ni kwereu ibrahim gi isaka kod jakobo rapar mar chik oket joshua kar musa musa nomedo wuoyo ni joisrael kowacho niya koro hika gin mia achiel gi piero ariyo kendo ok anyal dhi nyime gi telonu bende ruoth nyasaye osenyisa ni ok nangad aora jordan ruoth nyasaye nyasachu owuon biro telo nyimu mondo otiek ogendini mudhi kawo pinygigo mi unudag e pinygi kendo joshua notelnu kaka ruoth nyasaye osewacho ruoth nyasaye biro tieko ogendinigo mana kaka notieko sihon gi og ruodhi joamor kaachiel gi pinjegi nochiwgi e luetu mi unutimnigi mana kaka nochikou beduru gi chir kendo gi jingo kik uluorgi kendo kik chunyu nyosre nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro dhi kodu kendo ok noweu kata jwangou ok nojwangu bange musa noluongo joshua mowachone e nyim joisrael duto niya bed gi chir kendo gi jingo nikech ema ibiro telo ni jogi ka gidhi e piny ruoth nyasaye nosingore ni kweregi ni nomigi kendo inimi gikawe ruoth nyasaye owuon biro teloni kendo nobed kodi ok noweyi bende ok nojwangi omiyo kik ibed maluor kendo kik chunyi nyosre nyaka som chik bang higni abiriyo ka higni abiriyo musa nondiko chikno momiyo jodolo jolawi mane tingo sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye kod jodong israel duto eka nochikogi kama bang higni abiriyo ka higni abiriyo e higa miweyoe gope e kinde mutimoe sap kiche ka joisrael duto biro mondo olam ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kama obiro yiero mondo nyinge obedie nyaka usom chikni
