tienge mabiro mapok ongeyo wechegi nowinjgi mi nopuonjre luoro ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ndalo duto gidakgo e piny ubiro kawo ka usengado aora jorda chike mogik mane ruoth nyasaye omiyo musa ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya ibiro tho machiegni omiyo luong joshua udhi e hemb romo mondo akete e tich omiyo musa gi joshua ne jodhi kaka nowachnigi kendo ruoth nyasaye nofwenyore e hema ka ni e bor polo mane ochung e dho hema ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya ka isetho moyiki jogi biro weya mi luw nyiseche mag jomoko gidhi yudo ka gidonjo e pinyno mana kaka dhako weyo chwore dwanyore gi chwo mamoko giniweya kendo giniketh singruok asetimo kodgi kuom mano mirimba mager noliel kuomgi ka mach mi notiekgi anawegi kendo ok nakwangi ka joga mi ginithagre malit kendo ginine masiche madongo eka bange giniwach niya thagruokgi osebironwa mana nikech nyasachwa koro ok ni kodwa ok nawinjgi e ndalogo nikech richo gisebedo ka gitimo mar lamo nyiseche mamoko kuom mano koro ndik wer anyisi ni kendo ipuonjgi kaka iwere mondo oparnigi chikena ka asekelogi e piny maber kendo momew kaka nasingora ni kweregi mi giyudo chiemo kendo gidoko machwe eka bange ginichara kendo giniketh singruokna ka giluwo nyiseche mamoko kendo tiyonigi ka githagore malit kendo gineno masiche malit kamano wendni nobednigi rapar nimar nyikwagi nosik ka kata koroni ka pok akelogi e piny nasingora ni namigi angeyo kaka chunygi chalo musa nondiko wendno chiengno mopuonjo joisrael ruoth nyasaye nochiko joshua wuod nun niya bed gi chir kendo gi jingo nikech ema nitelni joisrael ka gidhi e piny ne asingora ni namigi kendo anabed kodi kane musa osetieko ndiko chikno duto e kitabu nochiko jolawi mane tingo sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye niya kawuru kitap chikni uket e bath sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mondo obednu kanyo ka rapar nimar angeyo ni un joma wigi tek ta usetamoru winjo ruoth nyasaye kata ka pod angima ka kodu koro kasetho ubiro dage machal nadi omiyo chokuru jodong dhoutu gi jotendu duto e nyima mondo awachnigi wechegi kendo aluong polo gi piny mondo obedna joneno angeyo ni ka asetho ubiro duworu malich muwe yo asechikoue kuom mano unune masiche e ndalo mabiro nikech numiyo ruoth nyasaye mirima gi timbeu maricho wend musa bange musa nowachonigi weche duto mag wendni ka oganda joisrael ochiko itgi rapar mar chik polo chik iti ka awuoyo piny winj wechena puonj mara mondo obed ka koth machue e lek kendo wechena mondo obed ka tho mamiyo lum doko mangich abiro luongo nying ruoth nyasaye dwokuru ni omi nyasaye duong en lwanda tichne longo nikech yorene duto ni kare en nyasaye jaadiera kendo maonge ketho timbene kare kendo jaratiro tiengni en tieng makoch kendo mobam timbegi mobam nyiso ni ok gin nyithind ruoth nyasaye yaye oganda mofuwo onge gi rieko mano e kaka utimo ni ruoth nyasaye adier donge en e wuoru mane ochueyou donge en ema omiyou doko oganda maratego paruru ndalo machon kod tienge koro osekadho penjuru wuoneu kod jodongu mondo ogannu sigendgi kane ngama duong moloyo ochiwo ni ogendini pinjegi mondo obed kuondegi mag dak noketo ni oganda ka oganda tong pinygi maromre gi kar romb nyithi nyasaye ruoth nyasaye owuon noyiero joka jakobo mondo obed joge owuon kendo obed mwandune noyudo ogandano e thim malich ondiegi rutoe mi nolworogi koni gi koni moritogi maber kaka ongo yiengo ode mondo nyithinde owuogi koyaro bwombene mondo okawgi kendo otinggi e gichamo mor kich mothodhi e kind lwanda kod mor zeituni manyak e lowo motimo kite ne gin gi cha adila gi cha rombe kod nyirombe gi imbe mabeyo moloyo gi dhok moa bashan kod nyuogi kaachiel gi ngano gicharo lwanda noresogi ne gimiyo nyiego omake kuom lamo nyiseche mamoko kendo ne gimiye mirima gi timbegi makuero ne gitimo lisweche ni jochiende ok nyasaye kendo ni nyiseche ok gingeyo kata mana named kwanogi ka joga abiro neno gikogi nimar gin tieng wigi tek nyithindo ok nyal gen gisemiyo nyiego omaka nikech giselamo gikma ok nyasaye adier gisewango iya nikech giselamo gima nono omiyo abiro miyo nyiego makgi ka ayiero oganda nono oloyo kendo abiro wango igi ka ayiero oganda ok dew nyasaye mirimba osemoko mach mawango piny kaachiel gi gik manyakie kendo owango mise mag gode bende ochopo kata kar joma otho e liel piny anamed masiche kuom joga kendo nachielgi gi asechena duto mi kech nokagi kendo midhusi notuogi kendo tuoche maricho nogogi bende naol kuomgi ondiegi mangemo kod thuonde man gi kwiri mager ligangla noneggi ka gin oko kendo ka gin ei udi mi nyithindgi nodong kiye kendo mondgi nodok mond liete yawuowi gi nyiri bende notho kaachiel gi nyithindo mayom kod jodongo moti naparo ni mondo angadgi matindotindo kendo atiekgi ok nochak opargi naparo ni dipo ka wasigu ojara ka gipakore ni gin ema gisetimo gigo duto ok ruoth nyasaye joma wacho kamano gin oganda mofuwo kendo maonge gi paro ka dine giriek dine gingeyo tiend gik matimore dine gingeyo gima biro timorenigi e giko ere kaka ngat achiel dilaw ji gana achiel kata ji ariyo riemb ji gana apar mak mana ka ok ruoth nyasaye lwandagi ema oweyogi moketogi e lwet wasikgi adier lwanda mar wasikwa ok chal gi lwandawa kata mana wasikwa bende ongeyo kamano mzabibu maggi gin mzabip sodom mopidh gomora olembgi otimo kwiri kendo kech divachgi chalo gi kwich thuol mager ruoth nyasaye wacho niya donge gigo duto okan maber e od kenona nyaka chop chieng abiro chuloe kuor kendo kumogi mana chieng tiendgi nokierie mi gipodh piny chieng mar masira gibiro rumoe sudonigi machiegni adier ka ruoth nyasaye oneno ni joge ool kendo ni onge kata ngat achiel modong makonyogi obiro ngadonigi bura maber kendo obiro kechogi enowach niya nyisecheu ni kanye lwanda mane udwaro yudo konyruok kuome ere nyisecheu mane chamo boche mag misengni mau kendo madho divai mar misengni miolo piny koro gibi mondo gikonyu kendo gibednu kar konyruok koro ngeuru malongo ni e nyasaye kendo onge nyasaye moro mak mana kende ema anego ji kendo ema achiwo ngima ahinyo bende achango onge ngama nyalo reso ngato e lweta koro atingo bada ka akuongora gi nyinga awuon mochwere ni kasepiago ligangla mamil anachul kuor ni wasika kendo kasechako ngado bura anakum jogo mochaya anami asere maga chadhre gi remb joma onegi kod joma omaki enochul kuor kuom remb jotichne kokumo wasike kod joma ochaye enopwodh piny kaachiel gi joge musa nobiro gi joshua wuod nun mosomo weche duto mag wendno ka ji ochiko itgi kane musa osetieko wuoyo ni joisrael duto nowachonigi niya chikuru itu maber mondo uwinj weche duto asiemougo kawuono puonjuru nyithindu chikego duto mondo girit kendo gitim mak giweyo kata achiel nikech ok gin weche nono gin e ngimau kuritogi gibiro miyo udag aminga e piny ubiro kawo ka usengado aora jordan nyasaye oyie mondo musa one piny kanaan odiechieng onogo ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya idh got nebo en achiel kuom gode abarim manie piny moab yo wuokchieng mar jeriko mondo irang piny kanaan abiro miyo joisrael ka mwandugi initho ewi got ibiro idhono mi iluw kwereni mana kaka owadu harun notho e got hor moluwo kwerene gima kamano nyaka timre nimar nuketho e nyima kane ok uluora e nyim joisrael e sokni mag meribathkadesh e thim zin inine piny abiro miyo joisraelno gi chien ok inidonjie rapar mar chik musa oguedho dhout israel kane musa ngat nyasaye chiegni tho noguedho joisrael kowacho kama ruoth nyasaye nobiro koa sinai ne orienynigi gie seir kendo gie got paran nobiro ka ji maler gana gi gana oruowo e bathe korachwich adier ohero joge maler kendo oguedhogi giluwe kamoro amora modhiye kendo giwinjo chikene mane musa omiyowa mondo obed mwandu mar oganda joka jakobo ruoth nyasaye nodoko ruodh israel bende iluongo ni jojeshurum kane jodong dhoutgi ochokore kaachiel kuom joreuben musa nowachoe niya joreuben mondo obed mangima kendo kik githo kata kamano onego gibed manok kuom jojuda nowuoyoe kama ruoth nyasaye winj ywak jojuda mondo idwokgi kuom ogandagi bednigi tekregi gisirorego kendo ikonygi kuom wasikgi jolawi nowuoyo kuomgi niya ruoth nyasaye nimiyo nyikwa lawi ombulu miluongo ni urim gi thumim mondo gingego dwaroni nikech gin joma tiyoni gi adiera ne itemogi masa kendo e sokni mag meriba mi inwango ni gin joma inyalo geno hera mane giherigo oloyo hera mane giherogo wuonegi gi minegi kod owetegi kata nyithindgi nikech ne giluwo mana chikeni mi girito singruok mari maber gipuonjo joka jakobo chikeni ee gipuonjo joisrael chikeni giwangoni misengni madum tik mamit kendo gitimoni misengni miwango pep e kendoni mar misango ruoth nyasaye guedh riekogi duto kendo iyie gi tichgi tiek wasikgi duto mondo wasikgigo kik chak bed gi teko kuom jobenjamin nowuoyoe kama joma ruoth nyasaye ohero odak gi kue nyasaye maduong moloyo ritogi seche duto kendo gidak e godene kuom joka josef nowachoe niya ruoth nyasaye onego guedh lopgi gi chiwo maber moa e polo malo kaachiel gi pi manie bwo piny gi olembe mabeyo chieng onyago kod olembe mabeyo manyak due ka due gi gik mabeyo mag gode chon mochwere kaachiel gi gik mabeyo mag piny kod gik moko duto manie iye gi ngwono mar jal modak e bungu maliel guethgi duto onego bed ewi joka josef jal mane oyier kuom owetene dhoode nochal gi nyarwath makayo tungene chalo gi tung jowi obiro chwowogo ogendini moriembgi nyaka tung piny gi tung piny tungego gin gi ji tara gi tara joefraim kod ji gana gi gana jomanase jozebulun nowuoyo kuomgi kama un jozebulun beduru mamor e wuodheu kendo un joisakar beduru mamor e hembeu dhoudi ariyogo biro luongo ogendini e got kama gitimoe misengni makare nimar gibiro yudo mwandu mogundho e nembe kendo gik mabeyo mopondo e dhonam kuom jogad nowuoyoe niya oguedh jalo mayaro tong jogad dhood gad chalo gi sibur madhako mogwom piny ka yiecho bat gi wi gima omako ne giyiero piny koma ber moloyo nikech gin ema nopognigi migap jatelo ne gibiro ir jotend ji kendo ne gitimo kaka ruoth nyasaye dwaro ka girito chike mane ruoth nyasaye omiyo joisrael kuom jodan nowachoe kama dhood dan chalo gi nyathi sibuor machikore koa bashan kuom jonaftali nowuoyoe niya dhood naftali nigi gik moko duto modwaro kendo en gi gueth mogundho moa kuom ruoth nyasaye bende opogne nam galili kod dho wedhe milambo kuom joasher nowachoe kama dhood asher mondo oyud gueth moloyo dhout owetene mamoko dhout owetene mondo oher dhoode kendo mondo dhoode odag maber lodi mag dhorangeyene obed mag chuma gi mag mula kendo tekone omedre ndalo duto onge nyasaye moro machal gi nyasach joka jeshurun maringo e kor polo e duongne maler mondo okonyu nyasaye mochwere nyaka chieng en kar daku kendo bedene mochwere ema konyou noriembonu wasigu mi ogolo chik mondo neggi kamano joisrael odak gi kue adier nyikwa jakobo odak maonge ngama thagogi e piny machiego cham gi divai kama tho moa e polo tonie maber ere joma mor ka un un joisrael ruoth nyasaye owaro ruoth nyasaye e kuot mogengou kendo en e liganglau mar duong wasiku mondo obolrenu kendo unyon hembko maggi gi tiendu rapar mar chik tho mar musa musa nowuok oa e paw moab moidho got nebo nyaka wi pisga yo wuokchieng mar jeriko mi ruoth nyasaye nonyise piny kanaan duto chakre gilead nyaka dan gi piny naftali duto kod piny efraim gi manase kaachiel gi piny juda duto nyaka nam mediterenia man yo podho chieng gi piny man yo milambo kod paw holo man yo jeriko miluongo ni dala othidhe nyaka zoar ruoth nyasaye nowachone niya e piny mane asingora ni ibrahim gi isaka kod jakobo ni nami nyikwagi asenyisigo mondo inene gi wangi kata kamano ok niidh loka midonjie kamano musa jatich ruoth nyasaye notho e piny moab kuno mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nosewacho mi noyike e holo momanyore gi bethpeor e piny moab onge ngama ongeyo liende nyaka chil kawuono musa ne otho ka jahigni mia achiel gi piero ariyo ne pod en ngat matek wange bith jo israel noywage e paw moab kuom ndalo piero adek nyaka ndalo miywagego norumo joshua wuod nun nomi rieko mathoth nikech musa noseyieyo lwete kuome mi joisrael nowinje motimo gik mane ruoth nyasaye ochiko musa nyaka koroni janabi moro machal gi musa mane ruoth nyasaye romogo wang gi wang pok owuok e israel paruru ranyisi gi honni duto mane ruoth nyasaye ooro musa mondo odhi otim ni farao gi joge kod piny misri duto kendo paruru timbe madongo kendo malich mane musa otimo ka joisrael neno joshua joisrael ikore mondo omonj piny kanaan kane musa jatich ruoth nyasaye osetho ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni joshua wuod nun mane jalup musa niya musa jatichna osetho omiyo ikri gi joisrael duto mondo ungad aora jordan udhi e piny mamiyou kamoro amora tiendu onyono nobed maru kaka nasingora ni musa kuonde duto nobed mau chakre e thim yo milambo nyaka lebanon yo nyandwat kendo koa yufrate aora maduong man yo wuok chieng koluwo piny johiti nyaka nam mediterenia man yo podho chieng onge ngat nosiri nyaka chieng anabed kodi kaka nabet gi musa ok naweyi kata jwangi ok najwangi bed gi chir kendo gi jingo nimar ema nitel ni jogagi ka gikawo piny mane asingora ni kweregi ni namigi bed mana gi chir kendo gi jingo kiluwo chik duto mane musa jatichna omiyi kik iwe chikno kibaro koracham kata korachwich mi inibed gi hawi kuonde duto midhiye kik wiyi wil gi kitap chikno nyaka isome odiechieng gotieno kendo ine ni iluwo chik duto mondikie eka inidongi kendo noguedh gik moko duto mitimo par kaka asechiki ni mondo ibed gi chir kendo gi jingo kik iluor kendo kik chunyi nyosre nikech ruoth nyasaye nyasachi kodi kuonde duto midhiye eka joshua nochiko jotend joisrael kowachonigi niya wuothuru e kambi duto kunyiso ji niya ikreuru nimar bang ndalo adek ubiro ngado aora jordan mondo ukaw piny ruoth nyasaye miyou joshua nowacho ni joreuben gi jogad kod jomanase konchiel niya paruru gima musa jatich ruoth nyasaye nochikou kowacho niya ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nomiu pinyni mondo obed kar daku mondu gi nyithindu kod jambu nyalo dong e piny mane musa omiyou yo wuok chieng mar aora jordan un jolweny nyaka uidh loka kutelo e nyim joisrael weteu mondo ukonygi kedo ka gin bende gisekawo piny ruoth nyasaye nyasachu miyogi kendo gidakie eka unuduogi mondo udag e pinyu uwegi man yo wuok chieng mar aora jordan mane musa jatich nyasaye omiyou ne giduoko joshua niya wanatim duto michikowa kendo wanadhi kamoro amora miorowae wanawinji kaka ne wawinjo musa nyasaye mondo obed kodi kaka nobedo gi musa ngato angata nodagi winjo chikni kata notamre timo gima ichiko nonegi omiyo bed gi chir kendo gi jingo joshua joshua ooro jombetre jeriko kane pod gin shitim joshua wuod nun nooro jombetre ariyo lingling mondo odhi ocheng piny jombetrego nodhi jeriko modonjo e od dhako moro ohodho nyinge rahab kendo ne ginindo kanyo ruodh jeriko noyudo wach ni joisrael moko osebiro kanyo gotieno mondo ocheng piny omiyo nooro ni rahab wach kochike niya golnwa joma nie odigo oko nimar gisebiro mondo gicheng pinywa duto noyudo dhakono osepandogi omiyo nodwoko ruoth niya adier jomoko nende obiro e oda ne ok angeyo kuma giaye nende giwuok kar sa miloroe rangach ka piny dwaro yuso akia kuma gidhiye kulawogi matek ubiro jukogi chutho noseterogi e tado moumogi gi tworo mane osechano kanyo jootego nowuok molor rangach ne gilawo jombetre ka giluwo yo madhi kuma iyorogo aora jordan kane rahab odhi ir jombetrego e tado nonwango ka pok ginindo mowachonigi niya angeyo ni ruoth nyasaye osemiyou pinyni kendo en adier ni waduto waluor nikech birou kendo kibaji omako piny duto wasewinjo kaka ruoth nyasaye nodwono pi nam makwar e nyimu kane ua misri bende wasewinjo kaka nunego sihon gi og ruodhi mag joamon man loka jordan kaachiel gi ogendini mag lweny kane wawinjo wachno ne wadoko maluor birou bende osekawo chunywa duto nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasachu en nyasach polo gi piny emomiyo koro kuongrenauru e nying ruoth nyasaye kendo umiya ranyisi ni kaka asetimonu maber un bende nutimne joodwa maber singrenauru ni unures wuora gi mama kod owetena gi nyiminena kaachiel gi joutgi duto kik uwe watho jogo nodwoke niya kutho kara wan bende owojore watho ka ruoth nyasaye osemiyowa pinyni wanarit singruokwa kendo wanatimni maber mak mana kihulo wachwani rahab nodak e ot mochuog e kor ohinga mar dala jeriko omiyo nogologi gie dirisa molorogi piny gi tol kowachonigi niya dhiuru e got nikech dipo ka joma lawou oyudou ponduru kuno kuom ndalo adek bange ka jogo oseduogo eka uchak wuoth jombetrego nosieme ni ka ok otimo gima gichike muma ok nomakgi ne giwachone niya chieng wanadonj e pinyni nyaka itue tol makwarni e dirisa kama ilorowaeni kendo ichok wuoru gi meru gi oweteni kod joodu duto mondo gibed kodi e odi ka ka ngato nowuog oko mi negi rembe nobed e wiye owuon kendo ok wanabed joketho ka oneg ngato man kodi e ot rembe nobed e wiwa kapo ni ihulo wachwani muma ok nomakwa nodwokogi niya obed kamano eka noweyogi mi gidhi bange notueyo tol makwar e dirisa kamano ne gidhi e got mi gipondo kuno joma ne lawogi nomanyogi kuonde duto e yo madhi jordan kuom ndalo adek ne ok giyudogi omiyo ne gidok jeriko eka jombetre ariyogo nolor oa e got ne gingado aora mi gidok ir joshua ne ginyise weche duto notimorenigi ka gimedo nyise niya ruoth nyasaye osemiyowa pinyno duto kendo kibaji osemako ji duto ka giwinjo birowa joshua joisrael ongado aora jordan gokinyi mangich joshua kod joisrael duto nowuok shitim mi gidhi aora jordan ne gibworo kanyo ka pok gingado aora bang ndalo adek jotelo nowuotho e kambi duto ka ginyiso ji niya kuneno ka jolawi jodolo otelo e nyimu kotingo sandug muma mar ruoth nyasachu eka un bende unuchak wuoth kuluwo sanduk kuluwe kamano eka ununge yo monego uluw nimar yandi pok ubiro koni kik usud machiegni kode weuru thuolo dirom ondamo alufu achiel joshua nowacho ni ji niya puodhreuru nikech kiny ruoth nyasaye notimnu hono maduong eka nowacho ni jodolo niya tinguru sandug muma kendo utel ni ji mi ne gitimo kamano ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni joshua niya tinendeni abiro chako miyi bedo gi duong e nyim joisrael duto kendo gininge ni abedo kodi mana kaka nabedo gi musa omiyo nyis jodolo motingo sandug muma ni ka gichopo e aora jordan mondo gichung e pi joshua nowacho ni joisrael niya biuru ka mondo uwinj gima ruoth nyasaye nyasachu owacho tinende unuyud ranyisi ni nyasaye mangima ni kodu kendo nodarnu jokanaan gi johiti gi johivi gi joperizi gi jogirgash gi joamor kod jojebus sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye ruodh piny ngima notelnu kungado aora jordan kendo ka jodolo motinge nonyon pi jordan aora nowe mol mi pi moa malo nogudre kogingore ka pith koro yieruru ji apar gariyo kuom dhout istrael kugolo ngat achiel e dhoot ka dhoot omiyo ji nowuok e kambi mondo ongad aora jordan ka jodolo otelonigi kotingo sandug muma ne en ndalo keyo kinde mane aora pongie mao kane jodolo ochopo e dho aora mi giketo tiendegi e pi gikanyono pi nochung gi yo ka malo kogingore machiegni gi adam dala man zarethan pi mane mol kochomo nam mar araba miluongo ni nam kado noduono chuth mi joisrael nongado aora kama omanyore gi jeriko jodolo notingo sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye nochung e lowo motwo e dier jordan nyaka joisrael duto notieko kadho ka giwuotho e lowo motwo joshua ogol kite apar gariyo e aora jordan kane ji duto osengado aora jordan ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni joshua niya yier ji apar gariyo kigolo ngat achiel e dhoot ka dhoot kendo chikgi mondo gikwany kite apar gariyo e dier jordan kama ne jodolo ochungie mondo gitinggi mi gichunggi kama ang nubworie gotienoni eka joshua noluongo ji apar gariyo noseyiero mowachonigi niya kadhuru utel e nyim sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nyaka e dier jordan kendo ngato ka ngato mondo okwany kidi achiel oyie e goke mondo kidi aora jordan eka nowacho ni joisrael niya ka nyikwau nopenju ngech kitegi e ndalo mabiro ununyisgi ni joisrael nongado aora jordan kotwo kendo ne ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nomiyo aora jordan odwono nyaka gin ema joshua noterogi nyangu kane osetergi nyangu ji duto nobet e kambi nyaka ne gichango eka ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni musa niya tinendeni asegolo ayanj jomisri oko kuomu mano emomiyo nochak kanyo asechiwo jeriko gi ruodhe e lweti nyaka ilwor dalano gi jogi mag lweny kuom ndalo auchiel kilwore odiechieng kodiechieng dichiel jodolo abiriyo nyaka dhi e nyim sandug muma koting tunge abiriyo molos gi tunge imbe chieng mar abiriyo nyaka ilwor dala gi jogi mag lweny nyadibiriyo ka jodolo goyo tungegi ka giselwore kamano mondo gigo tung dichiel matek gikanyono muwinjoe tung ji duto mondo okog kane joshua osegolo chik kamano ne gilworo dala dichiel gi sanduk mar ruoth nyasaye eka bange ne gidok e kambi mi ginindo kanyo joshua nochiew gokinyi mangich kendo jodolo notingo sanduk mar ruoth dichiel chieng mar ariyo eka gidok e kambi ne gitimo kamano kuom ndalo auchiel chieng mar abiriyo ne gichiew ka ugue wang mi gilworo dala dibiryo chiengno kende ema ne gilworoe dalani dibiriyo e sa mane gilworee mar abiriyo jodolo ne goyo tung eka joshua nowacho ni jolweny niya koro gueuru nikech ruoth nyasaye osemiyou dalani joma odakie kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie iye noketh chuth kendo dhano ok nomulgi ginibed gik mochiw ni ruoth nyasaye rahab gi ji duto manie ode kende ema nowe ka ngima nikech en ema nopando jombetre mane waoro un beduru motang kendo kik ugomb gik mokwer kik ukaw kata achiel kuomgi nikech kutimoo kamano masira momako jodalano nomak kambi joisrael kendo nokelnigi chandruok fedha gi dhahabu duto kod gik moko molos gi mula kod molos gi nyinyo ema nobed gik mochiw ni ruoth nyasaye kendo nyaka tergi e kar keno mare jodolo nogoyo tung kendo kane jolweny owinjo ne gigueyo gi duol maduong mi ohinga mar dala nopodho eka jolweny duto nodonjo e dala ka ngato ka ngato ochomo nyime tir mi gikawe ne giketho gik moko duto e dalano bende ne ginego ngato angata dichwo kata dhako rawera kata moti kod dhok gi romb kod kenje joshua nowacho ni jombetre ariyo kande mondo odhi e od rahab okele kaachiel gi joode kaka ne gisesingore ni ginitim omiyo yawuowigo nodhi mogolo rahab gi wuon kod min gi owetene kod ji duto mane ni kode ne gikelogi duto mi giweyogi e kambi mar joisrael gi yo ka oko eka ne giwango dala gi gik moko duto manie iye mak mana fedha gi dhahabu kod gik molos gi mula kod molos gi nyinyo ema ne gikawo mi gikano kar keno mar od ruoth nyasaye kamano joshua noreso ngima rahab gi joode kod ji duto mane nii kode nikech nosepando jombetre noor mondo ocheng jeriko nyikwa rahab pod odak gi joisrael nyaka chil kawuono chiengno joshua nokwero ji gi kuong niya ruoth nyasaye mondo okum ngat notem gero jeriko kendo koketo mise mare wuode makayo notho kendo kochungo dharangaye wuode chogo notho kamano ruoth nyasaye ne ni kod joshua mi humbe nolak e pinyno duto joshua richo mar akan joisrael ne ok orito chik mane nyasaye ogolo ni mondo oketh gik moko duto akan wuod karmi wuod zabdi wuod zera jajuda nokawo gik mokwer mi ruoth nyasaye nokecho gi joisrael kane gin jeriko joshua noseoro jomoko mondo odhi ai dala man machiegni gi bethaven yo wuokchieng mar bethel mondo girang kaka pinyy chalo mi jogo notimo kamano kane giduogo jeriko ne giwacho ni joshua niya jolweny duto ok onego dhi ai mana ji alufu adek kata ariyo kende ema mondo odhi omonje kik imi jolweny duto sandre gi idho malo kuro nikech joma odak kuno nok kamano ji dirom alufu adek nodhi ai joai noriembogi kendo nonego ji alufu piero adek gauchiel kuomgi joai nolawogi chakre rangagi nyaka shebarim monegogi kama yo ridoree gikanyono chir mane joisrael nigo nolalnigi ka yamo joshua gi jodong israel noyiecho lepgi kendo noolo buru e wigi ne giriere piny auma e nyim sanduk mar ruoth nyasaye mi giriyo kanyo nyaka odhiambo joshua nowacho niya ruoth nyasaye ere gimomiyo isekelo jogi loka jordan mana ni mondo ichiwgi e lwet joamor kendo itiekgi mad ne wasik loka cha ruoth nyasaye ango dawachi ka koro wasigu oseriembo joisrael kapo ni jokanaan kod jopinyno duto owinjo wachni gibiro nur kuomwa kendo yweyowa ka yuech koro ango nitim mondo ire nyingi maduongni ruoth nyasaye nodwoko joshua niya malo ango momiyo inindo auma kamano joisrael oseketho ok giserito chik mane amiyogi gisekwalo gik mokwer kendo giriwogi gi mekgi mano emomiyo ok ginyal siro wasikgi giringo nimar gin bende koro okwedgi ka ok giwango gimoro amora mokwer gisekawo ok anabed kodgi malo luong ji duto kendo chikgi mondo gipwodhre ka giikore ni gima kiny notimre nyisgi ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel owacho ni gisekawo gik mokwer omiyo ka pok gigolo gigo kuomgi ok ginyal siro wasikgi kiny gokinyi ngato ka ngato ngat ombulu nonyis ni nokawo gik mokwer nowang gi joge kaachiel gi mwandune duto nikech osetimo gima nono kendo oseketho chik mane ruoth nyasaye omiyo joge israel joshua nochiew gokinyi mangich moluongo joisrael oko libamba ka libamba libamba mar jojuda ema nokwany noluongo dhout juda joka zera ema nokwany kuom joka zera anywola mar zabdi ema nokwany kane ogolo ngato ka ngato kuom joka zabdi akan wuod karmi wuod zabdi wuod zera ema nokwany eka joshua nowacho ni akan niya wuoda mi ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel duong kendo hulne richoni nyisa gima isetimo ok ipanda kata achiel akan nodwoke niya adier aseketho e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel nikech kane aneno law maber molos shinar gi fedha pekne oromo kilo ariyo kod dhahabu pekne oromo nu kilo kuom mwandu jeriko gombo nomaka makawogi nakunyogi e hemba ka fedha ema akuongo keto e bur joshua nooro joote modhi e hema piyopiyo ne giyudo gigo koyiki e lowo mana kaka akan nowacho ne gigologi kendo gikelogi ir joshua kod joisrael duto mi giyarogi e nyim ruoth nyasaye eka joshua kod joisrael duto nokawo akan nyakwar zera kaachiel gi fedha kod law kod dhahabu gi yawuote gi nyige gi dhoge gi kenjene gi rombene gi hembe kod mwandune duto moterogi e holo mar akor joshua nowacho ni akan niya isekelonwa masira marach koro bende ruoth nyasaye biro keloni masira eka joisrael duto nogoyo akan kod joge gi kite nyaka githo mi giwangogi kaachiel gi mwandune ne gidhuro kuome kite mogundho pod ni kanyo nyaka chil kawuono mano emomiyo pod iluongo kanyo ni holo mar akor tiende ni holo mar masira eka bange mirimb ruoth nyasaye norumo nyasaye nyasach israel nikech kane aneno law maber molos shinar gi fedha pekne oromo kilo ariyo kod dhahabu pekne oromo nu kilo kuom mwandu jeriko gombo nomaka makawogi nakunyogi e hemba ka fedha ema akuongo keto e bur joshua nooro joote modhi e hema piyopiyo ne giyudo gigo koyiki e lowo mana kaka akan nowacho ne gigologi kendo gikelogi ir joshua kod joisrael duto mi giyarogi e nyim ruoth nyasaye eka joshua kod joisrael duto nokawo akan nyakwar zera kaachiel gi fedha kod law kod dhahabu gi yawuote gi nyige gi dhoge gi kenjene gi rombene gi hembe kod mwandune duto moterogi e holo mar akor joshua nowacho ni akan niya isekelonwa masira marach koro bende ruoth nyasaye biro keloni masira eka joisrael duto nogoyo akan kod joge gi kite nyaka githo mi giwangogi kaachiel gi mwandune ne gidhuro kuome kite mogundho pod ni kanyo nyaka chil kawuono mano emomiyo pod iluongo kanyo ni holo mar akor tiende ni holo mar masira eka bange mirimb ruoth nyasaye norumo joshua joisrael okawo ai moketho ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni joshua niya kik iluor kendo kik chunyi nyosre kaw jolweny duto kendo dhi imonj ai anachiw ruodh ai gi dalane gi joge kod pinye e lweti kendo unutim ni ai kod ruodhe mana kaka nutimo ni jeriko kod ruodhe wangni unyalo kawo dhok kod gik moko muyudo kuno koro jolweny moko mondo odhi opond yo podho chieng mar dalano omiyo joshua kod jolweny duto noikore mondo omonj ai noyiero jolweny alufu piero adek moorogi gotieno kowachonigi niya ponduru yo podho chieng mar dalano kubet machiegni kode kendo kuikore anamonje gi jolweny modong ka jogo nowuog mondo orad kodwa kaka ne gitimo chieng mokwongo wanaring e nyimgi kuom mano ginipar ni waringogi kaka ne watimo mokwongo mi ginilawwa nyaka chop waseywayogi mabor gi dalagi kwaringo kamano eka uwuogi kama upondoe kendo ukaw dalagino nikech ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro chiwe e lwetu kendo osechiko ni kusekawe uwange koro timuru kamano eka joshua noorogi yo podho chieng mar ai mondo gipond e kind dalano kod bethel joshua nonindo kanyachiel gi jolweny gokinyi mangich nochiew mochokogi kendo ne gidhi ai kotelo gi jodong israel nyaka ne gichopo machiegni gi dalano ne gijot yo nyandwat mar ai holo ne ni e kindgi gi dalano joshua noseoro ji maromo alufu abich yo podho chieng mar ai mondo opond e kind dalano kod bethel kamano thoth jolweny nojot yo nyandwat mar ai joma nopondo ne ni yo podho chieng joshua nonindo e holo kane ruodh ai oneno ni joisrael nowuok mapiyo gi joge duto mondo oked kodgi ne ok ongeyo ni jolweny moko osepondone yo podho chieng mar dala joshua kod joisrael nowuondore ni ologi mi giringo ka gichomo thim eka noluong joai duto mane ni e dala mondo olawgi kane gilawo joshua kamano ne gichwalora mabor gi dalagi onge ngato kata achiel nodong e ai nikech ne gisewuok giduto mondo gilaw joisrael kuom mano ne giweyo dala nono eka ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni joshua niya siem yo ai gi tongi nimar abiro chiwe e lweti mi joshua notimo kamano kane joisrael mopondo oneno ranyisi joshua otimono ne giwuok ne giringo piyopiyo mi gidonjo e dala kendo kane gisekawe ne giwange gi kanyono kane joai ogoyo machiemo ne gineno iro kadum e dala kochomo polo onge kuma ne ginyalo tonyie nikech joisrael noyudo wuondore ni ringo kochomo thim nolokore gi joma ne lawogi joshua gi joisrael duto nolokore gi joai nikech ne gineno ka joma nopondo koro osekawo dala mi owango joai mane owuok mondo orad gi joisrael koro noket diere mi joisrael nonegogi duto maonge modong kata motony mak mana ruodh ai ema ne gimako kangima mi gitero ir joshua kane joisrael osenego joai duto mane ni e pap kod mane ni e thim kuma ne giselawogie ne gidok ai mi ginego ji duto nodong kuno chiengno noneg joai duto onge ngama dichwo kata madhako nodong ne giromo ji alufu apar gariyo joshua ne ok oweyo siemo ai gi tong nyaka noneg ji duto nodak kuno joisrael nokawo mana dhok gi mwandu mane giyudo kaluwore gi wach mane ruoth nyasaye owacho ni joshua kamano joshua nowango ai chuth moweye kokethore onge ji modakie nyaka chil kawuono noliero ruodh ai e yath moweye kanyo nyaka odhiambo ka chieng podho nogolo chik mondo ongade oko e yath ne giwito ringre e dhoranga dala mi gidhuro kuome kite mogundho pod ni kanyo nyaka chil kawuono joshua ondiko chik musa ka joisrael nie got ebal rapar mar chik joshua nogero kendomarmisango ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel e got ebal nogere gi kite ok opa gi gir nyinyo kaluwore gi chik mane musa jatich ruoth nyasaye omiyo joisrael kaka ondik e kitap chik mar musa ne gitimo ni ruoth nyasaye misengni miwango pep kod mag sawo e kendono joshua nondiko chik musa e kitego e nyim joisrael mi joisrael duto gi joma nobiro kodgi kaachiel gi jodongo gi jotelo kod jongad bura nochung e dir sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye koni gi koni ka gimanyore gi jolawi jodolo notinge joisrael moko nochung kochomo got gerazim modong nochomo got ebal mondo oguedhgi kaka musa jatich ruoth nyasaye nosechiko chon eka joshua nosomo weche duto mag gueth kod mag kuong mana kaka ondik e kitap chik ne ok oweyo kata wach achiel kuom weche mane musa osechiko nosomogi duto gi dwol maduong ni joisrael duto machwo gi mamon gi joma tindo kod joma nobiro kodgi joshua jogibeon owuondo joisrael ruodhi duto nodak yo podho chieng mar jordan nowinjo humb wechego ne gin ruodhi mag johiti gi mag joamor gi mag jokanaan gi mag joperizi gi mag johivi kod mag jojebus mane gin ogendini modak e gode gi pewe kod e dho nam mediterenia nyaka lebanon yo nyandwat kane giwinjo wechego ne giriwore giduto mondo giked gi joshua kod joisrael kane jogibeon owinjo gima joshua osetimo jeriko gi ai ne giparo mondo giwuonde ne gikawo gunde moti motingo chiemo motwo kendo mopur mi giketo e nge kenjegi kaachiel gi ndede mobaw obaw mag divai ne girwako wuoch moyiech kod nengni moti eka ne gibiro ir joshua e kambi gilgal mi giwachone kod joisrael niya waa e piny mabor ahinya omiyo yie watim kodu winjruok mar kue joisrael nodwoko johivigo niya ango dimi watim kodu winjruok mar kue kamoro udak mana machiegni kodwa johivi nowacho ni joshua niya wayie bedo e bwo lochni eka joshua nopenjogi nyinggi kendo kuma giaye ne gidwoke niya ruoth waa e piny mabor ahinya nikech humb ruoth nyasaye nyasachu wasewinjo gik notimore e misri kendo gima notimo ni ruodhi ariyo mag joamor man yo wuok chieng mar jordan gin sihon ruodh heshbon kod og ruodh bashan nodak ashtaroth omiyo jodongwa duto nochikowa mondo wakaw chiemo dirom wuoth kendo wabi iru mondo wanyisu ni wayie bedo e bwo lochu kuom mano yie watim kodu winjruok mar kue neuru makati mwatingogi kane wachako wuoth kwabiro ka ne pod giliet koro gisetwo kendo gipur neuru ndedewagi kane waoloe divai ne ginyien koro giseyiech wuochewa gi lepwa bende oseti nikech wuoth mabor jotelo moko mag joisrael nobilo chiemb jogo mak gipenjo ruoth nyasaye wach omiyo joshua norwako jootego motimo kodgi winjruok mar kue kokuongorenigi ni ok noneggi kendo jodong israel bende okuongorenigi kamano chieng mar adek bang timo kodgi winjruokno wach nofwenyore ni kara gin manaa jogweng modak machiegni mano omiyo joisrael nochako wuoth kendo bang ndalo adek ne gichopo e mier mane jogo odakie miego ne gin gibeon gi kefira gi beeroth kod kiriathjearim joisrael ne ok onegogi nikech singruok mane jodong israel otimo kodgi e nying ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel kata kamano ji duto nongur gi jodonggi jodongo duto nodwokogi niya ngeuru ni ne wachamo kodgi muma e nying ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel omiyo koro ok wanyal mulogi wabiro weyogi mak wanegogi mondo muma mane wachamo kodgi kik dognwa wabiro ketogi joma baronwa yien kendo umbonwa pi kamano joisrael duto noyie gi wach mane jodonggi onyisogi joshua noluongo jogibeon mopenjogi niya ere gimomiyo ne uwuondowa kamano nunyisowa ni ua e piny mabor ahinya kara un mana jogweng koro unubed joma okwedi nikech wachni kendo e kinde duto unubed wasumbwa baro yien kendo umbo pi mitiyogo e od nyasachwa ne gidwoke niya ruoth ne watimo kamano nikech nonyiswa ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachi nochiko musa jatichne ni mondo ochiwnu pinyni duto kendo ni mondo uneg ji duto modakie kuom mano birou osemiyo kihondko omakowa koro wan e lweti omiyo timnwa gima ineno ni ber kamano joshua noresogi e lwet joisrael mi ne ok ginegogi chakre kanyono noketogi jobar yien kod joumb pi ni joisrael kendo ni tich kendomarmisango mar ruoth nyasaye pod gitiyo kamano nyaka chil kawuono kamoro amora ruoth nyasaye oyiero ruodhi abichgo noringo mopondo e rogo man makeda noyudgi monyis joshua ni gipondo kanyo eka joshua nowacho niya ngieluru kite madongo olorgo dho rogono kendo uket ji orite kik udek kuno meduru mana lawo wasiku kendo kik uwe gichop e miechgi mak unegogi nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasachu osechiwogi e lwetu joshua kod joisrael nonego joamor motieko mak mana ji manok nodonjo e mier mochiel gi ohinga ema notony eka jolweny duto nodwogo ir joshua makeda kangima onge ngama notemo timo gimoro marach ni joisrael koro joshua nowacho ni mondo oel dho rogo kendo okelne ruodhi abichgo mi ne gitimo kamano ne gin ruodhi mag jerusalem gi hebron gi jarmuth gi lakish kod eglon kane gisekelogi ire joshua noluongo joisrael duto mowacho ni jotend jolweny nodhi kode niya suduru ka mondo unyon ngut ruodhigi mi ne gitimo kamano eka joshua nowacho ni jotelogo niya kik uluor kata kik chunyu nyosre beduru gi chir kendo gi jingo nimar mano e kaka ruoth nyasaye notim ni wasigu duto mubiro kedogo bange joshua nonego ruodhigo kendo nolierogi e yien abich mi ne giriyoe nyaka odhiambo kane chieng podho joshua nogolo chik mi ongadgi oko kendo nowitgi e rogo mane gisepondoeno eka nolor dho rogo gi kite madongo pod ni kanyo nyaka chil kawuono chiengno joshua nokawo makeda monego ruodhe gi joge notiekogi duto kaachiel gi gimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno ne ok oweyo ngato ka ngima kata achiel kendo notimo ni ruodh makeda mana kaka nosetimo ni ruodh jeriko bang mano joshua gi joisrael duto noa makeda modhi libna ne gimonjo dalano mi ruoth nyasaye nochiwe gi ruodhe e lwetgi kendo ne ginego joma odakie duto kod gimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno ne ok giweyo kata ngat achiel kangima kendo ne gitimo ni ruodh dalano mana kaka ne gitimo ni ruodh jeriko kane joshua kod joisrael duto oa kanyo ne gidhi mi gilworo lakish ne gimonje kendo ruoth nyasaye nochiwe e lwetgi ne gikawe bang ndalo ariyo mi ne ginego gimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno kaka ne gisetimo libna e kindeno horam ruodh gezer nobiro mondo ore lakish joshua nonege kaachiel gi joge onge ngama otony joshua kod joisrael duto noa lakish modhi eglon ne gilwore kendo gimonje mi gikawe mana odiechiengno ne ginego ji duto modakie kod gimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno mana kaka ne gitimo lakish kane gia eglon joshua kod joisrael duto nodhi momonjo hebron ne gikawe mi ginego ruodhe kod gimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno kaachiel gi mago mane nie mier matindo mokiewo kode joshua noketho dalano chuth ok oweyo kata ngat achiel kangima mana ne gitimo eglon bange joshua gi joisrael duto nowichore mochomo debir mi gimonje ne gikawe kaachiel gi ruodhe kod mier matindo mokiewo kode mi ne ginego ji duto kod gimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno ne ok giweyo ngato otony kata achiel ne gitimo ni debir gi ruodhe mana kaka ne gitimo ni hebron kod libna gi ruodhi maggi kamano joshua nokawo pinyno duto noloyo ruodhi mag piny gode kod mag piny milambo gi mag pewe kod mag kuonde motimo thidhiya nonego ji duto ok oweyo ngato otony kata achiel kotieko gimoro amora yueyo kaka ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel nosechiko nonego jopinjego duto chakre kadeshbarnea nyaka gaza kokwako piny duto mar jogoshen nyaka gibeon joshua nomako ruodhigo duto kaachiel gi pinjegi e lweny achielno nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel nokedo ni joge bange joshua gi joisrael duto nodok e kambi gilgal joshua joisrael oloyo jabin gi joma ne oriwore kode kane jabin ruodh hazor owinjo wechego duto nooro wach ni jobab ruodh madon kod ruodhi mag shimron gi akshaf kod ruodhi mae piny gode yo nyandwat gi holo mar aora jordan man yo milambo mar kinereth kod mae pewe gi mae piny dor yo podho chieng nooro wach bende ni jokanaan yo wuokchieng gi yo podho chieng kendo ni joamor gi johiti gi joperizi gi jojebus nodak e piny gode kod johivi nodak e tiend got hermon e piny mizpa giduto ne giwuok gi jolwenjgi duto ne gingeny ka kuoyo mae dhonam kendo ne gin gi geche lweny mogundho ruodhigo duto noriwo paro achiel mi ne gibiro kendo gijot e dho kuonde motimo thidhiya mag merom mondo gimonj joisrael ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni joshua niya kik iluorgi nimar kiny sa makama nachiwgi e lwet joisrael kendo giduto ginitho mi ningad odond faresegi kendo niwang gechegi kamano joshua kod jolwenje nopoyogi e dho kuonde motimo thidhiya mag merom mi gimwomore kuomgi ruoth nyasaye nochiwogi e lwet joisrael mi joisrael noloyogi kendo nolawogi yo nyandwat nyaka sidon maduong kendo yo podho chieng nyaka misrefoth kendo yo wuok chieng nyaka holo mar mizpa ne ginegogi onge kata ngat achiel nodong ka ngima joshua nongado odond faresegi kendo nowango gechegi kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko eka joshua nowichore ni hazor dala noyudo otelo ni pinjego joisrael nokawe monego ruodhe ne ginego gimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno onge gima yueyo manodong kendo ne giwango dalano kamano joshua nomako ruodhigo monego kendo noketho miechgi nonego ji duto nodak e miego kendo noketho gik moko duto kaka musa jatich ruoth nyasaye nosechiko joisrael ne ok owango mier mane oger ewi pidhe mak mana hazor kende ema ne joshua owango ne gipeyo dhok mi giyako gimoro amora mane giyudo e miego kendo ne ginego ji duto ok giweyo kata ngat achiel ka yueyo ruoth nyasaye noketo chikene e lwet musa jatichne musa nomiyogi joshua mi joshua nochopo duto ok oweyo kata chik achiel mane ruoth nyasaye omiyo musa joshua okawo piny kanaan duto joshua nokawo piny gode gi piny milambo duto gi piny goshen duto kaachiel kod pewe gi holo mar aora jordan kod piny gode mag israel gi pewe mokiewo kode lochne nochakore got halak man seir nyaka baalgad e holo mar lebanon manie tiend got hermon nokedo gi pinjego kuom ndalo mangeny nyaka nomako ruodhi maggi duto monego miego duto nokaw gi thwon onge mane otimo winjruok gi joisrael mak mana gibeon mane johivi odakie ruoth nyasaye nomiyogi chir mar kedo gi joisrael mondo joisrael oneggi maonge ngwono kendo otiekgi chuth mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nosechiko musa e ndalogo ema ne joshua odhiye piny gode motieko joanak mane odak hebron gi debir gi anab kendo e piny gode duto mag juda kod mag israel notiekogi duto kendo noketho miechgi onge joanak nodong kata achiel e piny mane joisrael okawo mak mana mago nodak gaza gi gath kod ashdod kamano joshua nokawo pinyno duto kochopo chike duto mane ruoth nyasaye omiyo musa joshua nomiyo joisrael pinyno kopogo ni dhoot ka dhoot lembe mi piny nokue joshua ruodhi mane musa oloyo joisrael nosekawo piny duto man yo wuokchieng mar aora jordan chakre aora arnon koluwo aora jordan nyaka got hermon kendo ne ginego ruodhi mag pinyno ne ginego sihon ruodh joamor nodak heshbon pinye nochakore aroer man holo mar arnon koluwo holono piny gilead konchiel nyaka aora jabok motimo tong amon bende ne nie pinye kaachiel gi piny man yo wuok chieng mar aora jordan chakre nam galili nyaka nam araba miluongo ni nam kado koluwo yor bethjeshimoth kochomo yo milambo nyaka got pisga bende ne ginego og ruodh bashan nodak ashtaroth gi edrei ne en achiel kuom jorefaim manok nodong got hermon gi saleka kod bashan duto mochopo e mbap geshur gi maakath kod gilead komachielo nyaka mbap sihon ruodh heshbon ne nie pinye musa jatich nyasaye kod joisrael nonegogi duto mokawo pinygi nomiyo joreuben gi jogad kod jomanase konchiel pinyno mondo obed margi ruodhi mane joshua oloyo joshua kod joisrael nonego ruodhi modak e piny man yo podho chieng mar aora jordan chakre baalgad e holo mar lebanon nyaka got halak man seir joshua nokawo pinygi mopogo ni dhout israel mondo obed margi ne en piny gode gi pewe gi holo mar aora jordan gi kuonde motimo thidhiya gi piny milambo kuondego ema johiti gi joamor gi jokanaan gi joperizi gi johivi kod jojebus odakie ne ginego ruodhi mag jeriko gi ai man bethel gi jerusalem gi hebron gi jarmuth gi lakish gi eglon gi gesher gi debir gi geder gi horma gi arad gi libna gi adulam gi makeda gi bethel gi tapia gi hefer gi afek gi sharon gi madon gi hazor gi shimronmeron gi akshaf gi taanak gi megido gi kedesh gi jokneamkarmel gi dor e piny dor gi gaimgalili kod tirza giduto ne gin ruodhi piero adek gachiel joshua bath piny kanaan pod onego kaw joshua koro noseti kendo hike oniang mi ruoth nyasaye nowachone niya isedoko jaduong moti piny malach pod odong monego kaw magi e pinje pod odong piny jofilistia kod piny jogeshur duto pinyno duto chakre shihor yo wuok chieng mar misri nyaka ekron yo nyandwat ikwano ka piny kanaan ruodhi mag jofilistia nodak gaza gi ashdod gi ashkelon gi gath kod ekron ema ne weg pinyno piny joavim duto yo milambo gi piny jokanaan duto chakre meara e piny josidon nyaka afek gi mbap joamor kod piny jogebal gi piny lebanon duto man yo wuok chieng mar baalgad manie tiend got hermon nyaka kama idonjogo hamath pinyno otingo josidon modak e piny gode chakre lebanon nyaka misrefothmaim anariemb jogo duto mondo oweni joisrael thuolo pinyno duto ipog ni joisrael mondo obed margi kaka asechiki koro pog pinyni ni dhoudi ochiko kande kaachiel gi jomanase konchiel piny mopog ni jo manase konchiel gi jo reuben kod jo gad jomanase komachielo kaachiel gi joreuben kod jogad noseyudo pinje mane musa jatich ruoth nyasaye omiyogi yo wuok chieng mar jordan nopogonigi pinyno chakre aroer man holo mar aora arnon gi piny mopie man e bath holo konchiel kendo notingo piny pap duto chakre medeba nyaka dibon kod mier duto mag sihon ruodh joamor nodak heshbon nyaka mbap joamon notingo bende piny gilead kod piny jogeshur gi jomaakath kod got hermon duto gi piny bashan duto nyaka saleka piny bashan notingo piny og duto mane og orito kodak ashtaroth gi edrei e ndalo mane musa onegoe jorefaim manok nodong mokawo pinygi og kende ema notony joisrael ne ok oriembo jogeshur gi jomaakath omiyo pod gidak gi joisrael nyaka chil kawuono jolawi kende ema ne ok oyudo piny nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel ema nobedo ka mwandugi kaka nosesingorenigi musa nosepogo piny gi dhout joreuben pinygi nochakore aroer man holo mar aora arnon kod piny mopie manie bath holo konchiel kendo notingo piny pap duto nyaka medeba gi heshbon kaachiel gi mier mokiewo kode duto kod dibon gi bethbaalmeon gi jahaz gi kedemoth gi mafaath gi kiriathaim gi sibma kod zerethshahar e got manie holo gi bethpeor gi kuonde thidhiya mag got pisga gi bethjeshimoth kod mier moko duto mag piny pap gi piny duto mane sihon ruodh joamor nodak heshbon orito musa nosenego sihon kaachiel gi evi gi rekam gi zur gi hur kod reba mane jodong jomidian jodongogo nodak e pinyno ka gin e bwo loch sihon balaam wuod beor mane jakor wach ne en achiel kuom joma joisrael nonego aora jordan ema nobedo mbap joreuben pinyno kaachiel gi mieche kod mier matindo mokiewo kodgi nobedo mwandu dhout joreuben bende musa nopogo piny ni dhout jogad pinygi ne en jazer gi miech gilead duto kod piny joamon konchiel nyaka aroer man yo wuok chieng mar raba nochakore heshbon nyaka ramothmizpe gi betonim kendo chakre mahanaim nyaka mbap lodeba pinygi mane nie holo mar aora jordan notingo bethharam gi bethnimra gi sukoth gi zafan kod bath piny sihon ruodh heshbon modong pinygino ne ni yo wuokchieng mar aora jordan kendo jordan nyaka nam galili nodoko mbape pinyno kaachiel gi mieche kod mier matindo mokiewo kodgi nobedo mwandu dhout jogad kamano bende musa nopogo piny ni dhout jomanase komachielo cha pinygi nochakore mahanaim mokwako piny og ruodh bashan duto kod mier piero auchiel mag jair e bashan kamano dir gilead konchiel gi ashtaroth kod edrei gin joka makir wuod manase tiende ni dhout joka makir konchiel mago e pinje mane musa opogo ni dhoudigo e paw moab yo wuok chieng mar jordan ne ok opogo ni jolawi piny nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel nobedo ka mwandugi kaka nosesingorenigi joshua piny kanaan opog gi ombulu koro magi e pok mane joisrael oyudo e piny kanaan kaka eleazar jadolo gi joshua wuod nun kod jodong dhout israel nopogonigi pinyno nopog gi ombulu ni dhoudi ochiko gi nu kande kaluwore gi chik mane ruoth nyasaye omiyo musa musa nosepogo ni dhoudi ariyo gi nu kande pinygi loka jordan ne ok opogo ni jolawi piny kaka nopogo ni dhoudi mamoko joka josef nosepogore dhoudi ariyo manase gi efraim jolawi ne ok oyudo pok moro e pinyno mak mana mier mag dak kod lege jamni nokiewo gi miego jolawi nopogo piny kaka ruoth nyasaye nosechiko musa dala mar hebron omi kaleb jojuda nobiro ir joshua gilgal mi kaleb wuod jefune ja keniz nowachone niya bende iparo gima ne ruoth nyasaye onyiso musa jatich nyasaye kuomi gi kuoma kane wan kadeshbarnea ne jahigni piero angwen kane musa jatich nyasaye oora mondo abi anon pinyni kendo kane adok naterone wach adieri jomoko mane wabirogo nonyoso chuny ji ne aluwo dwaro mar ruoth nyasaye nyasacha gi chuny modimbore chiengno musa nosingore kawachona niya piny isenyono gi tiendi nobed mari kod yawuoti nyaka chieng nimar iseluwo dwaro mar ruoth nyasaye nyasacha gi chuny modimbore koro en higni piero angwen gabich nyaka ne ruoth nyasaye singre ni musa e wachno e ndalo mane joisrael pod wuotho e thim ruoth nyasaye oserito ngimana kaka nosingore mi koro jahigni piero aboro gabich pod atek mana kaka ne atek e kinde mane musa oora kendo pod anyalo kedo kata timo gimoro amora monego atim omiyo koro miya piny gode mane ruoth nyasaye osingorena e kinde cha chieng cha donge niwinjo ni joanak odak kuno kendo ni gin gi mier madongo kendo mochiel matek mar siro wasigu dipo ka ruoth nyasaye okonya mi ariembogi kaka nosesingorena joshua noguedho kaleb momiye dala mar hebron kendo pod en mar kaleb wuod jefune ja kenaz nikech noluwo dwaro mar ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel gi chuny modimbore koro piny nobedo mokue e ndalo machon niluongo hebron ni kiriatharba tiende ni dala arba arbano ne jaduong joanak joshua piny mopog ni jojuda piny nopog ni dhout juda gi ombulu nogik yo milambo e mbap joedom man e thim zin mbapgi yo milambono nochakore yo milambo mar nam kado koluwo yor akrabim mokadho zin kochomo yo milambo mar kadeshbarnea eka nokadho ezron nyaka adar mogomo kochomo karka nyaka azmon kendo noluwo aora manie tong piny misri nyaka nam mediterenia mano e mbapgi yo milambo nam kado nyaka dho aora jordan ema nobedo mbapgi yo wuok chieng mbapgi yo nyandwat nochakore e dho aorano modhi nyaka bethhogla kokadho yo nyandwat mar betharaba mochopo nyaka lwanda bohan wuod reuben eka noluwo holo mar akor nyaka debir kochomo yo nyandwat nyaka gilgal machiegni gi yo maidho adumin man yo milambo mar aora eka nokadho kuonde thidhiya man enshemesh mochopo enrogel noluwo holo mar benhinom yo milambo mar piny gode mane jojebus odakie tinde ogerie jerusalem noidho got momanyore gi holo hinom yo podho chieng en giko holo mar refaim noluwo wi godno molor nyaka soko mar neftoa kendo nyaka mier man e got efron kosekadho miego nogomo kochomo baala miluongo bende ni kiriathjearim koa baala nochiko got seir mokadho yo nyandwat mar got jearim miluongo bende ni kesalon nyaka bethshemesh mochopo timna eka nochomo yo nyandwat nyaka efron mogomo kochiko shikeron bang mano nokadho got baala kendo nodhi jabneel mogik e nam mediterenia nam mediterenia ema notimo tong pinygi yo podho chieng mano e tong nolworo dhout juda duto kaleb okawo hebron gi debir jobura nopog ni kaleb wuod jefune dir piny jojuda kaka ruoth nyasaye nosechiko joshua pok noyudono ne en hebron dala mar arba kwar joanak kaleb nodaro joanak adek nodak kuno nyinggi sheshai gi ahiman kod talmai ne gin nyikwa anak bang mano nodhi momonjo joma nodak debi chon niluongo ni kiriathsefer eka nowacho niya ngat nokaw kiriathsefer ema nami aksa nyara mondo okendi othniel wuod kenaz owadgi kaleb ema nokawo dalano omiyo kaleb nomiye aksa nyare mokendo kane aksa odhi ir chwore nojiwe mondo okwa wuon mare lowo mi aksa nodhi ir kaleb kendo kane oselor e kanje kaleb nopenje gima odwaro nodwoke niya kaka iseketa e piny milambo motwoni yie imiya sokni kuom mano kaleb nomiye sokni mamalo gi mamwalo miech jojuda koro magi e mier duto mopog ni dhout juda kaachiel gi mier matindo nokiewo kodgi mier man yo milambo e tonggi gi jo edon ne gin kabzeel gi eder gi jagur gi kina gi dimona gi arara gi kedesh gi hazor gi ithnan gi zif gi telem gi bealoth gi hazorhadata gi keriothhezron gi amam gi shema gi molada gi hazargada gi heshmon gi bethpelet gi hazarshual gi beersheba kod mier matindo mokiewo kode gi baal gi iyim gi ezem gi eltolad gi kesil gi horma gi ziklag gi madmana gi sansana gi lebaoth gi shilhim gi kod rimon giduto ne gin mier piero ariyo gochiko mier mane giyudo e pewe ne gin eshtaol gi zora gi ashna gi zanoa gi engamin gi tapua gi enam gi jarmuth gi adulam gi soko gi azeka gi shaaraim gi adithaim gi gedera kod gederathaim giduto ne gin mier apar gangwen bende jojuda noyudo zenan gi hadasha gi migdalgad gi dilan gi mizpe gi joktheel gi lakish gi bozkath gi eglon gi kabon gi lama gi kithlish gi gederoth gi bethdagon gi naama kod makeda giduto ne gin mier apar gauchiel kendo ne giyudo libna gi ether gi ashan gi ifta gi ashna gi nezib gi keila gi akzib kod maresha giduto ne gin mier ochiko ekron bende ne margi kod mier duto mokiewo gi ashdod chakre ekron nyaka nam mediterenia ashdod gi gaza kod mieche mochopo nyaka aora manie tonggi gi misri kendo nyaka nam mediterenia ne maggi bende mier mane giyudo e piny gode ne gin shamir gi jatir gi soko gi dana gi kiriathsana miluongo bende ni debir anab gi eshtemoa gi anim gi goshen gi holon kod gilo giduto ne gin mier apar gachiel kendo ne giyudo arab gi duma gi eshan gi janim gi bethtapua gi afek gi humta gi kiriatharba miluongo bende ni hebron kod zior giduto ne gin mier ochiko nomigi bende maon gi karmel gi zif gi juta gi jezreel gi jokdeam gi zanoa gi kain gi gibea kod timna giduto ne gin mier apar bende ne giyudo halhul gi bethzur gi gedor gi maarath gi bethanoth kod eltekon giduto ne gin mier auchiel ne giyudo bende tekoa gi efratha tinde iluongo ni bethlehem gi peor gi etam giu kulom gi tatam gi sore gi karem gi galim gi baither kod manak giduto ne gin mier apar gachiel kiriathbaal miluongo ni kiriathjearim kod raba ne maggi bende mier mane giyudo e thim ne gin betharaba gi midin gi sekaka gi nibshan gi irmelek kod engedi giduto ne gin mier auchiel jojuda ne ok nyal riembo jojebus nodak jerusalem omiyo pod gidak kodgi kuno nyaka chil kawuono joshua piny mopog ni joefraim gi jomanase komachielo piny mane opog ni joka josef gi ombulu nochakore e aora jordan kama omanyore gi jeriko yo wuok chieng mar sokni mag jeriko man thim tonggi noa jeriko moidho bethel koa bethel noidho luz mochopo ataroth manie tong piny joarki eka nochomo yo podho chieng kolor nyaka tong piny jojaflet mochopo bethhoron mamwalo kod gezer mogik e nam mediterenia pinyno ema nopog ni jomanase kod joefraim yawuot josef piny dhout joefraim e mbapgi yo wuok chieng nochakore atarothadar modhi nyaka bethhoron mamalo eka nochiko yopodho chieng koweyo mikmethath yo nyandwat kendo nokadho yo wuok chieng mar taanathshilo kod janoa kosekadho janoa nolor nyaka ataroth kod aora jordan tonggi yo nyandwat noa tapua kochiko yo podho chieng moluwo aora kana nyaka nogik naaroth mokadho machiegni gi jeriko mogik e nam mediterenia pinyno ema nopogni dhout joefraim kaachiel gi mier moko mane omigi ei piny jomanase kod mier matindo mokiewo kodgi joefraim ne ok oriembo jokanaan nodak gezer mi jokanaango pod odak e diergi nyaka chil kawuono nochungi mondo gibed wasumbni nyaka chieng joshua nopog ni jomanase dir piny nikech manase ne e wuod josef maduong makir wuon gilead nomi piny bashan gi piny gilead nikech ne en wuod manase maduong dhout jomanase modong gin joka abiezer gi joka helek gi joka asriel gi joka shekem gi joka hefer kod joka shemida bende nopognigi piny mago ne gin dhout nyikwa manase wuod josef zelofehad wuod hefer wuod gilead wuod makir wuod manase nonywolo mana nyiri lilo nyinggi mala gi noa gi hogla gi milka kod tirza ne gibiro ir eleazar jadolo gi joshua wuod nun kod jotend israel mi giwachonigi niya ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa mondo opognwa piny mana kaka opog ni jowetewa kuom mano joshua nopogonigi piny kaka nopog ni owete wuongi kaluwore gi chik ruoth nyasaye jo manase noyudo pok apar ka ok okwan piny gilead gi piny bashan man yo wuok chieng mar aora jordan nikech nopog piny ni nyikwa manase manyiri kaachiel gi nyikwaye yawuowi piny gilead nobedo pok mar nyikwa manase modong tong piny jomanase nochakore e piny asher mochopo nyaka mikmethath man yo wuok chieng mar shekem eka tonggi nochomo yo milambo nyaka jashub kokadho entapua piny tapua nobedo mar jomanase dala tapua hie mane nie mbapgi nobedo mar joefraim koa kuno tonggi noluwo aora kana mier man yo milambo mar aorano ne mag efraim kata obedo ni gin e dier miech jomanase kamano tong manase noluwo geng aora kana gi yo nyandwat mogik e nam mediterenia piny efraim ne ni yo milambo mar aorano piny manase ne ni yo nyandwat ka nam mediterenia obedo tonggi giduto jomanase nokiewo kod joasher gi yo nyandwat kendo kod joisakar gi yo milambo bethshean kaachiel gi mier mokiewo kode gi joma nodak ibleam gi dor manie dhonam gi endor gi taanak kod megido kaachiel gi mier matindo nokiewo kodgi ne nie bwo jomanase kata obedo ni ne gin e pinje mag joisakar gi joasher kamano jokanaan pod weg pinyno nyaka chil kawuono nikechh jomanase ne ok nyal riembogi kane joisrael osebedo motegno ne gichuno jokanaan mondo obed wasumbgi joka josef nopenjo joshua niya ere gima omiyo isemiyowa mana pok achiel kende e pinyni wasenya ahinya nikech ruoth nyasaye oseguedhowa joshua nodwokogi niya kusenya kamano kendo uhingo piny gode mag efraim koro dhiuru e bungu manie piny joperizi gi jorefaim mondo ubete obed lopu joka josef nowachone niya adier piny godeno ok oromowa bende jokanaan modak bethsheam gi mier mokiewo kode kaachiel gi mago modak e paw jezreel nigi geche lweny mag nyinyo joshua nowacho ni joefraim gi jomanase nyikwa josef niya un ji mangeny kendo man gi nyalo ok unubed gi pok achiel kende piny gode bende nobed maru kata otimo bungu kamano kaweuru kendo ubete nyaka uchop e tong adier jokanaan ni gi geche lweny mag nyinyo pod unuriembgi ariemba joshua piny modong opog gi ombulu shilo ka ne joisrael osekawo pinyno ne gichokore shilo giduto mi giguro hemb romo kuro dhout israel abiriyo ne pok okawo lowo omiyo joshua nowacho ni joisrael niya ango murito momiyo pok ukawo piny ruoth nyasaye nyasach kwereu osemiyou dhoot ka dhoot mondo omiya ji adek anyalo oro mondo odhi onon kaka dipog pinyno duto e migepe abiriyo ka gindiko kaka migawo ka migawo chalo ka gisetieko eka giduog ira mondo opog pinyno ni dhoudi abiriyogo jojuda nobed abeda e pinygi man yo milambo kendo joka josef bende nobed e pinygi man yo nyandwat kusepogo piny nyadibiriyo kamano kendo usendiko kaka ochalo eka ukelna ndiko manyiso migepego kendo nopognugi gi ombulu e nyim ruoth nyasaye jolawi ok noyud lowo kaka uyudo nimar pokgi en bedo jodolo mag ruoth nyasaye kendo jogad gi joreuben gi jomanase konchiel bende ok nopognigi nikech giseyudo lopgi loka jordan mane musa jatich ruoth nyasaye omiyogi joma noyiergo nodhi mowuotho e pinyno duto ka ginono kaka ochalo nikech joshua nosechikogi niya dhiuru uwuoth e pinyno duto kendo undik kaka ochalo eka uduog ira shilo ka bange napognu piny gi ombulu e nyim ruoth nyasaye kuom mano jogo nodhi monono pinyno duto kendo ne gindiko e kitabu kaka ochalo ne gipogo piny nyadibiriyo ka gichano nying mier duto mane ni kuno bange ne giduogo ir joshua e kambi shilo kendo joshua nogoyonigi ombulu e nyim ruoth nyasaye mopogo ni dhoot ka dhoot lope piny mopog ni jobenjamin ombulu mokwongo nolwar kuom dhout benjamin mi giyudo lowo e kind jojuda gi joka josef malo yo nyandwat tonggi nochakore e aora jordan modhi nyaka gode man yo nyandwat mar jeriko noluwo piny godego kochomo yo podho chieng nyaka e thim machiegni gi bethaven eka nochomo luz yo milambo nyaka god luz tinde iluongo ni bethel bange nodhi nyaka atarothadar e got man yo milambo mar bethhoron mamwalo nogomo koa yo podho chieng mar godno mochomo yo milambo mar got man bethhoron mogik kiriathbaal dala jojuda miluongo bende ni kiriathjearim mano e tonggi yo podho chieng tonggi yo milambo nochakore kiriathjearim kochomo yo podho chieng nyaka soko mar neftoa eka nodhi nyaka bath got mochomore gi holo benhinom man yo nyandwat mar holo refaim noluwo holo hinon tir kochomo yo milambo mar god jojebus nyaka enrogel bange nogomo kochomo yo nyandwat nyaka enshemesh kendo nyaka geliloth momanyore gi yo maidho adumin eka nolor nyaka lwanda bohan wuod reuben mokadho yo nyandwat mar betharaba kendo noridore nyaka holo mar aora jordan bange nodhi yo nyandwat mar got bethhogla mogik yo nyandwat mar nam kado e dho aora jordan gi yo milambo mano ne tonggi yo milambo tonggi yo wuok chieng ne en aora jordan mano ne tong piny nopog ni dhout benjamin miech jobenjamin kaluwore gi dhoutgi ne gin jeriko gi bethhogla gi emekkeziz gi betharaba gi zemaraim gi bethel gi avim gi para gi ofra gi kefaramoni gi ofni kod geba giduto ne gin mier apar gariyo ka ok okwan mier matindo mane okiewo kodgi bende ne gin gi gibeon gi rama gi beeroth gi mizpe gi kefira gi moza gi rekem gi irpeel gi parala gi zela gi haelef gi jebuz tinde iluongo ni jerusalem gi gibea kod kiriathjearim giduto ne gin mier apar gangwen ka ok okwan mier matindo mane okiewo kodgi mago e mier mane opog ni dhout benjamin joshua piny mopog ni josimeon ombulu mar ariyo nolwar kuom dhout simeon pinygi ne nie dier piny jojuda notingo beersheba gi molada gi hazarshual gi bala gi ezem gi eltolad gi bethul gi horma gi ziklag gi bethmarkaboth gi hazarsusa gi bethlebaoth kod sharuhen giduto ne gin mier apar gadek ka ok okwan mier matindo nokiewo kodgi bende ne giyudo gi mier rimon gi ether kod ashan duto mier angwen ka ok okwan mier matindo okiewo kodgi nyaka baalathbeer miluongo bende ni ramathnegeb pinyno ema nopog ni dhout simeon pinyno ne en dir piny jojuda nikech jojuda nomi piny malach mohingogi piny mopogni jozebulun ombulu mar adek nolwar kuom dhout zebulun piny mane opognigi nochopo nyaka shadub koa kuno tonggi mochiko yo podho chieng nodhi nyaka marala moluwo bath debesheth kod apra man yo wuok chieng mar jokneam tonggi moa shedub kochomo yo wuok chieng nochiko tong kislothtabor modhi daberath kod jafia nomedo dhi yo wuok chieng mochopo gethhefer kod itakazin nyaka rimon mogomo kochiko nea tong yo nyandwat nolworo nyaka hanathon mogik e holo jethael pinyno noting katath gi nahalal gi shimron gi idala kod bethlehem giduto ne gin mier apar gariyo ka ok okwan mier matindo nokiewo kodgi miegi kaachiel gi mier matindo nokiewo kodgi ema nopog ni dhout zebulun piny mopog ni joisakar ombulu mar angwen nolwar kuom dhout isakar jezreel gi kesiloth gi shunem gi hafaraim gi shion gi anaharath gi rabith gi kishion gi ebez gi remeth gi enganim gi enhaga kod bethpazez ne nie pinygi tonggi nokadho tabor gi shahazuma kod bethshemesh mogik e aora jordan giduto ne gin mier apar gauchiel ka ok okwan mier matindo nokiewo kodgi miego duto kaachiel gi mier matindo nokiewo kodhi ema nopog ni dhout isakar piny mopogni joasher ombulu mar abich nolwar kuom dhout asher pinygi notingo helkath gi hali gi beten gi akshaf gi alamelek gi amad kod mishal yo podho chieng tonggi noluwo karmel gi shihorlibnath eka nochiko yo wuok chieng modhi bethlagon koluwo bath piny zebulun kod holo jiftael kochomo yo nyandwat nyaka bethemek gi neyel yo nyandwat pinyno notingo kabul gi abdon gi rehob gi hamon kod kana mochopo sidon maduong eka tong nogomo mochomo rama nyaka turo dala mochiel kuma nogomoe kochiko hosa mogik e nam mediterenia yo podho chieng notingo mehalab gi akzib gi ako gi afek kod rehob giduto ne gin mier piero ariyo gariyo ka ok okwan mier matindo mane okiewo kodgi miego duto kaachiel gi mier matindo nokiewo kodgi ema nopog ni dhout asher piny mopog ni jonaftali ombulu mar auchiel nolwar kuom dhout naftali pinygi nochakore helef kendo e yath maduong man zaananim moluwo adaminegeb gi gabneel nyaka lakum mogik e aora jordan tonggi yo podho chieng noluwo azmothtabor nyaka hukoth piny jozebulun ne ni yo milambo kendo piny joasher ne ni yo podho chieng aora jordan nobedo tong yo wuok chieng miechgi mane ochiel gi ohinga ne gin zidim gi zer gi hamath gi rakath gi kinereth gi adama gi rama gi hazor gi kedesh gi edrei gi enhazor gi yiron gi migdalel gi horem gi bethanath kod bethshemesh giduto ne gin mier apar gochiko ka ok okwan mier matindo mane okiewo kodgi miego duto kaachiel gi mier matindo mane okiewo kodgi ema ne opog ni dhout naftali piny mopog ni jodan ombulu mar abiriyo nolwar kuom dhout dan pinygi notingo zora gi eshtaol gi irshemesh gi shaalabin gi aijalon gi ithla gi elon gi timna gi ekron gi elteke gi gibethon gi baalath gi jehud gi beneberak gi gathrimon gi mejarkon kod rakon kaachiel gi piny momanyore gi jopa kane oriemb jodan e pinygi ne gidhi nyaka leshem mi gimonjo dalano ne gikawe kendo ne ginego ji duto nodakie ne gidak kuno mi giloko nyinge ni dan nying kwargi miego duto kaachiel gi mier matindo nokiewo kodgi ema nopog ni dhout dan piny mopog ni joshua kane joisrael osetieko pogo piny kendo guro mbapgi ne gimiyo joshua lowo e pinygi kaka ruoth nyasaye nosechiko ne gimiye timnasera e piny gode mag efraim nikech mano ema nokwayo nochako ogero dalano modakie mano e kaka eleazar jadolo gi joshua wuod nun kod jodong dhout israel nopogo lowo gi ombulu e nyim ruoth nyasaye e dho hemb romo ka ne gin shilo kamano ne gitieko pogo piny joshua mier mag tony kwan rapar mar chik ruoth nyasaye nochiko joshua ni mondo owach ni joisrael kama koro yieruru miechu mag tony mane awacho ni musa mondo onyisu ngat moneko kobothne nyalo dhi kuondego mondo opond ni ngat madwaro chulone kuor ka ngato dwaro tony kamano moringo nyaka e achiel kuom miego nochung e dhorangach kendo nonyis jodong dalano gima osetimorene eka giniyiene odonji kendo ginimiye kar dak ka ngato madwaro chulo kuorno oluwe nyaka kuno jodalano kik chiwe girite nikech nonego nyawadgi mana kuom ok nikech ne gimonre janekno nodag e dalano nyaka chop yale e nyim oganda kendo ka jadolo maduong e kindeno osetho eka onyalo dok dalagi kuma noseringo oaye kuom mano ne giyiero kadeshgalili manie piny gode mag naftali gi shekem manie piny gode man efraim kod kiriatharba miluongo bende ni hebron manie piny gode mag juda yo wuok chieng mar aora jordan e piny mamalo momanyore gi jeriko ne giyiero bezermethim kuom piny joreuben gi ramothgilead kuom piny jogad kod galonbashan kuom piny jomanase mago ne gin mier mane ngat moneko nyalo tonyie ne oketgi ne joisrael duto kendo ni jodak mane ni kodgi ngato angata mane oneko kobothne ne nyalo ringo kuno mondo ngat dwaro chulone kuor kik nege kapok oyale e nyim oganda joshua miech jolawi weche mag ndalo jodong dhout jolawi nodhi shilo e piny kanaan mowacho ni eleazar jadolo gi joshua wuod nun kod jodong dhout israel niya ruoth nyasaye nochiko musa ni mondo wayud mier mag dak kaachiel gi lege jamni mokiewo kodgi kuom mano joisrael nomiyo jolawi miechgi gi lege mokiewo kodgi mana e pinygi giwegi kaluwore gi chik ruoth nyasaye joka kohath ema nokwong pognigi mier gi ombulu jolawi nyikwa harun jadolo noyudo mier apar gadek e piny jojuda gi piny josimeon kod piny jobenjamin joka kohath modong nomi mier apar e piny joefraim gi jodan kendo e piny jomanase konchiel joka gershom nomi mier apar gadek e piny joisakar gi piny joasher kod piny jonaftali kendo e piny jomanase komachielo nodak bashan joka merari nomi mier apar gariyo e piny joreuben gi piny jogad kod piny jozebulun kamano joisrael nopogo ni jolawi miego gi ombulu kaluwore gi chik mane ruoth nyasaye omiyo musa ombulu mokwongo nolwar kuom jolawi nyikwa harun mane gin dhoot achiel kuom joka kohath mier mane opognigi kuom piny jojuda gi mar josimeon ne gin kiriatharba miluongo bende ni hebron e piny gode mag juda kaachiel gi lege nokiewo kode arbano ne kwar joanak mier matindo nokiewo gi dalano kaachiel gi gweng momanyore kode nosemi kaleb wuod jefune mier mane opog ni nyikwa harun jadolo e magi hebron achiel kuom mier ngat moneko nyalo tonyie gi libna gi jatir gi eshtemoa gi holon gi debir gi ashan gi juta kod bethshemesh ne gin mier ochiko nopog ni dhoudi ariyogo e piny jobenjamin nomigi mier angwen mane gin gibeon gi geba gi anathoth kod almon kamano jodolo nyikwa harun noyudo mier apar gadek kaachiel gi legegi kane ogo ombulu jolawi jodhout kohath modong nopognigi mier angwen kaachiel gi legegi e piny efraim ne gin shekem dala ngato moneko nyalo tonyie e piny gode mag efraim gi gezer kibzaim kod bethhoron nopognigi bende mier angwen e piny jodan ne gin elteke gi gibethon gi aijalon kod gathrimon e piny jomanase konchiel nomigie taanak kod ibleam kamano dhout kohath modonggo noyudo mier apar kaachiel gi legegi nyikwa gershom achiel kuom dhout jolawi bende nomi mier kaachiel gi legegi e piny jomanase komachielo ne giyudoe mier ariyo mane gin galongashan dala ngat moneko nyalo tonyie kod beastaroth e piny joisakar ne giyudoe mier angwen mane gin kishion gi daberath gi jarmuth kod engamuth e piny joasher bende nomigie mier angwen mane gin mishal gi abdon gi helkath kod rehob e piny jonaftali ne giyudoe kedeshgalili dala ngat moneko nyalo tonyie gi hamothdor gi kartan duto mier adek kamano dhout jogershom koriwore noyudo mier apar gadek kaachiel gi legegi koro magi e mier kaachiel gi legegi mane opogni jolawi jodhout merari modong e piny jozebulun ne giyudoe mier angwen mane gin joklean gi karta gi dimna kod nahalal yo wuok chieng mar aora jordan e piny joreuben momanyore gi jeriko ne giyudoe mier angwen mane gin bezermethim dala ngat moneko nyalo tonyie gi jahaz gi kedemor kod meraath e piny jogad ne giyudoe mier angwen mane gin ramothgilead bende dala ngat moneko nyalo tonyie gi mahanaim gi heshbon kod jazer kamano jolawi jodhout merari modonggo noyudo mier apar gangwen kaachiel gi legegi kuom mano mier duto mane jolawi oyudo e piny israel noromo piero angwen gaboro dala ka dala ne nigi lege mokiewo kode joisrael okawo piny kanaan kamano ruoth nyasaye nomiyo joisrael piny duto mane osesingore ni kweregi ni nomigi ne gikawe mi gidak kuno ruoth nyasaye nomiyogi kue e tonggi duto kaka nosesingore ni kweregi onge wasikgi kata achiel mane nyalo sirogi nikech ruoth nyaaye ema nomiyo giloyogi duto ruoth nyasaye nochopoi singruokne duto nosetimo ni joisrael joshua kendomarmisango oger e bath aora jordan bang wechego duto joshua noluongo jobenjamin gi jogad kod jomanase konchiel kande mowachonigi niya usechopo chike duto mag musa jatich ruoth nyasaye kaachiel gi maga bende e kindegi duto ok useringo uweyo joisrael weteu userito chik ruoth nyasaye nyasachu gi chunyu duto nyaka chil kawuono koro ruoth nyasaye osemiyo oweteu pinyni kaka nosingorenigi omiyo unyalo dok e miechu manie piny mane musa jatich ruoth nyasaye omiyou yo wuok chieng mar aora jordan neuru ni urito chik duto mane musa jatich ruoth nyasaye omiyiou heruru ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kuluwo yorene kendo kurito chikene padreuru kuome kutiyone gi chunyu duto eka joshua noguedhogi kendo nowachonigi niya ero udok e miechu gi mwandu mangeny un gi dhok mathoth gi fedha kod dhahabu gi mula kod nyinyo kendo gi lewni lowo yo podho chieng mar jordan kaachiel gi jowetegi kuom mano joreuben gi jogad kod jomanase konchiel noweyo joisrael shilo e piny kanaan ne gidok gilead e pinygi mane ruoth nyasaye osechiko musa ni mondo gikaw kane gichopo geliloth man aora jordan ne gigero kendo mangongo mar misango e bath aora kanyo mane ji nyalo neno gi kuma bor kane joisrael mamoko owinjo ni joreuben gi jogad kod jomanase joreuben gi jogad kod jomanase konchiel mi nodhi gi jotelo apar mag dhout israel ka moro ka moro ochung ni dhoot ka dhoot ne gibiro ir jogo mi giwachonigi niya wabiro e nying joruoth nyasaye duto mondo wapenju gima omiyo usetimo gima rachni e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel useketho ni ruoth nyasaye nikech ugero kendo marmisango maru uwegi kendo useweyo luwe paruru richo mane watimo peor kod kum mane ryoth nyasaye omiyowa pok orumo nyaka chil kawuono uparo ni kumno ne yot kendo pod uweyoe mana luwo ruoth nyasaye ka uketho ni ruoth nyasaye kawuono kiny nokech gi joisrael duto kuom mano jomanase konchiel nodwoko jotend dhout israelgo niya ruoth nyasaye e nyasaye maduong ruoth nyasaye e nyasaye maduong en ema ongeyo gima omiyo ne wagero kendoni un bende nyaka unge ka en adieri ni kindwa kodu omiyo ok un joge ka giwacho kamano di gimon nyikwawa lamo ruoth nyasaye kuom mano ne wagero kendoni mana ni mondo obed ranyisi ni jowa gi jou kod joma nobi bangwa ni walamo ruoth nyasaye gi misengni miwango gi mag sawo kod mamoko kata kamano ne ok wagere mondo watimie misango kamano nyikwau ok nonyal wacho ni nyikwawa ni ok gin jo ruoth nyasaye ne waparo bende ni ka gima kamano moti eka joshua noluongo jodongo gi jongad bura kod jotelo duto mag israel mowachonigi niya koro aseti ahinya useneno gik moko duto ruoth nyasaye nyasachu osetimo ni ogendini duto nikech oherou en ema osebedo kokedonu omiyo winjuru asepogo ni dhoutu piny ogendini aseriembo kaachiel gi piny jogo pod odong chakre aora jordan yo wuok chieng nyaka nam maditerenia man yo podho chieng ruoth nyasaye notimnu ka ok urito singruok nomiyou mi ulamo nyiseche mamoko enokech kodu mi karu nolal nono piyopiyo e piny maber mosemiyouni joshua oriti joshua ogoyo ni joisrael joshua nochoko dhout joisrael duto ogolo misri noyik shekem e lowo mane jakobo ongiewo gi yawuot hamor wuon shekem kuom siling mia achiel achien lowono nobedo mar joka josef eleazar wuod harun bende notho mi noyike gibea dala mane opog ni finehas wuode e piny gode mag efraim jongad bura jojuda gi josimeon omako adonibezek bang tho joshua joisrael nopenjo ruoth nyasaye wach niya ere dhoot monego kuong dhi monjo jokanaan ruoth nyasaye nodwokogi ni dhood juda ema mondo okwongi ero achiwo pinyno e lwetgi juda nowacho ni josimeon owetegi niya biuru wadhi e piny mopognwa mondo wamonj jokanaan eka wan bende wanadhi kodu e piny mopognu motho kuno jojuda okawo jerusalem gi hebron jojuda nomonjo jerusalem mokawo ne ginego joma odakie mi giwango dalano gi mach bang mano jojuda nochomo yo milambo mokedo gi jokanaan mane odak e piny gode othniel wuod kenaz owadgi kaleb matin ema nokawo dalano omiyo kaleb nomiye aksa nyare obedo chiege kane aksa odhi ir chwore chwore nojiwe mondo okwa wuon mare lowo mi aksa noidho kanje modhi ir kaleb kendo kane oselor e kanje kaleb nopenje gima odwaro nodwoke niya kaka iseketa e piny milambo motwoni yie imiya sokni kuom mano kaleb nomiye sokni mamalo gi mamwalo pinje mane jojuda gi jobenjamin okawo nyikwa jakeni jaduong musa ne jowuok kaachiel gi jojuda e dala mar othidhe mi gidhi e thim juda yo milambo mar arad kendo ne gidak gi joamalek kuno bange jojuda ne jodhi gi josimeon owetegi mi gimonjo jokanaan man zefath kendo giketho dalano chuth omiyo noluong dalano ni horma tiende ni mokethi jojuda ne ok okawo gaza gi ashkelon gi ekron kata gwengegi ruoth nyasaye nokonyo jojuda omiyo ne gikawo piny gode ne ok ginyal riembo joma nodak e piny pewe nikech ne gin gi geche lweny mag nyinyo hebron nopog ni kaleb kaka musa nosechiko kendo kaleb noriembo yawuot anak adek noyudo kuno
