ginego ji duto mane odak kuno mak mana ngatno gi joode ema ne giweyo bang mano ngatno nodhi e piny johiti mogero dala kuno kendo nochako ni luz pod iluongo dalano ni luz nyaka chil kawuono pinje mane jomanase gi joefraim okawo jomanase bende ne ok oriembo joma nodak bethshean kata joma nodak dor gi ibleam kod megido gi mier matindo nokiewo kodgi jokanaan nosiko mana kodak e pinyno achien kane joisrael osedoko motegno ne giloko jokanaango wasumbgi ne ok giriembogi chuth joefraim bende ne ok oriembo jokanaan nodak gezer jokanaango nosiko kodak kodgi kuno pinje mane dhoudi mamoko okawo jozebulun bende ne ok oriembo joma nodak kitron gi nahalol jokanaan nodak kodgi kata kamano jozebulun nolokogi wasumbgi joasher bende ne ok oriembo joma nodak ako gi sidon gi alab gi akzib gi helba gi afik kod rehob kamano joasher nodak adaka gi jokanaango kendo ne ok giriembogi jonaftali bende ne ok oriembo jokanaan nodak bethshemesh kod joma nodak bethanath ne gidak mana kodgi kendo ne gilokogi wasumbgi joamor nodhiro jodan chien e piny gode kendo notamogi lor e piny pewe bende joamor nosiko kodak e gode mag here gi aijalon kod shaalbim kata kamano joka josef noloyogi mosmos mi gidoko wasumbgi tong piny joedom nochakore kama idhogo akrabim koa sela kochomo yo nyandwat jongad bura malaika mar ruoth nyasaye odhi bokim malaika mar ruoth nyasaye noa gilgal modhi bokim nowacho ni joisrael niya ne agolou e piny misri mi akelou e piny mane asingora ni nami kwereu ne awacho ni ok naketh singruokna kodu omiyo un bende kik utim winjruok gi weg pinyni nyaka uketh kendegi mag liswa kata kamano ne ok uwinjo chikna kendo koro neuru gima usetimoni mano emomiyo nawacho ni ok nariemb ogendnigo mondo owenu thuolo ginithagu kendo nyisechegi nobednu obadho kane malaika mar ruoth nyasaye osewacho ni joisrael wechego ne giywak malit giduto omiyo nochak kanyo ni bokim tiende ni joywak joisrael notimo ni ruoth nyasaye misengni kanyo tho mar joshua joshua joshua nomiyo joisrael thuolo mi ne gidhi mi gidak e pinyno ngato ka ngato e lowo mopogne joisrael notiyo ni ruoth nyasaye e ndalo duto mag joshua kendo e ndalo mag jodongo mane odong bange kendo mane oneno timbe madongo duto mane ruoth nyasaye otimo ni joisrael joshua wuod nun jatich ruoth nyasaye notho ka jahigni mia achiel gapar ne giyike e lope owuon timnathheres man yo nyandwat mar got gaash e piny gode mag efraim tiengno duto notho moluwo kweregi kendo tieng machielo mane ok ongeyo ruoth nyasaye kata gik mane osetimo ni joisrael noluwo banggi joisrael oweyo ruoth nyasaye timbe joisrael nodoko maricho e nyim ruoth nyasaye kendo ne gilamo nyiseche manono miluongo ni baal ne giweyo ruoth nyasaye nyasach kweregi mane ogologi misri mi giluwo nyiseche mamoko mag ogendini mane gidakgo ne gilamo nyisechego mi gimiyo ruoth nyasaye mirima ne giweyo ruoth nyasaye mi gilamo baal kod ashtaroth omiyo ruoth nyasaye nokecho kodgi mi nochiwogi e lwet mony moyakogi bende noketogi e lwet wasikgi duto mane olworogi mi koro ne ok ginyal sirogi kata matin kinde duto mane gidhi kedo ruoth nyasaye ne kelonigi chandruok mana kaka nosiemogi kokuongorenigi kamano ne gichandore malit tij jotelo mane nyasaye oketo ruoth nyasaye noketonigi jotelo moresogi e lwet joyekogo kata kamano ne ok gidewo kata mana jotelogo ne giduwore mi gitiyo ni nyiseche mamoko kendo ne gilamogi piyopiyo nono ne gibaro mi giweyo rito chik ruoth nyasaye mane kweregi orito kendo ne ok giluoro ruoth nyasaye kinde ka kinde mane ruoth nyasaye oketoe ni joisrael jotelo nokonyo jatelono kendo norito joisrael e lwet wasikgi kuom ndalo duto mane jatelono pod ngima ruoth nyasaye ne kecho joisrael nikech ne giywak ka wasikgi sandogi kendo thirogi pile kane jatelo kamano osetho ne gidok e timbe maricho moloyo mane kweregi timo kendo ne giluwo nyiseche mamoko ka gitiyonigi kendo gilamogi ne ok giweyo timbegi maricho kata yoregi mag wich teko kuom mano ruoth nyasaye nokecho gi joisrael mowacho niya ogandani oseketho singruok mane atimo ni kweregi kendo ok gisemako chikna omiyo koro ok nariemb kata ngat achiel kuom ogendini duto mane joshua oweyo bang thone abiro temo joisrael gi tim jogo mondo ane ane ka digiluw yorena adimba kaka kweregi notimo kamano ruoth nyasaye noweyo ogendinigo kendo ne ok odewo riembogi kata chiwogi e lwet joshua jongad bura ogendini mane nyasaye oweyo e piny kanaan mondo otemgo joisrael ruoth nyasaye noweyo ogendini moko mondo otemgo joisrael mane ok okedo e ndalo mane gikawo piny kanaan notimo kamano ni mondo tienge joisarel mabiro kod joma ne pok opuonjore kaka ikedo onge lweny ogendinigo e magi ruodhi abich mag jofilistia gi jokanaan duto gi josidon kod johivi mane odak lebanon chakre god baalhermon nyaka kama idonjogo hamath ruoth nyasaye noweyo jogo mondo otemgo joisrael kendo ongego ka ginyalo rito chike mane omiyo musa mondo omi kweregi omiyo joisrael nodak e kind jokanaan gi johiti gi joamon gi jo perizi gi johivi kod jojebus ne ginywomo nyi jogo nyigi bende ne gimiyo yawuot jogo kendo ne gilamo nyisechegi othniel oreso joisrael kuom kushanrishathaim wi joisrael nowil gi ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi mi timbegi nodoko maricho e nyime ka gilamo baal kod nyiseche mon miluongo ni asher kuom mano ruoth nyasaye nokecho kodgi mochiwogi e lwet kushanrishathaim ruodh mesopotamia mi gibedo e bwo lochne kuom higni aboro kane joisrael oywak ni ruoth nyasaye mondo okonygi nomiyo ngato moresogi ne en othniel wuod kenaz owadgi kaleb matin much ruoth nyasaye nobiro kuome mi nobedo jatend joisrael nodhi kedo gi kushanrishathaim ruodh mesopotamia mi noloyo nikech ruoth nyasaye nochiwo ruodhno e lwete omiyo piny israel nobet gi kue kuom higni piero angwen bange othniel wuod kenaz notho ehud oreso joisarel kuom jomoab timbe joisrael nochako obedo maricho kendo e nyim ruoth nyasaye omiyo ruoth nyasaye nothuwo eglon ruodh moab mondo oked kodgi eglon nochoko joamon gi joamalek eka ne gidhi mi giloyo joisrael kendo ne gikawo dala mar othidhe joisrael nobedo e bwo loch eglon ruodh moab kuom higni apar gaboro kane joisrael oywak ni ruoth nyasaye mondo okonygi ruoth nyasaye nomiyogi ngato moresogi ne en ehud wuod gera jabenjamin mane ngat racham chieng moro joisrael noore mondo odhi ochul osuchgi ni eglon ruodh moab ehud nothedho pand ligangla dhoge ariyo borne romo nu mita mi notweye ei lawe e bathe korachwich eka notero ni eglon ruodh moab osuru eglon ne ngat machwe ahinya kane ehud osetieko chulo osuru nowacho ni joma notingo osuru mondo odhi adhiya en owuon nowichore kar kite mopa man gilgal modok ir ruoth kendo owachone niya ruoth kodi gi wach lingling eka ruoth nowacho ni joge mondo owuog oko owenigi thuolo noyudo eglon obet e ode man ewi tado mane ojabetie ka chieng kech ehud nosudo bute mowachone niya akeloni wach moa kuom nyasaye kane eglon owinjo wachno nochung e kome mi ehud notero lwete kor acham mowuodho ligangla e bathe kor achwich mohobogo bund eglon ligangla nodonjo e iye molal kuno gi loge duto ehud ne ok oywaye oko noweye mi dhoge opowore mowuok kabang eglon eka ehud nowuok oko mochiego dhoudi kane osedhi jotich eglon nodwogo mi giyudo ka dhoot ochiegi ne giparo ni ruoth odonjo e ot maiye mondo olsre kane gineno ni koro giserito motamo wanggi ne gikawo kifungu mi giyawogo dhoot kendo ne ginwango ruodhgi koriere piny e dier ot kotho ehud noseringo e sa mane jogo pod ogalore ka girito e dhod cha nokadho kar kite mopa motony odhi seira kane ochopo kuno nogoyo tung e piny gode mag efraim mondo ji oyuor ni lweny eka notelo ni joisarel kendo ne gilor kode e ka gia e piny godego nowachonigi niya luwauru nimar ruoth nyasaye osechiwo wasiku jomoab e lwetu omiyo ne gilor ka giluwe kendo ne girito kwonde mingadogo aora jordan mondo kik jomoab kadhi ne ok giyie mondo ngato oidh loka ne ginego jomoab marateke kendo jochir alufu apar kendo chiengno onge kata ngato achiel mane otony kamano joisrael noloyoo jomoab mi pinyno nobedo gi kue kuom higni piero aboro shamgar oreso joisrael kuom jofilistia jatelo mane owuok bang ehud ne en shamgar wuod anath nonego jofilistia mia achiel mana gi bidhi en bende noreso joisrael jongad bura debora gi barak joloyo sisera bang tho ehud timbe joisrael nochako obedo maricho e nyim ruoth nyasaye omiyo nochiwogi e lwet jabin ruodh jokanaan nodak hazor jaduong jolweny jabin ne nyinge sisera nodak haroshethhahagoim kendo ne en gi geche lweny mag nyinyo mia ochiko nothago joisrael malit kuom higni piero ariyo omiyo joisrael noywak ni ruoth nyasaye mondo okonygi e ndalogo debora janabi madhako chi lapidoth ne jangad bura e israel nothoro bet e tiend yadh othidhe man e kind rama gi bethel e piny gode mag efraim yadhno niluongo ni yadh debora joisrael ne dhi ire mondo ongadnigi bura kanyo chieng moro debora noluongo barak wuog abinoam nodak kedesh e piny naftali mowachone niya ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel ochiki mondo idhi e piny naftali gi zebulun ikawie ji alufu apar mondo idhigo e got tabor enomi sisera jaduong jolweny jabin bi e aora kishon kaachiel gi gechene kod ogandane kendo nochiwgi e lweti kuno barak nodwoke niya anyalo mana dhi ka bende idhi koda ka ok idhi bende ok adhi debora nowachone niya adier abiro dhi kodi kata kamano lwenjni ok nokelni duong nimar ruoth nyasaye biro chiwo sisera mana e lwet dhako kamano debora noa malo modhi gi barak kedesh barak noluongo jozebulun gi jonaftali ire kedesh mi nodhi gi ji alufu apar nobiro debora bende nodhi kode noyudo ka ngat moro miluongo ni heber jakeni oguro hembe elonbezaananim man kedesh nimar nosedar moweyo jokeni nyikwa hobab musa ka ne onyis sisera wach ni barak wuod abinoam osedhi got tabor nochoko gechene mia ochiko mag nyinyo kod jolwenje duto eka ne giwuok haroshethmarogendini mi gidhi e aora kishon debora nowacho ni barak niya malo kawuononi ruoth nyasaye biro keto sisera e lweti ruoth nyasaye osewuok kedo e nyimi kamano barak nobiro koa got tabor gi ji alufu apar ruoth nyasaye nodhuolo sisera gi gechene kod jolwenje e nyim barak mi sisera nolor e gache moringo gi tiende barak nolawogi nyaka harosheth monego jolwenygo duto mi kargi olal onge kata ngat achiel nodong sisera noringo modhi e hemb jael chi heber jakeni nikech ne nitie winjruok e kind jabin ruodh hazor gi jood heber jael nowuok moso sisera mowachone niya donji ruoth donji kik iluor omiyo nodonjo e hema mi jael noume gi law sisera nokone niya riyo oloya miyae pi amodhi jael noyawo dho puk chak moolone chak omadho bange noume kendo sisera nowachone niya chung e dho hema mondo ka ngato obiro penjo ka ngato ni ka ikwere ni onge jael chi heber nokawo tuor kod mulo migurogo hema nolidho modhi ir sisera mane oyudo nindo ogoyo ngoga noguro wiye gi mulono mi obwongone othichore sisera nogwecho motho kane barak obiro ka dwaro sisera jael nodhi romone kawacho ne niya bi mondo anyisi ngama idwaro nodhi kode moneno sisera koriere piny otho ka mulo migurogo hema othir e wiye chiengno ruoth nyasaye nomiyo joisrael oloyo jabin ruodh kanaan kendo ne githunge ahinya gi lweny nyaka ne gitieko kare chuth jongad bura wend debora gi barak chiengno debora gi barak wuod abinaom nower niya pakuru ruoth nyasaye nikech joisrael duto gi jotendgi nochiwore ni lweny winjuru un ruodhi chikuru itu un jotelo abiro goyo thum kawer ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel kane ruoth nyasaye owuok oa seir e piny edom piny noyiengni kendo polo notetni mi boche polo noton piny mangeny gode noyiengni e nyim ruoth nyasaye mar sinai nyasach israel e ndalo shamgar wuod anath kendo e ndalo jael joohala ne ok nyal dhi e wuoth jowuoth ne luwo mana yore mogondore ogondore miech israel nodong nono nyaka nabiro debora nabiro mabedo ka min ji e israel ne giyiero nyiseche manyien ne gilamo mana jochiende kuot kata tong ne ok nyal yudi kuom joisrael alufu piero angwen un jotend israel beduru gi sunga un joisarel mane ochiwore ni lweny denduru ruoth nyasaye un joidh kenje marachere kod un joma obet e lewni mabeyo mopedhi kata un joma wuotho awuotha gi tielo paruru ane gik mosetimorenigi winjuru dwond jower magoyo thum kuonde mon umboe gipako ruoth nyasaye kuom lochne nikech obedo kaka thwon joisrael joruoth nyasaye nolor kowuok e miechgi chiew chiew debora chiew chiew ichak wer malo barak wuod abinoam imak ji mangeny eka jolweny nolor gi jotendgi joruoth nyasaye nolor ire ka gikore ni lweny joefraim nobiro moriedo ni lweny gi chir ka giwacho niya wan kodu un jobenjamin oweteu ni ka jotend jolweny nobiro koa makir kaachiel gi jozebulun nomako ludh jodong lweny jodong isakar ne ni kod debora e lweny ee joisakar noluwo barak giduto ne giluwe mi gimwomore nyaka e holo joreuben ne onge winjruok e kindgi giwegi ka giparo gima onego gitim ango momiyo ne udigni mudong e kund rombe kuwinjo mana jokwath kaluongo rombegi jogilead bende nodong loka jordan ango momiyo jodan nodong kuma yiedhi gowoe joasher nobet e dhonam kuma aore wuokie jozebulun nochiwo ngimagi nyaka kar tho jonaftali bende nochiwore kamano e paw lweny mane nie got ruodhi nobiro mokedo taanak aora mar megido ee ruodhi mag kanaan nokedo ne ok giyako fedha sulue manie polo bende nokedo gi sisera aora kishon maringo matek noyuoyo josisera adier aora kishon nogengonigi yaye chunya tim teko tiend faresegi ne goyo koko ka ringo malaika mar ruoth nyasaye owacho ni kuonguru meroz kod joma odakie gi kuong malit nikech ne ok gibiro mondo gikony ruoth nyasaye ne ok gikonyo ruoth nyasaye kata joge mag lweny oguedh jael chi heber jakeni moloyo mon duto modak e hema sisera nokwayo pi nomiye chak nokelone cha adila e tawo maber ka tap ruoth nomako lo hema gi lwete achiel tuor omako gi lwete machielo nogoyo sisera gi tuor motoyo wiye notoyo wiye mi obwongone othichore e lowo noruombore piny mopodho e tiende koriere kanyo kama noruomboreeno ema noriere mothoe min sisera nongicho gie dirisa kapenjo niya ango momiyo gechene mag lweny odeko mak obiro ango momiyo pod ok wawinjo tiend faresene kagiro mon mariek nodwoke en bende nodwokore kende niya nyaka bed ni giyeko kendo gipogo mwandu giseyudo ngato ka ngato yudo nyako achiel kata ariyo kendo omi sisera gik mope kitgi yoreyore kod nanga mokwo maber mondo orwak e ngute ruoth nyasaye wasiki duto mondo olal nono kamano ji duto moheri mondo orieny ka wangchieng wuok gi tekone duto bange piny israel nobedo gi kue kuom higni piero angwen jongad bura ruoth nyasaye oluongo gideon timbe joisrael nochako obedo maricho e nyim ruoth nyasaye mi nochiwogi e lwet jomidian kuom higni abiriyo jomidian nothungogi ahinya omiyo nochunogi ni nyaka gipondi kuonde madiny e kor gode kod kuonde motimo rogo gi kuonde moko ginyalo gengoree pile kane joisrael osechwoyo jomidian kod joamalek kod ogendini mamoko moa yo wuok chieng ne biro monjogi ne giguro hembegi e piny joisrael kendo ne giketho cham nyaka mbap gaza ok giweyo gimoro amora mane joisrael nyalo konyorego kaka rombo kata dhiang kata kanyna ne gibiro gi jambgi kod hembegi kendo ne gingeny mana ka bonyo kane oriwgi gi ngamia mane gingo ne gingeny mokalo akwana ne gibiro e pinyno mondo giketh cham kamano jomidian nomiyo joisrael obedo modhier mi joisrael noywak ni ruoth nyasaye mondo okonygi kane giywak ni ruoth nyasaye nikech thagruok mane giyudo e lwet jomidian ruoth nyasaye nooronigi janabi mowachonigi niya ruoth nyasaye nyasach isarel owacho ni nagolou e piny misri kuma ne unie wasumbini mi aresou e lwet jomisri kendo e lwet jogo duto mane thagou nariembogi oko mondo giwenu thuolo mi amiyou pinjegi nawachonu ni e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kendo ni kik ulam nyiseche joamor koro udak e pinygi ne ok uwinjo wachna bang mano malaika mar ruoth nyasaye nobiro mobet piny e tiend yath moro man ofra yadhno ne mar joash jaabiezer noyudo ka gideon wuod joash dino cham e bur lwanda mar biyo mzabibu mondo kik jomidian juke gi chamgo malaika mar ruoth nyasaye nofwenyorene mowachone niya ngat thwon kendo ruoth nyasaye ni kodi gideon nodwoke niya ruoth ka en adier ni ruoth nyasaye ni kodwa ango momiyo gigi duto osetimorenwa ere honni duto mane kwerewa owachonwa ni ruoth nyasaye notimo kogologi e piny misri ruoth nyasaye osejwangowa kendo oseweyowa e lwet jomidian eka ruoth nyasaye nochike ni dhiyo mondo ire joisrael e lwet jomidian gi teko ingo ema aori gideon nodwoke niya ruoth ere kaka dare joisrael dhoodwa e dhoot matinie moloyo dhoudi duto mag manase bende mana ngat marachrachie moloyo e dhoodwa ruoth nyasaye nowachone niya anabed kodi mi initiek jomidian inilogi mana ka gima en ngat achiel gideon nokone niya ka iyie koda adier timna gima nyisa ni ema iwuoyo koda yie kik ia ka nyaka akelni chiwo moro mondo aket e nyimi nodwoke ni abiro riti nyaka iduogi kamano gideon nodhi moyango nyadiel kendo otedo nokawo mogo dirom kilo piero ariyo molosogo makati ok ketie thowi noketo ringo e adita kado noolo e tawo eka nokelo ni malaika mar ruoth nyasaye e tiend yath malaika nowachone niya ket ringono kod makatino e lwandani kendo iol kado kuomgi mi notimo kamano eka malaika mar ruoth nyasaye norieyo lwete momulo ringo kod makati gi luth mane engo e lwete mach nomwoch e lwanda mowango ringo gi makati te bang mano malikano nolal nono e wange mano nomiyo gideon ongeyo ni kara malaika mar ruoth nyasaye ema aye loso kode mi nowacho niya yaye ruoth nyasaye kara en adier ni asewuoyo gi malaika mari wang gi wang ruoth nyasaye nowachone niya bed gii kue kendo kik iluor nimar ok nitho bang mano gideon nogero ni ruoth nyasaye kendomarmisango kanyo mochako ni jehova shalom tiende ni ruoth nyasaye en kue kendono pod ni ofra kuno e piny joabieze nyaka chil kawuono otienono ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni gideon niya kaw rwadh wuoru gi rwath machielo hike abiriyo kendo imuk kendomarliswa mar baal wuoru orito bende ingad siro milamo mochung e bathe eka iger ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachi kendomarmisango maber mowinjore ewi pidhni kaw rwath machielo iwang kaachiel gi siro misengadono ka misango miwango pep omiyo gideon nokawo jotichne apar mokonye timo gima ne ruoth nyasaye ochike ne ok ohedhore timo kamano godiechieng nikech noluoro joodgi kod jodalagi omiyo notime mana gotieno kane jodala ochiew gokinyi ne giyudo ka omuk kendomarliswa mar baal kendo otong siro mane ochung e bathe mi ochiw rwath ka misango miwango pep e kendomarmisango mane gideon ogero ne gipenjore ka gidwaro ngeyo ngama otimo kamano mi bange ne giyudo wach ni en gideon wuod joash omiyo ne giwacho ni joash niya gol wuodi oko nimar osemuko kendomarliswa mar baal kendo osengado siro mane ochung e bathe omiyo nyaka otho kane joash oneno ka ji ochokore molwore nopenjogi niya un ema uwuoyo ni baal koso un ema uyalone ngato ka ngato yalone ang nonegi ka piny pok oru ka baal en nyasaye adier mondo owach wachne owuon nimar en ema nende omuk kendone mar liswa chiengno nochak gideon ni jerubaal tiende ni baal owach wechene owuon nimar joash nosewacho ni baal owach wechene owuon kodonjo ni ngatno kuom muko kendonemarliswa jomidian gi joamalek kod ogendini duto yo wuok chieng noriwo jolwenjgi kaachiel ne gingado aora jordan mi gijot e holo jezreel much ruoth nyasaye nobiro kuom gideon mi nogoyo tung koluongo joka abiezer mondo oluwe nooro joote e piny manase duto mondo gin bende giluwe kendo nooro joote ir joasher gi jozebulun kod jonaftali mi gin bende ne gibiro gideon nowacho ni nyasaye niya ka idwaro ni mondo ire joisrael gi lweta kaka isewacho eri aketo pien rombo e laru kama wadinoe cham ka kiny ayudo ka pien rombo kende ema tho omokoe piny odong kotwo eka nange ni kara adier idwaro ni mondo are joisrael mi notimore kaka nokwayono kane gideon ochiew gokinyi nobiyo pien rombono mogolo kuome pi moromo pongo bakul eka gideon nowacho ni nyasaye niya kik ikech koda yie awuo kodi kendo yie mondo pien kende ema mondo odong kotwo piny ema mondo tho omokie otienono bende nyasaye notimo kamano mi pien kende ema nodong kotwo piny duto nomoko tho jongad bura jogideon oloyo jomidian gideon bende iluongo ni jerubaal kod ji duto mane ni kode nochiew gokinyi mangich modhi ojot soko man herod kambi jomidian ne nie holo man yo nyandwat mar got ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni gideon niya gi ji mangeny ahinya omiyo ok anyal keto jomidian e lwetgi nimar dipo ka joisrael opakore ni gilocho mana gi tekogi giwegi koro dhiyo mondo iland ni ji wach niya ngato angata luoro kata kibaji omako mondo oa e got galud piyopiyo odog dala gideon notimo kamano mi ji alufu piero ariyo gariyo noduogo alufu apar nodong eka ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni gideon kendo niya ji pod ngeny ahinya omiyo tergi mwalo e dho pi mondo abi kuno ayiernigi ka awacho ni ni jali nyaka dhi kodi ngatno nodhi kodi ka awachoni ni jali ok dhi kodi ngatno ok nodhi kamano gideon notero ji mwalo nyaka e dho pi mi ruoth nyasaye nowachone niya jogo duto gado pi gi lewgi kaka guok gado ket yorgi mago goyo chonggi piny eka modho ket komachielo kar romb joma nogado pi gi lwetgi ne mia adek ji mamoko duto nogoyo chonggi piny ka modho bang mano ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni gideon niya abiro resou gi lwet ji mia adek mogado pigo kendo abiro chiwo jomidian e lwetu joma odong duto mondo odog dala kuom mano gideon nokawo agulni kod tunge kuom joisrael mamoko duto mi noweyo gidok dala nodong mana ji mia adek kende kambi jomidian ne ni e holo gi mwalo otieno nogo ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni gideon niya chung idhi imonj kambi jo midian nikech aseketogi e lweti kiluoro timo kamano ara dhiuru mokwongo gi pura jatichni e kambigi mondo iwinj gima giwacho wach iwinjo ka giwachono biro miyi chir mar dhi monjo kambino omiyo ne gilor gi pura jatichne mi gidhi e kambi kuma ne jolweny mag jomidian nindoe jomidian gi joamalek kod jo yo wuokchieng duto mane nindo e holo ne ngeny ka bonyo kendo ngamia mane gin go nokadho akwana mana ka kuoyo manie dho nam kane gideon ochopo nowinjo ka ngat moro poro ni wadgi lek niya nende aleko ni makati moro motwo obiro ka ngielore e kambi jomidian nochopo e hema moro motuomo mi hemano opodho ataro eka wadgi nodwoke niya nyaka bed ni mano en mana ligangla gideon wuod joash jaisrael kara nyasaye osechiwo jomidian kod ogandagi mar lweny duto e lwete kane gideon owinjo lekno kaachiel gi ngeche nogoyo chonge piny molemo eka nodok e kambi joisrael mowacho niya wuoguru nikech ruoth nyasaye oseketo jolweny mag midian e lwetu nopogo joge mia adek e migepe adek momiyo ngato ka ngato tung kod agulu motingo meny e iye eka nowachonigi niya kwachopo e bath kambi ngiyauru mondo utim mana gima atimo ka agoyo tung kaachiel gi jogo duto wan go eka un joma oselworo kambi bende ugo tungeu kukok niya wakedo ni ruoth nyasaye kendo ni gideon gideon gi joge mia achiel nochopo e bath kambi kar sa angwen mar otieno mana ka jorit manyien chako tich ne gigoyo tung kendo ne ginego agulini mane gitingo eka migepe adekgo duto nogoyo tung kendo onego agulni ne gitingo meny e lwetgi koracham tunge ne gitingo e lwetgi korachwich ka gikok niya ligangla mar ruoth nyasaye gi mar gideon ne gilworo kambi ka ngato ka ngato ochung kare jomidian nochiew ka kihondko omako moringo ka ywak ji mia adekgo nomedo goyo tungegi mi ruoth nyasaye nomiyo ji duto mane ni e kambi ochako kedo kendgi giwegi ne giringo nyaka bethshita e yo mochomo zerera mi gichopo e tong abelmehola man tabath joisrael jonaftali gi joasher kod jomanase duto noluong moriembo jomidian bende gideon nooro joote e piny gode duto mag efraim mowacho ni jo kuno niya loruru mondo uked gi jomidian gengnigiuru kuonde duto minyalo ngadogo aora jordan nyaka bethbara mi joefraim noyuoro ni lweny kendo ne girito kuonde mingadogo aora jordan nyaka bethbara ne gimako oreb gi zeeb ruodhi ariyo mag jomidian oreb ne ginego e lwanda mar oreb zeeb ne ginego e kar biyo mzabibu mar zeeb ne gidhi nyime gi lawo jomidian eka bange ne gingado aora jordan mi gikelo ni gideon wi oreb gi wi zeeb jongad bura joefraim nowacho ni gideon niya ango momiyo isetimonwa kama dak ne iluongowa kidhi kedo gi jomidian ne gidhaw kode matek kuom wachno gideon nodwokogi niya ere ndhath gima asetimo kata mana gima tinie un joefraim usetimo oloyo mago duto dhoodwa osetimo donge nyasaye osechiwo e lwetu oreb gi zeeb ruodhi mag midian e lwetu ere gima asetimo minyalo pimo gi gima usetimo kane osewacho kamano mirimb jogo norumo gideon omako ruodhi mag jomidian kane gideon gi joge mia adek osebiro mongado aora jordan ne giol kata kamano pod ne gilawo wasikgigo omiyo nokwayo joma nodak sukoth niya yieuru umi joga chiemo nikech giol pod walawo zeba gi zalmuna ruodhi jomidian jodong sukoth nodwoke niya ere gima omiyo onego wami jogi mag lweny chiemo pok imako zeba gi zalmuna gideon nowachonigi niya kara ber ka ruoth nyasaye osechiwo zeba gi zalmuna e lweta anayu ringreu gi kuth thim noa kanyo modhi penuel kendo kuno bende nokwayoe chiemo mana kaka nosekwayo josukoth jopenuel nodwoke mana machal gi josukoth omiyo nowachonigi niya ka aduogo ka angima abiro muko kama ochiel motegno mar siro lweny e dalauni noyudo ka zeba gi zalmuna ne ni karkor kaachiel gi jogi mag lweny alufu apar gabich ne gin joma nodong kuom oganda lweny mar jo wuok chieng jolweny alufu mia achiel gi piero ariyo noneg e lweny gideon noluwo yor thim mane johala luwo man yo wuok chieng man noba gi jogbeha mi nomonjo jolwenygo apoya zeba gi zalmuna ruodhi mag midian noringo gideon nolawogi momakogi jolwenjgi noleny nono kane gideon wuod joash duogo koa e lweny koluwo yor here nomako wuod sukoth moro mi wuowino nondikone nying ruodhi mag sukoth kaachiel gi nying jodonggi duto ne gin ji piero abiriyo gabiriyo bange gideon nodhi ir josukoth mowachonigi niya neuru zeba gi zalmuna mane omiyo uchaya kupenja ni isemako zeba gi zalmuna koso momiyo idwaro ni mondo wami jogi chiemo eka nomako jodong dalano kendo nokawo kuth thim moyuyogigo bende nomuko kama ochiel motegno mar siro lweny mane ni penuel kendo nonego jo dalano bange nopenjo zeba gi zalmuna niya joma nunego tabor ne chal nadi ne gidwoke ni ne gichal kodi ngato ka ngato kuomgi ne chalo gi wuod ruoth gideon nowachonigi niya ne gin owetena yawuot mama akuongora e nying nyasaye ni dine uwe negogi da ok anegou eka nowacho ni jether wuode makayo niya malo ineggi wuodeno ne pod mana rawera omiyo noluor mi ok owuodho liganglane zeba gi zalmuna nowacho ni gideon niya bi inegwa mana iwuon nimar e ngat maduong bade otegno omiyo gideon noa malo monegogi giduto eka nokawo odeyo mane nie ngut ngamia maggi timbe moko mag gideon kod thone bang wechego joisrael nowacho ni gideon niya iseresowa e lwet jomidian omiyo koro bed ruodhwa kendo wuodi gi nyikwayi bende nobed ruodhi bangi gideon nodwokogi niya ok nabed ruodhu kata mana wuoda bende ok nobedi ruoth nyasaye ema nobed ruodhu eka nomedo wacho niya yieruru ngato kuomu mondo omiya stadi mugolo kuom gik moyaki jomidian mane giyakogo ne joma dak e thim timgi en liero stadi mag dhahabu e itgi joisrael nodwoke niya wayie miyigi mi ne gipedho stadi mane oseyako pek mar stadi mane gimiyo gideon ne romo kilo piero adek bende ne nitie odeyo gi bonje kod nengni maralik mane ruodhi mag jomidian rwako kaachiel gi thiwni mane otue e ngut ngamia maggi gideon noloso kido mar nyasaye manono gi dhahabubugo mochungo e dalane ofra joisrael duto noweyo nyasaye modhi kuno lamo nyasaye manonono ne odoko obadho ni gideon kaachiel gi joode kamano e kaka joisrael noloyo jomidian mi jomidian koro ne ok nyal bwogogi omiyo piny nobet gi kue kuom higni piero angwen kane gideon wuod joash pod ngima gideonno bende iluongo ni jerubaal nodhi odak e dalane owuon ne en gi yawuowi piero abiriyo nikech ne en gi mon mangeny bende ne en gi dhako moro shekem nonywolone wuowi mochako ni abimelek gideon wuod joash notho ka hike oniang mi oyike ofra dala joabiezer e liend joash wuon mare bang tho gideon joisrael nolokore kendo moweyo nyasaye ne gichako gilamo baal mi giloko baalberith nyasachgi ne giweyo lamo ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi mane oseresogi kuom wasikgi mane olworogi bende ne ok gitimo maber ni joka gideon kuom ber mane gideon osetimonigi gideonno nyinge moro ne en jerubaal jongad bura loch abimelek abimelek wuod jerubaal nodhi shekem thurgi min mare mi owuoyo gi owete gi min kod jodhoodgi min mare duto nowachonigi niya yieuru upenjna jodong shekem kama ere gima bernu bedo e bwo loch yawuot jerubaal gin ji piero abiriyo duto koso bedo e bwo loch ngat achiel bende nyisgiuru ni nyaka ginge ni remo achiel kodgi owete min mare nowuoyone gi joshekem e wachno mi joshekem noyie luwe nimar ne en watgi ne gimiye fedha piero abiriyo mogol e od baalberith nyasachgi mongiewogo jomoko acheje kendo jomahundu mondo oluwe abimelek nodhi ofra dala jerubaal wuon mare mi onego owetene piero abiriyo yawuot wuon ewi lwanda achiel mak mana jotham wuod jerubaal machogo ema nopondo mi ne ok onego bange joshekem duto kod jobethmilo nochokore kanyakla kendo ne gidhi e tiend yath man siro milamo man shekem mi giketo abimelek ruoth kuno kane jotham owinjo wachno nodhi mochung ewi got gerizim kendo nokok niya winjuru un joshekem kendo nyasaye bende mondo owinju chieng moro yien mae bungu nodhi yiero ruodhgi mi ne giwacho ni yadh zeituni mondo obed ruodhgii yadh zeituni nodwokogi niya ere kaka dawe mo miyudo kuom olembena kendo mimiyogo nyiseche kod ji duong mondo abed ruodhu eka yien nowacho ni ngowo ni diyie mondo ibed ruodhwa ngowo nodwokogi niya ere kaka dawe olembena mabeyo kendo mamit mondo abed ruodhu omiyo yien nokwayo yadh mzabibu mondo oyie bedo ruodhgi yadh mzabibu nodwokogi niya ere kaka dawe mzabibuna miyo nyiseche kod ji mor mondo abed ruodhu bang mano yien duto nokwayo kudho ni koro yie mondo ibed ruodhwa mi kudho nowachonigi niya ka udwaro keta ruodhu adiera ara biuru mondo uyue e tipona ka ok kamano mach biro muoch kuom kudho kendo biro wango kata mana yiend sida man lebanon eka jotham nomedo wacho niya koro un bende uparo ni usetimo gima kare kendo mowinjore kuom keto abimelek ruoth bende usetimo maber adier ni jerubaal kod joode bende usetimo ni wuora gima owinjore gi timne maber mane otimo kokedonu kendo kowitore e nyim lweny moresou e lwet jomidian kawuono useriwo ni jood wuora mi unego yawuote piero abiriyo e lwanda achiel kendo uketo abimelek wuod chiege misumba mondo obed ruodh shekem mana nikech en watu bende uparo ni gima usetimo ni jerubaal kod joode kawuononi en gima ber kendo kare adier ka en kamano onego ubed mamor gi abimelek kendo en bende onego obed mamor kodu ka ok kamano mach mondo omuoch kuom joshekem gi jobethmilo mondo owang abimelek bang mano jotham noringo moa nodhi modak beer nikech noluoro abimelek owadgi abimelek norito joisrael kuom higni adek bange nyasaye nomiyo joshekem odhaw kode mi ginganyone mano notimore ni mondo nek marach mar yawuot jerubaal piero abiriyo ochul ewi abemelek owadgi nonegogi kendo ewi joshekem nokonye negogi joshekem nooro ji mondo odhi obut ni abimelek ewi gode jogo ne yako ji duto mane kadho kuno omiyo abimelek noyudo wach motang ngat moro nyinge gaal wuod ebed nobiro shekem kaachiel gi owetene mi joshekem noyie bedo e bwo lochne ne gidhi e puothegi mi gipono mzabibu kendo gikelo kuonde mag bicho mondo gilosgo divai bange ne gitimo sawo e hekalu mar nyasachgi kuma ne gichiemoe kendo gimethoe mi giyanyoe abimelek gaal wuod ebed nowacho niya abimelek en nga koso ere gima omiyo wan joshekem dwatine donge wuod jerubaal kod ngate zebul josebedo ka tiyo ni johamor wuon shekem koro ere gimomiyo wan dwatine ka dabed ni jatend jogi dariembo abimelek kendo da awachone ni mondo okel jolwenje wakedgo kane zebul wuod shekem owinjo wachno nokecho ahinya mooro joote lingling ir abimelek gi wach niya gaal wuod ebed kaachiel gi owetene josebiro shekem kendo gisethuwo joshekem kodi omiyo koro kaw jogi mondo ubi gotieno upond e bungu kiny gokinyi ka piny oru uwuog kuma upondoe mondo umonj dala apoya ka gaal gi jogi jowuok mondo oked kodu timnegiuru gima uneno kamano abimelek gi joge nobiro gotieno ne gipogore e migepe angwen mi gibuto mondo gimonj shekem kiny kane gaal owuok mochung e dhoranga dala abimelek kaachiel gi joge nowuok kuonde mane gipondoe gaal nonegogi mowacho ni zebul niya neye joma biro ka ewi gode ka zebul nodwoke niya maka mana tipo mag gode ok gin ji bange matin gaal nochako owachone ni ne ji e kande lor ewi got kendo migawo moro e cha biro koluwo yor yadh ajuoga eka zebul nopenje niya koro ere wecheni nyocha isungorigo ka ok ema nyocha ipenjo ni ere gima omiyo dwabed e bwo ngat abimelekni donge magi e joma nyocha icharo koro dhiyo iked kodgi kane gaal owinjo kamano nokawo joshekem modhi omonjo abimelek abimelek nodhuole gi lop tiende moringo odok shekem ringre jomotho nopie kanyo mochopo e dhoranga shekem abimelek nodhi modak aruma zebul noriembo gaal kaachiel gi owetene mi ok oweyo nigi thuolo mondo gidag shekem kendo kinyne joshekem nowuok oko e lela mi nonyis abimelek wachno nokawo joge mopogo e migepe adek mi ne gidhi gipondo e bungu kane oneno ji kawuok e dala nowuok kama nopondoe momonjogi noreto gi migawo mane en go modhi ochung e dhoranga dala migepe moko ariyo mag joge nomonjo ji duto mane ni e bungu mi ne ginegogi duto abimelek nokedo gi joma ne ni e dala odiechiengno duto mi nomako dala kendo nonego ji nodakie eka noketho dalano mokworo bala kuome kane ji duto mane odak kama oger motegno mane ni shekem owinjo wachno ne gidonjo e ot iye mar hekalu mar elberik nyasachgi mondo gipondie kane onyis abimelek ni jodalano ochokore kanyakla nokawo joge modhigo e got zalmon nokawo le mongadogo bad yath moro moketoe goke eka nowacho ni joge niya uneno gima atimoni returu mondo un bende utim kamano omiyo ngato ka ngato nongado bad yath mi ne giluwo bang abimelek kendo ne gichano bede yiengo e kor ot iye mar hekaluno gi oko eka ne gimokoe mach mi jo dalano duto notho duto ne gin ji moromo alufu achiel chwo gi mon bange abimelek nodhi thebez molworo kendo okawo ne nitie gorofa mar lweny moger motegno e dier dala omiyo jo dalano duto chwo gi mon nodhi mopondo kanyo ne gilorore e iye mi giidho e tado abimelek nomonjo gorofano kane ochopo machiegni gi dhoot mondo omokie mach dhako moro nogolo pong rego mogoyo wi abimelek mi wiye obarore eka noluongo wuowi mane jatingne gi lweny piyopiyo mowachone niya wuodh liganglani inegago nimar dipo ka ji owacho ni dhako ema onega kamano wuowino nochwowe motho kane joisrael oneno ni abimelek osetho ne gike mi gidhi miechgi giduto kamano nyasaye nochulo richo mane abimelek otimo ni wuon mare kuom nego yawuot wuon piero abiriyo bende nyasaye nochulo kuor ni joshekem kuom richogi mana kaka jotham wuod jerubaal nonyisogi chieng mane okuongogi jongad bura tola gi jair jobedo jotelo e israel bang abimelek tola wuod pua nyakwar dodo nowuok mondo ore joisrael ne en jaisakar nodak shamir e piny gode mag efraim nobedo jatelo e israel kuom higni piero ariyo gadek bange notho moike shamir bang tola jair jagilead nowuok mobedo jatelo e israel kuom higni piero ariyo gariyo ne en gi yawuowi piero adek mane nigi kende piero adek giidho bende ne gin gi mier piero adek e piny gilead pod iluongo ni havothjair nyaka chil kawuono havothjair tiende ni miech jair kane jair notho noyike kamon joamon othiro joisrael timbe joisrael nochako odoko maricho e nyim ruoth nyasaye ne gitiyo ni nyiseche manono kaka baal gi ashtaroth gi nhyiseche mag joaram gi mag josidon gi mag jomoab gi mag joamon kod mag jofilistia ne giweyo ruoth nyasaye mi ok gilame omiyo ruoth nyasaye nokecho kodgi mochiwogi e lwet jofilistia gi joamon jogo nosando joisrael nodak loka jordan e piny joamon man gilead kuom higni apar gaboro mothirogi bange joamon nongado aora jordan mondo omonj jojuda gi jobenjamin kod joefarim mi joisrael nobedo e thagruok malit eka joisrael noywak ni ruoth nyasaye ka giywak niya nyasachwa waseketho e nyimi nikech waseweyi mi walamo mana baal ruoth nyasaye nodwokogi niya jomisri gi joamor gi joamon gi jofilistia gi josidon gi joamalek kod jomaon nothirou e higni mokadho kane uywakna donge ne aresou e lwetgi kata kamano bange nuchako uweya mi udhi lamo nyiseche mamoko kuom mano ok nachakl aresu kendo dhiuru mondo uywag ni nyiseche museyierogo mondo oresu kuom thagruok momakou joisrael nowacho ni ruoth nyasaye niya wayie ni waseketho omiyo timnwa kaka ihero wahombi mondo ikonywa kawuono kuom mano ne giwito nyisechegi manono mi gilamo ruoth nyasaye eka ruoth nyasaye nokechogi kuom thagruokgi bange oganda lweny mar joamon nochokore kanyakla modhi ojot gilead joisrael nochokore kanyakla mojot mispa jogilead kod jotendgi nowacho e kindgi giwegi niya ngat nokuong kedo gi joamon ema nobed jatelo mar joma odak gilead duto jongad bura jeftha oreso joisrael kuom joamon jeftha jagilead ne jalweny mager ne en wuod gilead mane onywolo gi nyako jachode gilead ne nigi chiege hie nonywolone yawuowi mogwarore kendo kane yawuotego osedoko madongo ne giriembo jeftha ka giwachone niya ok inyal chamo gikeni mag wuonwa nikech ok owadwa hie mi jeftha noringo oa kuom owetene modhi odak e piny tob kuno noyudoe jomoko acheje mi obedo jatendgi bang ndalo moko joamon nobiro momonjo joisrael kane lweny omuoch jodong gilead nodhi omo jeftha e piny tob ne giwachone niya bi ibednwa jatend lweny mondo waked gi joamon jeftha nodwokogi niya donge ne uchaya mi uriemba e dala wuora koro ango momiyo ubiro ira ka un e thagruok ne giwachone niya wabiro iri ni mondo wadog kodi waked gi joamon kendo mondo ibed ruodh joma odak gilead duto jeftha nowachonigi niya kudwoka dala mi akedo gi joamon mi ruoth nyasaye ochiwogi e lweta ngeuru ni nyaka abed ruodhu jodong gilead nodwoke niya wakuongre gi nying ruoth nyasaye janeno e kindwa kodi ni wanatim mana gima iwacho omiyo jeftha nodhi mizpa gi jodong gileadgo mi jogilead nokete jatendgi kendo ruodhgi eka nonwoyo e nyim ruoth nyasaye mana weche mane osewacho ni jodongo ka bange jeftha nooro joote ir ruodh joamon kopenje niya ango milaro kodwa ruodh joamon nodwoko joote jeftha niya kane joisarel wuok misri ne gikawo pinywa chakre aora arnon nyaka aora jabok gi aora jordan omiyo koro dwoknwauru pinyno gi kue jeftha nochako ooro joote ir ruodh joamon kowachone niya joisrael ne ok okawo piny jomoab kata piny joamon kane giwuok misri ne gingado thim nyaka nam makwar mi gichopo kadesh eka ne gioro joote ir ruodh edom ka gikwaye mondo oyie gikadhi e pinye notamore mi ne gioro wach ni ruodh moab bende en bende nodagi omiyo joisrael nobedo abeda kadesh bange ne gidhi nyime ka gingado thim ne giluwo yo lworo piny edom gi piny moab nyaka ne gichopo yo wuok chieng mar moab e bath aora arnon ne gibworo kanyo ne ok gingado aora nikech en tong piny jomoab eka joisrael nooro joote ir sihon ruodh heshbon mane ruodh joamor mondo oyie gikadhi e pinye ka gidhi kuma ne gidhi dakie sihon notamogi kadho e pinye nochoko joge duto mag lweny mi gijot jahaz kendo nochako kedo gi joisrael ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel noketo sihon gi joge duto e lwet joisrael mi joisrael noloyogi mokawo piny joamon duto mi gidak kuno kamano ne gikawo piny joamor chakre aora arnon yo milambo nyaka aora jabok man yo nyandwat kendo chakre thim yo wuok chieng nyaka aora jordan yo podho chieng omiyo ne en mana ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel ema noriembo joamor mondo oweni joge israel thuolo donge un udak e piny mane kemosh nyasachu omayo wegi momiyou kamano e kaka wan bende nyaka wadag adaga e piny mane ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa omiyowa koso iparo ni iber moloyo barak wuod zipor ruodh moab mane ok odhaw gi joisrael kata omonjogi joisrael osedak heshbon gi aroer gi mier matindo duto mokiewo kodgi kaachiel gi mier man e bath aora arnon kuom higni mia adek en ango osebedo ka monou kawogi kuom hignigo duto wan pok wakethonu un koro utimonwa marach kuom kedo kodwa ruoth nyasaye e jangad bura kendo kawuono obiro ngado bura e kind joisrael gi joamon ruodh joamon ne ok odewo ote mane jeftha oorone much ruoth nyasaye nobiro kuom jeftha mi nowuotho e gilead gi manase moduogo nyaka mizpa e gilead koa kanyo nodhi mondo omonj joamon nokuongore ni ruoth nyasaye niya ka inichiwo joamon e lweta ngat nokwong wuok e dala moromo koda ka aduogo bang loyo joamon e lweny nobed ngat mowal ni ruoth nyasaye kendo anachiwe ka misango miwango pep kamano jeftha nongado aora mondo odhi oked gi joamon mi ruoth nyasaye nochiwogi e lwete nonegogi oyokre chakre aora aroer nyaka minith kendo nyaka abelkeramin mokawo mier piero ariyo mano e kaka joisrael noloyo joamon nyar jeftha kane jeftha odok dalagi mizpa nopo koneno nyare ka ema biro romone kagoyo thum kendo miel mano nene e nyathine kende noonge gi wuowi kata nyako machielo kane onene noyiecho lepe koywak mowacho niya yaye nyathina ichodo chunya ango momiyo ema ikelona chandruokni asekuongora ni ruoth nyasaye kendo ok anyal lokora nyare nowachone niya ka isekuongori ni ruoth nyasaye kamano timna atima gima niwacho ni nitim nikech ruoth nyasaye osemiyo ichulo kuor ni joamon wasiki eka nomedo wacho ni wuon mare niya yie akwayie gimoro achiel kende wena thuolo kuom dueche ariyo mondo adhi aba ewi gode ka aywak nikech abiro tho kapod nyako ngili mapok ongeyo chwo noyiene mondo odhi mi nodhi kaachiel gi osiepene manyiri moywago nyakone ewi gode kuom dueche ariyo bang dueche ariyogo nodwogo ir wuon mare mi wuon notimone mana kaka nosekuongore notho nyako ngili pok ongeyo chwo mano ema nobedo chakruok mar tim joisrael ni nyigi nyaka dhi ywago nyar jeftha jagilead ndalo angwen higa ka higa jongad bura jeftha okedo gi joefraim joefraim nochoko jogi mag lweny mi gingado aora jordan nyaka zafon ne giwacho ni jeftha niya ere gima omiyo ne idhi kedo gi joamon ok iluongowa mondo wadhi kodi wabiro wangi gi mach e odi jeftha nodwokogi niya wasebedo ka wakedo lweny mager gi joamon ne waluongou ne utamoru biroo resowa e lwetgi kane aneno ni ok ubi resowa nawito ngimana madhi loka kedo kodgi mi ruoth nyasaye nochiwogi e lweta koro ango momiyo ubiro mondo uked koda kawuono bange jeftha nochoko jogilead duto kanyakla mi gikedo gi joefraim kendo giloyogi bang loyogi kamano jogilead nomako kuonde miyorogo aora jordan mondo joefraim kik ngadi noyudo ka nitie wach moro miluongo ni shiboleth joefraim ok nyal hulo adimba omiyo kane jaefraim moro pondo mi okwayo thuolo ka dokadhi jogilead nopenje ka en jaefraim kane okwer ne gikone mondo owachi ni shiboleth kane owacho ni siboleth gimake kendo ginege mana kanyono e kindeno joefraim alufu piero angwen gariyo notho jeftha nobedo jatelo e israel kuom higni auchiel bange notho moyike e dalane gilead ibzan gi elon kod abdon jobedo jotelo e israel bang jeftha ibzan jabethlehem nodoko jatelo e israel ne en gi yawuowi piero adek gi nyiri bende piero adek nyigego nodhi tedo yawuote bende nokendonigi nyiri piero adek ibzan nobedo jatelo e israel kuom higni abiriyo bange notho moyike bethlehem bang ibzan elon jazebulun nodoko jatelo e israel kuom higni apar bange notho moyike aijalon e piny zebulun bang elon abdon wuod hilel japirathon nodoko jatelo e israel ne en gi yawuowi piero angwen kod nyikwayo yawuowi piero adek moro ka moro kuom yawuote gi nyikwayego ne nigi kanje moidho abdon nobedo jatelo e israel kuom higni aboro bange notho moyike pirathon man efraim e piny gode mag joamalek jongad bura nywol samson timbe joisrael nochako odoko maricho e nyim nyasaye omiyo noketogi e lwet jofilistia kuom higni piero angwen ne nitie jadan nyinge manoa nodak zora chiege ne migumba onge nyathi chieng moro malaika mar nyasaye nofwenyore ni chiegeno mowachone niya dhako migumba onge nyathi ibiro mako ich mi inywol nyathi mawuowi omiyo koro kik imadh divai kata gimoro mero ji kata kik icham chiemo makuero nikech ibiro mako ich kendo nywolo nyathi wuowi mirich kik ka wiye nikech chakre chieng monywole nobed janazir ngat mowal ni nyasaye en ema nokwong kedo gi jofilistia mondo ore joisrael e lwetgi dhakono nodhi mowacho ni chwore niya ngat nyasaye nende obiro ira kite ne lich ahinya machalo mana gi kit malaika mar nyasaye ne ok apenje kuma oaye bende ne ok ohulona nyinge nowachona ni abiro mako ich kendo nywolo nyathi mawuowi omiyo koro kik amadh divai kata gimoro mamero ji kata kik acham chiemo makuero nikech nyathino biro bedo janazir ngat mowal ni nyasaye chakre chieng nywolne nyaka chieng thone bang winjo wechego manoa nokwayo ruoth nyasaye niya ruoth nyasaye yie mondo ngat nyasaye mane ioro cha odwog irwa kendo onyiswa gima onego watim gi nyathi wabiro nywolono nyasaye notimo gima ne manoa okwaye mi malaikane nodwogo e puodho kuma noyudo dhakono nitie manoa chwore ne ok ni kode kuno omiyo dhakono noringo piyo modhi onyiso chwore niya ngat nyocha obiro ira cha oseduogo ira kendo manoa noa malo moluwo chiege mi nodhi openjo ngatno niya e jal nende owuoyo gi chiega koso ngatno nodwoke niya ee eka manoa nowachone niya nyathino nobed nyathi machal nadi ka weche miwachogo otimore wanarite nadi kendo notim ango malaika mar nyasaye nodwoko manoa nia chiegi nyaka ritre kuom gik moko duto asenyise kik omadh divai kata gimoro amora mamero ji kata mana chamo chiemo makuero kik ocham duto mane asenyise ema mondo otim manoa nowacho ni malaika mar nyasaye niya yie mondo ibed wendowa mondo walosni nyadiel moro icham malaika mar nyasaye nodwoke niya kata ugenga mondo abedi ok abi chamo chiembu unyalo lose mondo uchiwe ni ruoth nyasaye ka misango miwango pep manoa ne pok ofwenyo ni ngatno en malaika mar ruoth nyasaye omiyo nowachone niya hulnwa nyingi mondo wabi wamiyi duong ka gima isewachono otimore malaika nopenje ni marango idwaro ngeyo nyinga en nying modhiero ji ngeyo omiyo manoa nokawo nyadiel kod mogo mi notimogo misango ewi lwanda ni ruoth nyasaye timbene odhiero ji ngeyo kane ligek mach bebni e kendomarmisango kochiko polo manoa gi chiege noneno malaika mar ruoth nyasaye ka dum dhi e polo ei ligek majno omiyo ne gipodho piny auma malaika mar nyasaye ne ok ochako ofwenyore ni manoa gi chiege kendo koro manoa nofwenyo ni ngatno ne malaika mar ruoth nyasaye omiyo nowacho ni chiege niya wabiro tho nikech waseneno nyasaye chiege nodwoke niya ka da ni ruoth nyasaye dwaro negowa da ok oyie misangowa kendo da ok onyisowa gigi duto kata wachonwa gik mosewachonwagi bange dhakono nonywolo nyathi mawuowi mochako ni samson nyathino nodongo mahanedan manie kind zora gi eshtaol ruoth nyasaye noguedhe kendo roho mar ruoth nyasaye nochako tiyo kode jongad bura wach samson gi nyar timna samson nolor odhi timna mi noneno nyar filistia moro kuno ka nodok dala nonyiso wuon gi min niya aseneno nyar filistia moro timna nyuomnagouru jonywolne nodwoke niya ango momiyo idwaro kendo nyar jofilistia ok oter nyangugi donge nitie nyako moro kuom nyi oweteni kata kuom jowa samson nowacho ni wuon mare ni nywomnago nikech ahere jonywolne ne ok ongeyo ni ruoth nyasaye ema ne dwaro ni mondo gima kama otimre mondo oyudgo yo mokelogo ni jofilistia masira e ndalogo joisrael ne ni e bwo loch jofilistia chieng moro samson ne lor dhi timna gi jonywolne ka nochopo e puoth mzabibu man kanyo nopo ka nyathi sibuor ochome ka ruto much ruoth nyasaye nolor kuom samson ka diemo wang mi noyiecho sibuor gi lwete mokidho matindotindo mana ka ngama yiecho nyadiel nikech ne en gi lwete nono ne ok onyiso jonywolne gima nosetimono bange nodhi mowuoyo gi nyakono kendo noyudo ni ohere eka bang ndalo moko samson nodok mondo okende kane enie yo odhi kuno nobaro mondo one sibuor mane oyudo osenego cha mi nopo konwango kich mochiek kopoto kuom sibuorno nowuodho pet kich motimo mo mochamo e lwete kodhi nodhi momiyo jonywolne bende ochamo ne ok onyisogi ni ogole kuom sibuor motho wuon samson nodhi dalagi nyako mane samson dwaro kendono mi samson noloso nyasi kuno kaka tim yawuowi nobet e ndalogo kane jofilistia onene ne gikelo yawuowi piero adek mondo obudh kode samson nowachonigi niya agonue ngero moro ka unyalo hulo tiende ka pok ndalo abiriyo mag nyasi orumo namiu kandhe piero adek gi nengni mabeyo bende piero adek ka otamou nyaka umiya gigo ne gidwoke niya gonwa ngerono mondo wawinji mi nowachonigi niya gima ichamo nowuok kuom jacham ji gima mit nowuok kuom ratego ndalo adek nokadho ka pok gihulo tiend ngerono chieng mar angwen ne giwacho ni chi samson niya ho chwori mondo onyisi tiend ngerono nono wabiro wangi e od wuoru ne uluongowa ka mana ni mondo uyakwa koso omiyo chi samson nodhi ir chwore kaywak mowachone niya kara ichaya ok ihera inyalo goyo ni jowa ngero pok inyisa tiende samson nodwoke niya wachno pok anyiso wuora kata mama danyisi wachno nadi nosiko koywakne kuom wachno pilepile nyaka ndalo mag nyasi orumo chieng mar abiriyo mar nyasi samson nonyise tiend ngerono nikech nojoge gi dudo kuom wachno bange nyakono nodhi monyiso jogi omiyo chieng mar abiriyono kane samson dwaro dhi nindo jodala gi nyako nowachone niya en ango dibed mamit moloyo mor kich koso ango dibed ratego moloyo sibuor samson nodwokogi niya ka dinende ok upuro gi nyarocha da ok ufwenyo tiend ngero magoyonu eka much ruoth nyasaye nolor kuom samson gi teko mi nodhi ashkelon nonego ji piero adek kuno mogonyo lepgi eka nokelo lewnigo momiyo joma ne ohulo tiend ngerono bange nodok dala kokecho ahinya chi samson nomi osiep samson mane ochungne kokendo jongad bura bang kinde moko e ndalo kayo ngano samson nokawo nyadiel modhigo limo nyako mane oyudo okendo cha nokwayo jaduongne niya adwaro dhi neno chiega e ot entie jaduonggne nodagi ni ok onyal donjo e odno kowachone niya ne angeyo ni ichaye omiyo asemiye jal mane ochungni nyamin maluwe ber moloye donge dikawe kar jalo samson nodwoke niya sani kata koro atimo ni jofilistia marach aonge gi ketho omiyo nodhi momako bwe mia adek nokawogi ariyo ariyo motueyo iwgi kanyakla eka notueyo meny e iw ariyogo nomoko menygo gi mach mogonyo bwego mondo odhi e puothe jofilistia mag ngano kamano nowango ngano mane oseka kaachiel gi mago mane pok oka puothe mag olembe bende nowang bange jofilistia nopenjore niya en nga motimo kama mi nowachnigi ni samson ema osetimo kamano nikech jaduongne jatimna nosekawo chiege momiyo jal mane ochungne kokendo omiyo jofilistia nodhi mowango dhakono kaachiel gi dalagi kane samson owinjo wachno nowacho niya kara kama e kaka jogi timo asingora ni ok nayue ka pok achulogi kuor nogoyogi arudha monegogi mangeny eka nodhi modak e lwanda morokore man etam samson oloyo jofilistia lehi jofilistia nobiro mojot e piny juda bange ne gimonjo dala moro miluongo ni lehi jojuda nopenjogi niya ango momiyo ubukowa ne gidwokogi niya wasebiro mondo watue samson kendo watimne mana kaka notimonwa kuom mano jojuda alufu adek nolor modhi e lwanda morokore man etam mi giwacho ni samson niya donge ingeyo ni wan e bwo loch jofilistia koro neye masira isekelo kuomwa en nodwokogi niya natimonigi mana kaka ne gitimona ne giwachone niya wasebiro mondo watueyi kendo wachiwi e lwet jofilistia samson nowachonigi niya kuongrenauru ni un uwegi ok ubi nega ne gidwoke ni ooyo wabiro mana tueyi eka bange waketi e lwet jofilistia ok wabi negi kamano ne gitueye gi tonde ariyo manyien mi gigole e lwanda morokoreno kane samson ochopo lehi jofilistia nogoyo koko gi mor kadhi ire much ruoth nyasaye nobiro kuome gi teko mochodo tonde mane oyudo otuego bedene mana ka gima ne gin omimi much mach ogoyo eka noneno chok lemb kanyna pod numu mokwanyo mi onegogo ji alufu achiel bange nower niya nanego ji gana achiel gi chok lemb kanyna mi adhurogii tuche tuche gi chogono bang mano nowito chogono mi nochako kanyo ni ramathlehi tiende ni god chok lemb kanyna koro riyo noloyo samson omiyo noywak ni ruoth nyasaye niya isemiya loch maduongni donge riyo biro nega kendo jofilistia ok ongeyigi biro maka mi nyasaye nobaro kama otimo bugo man lehi mi pi nowuok kanyo samson nomodho pigno mi chunye oduogo mano emomiyo sokono nochak ni enhakore tiende ni soko ngat maywak sokono pod ni kuno nyaka chil kawuono samson nobedo jatelo e israel kuom higni piero ariyo e ndalo mane jofilistia rito pinyno jongad bura samson odhi gaza chieng moro samson nodhi gaza kuma noyudoe nyako moro jachode moterorego jogaza nowinjo ni samson ni kuno ne gilworo kama ne entieno ka gibutone otieno duto e dhoranga dala ne ok gitimone gimoro ka giparo ni gibiro nege ka piny oru samson nonindo aninda nyaka dier otieno eka nochiew modhi omako thike mag ranga dala gi sirni kargi ariyo nopudhogi kaachiel gi lodi mag dhorangach moterogi nyaka ewi got momanyore gi hebron kotingogi e goke samson gi delila bang mano samson nomako osiep gi nyako moro nyinge delila nodak e holo sorek ruodhi mag jofilistia nodhi ir nyakono mowachone niya ho ane samson mondo inge kuma tekone malichno aye kendo inge kaka wanyalo loye mi watueye kendo wamake kitimo kamano ngato ka ngato kuomwa biro miyi fedha alufu achiel gi mia achiel omiyo delila nowacho ni samson niya yie inyisa kuma tekoni malichni aye ka ngato dwaro tueyi mondo omayi teko onyalo timo ango samson nodwoke niya ka otueya gi puye abiriiyo mag atung pok otwo anyalo bedo mana machalre gi ngato angata omiyo ruodhi mag jofilistia nokelo ni delila puye abiriyo pok otwo motueyogo samson noyudo nyakono osepando jomoko e ot moro maiye eka nokok niya samson jofilistia osebiro monji samson nochodo puyego mana ka omimi much mach ogoyo omiyo ne pod ok ongeyo kuma tekone aye delila nowacho ni samson niya aseneno kaka ichal kendo iwuonda koro yie inyisa malongo kaka ditueyi samson nodwoke niya ka itueya gi tonde manyien pok otuechgo anyalo bedo mana machalre gi ngato angata omiyo delila nokawo tonde manyien motueyego eka nokok niya samson jofilistia osebiro monji e sano noyudo ka jomoko osebuto e ot maiye samson nochodo tonde mane otuego bedene mana ka gima gin tond otieng delila nowachone niya pod ichaya achaya kimedo mana wuonda nyisa kaka ngato nyalo tueyi samson nowachone niya kikawo orimba yie wiya abiriyo mi ikado gi usi manie fremb chuecho mondo obed machal gi nanga anyalo bedo machal mana gi ngato angata bange delila nohoye nyaka onindo eka nokawo orimba mag yie wiye abiriyo mi okado motegno gi usi kamano eka nokok niya samson jofilistia osebiro monji samson nochiew oa e nindo moywayo usi kaachiel gi yie wiye mopudhogo frembe chwecho bange delila nochako openje niya ango momiyo iwuonda ni ihera chutho ok ihera koro isewuonda nyadidek pod ok inyisa kuma tekoni aye nodudo ni samson pilepile nyaka samson nojok modwaro mana dere omiyo nohulone adiera konyise niya nyaka ne nywola mirich pok okayo wiya nikech janazir ngat mowal ni nyasaye koliela tekona dirum kendo anyalo bedo mana machalre gi ji mamoko kane delila oneno ni samson osehulone adiera nooro wach ni ruodhi mag jofilistia niya duoguru kendo nikech koro osehulona adiera mi ne gibiro gi pesa e lwetgi delila nohoyo samson mi samson nonindo koteno wiye e chonge eka delila noluongo ngat moroo molielo orimba yie wi samson abiriyo bange delila nochako tueyo samson mane oyudo tekone koro osea eka delila nokok niya samson jofilistia osebiro monji mi samson nochiew ka paro ni obiro guecho kendo wuok kaka pile ne ok ongeyo ni ruoth nyasaye oseweye jofilistia nomake motoko wange oko bange ne gitere gaza mi gitueye kuno gi tarege mag mula kendo ne gikete jareg cham e od tuech mosmos yie wiye nochako twi tho mar samson chieng moro ruodhi mag jofilistia nochokore e sawo maduong mondo otim misango ni dagon nyasachgi ka gigoyone erokamano kuom chiwo jasikgi samson e lwetgi kane ji oneno samson ne gipako nyasachgi ka giwer niya jasikwa moseketho pinywa kendo onego jowa mangeny koro nyasachwa oseketo e lwetwa kane gisemetho mi giromo ne giwacho niya kelnwauru samson mondo obi otugnwa omiyo ne gigole e od tuech motugonigi bange ne gimiyo ochung e kind sirni mag ot samson nowacho ni wuowi mane taye niya yie iketa kama anyalo muloe sirni mag ot mondo ayiengrae noyudo ka chwo gi mon opongo ot kendo ruodhi duto mag jofilistia bende ne ni kanyo kendo chwo gi mon alufu adek ne ni ewi tado giduto ne gingiyo samson katugo samson noywak ni ruoth nyasaye niya ruoth nyasaye nyasacha yie ipara nyasacha para kendo miya teko mana dichiel kende mondo achulgo kuor ni jofilistia kuom toko wengena duto oko eka nomako sirni ariyo madiere mosiro ot mi nonyono piny matek ka lwete korachwich ni kuom siro achiel koracham kuom siro machielo nodhiro sirnigo gi muche duto kokok niya atho gi jofilistiagi mi ot noruombore piny kuom ruodhi gi ji duto mane ni e iye kamano ji mane samson onego kotho ne ngeny moloyo mago mane onego ka pod ongima owetene gi joodgi nobiro moomo ringre ne giyike e liend manoa wuon mare manie kind zora gi eshtaol nosebedo jatelo e israel kuom higni piero ariyo jongad bura mika olamo nyiseche manono ne nitie ngat moro nyinge mika nodak e piny gode mag efraim nowacho ni min mare niya donge iparo pesani alufu achiel gi mia achiel mane okwal kendo kaka niluongo jakuogno ka awinjo gi fedhago ema nakwalogi koro adwokonigi min mare nowachone niya nyasaye mondo oguedhi wuoda mi nodwoko ni min mare fedhago min mare nowachone niya koro wuoda akuongora ni abiro chiwo fedhagi ni ruoth nyasaye mondo olosgo kido mar nyasaye mar bao mobaw gi fedha kamano kuong ok nomaki omiyo kane mika odwoko fedhago ni min mare min mare nokawo fedha mia ariyo kuomgi momiyo jatheth molosonego kido mar bao mobaw gi fedha kido nogo noketi e od mika mikano ne nigi kare owuon mar lemo noloso kido moko manono molosonigi pasia kendo noketo wuode moro mobedo jadolone e kindego piny israel ne onge gi ruoth omiyo ngato ka ngato ne timo mana gima ohero ne nitie wuowi moro jabethlehemjuda nyinge bengershom ne en jalawi jadhood juda noa bethlehem mondo odhi odwar kar dak kane owuotho nopo kochopo e dala mika e piny gode mag efraim mika nopenje ni ia kanye nodwoke niya jalawi moa bethlehemjuda adwaro kar dak mika nowachone niya dag koda mondo ibed jangadna rieko kendo jadolona abiro miyi fedha apar higa ka higa kaachiel gi chiemo kod lewni jalawino noyie dak gi mika mi nobedo kaka wuode mika nokete jadolone mi nodak kode e dalane bange mika nowacho niya koro angeyo ni ruoth nyasaye biro guedha nimar aseyudo jadolo jalawi jongad bura mika kod jadan e kindego piny israel ne pok obedo gi ruoth e ndalogo jodan ne dwaro piny mondo odagie nikech ne pok giyudo lopgi giwegi kaka dhout israel mamoko kuom mano jodan noyiero jolweny abich kuom dhoutgi duto man zora gi eshtaol mi ne giorogi mondo gidhi giwuoth e piny kendo gine kaka piny chalo kamano ji abichgo nochopo e piny gode mag efraim mi gibworo e dala mika kane gin kanyo ne giwinjo ka wuowi jalawi cha wuoyo mi giyango dhoge omiyo ne gipenje niya ngama okeli ka ango mitimo ka nodwokogi niya mika ema oketa ka atiyone ka jadolo kendo ochula ne gikwaye niya penjnwa nyasaye wach ka wuodhwani biro bedo maber jadolono nodwokogi niya dhiuru gi kue ruoth nyasaye ni kodu e wuodhu omiyo ji abichgo nowuok mochako wuodhgi ne giwuotho awuotha mi gipo ka gichopo laish ne gineno ka jokuno odak gi kue mana kaka josidon ne gin ji mamuol man gi kue ok par ni ngato dimonjgi kendo ne gin gi gik moko onge gimoro gichando ne gidak mabor gi josidon kendo ne ok gitimo winjruok moro amora gi joaram kane ji abichgo odok zora gi eshtaol jothurgi nopenjogi wach mane giyudo kuma ne giaye ne gidwokogi niya waseneno piny momew ahinya omiyo wadhiuru wamonj joma odakie kik udeki kayiem nono returu umonj pinyno kendo ukaw nikech nyasaye osekete e lwetwa kudhi kuno unuyud ni en piny malach man gi gik moko duto kendo jopinyno ok par ni ngato dimonjgi kuom mano jodan mia auchiel nowuok zora gi eshtaol koikore ni lweny ne gidhi mi gibworo yo podho chieng mar kiriathjearim e piny juda mano emomiyo kanyo pod iluongo kambijodan ne gia kanyo mi gichopo dala mika e piny gode mag efraim eka ji abich mane osedhi nono piny mokiewo gi laish kande nowacho ni jowetegi mamoko niya bende ungeyo ni nitie kido mopa mag nyiseche manono e udigi koro paruru ane gima onego watim mi ne gibaro e dala mika kuma wuowi jalawi cha nodakie mi gimose e sa nogo jolweny mia auchiel jadan nochung e dhorangach eka ji abichgo nodonjo ei ot mondo okaw nyiseche manonogo jadolo nodong kochung e dhorangach ka wuoyo gi jolweny mia auchiel ka kane jogo osedonjo e od mika mokawo nyisechego jadolo nopenjogi niya ango mutimono ne gidwoke ni ling thi kendo kik iwach gimoro bi kodwa mondo ibed jadolowa kendo jangadnwa rieko ere gima ber moloyo bedo jadolo mar dhood israel ngima koso jadolo mar od ngat achiel kende kane jadolo owinjo wachno nodoko mamor ahinya omiyo nokawo nyisechego modhi gi jogo jodango nowichore moa ka giketo nyithindgi gi jambgi kod gigi nyimgi kane gisedhi mochwalore gi dala mika eka jogweng gi mika noyworo ne gilawo jodan mi gijuko ne gigoyonigi koko jodan nolokore mopenjo mika niya en ango mathagi marango ilawowa gi jogi duto nodwokogi niya usekawo nyisechena mane aloso kaachiel gi jadolona uago kendo koro adong nono eka pod upenja ni en ango thaga jodan nowachone niya kiriek kik iwach gimoro nimar wan ji chunygi lit kendo kapo nono wagore kuomi mano ema dibed thoni kaachiel gi joodi bang mano jodan nodhi nyime gi wuodhgi mika bende kane oneno ni gitek ahinya moloye noa modok dala kamano jogo noa gi jadolo kachiel gi gik mane musa oloso ne gidhi mi gimonjo laish kuma ji nodakie gi kue kendo ok par ni ngato dimonjgi ne ginego joma nodak kuno kendo ne giwango dalagi gi mach jolaish ne onge gi joma dikonygi nikech ne gidak mabor gi sidon bende ne ok gitimo winjruok moro amora gi joaram kata obedo ni laish ne ni e holo man bethrehob kamano jodango nochako ogero dalano manyien mi gidakie ne gichake ni dan nying kwargi wuod israel nying dalano mokwongo ne laish bange jodan nochungo kido manono cha mondo gilam kendo jonathan nyakwar gershom wuod musa kaachiel gi yawuote kod nyikwaye nobedo jodolo mag dhood dan nyaka ndalo mane odarie joisrael moter e tuech kido manono mane mika olosono nosiko kuno ndalo duto mane od nyasaye ni shilo jongad bura jalawi gi chiege moro e ndalo mane piny israel pok obedo gi ruoth jalawi moro nodak mabor e chuny gode mag efraim nokendo nyako moro nyar bethlehemjuda nyakono nodhaw kode moweye kendo odok dalagi bethlehem kane osebet kuno kuom kinde dirom dueche angwen chwore noluwo bange mondo odwoke dala nokawo jatichne gi kenjene ariyo modhigo kane ochopo chiegeno nomose mokele e od wuon mare mi wuon mare norwake gi mor jaduongneno nogenge mi noriyo kuno kuom ndalo adek korite maber chieng mar angwen ne gichiew chon mi giikore mondo gia wuon nyako nowacho ni ore niya rit chiemo icham mondo iyud teko eka bange inyalo omiyo ji ariyogo nobet piny mochiemo kendo ometho eka wuon nyako nowacho ni ore niya yie mondo iri imed nenowa jalawi nochung mondo ochak wuoth kata kamano jaduongne nomedo kwaye mondo ori omiyo noyie monindo kanyo kendo chieng mar abich nochiew gokinyi mondo odhi jaduongne nowachone niya rit mondo igagi mondi kamano ji ariyogo nobet piny mi ochiemo kendo ometho mi gibudho nyaka odhiambo bange ngatno nochung mondo oa gi chiege kod jatichne jaduongne nochako owacho niya ok ine ka sa koro ngeny kendo piny dwaro yuso omiyo ri mondo inewa kendo kiny inyalo chiew gokinyi mondo idog thuru ngatno ne ok dwar riyo kendo omiyo nochung momako wuoth kaachiel gi chiege kod kenjene ne gichopo jebus tinde iluongo ni jerusalem ka piny dwaro yuso mi jatichne nopenje niya ere monowa bworo e dala jojebus ka ruodhe nodwoke niya ok wanyal bworo e dala ok mar joisrael omiyo bi wadhi wabuor gibea kata rama kamano ne giwuotho mi gikadho jebus kendo ne gichopo gibea e piny jobenjamin ka chieng podho ne gibaro mi gidonjo e dalano mondo gibworie ne gibet mana e laru manie dier dala nikech onge ngamaa norwakogi mondo ginind e ode e sano jaduong moro nobiro kanyo koa e puothe ne en ja piny gode mag efraim kata kamano nodak gibea en dala jobenjamin notingo wange moneno ngat jawuothno mi nopenje kuma oaye kendo kuma odhiye ngatno nodwoke niya waa bethlehemjuda wadhi mabor e chuny gode mag efraim kuma adakie nyocha adhi bethlehemjuda koro adok dala kata kamano onge ngama oserwaka mondo abwor e ode wan gi lum kod chiemo moko mag kenjewa bende wan gi chiemo kod divai moromowa kendo onge gimoro mwachando jaduongno nowachone niya ber biuru oda abiro ritou maber kik unind e laru ka kamano nokawogi moterogi e ode kendo nomiyo kenjegi lum welogo nolwoko tiendegi mi gichiemo kendo gimetho eka sa mane gichiemono ne gipo ka jodalano moko acheje obiro molworo ot ka goyo dhoot kendo wacho ni jaduong wuon ot niya golnwa ngat mane obiro kodi cha mondo waterrego jaduongno nodwoko mowacho niya ooyo jowadwa kik utim gima achach marach kamano nikech ngatni wendona neuru nyara pok ongeyo chwo eri kendo chi ngat onogo bende eri weuru agolnugi oko mondo uterru kodgi kendo utim kodgi gimoro amora mudwaro kik utim gima lich kamano ni ngatni jogoo nodagi winje omiyo jalawino nogolo chiege oko momiyogi ne ginindo kode gi thwon ka gidwanye nyaka kogwen eka ne giweye odhi dhakono nodwogo ka piny yawore mopodho e dhood ngat cha kama chwore ne nitie kendo noriere kanyo nyaka piny oru chwore nochiew gokinyi kendo kane oyawo dhoot mondo ochak wuodhe noyudo ka chiege oriere e nyim dhoot nowachone niya chungi mondo wadhi ne ok odwoke omiyo nokawo ringre chiege moriwo e kanje kendo nochako wuoth kane ochopo dala nokawo pala mopogo ringre chiegeno migepe apar gariyo mi noorogi e piny israel duto nowacho ni joma nooro ni mondo openj joisrael duto kama bende gima kama osetimoree kata oseneye chakre ndalo mane joisrael owuokie misri nyaka chil kawuono paruru wachni kendo uchiw parou kamano ngato ka ngato nonenogi nowacho niya gima chal kama pok otimore kata pok one nyaka nene jongad bura joisrael okedo gi jobenjamin joisrael duto chakre dan nyaka beersheba kaachiel gi gilead noyworo ni lweny mochokore mizpa e nyim ruoth nyasaye maonge ngat modong dhout israel duto kaachiel gi jodonggi nobiro e chokruok maduong mar jonyasayeno ka gin jolweny alufu mia angwen mi jobenjamin nowinjo ni joisarel osedhi mizpa joisrael nopenjo niya ere kaka gima rach machalo kama notimore jalawi mane oneg chiege cha nodwoko niya noyudo wan e wuoth gi chiega mi ne wabuoro gibea e piny benjamin jodalano nobiro mondo omonja gotienono mi gilworo ot mane antie ka gidwaro nega eka ne ginindo gi chiega gi thwon motho bange nakawo ringre mi apogo kidienje kidienje kendo naoro sidienjego e piny israel duto nikech jogo osetimo tim mochido kendo makuero e israel koro en wachu un joisrael mondo upar ane gima onego utim mi ji duto nochung rat mowacho niya onge kata ngato achiel kuomwa biro dok e hembe kata ode e gima nyaka watim wabiro yiero jomoko gi ombulu mondo omonj gibea achiel kuom apar mar joisrael duto biro choko chiemo kuom ji ni joma kedo jomoko duto modong biro dhi chulo kuor ni jogibea kuom tim marach kendo makuero gisetimo e israel kamano joisrael nowuok gi chuny achiel mondo omonj dalano dhout israel nooro joote e piny jobenjamin ka giwacho niya mano tim marach manade musetimo miwauru joma acheje man gibeago mondo waneg kamano wabiro pwodho israel kuom tim marachno jobenjamin notamore winjo wach joisrael wetegi ne giwuok e miechgi duto mi gibiro gibea mondo giked gi joisarel chiengno jolweny alufu piero ariyo gauchiel moa e miech benjamin noyworo ni lweny bende ne nitie jogibea mia abiriyo moyier joorujre rachembe kendo josaba nyalo goyo kata mana yie wich ok obayo jolwenj israel marateke jabenjamin okend nyare koro ne gibiro bethel mi gibet kanyo e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyaka odhiambo ka giywak matek ne gipenjo ruoth nyasaye niya ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel ango motimore e israel momiyo israel achiel lal kama kinyne gokinyi ji nochiew chon mogero kendomarmisango kanyo mi gitimoe misengni miwango pep kod misengnii mag sawo ne gipenjore kendgii ka nitie jomoko kuom dhout israel mane ok obiro e chokruok mar ruoth nyasaye nikech ne gisekuongore matek ni nyaka neg ngato angata mane ok obiro mizpa e nyim ruoth nyasaye ne gikuyo ka giparo owetegi jobenjamin mi giwacho niya kawuono dhood israel achiel oselal ere gima dwatim mondo wayud mon ni jo dhoodno modong nikech ne wakuongore e nyim nyasaye ni ok wayie mondo gikend nyiwa mano emomiyo ne gipenjore ka nitie jomoko kuom dhout israel mane ok obiro mizpa e nyim ruoth nyasaye nobedo ni onge jajabeshgilead mane obiro e chokruokno omiyo kane okwan ji ne oyud ni onge jajabeshgilead kata achiel kanyo omiyo joisrael nooro jogi jochir nyi jabeshgilead mia angwen pok ongeyo chwo mi gikelogi e kambi man shilo e piny kanaan bange joisrael duto nooro joote mondo odhi ir jobenjamin mane ni e bur lwanda man rimon mondo olos kodgi ochopo elkana gi joode duto nodhi timo ni ruoth nyasaye misango mar higa ka higa kendo chopo singruokne hana ne ok odhi nowacho ni chwore niya ok nadhi nyaka nyathi dhoth eka natere e nyim ruoth nyasaye mi nosik kuno elkana chwore nokone niya tim gima ineno ni ber rit nyaka nyathi dhoth ruoth nyasaye mondo one ni ichopo singruokni kamano hana nodong kadhodho nyathine nyaka dhoth kane nyathi oseweyo dhoth nodhi kode shilo gi rwath hike adek gi mogo dirom depe ariyo gi divai e ndede mar pien modonjo e od ruoth nyasaye ne ginego rwadhno eka hana nokelo nyathi ir eli mowacho niya jaduong e dhako mane ochung kalamo ruoth nyasaye cha ne akwaye nyathini kendo koro osemiyago kaka nakwaye emomiyo bende achiwe ni ruoth nyasaye mondo obed jatichne ndalo duto mag ngimane samuel wend hana luka miye loch joma piem gi ruoth nyasaye notur matindotindo komiyo polo mor kuomgi ruoth nyasaye ngado bura e tung piny gi tung piny enomi ruoth moyiero duong kendo nomede teko bang mano nodok rama nyathi nodong katiyo ni ruoth nyasaye e nyim eli jadolo okor wach kuom dhood eli yawuot eli ne joma acheje ok dew ruoth nyasaye e ndalogo gima jodolo ne timo ni jolemo ne chalo kama kane ngat moro timo misango jatich jadolo ne biro gi uma lekene adek ka pod itedo ringo nonyumo umano e gima itedoe kaka agulu kata kabange kata nyalaro ringo duto mane lak uma omako ema ne jadolo kawo kamano e kaka ne gitimo ni joisrael duto nobiro shilo bende kane pok owang bor e kendomarmisango jatich jadolo ne biro kawacho ni ngat matimo misango niya chiw ringo mondo obul ni jadolo nikech ok odwar ringo motedi odwaro mana manumu kapo ni ngatno odwoke niya mondo okwong owang bor eka ikaw gima ihero jatich ne wacho ni ngang miyago mana sani ka ok itimo kamano abiro kawo gi thwon ketho mag yawuowigo ne dongo ahinya e nyim ruoth nyasaye nikech ne gichayo gima ochiw ni ruoth nyasaye samuel ne tiyo e nyim ruoth nyasaye ka pod en nyathi korwakore gi nanga mar katana higa ka higa min mare ne twangone law matin kendo kelone kobiro gi chwore mondo otim misango mar higa eli ne guedho elkana gi chiege kowacho niya ruoth nyasaye mondo omiyi nyithindo gi dhani kar mano misechiwone kane oseguedhogi kamano ne gidok thurgi ruoth nyasaye noparo hana mi nonywolo yawuowi adek gi nyiri ariyo nyathi samuel nodongo e nyim ruoth nyasaye eli koro noti ahinya nowinjo gik mane yawuote timo ni joisrael duto kendo kaka ne giterore gi mon matiyo e dho hemb romo omiyo nowachonigi niya mar ango utimo gik kamagi asewinjo wach timbeu maricho e dho ji duto ooyo yawuota wach masewinjo ka joruoth nyasaye wacho kuomu ok en wach maber ka ngato oketho ni wadgi nyasaye nobedne jathek ka ngato oketho ni ruoth nyasaye ere ngama nokonye ne gidagi winjo dwond wuongi nimar ruothn nyasaye nosengado ni mondo githo luka nyathi samuel nodongo kendo ruoth nyasaye gi ji nomedo bedo mamor kode ngat nyasaye moro nobiro ir eli monyise niya ruoth nyasaye owacho kama nafwenyora ni kwaru kane en gi joode misri e tuech e od farao wuok tlawi ne ayiere kuom dhout israel duto mondo obed jadolona kendo odhi e kendonamarmisango otim misengni kendo orwakre gi law dolo miluongo ni efod e nyima namiyo dhoodu misengni duto miwango joisarel chiwo ango momiyo koro uchayo misengni maga gi mich masechiko imiyo yawuoti duong moloyo awuon kiweyo gichamo lemo mabeyo mag mich joga israel kelo mi gidoko machwe nasingora ni dhoodu ni ginitina nyaka chieng koro awacho ni ok nobed kamano ngang nimar joma miya duong ema nami duong jogo mochaya ok nokwan ka gimoro ndalo biro anangadie tekoni oko gi teko mar dhoodu bende nyaka chieng eka e chandruokni inine mwandu duto nyasaye omiyo joisarel kendo inigombi onge ngat noru e dhoodi nyaka chieng anatiek jogi duto matiyo e kendonamarmisango mak mana jadhoodi achiel ema nodong kaywak kendo ka chunye chandore thoth jogi nonegi sam gima notimre ni yawuoti ariyo hofni gi finehas nobedni ranyisi ginitho giduto chieng achiel mi anaket jadolona awuon ngat jaadiera notim duto manie chunya gi parona anagur dhoode mondo nyikwaye oti nyaka chieng ni ruoth mayiero mowir jodhoodi duto nodong ka ngima nobi ire kakwaye fedha matin kata kuon matin giniwach niya asayi keta e tich kama jadolo moro tiyoe mondo ayudie gima dacham samuel ruoth nasaye oluongo samuel nyathi samuel ne tiyo ni ruoth nyasaye e nyim eli weche mane wuok kuom ruoth nyasaye ne nok ndalogo kendo ne ok fwenyre pile ndalogo wang eli nosechako imore ok onyal neno maber chieng moro eli ne nindo kare mar nindo samuel bende nosenindo e hekalu mar ruoth nyasaye kama sanduk mar nyasaye ne nitie kane taya mar nyasaye pok otho ruoth nyasaye noluongo samuel mi samuel nodwoko ni antie eka noringo odhi ir eli mowachone niya iluonga era e eli nowachone niya ok aluongi dog inindi mi nodok monindo ruoth nyasaye noluonge kendo niya samuel mi samuel nochung kendo odhi ir eli mowachone ni era e nikech iluonga nodwoke ni ooyo wuoda ok aluongi dog inindi noyudo ka samuel pok ongeyo ruoth nyasaye kendo wach ruoth nyasaye ne pok ofwenyorene omiyo kane ruoth nyasaye oluongo samuel kendo luong mar adek nochung kendo odhi ir eli mowachone niya era e nikech iluonga eli nofwenyo ni kara ruoth nyasaye ema luongo nyathino omiyo nowacho ni samuel niya dhiyo inindi koluongi kendo iwach niya wachi ruoth nyasaye jatichni winjo samuel nodok monindo eka ruoth nyasaye nobiro mochung kanyo kendo oluongo samuel kaka noseluonge mokwongo niya samuel samuel eka samuel nodwoko ni wachi jatichni winjo mii ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni samuel niya abiro timo gimoro e israel ngato angata mowinjo ite nopopni e ndalono anachop weche duto te mane awacho kuom eli gi dhoode nyaka iwachne ni abiro ngado ni dhoode bura mosiko nikech nongeyo ni yawuote yanyo nyasaye ne ok okwerogi emomiyo akuongora ni dhood eli ni misango kata chiwo ok wach ango ruoth nyasaye onyisi asayi kik ipandago nyasaye mondo okwedi kipanda wach moro kuom weche duto nowachoni mi samuel nonyise duto te ok opande kata wach achiel eli nowacho niya ruoth nyasaye mondo obed janabi mar ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye nomedo fwenyore shilo nikech kanyo ema nosefwenyoree ni samuel kamano wach samuel nobedo gi teko e piny israel duto samuel jofilistia omako sandug muma e ndalogo jofilistia nochokore mondo omonj joisrael kendo joisrael nowuok mondo oked kodgi joisrael nojot ebenezer jofilistia nojot afek jofilistia noyaro nii lweny momanyore gi joisrael kendo kane girado jofilistia noloyo joisrael mi ginego jogi dirom alufu angwen e paw lweny kane jolweny oduogo e kambi jodong israel nopenjore niya marango ruoth nyasaye omiyo jofilistia oloyowa kawuono wadhiuru shilo waom sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye wabedgo mondo oreswa e lwet wasikwa wuok omiyo ne gioro wach shilo mi gikelo sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto en nyasaye mobet ewi kerubi hofni gi finehas yawuot eli ema nobiro gi sandug muma kane sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye obiro e kambi joisrael duto nokok matek piny omor kane jofilistia owinjo kokono ne gipenjore niya mano koko manade matimore e kambi johibraniano kane giwinjo ni sanduk mar ruoth nyasaye osechopo e kambi ne gidoko maluor mi giwacho niya nyisechegi osebiro e kambigi bende ne giwacho niya yaye nyaka nene gima kama pok notimore yaye ngano noreswa e lwet nyiseche maratekegi gin nyiseche nosando jomisri gi masiche mayoreyore e thim jiwreuru ubed ka chwo un jofilistia mondo kik ubed ka wasumb johibrania kaka gisebedonu beduru ka chwo kendo keduru jofilistia nokedo gi joisrael mi giloyo kendo joisrael duto noringo odok e miechgi ne ologi marach kendo jogi dirom alufu adek notho sanduk mar nyasaye nokaw kendo hofni gi finehas yawuot eli bende nonegi jabenjamin moro noringo oa e lweny mobiro shilo chiengonogo koyiecho lepe kendo obuko wiye buru e sa nochopoe eli noyudo obet e kom e dir yo kangicho nikech chunye ne ridore koparo sanduk mar nyasaye kane jalo odonjo e dala monyiso ji wach dala duto noywak eli nowinjo ywak mopenjo ni mano koko manade ngatno nodhi ire kareto monyise wach joisrael oringo jofilistia kendo oseneggi gi nek malich hofni gi finehas yawuoti bende josetho kendo sanduk mar nyasaye osekaw kane eli owinjo wach sanduk mar nyasaye nogore piny ataro koa e kom nobetie rangach mi ngute notur motho nikech ne en jaduong moti kendo nopek nosebedo jangad bura ni joisrael kuom higni piero angwen noyudo ka chi finehas wuod eli nigi ich mogik nywol kane owinjo ni sanduk mar nyasaye osekaw kendo kwar mare kod chwore josetho nopo ka muoch kaye mi nobet piny monywol nohewore ahinya modwaro tho mi mon mane chole nokone niya kik iluor isenywolo wuowi ne ok odwoko wach kata dewo ne ok odewo nochako nyathi ni ikabod tiende ni maonge duong kowacho niya duong osea kuom israel nowacho kamano nikech sanduk mar nyasaye nosekaw kendo kwar mare gi chwore ne josetho gidwoke kare kinyne gokinyi mar ariyo kane gibiro ne ginwango ni dagon ochako opodho piny auma e nyim sanduk mar ruoth nyasaye mi wiye gi luetene ochot molwar e paw dhoot kor dagon kende ema nodong kaachiel gi ruodhi mau emomiyo mondo ulos gik maket gi buche mane okuodou kendo ulos gik maket gi oyieyo kethonu piny kumiyogo nyasach israel duong mi dipo koweyo sandou kaachiel gi nyisecheu kod uweye odhi adhiya kungiye kapo ni ochiko yo madhi thurgi nyaka bethshemesh wanange ni kara ruoth nyasaye ema osekelonwa masirani ka ok oluwo yorno eka wanange ni ok en ema osandowa en gimoro mobironwa abira jogo notimo kamano ne gikawo duesni ariyo madhodho mi gitueyo e gari nyiroye ne giloronigi e kul ne giyieyo sanduk mar ruoth nyasaye e gari kaachiel gi sanduk moketie oyieyo mag dhahabu kod gik maket gi buchegi dhogo nochiko nyimgi tir e yo madhi bethshemesh ka giluwo yo maduong ne giywak ka gidhi ne ok gibaro korachwich kata koracham ruodhi mag jofilistia noluwogi nyaka tong bethshemesh noyudo jobethshemesh kayo ngano e holo kendo kane gitingo wanggi mi gineno sanduk ne gidoko mamor gari nodonjo mochung e puoth joshua jabethshemesh kidi moro mangongo ne gibaro yiend gari kendo ne ni ruoth nyasaye misengni miwango pep kod misengni mamoko kane ruodhi abich mag jofilistia oseneno gima otimore ne gidok ekron mana chiengono buche molos gi dhahabu mane jofilistia ochiwo ni ruoth misango miwango pep eka nokwayo ruoth nyasaye mondo ore joisrael mi ruoth nyasaye nowinjo kwayone modwoke kane pod samuel timo misango jofilistia nokayo ni joisrael mondo oked kodgi ruoth nyasaye nomiyo polo omor matek kuom jofilistia mokeyogi mi joisrael noloyogi joisrael nowuok mizpa molawo jofilistia ka ginegogi nyaka gikadho bethkar samuel nokawo kidi mochungo kanyo e kind mizpa gi jeshana e ndalo duto mag samuel mier mane jofilistia okawo e lweny noduogo ni joisarel kendo joisrael noreso gwenge duto manie kind ekron gi gath e lwet jofilistia bende kue nobedo e kind joisrael gi joamor samuel nobedo jangad bura ni joisrael ndalo duto mag ngimane higa ka higa nolworore bethel gi gilgal gi mizpa kongado buche joisrael kuondego duto bange nodoknga rama kuma dalane ne nitie kuno bende nongadoe buche joisrael kendo nogeroe kendomarmisango ni ruoth nyasaye samuel joisrael okwayo mondo omigi ruoth kane samuel oseti noketo yawuote mondo obed jongad bura e israel nying wuode makayo ne joel jalupne ne abija ne gin jongad bura beersheba yawuotego ne ok oluwo timbene ne giketho bura ka gibaro kuom dwaro mwandu malang kendo kuom chamo asoya kuom mano jodong israel duto nochokore
