ne giwirogi gi gik mangue ngar kanyo eka ne gikawo chokegi mi giyiko e tiend yath moro man jabesh kendo ne gitueyo chiemo ndalo abiriyo samuel daudi owinjo wach tho saulo kane daudi oseduogo koa nego joamalek nonindo ziklag ndalo ariyo chieng mar adek ka saulo osetho ngat moro nobiro moa e lweny koyiecho lepe kendo obuko wiye buru kane ochopo ir daudi nokulore piny komiye duong daudi nopenje niya ia kanye nodwoko ni nyocha apondo aa e kambi lweny mar joisrael daudi nomedo penje niya ango motimore kuno wachna nodwoke ni joisrael oseringo oa e lweny thothgi osetho saulo gi jonathan wuode bende josetho eka daudi nomedo penje kendo niya ere kaka ingeyo gi saulo gi jonathan wuode josetho sam wnda wuowino nowacho niya noyudo e got gilboa kendo naneno saulo kosirore gi tonge geche lweny gi joidh farese lwore machiegni kane ogoyo machiemo nonena moluonga nadwoke ni era e eka nopenja ni nga nadwoke ni jaamalek eka nowachona niya bi ka inega nikech gi rem malit pod angima omiyo nasudo bute manege nikech nangeyo ni ok onyal bedo mangima kosehinyore kamano bange nakawo osimbo mane ni e wiye kod ronge mane ni e bade kendo ekigi kane daudi owinjo wachno noyiecho lepe owuon kendo ji duto mane ni kode bende notimo kamano ne gisedo ka giywago saulo gi jonathan wuode kod joruoth nyasaye tiende ni joisrael bende ne gitueyo chiemo nyaka piny oyuso ka giparo joma otho e lwenygo daudi nopenjo wuowi nokelone wachno niya jakanye nodwoke niya wuod jaamalek jadak daudi nowachone ni marango ne ok iluoro tero lweti kuom ruoth mowir ruoth nyasaye oyiero eka noluongo wuowi moro kuom joge mowachone niya bi inege mi jalo nogoyo ngatno motho daudi nowacho niya rembi obed e wiyi nimar dhogi iwuon ema ongadoni bura kiwacho ni isenego ruoth mowir ruoth nyasaye oyiero daudi oywago saulo gi jonathan daudi nochwogo wend ywak ni saulo gi jonathan wuode josh nochiko ni mondo jojuda opuonjre wendno kendo ondike e kitap jasher kama israel jou madongo osenegi e godeu yaye joma rateke osepodho kik ihul wachni e gath kik igo milome mare e wangyore mag ashkelon dipo ka mond filistia obedo mamor ee dipo ka nyi joma kia nyasayego obedo moil un gode mag gilboa kik tho mok kuomu un puothe mag kuoyo kik koth chue kuomu nikech kuondegoo ema kuodi mag joma rateke odongie ka kethore kaachiel gii kuod saulo koro ok owir gi mo atung jonathan ne ok duog nono mak ochuero remo kata mak ongolo boche mag joma rateke ligangla saulo bende ne ok duog nono saulo gi jonathan ne joma oher kendo joma beyo ne ok gipogore e ngimagi kata e thogi e nguech ne giyot kongo ne gin rateke moloyo sibuor un nyi israel ywaguru saulo en ema norwakou gi lewni makwar kendo mabeyo kendo en ema noketonu dhahabu e lepu yaye mano kaka joma rateke osepodho e lweny oneg jonathan e lweny mager jonathan chunya lit nikech itho ne ageni ahinya kendo gen nigenago ne lich miwuoro ne okadho hera mon herogo chwogi yaye joma rateke osetho kendo gigi mag lweny olal nono samuel oket daudi ruoth juda bang wechegi daudi nopenjo ruoth nyasaye wach niya dadhi e dala moro mar juda koso ruoth nyasaye nodwoke ni dhiyo daudi nomedo penjo niya ere dala dadhiye mi nodwoke ni hebron sam omiyo daudi nodhi kuno gi monde ariyo ahinoam nyar jazreel kod abigail chi nabal jakarmel nodhi gi joge duto ngato ka ngato gi joode mi ne gidak hebron sam jojuda nobiro mowiro daudi gi mo ka gikete ruodh dhood juda kane onyis daudi ni jojabeshgilead ema noyiko saulo nooro joote irgi kowachonigi niya ruoth nyasaye mondo oguedhu nikech nutimo ngwono ni saulo ruodhu kuom yike koro ruoth nyasaye mondo otimnu ngwono gi adiera bende natimnu maber kuom timo kamano emomiyo koro beduru joma otegno kendo jochir nikech saulo ruodhu osetho kendo dhood juda osewira abed ruodhgi daudi okedo gi josaulo noyudo ka abner wuod ner jatend jolweny mag saulo osekawo ishbosheth wuod saulo motero mahanaim loka jordan nokete ruodh gilead gi asher gi jezreel gi efraim gi benjamin kendo ruodh joisrael duto ishbosheth ne jahigni piero angwen kane ochako bedo ruodh joisrael mi nobedo ruoth kuom higni ariyo dhood juda ne luwo daudi kendo daudi nobedo ruoth kuom higni abiriyo gi dueche auchiel kodak hebron abner wuod ner kod joma ne luwo ishbosheth wuod saulo nowuok mahanaim modhi gibeon joab wuod zeruya kaachiel gi joma ne luwo daudi bende nowuok hebron mi ogendini ariyogi noromo e yawo man gibeon jodaudi nobet e bath yawo konchiel joishbosheth nobet e bath yawo komachielo eka abner nowacho ni joab niya yawuowi oa malo mondo otemre e nyimwa joab nodwoke ni ara gitim kamano omiyo ne gia malo moyier ji apar gariyo kor ishbosheth wuod saulo gi jobenjamin kendo ji apar gariyo kor daudi eka ne girakore mi ngato ka ngato omako wi jasike kohobo ngetne gi ligangla mine giruombore piny rat giduto omiyo kanyo nochak ni helkethhazurim tiende ni paw lak ligangla pawno nie gweng gibeon negruokno nokelo lweny mager chiengono kendo jodaudi noloyo abner gi joisrael yawuot zeruya adek duto ne ni kanyo ne gin joab gi abishai kod asahel asahel mane tiende yot ka mwanda nolawo abner ka ok ongi korachwich kata koracham nyaka abner nogoyo machiemo mopenje niya asahel mano asahel nodwoke niya ee abner nowachone niya bar korachwich kata koracham mondo imak jalweny moro ipe gige asahel notamore weyo lawe mi abner nowachone kendo ni bar mondo iwe lawa dipo ka agoyi manegi katimo kamano ere kaka dachung e nyim joab owadu kata kamano asahel notamore baro omiyo abner nochwowo bund iye gi kapier tong mopowo nyaka ka ngeye nogore piny motho gikanyo kane ji duto ochopo kama asahel othoe ne gichung joab gi abishai nodhi nyime ka lawo abner nyaka chieng opodho mano noyudo ka gin e got ama kama omanyore gi gia e yo madhi e thim gibea jobenjamin nochokore bang abner kendo ne giriedo ni lweny ka gichung ewi got moro abner nokok ni joab kawacho niya ji biro negore nyaka chieng koso donge ingeyo ni giko wachni biro bedo marach moloyo nyaka karango ibiro siko kikwero jogi mondo owe lawo jowetegi joab nodwoke niya gi nying ruoth nyasaye ka da ok iwuoyo da ok giweyo lawo jowetegi nyaka piny oru eka joab nogoyo tung kendo ji duto nochung ne giweyo lawo joisrael kendo kedo kodgi gotienono duto abner gi joge nowuotho e holo mar aora jordan ne gingado aora jordan kendo ne gichopo mahanaim kar odiechieng kane joab oduogo koa lawo abner nochoko joge duto kanyakla monwango ni jodaudi apar gochiko osetho ka ok okwan asahel jodaudi nosenego ji mia adek kod piero auchiel kuom jobenjamin mane luwo abner ne gitingo ringre asahel mi giyiko e liend wuon mare bethlehem bange joab kod joge nowuotho gotienono thole mochopo hebron ka piny ru samuel lweny nodhi nyime e kind dhood saulo gi dhood daudi kuom ndalo momedore daudi nomedo locho dhood saulo nomedo dok chien yawuot daudi mane onywol hebron weche mag ndalo yawuot daudi mane onywolo hebron e magi wuode makayo ne amon min mare ne ahinoam nyar jezreel mar ariyo ne kileab min mare ne abigail chi nabal jakarmel mar adek ne absalom min mare ne maaka nyar talmai ruodh geshur mar angwen ne adonija min mare ne hagith mar abich ne shefetia min mare ne abital mar auchiel ne ithream mane wuod chiege nyinge elga jogi duto daudi nonywolo hebron abner ochano timo winjruok gi daudi kane pod lweny dhi nyime e kind dhood saulo gi dhood daudi abner nomedo yudo duong e dhood saulo ne nitie chi saulo moro nyinge rizpa nyar aya nomiyo ishbosheth openjo abner niya marango isedonjo e doho wuora mitero chiege abner nokecho ahinya nikech wachno mi nodwoko ishbosheth niya ikawa ka guo juda koso kinde duto asebedo jaadiera ni dhood saulo wuoru gi owetene kod osiepene ka ok achiwi e lwet daudi koro eka ichwanya kuom wach dhako sam nyasaye mondo okweda ka ok atimo ni daudi kaka ruoth nyasaye nosingorene ni enogol loch kuom dhood saulo kendo noket daudi obed ruodh joisrael gi jojuda chakre dan nyaka beersheba ishbosheth ne ok nyal dwoko abner kata wach achiel nikech noluore abner nooro joote hebron ir daudi kowachone niya tim koda winjruok mi nakonyi loko joisrael duto mondo oduog iri daudi nodwoke niya ber ayie timo kodi winjruok mak mana kikelo mikal nyar saulo chieng mibiro nena sam bende daudi nooro joote ir ishbosheth wuod saulo kowacho niya dwokna mikal chiega nanywomo gi ringre jofilistia mia achiel mi ishbosheth nooro joote mogolo mikal kuom chwore paltiel wuod laish chworeno nokowe nyaka bahurim ka ywak abner nowachone ni dogi mi nodok abner nowuoyo gi jodong israel kowachonigi niya kuom ndalo mokadho usedwaro mondo daudi obed ruodhu koro keteuru nikech ruoth nyasaye osesingore kuome ka wacho niya gi lwet daudi anares joga israel e lwet jofilistia kendo e lwet wasikgi duto abner nowuoyo gi jobenjamin bende eka nodhi hebron mondo onyis daudi gik moko duto mane joisrael gi jobenjamin dwaro timo abner nobiro hebron ir daudi kaachiel gi ji piero ariyo mi daudi norwakogi gi chiemo bange abner nowacho ni daudi niya ruoth koro adok loko joisrael duto odogni mondo gitim kodi singruok kendo mondo ibed ruodh pinywa duto kaka chunyi dwaro omiyo daudi nogoyo ni abner oriti modhi gi kue joab ogeno abner joab gi jodaudi noyudo duogo mana sano ne gia peyo ka gikelo gik mangeny mane giyako abner ne koro osea ir daudi hebron nikech daudi nosemiye thuolo modhi gi kue kane joab gi jolweny mane ni kode ochopo hebron nonyise niya abner wuod ner nobiro ir ruoth mi ruoth oweye odhi gi kue abner nodhi ir ruoth mopenje niya en ango misetimo awinjo ni abner nobiro iri marango imiye thuolo mondo odhi momiyo koro otony donge ingeyo ni abner wuod ner nobiro mana ni mondo owuondi kendo onge wuodheni kod gik mitimo duto kane joab osea ir daudi nooro joote mondo olaw abner ne gijuke e soko mar sira mi giduoge daudi ne kia wachno kane abner oduogo hebron joab nobaro kode rangach ka gima odwaro wuoyo kode lingling mi nochwowo bund iye monege kochulo kuor nikech remb asahel owadgi kane daudi owinjo wachno nowacho niya kod joga waonge bura e nyim ruoth nyasaye kuom tho abner wuod ner nyaka chieng rembe mondo obed ewi joab kendo kuom dhoode duto e dhood joab nyaka bedie ngama rembe chuer kata ngama jadhoho kata ngat modere kata ngama ochando chiemo kamano e kaka joab gi abishai owadgi nonego abner nikech en ema nonego asahel owadgi joab gi abishai e lweny gibeon daudi nowacho ni joab gi ji duto mane ni kode niya yiechuru lepu urwakru gi piende gugru kendo uywag abner daudi owuon nodhi e liel ka luwo bang abner ne giyiko abner hebron kendo ruoth noywak gi mirima e liende mi ji duto bende noywak kode ruoth noywago abner kawacho niya yaye abner bende owinjore itho kaka ngama ofuwo adier lweti ne ok otue kata tiendi ne ok omaki gi ratege nitho mana kaka ngato tho e lwet joma richo bange ji duto nomedo ywage ne gihoyo daudi mondo ochiem piny ne pod odiechieng omiyo daudi nokuongore kawacho niya nyasaye mondo okweda kapo ni achiemo kata abilo gimoro ka pok chieng opodho wachno ne longo ni ji duto nowinjo mana kaka gik moko duto mane ruoth timo ne longonigi kamano ji duto nongeyo chiengno ni kara ruoth ne kiya wach nek abner wuod ner ruoth nowacho ni joge niya donge ungeyo ni jalweny maduong e israel ema otho kawuono kata obedo ni ruoth kamano yawuot zeruyagi otamo wanga ruoth nyasaye ema mondo ochul kuor ni ngama rach moromo gi rach mosetimo samuel nek mar ishbosheth kane ishbosheth wuod saulo owinjo ni oseneg abner ka ni hebron chunye noa kendo joisrael duto nobwok ishbosheth ne nigi jotend mony ariyo achiel ne nyinge baana machielo rekab ne gin yawuot rimon jabeeroth jabenjamin nimar jobeeroth noseringo modhi gitaim mi gibedo jodak kuno nyaka chil kawuono sam jonathan wuod saulo ne nigi wuode moro mane tiende ongol ne en jahigni abich kane wach tho saulo gi jonathan okel oa jezreel mi japite notinge moringo kode kane oyudo japidino reto mondo otony nyathi nogore piny mohinyore kendo nodoko rangol nyinge ne mefibosheth rekab kod baana yawuot rimon jabeeroth nodhi mochopo e od ishbosheth godiechieng ka piny oore mi giyudo koyueyo chieng makech dhako jarit dhoot noyudo obet ka piedho ngano nochako nur nyaka nindo otere mi rekab gi baana owadgi nolidho modonjo e ot kane gichopo e ot mane ishbosheth nindoe ne gigoye motho kendo gingado wiye oko ne gikawo wiye mi giwuothogo otieno tulu ka giluwo yo madhi e holo mar aora jordan ne gikelo wi ishbosheth hebron ni daudi mi giwachone niya ruoth wakeloni wi ishbosheth wuod saulo jasiki mane dwaro negi tinendeni ruoth nyasaye osechuloni kuor kuom saulo kendo kuom kothe daudi nodwoko rekab gi baana owadgi niya gi nying ruoth nyasaye mosereso ngimana e masiche duto sam kane ngat moro obiro ziklag mokona ni saulo osetho koparo ni okelona wach maber namake manege mano e pok namiye kuom wach nokelo koro nadi ka joma richo osenego ngat makare e ode owuon kendo mana e kitandane donge owinjore achulnu kuor kuom remo musechuero mondo ua e piny mi daudi nogolo chik kendo joge nonego jogo ne gingado luetegi kod tiendegi oko mi giliero e yath yawo man hebron wi ishbosheth ne gikawo mi giyiko hebron e liend abner samuel oket daudi ruodh israel weche mag ndalo dhout israel duto nobiro hebron ir daudi mi giwachone niya nge ni wan mana remo achiel kodi e ndalo ruodhwa mokadho kane saulo pod ruodhwa ema nitelo ni joisrael e lwenjegi duto kendo ruoth nyasaye nowachoni niya inibed jakwadh joga israel kendo ema nibed ruodhgi jodong israel duto nobiro hebron ir daudi kendo ne gitimo kode singruok kuno e nyim ruoth nyasaye mi giwire gi mo mondo obed ruodh joisrael ruo wnda daudi ne jahigni piero adek ka nochako tich ruoth kendo nobedo ruoth kuom higni piero angwen nobedo ruodh jojuda kuom higni abiriyo kodak hebron kendo nobedo ruodh joisrael duto kaachiel gi jojuda kuom higni piero adek gadek kodak jerusalem daudi okawo dala mar sayun weche mag ndalo josh bura ruoth daudi nodhi jerusalem gi joge mondo oked gi jojebus weg pinyno jojebusgo ne paro ni daudi ok nyal donjo e dalagi omiyo ne giwachone niya ok nidonj ka nikech kata mana muofni gi rangonde oromo gengou kata kamano daudi nokawo sayun dala mochiel gi ohinga tinde iluongo ni dala daudi chiengno daudi nowacho niya ngama dwaro loyo jojebus mondo oidh gi aora motucho got kendo oneg rangonde gi muofni chunya osingo kande mano emomiyo iwacho ni muofni gi rangonde kik donj e hekalu bange daudi nodak e dala mochiel gi ohingano mi noluonge ni dala daudi nomedo gero udi moluore chakre ohinga mar milo ka dok ka iye duong mar daudi koro nomedore ahinya nikech ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ne ni kode hiram oyie gi loch daudi weche mag ndalo hiram ruodh turo nooro joote ir daudi gi yiend sida kaachiel gi jopa bao kod jogedo mag kite mi jogo nogero ni daudi ot koro daudi nongeyo ni ruoth nyasaye osekete ruodh israel kendo osetego lochne ahinya mondo oguedhgo joge israel yawuot daudi mane onywol jerusalem weche mag ndalo kane daudi osea hebron modhi odak jerusalem nomedo mon moko nonywologo yawuowi gi nyiri nying yawuote nonywolo jerusalem e magi shamua gi shobab gi nathan gi solomon gi ibhar gi elishua gi nefeg gi jafia gi elishama gi eliada kod elifelet daudi oloyo jofilistia e lweny weche mag ndalo kane jofilistia owinjo ni osewir daudi mondo obed ruodh israel ne gibiro kar rombgi mondo gimonje kane daudi owinjo kamano nolor modhi e dala mochiel gi ohinga cha kane jofilistia ochopo ne giyaro ni lweny e paw holo mar refaim daudi nopenjo ruoth nyasaye wach niya kadhi kedo gi jofilistia nichiwgi e lweta koso ruoth nyasaye nodwoke niya dhiyo nachiwgi e lweti mi daudi nodhi baalperizim momonjogi kendo oloyogi eka nowacho niya ruoth nyasaye osemwomore kuom wasikwa mana kaka aora mwomo genge mano emomiyo nochak kanyo ni baalperizim tiende ni ruoddh mwomruok jofilistia noringo moweyo nyisechegi kanyo mi daudi kod joge nokawogi chieng machielo jofilistia noduogo kendo mochako oyaro ni lweny e paw holo mar refaim daudi nochako openjo ruoth nyasaye wach mi ruoth nyasaye nodwoke niya kik ichomgi tir ngad yo ka ngegi mondo imonjgi kama omanyore gi yien maboyo ka kiwinjo mutni ewi yien ka mutni mag ji mawuotho ireti nimar asetelo nyimi mondo adhi alo jolweny mag jofilistia daudi notimo kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike mi nonego jofilistia chakre geba nyaka gezer samuel oket daudi ruodh israel weche mag ndalo dhout israel duto nobiro hebron ir daudi mi giwachone niya nge ni wan mana remo achiel kodi e ndalo ruodhwa mokadho kane saulo pod ruodhwa ema nitelo ni joisrael e lwenjegi duto kendo ruoth nyasaye nowachoni niya inibed jakwadh joga israel kendo ema nibed ruodhgi jodong israel duto nobiro hebron ir daudi kendo ne gitimo kode singruok kuno e nyim ruoth nyasaye mi giwire gi mo mondo obed ruodh joisrael ruo wnda daudi ne jahigni piero adek ka nochako tich ruoth kendo nobedo ruoth kuom higni piero angwen nobedo ruodh jojuda kuom higni abiriyo kodak hebron kendo nobedo ruodh joisrael duto kaachiel gi jojuda kuom higni piero adek gadek kodak jerusalem daudi okawo dala mar sayun weche mag ndalo josh bura ruoth daudi nodhi jerusalem gi joge mondo oked gi jojebus weg pinyno jojebusgo ne paro ni daudi ok nyal donjo e dalagi omiyo ne giwachone niya ok nidonj ka nikech kata mana muofni gi rangonde oromo gengou kata kamano daudi nokawo sayun dala mochiel gi ohinga tinde iluongo ni dala daudi chiengno daudi nowacho niya ngama dwaro loyo jojebus mondo oidh gi aora motucho got kendo oneg rangonde gi muofni chunya osingo kande mano emomiyo iwacho ni muofni gi rangonde kik donj e hekalu bange daudi nodak e dala mochiel gi ohingano mi noluonge ni dala daudi nomedo gero udi moluore chakre ohinga mar milo ka dok ka iye duong mar daudi koro nomedore ahinya nikech ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ne ni kode hiram oyie gi loch daudi weche mag ndalo hiram ruodh turo nooro joote ir daudi gi yiend sida kaachiel gi jopa bao kod jogedo mag kite mi jogo nogero ni daudi ot koro daudi nongeyo ni ruoth nyasaye osekete ruodh israel kendo osetego lochne ahinya mondo oguedhgo joge israel yawuot daudi mane onywol jerusalem weche mag ndalo kane daudi osea hebron modhi odak elifelet daudi oloyo jofilistia e lweny weche mag ndalo kane jofilistia owinjo ni osewir daudi mondo obed ruodh israel ne gibiro kar rombgi mondo gimonje kane daudi owinjo kamano nolor modhi e dala mochiel gi ohinga cha kane jofilistia ochopo ne giyaro ni lweny e paw holo mar refaim daudi nopenjo ruoth nyasaye wach niya kadhi kedo gi jofilistia nichiwgi e lweta koso ruoth nyasaye nodwoke niya dhiyo nachiwgi e lweti mi daudi nodhi baalperizim momonjogi kendo oloyogi eka nowacho niya ruoth nyasaye osemwomore kuom wasikwa mana kaka aora mwomo genge mano emomiyo nochak kanyo ni baalperizim tiende ni ruoddh mwomruok jofilistia noringo moweyo nyisechegi kanyo mi daudi kod joge nokawogi chieng machielo jofilistia noduogo kendo mochako oyaro ni lweny e paw holo mar refaim daudi nochako openjo ruoth nyasaye wach mi ruoth nyasaye nodwoke niya kik ichomgi tir ngad yo ka ngegi mondo imonjgi kama omanyore gi yien maboyo ka kiwinjo mutni ewi yien ka mutni mag ji mawuotho ireti nimar asetelo nyimi mondo adhi alo jolweny mag jofilistia daudi notimo kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike mi nonego jofilistia chakre geba nyaka gezer samuel nyasaye otimo ni daudi singruok weche mag ndalo kane ruoth osechako dak e ode nogero kendo ruoth nyasaye omiye kue e kinde gi wasike duto nolwore koni gi koni nowacho ni nathan janabi niya koro adak e ot moger maber gi yiend sida sanduk mar nyasaye odak mana e hema nathan nodwoko ruoth niya tim duto midwaro nikech ruoth nyasaye ni kodi gotienono wach ruoth nyasaye nobiro ni nathan niya dhiyo inyis daudi jatichna ni ruoth nyasaye owacho kama digerna ot mondo adagie adier chakre ndalo mane agoloe joisrael e piny misri nyaka chil kawuono pok adak e ot asebet ka adak e hema kuonde duto nawuothoe gi joisrael duto ne ok apenjo achiel kuom jobura naketo mondo obed jokwadh joga israel gimomiyo ok gigerona ot mar yiend sida bende nyis daudi ni ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto owacho kama ne agoli e lek kuma nikwayoe rombe mondo ibed jatend joga israel asebet kodi kuonde duto midhiye kendo asetiekoni wasiki duto koro abiro miyo nyingi bedo gi huma maduong ka humb joma dongo mag piny kendo abiro miyo joga israel pinygi giwegi anagurgi kuno kendo ginidagie ok othaggi kendo kaka chon chakre ndalo mane aketoe jobura mondo oritgi anamiyi kue e kindi gi wasiki duto bende awacho ni anaguedh dhoodi mondo osiki zab joh joote kisetho minindo e liel gi kwereni anaket achiel kuom yawuoti kari kendo anagur lochne obed motegno en ema nogerna ot kendo anager lochne osik nyaka chieng zab kor hib anabed wuon mare kendo enobed wuoda koketho anachwade kaka wuon nyathi chwado nyathine ok nagol herana kuome kaka nagolo kuom saulo nariembo mondo oweni thuolo zab dhoodi gi lochni ogur matek e nyima kendo lochni nosik nyaka chieng nathan nonyiso ruoth daudi weche duto nofwenyne mi ruoth nodhi e nyim ruoth nyasaye mobet piny nowacho niya ruoth nyasaye nga koso dhooda en ango momiyo isemiya duong kama gima isetimona pod ikwano ka gima tin nimar bende isewacho ni dhooda nosik kuom ndalo mangeny kendo isenyisa kaka tienge mabiro nochal ruoth nyasaye ango damed wachoni ingeya oko gi iye isemiya ngeyo gik madongo misetimogi mana nikech singruokni kendo nikech mano ema idwaro ruoth nyasaye ema iduong kendo pok wawinjo ni nitie nyasaye moro machal kodi onge nyasaye moro mak mana tchik ere oganda moro e piny machalo gi jogi israel bende nitie jopiny moro mane isedhi miwaro e tich misumba miloko jogi ere oganda moro misetimonigi gik madongo malich kimiyogo nyingi duong koso ere oganda machielo misereso kigolo misri mondo obed jogi iwuon kendo kiriembonigi ogendini mamoko gi nyisechegi mondo oweni thuolo niwalo jogi israel mondo obed jogi nyaka chieng kendo ruoth nyasaye ema isedoko nyasachgi koro ruoth nyasaye mi singruok misetimona kaachiel gi dhooda obed gi teko nyaka chieng mi ichop gima isewacho nyingi mondo oyud duong nyaka chieng ka ji wacho niya ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto en nyasach israel kamano dhooda nodongi e nyimi nimar ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto en nyasach israel ema isenyisa wach ni ibiro dongo oda kuom mano asebedo gi chir mondo alem kama e nyimi ruoth nyasaye e nyasaye adier wecheni gin adier kendo isesingorina maber kama emomiyo koro ruoth nyasaye yie iguedh dhooda mondo osik e nyimi nyaka chieng ruoth nyasaye ema isesingori kamano omiyo dhooda noyud gueth nyaka chieng samuel daudi oyaro tong pinye weche mag ndalo bange daudi noloyo jofilistia mi gibedo moboch kendo nomayogi methegama dalagi noloyo jomoab bende kendo nochikogi mondo ginind piny ka giriedo eka nopogogi gi tol e migepe adek nogolo chik mondo oneg migepe ariyo migawo achiel mondo odong bang mano jomoab nobedo e bwo loch daudi kendo ne gigolone osuru bende daudi noloyo hadadezer wuod rehob ruodh zoba e kinde mane ruodhno dhiyo chungoe rapar mar lochne e lweny aora yufrate daudi nomako joidh farese alufu achiel gi mia abiriyo kod jolweny moko alufu piero ariyo nongado odond farese duto mag geche lweny moweyo mana farese mia achiel kane joaram moa damaski obiro mondo okony hadadezer ruodh zoba daudi nonego ji alufu piero ariyo kuomgi noketo askeche jorit e piny joaramgo mi ne gibedo e bwo lochne kendo ne gigolone osuru kuonde duto mane daudi dhiye ruoth nyasaye ne miye locho noyako gi lweny mag dhahabu mane jorit hadadezer otingo mokelo jerusalem bende noyako mula mogundho beta kod berothai miech hadadezer kane tou ruodh hamath owinjo ni ruoth daudi oseloyo lweny mag hadadezer nooro joram wuode ire mondo omose kendo opake kuom loyo hadadezer nimar hadadezer ne jasik tou joram nokelo gik moko mag fedha gi mag dhahabu kod mag mula magi bende ruoth daudi nochiwo ni ruoth nyasaye kaka nosechiwo fedha gi dhahabu noseyako kuom jo edom gi jomoab gi joamon gi jofilistia kod joamalek noseloyo gik moko noyako kuom hadedazer wuod rehob ruodh zoba bende nochiwo ni ruoth nyasaye zab kamano nying daudi noyudo huma kane daudi oduogo nonego joedom alufu apar gaboro e holo kado bange noketo askeche jorit e piny edom kendo joedom duto nobet e bwo lochne kuonde duto mane daudi dhiye ruoth nyasaye ne miye locho jodong daudi samuel weche mag ndalo daudi nobedo ruodh israel duto morito piny gi kue kongado bura kare ni joge duto joab wuod zeruya ne jatend jolweny jehoshafat wuod ahilud ne jachan weche zadok wuod ahitub kod ahimelek wuod abiathar ne jodolo seraya ne jagoro benaya wuod jehoyada ne jatend jokereth kod jopeleth yawuot daudi bende ne jodolo samuel daudi otimo maber ni mefibosheth sam daudi nopenjo niya dipo kodongie ngat moro ja dhood saulo koso mondo atimne maber nikech hera mane aherogo jonathan ne nitie jatich joka saulo moro nyinge ziba ne giluonge mondo obi ir daudi kane osebiro ruoth nopenje niya e ziba koso mi nodwoke niya e ruoth sam ruoth nomedo penje ni dipo kodongie ngat moro ja dhood saulo mondo atimne maber kaka nyasaye dwaro ziba nodwoko ruoth niya wuod jonathan moro pod nitie tiendene ongol ruoth nopenje ni en kanye ziba nodwoke niya en lodebar e od makir wuod amiel omiyo daudi nooro joote lodebar mondo oome kamano mefibosheth wuod jonathan wuod saulo nobiro ir daudi mogoyo chonge piny nyaka e lowo daudi noluonge niya mefibosheth mi nodwoke ni antie ruoth daudi nowachone niya kik iluor nimar abiro timoni maber nikech hera naherogo jonathan wuoru abiro dwokoni puothe duto mane mag saulo kwaru kendo anamiyi chiemo pile mefibosheth nochako okulorene ka wacho niya aana ni nga momiyo itimona maber kamano machalo guok mothoni ruoth noluongo ziba jatich saulo mowachone niya gik moko duto mane mag saulo kod joode koro amiyo mefibosheth nyakwar ruodhu kod yawuoti gi wasumbi nyaka upurne puothene kendo ukelne cham monyakie mondo jood nyakwar ruodhu oyud chiemo mefibosheth owuon abiro miyo chiemo ndalo duto ziba nodwoke niya ruoth abiro timo gik moko duto michika noyudo ka ziba nigi yawuowi apar gabich kod wasumbini pieri ariyo kamano mefibosheth nochiemo e mesa daudi kaka achiel kuom yawuot ruoth ne en gi wuode matin nyinge mika jogo duto nodak e od ziba nodoko jotich mefibosheth mefibosheth nodak jerusalem nikech nochiemo ndalo duto e mesa ruoth tiende duto nongol samuel daudi oloyo joamon gi joaram weche mag ndalo bange ruoth amon notho mi hanun wuode nodoko ruoth kare daudi nowacho niya abiri timo ni hanun wuod nahash maber mana kaka wuon mare notimona maber omiyo nooro joote mondo oduog chuny hanun kuom tho wuon mare kane joote daudi ochopo e piny joamon jotend joamon nowacho ni hanun ruodhgi niya bende iparo ni daudi oseoro joge mondo omi wuoru duong ooyo oseorogi mana ni mondo gicheng dala eka oyud yo monyalo loyego kuom mano hanun nomako joote daudi molielo tikgi nyakulchiel kendo ongado lepgi nyabathe chakre nungogi kalor piny bange noriembogi kane onyis daudi wachno nooro ji mondo orom ni jootego nikech ne giyudo wichkuot maduong nowacho mondo gibed jeriko mondi nyaka yie tikgi dongi eka giduogi joamon noneno ni gisemiyo daudi ojok kodgi omiyo ne giholo jolweny alufu piero ariyo kuom joaram bethrehob kod joaram zoba kendo ne giwako ruoth maaka kod joge alufu achiel kaachiel gi jotob alufu apar gariyo kane daudi owinjo wachno nooro joab kod joma rateke duto mondo oked kodgi joamon nowuok mi ne giriedo ni lweny e dhoranga dala joaram zoba kod rehob kaachiel gi jotob kod jomaaka nochanore e pap kane joab oneno ni lweny olwore noyiero thuond joisrael moko mochano kochomo joaram jomoko duto modong noketo e lwet abishai owadgi mi abishai nochanogi ka gichomo joamon joab nowacho ni abishai niya kineno ka joaram tek madwaro loya nyaka ibi ikonya ka joamon dwaro loyi nabi akonyi bed gi chir waked matek ni jowa ruoth nyasaye mondo otim gima oneno ni ber kamano joab gi joge norado gi joaram moriembo kane joamon oneno ni joaram ringo gin bende ne giringo abishai mi gidonjo e dalagi eka joab noweyo kedo kodgi modok jerusalem kane joaram oneno ni joisrael oseloyogi ne gichokore kanyakla hadadezer nooro joote mondo oluong joamon nodak loka aora yufrate mi ne gibiro helam ka shobak jatend oganda lweny mar hadadezer otelonigi kane daudi oyudo wach ni gibiro nochoko jolwenj israel duto kanyakla mi giidho loka jordan mondo girad kodgi helam joaram noriedo ni lweny kochomo daudi gi joge mi ne girado joisrael noloyogi mi giringo kendo daudi gi joge nonego jogi joidh geche mia abiriyo kod joidh farese alufu piero angwen bende ne gigoyo shobak jatendgi motho kanyo kane ruodhi duto manie bwo hadadezer oneno ni joisrael oloyogi ne giywagorenigi mi gibedo e bwo lochgi bang mano joaram ne ok ohedhore konyo joamon kendo samuel daudi gi bathsheba wnda e ndalo chakruok oro mane ruodhi thoro wuokie kadhi kedo daudi nooro joab kod askechene owuon kaachiel gi jolwenj israel duto mogoyo joamon asasa kendo ne giluoro dala raba daudi nodong jerusalem chieng moro kar sa dhok donjoe daudi noa e kitandane noyudo oyueyoe mowuotho ewi tat ode mi nopo koneno dhako moro ka lwokore ne en dhako jaber ahinya daudi nopenjo wach dhakono mi nodwoke ni en bathsheba nyar elam chi uria jahiti eka daudi nooro joote mondo oome ka nobiro noterore kode bange nodok e ode dhakono nomako ich mi nooro ni daudi wach konyise ni en gi ich daudi nooro ni joab wach niya orna uria jahiti mi joab nooro uria ir daudi kane uria obiro daudi nopenje ka joab gi jolweny jongima kendo ni lweny dhi nadi bange daudi nowachone niya dhiyo e odi mondo iyue kane uria owuok e od ruoth ruoth noorone chiemo moa e mesane owuon uria ne ok odhi e ode nonindo mana ranga dala ruoth kaachiel gi jorit ruoth kane onyis ruoth ni uria nyoro ok odhi e ode nopenjo uria niya donge nyoro ia wuoth ango momiyo ok idhi e odi uria nodwoke niya sandug muma kod joisrael gi jojuda odak mana e hembe kendo joab jatendwa gi jodongi mag lweny bende jojot oko e pap koro ere kaka dadonj e oda machiem kendo amethi kendo anind gi chiega akuongora gi nyingi ni ok natim kamano daudi nowacho ni uria niya ri kawuono bende kiny nawe mondo idhi kamano uria noriyo jerusalem chiengno kinyne daudi noluonge mondo gichiem mi nohoye mometho nyaka omer kane piny ochido uria nowuok modhi onindo mana kama jorit ruoth ne nitie ne ok odhi e ode kinyne gokinyi daudi nondiko ni joab barua moorogo uria baruano nondikoe niya ket uria yo ka nyime koma lweny gerie moloyo un udong chien uweye mondo onege omiyo joab noyudo lworo dala moro noketo uria kama nongeyo ni wasigu mager nitie jodalano nowuok mondo oked gi joab mi ne ginego jolweny moko kuomgi ne nitie askeche moko jorit daudi uria bende notho joab nooro ni daudi jaote mondo onyise weche duto kuom lweny nochiko jaoteno niya angeyo ni kisetieko nyiso ruoth weche duto kuom lweny kamoro mirima dipo komake mowacho niya marango nusudo machiegni gi dalano kukedo donge nungeyo ni joma ni ewi ohinga dichielu gi asere bura paruru ane ngama nonego abimelek wuod jerubaal ok mana dhako ema nodiro pong rego kuome gi ewi ohinga mar thebez monege ka ungeyo kamano ere gimomiyo nusudo machiegni gi ohinga kapo ni openji kamano iwachne ni uria jahiti bende otho jaoteno nodhi monyiso daudi weche duto mane joab ochike mi mirima nomako daudi gi joab mowacho niya marango nusudo machiegni gi dalano kukedo donge nungeyo ni joma ni ewi ohinga dichielu gi asere paruru ane ngama nonego abimelek wuod jerubaal ok mana dhako ema nodiro pong rego kuome gi ewi ohinga mar thebez monege ka ungeyo kamano ere gimomiyo nusudo machiegni gi ohinga jaote nodwoko daudi niya jogo nochako loyowa ni ne giwuoknwa e pap ne wariembogi kwadwokogi chien nyaka dhorangagi joasere mane ni ewi ohinga nochielo jolwenji kendo jomoko kuom thuondi magi notho uria bende osetho kane daudi owinjo kamano nodwoko jaote niya wach ni joab ni kik wachno chande nikech mano e kaka lweny obet kawuono ngato tho kendo kiny en mar ngama chielo dhiyo ijiwe kamano mondo omed mana kedo matek gi dalano nyaka olo kane chi uria owinjo ni uria osetho noywage kane ndalo ywakne orumo daudi nooro joote moome kendo nobedo chiege monywolone wuowi gima ne daudi otimono ne ok longo ni ruoth samuel nathan okwero daudi zab ruoth nyasaye nooro nathan ir daudi kendo ka nobiro ire nokone niya ji ariyo nodak e dala moro achiel ne japith machielo ne jachan japith ne nigi jamni gi dhok mogundho jachan ne onge gi gimoro mak mana nyarombo achiel kende nosengiewo nopidhe kendo nodongo e ode kaachiel gi nyithinde kochamo mana chiembe nometho e kikombene kendo nonindo e kore mobedone kaka nyare chieng moro ngato nobworo e dala japithno japithno ne ok oyie kawo chiayo moro kuom jambe owuon mondo oyang ni wendono nokawo mana nyarombo ngat jachan cha ema noyango ni wendone kane daudi owinjo wachno mirima nomake ahinya gi japithno nowacho ni nathan niya gi nying ruoth nyasaye ngat mosetimo kamano owinjore gi tho onego ochul nyadingwen kar nyarombono nikech notimo kamano koonge gi chunye eka nathan nowacho ni daudi niya e ngatno ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel owacho kama ne ayieri mondo ibed ruodh israel kendo naresi e lwet saulo ne amiyi od ruodhi kod monde bende obed magi kendo namiyi dhood israel gi dhood juda kata da ni mano pod tin da amedi gik moko moloyo mago marango nichayo wach ruoth nyasaye mitimo gima ok longone isenego uria jahiti kuom golo chik otho e lwet joamon kendo isekawo chiege mi obedo chiegi emomiyo koro lweny ok norum e dhoodi nikech isechaya kendo isekawo chi uria jahiti obedo chiegi sam ruoth nyasaye omedo wacho niya abiro keloni thagruok mowuok mana e odi iwuon nakaw mondi kendo namigi ngat moro mana kineno mi noterre kodgi e lela godiechieng gima nitimo nitimo lingling anatim gini e nyim joisarel duto odiechieng alanga daudi nowacho ni nathan niya aseketho e nyim ruoth nyasaye eka nathan nomedo wachone niya ruoth nyasaye bende oseweyoni richoni koro ok nitho kata kamano nyathi monywolni biro tho nikech isechayo ruoth nyasaye nathan nodok e dalane bange ruoth nyasaye nomiyo tuo ogoyo nyathi mane chi uria onywolo ni daudi mi nohewore ahinya daudi nosayo nyasaye mondo kik nyathi tho koriyo kech kendo konindo piny e lowo otieno duto jodong ode ne biro kendo chung bute ka dwaro chunge oa e lowo notamore kendo ne ok oyie mondo ochiem kodgi chieng mar abiriyo nyathi notho jodong od daudi noluoro nyise ni nyathi osetho ne giwacho niya kane nyathi pod ngima ne wawuoyo gi ruoth ne ok owinjwa koro obiro timore nadi ka wanyise ni nyathi osetho kane daudi oneno jotichne ka kuodho wach kendgi nofwenyoo ni kara nyathi osetho omiyo nopenjogi niya kara nyathi osetho ne gidwoke ni ee osetho daudi noa malo mi olwokore kendo owirore gi mo moloko lepe eka nodonjo e od ruoth nyasaye molemo bange nodok e ode mokwayo mondo okelne chiemo jotichne nopenje niya en ango mitimoni kane nyathi pod ngima nitueyo chiemo kendo niywak ka koro nyathi osetho ia malo michiemo nodwokogi niya kane nyathi pod ngima natueyo chiemo kaywak nikech naparo niya ngama ongeyo kata ka ruoth nyasaye biro ngwonona mondo nyathi obed mangima koro osetho ere gima datuene chiemo anyalo duoge koso ema nadhi ire en ok noduog ira daudi nohoyo bathsheba chiege modhi ire kendo noriwore kode mi bathsheba nonywolo wuowi mochako ni solomon ruoth nyasaye nohero nyathino kuom mano nomiyo nathan janabi owacho ni mondo ochake ni jedidia nikech mano e dwaro mar ruoth nyasaye tiend nyingno en ni ngama ohero ruoth nyasaye daudi okawo raba dala joamon weche mag ndalo joab nokedo gi raba dala joamon mokawo yap ruoth eka nooro joote ir daudi kowacho niya asekedo gi raba kendo asekawo yap ruoth omiyo koro chok joma odong duto ibi ilwor dalano kendo ikaw nikech ka ok itimo kamano dipo ka ema akawe mi ji diluonge gi nyinga kuom mano daudi nochoko oganda lweny duto modhi raba nokedo gi dalano mokawo nogolo osimbo ewi milkom nyasach joamon moyudo ni pek mar dhahabu molosego oromo kilo piero angwen kendo kidi nengone tek ochom kuome mi nosidho osimbono e wiye owuon noyako bende gik mathoth e dalano kendo nodaro joma nodakie moketogi e tich ngado bao kod kunyo kite gi tongo yien kod wango matafari kamano e kaka daudi notimo e miech joamon duto bange nodok jerusalem gi jogo duto samuel amnon gi tamar absalom wuod daudi ne nigi nyamin mare moro jaber nyinge tamar amnon wuod daudi nohere chuny amnon ne chande ahinya nyaka nobedo matuo mana nikech tamar nyamin mare ne tekne timo kode gimoro nikech ne en nyako pok ongeyo chwo amnon ne nigi osiepne moro rieke ngeny ahinya nyinge jonadab wuod shimea owadgi daudi nopenjo amnon niya wuod ruoth idhero nadi ndalogi dak inyisa gimomiyo amnon nodwoke niya ahero tamar nyamin absalom owadwa mi jonadab nowachone niya dhi inind e kitandani kiwuondori ni ituo ka wuoru obiro mondo oneni ikwaye niya yie mondo tamar nyamera obi omiya chiemo iyiene mondo olos chiemono e nyima ka kaneno kendo achiem kotingona chiemo e lwete kamano amnon nonindo kawuondore ni otuo kane ruoth obiro mondo onene amnon nokwaye niya yie mondo tamar nyamera obi olosna kek moko e nyima ka mondo acham kotingona e lwete mi daudi nooro jaote ir tamar dala kowacho niya dhiyo e od amnon owadu illosne chiemo omiyo tamar nodhi e od amnon owadgi moyude konindo nokawo mogo modwalo kendo otedogo kek e nyime kanyo eka nokawo nyalaro motokoe e nyime amnon nodagi chiemo nogolo chik ni mondo ji duto owuog oko mi ne giwuok eka nowacho ni tamar niya kel chiemo e od nindo koni mondo acham kitingona e lweti tamar nokawo kek noseloso mokelo ni amnon owadgi e od nindo ka nosekelone mondo ocham amnon nomake kawachone niya yie anind kodi nyamera en nokwere ni ooyo owadwa kik ikuod wiya joisrael ok tim gima kamano kik itim gima ofuwoni ere kuma dadhi apondie gi wichkuot kama bende dikwani kaka achiel kuom joma ofuwo e israel asayi dhi ilo gi ruoth nikech ok nodagi ni kik ikenda kata kamano amnon nodagi winje nomake moterore kode gi thwon bang mano amnon nojok kode ahinya kendo jok mane ojokgo ne duong moloyo hera noherego mokwongo nowachone niya malo idhiyo en nodwoke ni ooyo owadwa riemb miriembagoni rach moloyo gima isetimona amnon ne ok odewo wechene noluongo wuowi mane tiyone mowachone niya gol nyakoni oko mondo ilor dhoot mi wuowino nogole oko moloro dhoot noyudo nyakono orwako law bade boyo nyi ruodhi pok okendi ne rwako e ndalogo tamar nobuko wiye gi buru moyiecho lawe bade boyo norwako kendo nodhi koywak komako wiye absalom owadgi nopenje niya amnon owadu osetimoni gimoro koso bed gi kue nyamera nikech en owadu wachno kik chand chunyi tamar nodak e od absalom owadgi kotamore hore kane ruoth daudi owinjo wechego duto iye nowang ahinya ne ok otimo ni amnon gimoro nikech ne en wuode makayo kendo mohero absalom bende ne ok owacho ni amnon kata wach achiel nimar nosin kode kuom kuodo wi tamar nyamin mare absalom ochulo kuor moringo bang higni ariyo absalom noluongo yawuot ruoth duto baalhazor man efron kuma noyudo ongadoe yie rombe nodhi ir ruoth mowachone niya ruoth ingeyo ni tinde angado yie rombe akwayi ni mondo ibi kaachiel gi jogi ruoth nodwoke niya ooyo wuoda ok onego wabi waduto dipo ka wamiyi ting mapek absalom nosaye kata kamano ne ok oyie dhi nogoyone mana oriti eka absalom nowachone niya ka ok iyie biro mondo wadhi gi amnon owadwa ruoth nodwoke niya ere gimomiyo dodhi kodu absalom nomienore nyaka oyie ni mondo amnon gi owetene duto odhi absalom noloso chiemo mathoth noyudo osewacho ni jotichne niya ka amnon osemer mi awachonu ni negeuru unege kik uluor nikech awuon ema achikou beduru gi chir kuikoru mi jotich absalom notimo ni amnon mana kaka absalom nochikogi yawuot ruoth moko duto noidho kenjegi piyopiyo moringo kane pod gin e yo wach nochopo ni daudi niya absalom osenego yawuoti duto onge kata achiel modong ruoth noa malo moyiecho lepe kendo norudhore piny e lowo joge duto nochung bute bende noyiecho lepgi jonadab wuod shimea owadgi daudi nowacho niya ruoth kik ipar ni gisenego yawuoti duto amnon kende ema osetho absalom nochako ochano wachni chakre chieng mane amnon okuodoe wi tamar nyamin mare omiyo kik igen wachni kiparo ni mita yawuoti duto osetho amnon kende ema osetho absalom oseringo wuowi jarit notingo wange moneno ji mangeny ka lor e kor got koluwo yo moa horonaim jonadab nowacho ni ruoth niya ne yawuoti biro ero en mana kaka awachoni gikanyono kotieko wuoyo yawuot ruoth nochopo kendo ne giywak matek eka ruoth kaachiel gi joge duto bende noywak malit ahinya daudi noywago wuode kuom ndalo mangeny sam absalom noringo modhi ir talmai wuod amihud ruodh geshur mobet kuno kuom higni adek bange ruoth ne gombo neno absalom nikech chunye nosea kuom wach tho amnon samuel joab otiyo gi rieko mondo absalom oduogi joab wuod zeruya noneno ni chuny ruoth dwaro absalom omiyo nooro jaote tekoa moomone dhako moro mariek kuno joab nowacho ni dhakono niya rwakri gi lep ywak mondo iwuondri ka ngama ywago ngama otho kik iwirri gi mo chal dhako moseywago ngama otho kuom ndalo mangeny mi idhi ir ruoth kendo iwachne weche abiro nyisigi eka joab nopuonje weche modhi wacho kane chi tekoano obiro ir ruoth nogoyo chonge piny nyaka e lowo komiye duong mowacho niya ruoth konya ruoth nopenje ni ango machandi nodwoke niya ruoth chi liel chwora osetho ne gi yawuowi ariyo ne gigore ka kwath kuma ne onge ngato thegogi mi achiel ogoyo wadgi koro joodwa duto okayona kawacho niya gol jal mane onego owadgi mondo wanege kar owadgino kuom mano diginet jacham mwandu bende gidwaro lungo kara duto pep mak giweyo nying chwora kata kothe e piny ruoth nowacho ni dhakono niya dog dala abiro ngado buchi dhakono nomedo wachone niya yaye ruoth ketho mondo obed kuoma kendo kuom joodwa kod lochni ibed onge ketho omiyo ruoth nowachone niya ka ngato omedo wachoni gimoro kele ira mi ok nochak ochandi kendo dhakono nomedo wacho niya ruoth akwayi mondo ikuongrina e nying ruoth nyasaye nyasachi ni jachul kuor kik med ketho konego wuoda ruoth nodwoke ni gi nying ruoth nyasaye kata yie wi wuodi achiel ok nolwar piny eka dhakono nowacho niya asayi ruoth yie mondo amed wachoni wach achiel kende ruoth nokone ni wachi dhakono nowacho niya kingado wach wuoda kamano imiyo bura loyi iwuon nikech idagi omo jal niriembo mondo oduog dala marango iseparo wach diketh jonyasayeni waduto wabiro tho nikech wachalo gi pi mopukore piny ok nyal twom kendo kata kamano nyasaye ok dwar mondo ngato otho oloso wach mondo jal moriemb oduog dala ruoth asebiro mondo awuo kodi nikech ji miya luoro naparo ni awuo gi ruoth nimar dipo ka otimo gima odwaro angeyo ni ruoth biro winjo ywakna kendo obiro resa e lwet jal dwaro tieka kaachiel gi wuoda ni kik wabed e oganda mar jonyasaye sam bende naparo niya wach ruoth ema nyalo miya kue nikech ruoth chalo malaika mar nyasaye mapogo gima ber gi gima rach ruoth nyasaye nyasachi mondo obed kodi ruoth nowacho ni dhakono niya kik ipanda gimoro kuom wach madwaro penjini dhakono nodwoke ni ruoth wachi ruoth nopenje ni joab ni kodi e wachni koso nodwoke niya ruoth akuongora gi nyingi ni onge ngat nyalo mbalore ni weche misewacho adier joab jatichni ema nonyisa wechego duto mondo awachni notimo kamano ni mondo gik mosetimore olokre malaika mar nyasaye mingeyogo gik moko duto matimore e piny bange ruoth nowacho ni joab niya koro ayie wachni dhiyo iom rawera absalom joab nokulore piny komiyo ruoth duong kendo nodende nowacho niya ruoth tinendeni angeyo nii iyie koda nikech isetimona gima akwayo mi joab nodhi geshur omo absalom mokele jerusalem ruoth nowacho niya mondo odag e ode owuon ok adwar mondo obi e nyima mano omiyo absalom nodak e ode owuon ka ok odhi e nyim ruoth e israel duto ne onge ngat man gi chia miwuoro ka absalom mbala ne onge kuome wiye nyaka tiende piny nolielo wiye higa ka higa kane yie wiye ohinge ka nopimo yie wiyeno noyudo ni pekne romo kilo ariyo absalom nonywolo yawuowi adek gi nyako achiel nyinge tamar ne en nyako jaber ahinya absalom nodak jerusalem kuom higni ariyo mangima ka ok odhi e nyim ruoth eka noluongo joab mondo oor irr ruoth joab nodagi biro ire noluonge kendo joab ne pod odagi omiyo absalom nowacho ni jotichne niya donge ungeyo puoth joab mar cham mokiewo gi puotha dhiuru uwange gi mach mi ne gidhi mi giwango puodhono eka joab nodhi ir absalom e ode mopenje niya marango jotichni owango puotha absalom nodwoke ni naoroni wach kaluongi mondo aori ir ruoth ipenje gimomiyo nooma geshur dobedona maber moloyo ka da pod kuno emomiyo koro adwaro neno ruoth kendo ka oneno rach moro kuoma mondo onega kane joab odhi ir ruoth monyise wachno ruoth noluongo absalom mobiro ire absalom nokulore piny e nyime mi ruoth nomose ka nyodhe samuel absalom onganyo ni daudi bang mano absalom nongiewo gari gi farese kendo ne en gi ji piero abich mane telo nyime nothoro chiew gokinyi mangich kendo chung e dir yo mochomo dhoranga jerusalem ka noneno ngat man gi wach moro ka dhi ir ruoth mondo ongad buche noluongo ngatno kendo openje kuma oaye kane ngatno onyise dhood israel moaye absalom ne wachone niya aneno ni wecheni beyo kendo adier mak mana ni onge ngat ruoth oseketo mondo oyal buche kamagi bende nomedo wacho niya yaye mad keta jangad bura e pinyni eka ngato ka ngato man gi wach kata ywak nyalo biro ira kendo dangadne bura kare pile kane ngato obiro ire kendo okulorene ka miye duong absalom ne rieyo lwete ka mose kendo ka nyodhe notimo kamano ni joisrael duto mane biro ni mondo ruoth daudi ongadnigi bura mano e kaka absalom noywayo chuny joisrael bang higni angwen absalom nowacho ni ruoth niya yiena adhi hebron mondo achop singruok mane asingora ni ruoth nyasaye nikech kane adak geshur e piny aram nasingora ni ka ruoth nyasaye oduoga jerusalem nalame hebron ruoth noyiene mi absalom nodhi hebron absalom nooro joote ni dhout israel duto lingling kowacho niya ka uwinjo tung ukog ni absalom e ruodh hebron absalom noluongo joisrael mia ariyo mondo odhi kode hebron mi jogo nodhi ka chunygi ler kendo ka kiya gima absalom ochano kane absalom timo misango nooro wach gilo moluongne ahitofel jagilo jangad rieko ni daudi kamano ji mane onganyo ka dok ni absalom nomedore kane daudi oyudo wach ni joisrael osedok ni absalom nowacho ni joge duto mane ni kode jerusalem niya wuoguru waringuru nimar ka ok watimo kamano ok wabi tony mak absalom ojukowa wuoguru aruya dipo kongukowa moloyowa kendo onego jo dala ka duto jotend lweny nodwoko ruoth niya ruoth waikore timo gimoro amora miwacho omiyo ruoth nowuok kaachiel gi joode duto mak mana monde apar moko ema noweyo mondo orit ode kamano nowuok kaachiel gi joge duto mi gichung ot matung eka jolwenje duto kod jokereth gi jopeleth duto kod jogiti mia auchiel nobiro kode koa gath nokadho e nyime ruoth nopenjo itai jagiti niya marango bende idhi kodwa dogi ibed gi ruoth manyien nikech ngama wendo noriembi moweyo dalagi yandi eka ibiro ere kaka dwawuoth kodi kamoro amora akia kuma adhiye emomiyo dogi kaachiel gi jowadu ruoth nyasaye mondo oguedhi kendo onyisi herane mosiko itai nodwoko ruoth niya gi nying ruoth nyasaye kendo gi nyingi iwuon kamoro amora midhiye kanyo ema bende nabedie kata e tho kata e ngima omiyo daudi nowachone niya ara dhi nyime mi itai jagiti nokadho kaachiel gi joge duto jopinyno duto noywak ka ji kadho ruoth nochung e aora kidron ka ji duto kadho nyime kochiko yo thim abiathar gi zadok bende nobiro kaachiel gi jolawi duto kotingo sandug muma mar nyasaye ne giyieyo sanduk mar nyasaye piny nyaka ji duto mane wuok jerusalem okadho eka ruoth nowacho ni zadok niya dwok sanduk mar nyasaye jerusalem kapo ni ruoth nyasaye okecha enoduoga mi anane sanduk kod kar dakne kendo ka ruoth nyasaye owacho ni ok ngat malongo e nyime era e mondo otimna gima ohero ruoth nomedo wacho ni zadok jadolo niya koro doguru dala gi kue gi ahimaaz wuodi kod abiathar gi jonathan wuode abiro bet kama iyorogo aora e thim nyaka ayud wach moa kuomi omiyo zadok gi abiathar ne jodwoko sanduk mar nyasaye jerusalem mi gimedo dak kuno daudi noidho got zeituni ka ywak koumo wiye kendo ka en gi tiende nono ji duto mane ni kode bende noidho got koumo wigi kendo ka ywak nonyis daudi ni ahithofel en achiel kuom joma odok ni absalom mi nowacho niya ruoth nyasaye asayi lok rieko mar ahithofel mondo obed mana fuwo kane daudi ochopo ewi got kama nilamoe nyasaye hushai jaarki nobiro romone koyiecho lawe kendo obuko wiye buru daudi nowachone niya kwadhi kodi dimedna mana ting omiyo dog jerusalem mondo iwach ni absalom ni initine kaka nitiyo ni wuon mare e ndalo mokadho kitimo kamano inikethna rieko ahithofel un gi zadok gi abiathar jadolo kuno wach moro amora miwinjo e od ruoth inyis jodologo ahimaaz wuod zadok kod jonathan wuod abiathar bende ni kodgi kuno gin ema mondo iorgi gikelna weche duto miwinjo kuom mano hushai osiep daudi nodok modonjo jerusalem mana e sa mane absalom bende ochopoe kuno samuel sam noyudo daudi oselor matin koa ewi got eka ziba jatich mefibosheth noromone ka nigi kenje ariyo motingo makati mia ariyo gi tombo mia achiel mag olemb mzabibu motwo kod olembe moko mia achiel gi divai e ndede mar pien ruoth nopenjo ziba niya marango ikelo gigi ziba nodwoke niya akelo kenje mondo jood ruoth oidhi kendo makati gi olembe mondo jolweny ocham divai mondo joma nongno ohewo e thim omadhi sam ruoth nomedo penje ni wuod ruodhi ni kanye ziba nodwoke niya odong jerusalem nikech nowacho ni tinende joisrael biro dwokona loch wuora eka ruoth nowacho ni ziba niya gik moko duto mag mefibosheth koro amiyi ziba nodwoke ni erokamano ruoth mad isik kigena kamano kane daudi ochopo bahurim ngat moro nyinge shimei wuod gera ja dhood saulo nowuok mokuonge alanda nobayo daudi gi joge duto gi kite kata obedo ni jolweny duto kaachiel gi thwondi nolworo ruoth koni gi koni weche mane shimei okuongo e magi aye dhand remo ngama achach ruoth nyasaye osechuloni kuor nikech nichuero remb joka saulo nikawo lochne ruoth nyasaye osemiyo absalom wuodi loch koro masira osenwangi nimar dhand remo abishai wuod zeruya nowacho ni ruoth niya marango iweyo guok mothoni kuongi yiena mondo adhi angad wiye oko ruoth nowacho niya ango chandou koda un yawuot zeruya mondo okuonga akuonga ka ruoth nyasaye ema ochike mondo okuonga onge ngama nyalo penje gimomiyo otimo kamano eka nomedo wacho ni abishai kod joge duto niya uneno ka wuoda manywolo ema dwaro nega ka kamano koro jabenjaminni didwar nega machal nadi weye okuonga akuonga kamano nikech ruoth nyasaye ema osechike dipo nono ka ruoth nyasaye oneno chandruokna motimona ber kar kuong mikuongagono daudi gi joge nodhi nyime gi wuodhgi shimei ne wuotho e kor got komanyore gi daudi kokuonge kendo obaye gi kite kendo oguetho daudi gi joge duto nochopo e aora jordan kool mi ne giyueyo kanyo absalom gi joisrael duto nodonjo jerusalem kaachiel gi ahithofel hushai jaarki osiep daudi nosudo ir absalom mowachone niya ruoth mondo idag aminga absalom nopenje niya e kaka inyisogo ni ihero daudi osiepni marango ne ok idhi kode hushai nodwoke niya ooyo ngat ruoth nyasaye kod oganda man kae gi joisrael duto oyiero ema ngate kendo anasikgo ere ngama chielo kendo datine mak mana wuod ruoth kaka natiyo ni wuoru e kaka bende natini absalom nowacho ni ahithofel niya ngadnwae rieko ere gima onego watim ahithofel nodwoke ni dhi iriwri gi mond wuoru noweyo mondo oritne dala bange joisrael duto biro winjo ni isetimo tim makuero momiyo wuoru ojok kodi mano biro jiwo chuny jogo duto luwi sam joabsalom nieyie gi wachno mi ne giguro ni absalom hema ewi ot malo kendo absalom nodonjo moriwore gi mond wuon mare mana ka joisrael duto neno e ndalogo rieko mane ahithofel ngado ne chalo mana gi rieko mane ngato yudo kopenjo nyasaye wach daudi kod absalom bende ne kwano rieko mar ahithofel kamano samuel rieko mar hushai oloyo rieko mar ahithofel ahithofel nowacho ni absalom niya yiena ayier ji alufu apar gariyo mondo alawgo daudi gotienoni abiro juke kool kendo ka chunye onyosore mi anamiye kihondko maduong kendo ji duto man kode noringi naneg mana ruoth kende eka anadwok ji duto iri ka dhako midwoko ir chwore kinego ngat achiel kende ji duto nobed gi kue wachno ne ber ni absalom gi jodong israel duto kata kamano absalom nowacho niya luong hushai jaarki mondo wawinj wachne bende kane hushai obiro ir absalom absalom nonyise rieko mane ahithofel osengado nopenje niya dwatim gima owachono koso ka ok kamano mondo ingadnwa rieko hushai nodwoko absalom niya rieko ahithofel ongadono kawuono ok ber ingeyo ni wuoru gi joge gin joma rateke kendo koro giger mana ka ondiek moma nyithinde bende wuoru en jalweny mariek ang nonind mana kar kende mopogore gi joge kata sani koro osepondo e bugo moro kata kamoro machielo omiyo ka jowa moko oneg mana e chakruok lweny ngato angata mowinjo biro wacho ni masira osemako joma luwo absalom mi kata ngat jachir kendo mager ka sibuor nokirni nikech joisrael duto ongeyo ni wuoru en thwon kendo joma ni kode jochir angado rieko ni mondo ichok joisrael duto kanyakla chakre dan nyaka beersheba joma thoth ka kuoyo e dhonam kendo iwuon itelnigi e lweny kamano wanajuke kamoro amora entie wanamwomre kuome kendo wanamok kuome ka tho momoko e lum wananege kendo onge ngat achiel kuom joge duto notony kata kapo ni odonjo e dala moro joisrael duto nokel tonde mi giniywa udi duto e dalano nyaka aora kata kidi matin ok nodong kanyo mi absalom gi joisrael duto nowacho niya rieko mar hushai jaarki ber moloyo rieko mar ahithofel mano notimore nikech ruoth nyasaye nosechano mondo okel masira ni absalom komiyo rieko mar ahithofel bedo kayiem nono eka hushai nonyiso zadok gi abiathar jadolo rieko mane ahithofel ongado ni absalom gi jodong israel kod rieko mane en owuon ongado bange nomedo wacho niya koro oruru wach piyo kunyiso daudi ni gotienoni kik obwor kar yoro aora manie thim oidh loka piyo nimar dipo ka onege gi joge duto noyudo jonathan gi ahimaaz jobet enrogel ka rito wach nikech ne ok owinjore mondo gidonj jerusalem nimar dipo ka ngato onegogi nyako moro jatich ema ne dhi enrogel pile nyisogi gik matimore eka ne gitero ni daudi wach kata kamano rawera moro nonenogi monyiso absalom omiyo ji ariyogo nowuok ayuka modhi e dala ngat moro bahurim ne gidonjo e soko ngatno mane ni e laru chi ngatno nokawo par moumogo dho soko eka nomoyoe cham nondo kik gimoro nen kane jotich absalom ochopo e dalano ne gipenjo dhakono niya ere ahimaaz gi jonathan dhakono nodwpokogi niya giseidho loka aora jotich absalom nodwarogi ne gitamogi nwango mi gidok jerusalem kane gisedhi ji ariyogo nowuok e soko motero ni daudi wach niya malo ingad aora piyo nimar ahithofel osengado rieko ditieki omiyo daudi kod joge nongado aora jordan mi kane piny oru ne onge kata ngat achiel mane pok ongado aora kane ahithofel oneno ni absalom ok oluwo rieko nongadone noidho kanje modok thurgi nyaka dalane nolamo gige ni joode mi nodere motho ne giyike wuon mare daudi odak mahanaim kane absalom gi joisrael duto oidho loka aora jordan noyudo ka daudi osechopo mahanaim absalom noseketo amasa mondo obed jatend jolweny kar joab amasa ne wuod jaishmael nyinge ithra nokendo abigail nyar nahash nyamin zeruya min joab absalom gi joisrael nojot e piny gilead kane daudi ochopo mahanaim shobi wuod nahash jaamon raba gi makir wuod amiel jalodebar kod barzilai jagilead rogelim ne jobiro ire ne gikelo kitendni gi tewni gi agulni kod ngano ghi shairi gi mogo gi chamb aloida gi oganda gi ngor kod mor kich gi chak mopoto gi rombe kod mo mabuo mondo daudi gi joge ocham nimar ne gingeyo ni midenyo gi riyo koro omakogi e thim kendo giol samuel tho mar absalom daudi nochano joma ne ni kode kendo noyieronigi jotelo madongo gi matindo nopogo jolweny e migepe adek migawo achiel noketo e bwo joab moro e bwo abishai wuod zeruya omin joab kendo mar adek e bwo itai jagiti nowacho ni jolweny niya bende adhi kodu e lweny jolweny nodwoke ni ok didhi kodwa nikech wan kata kapo ni waringo kata kapo ni ginegowa mathoth mano ok gimoro iromri gi ji alufu apar kuomwa emomiyo owinjore idong mondo ikonywa gi ka mi ruoth nowachonigi niya abiro timo gima uneno ni ber omiyo nochung rangach ka oganda lweny wuok kochanore e migepe matindo gi madongo ruoth nochiko joab gi abishai kod itai niya akwayou ni kik uhiny rawera absalom jolweny duto nowinjo ka ruoth chiko jotelo ni kik gihiny absalom kamano oganda lweny mar daudi nowuok kedo gi joisarel kendo lweny norado e bungu mar efraim jodaudi noloyo joisarel kendoo ji mathoth dirom alufu piero ariyo notho chiengno lweny nolandore mokwako pinyno duto mi chiengno joma ne otho e bungu ne ngeny moloyo mago mane jolweny onego absalom nopo koromo gi jolwenj daudi noyudo oseidho kanyna kane kanyna kadho e tiend yath maduong bedene okar wi absalom nomoko e bad yadhno mi nodong koliero kanyo e kor muya kanje nodhi adhiya ngat moro noneno absalom mowacho ni joab niya neno absalom koliero e yath joab nopenjo ngatno niya ka inene adier marango ne ok ichwowe mondo otho gi kanyono da amiyi fedha apar gi okanda maber ngatno nodwoko joab niya kata da ni imiya fedha gana e lweta ok dater lweta kuom wuod ruoth nimar ne wawinjo ka ruoth chiki kaachiel gi abishai kod itai niya akayou ni kik uhiny rawera absalom ka da ahinye ruoth dowinjo nikech onge wach manyalo mungore ni ruoth ok diresa joab nowachone niya ok anyal galora kodi kamano mi nokawo aserni adek modhi ochielogo absalom mane pod oliero e yath ka ngima eka yawuowi apar joting ni joab gi lweny nolworo absalom mogoye nyaka otho bange joab nogoyo tung kokwerogo jolweny ni kik gimed lawo joisrael jolweny noduogo mokawo ringre absalom mi gibolo e bugo matut mane ni e bungu kendo ne gidhuro kuome kite mangeny molokore pith maduong joisrael duto noringo nyaka miechgi kane absalom pod ngima noyudo osechungo siro e holo mar ruoth mondo obedne ka rapar nowacho niya aonge gi wuowi dichung wiya kasetho omiyo nochako sirono nyinge owuon kendo pod iluonge ni rapar mar absalom nyaka chil kawuono ahimaaz wuod zadok nowacho niya aring ater ni ruoth wach maber kaka ruoth nyasaye oserese e lwet wasike joab nodwoke ni kawuono ok niter wach nimar wach maditer kawuono ok en wach maber nikech wuod ruoth osetho ibiro tero wach chieng machielo eka joab nowacho ni misumba moro jakush niya dhiyo inyis ruoth gima iseneno jakushno nokulore ni joab momako nguech ahimaaz wuod zadok nochako okwayo joab niya ok adewo gima biro timorena akwayi yiena aring aluw jakush joab nopenje niya wuoda marango idwa dhi onge gima ibiro yudo kuom oteni ahimaaz nodwoke niya kata da nadi nyaka aring adhi omiyo joab noyiene mondo oring odhi mi ahimaaz noringo koluwo yor paw aora jordan moyombo jakush noyudo daudi obedo e kind dhorangach maoko gi maiye kendo jarit ne ni ewi dhoranga ohinga kane jaritno otingo wange noneno ngat man kende ka ringo omiyo noluongo ruoth monyiso wach ruoth nodwoke niya ka ngat achiel ema biro okelo wach maber jalo noringo piyo ka nochopo machiegni jarit noneno ngat machielo ka ringo biro noluongo joma ne nie dhorangach kokok niya aneno ngat machielo ka ringo biro kende ruoth nodwoko niya en bende okelo wach maber jarit nomedo wacho niya jal motelo ringo ka ahimaaz wuod zadok ruoth noko ni ahimaaz ngat malongo kendo ageno ni okelo wach maber ahimaaz nochopo motingo dwonde kowacho ni ruoth niya wach ber bange nokulore piny ni ruoth mowacho niya ruoth nyasaye nyasachi duong mosechiwo joma nopiem kodi e lweti ruoth nopenje niya rawera absalom ngima koso ahimaaz nodwoke niya kane joab oora nawinjo mahu maduong ne ok angeyo gima otimore ruoth nowachone ni sudi ichung ka mi nosudo eka jakush bende nochopo mowacho niya ruoth akeloni wach maber nikech ruoth nyasaye oseresi e lwet joma nopiem kodi ruoth nopenje niya rawera absalom ngima koso jakush nodwoke niya mad wasiki duto kod joma piem kodi ka dwaro hinyi bed mana kaka wuowino koro obedo ruoth nobwok ahinya moidho e ot mane ni ewi dhorangach koywak kama yaye absalom wuoda wuoda yaye absalom wuoda mad ema atho kari absalom wuoda wuoda samuel nonyis joab ni ruoth ywak malit nikech absalom kendo mor mar odiechiengno nolokore mana ywak kuom jolweny duto kane giwinjo ni ruoth okuyo nikech wuode chiengono jolweny nodok mahanaim ka lidho mana kaka joma olo e lweny dwogo alucha ka wigi okuot noyudo ruoth ogengo wange kendo ywak gi dwol maduong niya yaye absalom wuoda absalom wuoda wuoda joab nodonjo ei ot ir ruoth mowachone niya kawuono jogi osereso ngimani kaachiel gi ngima yawuoti gi nyigi kod mondi ikuodo wigi nikech ihero jogo mochayi ichayo jogo moheri tinendeni isemiyo ji ongeyo ni ok ikwan jotend lweny gi jolwenji ka gimoro nimar aneno ni kada absalom bed mangima kawuono wan duto watho dibedo mamor omiyo wuogi iho chuny jogi nikech gi adiera e nying ruoth nyasaye ni ka ok itimo kamano onge kata ngat achiel ang nobed kodi otienoni kendo mano dibedni masira maduong moloyo masiche duto miseneno nyaka ia e nyathi mi ruoth nowuok mobet e kome e dhorangach kendo kane onyis ji ni ruoth obet kanyo ne gibiro e nyime giduto noyudo ka joisrael oseringo daudi oduogo jerusalem koko maduong ne nitie e dhout israel duto ka ji penjore niya ruoth daudi noresowa e lwet wasikwa kendo e lwet jofilistia koro oseringo oa e pinywa nikech absalom nopiem kode absalom mane wawiro mondo obed ruodhwa koro osetho e lweny marango waling alinga ok wachan kaka wanyalo duogo ruoth ruoth nowinjo wach joisrael omiyo nooro wach ni zadok gi abiathar jadolo kowachonigi ni mondo gipenj jodong juda niya marango un ema dubi achien kuom dwoka e dala un e jowetena kendo un e remba marango un ema dudong achien kuom dwoka e dala wachuru ni amasa bende ni donge ingeyo ni kod wan remo achiel nyasaye mondo okweda ka ok aketi jatend jolweny kar joab kamano noloko chuny jojuda duto mi ne gibet gi chuny achiel kendo ne giorone wach niya duogi kaachiel gi jogi duto omiyo ruoth noduogo nyaka aora jordan monwango ka jojuda osechokore gilgal mondo oromne kendo okele loka jordan sam shimei wuod gera jabenjamin bahurim nobiro piyopiyo kod jojuda mondo orom ni ruoth daudi jobenjamin alufu achiel bende nobiro kode ziba jatich joka saulo kod yawuote apar gabich gi wasumbni piero ariyo noreto mokwongo ni ruoth chopo jordan mondo gikonye ngado aora gi joode kendo gitimne gimoro amora modwaro kane ruoth oikore ngado aora shimei wuod gera nogoyo chonge piny mokulorene nyaka e lowo kowacho niya ruoth kik ikwana ka jaketho kata paro tim achach natimo chieng niwuok jerusalem cha kik ikan wachno e chunyi nikech ayie ni aseketho emomiyo e ngat mokuongo kuom dhood josef mobiro romoni kawuono abishai wuod zeruya nowacho niya donge owinjore shimei tho kuom kuongo ruoth mowir ruoth nyasaye oyiero daudi nodwoke niya ango machandou koda un yawuot zeruya momiyo udoko wasika tinendeni uparo ni bende dineg ngato e israel kawuono adier kawuono eka angeyo ni kare ruodh israel mi nosingore ni shimei kowacho niya ok nonegi sam mefibosheth nyakwar saulo nobiro romo ni ruoth ne pok olwoko tiende kata golo yie tike kata mana lwoko lepe chakre chieng mane ruoth owuokie nyaka chieng mane oduogoe koselocho kane mefibosheth ochopo koa jerusalem mondo orom ni ruoth ruoth nopenje niya mefibosheth marango ne ok idhi koda en nodwoke niya ruoth jatichna nowuonda kaka ingeyo ni rangol nadwaro gawo kanyna mondo aidh adhi kodi jatichnano nothuwa kodi omiyo naluoro biro ruoth ichalo kaka malaika mar nyasaye emomiyo tim gima ineno ni ber nikech joodwa duto nowinjore gi tho e lweti kata kamano niyiera mondo abed achiel kuom joma chiemo kodi koro ere gima chielo damed kwayi ruoth nowachone niya asewinjo wachni kendo koro aneno ni mondo upogru gi ziba mwandu mane amiye mefibosheth nowacho ni ruoth niya ruoth kaka koro iseduogo gi kue mondo ziba okawgi duto sam barzilai jagilead bende nosebiro koa rogelim kokowo ruoth nyaka aora jordan ne en ngat moti ahinya jahigni piero aboro en ema nokonyo ruoth gi chiemo e kinde mane ruoth ni mahanaim nikech ne en jamoko ruoth nowachone niya bi wadhi kodi loka cha kendo anapidhi kidak koda jerusalem barzilai nodwoke ni ruoth ngat moseti ere kaka dadhi kodi jerusalem koro jahigni piero aboro iparo ni pod nitie gimoro manyalo miya mor koso awinjon dhath gima achamo kata mar gima amadho iparo ni wende chwo kata wende mon pod nyalo miya ilo ooyo ruoth ok owinjore amedni ting kayiem ere gimomiyo dimiya pok kama abiro ngado kodi aora jordan kende bange iyiena adog dalana mondo oyika kuma liend wuora gi mama nitie kimham wuoda eri yie mondo idhi kode kendo irite kaka idwaro ruoth noyiene ka dwoke niya kara kimham nyalo dhi koda anatimne kaka idwaro kendo gimoro amora midwaro kuoma anatimni ji duto nongado aora jordan ruoth nodong ka goyo ni barzilai oriti nonyodhe kendo oguedhe eka barzilai nodok dalane bange ruoth nongado aora modhi nyaka gilgal ka jojuda duto kowe kaachiel gi joisrael moko kimham bende nodhi kode eka joisrael duto nobiro ir ruoth mi gipenje niya marango owetewa jojuda okawi lingling kendo okowi loka jordan kaachiel gi joodi gi jolwenji duto jojuda duto nodwoko joisrael niya ne watimo kamano nikech wan wat ruoth machiegni moloyo marango iu wang gi wachni bende uwinjo ni ruoth osemiyowa gimoro wachamo koso uparo ni osemiyowa mich moro joisrael nodwoko jojuda kendo niya wan dhoudi apar e piny daudi omiyo owinjore wabed kode moloyo un marango ujarowa donge wan ema ne wakwongo paro wach duogo ruoth kata kamano weche jojuda ne ger moloyo weche joisrael samuel nonyis joab ni ruoth ywak malit nikech absalom kendo mor mar odiechiengno nolokore mana ywak kuom jolweny duto kane giwinjo ni ruoth okuyo nikech wuode chiengono jolweny nodok mahanaim ka lidho mana kaachiel gi jogi duto omiyo ruoth noduogo nyaka aora jordan monwango ka jojuda osechokore gilgal mondo oromne kendo okele loka jordan sam shimei wuod gera jabenjamin bahurim nobiro piyopiyo kod jojuda mondo orom ni ruoth daudi jobenjamin alufu achiel bende nobiro kode ziba jatich joka saulo kod yawuote apar gabich gi wasumbni piero ariyo noreto mokwongo ni ruoth chopo jordan mondo gikonye ngado aora gi joode kendo gitimne gimoro amora modwaro kane ruoth oikore ngado aora shimei wuod gera nogoyo chonge piny mokulorene nyaka e lowo kowacho niya ruoth kik ikwana ka jaketho kata paro tim achach natimo chieng niwuok jerusalem cha kik ikan wachno e chunyi nikech ayie ni aseketho emomiyo e ngat mokuongo kuom dhood josef mobiro romoni kawuono abishai wuod zeruya nowacho niya donge owinjore shimei tho kuom kuongo ruoth mowir ruoth nyasaye oyiero daudi nodwoke niya ango machandou koda un yawuot zeruya momiyo udoko wasika tinendeni uparo ni bende dineg ngato e israel kawuono adier kawuono eka angeyo ni kare ruodh israel mi nosingore ni shimei kowacho niya ok nonegi sam mefibosheth nyakwar saulo nobiro romo ni ruoth ne pok olwoko tiende kata golo yie tike kata mana lwoko lepe chakre chieng mane ruoth owuokie nyaka chieng mane oduogoe koselocho kane mefibosheth ochopo koa jerusalem mondo orom ni ruoth ruoth nopenje niya mefibosheth marango ne ok idhi koda en nodwoke niya ruoth jatichna nowuonda kaka ingeyo ni rangol nadwaro gawo kanyna mondo aidh adhi kodi jatichnano nothuwa kodi omiyo naluoro biro ruoth ichalo kaka malaika mar nyasaye emomiyo tim gima ineno ni ber nikech joodwa duto nowinjore gi tho e lweti kata kamano niyiera mondo abed achiel kuom joma chiemo kodi koro ere gima chielo damed kwayi ruoth nowachone niya asewinjo wachni kendo koro aneno ni mondo upogru gi ziba mwandu mane amiye mefibosheth nowacho ni ruoth niya ruoth kaka koro iseduogo gi kue mondo ziba okawgi duto sam barzilai jagilead bende nosebiro koa rogelim kokowo ruoth nyaka aora jordan ne en ngat moti ahinya jahigni piero aboro en ema nokonyo ruoth gi chiemo e kinde mane ruoth ni mahanaim nikech ne en jamoko ruoth nowachone niya bi wadhi kodi loka cha kendo anapidhi kidak koda jerusalem barzilai nodwoke ni ruoth ngat moseti ere kaka dadhi kodi jerusalem koro jahigni piero aboro iparo ni pod nitie gimoro manyalo miya mor koso awinjon dhath gima achamo kata mar gima amadho iparo ni wende chwo kata wende mon pod nyalo miya ilo ooyo ruoth ok owinjore amedni ting kayiem ere gimomiyo dimiya pok kama abiro ngado kodi aora jordan kende bange iyiena adog dalana mondo oyika kuma liend wuora gi mama nitie kimham wuoda eri yie mondo idhi kode kendo irite kaka idwaro ruoth noyiene ka dwoke niya kara kimham nyalo dhi koda anatimne kaka idwaro kendo gimoro amora midwaro kuoma anatimni ji duto nongado aora jordan ruoth nodong ka goyo ni barzilai oriti nonyodhe kendo oguedhe eka barzilai nodok dalane bange ruoth nongado aora modhi nyaka gilgal ka jojuda duto kowe kaachiel gi joisrael moko kimham bende nodhi kode eka joisrael duto nobiro ir ruoth mi gipenje niya marango owetewa jojuda okawi lingling kendo okowi loka jordan kaachiel gi joodi gi jolwenji duto jojuda duto nodwoko joisrael niya ne watimo kamano nikech wan wat ruoth machiegni moloyo marango iu wang gi wachni bende uwinjo ni ruoth osemiyowa gimoro wachamo koso uparo ni osemiyowa mich moro joisrael nodwoko jojuda kendo niya wan dhoudi apar e piny daudi omiyo owinjore wabed kode moloyo un marango ujarowa donge wan ema ne wakwongo paro wach duogo ruoth kata kamano weche jojuda ne ger moloyo weche joisrael samuel nonyis joab ni ruoth ywak malit nikech absalom kendo mor mar odiechiengno nolokore mana ywak kuom jolweny duto kane giwinjo ni ruoth okuyo nikech wuode chiengono jolweny nodok mahanaim ka lidho mana kaka joma olo e lweny dwogo alucha ka wigi okuot noyudo ruoth ogengo wange kendo ywak gi dwol maduong niya yaye absalom wuoda absalom wuoda wuoda joab nodonjo ei ot ir ruoth mowachone niya kawuono jogi osereso ngimani kaachiel gi ngima yawuoti gi nyigi kod mondi ikuodo wigi nikech ihero jogo mochayi ichayo jogo moheri tinendeni isemiyo ji ongeyo ni ok ikwan jotend lweny gi jolwenji ka gimoro nimar aneno ni kada absalom bed mangima kawuono wan duto watho dibedo mamor omiyo wuogi iho chuny jogi nikech gi adiera e nying ruoth nyasaye ni ka ok itimo kamano onge kata ngat achiel ang nobed kodi otienoni kendo mano dibedni masira maduong moloyo masiche duto miseneno nyaka ia e nyathi mi ruoth nowuok mobet e kome e dhorangach kendo kane onyis ji ni ruoth obet kanyo ne gibiro e nyime giduto noyudo ka joisrael oseringo daudi oduogo jerusalem koko maduong ne nitie e dhout israel duto ka ji penjore niya ruoth daudi noresowa e lwet wasikwa kendo e lwet jofilistia koro oseringo oa e pinywa nikech absalom nopiem kode absalom mane wawiro mondo obed ruodhwa koro osetho e lweny marango waling alinga ok wachan kaka wanyalo duogo ruoth ruoth nowinjo wach joisrael omiyo nooro wach ni zadok gi abiathar jadolo kowachonigi ni mondo gipenj jodong juda niya marango un ema dubi achien kuom dwoka e dala un e jowetena kendo un e remba marango un ema dudong achien kuom dwoka e dala wachuru ni amasa bende ni donge ingeyo ni kod wan remo achiel nyasaye mondo okweda ka ok aketi jatend jolweny kar joab kamano noloko chuny jojuda duto mi ne gibet gi chuny achiel kendo ne giorone wach niya duogi
