sheba onganyo ruo wnda ne nitie jabenjamin moro kanyo achach nyinge sheba wuod bikri nogoyo tung kowacho niya waonge wat gi daudi ok wan libamba achiel gi wuod jesse wan joisrael wadoguru dala omiyo joisrael duto noweyo daudi kendo ne giluwo sheba wuod bikri jojuda nomedo kowo ruodhgi gi chuny achiel ka gia jordan nyaka jerusalem sam kane daudi ochopo e ode jerusalem nokawo monde apar noweyo ka rito dala mi noketogi e ot moro machielo kama ne gibedo kiritogie nomiyogi chiemo ne ok oriwore kodgi kendo kamano noloronigi nyaka chieng thogi ka gidak mana ka mond liete daudi nonyiso amasa niya chok jojuda duto kanyakla ibigo ira kapok ndalo adek orumo mi amasa nodhi choko jojuda nodeko mi kinde nomiye okadho eka daudi nowacho ni abishai niya koro sheba wuod bikri biro hinyowa moloyo absalom omiyo dhiyo gi jolwenja ilawe nimar dipo ka odonjo e mier mochiel gohinga kendo dotony moa e lweta abishai nowuok jerusalem kotelo ni joab gi jokereth gi jopeleth kod thwondi duto mondo gilaw sheba wuod bikri kane gichopo e lwanda maduong man gibeon ne gipo ka giromo gi amasa noyudo ka joab orwakore gi lep lweny ka en gi ligangla ei olalo moliero e okanda mane otueyo e nungone nosudo machiegni kopando gima odwaro timo nomoso amasa kopenje niya nadi omera eka nomako yie tik amasa gi lwete korachwich mondo onyodhe amasa ne ok odewo ligangla mane ni e lwet joab gikanyono joab nochwowo bund iye dichiel mak onwoyo mi jamb iye noo piny motho eka joab gi abishai owadgi nomedo lawo sheba wuod bikri ngat achiel kuom jolwenj joab nochung ringre amasa kawacho niya ji duto moyie joab kendo modok kor daudi mondo oluw bang joab ringre amasa noriere e dier yo kochadhore gi remo kendo ji duto mane luwo yorno ne chung ka ngiye kane ngatno oneno ni ji chung kanyo nogolo ringre amasa oko e yo moketo tenge kendo nobolo law kuome kane osegole e yo ji duto noluwo bang joab ka gilawo sheba wuod bikri sheba nolimo dhout israel duto nyaka nochopo abelbethmaaka kendo jobikri duto nochokore ire modonjo kode e dalano bange joab nobiro gi joge duto mi gilawo sheba e abelbethmaaka ne gigingo pith maduong dala eka ne gichako kunyo ohinga mondo osienyre dhako moro mariek mane nie dalano nokok matek niya uwinjo nyisuru joab obi ka mondo alos kode joab nosudo machiegni mi dhakono nopenje ni e joab nodwoko ni e eka dhakono nowachone niya ruoth winj wechena joab nodwoke ni wachi mi dhakono nowachone niya e ndalo machon ji ne biro abel mondo ongadnigie rieko kamano ne giwacho weche mathagogi dalawani en achiel kuom mier mabeyo kendo mokue moloyo e israel koro idwaro ketho dala maduong kama e israel marango idwaro ketho joruoth nyasaye joab nodwoke niya ooyo ok adwar tiekogi kata ketho gimoro ok en kamano ngat moro miluongo ni sheba wuod bikri modak e piny gode mag efraim ema osepiem gi ruoth daudi omiyo goluru mana ngatno kende eka abiro weyo dalani dhakono nowacho ni joab niya ber wabiro dironi wiye gi ewi ohinga eka dhakono nodhi ir jodalano duto moloso kodgi gi rieko mi ne gingado wi sheba wuod bikri kendo gidiro ni joab omiyo joab nogoyo tung kendo joge noweyo dalano modok miechgi joab nodok jerusalem ir ruoth jotend daudi samuel weche mag ndalo koro joab ne jatend jolweny duto benaya wuod jehoyada ne jatend jolweny mowuok jokereth gi jopeleth adoram ne jarit joma nichuno gi thwon mondo oti jehoshafat wuod ahilud ne jachan weche sheva ne jagoro kendo zadok gi abiathar ne jodolo ira jajair bende ne jadolo mar daudi samuel jogibeon ochulo kuor e ndalo daudi ne nitie kech kuom higni adek omiyo daudi nopenjo ruoth nyasaye wach gimomiyo kejno obiro ruoth nyasaye nodwoke niya ketho ni kuom saulo kod joodgi nikech nochuero remb jogibeon josh kuom mano ruoth noluongo jogibeon ire jogibeon ne ok gin joisrael ne gin joamor nodong mae joisarel otimogo winjruok kata kamano saulo ne dwaro negogi nikech nodwaro ni mondo joisrael gi jojuda ogurre motegno daudi nopenjo jogibeon niya ere gima anyalo timonu ere kaka dagol richono mondo umi hawi oduog ni joruoth nyasaye jogibeon nodwoke niya wach manie kindwa gi saulo kod joodgi ok en wach ditiek gi fedha kata dhahabu bende waonge gi teko mar nego jaisrael moro daudi nopenjogi kendo niya ere gima udwaro mondo atimnu ne gidwoke ni mondo watiek nying jal nohinyowa ka dwaro tiekowa ni kik wadag e piny israel miwa yawuote abiriyo mondo waneg e nyim ruoth nyasaye gibea dala saulo ruoth mane ruoth nyasaye oyiero daudi noyie mochiwogi sam sam ne ok ochiwo mefibosheth wuod jonathan wuod saulo nikech singruok notimo gi jonathan e nying ruoth nyasaye sam nokawo mana armoni gi mefibosheth yawuowi ariyo mane rizpa nyar aya onywolo ni saulo kod yawuowi abich mane merab nyar saulo onywolo ni adriel wuod barzilai jamehola jogo ema ne ruoth ochiwo ni jogibeon mi jogibeon nonegogi e nyim ruoth nyasaye e got ji abiriyogo duto notho kaachiel e ndalo keyo mar atamalo mar shairi rizpa nyar aya nopedho pien gugru ewi lwanda mobedoe chakre ndalo keyo nyaka koth nochue kendo notamo winy godiechieng kod ondiegi gotieno mondo kik cham ringre jogo kane onyis daudi gima rizpa nyar aya chi saulo otimo sam nodhi mokawo choke saulo kod choke jonathan wuod saulo kuomm jojabeshgilead noyudo jojabeshgilead osekawogi lingling e paw dala mar bethshan kama jofilistia nolierogie bang nego saulo gilboa daudi noomo choke saulo kod choke jonathan wuode kanyo kendo noketogi kaachiel gi choke joma oneg kande ne gikawo choke saulo gi mag jonathan wuode kaachiel gi mag joma noneg mi giyiko zeba e piny benjamin e liend kish wuon saulo ne gitimo duto mane ruoth ochiko kendo bang mano nyasaye nokecho pinygi abishai oreso daudi e lwet thwon marabet kinde moro jofilistia nochako omonjo joisrael mi daudi gi jolwenje nodhi mojot gob ne gikedo gi jofilistia nyaka daudi nodoko mool ne nitie jarefaim moro mathwon pek tonge ne dirom kilo adek notingo ligangla manyien kendo noparo ni doneg daudi ruo zab abishai wuod zeruya nobiro monego jafilistiano mi daudi otony bange jolwenj daudi nosayo daudi niya kik ichak idhi kodwa e lweny nimar dipo ka chieng moro onegi ema ibedonwa ka taya e israel joma rabede mane jodaudi onego weche mag ndalo bang mano lweny nochako owuok e kind joisrael gi jofilistia mi ne gikedo gob e lwenjno sibekai jahusha nonegoe saf jarefaim lweny nowuok kendo e kind joisrael gi jofilistia e gob mi elhanan wuod jair jabethlehem nonego goliath jagiti bond tonge ne chalo lodi lweny nochako owuok e gath kama ne nitie ngat magana rabora man gi lith lwedo auchiel gi lith tielo auchiel koni gi koni lith luetene gi mag tiendene duto koriw ne romo piero ariyo gangwen jalo bende ne jarefaim ka nothiano ni joisrael jonathan wuod shimea owadgi daudi nonege ji angwengo duto ne jorefaim oganda joma rabede daudi gi joge nonegogi duto samuel wend daudi mane opakogo nyasaye kuom rese zaburi kane daudi oneno ni ruoth nyasaye oserese e lwet saulo kendo e lwet wasike duto nopake gi wer kama ruoth nyasaye e lwandana kendo ohingana nyasacha e jaresna gi lwandana agengorae e okumbana gi teko mar resruokna e ohingana gi kar gengruokna kendo jawarna ema iresa kuom masiche mager akwayo ruoth nyasaye mowinjore oyud pak kendo resa kuom wasika tho notaga ka apaka kodwaro tera kaka ohula tonde mag liel nodhoga tho ne dwaro maka kobadho kane anie chandruok nakwayo ruoth nyasaye ee naywak ni nyasacha nowinjo dwonda gie hekalu mare kendo ywakna nochopo e ite piny notetni kendo oyiengni mise mag polo bende notetni kendo okirni nikech mirimb ruoth nyasaye iro nodum ka wuok e ume kendo mach mangangni bende nowuok e dhoge nosudo polo machiegni eka nolor konyono rumbi molil ti ne oidho kerubi mi ohuyogo ka kalausi nokawo mudho kod boche polo morweyo gi koth maduong moloko ka hembe ler motelo e nyime nomoko mach motimo ligega dwond ruoth nyasaye nomor ee ngama duong moloyo nomor gie polo nodiro mor polo ka aserni kokworogi koni gi koni kane ruoth nyasaye okudho ka yamb nyakoi kendo okwerogi mise mag piny noelore kendo kude mag nam nofwenyore norieyo bade ka en malo mi omaka kogola e atarongala ne oresa e lwet wasika marateke kendo kuom ji duto mosin koda mane oloya gi teko ne gimonja ka anie masira ruoth nyasaye ema nokonya ne ogola e chandruok mi abedo thuolo noresa nikech nomor koda ruoth nyasaye ne opoga pok mowinjore gi timna makare nochula moromo gi tichna maler nikech naluwo yorene kendo ok asepogora kod nyasacha kadonjo e richo aserito chikene duto onge kata achiel apogorago aonge gi ketho e nyim ruoth nyasaye kendo aseritora kuom richo omiyo osemiya pok mowinjore gi timna makare kendo mowinjore gi tim malongo e nyime ruoth nyasaye jaadiera ni ji mohero adiera kendo ilongo ni joma longo iler ni joma ler wiyi tek ni joma wigi tek ireso joma muol josunga idwoko piny ruoth nyasaye e tacha e nyasacha menyona mudho imiyo aloyo oganda lwenja kendo e nyasacha konya kalo ohinga yor nyasaye en yo malongo osenon wach ruoth nyasaye moyud ni en adier ruoth nyasaye e okumba mar joma ogeno kuome ere nyasaye moro mak mana ruoth nyasachwa koso ere lwanda moro mak mana nyasachwani nyasayeni e kar pondona motegno osemiyo yorena bedo thuolo kendo moboch hab en ema omiyo tienda bedo mayot ka tiend mwanda kendo oresa koketa malo kama otingore ojiwo bada ni lweny mi onyalo ywayo kata mana atung mar mula ruoth nyasaye isekelona resruok mobedona okumba kendo konyni ema nomiyo abedo gi duong ne imiya yo malach mondo awuothie mi ne ok akier nalawo wasika mi atiekogi kendo ne ok aduogo dala ka pok girumo nagoyogi ngoga mi atiekogi ne giriere piny e tienda ok ginyal chung nimiya teko mar kedo kendo mar loyo wasika ne imiyo wasika oringa mi atiekogi ne girango koni gi koni onge ngamaa ne nyalo resogi ne giywak ni ruoth nyasaye ne ok oduokogi ne aregogi mayom mana ka buru yamo tero mi anyonogi ka chuodho ne iresa kuom joma piem koda kendo niketa jatelo mar ogendini mi ji mane pok angeyo notiyona joma oa e pinje mamoko ne biro ira kobolore kane giwinjo humba ne giyie lochna mana gikanyono chunygi nool mi ne giwuok ka gitetni kuma ne gipondoe ruoth nyasaye nitie en e lwandana pakeuru ee odend nying nyasacha lwanda mar resruokna en nyasaye mane omiya teko mar chulo kuor koketo ogendini e bwo lochna kendo kogola kuom wasika en e ruoth nyasaye mane omiyo aloyo joma ne piem koda kendo oresa kuom jomahundu rumi kuom mano anapake kuom kind ogendini adier anapak nyinge gi wer nyasaye kelo resruok maduong ni ruoth moketo ee ohero ngat moyiero gi hera mosiko en mana daudi gi kotha nyaka chieng samuel weche mogik mag daudi koro magi e weche mogik mag daudi wuod jesse ngat momus duong adier ruoth mowir mane nyasach jakobo oyiero kendo mane jachuog wende mamit e israel nowacho kama roho mar ruoth nyasaye ema miya weche mawacho kendo wachne nie dhoga nyasach jakobo lwanda mar israel oseloso kowacho niya ka ruoth rito ji gi bura makare nikech oluoro nyasaye lochne chalo gi ler mar wangchieng mopilore gokinyi ka boche polo onge kendo mamiyo lum loth bang koth donge kamano e kaka oda obet e nyim nyasaye nikech osetimo koda singruok mosiko mochan kare kendo ok nyal lokore oseguedho gik moko konya kendo adwaro joma ok oluoro nyasaye chalo gi kudho moke ok nyal choki gi lwedo ngat manyalo dwarogi nyaka konyre gi nyinyo kata gi bond tong eka bange owanggi chutho gi mach thuondi mag daudi weche mag ndalo koro thuondi mane daudi nigo e ndalone e magi joshebbashebeth jatakemon ne jatend thuondi adek madongo en ema nonego ji mia aboro gi tong odiechieng achiel ngat mane luwe ne eleazar wuod dodo jaahohi ne en gi daudi pasdamin kama ne jofilistia ochokoree ni lweny joisrael noringo en nochung kanyo monego jofilistia nyaka bade nojony mi ligangla nomoko e lwete kendo ruoth nyasaye nomiyogi loch maduong chiengono kane jolweny oduogo ir eleazar bang ringo koro ne odongnigi mana dedo joma otho ngat mar adek ne shama wuod agee jaharar jofilistia nochokore lehi kama ne nitie puoth ngor moro jolweny moko duto noringo jofilistia en nodong e puodhono korite kendo nonego jofilistiago kamano ruoth nyasaye nomiyogi loch maduong chieng moro kane oyudo jolweny mag jofilistia ojot e holo mar refaim e kinde mar keyo ji adek kuom thuondi piero adek madongo kande nodhi ir daudi e holo mar adulaim kindego daudi ne nie rogo jolweny mag jofilistia nosekawo bethlehem daudi noomo chunye ka siso omake mowacho niya mad ngato kelna pi soko man ranga bethlehem mondo amodhi eka thwondi adekgo nomwomo oganda lweny mar jofilistia ne gidhi omo pi sokono mi gikelo ni daudi nodagi modho pigno moole piny ka misango ni ruoth nyasaye kowacho niya ruoth nyasaye mondo orita kik amodh pigni nikech ochalo mana remb jogo mane odhi ome koyie wito ngimagi mano emomiyo daudi notamore modhe gik kamago ema thuondi adekgo ne timo abishai owadgi joab wuod zeruya ema ne jatend thwondi piero adekgo nonego ji mia adek gi tong mi nobedo ngat marahuma kuom thuondigo ne en rahuma moloyo kuomgi mobedo jatendgi kata kamano ne ok ochopo e ranginy mar ji adek kande benaya wuod jehoyada thwon kabzeel marahuma notimo timbe thwon mangeny bende nonego thwond moab ariyo chieng moro kane kodh pe osechue nolor e bur monego sibuor kanyo bende en ema nonego jamisri marabet jamisrino ne nigi tong benaya nodhine gi odunga noyudho tong e lwet jamisrino monegego timbe machal kamago ema benaya wuod jehoyada oyudogo huma kaachiel gi thwondi piero adek kande ne en rahuma moloyo ji piero adekgo kata kamano ne ok ochopo e ranginy mag thuondi adek madongo kande daudi nokete jatend joge mag lweny mane rito ngimane asahel owadgi joab ne achiel kuom ji piero adekgo jomoko ne gin elhanan wuod dodo jabethlehem kod shama gi elika joharod gi helez japalti gi ira wuod ikesh jatekoa gi abiezer jaanathoth gi sibekai jahusha gi zalmon jaahohi kod maharai gi itai wuod ribai jagibea e piny benjamin gi benaya japirathon gi hidai jagaash piny aore gi abialbon jaarbath gi azmoth jabahurim gi eliaba ja shalbon gi hashem jagizon kod jonathan wuod shama gi ahiam wuod sharar joharar gi elifelet wuod ahasbai jamaaka gi eliam wuod ahithofel jagilo gi hezro jakarmel gi paarai jaarbi gi igal wuod nathan jazoba gi ban jagad gi zelek jaamon gi naharai jabeeroth mane jating gilweny mag joab wuod zeruya kod ira gi gareb joithri kod uria jahiti duto ne gin ji piero adek gariyo samuel daudi okwano joisrael gi jojuda weche mag ndalo mirima nochako omako ruoth nyasaye kod joisrael mi nomiyo daudi otimo gimoro dihinygi kowachone niya dhiyo ikwan joisrael gi jojuda omiyo ruoth nowacho ni joab gi jotend lweny mane ni kode niya dhiuru koro uwuoth e dhout israel duto chakre dan nyaka beersheba kukwano ji mondo unge kar rombgi joab nodwoko ruoth niya ruoth nyasaye nyasachi mondo omedni ji nyadi mia achiel kapod wangi neno marango iketo chunyi e wachni kata kamano ruoth nochuno joab gi jotend lweny mi ne giwuok mondo gikwan joisrael ne gingado aora jordan mi gichako kweno aroer kod dala manie holono ka gichiko gad nyaka jazer eka ne gidhi dan mi kane giwuok kuro ne giluwo piny nyaka sidon gi dala turo mochiel gi ohinga kod mier duto mag johivi gi mag jokanaan achien ne gidhi nyaka beersheba yo thim juda bang dueche ochiko gi ndalo piero ariyo kane gisewuotho e pinygi duto ne giduogo jerusalem joab nonyiso ruoth kar romb ji kama e piny israel ne nitie ji alufu mia aboro nyalo kedo jojuda ne gin alufu mia abich kane daudi osekwano ji chunye nochande mowacho ni ruoth nyasaye niya ruoth nyasaye aseketho ahinya kuom gima asetimo koro asayi ni mondo iwena richona nikech asetimo gima ofuwo eka kane daudi ochiew gokinyi noyudo ka ruoth nyasaye osenyiso gad janabi mane jakor wach ni daudi kowachone niya dhiyo inyis daudi ni ruoth nyasaye osewacho kama aketo gik moko adek e nyimi yier achiel kuomgi monego atimni omiyo gad nodhi ir daudi mopenje niya ere gima iyiero idwaro mondo kech omak pinyu kuom higni adek koso idwaro ringo wasiki kuom dueche adek ka gilawi koso tho malit mondo obed e pinyu kuom ndalo adek parane inyisa gima dadwok jal moora daudi nodwoko gad niya gi masira maduong ber mondo wabed e lwet ruoth nyasaye nimar ngwonone duong kik abed e lwet dhano omiyo ruoth nyasaye nooro tho malit kuom joisrael chakre okinyi nyaka chop kinde noketo ji alufu piero abiriyo notho chakre dan nyaka beersheba kane malaika orieyo bade kochiko jerusalem mondo oketh dalano ruoth nyasaye noloko parone kuom masira nodwaro timo mowacho ni malaika mane nego ji niya oromo koro dwok lweti noyudo ka malaika mar ruoth nyasaye obet kar dino mar arauna jajebus kane daudi oneno malaika mane nego ji nowacho ni ruoth nyasaye niya e jakwath moseketho kendo ema asetimo gima rach ere rach ogandani osetimo akwayi ni ema mondo ikuma kod dhoodwa chiengno gad nodhi ir daudi mowachone ni dhiyo kar dino mar arauna jajebus igerie ni ruoth nyasaye kendomarmisango omiyo kane daudi owinjo wachno nodhi kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike kane arauna oneno ruoth gi joge ka biro ire nowuok modhi romone kendo nogoyo chonge piny mokulorene nyaka e lowo arauna nopenjo ruoth niya marango ibiro ira daudi nodwoke ni adwaro ngiewo kodi kar dinoni mondo agerie ni ruoth nyasaye kendomarmisango mondo tho nego joga orum arauna nowacho ni daudi niya ruoth kaw akawa gimoro amora chunyi dwaro ichiw ni nyasaye ruedhi nitie minyalo timogo misango kendo yien mag dino cham kendo jok motue e ngut dhok minyalo chwako ruoth magi duto amiyi eka arauna nomedo wacho ni ruoth niya ruoth nyasaye nyasachi mondo oyie gi chiwoni ruoth nodwoke ni ooyo nyaka achuli nikech ok natim ni ruoth nyasaye nyasacha misengni gi gik mayudo nono omiyo daudi nochulo fedha dirom nu kilo kongiewogo kar dino kaachiel gi ruedhigo eka nogero ni ruoth nyasaye kendomarmisango kanyono motimoe misengni miwango pep kod mag sawo ruoth nyasaye nowinjo lemo nochiwne kendo nogengo tho malitno mondo kik oneg joisrael ruodhi abishag tiyo ni daudi ruoth daudi koro noseti kendo hike ne oniang kata ne oume gi lep nindo pod ne ok onyal yudo liet emomiyo jotichne ne owachone niya yie mondo wadwarni nyako manyalo tiyoni kendo riti bende nonind buti mondo iyud liet omiyo ne gidwaro nyako jaber e piny israel duto nyaka ne giyudo abishag nyar shunam mi ne gikele ir ruoth nyakono ne jaber ahinya norito ruoth kotiyone ruoth ne ok riwre kode adonija wuod hagith nochako kawore kaparo ni nobed ruoth nongiewo geche lweny gi joidh farese kod gi ji piero abich mane telo nyime nyaka oa e tinne wuon mare ne pok otale adonija ne wuod daudi mane jalup absalom kendo ne en gi chia kaka owadgino noloso gi joab wuod zeruya kod abiathar jadolo mi jogo nodokne kendo ne gikonye zadok jadolo gi nathan janabi gi shimei gi rei kod thuondi mag daudi ne ok odokne adonija noyango rombe gi rwedhi kod dhok machwe kotimogo misango lwanda mar zoheleth man enrogel nogwelo owetene duto yawuot ruoth kod jodong juda duto ne ok ogwelo nathan janabi gi benaya kod thuondi kande kata solomon owadgi bende ne ok ogwelo eka nathan nowacho ni bathsheba min solomon niya donge isewinjo ni adonija wuod hagith osebedo ruoth ruodhwa daudi ok ongeyo koro yiena mondo angadni rieko minyalo resogo ngimani gi ngima solomon wuodi dhi ir ruoth daudi kendo penje niya ruodha donge isesingorina ni solomon wuoda ema nobed ruoth kari kendo nobed e kom duongni ka en kamano ango momiyo adonija osebedo ruoth ka pod iwuoyo gi ruoth kamano anadonj bangi mondo asir weche miwachogo omiyo bathsheba nodonjo e od ruoth ndalogo daudi noseti ahinya kendo abishag nyar shunam ne tiyone bathsheba nolungore ni ruoth ka miye duong mi ruoth nopenje gima odwaro en nodwoke niya ruodha nisingorina e nying ruoth nyasaye nyasachi ni solomon wuoda ema nobed ruoth kari kobet e kom duong mari koro adonija osebet ruoth kakia osetimo misango gi ruedhi kod dhok machwe gi rombe mathoth kendo osegwelo yawuot ruoth duto kod abiathar jadolo gi joab jatend jolweny ok ogwelo solomon wuodi koro ruodha joisrael rito wachni mondo inyisgi ngat nobed ruoth kari ka ok itimo kamano wan gii solomon wuoda wanane masira kisetho kane bathsheba pod wuoyo gi ruoth nathan janabi nodonjo mi onyis ruoth ni nathan janabi dwaro nene nochopo ir ruoth mogoyo chonge piny kokulorene nyaka e lowo eka nopenjo ruoth niya isewacho ni adonija ema nobed ruoth kari kendo nobed e kom duongni osedhi mwalo moyango ruedhi gi dhok machwe kod rombe mogundho osegwelo yawuot ruoth duto kaachiel gi joab jatend jolweny kod abiathar jadolo kendo koro gibet piny kode ka gichiemo kendo gimetho giwacho niya ruoth adonija mondo odag aminga gi zadok jadolo gi benaya wuod jehoyada kod solomon wuodi ne ok ogwelowa ema iyienigi mondo gitim kamano koso mak inyisowa ngama nobed ruoth kari oket solomon ruoth ruoth daudi nodwoko niya luongna bathsheba obi ka mi nobiro mochung e nyim ruoth eka ruoth nokuongore kowacho niya adier gi nying ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel mosereso ngimana e masiche duto ne akuongora ni solomon wuodi ema nobed ruoth banga e kom duongna kawuono eka abiro chopo gima nakuongora bathsheba nogoyo chonge piny mokulore nyaka e lowo komiyo ruoth duong mi nowacho niya ruodha mondo idag nyaka chieng eka ruoth daudi nowacho niya luongnauru zadok jadolo gi nathan janabi kod benaya wuod jehoyada jobi ira mi ne gibiro e nyime nowachonigi niya dhiuru gi askechena uket solomon wuoda e kanja kendo ukowe nyaka gihon kama zadok jadolo gi nathan janabi biro wiree gi mo mondo obed ruodh israel bange ugo tung kendo ukog niya ruoth solomon mondo odag aminga eka uluw bange kuduoge ka mondo obed e kom duongna nikech asekete ruoth kara kendo aseyiere mondo obed jatend joisrael gi jojuda benaya wuod jehoyada nodwoko ruoth niya obed kamano ruoth nyasaye nyasachi mondo oyie otimre kamano ruoth nyasaye mondo obed gi solomon kaka ne en kodi kendo lochne obed maduong moloyo mari eka zadok jadolo gi nathan janabi kod benaya wuod jehoyada kaachiel gi jokereth kod jopeleth nomiyo solomon oidho kanyna mar ruoth daudi mi ne gilor ka gikowe nyaka gihon zadok jadolo nokawo tung mar mo mane ogolo e hemb nyasaye mowirogo solomon kuno eka ne gigoyo tung kendo ji duto nokok niya ruoth solomon mondo odag aminga bange ji duto noluwe ka giduoge ne gigoyo asili kendo ne gimor gi mor maduong mi piny noyiengni nikech koko margi adonija gi welo duto mane ni kode nowinjo kokono ka noyudo gitieko chiemo joab ka nowinjo tung ka ywak nopenjo niya ere gimomiyo dala otimo mahu kane joab pod loso jonathan wuod abiathar jadolo nochopo adonija nokone ni donji ngama ber kendo ageno ni ikelo wach maber jonathan nodwoke niya ok kamano ruodhwa daudi oseketo solomon ruoth nooro zadok jadolo gi nathan janabi kod benaya wuod jehoyada kaachiel gi jokereth gi jopeleth mondo okow solomon koidho kanyna mar ruoth kendo zadok jadolo gi nathan janabi josewire gi mo soko gihon mondo obed ruoth koro gisea kuro gi ilo emomiyo dala otimo mahu kendo mano e koko musewinjo solomon koro obet e kom ruoth moloyo jodong ruoth bende nobiro mopako ruodhwa daudi ka giwacho niya nyasachi mondo omi nying solomon obed gi huma moloyo nyingi kendo omi lochne duong moloyo mari mi ruoth daudi nokulore e kitandane mowacho ni apako ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel moseyiena mondo ane wuoda kobet e kom duongna kawuono eka luoro nomako wend adonija duto mi gia malo kendo ngato ka ngato nodok dalane adonija bende noluoro solomon mi nodhi momako tunge mag kendomarmisango nonyis solomon niya adonija oluori omiyo osemako tunge mag kendomarmisango kowacho niya ruoth solomon mondo okuongrena ni ok nonega solomon nowacho ni ka timbene nonyiswa ni en ngama kare onge kata yie wiye achiel nolwar piny ka noyud kuome ketho moro nonege eka ruoth solomon nooro wach kendo ne gigole oko e kendomarmisango nobiro mokulore ni ruoth mi ruoth nowachone ni dog dalani ruodhi daudi olemo ni solomon kane daudi chiegni tho nolemo ni solomon wuode niya eri adhi kuma ji duto mae piny dhiye bed motegno kinyiso ni dichwo mak chik ruoth nyasaye nyasachi kiwuotho e yorene kendo kimako wechene gi chikene kod buchene kaka ondiki e chik musa kamoro amora midhiye kamano ruoth nyasaye nochopo singruok mane otimona kowachona ni ka yawuoti noritre kendo nowuoth e nyima gi adiera gi chunygi duto kod parogi duto nyikwayi nobed ruodhi mag israel nyaka chieng bende ingeyo gima joab wuod zeruya notimona ne onego abner wuod ner kod amasa wuod jether mane jotend jolwenj israel e ndalo kue nochulo kuor kuom gima notimore e lweny kokelona buch remo nikech tho mar ngat makare omiyo ti gi riekoni wiye oseti lwar kik iwe otho gi kue tim maber ni jood barzilai jagilead kendo ikonygi nikech ne girwaka gi ngwono kane aringo absalom owadu kik wiyi wil gii shimei wuod gera jabenjamin moa bahurim nikech nokuonga gi kuonga malit chieng mane awuok kadhi mahanaim bang kane romona e aora jordan nakuongorane gi nying ruoth nyasaye ni ok nanege koro kik iweye mak ikume ngat mariek kendo ibiro ngeyo ngama owinjore itim mondo otho tho mar masira kata obedo ni wiye oseti lwar kamano tho mar daudi weche mag ndalo kamano daudi notho moluwo kwerene kendo noyike jerusalem nobet ruodh israel kuom higni piero angwen e hebron nobedoe ruoth kuom higni abiriyo e jerusalem higni piero adek gadek koro solomon nobet ruoth kar daudi wuon mare kendo lochne nogurore motegno solomon oguro lochne adonija wuod hagith nodhi ir bathsheba min solomon bathsheba nopenje niya ibiro gi kue koso nodwoke ni ee abiro gi kue adwaro kwayi gimoro bathsheba nokone ni wachi eka nowacho niya ingeyo ni yande loch onego bed mara kendo joisrael duto nogeno ni ema nabed ruoth wach olokore kendo owadwa osebet ruoth nikech nyasaye ema omiye koro adwaro kwayi gimoro achiel kik itama bathsheba nokone ni kwa akwaya nowacho niya asayi kwa ruoth solomon mondo omiya abishag nyar shunam obed chiega nikech ok onyal tami nodwoke ni ber abiro wuoyoni gi ruoth omiyo bathsheba nodhi ir ruoth solomon mondo okwaye gima adonija dwaro ruoth nochung ka dhi romo ni min mokulorene eka nobet e kom duongne kendo nochiko jotich mondo okel kom ni min mare mondo obed e bade korachwich bathsheba nowachone niya gi kwayo matin kik idagi ruoth nodwoke ni kwa akwaya mama ok nadagi nowacho niya yie mondo abishag nyar shunam obed chi adonija owadu ruoth solomon nopenjo min mare ni ango momiyo ikwaya mondo abishag nyar shunam obed chi adonija chal ka gima ikwaya mana ni mondo amiye loch nimar en owadwa maduong kendo abiathar jadolo gi joab wuod zeruya jodokne bang mano ruoth solomon nokuongore gi nying ruoth nyasaye kowacho niya nyasaye mondo okweda ka adonija ok otho nikech wachni gi nying ruoth nyasaye mosemiyo agurora motegno e loch kar daudi wuora kendo mosemiyo jodhooda obedo jotelo kaka nosingore akuongora ni adonija biro tho kawuono kuom mano ruoth solomon nooro benaya wuod jehoyada monego adonija ruoth nowacho ni abiathar jadolo niya dog anathoth dalau owinjore itho kata kamano koro ok nanegi nikech nitingo sanduk mar ruoth nyasaye e nyim daudi wuora kendo nineno chandruok kaachiel kode omiyo solomon nogolo abiathar ni kik obed jadolo mar ruoth nyasaye kamano wach mane ruoth nyasaye owacho shilo kuom od eli nochopo kare kane joab owinjo wachno noringo odhi e hema mar nyasaye momako tunge kendomarmisango nimar nodok ni adonija kata obedo ni ne ok odok ni absalom e kinde mane absalom onganyoe nonyis solomon ni joab oseringo odhi e od hema mar ruoth nyasaye mobet e bath kendomarmisango mi solomon nooro benaya wuod jehoyada kochike ni dhiyo inege omiyo benaya nodhi e hema mar ruoth nyasaye mowacho ni joab niya ruoth owacho ni mondo iwuogi joab nodagi kowacho ni ooyo atho mana ka eka benaya nokelo ni ruoth wach mane joab odwoke ruoth nokone niya tim kaka owacho nege kendo iyike mondo igol oko remo mane ochuero kayiem kik sik kuoma kendo kuom od wuora ruoth nyasaye biro kume kuom remo nochwero nikech nonego ji ariyo makare moloyo gi ber nonego abner wuod ner jatend jolweny mag israel kod amasa jotend jolweny mag juda kane daudi wuora kia emomiyo rembgi mondo obed ewi joab gi kothe nyaka chieng ruoth nyasaye mondo omed kue ni daudi gi kothe gi ode kod lochne nyaka chieng eka benaya wuod jehoyada nodhi monego joab mi noyik joab e dalane e thim ruoth noketo benaya wuod jehoyada jatend jolweny kar joab zadok jadolo noketo kar abiathar eka ruoth noluongo shimei mowachone niya ger ot jerusalem idagie kik iwuog oko ngang nikech chieng iniwuogie kingado aora kidron bed kingeyo ni nonegi rembi nodong e wiyi iwuon shimei nodwoko ruoth ni gima iwacho ber anatim kamano mi shimei nodak jerusalem kuom ndalo mangeny bang higni adek wasumb shimei ariyo noringo adhi ir akish wuod maaka ruodh gath kane onyis shimei ni wasumbni mage ni gath nogawo kanyna moidho kodhi ir akish dwarogi kamano noomogi gath moduogogi ka nonyis solomon ni shimei osewuok jerusalem odhi gath kendo oseduogo noluongo shimei mowachone niya namiyo ikuongori e nying ruoth nyasaye kendo asiemi matek kawachoni ni nge adier ni chieng iniwuog oko kidhi kamoro amora nonegi kendo kidwoka ni anatim kaka iwacho marango nitamori rito singruok nitimo e nying ruoth nyasaye kod chik mane aketoni ruoth nomedo wacho ni shimei niya ingeyo richo duto mane itimo ni daudi wuora emomiyo ruoth nyasaye nodwok richoni e wiyi solomon nayud gueth kendo loch daudi nogurre e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyaka chieng eka ruoth nochiko benaya wuod jehoyada mondo oneg shimei mi benaya nowuok oko monege kamano loch nogurore e lwet solomon ruodhi solomon okendo nyar farao solomon nokendo nyar farao ruodh misri kokelogo winjruok e pinjegi kendo nokele e dala daudi gi od ruoth nyasaye kod ohinga molworo jerusalem ji ne pod timo misango e hembko mane ni kuonde motingore nikech ot moger ni ruoth nyasaye ne pod onge ndalogo solomon nohero ruoth nyasaye koluwo chik daudi wuon mare mak mana ni notimo misango kendo nowango ubani e hembko mane ni kuonde motingore solomon okwayo nyasaye rieko weche mag ndalo ruoth solomon ne jadhi gibeon mondo otim misango nikech ne en hembko mongere moloyo kendo nothoro timo misengni miwango pep alufu achiel e kar misangono kane solomon odhi dalano ruoth nyasaye nofwenyorene e lek gotieno mowachone ni kwa gima idwaro mondo amiyi solomon nodwoke niya ninyiso hera mosiko ni daudi wuora jatichni mane wuotho e nyimi gi adiera kendo kuom dimbruok gi chuny makare bende pod inyise hera mosikono nyaka chil kawuono nimar isemiyo wuode obedo ruoth kare koroni ruoth nyasaye nyasacha iseketa ruoth kar daudi wuora pod rawera mayot kendo akia kaka onego awuoth e nyim ji iseketa e kind jogi miseyiero gin ji mathoth mokadho akwana emomiyo yie imiya chuny mariek manyalo yango gima ber gi gima rach mondo angadgo ni jogi bura nikech ere ngama dinyal ngado bura ni jogi mangenygi ruoth nyasaye ne mor nikech solomon nokwayo kamano omiyo nodwoke niya nikech ikwayo wachni ok ikwayo ni mondo idag aminga kata mondo iyud mwandu kata mondo iketh ngima wasiki ikwayo mana rieko mar ngado bura kare koro atimoni kaka isekwayo amiyi chuny mar rieko kod mar ngeyo pok onywolie ngat machal kodi bende ok nonywol moro bangi mago mane ok ikwayo bende amedi gin mwandu kod duong onge ruoth moro amora dibed marom kodi ka pod ingima bende kiluwo yorena kendo imako chikena gi buchena kaka daudi wuoru notimo namedni ndalo eka solomon nochiew moyudo ni kara en mana lek nodok jerusalem mochung e nyim sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye kotimo misengni miwango pep kod mag sawo kendo noloso ni jotichne duto sawo maduong solomon ongado bura gi rieko chieng moro mon ariyo jochode nobiro ir ruoth mi ochung e nyime dhako achiel nowacho niya yaye ruodha wadak gi dhani e ot achiel kendo nanywolo nyathi ka wan kode e odno bang ndalo adek dhani bende nonywol ne wan kendwa e ot ne onge ngat moro machielo mak mana wan ji ariyo nyathi dhani notho gotieno nikech nonindo kuome eka noa malo dier otieno mokawo wuoda buta ka nindo otera mi opielo e kore wuode motho nopielo e kora kane achiew mondo adhodh nyathina nayudo kosetho kane anone maber gokinyi nayudo ni ok en nyathi manywolo eka dhako machielo nowacho niya ooyo nyathi mangima e mara motho e mari dhako mokwongo nodwoko ni ooyo nyathi motho e mari mangima e mara kamano e kaka ne gimino wach e nyim ruoth eka ruoth nowacho niya dhako achiel wacho niya nyathi mangima e wuoda motho e wuodi machielo wacho ni ooyo ema wuodi otho wuoda ema ngima kane ruoth osewacho kamano nokwayo mondo okelne ligangla kendo kane gisekelonego nowacho niya poguru nyathi mangima diere mondo umi dhako achiel konchiel komachielo umi dhako machielo dhako mane nyathine ngima nohero wuode ahinya omiyo nosayo ruoth kowacho niya yaye ruoth mi dhani nyathi mangima kik inege ngang dhako machielo nowacho ni ok enobed mara kata mari poge apoga eka ruoth nodwoko ni miuru dhako mokwongono nyathi mangima kik unege ngang nikech en e min mare joisrael duto nowinjo bura mane ruoth ongado mi ne giluore nikech ne gineno ni rieko nyasaye ni kuome ka konye ngado bura makare ruodhi jodong solomon solomon nobedo ruodh joisrael duto kendo magi ne jodonge azaria wuod zadok ne jadolo maduong elihoref gi ahija yawuot shisha ne jogoro jehoshafat wuod ahiud ne jachan weche benaya wuod jehoyada ne jatend jolweny zadok gi abiathar ne jodolo azaria wuod nathan ne jatend jodong piny zebud wuod bethshemesh kod elonbethhanan wuod hesed ne rito aruboth kaachiel gi soko kod piny hefer duto wuod abinadab chiege tafath nyar solomon ne rito piny dor duto baana wuod ahilud ne rito taanak gi megido nyaka bethshean chakre kama yo lorie koa jezreel dhi bethshean mopowore nyaka abelmehola mokiewo gi zerethan kendo nyaka loka jokmeam wuod geber ne rito piny ramothgilead pinyno ema miech jair wuod manase man gilead ne nitie kod piny argob man bashan mier piero auchiel mochiel gi ohinga kendo man gi lodi mag mula ahinadab wuod iddo ne rito mahanaim ahimaaz nokendo basemath nyar solomon ne rito piny naftali baana wuod hushai ne rito piny asher kod bealoth jehoshafat wuod parua ne rito piny isakar shimei wuod ela ne rito piny benjamin geber wuod uri ne rito piny gilead enie piny mane sihon ruodh joamor kod og ruodh bashan rito chon ne nitie jaduong achiel kende mane rito piny juda rieko solomon gi mwandune jojuda gi joisrael ne ngeny ka kuoyo mae dhonam ne gidak gi kue kendo gi mor solomon nobedo ruodh pinje duto chakre aora yufrate nyaka piny jofilistia kod tong piny misri jopinjego duto ne chulo osuru kendo ne tiyo ni solomon kuom ndalo duto mag ngimane chiemo mane ikelo ni solomon odiechieng kodiechieng ne romo kama gunde piero auchiel mag mogo mayom gi gunde mia achiel gi piero ariyo mag mogo amoga gi ruedhi apar machwe kwayo kama ochiel gi ruedhi piero ariyo kwayo e pinye duto e ndalo solomon duto jojuda gi joisrael duto nodak e miechgii gii kue chakre dan yo nyandwat nyaka beersheba yo milambo solomon ne nigi udi alufu piero angwen moger ni farese mag gechene bende ne en gi joidh geche alufu piero angwen moger ni farese mag gechene bende ne en gi joidh farese alufu apar gariyo jodong gwenge kande ne kelo chiemo ni ruoth solomon kod jogo duto mane chiemo e dalane ngato ka ngato ne kelo chiemo kamano e due moketne mak gimoro orem ne gitero bende shairi gi lum mag farese gi mag kenje kamoro amora mane idwarogie nyasaye nomiyo solomon rieko gi winjo mathoth kod paro malach ka nam kuom mano rieko solomon noyombo rieko mar jo yo wuokchieng duto noloyo bende rieko duto mag jomisri noriek moloyo ji duto kata ethan jaezra gi heman gi kalkol kod darda yawuot mahol humbe nolak e pinje duto mokiewo kode koni gi koni nochuogo ngeche alufu adek kendo wende moromo alufu achiel kod abich nowuoyo kuom kit yien duto kochako gi sida madongo man lebanon nyaka okinga mati e kind kite mag ohinga nowuoyo bende kuom le gi winy gi gik mamol kendo kuom rech ji ne biro koa e ogendini duto mondo owinj rieko solomon ruodhi duto mag piny ngima mane osewinjo humb riekone bende ne biro ire ruodhi solomon otimo winjruok gi hiram ruodh turo weche mag ndalo kane hiram ruodh turo owinjo ni solomon osewir moket ruoth kar daudi wuon mare nooro joote ire nikech yande ne ohero daudi eka solomon nooro ni hiram wach niya ingeyo ni daudi wuora ne ok nyal gero hekalu ni ruoth nyasaye nyasache nikech lwenje mane wasike olworego nyaka ruoth nyasaye noketogi e bwo lochne koro ruoth nyasaye nyasacha osemiya kue kuonde duto kendo aonge gi wasigu kata masira moro emomiyo koro adwaro gero ni ruoth nyasaye nyasacha ka aluwo singruok mane omiyo daudi wuora kowacho niya wuodi naket ruoth kari ema nogerna hekalu omiyo koro yie ichik ji mondo otongna yiend sida mag lebanon jotichna nonywak tich kod jotichni kendo anamiyi chudo mag jotichni kaka ichano nikech onge ngato kuomwa mongeyo tongo yien machal gi josidon kane hiram owinjo weche solomon nomor ahinya mowacho niya apako ruoth nyasaye tinendeni mosemiyo daudi wuowi man gi rieko mondo otel ni oganda maduong kamano nooro ni solomon wach niya asewinjo wach miorona kendo aikora timo gik moko duto midwaro kuom wach yiend sida gi yiend saipras jotichna nogolgi lebanon kendo notergi nyaka e dhonam mi notuegi kanyakala mondo okwanggi e nam nyaka kuma idwaro joga nogony yiengo kanyono kendo inikawgi kichiwo chiemo moromo jooda inichop dwarona eka hiram nomiyo solomon yien duto modwaro kendo higa ka higa solomon ne miyo hiram gunde alufu piero ariyo mag cham mondo obed chiemb joode kod mo dirom depe alufu piero ariyo gabich ruoth nyasaye nomiyo solomon rieko kaka nosesingorene kue ne nitie e kind hiram gi solomon kendo ne gitimo winjruok solomon nochuno ji alufu piero adek kuom joisrael duto mondo oti gi thwon due ka due nooro ji alufu apar kuomgi lebanon ne gitiyo kuno kuom due achiel ne giyueyo dala kuom dueye ariyo adoram ne en jarit joma nichuno mondo oti gi thwongo bende solomon ne nigi joting misike alufu piero abiriyo kod jopecho alufu piero aboro mane payo kite e gode kaachiel gi nyipeche alufu adek gi mia adek ruoth noketonigi chik mi ne gipayo kite madongo nengogi tek mondo gilosgo mise mar hekalu kamano jogedo mag solomon gi mag hiram kod jogebal ne payo kite kod bepe ka giko mondo ogergo hekalu ruodhi solomon ogero hekalu mar nyasaye weche mag ndalo e higa mar mia angwen gi piero aboro bang wuok joisrael misri kane solomon osebet ruodh israel higni angwen nochako gero hekalu mar ruoth nyasaye e due mar ariyo miluongo ni zif bor mar hekalu mane ogero ni ruoth nyasaye noromo mita piero adek lachne mita apar borne modhi malo mita apar gabich bor mar agola mane ni e nyim kama ler mar hekalu noromo mita apar maromre gi lach hekalu lach agolano koa e nyim hekalu noromo mita abich noloso ni hekalu dirise mogaji kendo nogero udi moko momakore gi kor hekalu gi oko udigo noluoro kama ler kaachiel gi kama ler moloyo udigo ne oluwo gorofa adek kendo lach mar udi mapiny noromo mita ariyo gi nu lach mar udi diere ne mita adek kendo lach mar udi mamalo ne mita adek gi nu nikech ne gisweko kor ot mondo yiend arip kik pow noger hekalu gi kite mane opa kuma nikunyogie mondo koko mar nyundo kata mar le kata mar gir tich moro mar nyinyo kik winji e hekalu kapod igere dhoot midonjogo e udi mapiny ne nie bat korachwich mar hekalu raidhi nochopo e udi madiere nyaka gorofa mar adek kamano solomon nogero hekalu motieko kendo nochwade gi sida eka nogero udi molworo hekalu duto bepe mag sida ema noriwo kor udigo gi hekalu kendo bor modhi malo mar gorofa ka gorofa noromo mita ariyo gi nu wach ruoth nyasaye nofwenyore ni solomon niya kuom wach hekalu migeroni ka inirit chikena duto kendo iluwgi maber anachop gima nawacho ni daudi wuoru kuomi anadag kod joga israel mak aweyogi ngang kamano solomon nogero hekalu motieko nochwado kor ot gi yo ka iye gi bap sida chakre tiend ot nyaka yiend tado noloso dier ot gi yiend saipras mita apar iye nongado gi bap sida chakre tiend ot nyaka yiend tado mondo obed ot maler maiye miluongo ni kama ler moloyo bor mar ot modong mane nie nyim ot maler iye moromo mita piero ariyo bap sida mane nie hekalu nopa machal gi budho kod thiepe ne en bap sida lilo kata kidi moro ne ok nen ei hekalu nolosoe ot maler iye mondo oketie sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye ot iyeno borne gi lachne kod borne modhi malo noromo mita apar kendo solomon nobawe gi dhahabu maler bende noloso kendomarmisango gi bap sida nobawo ii hekalu gi dhahabu maler kendo noriwo thiwini mag dhahabu e nyim ot maler iye odno bende nobawo gi dhahabu kamano nobawo ot duto gi dhahabu kaachiel gi kendomarmisango mane nie ot iye ei ot maler maiye noketoe kido ariyo molos gi bap zeituni maket gi malaika miluongo ni kerubi moro ka moro borne noromo mita abich buomb kerubi konchiel noromo mita ariyo gii nu komachielo bende kamano kamano bor buombe duto korie noromo mita abich pim mar kerubi machielo bende noromo mita abich duong kod kido mar kerubi ariyogo ne chalre chuth kendo bor modhi malo mar moro ka moro noromo mita abich noketo kerubigo e dier ot maler maiye ka buombegi oyarore buomb kerubi achiel nogik e kor ot koni kendo buomb kerubi machielo nogik e kor ot kocha buombegi madiere noromo e dier ot tir solomon nobawo kerubigo bende gi dhahabu kor ot duto iye gi maoko nopayoe kido mag kerubi gi mag yiend othidhe kod thiepe moyarore kendo dier udi maiye gi maoko noumo gi dhahabu dhoot midonjogo e ot maiye noloso gi bepe abich mag zeituni thikene ariyo nopayoe kido mag kerubi gi mag yiend othidhe kod thiepe moyarore kendo thikego kaachiel gi kerubi kod yiengo nobawo gi dhahabu kamano bende noloso sich dhood hekalu gi bepe angwen mag zeituni thikene ariyo noloso gi bap saipras moro ka moro nibano diriyo kiyawo thikego bende nopayoe kido mag kerubi gi mag yiend othidhe kod thiepe moyarore kendo nobawo gik mopago gi kenya bible society tanzania ruodhi udi mamoko solomon ogero solomon nogero dalane owuon kuom higni apar gadek eka otieko gere nogero ot miluongo ni od bungu mar lebanon borne noromo mita piero abich lachne mita piero ariyo gabich kendo borne modhi malo mita apar gabich nogere ewi laini adek mag sirni mag sida moriwie bepe mag sida ne oumo wiye gi bap sida mokadho ewi sirni piero angwen gabichgo e laini ka laini nochanie sirni apar gabich ne nitie laini adek mag dirise mogaji kendo dirisa ka dirisa nomanyore gi wadgi sisi mar dhoudi duto gi mag dirise duto ne romre kendo dirisa ka dirisa nomanyore gi wadgi e laini adek bende nogero ot moro miluongo ni od sirni borne noromo mita piero ariyo gabich lachne mita apar gabich ne en gi agola man gi sirni e nyime nogero bende od kom duong mochwado gi bap sida chakre tiend ot nyaka tado noluonge ni od bura nimar nongadoe bura solomon nogero ode owuon mane obiro dakie e laru machielo man tok od bura nolose machal gi od burano kendo nogero ot moro machielo bende chal kode ni mondo nyar farao mane okendo odagie udigo duto noger gi kite mopa nengogi tek chakre mise nyaka yiendambewa kendo chakre laru mar hekalu mar ruoth nyasaye nyaka laru maduong kitego duto nongad gi musmeno marom kaka idwaro kendo nopagi koni gi koni mise noger gi kite madongo nengogi tek moko mita abich moko mita angwen ewigi ne nitie bap sida gi kite nengogi tek moro ka moro opa kaka idwaro laru maduong nochiel gi ohinga moger gi kite mopa moluow didek kod laini achiel mar bap sida machal gi laru iye mar hekalu mar ruoth nyasaye kod agola mar hekalu tich huram otiyo e hekalu weche mag ndalo eka ruoth solomon nooro jaote turo mondo oom ngat moro miluongo ni huram ne en wuod chi liel jadhood naftali wuon mare ne jaturo jatich mula ne en gi rieko gi winjo kod lony mar loso gimoro amora mar mula kendo nobiro ir ruoth solomon molosone gik moko duto mane odwaro noloso sirni ariyo mag mula bor mar moro ka moro noromo mita ochiko alwora mar kore noromo mita auchiel igi norokore kendo mith mula molosgigo ne romre gi lach lith lwedo angwen nolenyo mula molosogo gik moko ariyo machal gi agulini madongo moumogo sirni bor mar agulu ka agulu noromo mita abich noloso gik moko ariyo mag mula e kido machal gi osera mongawogi kuom agulini mane nie wi agulini mane nie wi sirni agulu ka agulu ne nie wi osera achiel kamano bende noloso gik monginore onginore ka machunga e laini ariyo molworo osera noumo agulini mane nie wi sirni agulini mane nie wi sirni mochung e nyim agolago nolos gi mula machal gi wi oyungu moromo mita ariyo wi sirni ariyogo noyarore kendo agulini moum gi osera noumore kuomgi gik monginore onginore mia ariyo mochan e laini ariyo nolworo agulu ka agulu nochungo sirnigo e agola mar hekalu siro achiel nochungo korachwich mochako ni jakin siro machielo nochungo koracham mochako ni boaz wi sirnigo noketie mula molos e kido machal gi wi oyungu kamano tich sirni norumo eka nolenyo mula molosogo gima duong matingo pi machal gi karaya mochako ni nam lach dhoge ne romo mita abich kendo tutne ne romo mita ariyo gi nu alwora mar dhoge mita apar gabich e bwo dhoge ne nitie gik maradadi monginore onginore molwore noriedgi e laini ariyo borgi romo mita apar gabich namno nochue kaachiel gi gik maradadigo norenje e nge ruedhi apar gariyo mag mula ruedhi adek nomanyo yo nyandwat adek yo podho chieng adek yo milambo kendo adek yo wuok chieng wigi nodok ka iye kamano e kaka noten namno e dienge ruedhigo mith mula molosego ne romre gi lach lith lwedo angwen dhoge nolos ka dho kikombe machal gi thiep oyungu nonyalo tingo pi dirom depe alufu angwen bende noloso rachungi apar mag mula mondo kareche orenjree bor mar rachungi ka rachungi ne romo mita ariyo kendo lachne bende mita ariyo borne modhi malo mita achiel gi nu rachungigo nolos kama ne gin gi pewe moket e frembe nolos sibuoche gi ruedhi kod kerubi mag mula e pewe mane ni e frembego nokiewo frembego yo ka wi sibuoche gi yo ka wi ruedhi kod yo ka tiendegi rachungi ka rachungi ne nigi tiende angwen mag mula mane nyalo lworore kuom chumbe mag mula e tunge angwen mag rachungi ne nitie sirni morenjie karaya sirnigo nolos gi mula kendo nokiew bethegi chuma motingoo karaya ne ni malo moyombo wi rachungi gi mita achiel en bende nokiewe dhoge nolworore mondo karaya orenjree maber pewe mag rachungi ne ok olworore ne gin gi bethe angwen maromre tiende angwen go ne nie bwo pewe mag rachungi chumbe mane tiendegi lwororee nolos mobedo gimoro achiel gi rachungi bor modhi malo mar tielo ka tielo ne romo mita achiel tiendego nolos machal gi tiend gach lweny chumbe mane tiende lwororee kaachiel gi tiendegi giwegi nolos gi mula ne nitie sirni angwen e tunge angwen mag rachungi sirnigo nolos mobedo gimoro achiel kode ewi rachungi ne nitie chuma molworore borne modhi malo romo mita achiel chumano gi ramekni mage kod bethene nolos mobedo gimoro achiel kode kuom rameknigo kod pewe nopayoe kerubi gi sibuoche kod yiend othidhe kama thuolo ne yudoree kendo nokiewgi gi oko kamano e kaka noloso rachungigo duto apar mag mula kendo romgi gi kitgi ne chal eka noloso kareche apar mag mula moro ka moro ne nyalo tingo pi dirom depe mia achiel lach karaya ka karaya noromo mita ariyo rachungi apargo moro ka moro ne nigi karache owuon noketo rachungi abich e bath hekalu korachwich kendo abich e bathe koracham nam cha noketo e bath hekalu korachwich yo wuok chieng mochomo milambo achien huram noloso agulini gi rajope kod tewni kamano notieko tije duto mag odd ruoth nyasaye ni ruoth solomon noseloso sirni ariyo gi agulini madongo ariyo mane ni e wi sirni gi oserni mag mula noumo agulini ariyogo kod gik monginore onginore mia angwen noried e laini ariyo e kor oserni gi rachungi apar gi kareche apar mane orenj kuom rachungigo kaachiel gi nam cha gi ruedhi apar gariyo mane orenjie namno gi agulini gi rajope kod tewni gigo duto mag od ruoth nyasaye huram noloso ni ruoth solomon gi mula mangangni nolosogi e paw aora jordan e lop chuech man e kind sukoth gi zerethan solomon ne ok opimo pek gigo nikech ne gingeny ahinya omiyo pek mula mane olosgigo ne ok ongere solomon noloso gik moko duto mag od ruoth nyasaye noloso kendomarmisango mar dhahabu tingo makati miketo e nyim ruoth nyasaye gi rachung teyni apar mag dhahabu maler maiye bende noloso thiepe gi teyni kod ramekni mag dhahabu gi kikombe gi rangis teyni gi degi gi tewni mag ubani kod tegni mag mach magi duto nolos gi dhahabu maler pata mag dhood hekalu bende nolos gi dhahabu kamano ruoth solomon notieko tich duto mag od ruoth nyasaye eka noomo gik moko duto mane daudi wuon mare osechiwo ni ruoth nyasaye mi noketogi kar keno mar od ruoth nyasaye ne gin fedha gi dhahabu kod gik mamoko ruodhi solomon okelo sandug muma e hekalu weche mag ndalo solomon nochoko jodong israel duto jerusalem mondo oom sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye e dala daudi miluongo ni sayun mi joisrael duto nochokore gi ruoth solomon chieng sawo nitimo higa ka higa e due mar abiriyo miluongo ni ethanim kane jodong israel duto osebiro jodolo notingo sandug muma ne gikele kaachiel gi hemb romo kod gik moko duto mane nie hema mitiyogo tich nyasaye jodolo kod jolawi ema nokelogi ruoth solomon gi joisrael duto nochokore kode ne nie nyim sanduk ka gitimo misengni gi rombe kod ruedhi mokadho akwana eka jodolo norwako sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye kama nolosne e bwo buomb kerubi ei ot maiye mar hekalu miluongo ni kama ler moloyo nimar kerubi noyaro bwombegi ewi kama sanduk betie ka giume kaachiel gi ludhe mitingego ludhego ne boyo ahinya wigi ne nenore oko e kama ler mane nie nyim ot maiye ne ok ginen oko mar hekalu pod gin kanyo nyaka chil kawuono ne onge gimoro ei sanduk mak mana kite ariyo mopa mane musa oketoe kane en horeb kuma ruoth nyasaye notimoe winjruok gi joisrael ka gia e piny misri kane jodolo owuok oa kama ler bor polo nopongo od ruoth nyasaye mi ne ok ginyal tiyo tichgi mar dolo nikech duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye nopongo hekalu solomon oguedho hekalu weche mag ndalo eka solomon nowacho niya ruoth nyasaye niketo wang chieng e polo malo isewacho ni nidag e mudho mandiwa koro asegeroni ot man gi duong mondo idagie nyaka chieng ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel ruoth nyasaye nowachone niya nitimo maber kuom paro gerona ot kata kamano ok niger odno mana wuodi mibiro nywolo ema nogernago koro ruoth nyasaye osechopo singruok notimo nikech asebet kar daudi wuora kendo e ruodh israel mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nosingore mi asegero ot ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel kendo aseikoe kar bet ni sanduk motingo weche mag singruok mane ruoth nyasaye otimo gi kwerewa kogologi e piny misri eka solomon nochung e dho kendomarmisango mar ruoth nyasaye e nyim joisrael duto norieyo bedene malo kochomo polo mowacho niya ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel onge nyasaye moro e piny mwalo machal kodi irito singruokni mitimo gi jotichni wuotho e yoreni gi chunygi duto kendo iherogi gi hera mosiko isechopo singruok mane itimo ni daudi wuora jatichni adier gima niwacho ema koro isetimo emomiyo ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel chop singruok mane itimo ni daudi wuora jatichni kiwachone ni anywolani nobed ruodhi mag israel nyaka chieng mana ka yawuoti oritore kendo owuotho e nyima kaka isewuotho koro nyasach israel wachni niwacho ni daudi wuora jatichni mondo otimre nyasaye bende didag e piny ka kata polo maduong manadi ok nyal romi koro ot masegeronini direm marom nadi kata kamano ruoth nyasaye nyasacha yie mondo iwinj lemona gi kwayona kendo iwinj ywakna makeloni tinende odiechieng gotieno mondo irang ot misewacho ni nyingi nobedieni kendo iwinj lemo anakwa ka eri iwinj kwayo kod jogi israel biro kwayi ka eri yie iwinj e polo kama idakie kiwinjo mondo iwenwa richowa ka ngato otimo ni wadgi marach kendo okete mondo ocham muma mi okuongore e nyim kendomarmisango manie odni iwinj e polo kendo ingad buch jotichni kikumo ngat moketho kendo kidwoko richone e wiye owuon jal makare mondo iket kare kimiye pok moromo gi timne maber ka wasigu oloyo jogi israel nikech gisekethoni koro gilokore iri kendo gisayi e odni yie mondo iwinjgi gi e polo kiweyonigi richogi kendo idwokgi e piny nimiyo kweregi ka polo ongawo koth onge nikech jogi israel osekethoni mi gilemo ka eri kendo giyie duongni ka gilokore giweyo richogi nikech ikumogi yie mondo iwinjgi e polo kiweyonigi richogi nyisgi yo maber onego giwuothie kendo imi koth chue e pinyi misemiyo jogi mondo obed mwandugi ka kech kata dera mar tho marach nie piny kata ka cham orochore ewi dongo kata ka bonyo kata kungu nitie kata ka wasigu olworo dala moro kata ka tho kata tuo manade nitie mi ngato olami ka kwayi gimoro korieyo bedene kochomo hekaluni nimar ngato ka ngato ongeyo gima chando chunye yie mondo iwinj e polo kama idakie iwene richone kendo ichop lemone kimiye moromo gi timbene nikech kendi ema ingeyo chuny ji duto kuom mano mondo giluori ndalo duto gidakgo e piny nimiyo kwerewani ka ngama wendo ok achiel kuom jogi israel obiro mondo olem e hekaluni koa e piny mabor nikech nyingi nimar ji biro winjo humb nyingi maduong gi mar lueti motegno kod mar badi morie yie mondo iwinj e polo kama idakie kendo itim duto ngat wendono okwayi kamano ji duto mae piny mondo onge nyingi kendo oluori mana kaka jogi israel oluori kendo mondo ginge ni hekalu asegeronini en mari adier ruoth nyasaye ka jogi dhi e lweny kedo gi wasikgi kamoro amora miorogie mi gilami ka gichomo dala miseyiero kod hekalu asegeroni yie mondo iwinji e polo lemo gikwayigo kendo ikonygi ka gitimo gima isekwero nimar onge ngato ok kethi kendo ikecho kodgi michiwogi e lwet wasikgi mondo otergi e tuech e piny wasikgigo kuma bor kata kuma chiegni eka bange giloko parogi e piny motuegieno mi chunygi olokore kendo gikwayi niya waseketho kwatimo wich teko kod richo mi giduogo iri gi parogi duto kendo gi chunygi duto e piny wasikgi notuegieno kendo gilami ka gichomo pinygi mane imiyo kweregi kod dala mane iyiero gi hekalu asegeronini yie mondo iwinj lemogi gikwayigo e polo kama idakie kendo ikonygi iwe ni jogi richogi duto gisetimo kod chwanyruok duto gisechwanyorego e nyimi kendo imi joma noterogi e tuech ongwonnigi ka kechogi nikech gin jogi kendo gin mwanduni mane igolo e piny misri kireso e sand mager ka mach makakni ruoth nyasaye winj kwayona gi kwayo mag jogi israel kichiko iti mondo iwinjgi sa moro amora giywaknie nimar niyierogi kuom ji duto mae piny mondo gibed jogi kaka kwerewa misri kane solomon osetieko lamo ruoth nyasaye kendo kwaye wechego duto noa malo e nyim kendomarmisango mar ruoth nyasaye kama nosegoyoe chonge piny morieyo bedene kochomo polo kane osechung noguedho oganda israel duto gi dwol maduong kowacho niya apako ruoth nyasaye mosemiyo joge israel kue kochopo gik moko duto mane osingore onge kata wach achiel moserem kuom singruokne duto mabeyo mane omiyo musa jatichne owacho ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa obed kodwa kaka nobet gi kwerewa kik owewa kata kik ojwangwa mondo okonywa keto chunywa kuome wawuoth e yorene duto kendo wamak chikene gi buchene kod wechene mane ochiko kwerewa wechena asehombogo ruoth nyasaye nyasachwagi mondo obed e nyime odiechieng gotieno mondo okonya kaachiel gi joge israel kaka dwarore odiechieng kodiechieng ji duto mae piny ngima mondo onge ni ruoth nyasaye kende e nyasaye kendo onge moro koro mondo chunyu obed malongo e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa kuwuotho e yorene kendo kurito chikene kaka utimo kawuono eka ruoth solomon kaachiel gi joisrael duto notimo misengni ni ruoth nyasaye solomon nochiwo ruedhi alufu piero ariyo gariyo kod rombe alufu mia achiel gi piero ariyo kotimogo misengni mag sawo mano e kaka ruoth kod joisrael duto noyango hekalu ni ruoth nyasaye chiengono ruoth nopwodho dier laru mane nie nyim hekalu mar ruoth nyasaye nikech kanyo ema notimoe misengni miwango pep gi misengni mag sawo nikech kendomarmisango mar mula mane ok nyal timie misengnigo duto e ndalogo solomon kaachiel gi joisrael duto notimo sawo maduong e nyim ruoth nyasaye kuom ndalo abiriyo oganda maduong nochokore kanyo moa e piny israel duto chakre kama idonjogo hamath nyaka aora manie kind pinygi kod piny misri chieng mar aboro nomiyogi thuolo mi gidok miechgi ka gidendo ruoth ne gimor kendo giil nikech gik mabeyo duto mane ruoth nyasaye osetimo ni daudi jatichne kendo ni joge israel ruodhi nyasaye ochako ofwenyore ni solomon weche mag ndalo kane solomon osetieko gero od ruoth nyasaye gi ode owuon kod udi duto mane odwaro gero nyasaye nofwenyorene kendo kaka nofwenyorene mokwongo e dala gibeon nowachone niya asewinjo lemoni kod kwayoni mi asegwedho hekalu misegeronani aketo nyinga kanyo mochwere kendo wengena kod chunya nobedie nyaka chieng kiwuotho e nyima gi chuny makare kod bidhruok kitimo duto masechiki kendo kimako chikena gi buchena kaka daudi wuoru notimo eka anagur loch mar nyikwayi e israel nyaka chieng mana kaka nasingora ni daudi wuoru ka awachone ni ndalo duto nyikwayi nobed ruodhi mag israel ka un kata nyithindu ulokoru muweyo luwa ka ok umako wechena gi chikena mane aketo e nyimu mudhi tiyo ni nyiseche mamoko kendo lamogi anagol joisrael e piny mane amiyogi kendo hekalu masewalo ni nyingani naketh mondo olal e wanga mi nying israel nolok ka ngero kendo gima ji duto jaro bende hekaluni nodong gunda kendo ji duto kadho bute nowuor kendo nohum ka gipenjo niya ango momiyo ruoth nyasaye osetimo gima kama ni pinyni gi hekaluni eka nodwokgi niya ne giweyo ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi mane ogolo kweregi e piny misri mi ne gilamo nyiseche mamoko kendo gitiyonigi emomiyo ruoth nyasaye osekelo masichegi duto kuomgi gik mamoko solomon otimo weche mag ndalo kane higni piero ariyo mane solomon ogeroe od ruoth nyasaye gi ode owuon oserumo nomiyo hiram mier piero ariyo e piny galili hiram ruodh turo nosemiyo solomon bap sida gi bap saipras kod dhahabu kaka nodwaro kane hiram oa turo mondo odhi one mier mane solomon omiye ne ok oherogi omiyo nowacho niya owadwa imiya mier machal nadi emomiyo nochako gwengno ni piny kabul tiende ni piny motimo ongoro pod iluonge milo kod ohinga mar gezer gi hazor gi megido kod gezer noyudo ka farao ruodh misri osedhi mokawo gezer mowango gi mach kendo nosenego jokanaan modak kanyo mi dalano nomiyo nyare chi solomon kaka chiwo miech joge joidh farese bende solomon nogero udi e jerusalem kod lebanon kendo e pinye duto kaka nodwaro ji duto nodong e piny israel kuom joamor gi johiti gijoperizi gi johivi kod jojebus ok joisrael joohala kendo kuom ruodhi duto mag piny arabia kendo kuom jorit piny ruoth solomon nochuogo kuodi mia ariyo kendo kuot ka kuot nobaw gi dhahabu moromo kilo abiriyo nochuogo bende okumbni mia adek man gi kuonde minyono auchiel ka toke ne nitie nyaroya mar dhahabu sibuoche ariyo mag dhahabu nochung e bath bede kom koni gi koni kendo sibuoche apar gariyo moko nochung moro ka moro e dir raidhi gioro ne wach mondo obi shekem mi nobiro gi joisrael duto eka ne giwacho ni rehoboam niya wuoru miyowa ting mapek emomiyo koro ngad ting mapek mane oketo kuomwa eka wanatini nodwokogi ni doguru mondi moromo koro neuru nyisecheu mane ogolou e piny misri noketo nyarwath achiel bethel yo milambo mar piny israel machielo noketo dan yo nyandwat wachni nomiyo joisrael obedo joketho nikech ji moko ne dhi lamo nyarwath man bethel ji moko ne dhi dan nogero ut liswa e hembko mane oseloso moketoe jodolo moa e dhoudi duto kata mane ok nyikwa lawi jeroboam nogolo chik mondo otim sawo due apar gabich due mar
