oseyiero nosudo e dho kendomarmisango mane oseloso bethel motimo sawo ni joisrael kendo owango misango e kendono ruodhi janabi moa juda okwero ruoth jeroboam ruoth nyasaye nosewacho ni jatichne moro mondo oa juda odhi bethlehem mi jalo nodhi moyudo jeroboam kochung e dho kendomarmisango kawango misango ngat nyasayeno nokuongo kendomarmisango kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike koywage niya yaye kendomarmisango yaye kendomarmisango ruoth nyasaye owacho kama enonywol wuowi e dhood daudi nochak nyinge ni josia enoneg jodolo mag hembko man kuonde motingore wango ubani kuomi kendo enowang choke ji kuomi eka nokor wach chiengono kowacho niya ranyisi ruoth nyasaye osewacho ni biro timore ema kendomarmisangoni nobarre kendo buru manie wiye nopukre kane ruoth jeroboam owinjo wach mane ngat nyasaye okuongogo kendomarmisango man bethel nogolo bade e misango mosiemo ngatno kowacho niya makeuru bede mane osiemogo ngatno notal mi ne ok onyal dole kendo kendomarmisango bende nobarore mi buru manie wiye nopukore mano noluwore gi ranyisi mane ngat nyasaye nokoro mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nochiko eka ruoth nowacho ni ngat nyasaye niya kwana ruoth nyasaye nyasachi mondo bada ochangi eka ngat nyasaye notimo kamano mi bade notugore ruoth nowacho ni ngat nyasaye niya wadog oda mondo iyue eka abiro miyi gimoro ngat nyasaye nodwoko ruoth niya kata da bed ni imiya mana nu mwanduni ok nadonj e odi ok nachiem kata madho gimoro ok namadh ka nikech wach ruoth nyasaye nobirona ni kik achiem kata kik amadh gimoro bende kik adog gi yo mane abirogo omiyo noluwo yo machielo ka ok odok gi yo nodhigo bethel ne nitie janabi moro moti nodak bethel yawuote nobiro ire monyise gik moko duto mane ngat nyasaye otimo bethel chiengono ne gihulone weche duto mane ngatno owacho ni ruoth wuongi nopenjogi yo mane oluwo mi ginyise eka nowachonigi ni gawnauru kanyna mi ne gigawone moidho noluwo ngat nyasaye moyude kobet piny e tiend yath moro nopenje niya e ngat nyasaye mane oa juda koso ngatno nodwoke niya ee eka nowachone ni wadog dala idhi ichiem nodwoke ni ok anyal dok kodi kata donjo e odi ok anyal donjo bende ok nachiem kata madho gimoro ok namadhi nikech wach ruoth nyasaye nobirona ni kik achiem kata kik amadh gimoro kendo kik adog gi yo mane abirogo janabi motino nowuonde kawachone niya bende janabi kaka kendo malaika osekelona wach ruoth nyasaye ni mondo abi aomi wadhi e oda ichiem omiyo nodok kode mochiemo e ode kane pod gichiemo wach ruoth nyasaye nobiro ni janabi mane oomeno mi nowacho ni ngat nyasaye mane oa juda niya ruoth nyasaye owacho kama isedagi winjo wach ruoth nyasaye nyasachi ochiki iseduogo michiemo kama nokweri ni kik ichiemie kata kik imethie emomiyo ringri ok noyik gi kwereni kane gisechiemo janabi moti mane odwokeno nogawone kanyna kendo kane jalo osewuok dhiyo noromo gi sibuor e yo mi sibuor nonege ringre noriere e yo kanyna gi sibuor nochung bute ji mane kadho kanyo noneno ringre koriere e yo kod sibuor kochung bute mi ne gitero wach e dala janabi moti cha kane janabino owinjo wachno nowacho niya nyaka bed ni en ngat nyasaye mane ok orito wach ruoth nyasaye cha emomiyo ruoth nyasaye osechiwe ni sibuor koro osenege mokidhe mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nowachone eka noko ni yawuote ni gawnauru kanyna mi ne gitimo kamano nodhi moyudo ringre ngatno koriere e yo ka kanyna kod sibuor ochung bute sibuor ne ok ochamo ringre ngatno kata timo gimoro ni kanyna ne ok otimo janabino noketo ringre e nge kanyna modwoko bethel mondo oywage kendo oyike noyiko ringre ngatno e bure owuon mi ne giywage ka giwacho niya yaye owadwa kane oseyike nowacho ni yawuote niya katho uyika e liel moyikie ngat nyasayeni kuketo chokena chokene nimar wach ruth nyasaye nochopo kare kaka jali nowacho kokuongo kendomarmisango man bethel kod ut lemo manie hembko mag miech samaria kata kamano jeroboam ne ok oweyo yorene maricho nomedo keto jomoko nono mondo obed jodolo rito hembko man kuonde motingore kopwodho ngato angata ne dwaro bedo jadolo timni nomiyo dhood jeroboam obedo joketho mi notiekgi chuth onge modong e piny ruodhi ahija okoro wach marach kuom jeroboam e ndalogo abija wuod jeroboam ne tuo jeroboam nowacho ni chiege niya lok kiti mondo kik ngato nge ni chiega kendo idhi shilo ir ahija janabi nokoro ni ema nabed ruodh pinyni kaw makati apar gi kek moko kod puga mar mor kich iterne enonyisi gima biro timore kuom nyathi chi jeroboam notimo kamano nodhi shilo mochopo e od ahija koro ahija ne ok nyal neno wengene nosechor nikech hike noniang ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni ahija niya nge ni chi jeroboam biro iri mondo openji wach wuode nikech wuode tuo eka ruoth nyasaye nonyiso ahija kaka onego owuo kod dhakono kane chi jeroboam ochopo nowuondore ni en dhako moro nono kane ahija owinjo tiende e dhoot nowacho niya donji chi jeroboam ango momiyo iriasori ni ngat moro nono gi wach marach monego anyisi dhi iwach ni jeroboam ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel owacho kama ne ayieri e kind ji mondo amiyi duong ne aketi jatend joga israel kendo nagolo loch kuom dhood daudi mamiyi kata kamano ok isebet ka daudi jatichna norito chikena kendo noluwa gi chunye duto katimo mana gik malongo e nyima iseketho moloyo joma nokwongoni iseloso nyisecheni iwuon mag chuma kimiyago mirima kendo iselokana ngeyi emomiyo abiro keloni masira ni dhoodi kendo abiro tieko joodi machwo duto koda ka wasumbni onge ngati nodong e israel kendo abiro yweyo jodhoodi oko pep mana kaka ngama wango owuoyo marum chuth jadhood jeroboam moro notho e dala guogi nocham mago notho oko winy nocham nikech ruoth nyasaye osewacho kamano koro dog dala e sa asaya tiendeni onyonoe da lani nyathi notho joisrael duto biro ywage kendo yike en ngat achiel kende kuom jodhood jeroboam noyike e liel nimar kuome kende ema ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel onwangoe gima longone bende ruoth nyasaye noyier ngat moro obed ruodh israel biro tieko dhood jeroboam chakre kawuono ruoth nyasaye biro goyo joisrael mi ginikirni kaka odundu pi yiengo kendo nogol joisrael oko e piny maber nomiyo kweregini mi nokegi koterogi loka aora yufrate nikech gisemiyo ruoth nyasaye mirima ka gichungo sirni milamo miluongo ni ashera enojwang joisrael nikech richo jeroboam mane omiyo joisarel bende otimo chi jeroboam nodok tirza dalagi kane ochopo e dhoot nyathi cha notho joisrael duto noyike kendo noywage mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nomiyo ahija janabi jatichne owacho weche moko mag jeroboam kod lwenjene kendo kaka norito piny ondiki e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag israel jeroboam norito piny kuom higni piero ariyo gariyo notho moyike eka nadab wuode nodoko ruoth kare loch rehoboam ruodh juda weche mag ndalo rehoboam wuod solomon min mare niluongo ni naama nyar amon nodoko ruodh juda nochako tich ka en jahigni piero angwen gachiel kendo norito piny kuom higni apar gabiriyo kodak jerusalem dala mane ruoth nyasaye oyiero kuom dhout israel duto mondo nyinge obedie jojuda notimo gik ruoth nyasaye okwero mi richogi nomiyo ruoth nyasaye ojok kodgi moloyo kweregi duto ne giloso ut lemo e hembko mane ni kuonde motingore kendo ne gichungo sirni milamo mag kite gi mag yien e gode maboyo duto kendo e tiend yien moro amora motimo otiep bende ne giketo ji kuonde lemo mondo jolemo oterrego kaka kit lemo margi nobet jojuda ne timo timbe makuero duto mag ogendini mane ruoth nyasaye oriembo mondo owe ni joisrael thuolo e higa mar abich mar loch rehoboam shishak ruodh misri nomonjo jerusalem nokawo mwandu duto mag hekalu mar ruoth nyasaye gi mag od ruoth bende nokawo kuodi duto mag dhahabu mane solomon oloso mi ruoth rehoboam noloso kuodi mag mula kar mago momiyo jotend jorit ranga dalane kane ruoth dhi e hekalu mar ruoth nyasaye jorit ne tingo kuodigo eka bange ne gidwokogi ka od jorit koro weche moko mag rehoboam gi timbene duto ondiki e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag juda ne nitie lweny e kind rehoboam gi jeroboam ndalo duto rehoboam notho moyike kwerene e dala daudi min mare ne nyinge naama nyar amon abija wuod rehoboam nodoko ruoth kare ruodhi loch abija ruodh juda weche mag ndalo e higa mar apar gaboro mar loch jeroboam wuod nebat abija nodoko ruodh juda norito piny kuom higni adek kodak jerusalem min mare ne nyinge maaka nyar abishalom abija ne timo richo duto mane wuon mare otimo chunye ne ok longo ni ruoth nyasaye kaka chuny daudi kwar mare ne longo kata kamano ruoth nyasaye nyasache noketo wuode ruoth kare mondo obedne ka taya maliel e jerusalem mana nikech nying daudi kendo nomiyo jerusalem ogurore nimar daudi notimo gik malongo ni ruoth nyasaye kendo e ngimane duto ne ok oketho wach moro mane ochike mak man wach uria jahiti ne nitie lweny e kind ahija gi jeroboam ndalogi duto weche moko mag abija gi timbene ondik e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag juda abija notho mi noyike e dala daudi asa wuode nodoko ruoth kare loch asa ruodh juda weche mag ndalo e higa mar piero ariyo mar loch jeroboam ruodh israel asa nodoko ruodh juda mi norito piny kuom higni piero angwen gachiel kodak jerusalem min mare ne nyinge maaka nyar abishalom timbe asa ne longo e nyim ruoth nyasaye mana kaka timbe daudi kwar mare noriembo joterruok mag kuonde lemo kodarogi e pinye kendo nogolo nyiseche manono mane kwerene oloso bende nogolo maaka e duongne mar bedo min ruoth nikech noloso kido makuero maket gi nyasaye madhako miluongo ni ashera asa nomuko gima ketno mowango e dho aora kidron hembko mane ni kuonde motingore ne ok okethi kata kamano chuny asa ne longo e nyim ruoth nyasaye e ndalone duto nokawo fedha gi dhahabu kod gik lemo mi oketo e od ruoth nyasaye moko en owuon ema nochiwo asa otimo winjruok gi benhadad ruodh aram weche mag ndalo ne nitie lweny e kind asa gi baasha ndalo duto mag ngimagi baasha ruodh israel nodhi monjo jojuda kendo nochielo rama gi ohinga moketoe jolweny mondo ogeng ni ji duto madhi ka asa ruodh juda kata maa kuno eka asa nokawo fedha gi dhahabu duto nodong kuom mwandu mag od ruoth nyasaye kod mag ode owuon momiyo jotichne mondo okow ni benhadad ruodh aram wuod tabrimmon wuod hezion nodak damaski noorone wach niya winjruok mondo obed e kindwa kodi kaka winjruok mane nie kind wuora gi wuoru ero aoroni chiwo mar fedha gi dhahabu yie iketh winjruok manie kindu gi baasha ruodh israel mondo owe kedo koda benhadad noyie kwayo mar ruoth asa mi nooro jotend ogend lweny mondo omonj miech israel noketho ijon gi dan gii abelbethmaaka gi paw kineroth duto kod piny naftali kane baasha owinjo gima otimore noweyo gero ohinga mar rama modok tirza eka ruoth asa noluongo jojuda duto maonge ngama odong ne gigolo kite gi yien duto mane baasha gerogo ohinga mar rama mi ruoth asa nochielogo geba manie piny benjamin kod mizpa weche moko mag asa gi tekone kod timbene duto gi mier mane ogero ondiki e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag juda kane oseti tuo moro nomako tiendene notho moyike e dala daudi kwar mare jehoshafat wuode nodoko ruoth kare loch nadab ruodh israel e higa mar ariyo mar loch asa ruodh juda nadab wuod jeroboam nodoko ruodh israel nobedo ruoth kuom higni ariyo notimo gik ruoth nyasaye okwero koluwo timbe wuon mare nomiyogo joisrael obedo joketho baasha wuod ahija jaisakar nojamo nadab monege gibethon dala jofilistia kane oyudo nadab gi joisrael lworo gibethon mondo omonji e higa mar adek mar loch asa ruodh juda ema baasha nonegoe nadab mokawo lochne gikanyono kosedoko ruoth nonego jood jeroboam duto notieko od jeroboam chuth ok oweyo kata ngat achiel kangima mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nosemiyo ahija jashilo jatichne owacho mano notimore nikech ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel nokecho gi richo mane jeroboam otimo kendo mane omiyo joisrael otimo weche moko mag nadab kod timbene duto ondiki e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag israel ne nitie lweny e kind asa kod baasha ruodh israel e ndalo duto mag ngimagi loch baasha ruodh israel e higa mar adek mar loch asa ruodh juda baasha wuod ahija nodoko ruodh israel morito piny kuom higni piero ariyo gangwen kodak tirza notimo gik ruoth nyasaye okwero koluwo timbe jeroboam nomiyogo joisrael obedo joricho ruodhi ruoth nyasaye nomiyo jehu wuod hanani owacho ni baasha niya ne amiyi duong kagoli e buru kendo naketi jatend joga israel eka iluwo timbe jeroboam kendo imiyo joga israel obedo joketho ka gimiya mirima nikech richogi emomiyo abiro yweyi oko kaachiel gi jodhoodi kendo anami odi bed kaka od jeroboam wuod nebat jodhood baasha otho e dala guogi nocham mago otho oko winy nocham weche moko mag baasha kaachiel gi tekone kod timbene duto ondik e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag israel koro baasha notho moyike tirza eka ela wuode nodoko ruoth kare ruoth nyasaye nosemiyo jehu wuod hanani owuoyo kuom baasha gi dhoode nikech baasha notimo gik ruoth nyasaye okwero baasha nomiyo ruoth nyasaye mirima gi timbene mane chalo gi timbe mag dhood jeroboam kendo nikech notieko dhoodno loch ela ruodh israel e higa mar piero ariyo gauchiel mar loch asa ruodh juda ela wuod baasha nodoko ruodh israel mi norito piny kuom higni ariyo kodak tirza zimri achiel kuom jotend geche mag lweny nojame mokedo kode e higa mar piero ariyo gabiriyo mar loch asa ruodh juda kane oyudo ela omer tirza e od arza mane jarit od ruoth zimri nodonjo monege kendo okawo lochne kane zimri osedoko ruoth nonego jodhood baasha duto ok oweyo kata ngama dichwo achiel kuom wedene kata osiepene kamano zimri notieko dhood baasha duto kaka ruoth nyasaye nomiyo jehu janabi owacho mano notimore nikech richo duto mag baasha gi mag ela wuode ne gimiyo joisrael otimo ka gimiyogo ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel mirima nikech nyiseche manono koro weche moko mag ela gi timbene duto ondik e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag israel loch zimri ruodh israel zimri nobet ruoth kuom ndalo abiriyo e higa mar piero ariyo gabiriyo mar loch asa ruodh israel kodak tirza nonwango ka jolweny ojot gibethon dala jofilistia jolweny mane ojotgo nowinjo kiwacho ni zimri osejamo ruoth monego emomiyo joisarel duto mane nie kar jot noketo omri jatend lweny mondo obed ruodh israel chiengno eka omri kaachiel gi joisrael duto nowuok gibethon mi gidhi gilworo tirza kane zimri oneno ni dala osekaw nodonjo e od ruoth mochwinyo mach kuom odno motho kanyo mano notimore nikech notimo gik mane ruoth nyasaye okwero koluwo timbe jeroboam kendo nikech nomiyo joisrael obedo joricho koro weche moko mag zimri gi timbene mag andhoga ondiki e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag israel loch omri ruodh israel eka joisrael nopogore diriyo jomoko noluwo tibni wuod ginath ka gidwaro kete ruoth jomoko noluwo omri joma noluwo omri noloyo jotibni wuod ginath e lweny mi ginego tibni kendo omri nokawo loch e higa mar piero adek gachiel mar loch asa ruodh juda omri nodoko ruodh israel motiyo higni apar gariyo higni auchiel nodak tirza eka bange nongiewo got samaria kuom shemer gi fedha dirom kilo piero abiriyo kendo nochielo godno gi ohinga mochake ni samaria machal gi nying shemer wuon godno omri notimo gik mane ruoth nyasaye okwero moloyo ji duto nokwongone nikech noluwo timbe duto mag jeroboam wuod nebat kendo nomiyo joisrael obedo joricho ka gimiyo ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel mirima nikech nyisechegi manono koro weche moko mag omri gi tekone nonyiso ondik e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag israel omri notho moyike samaria ahab wuode nodoko ruoth kare loch ahab ruodh israel e higa mar piero adek gaboro mar loch asa ruodh juda ahab wuod omri nodoko ruodh israel morito israel kuom higni piero ariyo gariyo kodak samaria ahab wuod omri notimo gik ruoth nyasaye okwero moloyo jogo duto mane okwongone ok noluwo mana richo mag jeroboam kende gima rachie moloyo mane otimo en ni nokendo jezebel nyar ethbaal ruodh josidon kendo notiyo ni baal kolame noloso kendomarliswa ni baal e ot nogero ni baal samaria kendo nochungo siro milamo miluongo ni ashera nomiyo ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel mirima moloyo ruodhi duto mag israel nokwongone ndalo ahab ema hiel jabethel nogeroe jeriko kane oketo mise abiram wuode makayo notho kendo ka nochungo dhorangeyene segub wuode machogo notho mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nomiyo joshua wuod nun owacho ruodhi elija okoro ni oro marach biro biro elija jatishbe modak e piny gilead nowacho ni ahab niya gi nying ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel kata tho ok nomok e lum kata koth ok nochue e piny kuom hignigi mak mana ka awacho eka wach ruoth nyasaye nobiro ni elija niya aye ka ichik yo wuok chieng kendo ipond e bath aora kerith man yo wuok chieng mar aora jordan inimodh e aora kendo asechiko agak mondo okelni chiemo kuno nodhi kaka ruoth nyasaye nowacho modak e bath aora kerith man yo wuok chieng mar aora jordan agak ne kelone kuon gi ringo okinyi godhiambo kendo nomodho e aorano bang ndalo moko aora nodwono nikech koth ne onge e piny elija gi chi liel modak zarefath eka wach ruoth nyasaye nobirone niya malo idhi zarefath dala moro e piny sidon idag kuno nikech asechiko chi liel moro dalano mondo opidhi omiyo nodhi zarefath kane ochopo e dhoranga dala noyudo dhako moro ka dondo yien noluonge mokwaye ni omnae pi matin e agwata mondo amodhi kane dhakono dhi elija nokowone wach ni ikelnae kuon matin bende en nodwoko ni gi nying ruoth nyasaye nyasachi aonge gi gimoro motedi mak mana sanja mar mogo modong e dak kod mo matin e agulu koro eka adondo yien matin mondo adhi atedgo chiemo wacham gi wuoda aye watho elija nowachone niya kik iluor dhi mondo itim kaka asewacho mokwongo ited kuon matin ikelna eka bange ited modong ucham gi wuodi nimar ruoth nyasaye owacho kama mogo manie dak kata mo manie agulu ok norum nyaka chop chieng ruoth nyasaye nokel koth e piny mi dhakono nodhi motimo kaka elija nowachone kendo ne gichiemo gi joode kod elija ndalo mangeny mogo manie dak kod mo manie agulu ne ok orumo kaka ruoth nyasaye nomiyo elija owacho bang mano tuo nogoyo wuod dhako wuon otno kendo tuono nohinge mi chunye nochot dhakono nopenjo elija niya yaye ngat nyasaye gango koda bironi osefwenyo richona koso omiyo wuoda otho elija nodwoke niya miya wuodi eka nokawe kuome motinge kodhi kode e gorofa malo kama nodakie mi nopiele e kitandane owuon eka noywak ni ruoth nyasaye kopenje niya yaye ruoth nyasaye nyasacha ema isekelo masira ni chi liel adakgoni kinego wuode eka noriere kuom nyathi didek koywak ni ruoth nyasaye niya ruoth nyasaye nyasacha akwayi yie chuny nyathini oduogi ruoth nyasaye nowinjo elija mi chuny nyathi noduogo modoko mangima elija nokawo nyathi molorgo koa e gorofa nomiye min mare kowacho niya neye wuodi ngima dhakono nowacho ni elija niya kawuono eka angeyo ni ngat nyasaye kendo wach ruoth nyasaye mawuok e dhogi en adier ruodhi elija odok ir ahab bang ndalo mangeny ka oro osebetie kuom higni adek wach ruoth nyasaye nobiro ni elija niya wuogi mondo ahab oneni nikech abiro kelo koth e piny omiyo elija nowuok mondo ahab onene ndalogo kech ne duong e samaria omiyo ahab noluongo obadia jaduong ode obadia ne en ngat moluoro ruoth nyasaye ahinya kendo kane jezebel nego jonabi mag ruoth nyasaye nopando jonabi mia achiel kuomgi piero abich nopando e rogo achiel piero abich opando e rogo machielo momiyogi chiemo gi pi bende ahab nowacho ni obadia niya wawuoth e piny duto e sokni kod aore duto dipo ka wayudo lum dwaresgo farese gi kenje mondo kik kech neggi duto omiyo ne gipogo piny e kindgi ji ariyo mondo kik gimoro dong mak orangi ahab nochiko konchiel obadia nochiko komachielo kane obadia dhi nopo koromo gi elija kane onene nogoyo chonge piny mokulorene kowacho niya jaduong elija kara mana nodwoke ni ee mana koro dhi inyis ruodhu ni ka obadia nopenje niya ere gima aseketho momiyo idwaro keta e lwet ahab mondo onega akuongora gi nying ruoth nyasaye nyasachi ni onge oganda kata piny moro ruodha pok oroe ji mondo odwari kane jopinjego okwer ni ionge kuno nyaka ne gikuongre ni gikia kuma intie koro iora mondo adhi anyis ruodha ni elija ni ka kwasewere kodi roho mar ruoth nyasaye biro teri kuma ok angeyo omiyo ka adhi anyiso ahab ni ka mi obiro ok onwangi enonega jaduong aseluoro ruoth nyasaye chakre tinna bende isewinjo gima natimo ka jezebel ne nego jonabi mag ruoth nyasaye napando jonabi mia achiel piero abich napando e rogo achiel piero abich e rogo machielo mamiyogi chiemo gi pi bende pod iora mondo adhi anyis ruodha ni elija ni ka donge ingeyo ni obiro nega elija nodwoke niya gi nying ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto nyasacha atiyone akuongora ni abiro nene kawuono eka obadia nodhi dwaro ahab monyise wach mi ahab nodhi neno elija kane ahab oneno elija nowachone niya kara mana jasand joisrael elija nodwoke ni ok asand joisrael gi jodhoodu ema usandogi nikech useweyo chik ruoth nyasaye kuluwo nyiseche manono miluongo ni baal emomiyo koro wach mondo joisrael duto obi wachokre e got karmel kaachiel gi jonabi mia angwen gi piero abich mag baal kod mag ashera mia angwen jezebel opidho elija opiem gi jonabi mag baal e got karmel kuom mano ahab noluongo joisrael duto kendo nochoko jonabigo kanyakla e got karmel eka elija nochung e nyim ji duto mopenjogi niya unuriwni e kind paro ariyo nyaka karango ka ruoth nyasaye en nyasaye luweuru ka baal e nyasaye luwuru baal ji noling thi eka elija nowachonigi niya eri kende e janabi mar ruoth nyasaye modong jonabi mag baal gin mia angwen gi piero abich koro miwauru ruedhi ariyo giyier achiel mondo giyang kendo gikete ewi yien kik gimok mach bende abiro yango rwath machielo kendo nakete ewi yien ok namok mach eka uluong nying nyasachu abiro luongo nying ruoth nyasaye kendo nyasaye noor mach e nyasaye ji duto nodwoko ni wayie elija nowacho ni jonabi mag baal niya yieruru rwath achiel uyang mokwongo nikech ungeny eka uluong nying nyasachu kik umok mach omiyo ne gikawo rwath mi giyango kendo ne giluongo nying baal chakre okinyi nyaka odiechieng ka giwacho niya baal yie idwokwa ne onge dwoko kata matin koro ne gichikore achika ka gilworo kendomarliswa mane giseloso kane ochopo odiechieng tir elija nojarogi ka ngeko nyiero kowacho niya koguru matek donge en nyasaye dipo ka wach moro pod ogale kata odich kata odhi wuoth kamoro onindo chieweuru omiyo ne gimedo kok matek ka gingolore gi pelni kod ligengni kaka kit timgi nobet nyaka rembgi nochuer odiechieng nokadho ne gimedo dhumore nyaka sa michiwoe misango mar odhiambo ne onge dwoko kata ngama dewo ywakgi eka elija nowacho ni ji duto niya suduru ka mi ji duto nosudo machiegni noloso kendomarmisango mar ruoth nyasaye nomukore nokawo kite apar gariyo maromre gi kwan mar dhout yawuot jakobo jal mane wach ruoth nyasaye obirone niya nyingi noluong ni israel kitego nolosogo kendomarmisango ni ruoth nyasaye nokunyo bur molworo kendomarmisango burno dine rom tingo migerni ariyo mag koth ngano kind chongene nowacho ni jatichne ni dhi ewi got ingi yo nam jalo nodhi mongicho mi nodwoke niya ok aneno gimoro elija nowachone ni dog nyadibiriyo kane oduogo e wuodhe mar abiriyo nowacho niya koro aneno bor polo matin ka lwet dhano ka wuok e nam eka elija nowachone ni dhi inyis ahab ni mondo oik geche kendo olor mwalo nimar dipo ka koth ogenge bang sa matin polo nodudo gi yamo kendo koth nochue maduong mi ahab noidho geche modhi jezreel teko mar ruoth nyasaye nolor kuom elija mi elija nongwano lepe moringo nyim ahab kateloe nyaka ranga jezreel ruodhi elija oringo odhi horeb ahab nonyiso jezebel gik moko duto mane elija otimo kendo kaka nonego jonabi duto mi jezebel nooro jaote ir elija kowacho niya ka kiny ochopo sa makama ka pok anegi kaka isenego jonabigo nyiseche mondo onega elija puga mar pi yo ka wiye nochiemo kendo nomodho eka nochako oriere piny malaika mar ruoth nyasaye noduogo momule ka wacho niya malo ichiem nono wuoth biro hingi eka noa malo mochiemo kendo omodho nowinjo dwol kapenje niya elija itimo ango ka nodwoko ni ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto asetiyoni gi kinda joisrael ok oserito singruok mane itimo kodgi gisemuko kendeni mag misango kendo asetimoni mi elisha noweyo lawe modok okawo dhok ariyogo noyangogi motedogi gi yiend kwer mi nomiyo joge mondo ocham eka nowuok moluwo elija kendo nodoko jatichne ruodhi ahab oloyo joaram benhadad niya koro benhadad owacho ni mondo imiye fethi gi dhahapi kaachiel gi mondi kod nyithindi kiny kar sa makama noor jotichne mondo omany odi kod ut jogi kendo ginikaw gimoro amora gihero eka ruodh ngama oselonyogi benhadad nowinjo wachni kometho gi ruodhi kande e hembegi mi nowacho ni joge niya chanreuru ni lweny mi ne giikore monjo dala samaria eka janabi moro nobiro ir ahab ruodh israel oneno ni ok en ruodh israel ne giweyo lawe ngat moro nodiro asere morodhno gi kor ruodh israel e kind chumbe mag lweny norwako mi ruoth nowacho ni jariemb gache niya wichri igola e lweny nikech ahinyora malit lweny nomedore chiengno ne giyiengo ruoth e gache kochomo joaram kendo rembe nochuer aminga e gari nyaka notho godhiambo kane chieng dwaro podho nogo milome ni oganda lweny niya ngato ka ngato mondo odog thurgi nikech ruoth osetho ne gidwoko ringre ruoth samaria mi giyike kuno ne gilwoko geche e dho yawo mar samaria kuma mon jochode ne lwokoree mi guogi nonango rembe kamano wach ruoth nyasaye nochopo kare weche moko mag ahab gi timbene duto kod ode mane olos gi lak liech gi mier duto nogero ondik e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag israel kane ahab otho ahazia wuode nodoko ruoth kare loch jehoshafat ruodh juda weche mag ndalo e higa mar angwen mar loch ahab ruodh israel jehoshafat wuod asa nodoko ruodh juda nokawo loch ka en jahigni piero adek gabich kendo norito piny kuom higni piero ariyo gabich kodak jerusalem min mare ne nyinge azuba nyar shilhi jehoshafat noluwo timbe duto mag asa wuon mare ok oweyo kata achiel kendo timbene ne longo e nyim ruoth nyasaye hembko mane ni kuonde motingore ne ok okethi kendo ji ne pod timo misengni kendo wango ubani kuondego jehoshafat bende notimo winjruok gi ruodh israel timbe moko duto mag jehoshafat gi tekone kod lwenjene ondik e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag juda noriembo joterruok mag kuonde lemo mane otony e ndalo asa wuon mare mondo kik gidag e pinye ndalogo edom ne onge gi ruoth jaduong moro ema nobet jatelo kar ruoth jehoshafat nohondho yiedhi madongo machal gi mago mane dhi tarshish mondo oomgo dhahabu ofir ne ok gidhi nikech ne gibarore mana eziongiber eka ahazia wuod ahab nokwayo jehoshafat niya yie mondo jowa odhi gi jou e yiedhi mau nodagi jehoshafat notho moyike kwerene e dala daudi kwar mare jehoram wuode nodoko ruoth kare loch ahazia ruodh israel e higa mar apar gabiriyo mar loch jehoshafat ruodh juda ahazia wuod ahab nodoko ruodh israel kuom higni ariyo notimo gik ruoth nyasaye okwero koluwo timbe wuon mare gi timbe min mare kod timbe jeroboam wuod nebat nomiyo joisrael obedo joricho notiyo ni baal kendo nolame komiyo ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel mirima mana kaka wuon mare notimo ruodhi tho mar ahazia kane ahab osetho jomoab nodagi bet e bwo loch israel chieng moro ahazia nogore piny koa e dirisa mar gorofa mar ode man samaria mohinyore nooro joote mondo odhi openj baalzebub nyasach ekron kata kobiro kwo malaika mar ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni elija jatishbe niya dhi irom gi joote mag ruodh samaria kendo ipenjgi nia nyasaye onge e israel ka koso momiyo udhi mana ir baalzebub mondo upenje wach emomiyo ruoth nyasaye owacho ni ok nikwo initho mana e kitandani minindoeno kane jootego odok ir ruoth nopenjogi gimomiyo giduogo ne gidwoke niya ngat moro oromo kodwa mowachonwa ni mondo wadog ir ruoth noorowa wanyise ni ruoth nyasaye owacho kama nyasaye noyude kobet piny ewi got moro nowachone niya ngat nyasaye ruoth owacho ni mondo ilor elija nodwoke ni ka ngat nyasaye adier mach mondo oa e polo otieki kaachiel gi jogi piero abichgo eka mach noa e polo motieko jalo gi joge ruoth nochako ooro ni elija jatelo machielo kod joge piero abich jalo nodhi ir elija mowachone niya ngat nyasaye ruoth owacho ni mondo ilor piyo elija nodwoke ni ka ngat aora kotwo kane giseidho loka elija nowacho ni elisha niya yier gima datimni kapok okawa kuomi elisha nokone ni akwayi mondo ayud pok ariyo mag teko go elija nodwoke ni ikwayo gima tek kata kamano elija mane olwar piny kendo nodok mochung e dho aora jordan nochwado pi gi law elijano kowacho niya ere ruoth nyasaye nyasach elija kane osechwado pi kamano pi nopogore koni gi koni mi nongado aora kane oganda jonabi modak jeriko onene gi kuma bor ne giwacho niya teko mane elija nigo koro odok ni elisha ne gidhi romone mi gikulorene ka giwachone niya wan gi joma rateke piero abich yie mondo joram wuod ahab nodoko ruodh israel morito piny kuom higni apar gariyo kodak samaria timbene ne richo e nyim ruoth nyasaye ok marom gi mago mane wuon mare gi min mare otimo nikech nogolo siro mar baal rombe kendo higa ka higa nogolo rombe alufu mia achiel kod piende imbe alufu mia achiel kane ahab otho ruodh moab nodagi bedo e bwo loch ruodh israel omiyo ruoth joram nowuok samaria mochoko joisrael duto nooro wach ni jehoshafat ruodh juda niya ruodh moab piem koda diyie wanywak ni jomoab koso jehoshafat nodwoke ni ayie joga e jogi kendo faresena e fareseni eka nopenje ni dwaluw yo mane joram nodwoke ni waluw yor thim edom eka ruodh israel gi ruodh juda kod ruodh edom ne jodhi kanyakla ne gitieko ndalo abiriyo ka gilworo kuma bor nyaka pi norumo ni jolweny kod jamni mane gin go eka ruodh jehoshafat kod ruodh edom ne jodhi ir elisha elisha nopenjo ruodh israel niya gango kodi dhiyo ir jokor weche wuoru gi meru ne dhiye ruodh israel nokwere ni ok kamano nimar ruoth nyasaye ema osechokowa kanyakla mondo oketwa e lwet jomoab elisha nodwoke niya akuongora gi nying ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto atiyone ni da ni ok ageno jehoshafat ruodh juda da ok adewi kata ngiyi da ok angiyi kata kamano kelna jago thum kane jago thum gocho teko mar ruoth nyasaye nolwar kuom elisha mowacho niya ruoth nyasaye owacho ni mondo ukuny buche mangeny e holoni nikech owacho ni ok unune yamo kata koth pi biro pongo holo mondo umodhi kaachiel gi jambu mano en gima yot ni ruoth nyasaye nimar jomoab bende obiro keto e lwetu ubiro loyo mier mochiel gi ohinga kod mier mabeyo duto kendo unutong yien mabeyo duto unudin sokni kendo unuketh puothe mabeyo duto gi kite kamano kinyne gokinyi kar sa mitimoe misango pi nobiro koa yo edom nyaka gwengno duto nolokore pi lilo kane jomoab duto owinjo ni remo omiyo ne giwacho niya macha remo nyaka bed ni ruodhigo nende okedi kendgi monegore koro wadhi wayeki kane gichopo kama joisrael ojotie joisrael nowuok momonjogi mi ne giringo ka joisrael lawogi nodong mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nowacho ruodhi ochang dhoho mar naaman naaman ne jaduong lweny mar ruodh aram kendo ruoth nyasaye nosekonye komiyo joaram loyo e lweny kuom mano ne en ngat ruodhe ogeno nyime kowachone niya koro angeyo ni onge nyasaye kamoro amora mak mana e israel omiyo akwayi ni yie ikawie mich moro matin nodwoke niya gi nying ruoth nyasayee atiyone ok nakaw gimoro nochune mondo okaw elisha nodagi eka naaman nowachone niya kidagi ni kik amiyi gimoro akwayi ni mondo imiya lowo dirom kenje ariyo tingo nikech chakre kawuono ok abi timo misango ni nyasaye moro amora mak mana ni nyasaye mondo owena kuom timo kamano elisha niowachone niya dhiyo gi kue kane naaman osechwalore matin gehazi jatich elisha ngat nyasaye noparo niya ruodha oseweyo naaman jaaram odhi mak okawo mich nokelo gi nying ruoth nyasaye abiro lawe mondo ayudie gimoro kuome omiyo gehazi nolawo naaman kane naaman oneno ngato kalawe nolor oa e gari modhi moromone kopenje niya ere wach gehazi nodwoke niya onge wach ruodha oora mondo anyisi ni yawuowi ariyo mag oganda jonabi ochopo sani koa e piny gode mag efraim okwayi mondo imiye fedha moromo kilo piero adek kod lewni ariyo naaman nodwoke niya yie mondo ikaw kilo piero auchiel nochuno gehazi momiyo kilo piero auchiel mag fedha e kirope ariyo kod lewni ariyo nomiyo jotichne ariyo mondo otinggi ka gitelo e nyim gehazi kane gichopo e dala gehazi nodhi kodi kane ngat cha lor e gache duogo romoni iparo ni e kinde mar kawo fedha gi lewni gi puothe mzabibu gi rombe gi dhok kod jotich machwo gi mamon koso omiyo koro dhoho mar naaman biro maki
