wadhi aora jordan mondo ngato ka ngato otong yien wagergo udi nodwoke niya ayie dhiuru ngato achiel kuomgi nokwayo elisha ni yie idhi kodwa mi noyie modhi kodgi kane gichopo e aora jordan ne gichako tongo yien kane oyudo ngat moro tongo yien wi leye nolwar e pi mi noywak kowacho niya ruoth hapa rach nikech en le aholo ngat nyasaye nopenje niya olwar gi kanye kane jalo onyise elisha nongado luth mobolo kanyono mi le nolewore elisha nokone ni kawe mi ngatno notero lwete mokawe elisha gi joaram chieng moro kane joaram kedo gi joisrael noporo wach gi jotende mag lweny konyisogi kuma obiro butoe ngat nyasaye nooro ni ruodh israel wach kanyise niya kik iluw yorno nikech joaram obuto kuno eka ruodh israel nooro ji kuma ngat nyasaye nosenyise kamano e kaka elisha ne thoro timo omiyo ruoth noresore ndalo mogwarore wachno nothago chuny ruodh aram ahinya mi noluongo jodonge mopenjogi niya dak unyisa ngatwa konyo ruodh israel achiel kuom joge nodwoke niya ruoth onge ngatwa moro amora mak mana elisha janabi ema nyiso ruodhgi gik miwacho kata ka e odi mar nindo ruoth nowacho niya dhiuru mondo udwar kuma entie eka naor ji odhi omake ne ginyise ni en dothan omiyo nooro farese gi geche kod oganda lweny maduong ne gichopo kuno gotieno mi gilworo dalano ka ne ngat nyasaye ochiew gokinyi nowuok oko moneno oganda lweny man gi farese kod geche kolworo dala jatichne nowach niya ruodha wadiwo ti wanatim ango nodwoke niya kik iluor nimar jowa ngeny moloyogi eka elisha nokwayo ruoth nyasaye niya asayi yaw wang jali mondo onen ruoth nyasaye noyawo wang wuowino mi noneno ka got opong gi farese kod geche mag mach ka rito elisha kane joaram obiro monjo elisha nokwayo ruoth nyasaye niya lok jogi muofni mi ruoth nyasaye nolokogi muofni mana kaka elisha nokwaye eka elisha nowachonigi niya ok e yo kendo ok enie dala mudwaro luwauru mondo ateru ir ngat mudwarono eka noterogi nyaka samaria kane gidonjo samaria elisha nowacho niya ruoth nyasaye koro yaw wanggi mondo ginen kamano ruoth nyasaye noyawo wanggi mi ne gipo ka gin mana e dier samaria kane ruodh israel onenogi nopenjo elisha niya wuonwa aneggi koso nodwoke ni kik ineggi bende dineg ji mimako e lweny adier migi chiemo mondo gichiem eka gidog ir ruodhgi omiyo nolosonigi chiemo mathoth kane gisechiemo kendo gimetho noweyogi mi gidok ir ruodhgi chakre kanyo joaram ne ok ochako omonjo joisrael wach mane elisha okoro ka joaram olworo samaria bang mano benhadad ruodh aram nochoko joge duto mag lweny modhi olworo samaria mondo okaw ne gilwore aminga nyaka kech maduong nomako josamaria wi kanyna ningiewo gi fedha moromo kilo achiel ondong mar owuoch akuru ningiewo gi fedha moromo achiel kuom piero ariyo mar kilo chieng moro kane ruodh israel oyudo wuotho ewi ohinga mar dala dhako moro noywakne kawacho niya yaye ruoth konya ruoth nodwoke niya ka ruoth nyasaye ok konyi dakonyi nadi dakonyi gi cham koso gi divai eka ruoth nomedo penje ni ango machandi nodwoke niya dhako moro nowachona ni mondo achiw wuoda wacham kinyne wacham mare omiyo ne watedo wuoda mwachamo kinyne kane awachone ni mondo ochiw wuode wacham nayudo kosepande kane ruoth owinjo wach dhakono noyiecho lepe wachno notimore ka ruoth wuotho ewi ohinga mi ji nongiye moneno ni pien gugru ema orwako ei lepe nowacho niya nyasaye mondo okweda ka ok angado wi elisha wuod shafat oko kawuono noyudo ka elisha obet ewi ode kaachiel gi jodongo ruoth nooro jaote ire kane pok jaoteno ochopo elisha nowacho ni jodongo niya uneno kaka ngat janekno oro ngato mondo obi ongad wiya oko ka jaoteneno ochopo ka ulor dhoot matek nikech ruodhe luwo bange machiegni kane pod owuoyo kodgi ruoth nochopo mowacho niya masirani oa mana kuom ruoth nyasaye omiyo onge tiende medo rito ruoth nyasaye mondo okonywa ruodhi elisha nowacho niya winjuru wach ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye owacho niya kiny kar sa makama nengo atonga mar mogo mayom nobed otonglo achiel e dhoranga samaria kendo atonge ariyo mag shairi bende otonglo achiel jaduong lweny nyagach ruoth nowacho ni ngat nyasaye niya bende gini ditimre adier kata da ruoth nyasaye yaw dirise polo nodwoke niya ibiro nene gi wangi ok nichame noyudo ka jodhoho angwen obet e dhoranga samaria ne gipenjore niya ere gima omiyo warito mondo watho ka kwadonjo e dala kech ni kuno wabiro tho kata kwamedo bet ka pod wabiro mana tho ber wadog ni joaram ka gingwononwa wanabed mangima kata ka gidagi bende watho omiyo kane chieng osepodho ne giwuok mondo gidhi kuma joaram ojotie kane gichopo e dho kambigi ne gipo ka onge kata ngat achiel kanyo nimmar ruoth nyasaye nosemiyo oganda joaram owinjo koko mar geche gi farese machalo oganda maduong mi giwacho kendgi niya winjuru ruodh israel osewako ruodhi mag johiti gi mag jomisri mondo obi oked kodwa omiyo kar angich welo ne giringo mondo gitony ka giweyo hembegi gi faresegi kod kenjegi e kambi kuom mano kane jodhohogo ochopo e dho kambi ne gidonjo e hema moro mi gichiemoe kendo gimethoe eka ne gipeyo fedha gi dhahabu kod lewni mi gidhi gipando ne gidok kendo ne gipeyo gik mane nie hema machielo gigo bende ne gidhi gipando eka ne giwacho kendgi niya yawa ok watim maber en odiechieng mar mor waling alinga nadi kwagalore kama nyaka piny oru wabiro neno masira omiyo koro wadhiuru mondo wanyis jood ruoth gima otimore mi ne gidok kendo ne giluongo jorit ranga dala ka giwachonigi niya nende wachopo e kambi mar joaram ne ok waneno ngato kata winjo dwol moro ne ok wawinjo mak mana hembe gi farese kod kenje motue e loyegi eka jorit rangach nogoyo koko mi wach noter ni jood ruoth ruoth nochiew gotieno mowacho ni jodonge mag lweny niya winjuru gima joaram dwaro timonwa gingeyo ni wadenyo omiyo gisewuok e kambigi gipondo mana e bungu ka giparo ni gibiro makowa kwawuok eka gidonj e dalawa ka achiel kuom jodonge nowacho niya yie mondo ji moko odhi gi farese abich modong nikech farese duto biro tho mana kaka joisrael mangeny osetho waorgi mondo wane gima timore omiyo ne giluongo joidh farese ariyo mi ruoth noorogi mondo giluw bang oganda lweny mar joaram kowachonigi niya dhiuru une gima otimore kuom mano ne giluwo joaram nyaka aora jordan mi giyudo lewni kod gik moko mangeny mane joaram owito e yo ka gireto nikech kibaji eka jootego nodok monyiso ruoth gima ne gineno omiyo ji duto nowuok moyako kambi joaram kendo atonga mar mogo mayom ningiewo otonglo achiel kaka ruoth nyasaye nowacho ruoth noketo jaduong lweny nyagache cha mondo obed jatend jorit rangach ji nonyone piny e dhorangach motho mana kaka ngat nyasaye nowacho chieng mane ruoth obiro ire ngat nyasaye nosewacho ni ruoth niya kiny kar sa makama nengo atonge ariyo mag shairi nobed otonglo achiel kendo nengo atonga mar mogo mayom bende otonglo achiel jaduong lweny cha nosewacho ni ngat nyasaye niya bende gini ditimre adier kata da ruoth nyasaye yaw dirise polo elisha nosedwoke niya ibiro neno gi wangi ok inichame kendo kamano e kaka notimorene nikech ji ne onyone e dhorangach motho ruodhi odwok ni chi shunem lope elisha nosenyiso dhako mane ochierone wuode cha niya dar gi joodi udhi udag kamoro amora unyalo yudoe thuolo nikech ruoth nyasaye biro kelo kech e piny kuom higni abiriyo kamano dhakono nodhi motimo kaka ngat nyasaye nowachone nodar gi joode modhi odak e piny jofilistia kuom higni abiriyo kane higni abiriyogo oserumo dhakono noduogo koa e piny jofilistia mi nodhi mondo okwa ruoth odwokne ode gi puothe noyudo ka ruoth penjo gehazi jatich ngat nyasaye ni mondo onyise gik madongo duto elisha osetimo kane pod gehazi nyiso ruoth kaka elisha nochiero ngat motho nopo ka min wuowi mane ochierono obiro mokwayo ruoth mondo odwokne ode gi puothene mi gehazi nowacho ni ruoth niya ruodha e dhako nogono kendo e wuode mane elisha ochiero ruoth nopenjo dhakono wachno mi dhakono nonyise gik notimore eka ruoth nomiye jaduong moro kowachone niya los wach dhakoni mondo odwokne gige duto kaachiel gi cham duto mosenyak e puothene chakre chieng mane oaye ka nyaka chil kawuono hazael odoko ruodh aram chieng moro elisha nodhi damaski moyudo ka benhadad ruodh haram tuo kane ruoth owinjo ni ngat nyasaye obiro nowacho ni hazael niya kaw mich idhi irom godo ni ngat nyasaye kendo ikwaye mondo openj ruoth nyasaye ka abiro kwo kamano hazael nodhi romo ni elisha kotero ne mich mangeny mogolo damaski moromo ngamia piero angwen tingo kane oromo kode nochung e nyime mowachone niya benhadad ruodh aram nyathini oora ni mondo apenji kobiro kwo elisha nodwoke niya dhiyo iwachne ni obiro kwo kata kamano ruoth nyasaye osenyisa malongo ni obiro tho eka wang elisha notwo kuome kangiye nyaka wi hazael nokuot pi wang ngat nyasaye noton hazael nopenje niya jaduong iywago ango nodwoke niya aywak nikech angeyo kaka ibiro sando joisrael iniwang miechgi mochiel gi ohinga kendo inineg yawuotgi marateke inikidh nyithindgi matindotindo bende iniried iye mondegi mayach hazael nopenje ni anani ere kaka danyal timo gima duong kamano elisha nodwoke niya ruoth nyasaye osenyisa ni ibiro bedo ruodh aram eka hazael noa ir elisha modok ir ruodhe ruoth nopenje gima elisha owachone mi hazael nodwoke niya nonyisa ni ibiro kwo maonge kiawa kinyne noumo wang ruoth gi nanga moluti e pi mothunge nyaka otho eka nobet ruoth kare loch jehoram ruodh juda weche mag ndalo e higa mar abich mar loch joram wuod ahab ruodh israel jehoram wuod jehoshafat nodoko ruodh juda ne en jahigni piero adek gariyo kochako tich ruoth kendo norito piny kuom higni aboro kodak jerusalem noluwo timbe ruodhi mag israel kaka jodhood ahab notimo nikech nokendo nyar ahab timbene ne richo e nyim ruoth nyasaye kata kamano ruoth nyasaye ne ok otieko jojuda nikech noparo daudi jatichne nimar nosesingorene ni anywolane nobed e kom duong ka taya malielne nyaka chieng e ndalo loch jehoram joedom nodagi bet e bwo loch juda mi ne giketo ruodhgi giwegi omiyo jehoram noidho loka nyaka zair kaachiel gi gechene duto mag lweny joedom nolworogi mi jehoram gi jotend gechene nochiew gotieno momwomo joge duto noringo modok miechgi mano e kaka joedom notieko loch juda edom nyaka chil kawuono e ndalogo libna bende nodagi bet e bwo loch juda koro weche moko mag jehoram kod timbene duto ondiki e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag juda jehoram notho mi noyike kwerene e dala daudi ahazia wuode nodoko ruoth kare lochh ahazia ruodh juda weche mag ndalo e higa mar apar gariyo mar loch joram wuod ahab ruodh israel ahazia wuod jehoram nodoko ruodh juda ahazia ne jahigni piero ariyo gariyo kane ochako tich ruoth kendo norito piny kuom higa achiel kodak jerusalem min mare ne nyinge athalia nyakwar omri ruodh israel ahazia bende noluwo timbe dhood ahab timbene ne richo e nyim ruoth nyasaye mana kaka timbe ahab nikech ne en jodhood ahab ahazia gi joram wuod ahab ne jodhi ramothgilead mondo oked gi hazael ruodh aram nopo ka joaram ohinyo joram kuno mi ruoth joram nodok jezreel ni mondo ochang kuom hinyruok noyudo ramoth kokedo gi hazael ruodh aram eka ahazia wuod jehoram ruodh juda nodhi jezreel mondo one joram wuod ahab nikech joram ne tuo ruodhi owir jehu mondo obed ruodh israel elisha janabi noluongo achiel kuom jonabi mowachone niya ngwan lepi idhi ramothgilead gi puga mar morni kichopo dwar jehu wuod jehoshafat wuod nimshi kisetundo kama entie gole kuom jolweny wetene kendo itere e ot maiye eka ikaw puga mar mo iol e wiye kikone ni ruoth nyasaye owachone ni oseyiere mondo obed ruodh israel ka isewacho kamano yaw dhoot iring ia kik ideki omiyo janabi rawerano nodhi ramothgilead monwango jodong lweny ka nie bura nowacho niya jaduong adwaro loso kodi jehu nopenje niya en nga idwaro losogo kuomwa nodwoke ni mana jaduong mi jehu noa malo modonjo e ot eka janabino noolo mo e wiye kawachone ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel owacho niya aseyieri mondo ibed ruodh israel inineg dhood ahab ruodhu mondo ochulgo kuor kuom jezebel nikech nochuero remb jotichna jonabi kod jotichna mamoko duto dhood ahab duto norum anatiek joahab machwo duto onge kata achiel nodong e israel analok dhoode mondo ochal gi dhood jeroboam wuod nebat kendo machal gi dhood baasha wuod ahija guogi nocham jezebel e piny jezreel kendo onge ngama nokonye eka janabino noyawo dhoot moringo kane jehu owuok modok ir jodong ruodhe ne gipenje niya ere wach janekono nobiro iri nango nodwokogi niya ungeyo kaka ngatno wuoyo ne gikwere ni mano miriambo wachnwa awacha adiera nodwokogi kendo niya nonyisa ni ruoth nyasaye owacho ni oseyiera mondo abed ruodh israel mi jogo duto nopedho lepgi aruya ewi raidhi mondo jehu obedie eka ne gigoyo tung ka gikok niya jehu e ruoth jehu onego joram ruodh israel kamano e kaka jehu wuod jehoshsfat wuod nimshi nochako piem gi joram mondo ogol e tich ruoth jehu nowacho ni jodong lweny wetene niya ka parou chal kamano kara neuru ni ngato ok owuok e dala ka diter wach jezreel eka jehu noidho gache modhi jezreel nimar joram ne ni kuno ahazia ruodh juda bende ne ni kuno ka wendo joram ruoth joram ne ni jezreel mondo ochang kuom hinyruok mane oyudo e lwet joaram ramothgilead gi joisrael duto mondo kik hazael ruodh aram kaw jarito mane oyudo ochung ewi ohinga mar jezreel noneno jehu gi joge ka biro mowacho niya aneno ji moko ka biro joram nowachone ni ngato gi faras odhi oromnigi mondo openjgi ka wach ber omiyo jaidh faras nodhi romonigi mowachonigi niya ruoth penjo ka wach ber jehu nodwoke niya wach maber obadhie ango wichri ilu banga jarito mane ni ewi ohinga nochako owacho niya jaote cha osechopo irgi ok ane koduogo eka ruoth nooro jaidh faras machielo bende nowachonigi niya ruoth penjo ka wach ber jehu nodwoke niya wach maber obadhie ango wichri ilu banga jarito nowacho kendo niya jaoteno osechopo irgi en bende ok oduogi jariemb gari cha chalo mana gi jehu wuod nimshi nikech oriembo matek ka janeko joram nowacho ni joge mondo oikne gache mi ne gitimo kamano eka joram ruodh israel kod ahazia ruodh juda ne jowuok gi gechegi ka dhi romo ni jehu mi ne giromo kode e puoth naboth jajezreel kane joram oneno jehu nopenje niya ere kaka wach nyalo bet maber ka meru jezebel pod dhi nyime gi timbene mag ndhogruok gi mag jwok kane joram owinjo wachno noloko gache moringo kowacho ni ahazia niya ahazia masira ni ka jogi jemo jehu noywayo asere gi tekone duto mochwowo otenga joram mi asere nopowo e dho chunye monywowore e gache eka jehu nowacho ni bidkar mane jatingne gilweny niya kawe ibole e pwoth naboth jajezreel ok ipar gima ruoth nyasaye nowacho kuome chieng mane wan kodi e gach lweny kwaluwo bang ahab wuon mare donge ruoth nyasaye nowacho kuome ni nyoro aneni kinego naboth gi yawuote abiro chuloni kuor e puodhoni omiyo kawe ibole e puodhono mondo wach ruoth nyasaye ochop kare jehu onego ahazia ruodh juda weche mag ndalo kane ahazia ruodh juda oneno gima otimore noringo kochomo bethhagan jehu nolawe kawacho niya en bende negeuru mi ne gichwowe ka geche idho got gur machiegni gi ibleam noringo nyaka megido motho kuro joge notinge e gari nyaka jerusalem mi giyike kwerene e dala daudi ahazia nochako bet ruodh juda e higa mar apar gachiel mar loch joram wuod ahab tho mar jezebel kane jehu ochopo jezreel jezebel nowinjo birone omiyo nowiro wange gi mo kendo oloso yie wiye eka nongicho gie dirisa kane jehu odonjo e dhorangach jezebel nowachone niya ere wach zimri janek ruodheni jehu notingo wange mongiyo dirisa kapenjo niya ere ngama odokna eka jotich ariyo kata adek nobiro e dirisa mongiye jehu nowacho nigi niya dhiruru dhakono piny kamano ne gidhire mi rembe nokirore e kor ot kendo farese nonyone jehu nodonjo e ot mochiemo kendo ometho eka nowacho niya dhiuru uyik dhako mokuongni nikech en nyar ruoth kane gidhi mondo giyike ne ginwango mana hanga wiye gi tiendene kod luetene kende kane gidok nyiso jehu nowachonigi niya mano e gima ruoth nyasaye nomiyo jatichne elija jatishbe owacho kokoro niya guogi nocham ringre jezebel e gweng jezreel kendo ringre nochal kaka owuoyo moyar e puothe mag jezreel onge ngato nonge ni e jezebel ruodhi jehu otieko dhood ahab noyudo ka yawuot ahab piero abiriyo odak samaria omiyo jehu nondiko barupe mooro samaria ni jodong dala kod joma ne pidho yawuot ahabgo kowacho niya donge yawuot ruoth odak kodu kendo un gi gilwenje gi geche gi farese kod mier mochiel omiyo kuyudo baruani yieruru wuod ruoth moro malongo kendo motegno uket e kom wuon mare mondo uked ni dhood ruodhu ne giluor ahinya ka giwacho niya jehu noloyo ruodhi ariyo kande koro wan dwaloye nadi omiyo jaduong od ruoth gi jaduong dala kaachiel gi jodongo kod jogo mane pidho yawuowigo nooro ni jehu wach niya wan jotichni kendo wayie timo gimoro amora miwachonwa ok wanaket ngat moro obed ruoth tim atima gima idwaro eka jehu nondikonigi barua machielo kawacho niya kuyie dokna kendo mako chikna ngaduru wiye yawuot ruodhu ukelna jezreel kiny sa makama yawuot ruoth piero abiriyogo nodak kod jodong dala mane pidhogi kane jodongogo oyudo baruano ne ginego yawuot ruoth duto mi giketo wiyegi e aditni kendo giorogi jezreel ni jehu kane jaote onyiso jehu ni osekel wiye yawuot ruoth jehu nowacho ni mondo odhurgi pidhe ariyo e dhorangach gibed kanyo nyaka piny ru nowuok gokinyi mowacho ni ji duto niya ema najamo ruodha manego omiyo un uonge bura e wachno koro jogi duto ngama onego kuom mano ngeuru ni onge wach ruoth nyasaye kata achiel norem mak otimore kuom weche duto mane owacho kuom dhood ahab nikech ruoth nyasaye osetimo gima nomiyo elija jatichne owacho eka jehu nonego jodhood ahab duto nodong jezreel gi jodonge duto gi osiepene kod jodolo mage nyaka ne onge kata ngat achiel modong jehu nowuok kadhi samaria kane osechopo betheked kajokwath nopo koromo gi owete ahazia ruodh juda nopenjogi niya un nga gini ne gidwoke ni wan owete ahazia kendo wadhi limo joka ruoth eka jehu nowacho niya makgiuru mi ne gimakogi duto ji piero angwen gariyo kendo ne ginegogi pep e yap betheked kane jehu osea kuno noneno jehonadab wuod rekab ka biro romone nomose mopenje niya bende chunyi ler koda kaka chunya ler kodi jehonadab nodwoke niya ee chunya ler kodi jehu nokone ni ka kamano mak lweta omiyo jehonadab nomako lwete eka jehu nokwaye mondo giidh gari kowachone niya bi wadhi mondo ine kaka atiyo ni ruoth nyasaye gi kinda kamano jehu notero jehonadab samaria gi geche kane gichopo samaria nonego jodhood ahab duto nodong kuno nyaka notiekogi chuth mano e kaka wach mane ruoth nyasaye owacho ni elija nochopo kare jehu otieko lemo mar baal eka jehu nochoko joisrael duto mowachonigi niya ahab notiyo ni baal matin nono abiro tiyone moloyo omiyo luongnauru jonabi duto mag baal gi ji duto malame kod jodolo mage kik ngato dong kata achiel nikech adwaro timo ni baal liswa maduong ngama obare notho jehu nowuondogi kamano mondo oneg jogo duto mane lamo baal nochiko ni mondo olos chokruok mopwodhi mar lamo baal mi ne gitimo kamano nooro wach e piny israel duto mi jolam baal nobiro maonge kata ngat achiel modong ne gidonjo e od baal ot opong onge kata kama iboloe luth jehu nonyiso jarit lep lemo mondo opogni jolam baal duto lewnigo mi nomiyogi eka jehu nodonjo e od baal gi jehonadab wuod rekab nowacho ni jolam baal niya nonuru mondo une ni onge jatich ruoth nyasaye moro e dieru ka mak mana jolam baal kende eka nochako wango misango kendo timo liswa jehu noseketo askeche piero aboro oko mondo orit ot kawachonigi niya ka ngato kuomu oweyo ngat achiel kuom joma aseketo e lwetu otony en ema notho kar ngatno kane jehu osetieko wango misango nowacho ni askechego kod jotendgi niya donjuru uneggi kik uwe ngato tony kane askechego kod jotendgi osenegogi ne giwito ringregi oko eka ne gidonjo e od baal maiye mi gigoloe siro mane ji lamo mi giwango kamano ne giketho siro mar baal kendo ne gimuko od baal mi giloko choo kendo pod en kamano nyaka chil kawuoono mano e kaka jehu notieko lemo mar baal e israel kata kamano ne ok oweyo timo timbe maricho mane jeroboam wuod nebat omiyo joisrael otimo nimar ji ne pod lamo nyiroye mag dhahabu mane ni bethel gi mane ni dan ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni jehu niya amor gi tich misetiyo nikech isetimo ni dhood ahab kaka nadwaro omiyo nyikwayi nobed ruodhi mag israel nyaka tieng mar angwen jehu ne ok odewo rito chik ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel gi chunye duto nomedo timo richo mane jeroboam omiyo joisrael otimo ndalogo ema ruoth nyasaye nochako thiroe joisrael komiyo wasikgi kawo bethe pinygi hazael noloyo joisrael e pinygi duto chakre aora jordan kochomo yo wuokchieng nokawo piny gilead gi bashan duto chakre aroer aora arnon koloyo jogad gi joreuben kod jomanase weche moko mag jehu gi timbene kod tekone duto ondik e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag israel jehu notho moyike samaria jehoahaz wuode nodoko ruoth kare jehu nobet ruodh israel kuom higni piero ariyo gaboro kodak samaria ruodhi athalia okawo loch gi thwon weche mag ndalo kane athalia min ahazia oneno ni wuode osetho nonego joka ruoth duto jehosheba nyar ruoth jehoram nyamin ahazia nogolo joash lingling kuom yawuot ruoth nidwaro nego mi nopande e od nindo kod japite kamano athalia ne ok onege joash nodak kod jehosheba e od ruoth nyasaye kuom higni auchiel e kinde mar loch athalia e higa mar abiriyo jehoyada jadolo nooro wach moluongo jotend jokari kod jotend askeche jorit mondo obi ire e od ruoth nyasaye notimo kodgi winjruok kendo nomiyo gikuongore eka nonyisogii wuod ruoth nochikogi kama migap askeche matiyo chieng sabato nyaka rit od ruoth migepe ariyo modong mondo orit od ruoth nyasaye kendo oluor ruoth ka girite ka ngato ka ngato omako gilweny e lwete ka ngat moro amora dwaro mwomou negeuru bende kamoro amora ruoth dhiye koweuru kurite jotend askeche notimo duto mane jehoyada jadolo ochikogi ngato ka ngato kuomgi nokelo askeche duto mane onego oa e tich chieng sabato kaachiel gi mago mane onego ochak tich chiengno jadolono nopogo ni jotend askechego tonge gi kuodi mane mag ruoth daudi mane okan e od ruoth nyasaye askeche mag jorit noriedo ka ngato ka ngato omako gilweny e lwete chakre yo milambo nyaka yo nyandwat mar hekalu ka gilworo kendomarmisango kaachiel gi hekalu eka jehoyada nogolo wuod ruoth oko nosidhone osimb duong momiye kitap chik kendo nowire gi mo mondo obed ruoth ji duto nopamo lwetgi ka kok niya ruoth mondo odag aminga kane athalia owinjo mahu mar ji nodhi e od ruoth nyasaye kama ne gintie noneno ruoth kochung e bath siro kaka kit joisrael nobet ka tung ywak kendo ji wer ji duto ne mor kendo goyo tung mi athalia noyiecho lepe ka kok niya ujemo ujemo jehoyada jadolo nowacho ni jotend askeche niya goleuru oko kik unege e od ruoth nyasaye kendo ka ngat moro oluwe neguru ngatno omiyo ne gimake kendo ne gigole ka giluwo dhorangach mane farese donjogo e dala ruoth mi ne ginege kanyo eka jehoyada nomiyo ruoth kod joisrael osingore ni ruoth nyasaye ni ginibed joruoth nyasaye nomiyo ruoth gi ji bende otimo winjruok e kindgi giwegi mi ji duto nodhi momuko od baal kendo ne ginego matan jadolo mar baal e nyim kende mag liswago jehoyada noketo jorit e od ruoth nyasaye eka nodhi gi jotend askeche gi jokari kod ji duto mi ne giwuok gii ruoth e od ruoth nyasaye ne gikowe nyaka e od ruoth ka giluwo dhoranga jorit eka joash nobet e kom duong kane oseneg athalia e od ruoth ji duto nobedo mamor kendo jerusalem nokue loch joash ruodh juda weche mag ndalo joash ne jahigni abiriyo kane odoko ruoth ruodhi loch jehoahaz ruodh israel e higa mar piero ariyo gadek mar loch joash wuod ahazia ruodh juda jehoahaz wuod jehu nodoko ruodh israel mi norito kuom higni apar gabiriyo kodak samaria timbene ne richo e nyim ruoth nyasaye koluwo richo mane jeroboam wuod nebat omiyo joisrael otimo ne ok oweyo kata achiel ruoth nyasaye nokecho gi joisrael mi nothoro ketogi e lwet hazael ruodh aram kendo e lwet benhadad wuode jehoahaz nosayo ruoth nyasaye mi ruoth nyasaye nowinje nikech noneno kaka ruodh aram sando joisrael omiyo ruoth nyasaye nomiyo joisrael ngat noresogi e lwet joaram mi ne gidak e miechgi gi kue kaka chon kata kamano ne ok giweyo timbe maricho mag dhood jeroboam mane jeroboam omiyo joisrael otimo ne pod giluwogi kido mar nyasaye dhako miluongo ni ashera bende ne pod ni samaria ruoth nyasaye noweyo ni jehoahaz mana jolweny alufu apar gi joidh farese piero abich kod geche lweny apar nikech ruodh aram nosetiekogi mi gichalo mana mihudhi weche moko mag jehoahaz gi timbene duto kod tekone ondiki e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag israel jehoahaz notho moluwo kwerene mi noyike samaria jehoash wuode nodoko ruoth kare loch jehoash ruodh israel e higa mar piero adek gabiriyo mar loch joash ruodh juda ema jehoash wuod jehoahaz nodokoe ruodh israel kendo norito piny kuom higni apar gauchiel kodak samaria en bende timbene ne richo e nyim ruoth nyasaye koluwo timbe maricho duto mane jeroboam wuod nebat omiyo joisarel otimo weche moko mag jehoahaz gi timbene duto kod teko mane okedogo gi amazia ruodh juda ondiki e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag israel jehoahash notho moluwo kwerene mi noyike samaria ruodhi mag israel jeroboam nodoko ruoth kare tho mar elisha kane elisha tuo gi tuo mane biro nege noyudo jehoash ruodh israel osedhi nene moywage ni wuora wuora isebedonwa kaka geche lweny gi joidh farese mag israel elisha nowachone niya kaw tung gi aserini mi notimo kamano eka elisha nochako owachone niya ywa atung mi noywayo elisha noketo luetene kuom luete ruoth mowacho niya yaw dirisa mochomo yo wuokchieng mi noyawo eka elisha nowachone niya dir asere kane osediro elisha nowachone niya mano asech loch ruoth nyasaye kendo onyiso ni ibiro loyo joaram ibiro kedo gi joaram e dala mar afek nyaka itiekgi chuth nowachone kendo niya koro kaw aserini modong kane ruoth osekawogi elisha nowachone ni chiel piny kodgi mi nochielo piny nyadidek moweyo elisha ngat nyasaye nokecho kode mowachone niya da bed ni ichielo piny nyadibich kata nyadiuchiel eka da itieko joaram chuth koro inilogi mana nyadidek kende elisha notho moyiki kindego jomoab ne thoro monjo piny israel higa ka higa chieng moro kane jomoko yiko ngato ne gipo ka gineno wasigu kabiro mi ne gibolo ringre ngatno ei liend elisha kane ringre ngat mothono olwar kuom choke elisha chunye noduogo mochung hazael ruodh aram ne thago joisrael ndalo duto mag loch jehoahaz ruoth nyasaye nongwononigi kendo nokechogi koparo singruok mane otimo gi ibrahim kendo gi isaka kod jakobo emomiyo ne ok otiekogi kata witogi oko ne ok owitogi kane hazael ruodh aram otho benhadad wuode nodoko ruoth kare jehoash wuod jehoahaz nomayo benhadad wuod hazael mier mane hazael ogolo e lwet jehoahaz wuon mare e lweny jehoash noloyo benhadad nyadidek mi nodwoko miergo ni israel ruodhi loch amazia ruodh juda weche mag ndalo e higa mar ariyo mar loch jehoash wuod jehoahaz ruodh israel amazia wuod joash nodoko ruodh juda ne en jahigni piero ariyo gabich kane ochako tich kendo norito piny kuom higni piero ariyo gochiko kodak jerusalem min mare ne nyinge jehoadin nyar jerusalem timbe amazia ne longo e nyim ruoth nyasaye ok machal gi daudi kwar mare noluwo timbe duto mag joash wuon mare kata kamano hembko mane ni kuonde motingore ne ok okethi kendo ji ne pod timo misengni kendo wango ubani kuondegoo kane amazia ogurore e tich ruoth nonego joge nonego wuon mare mane ruoth ne ok onego yawuot jonekgo noluwo wach mondiki e kitap chik mar musa kama ruoth nyasaye owachoe niya kik uneg wuone nikech richo mag nyithindgi kata kik uneg nyithindo nikech richo mag wuonegi ngato ka ngato noneg mana nikech richone owuon amazia nonego joedom alufu apar e holo kado mi okawo sela gi lweny mochako ni joksheel pod iluonge kamano nyaka chil kawuono eka amazia nooro ni jehoash wuod jehoahaz wuod jehu ruodh israel kowachone niya bi mondo waradi jehoash ruodh israel nodwoko amazia ruodh juda gi ngero niya okuro moro man lebanon nooro wach ni yath maduong man lebanon kowachone niya yie mondo wuoda okend nyari nopo ka le moro kadho kanyo monyono okurono moketho adieri iseloyo joedom mi koro ipakori pakruoknino mondo oromi ibedgo mana e dala ango momiyo iero miero biro tieki kaachiel gi jojuda amazia ne ok odewo omiyo jehoash ruodh israel nodhi bethshemesh dala mar juda nokedo gi amazia ruodh juda kuno kendo joisrael noloyo jojuda moringo nyaka miechgi jehoash ruodh israel nomako amazia wuod joash wuod ahazia ruodh juda e bethshemesh nodhi jerusalem momuko bath ohinga borne mita mia ariyo chakre dhoranga efraim nyaka dhorangach kama ohinga ogomogo nokawo dhahabu gi fedha kod gik moko duto mane onwango e od ruoth nyasaye kod kar keno mar od ruoth bende nokawo ji moko motueyo ka gir singo eka nodok samaria koro weche moko mag jehoash gi timbene duto kod chir mane okedogo gi amazia ruodh juda ondiki e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag israel jehoash notho moluwo kwerene noyike samaria ruodhi mag israel jeroboam wuode nodoko ruoth kare amazia wuod joash ruodh juda nodak higni apar gabich bang tho joash wuod jehoahaz ruodh israel timbene moko duto ondiki e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag juda joge moko nojame jerusalem mi noringo nyaka lakish ne gilawe mi ginege kuno ne gitingo ringre gi farese ka gidwoko jerusalem mi noyike kwerene e dala daudi eka jojuda duto noketo uzia ruoth kar amazia wuon mare ka en jahigni apar gauchiel en ema nokawo dala mar elath modwoko ni jojuda bang tho wuon mare eka ne ochiele gi ohinga jeroboam machielo odoko ruodh israel e higa mar apar gabich mar loch amazia wuod joash ruodh juda jeroboam wuod jehoash nodoko ruodh israel kodak samaria norito piny kuom higni piero angwen gachiel timbene ne richo e nyim ruoth nyasaye mana kaka timbe duto mane jeroboam wuod nebat omiyogo joisrael obedo joricho nodwoko piny mane olal ni israel chakre kama idonjogo hamath nyaka nam kado kaka ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel nomiyo janabi jona wuod amitai jagathhefer owacho kane ruoth nyasaye oneno ni masich joisrael lit ahinya kendo onge ngato kata achiel manyalo konyogi nomiyo jeroboam wuod jehoash oresogi nikech nosewacho ni ok noruch nying joisrael oko koro weche moko mag jeroboam gi timbene duto kod chir mane okedogo gi jodamaski kendo kaka nohoyo ruoth nyasaye ni kik mirimbe kuom joisrael ondik e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag israel jeroboam notho moluwo kwerene mane ruodhi mag israel zekaria wuode nodoko ruoth kare ruodhi loch ahaz ruodh juda weche mag ndalo e higa mar apar gabiriyo mar loch peka wuod remalia ema ahaz wuod jotham nodokoe ruodh juda ne en jahigni piero ariyo kane ochako tich morito piny kuom higni apar gauchiel kodak jerusalem timbene ne ok longo e nyim ruoth nyasaye kaka timbe daudi wuon mare ne longo noluwo timbe ruodhi mag israel gima rach moloyo en ni nowango wuode ka gir misango koluwo timbe makuero mag ogendini mane ruoth nyasaye oriembo mondo owe thuolo ni joisrael bende notimo misengni kendo nowango ubani e hembko ewi gode kendo e tiend yath moro amora motimo otiep e ndalogo rezin ruodh aram gi peka wuod remalia ruodh israel nodhi monjo jerusalem ne gilworo ahaz gi joge ne ok ginyal loye kindego bende ema ruodh edom noriemboe jojuda elath modwoko ni joedom mi joedom nodhi elath kuma gidakie nyaka chil kawuono kane ahaz oyudo ni ruodhigo olwore kamano nooro joote ir tiglathpileser ruodh asuria kowachone niya nyathini kendo jatichni yie ibi iresa e lwet ruodh aram gi ruodh israel kedo koda bende ahaz nokawo fedha gi dhahabu mane nie od ruoth nyasaye kod kar keno mar od ruoth mooro ni ruodh asuria kaka chiwo ruodh asuria noyie gi wechene modhi omonjo damaski mokawo nodaro joma odakie motero e tuech kir rezin bende nonego kane ruoth ahaz odhi damaski romo gi tiglathpileser ruodh asuria noneno kendomarmisango mane ni kuno mi nooro ni uria jadolo kido mar kendono gi romne duto manyise kaka ochalo uria jadolo noloso kendomarmisango machielo machal gi mano chuth kendo notieke ka pok ruoth ahaz oduogo koa damaski kane ruoth oduogo norango kendono eka noidho raidhi kosudo machiegni kode nowangoe misango miwango pep kod misango mar mogo bende notimoe misango miolo piny kendo nokiroe remb misengni mag sawo kendomarmisango mar mula mane nie nyim ruoth nyasaye nogolo e kind kendone manyien gi od ruoth nyasaye moketo yo nyandwat mar kendo manyienno ruoth ahaz nowacho ni uria jadolo niya e kendo maduongni ema nitimie misango mar okinyi kod mar mogo mitimo godhiambo gi mar ruoth kod misangone mar mogo kod misengni miolo piny inikir kuome remo duto mag misengni mamoko kendomarmula ema anapenjie ruoth nyasaye wach uria jadolo notimo gik mojo duto kaka ruoth ahaz nochike ruoth ahaz nongado frembe mag rachungi mane nie hekalu kendo nogolo nyilerni mane nie wigi gima ne iluongo ni nam bende nogolo kuom ruedhi mag mula mane nie bwoye mi orenjo e rachungi mar kite bende nomuko agola mane okonyorego chieng sabato gi dhorangach oko mane odonjogo e od ruoth nyasaye nikech noluoro ruodh asuria timbe moko mag ahaz ondiki e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag juda ahaz notho moyike kwerene e dala daudi hezekia wuode nodoko ruoth kare ruodhi okaw samaria mi oter joisrael e tuech e higa mar apar gariyo mar loch ahaz ruodh juda hoshea wuod ela nodoko ruodh israel morito piny kuom higni ochiko kodak samaria timbene ne ok longo e nyim ruoth nyasaye ok ne giricho kaka timbe ruodhi mag israel mane okuongone tiyo shalmaneser ruodh asuria nokedo gi hoshea mi oloyo koro hoshea nobet e bwo lochne kendo golone osuru ruodh asuria noyudo ni hoshea ndhoge nikech hoshea noseoro joote ir ruodh misri bende noweyo chulo osuru kaka nosebedo kotimo higa ka higa kuom mano ruodh asuria nomake mokete e od tuech eka ruodh asuria nomonjo pinyno duto mochopo samaria noluore kuom higni adek mokawe e higa mar ochiko mar loch hoshea nomako joisrael motero asuria kendo noketo moko mondo odag hela aora habor man gazon moko noketo e miech jomedia mano notimore nikech timbe joisrael ne ok longo e nyim ruoth nyasaye mane ogologi e piny misri e bwo loch farao ne gilamo nyiseche mamoko kendo ne giluwo timbe mag ruodhi mag israel oketo kod timbe ogendini mane nyasaye oriembo e pinygi mondo owe ni joisrael thuolo joisrael noyanyo ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi kendo ne gigero ut lemo e hembko mane nie miechgi matindo gi madongo duto ne gichungo sirni milamo mag kite gi mag yien ewi gode maboyo duto kendo yiend yath moro amora motimo otiep ne giwango ubani kuondego duto kaka ogendini mane ruoth nyasaye oriembo e pinyno ne timo kendo ne gitimo timbe mamono mane omiyo ruoth nyasaye mirima ne gilamo nyiseche manono mane ruoth nyasaye okwerogi ni kik gilam ruoth nyasaye ne siemo joisrael kod jojuda kooronigi jonabi gi jokor wach duto kowachonigi niya weuru yoreu maricho mondo umak chikena gi buchena jonabina mane aoro onyiso kwereu kata kamano ne gidagi weyo yorego nikech ne wigi tek ka wi kweregi mane ok oyie kuom ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi ne gichayo chikene gi singruokne mane otimo kod kweregi kendo ne ok gidewo weche mane osiemogigo ne gilamo nyiseche manono nyaka gin giwegi gidoko joma nono nikech ne giluwo timbe mag ogendini mokiewo kodgi mane ruoth nyasaye osekwerogi ni kik giluw ne giweyo chike duto mag ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi ka gilenyo mula mi gilosgo nyiroye ariyo mondo gilam kendo ka gichungo siro milamo bende ne gilamo sulue duto kendo ne gitiyo ni baal ne giwango yawuotgi gi nyigi ka misango kendo ne giwuoyo gi nyakalondo kamano ne gichiwore ni timbe maricho e nyim ruoth nyasaye ka gimiyego mirima kuom mano ruoth nyasaye nokecho ahinya gi joisrael mi noriembogi e nyime onge modong mak mana jojuda kende jojuda bende ne ok orito chik ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi ne giluwo mana timbe joisrael ochako timo omiyo ruoth nyasaye nodagi nyikwa israel duto nothagogi moketogi e lwet wasigu mane peyogi achien nogologi e pinygi kane ruoth nyasaye opogo joisrael kuom dhood daudi joisrael noketo jeroboam wuod nebat ruoth mi jeroboam nohoyo joisrael mondo owe luwo ruoth nyasaye kendo nomiyo gidonjo e richo maduong joisrael noluwo timbe maricho duto mane jeroboam otimo ne ok giweyo richogo kata matin nyaka ruoth nyasaye nogologi e nyime kaka nosemiyo jonabine duto owacho nodarogi moterogi asuria kuma gintie nyaka chil kawuono ruodh asuria okelo ogendini moko mondo odag samaria ruodh asuria nogolo ji babulon gi kutha gi ava gi hamath kod sefarvaim moketogi e miech samaria kar joisrael mi ne gidoko weg pinyno kane gichako dak kanyo ne ok gilam ruoth nyasaye omiyo ruoth nyasaye nooro sibuoche monego jomoko kuomgi ne onyis ruodh asuria niya ogendini mane idaro miketio e miech samaria ok ongeyo yo onego olamgo nyasach pinyno kuom mano nyasayeno oseoro sibuoche koro negogi eka ruodh asuria nowacho niya dwokuru achiel kuom jodolo mane agolo samaria odhi odag kuro kapuonjogi kaka onego lam nyasach pinyno kamano jadolo achiel mane osegol samaria nodok kuro modak bethel kapuonjo ji kaka onego lam ruoth nyasaye kata kamano oganda ka oganda ne pod loso nyisechegi giwegi kendo ketogi ei ut lemo mane josamaria oloso e hembko mane ni kuonde motingore nyiseche mane oganda ka oganda oloso e miechgi e magi jobabulon noloso sukothbenoth nyasachgi kendo jokuth noloso nergal johamath noloso ashima kendo joarvi noloso nibhaz kod tartak josefarvaim ne wango nyithindgi ka misango ni adramelek gi anamelek mane nyisechegi kaachiel gi nyisechego ne gilamo ruoth nyasaye bende kendo ne giyiero ji ariyo mondo obed jodolo mag hembko mane ni kuonde motingore mondo otimnigi misengni kuondego kamano ne gilamo ruoth nyasaye bende ne gitiyo ni nyisechegi giwegi ka giluwo timbe pinje mane ogolgie pod giluwo timbe machongo nyaka chil kawuono ok giluoro ruoth nyasaye bende ok giluw buchene gi yorene kata mako puonjne kata rito chik mane oketo ni nyikwa jakobo jal mane ruoth nyasaye oloko nyinge ni israel ruoth nyasaye nosetimo kodgi singruok kawachonigi niya kik ulam nyiseche mamoko kata kik ukulrunigi kim utinigi kata kik utimnigi misango ema mondo ukulruna kendo utimna misango nikech ema nagolou e piny misri gi teko maduong karieyo bada ni lweny kik ulam nyiseche mamoko rituru buchena gi chikena mane aketonu e ndiko wiu kik wil gi singruok mane atimo kodu kik ulam nyiseche mamoko lamuru mana ruoth nyasaye mi anaresu e lwet wasiku duto kata kamano ne ok gidewo ne gisiko gi timbegi machon kamano ogendinigo ne lamo ruoth nyasaye gi nyiseche manono bende nyithindgi gi nyikwagi ne timo kaka kweregi ne timo kendo pod gitimo kamano nyaka chil kawuono ruodhi loch hezekia ruodh juda weche mag ndalo e higa mar adek mar loch hoshea wuod ela ruodh israel hezekia wuod ahaz nodoko ruodh juda ne en jahigni piero ariyo gabich kane ochako tich morito piny kuom higni piero ariyo gochiko kodak jerusalem min mare ne nyinge abija nyar zekaria timbe hezekia ne longo e nyim ruoth nyasaye mana kaka timbe daudi kwar mare noketho ut lemo mag hembko kaachiel gi sirni milamo mag kite gi mag yien thuond mula mane musa oloso bende nongado matindotindo nikech nyaka chop ndalogo joisrael ne pod wangoe ubani thuondno niluongo ni nekushtan tiende ni gima olos gi mula hezekia nogeno ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel kendo onge ruoth moro machal kode kuom ruodhi duto mag juda nikech nopadore kuom ruoth nyasaye chutho ka ok oweyo luwe kendo norito chike duto mane ruoth nyasaye omiyo musa kuom mano ruoth nyasaye ne ni kode kendo noguedho gik moko duto mane otimo nodagi bet e bwo loch asuria kendo noloyo jofilistia e lweny kokawo mier madongo gi matindo duto nyaka gaza gi mier mokiewo kode ruodh asuria okawo samaria mi otero joisrael e tuech e higa mar angwen mar loch hezekia kane hoshea wuod ela osebet ruodh israel kuom higni abiriyo shalmaneser ruodh asuria nomonjo samaria nolworo dalano kuom higni adek mokawo e higa mar auchiel mar loch hezekia kane hoshea wuod ela osebet ruodh israel kuom higni ochiko ruodh asuria nodaro joisrael motero nyaka asuria mi noketo moko kuomgi mondo odag hela aora habor man gozan moko noketo e miech jomedia wachno notimore nikech ne ok girito chik ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi ne giketho singruok mane gitimo kodgi ne ok gimako weche duto mane musa jatich ruoth nyasaye ochikogi kata dewogi bende ne ok gidewo senakerib ruodh asuria omonjo piny juda weche mag ndalo isaya e higa mar apar gabich mar loch hezekia senakerib ruodh asuria nomonjo miech juda duto mochiel gi ohinga mokawo eka hezekia ruodh juda nooro wach ni ruodh asuria mane oyudo ni lakish niya aseketho kedo koda kendo nikech ayie chulo gimoro amora midwaro kamano ruodh asuria nodwaro kuome fedha maromo kilo alufu apar kod dhahabu moromo kilo alufu achiel mi hezekia nomiye fedha duto mane nie od ruoth nyasaye kod mane nie kar keno mar od ruoth e ndalono ema hezekia nogoloe dhahabu mane obawgo thike kod sirni mag dhood ruoth nyasaye momiyo ruodh asuria ruodh asuria nooro tartan gi rabsaris kod rabshake jodonge kaachiel gi oganda lweny maduong ir hezekia mi ne giwuok lakish ka gidhi jerusalem kane gichopo kuno ne gichung fereji golo pi e yawo mamalo e yo maduong madhi e puodho miluongo ni puoth jalwok lewni ne giluongo ruoth eliakim wuod hilkia mane jaduong od ruoth gi shebna jagoro kod joa wuod asaf jachan weche mag piny ema ne jowuok irgi rabshake nowachonigi ni mondo ginyis hezekia ni ruoth maduong ruodh asuria owachone kama ere gimomiyo idhialori kamano iparo ni weche awecha nyalo lokore rieko kod teko mar loyo lweny en nga igeno ni biro konyi piem koda angeyo ni idhialori nikech jomisri nyaka inge ni farao ruodh misri chalo gi odundu mobarore ka ngato oyiengoree pilore kendo chwowo lwete mano e kaka farao ruodh misri chalo ni ji duto mogeno kuome kuwachona ni ugeno kuom ruoth nyasaye nyasachu donge en ema hezekia oseketho hembkone gi kuonde mitimonee misengni kochiko jojuda gi jojerusalem ni nyaka lem mana e nyim kendomarmisango man jerusalem koro hezekia singri ni ruodh asuria atiyone ayie miyi farese alufu ariyo kapo nono ni inyalo yudo joma diidhgi ka jomisri ema igeno ni biro konyi gi geche kod joidh farese ere kaka iparo ni dilo kata mana achiel matinie moloyo kuom jotend lweny mag ruodha koso iparo ni asebiro mana ni mondo amonj amonja jerusalem akethi ka ok ruoth nyasaye ema ne owachona ni mondo abi amonj pinyni akethi eka eliakim wuod hilkia gi shebna kod joa nowacho ni rabshake niya wasayi yie iwuo kodwa gi dho aram nikech en dhok mwangeyo wuoyo kodwa gi dho hibrania kae nimar joma ni ewi ohinga nyalo winjowa rabshake ne odwokogi kapenjogi niya uparo ni un kod ruodhu kende ema ne ruodha oora iru mondo awachnu wechegi ooyo noora ir joma ni ewi ohinga ochunore ni nyaka cham chiethgi kendo madh lachgi mana kaka un bende unutim bang mano rabshake nochung mokok gi duol maduong gi dho hibrania niya winjuru wach ruoth maduong ruodh asuria owacho ni kik uyie hezekia wuondu nikech ok onyal resou e lweta kik uwe ohou ni mondo ugen kuom ruoth nyasaye kowachonu ni adier ruoth nyasaye ema noresu kendo ni ruodh asuria ok nokaw dala maduongni kik uwinj wach hezekia nimar ruodh asuria owacho niya winjreuru koda mondo ubi ira mi ngato ka ngato kuomu nocham olemb mzabipe kod ngope bende nomodh pi e sokone owuon nyaka chop abi mi agolu kendo ateru e piny machal gi pinyuni mondo kik utho ubed mana mangima en piny cham gi mzabibu chiekie maber kendo makati gi divai gi mor zeituni kod mor kich ngenyie kik uwinj hezekia kawuondou ni ruoth nyasaye biro konyou bende nitie nyasach piny moro mosereso pinye e lwet ruodh asuria nyiseche mag hamath gi arpad ni kanye koso ere nyiseche mag sefarvaim gi hena kod iva bende ne gireso samaria e lweta kuom nyiseche duto mag pinjego ere mosereso jerusalem e lweta ji noling thi onge ngat modwoke kata wach achiel nikech ruoth hezekia nosegolo chik ni kik dwoke eliakim wuod hilkia jaduong od ruoth gi shebna jagoro kod joa wuod asaf jachan weche mag piny ne jobiro ir hezekia ka joyiecho lepgi mi ginyise gima ne rabshake owacho ruodhi nyasaye oreso piny juda e lwet senakerib weche mag ndalo isaya kane ruoth hezekia owinjo wechego noyiecho lepe mi orwako pien gugru kendo odhi e od ruoth nyasaye nooro eliakim jaduong ode gi shebna jagoro kod jodolo madongo ir janabi isaya wuod amoz ka jorwako piende gugru mondo odhi owachne niya hezekia owacho ni kawuono en chieng dhier gi kum kod wichkuot wachalo gi dhako muoch kayo onge muya mochologo nyathi nyalo bet ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachi osewinjo weche rabshake ruodh asuria oseoro mondo oyany nyasaye mangima omiyo kamoro obiro kumo rabshake nikech weche osewinjo ka rabshake wachogo kuom mano isaya lem ni jowa mapod odong kamano kane jodong ruoth hezekia ochopo ir isaya nowachone wechego nodwokogi niya dhiuru uwach ni ruodhu ni ruoth nyasaye owacho kama kik iluor weche isewinjo ka ruodh asuria yanyago nikech abiro miye chuny man gi kibaji mi kowinjo wach moro marach noring odog e pinye kuma nami onegee rabshake nodok moyudo ni ruodh asuria osea lakish odhi monjo libna omiyo nodhi ire kuno kane ruodh asuria owinjo tirhaka ruodh ethiopia obiro monje nochako ooro joote ir hezekia ruodh juda kowacho niya kik iyie nyasachi migeno kuomeno wuondi ni ruodh asuria ok nokaw jerusalem chutho isewinjo kaka ruodhi mag asuria oseketho pinje mane gikedogo chuth koro iparo ni ema dikwo kwerena nonego jogozan gi joharan gi jorezef kod joeden nodak telasar koro dak ne nyisechegi okonyogi koso ere ruodhi mag hamath gi arpad gi sefarvaim gi hena kod iva hezekia nokawo barua mane joote okelone mi osomo bange ne odhi e hekalu mi oyaro baruano e nyim ruoth nyasaye kokwaye niya ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel mobet ewi kerubi kaka ruoth bet e kom duongne kendi e nyasach ogendini duto mae piny kendo ema nichueyo polo gi piny ruoth nyasaye chik iti mondo iwinji kendo yaw wangi mondo inen winj weche senakerib yanyigo nyasaye mangima ruoth nyasaye en adier ni ruodhi mag asuria oseketho pinje duto mi gibolo nyisechegi e mach kendo gisekethogi chuth nimar ne ok gin nyiseche kata matin mana tich dhano molos gi yath kata gi kidi koro ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa yie ireswa e lwet senakerib mondo ogendinii duto mae piny onge ni kendi e nyasaye eka isaya wuod amoz nooro ni hezekia wach niya ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel owacho ni osewinjo lemo mikwayego nikech wach senakerib ruodh asuria osesiemigo omiyo osewuoyo kuom senakerib kama senakerib dala sayun ochayi kendo jari ee dala sayun twenyoni ume koro en ngano isejaro kendo iyanyo koso en nga isekokne kijowo wangi nyaka inge ni en ngama ler mar israel isejaro ruoth nyasaye kimiyo jooteni wacho niya aseidho gode maboyo mag lebanon mi achopo midimidi ka gi gechena mag lweny mangeny mokadho akwana bende asetongo yiend sida madongo kod yiend saipras man kuno asechopo nyaka e chuny bungu kuma ni iye mogik kendo yien odichie asekunyo sokni mi amodho pi pinje mamoko bende aore mag misri noduono ka anyonogi gi tienda senakerib kata obedo ni iwacho kamano donge ingeyo ni ruoth nyasaye ema nachano chon mondo gigo otimre adier ne achanogi chon koro amiyo gitimore ema ne achano mondo imuk mier mochiel motegno olokre gundni joma odakie chalo gi lum mae pap maonge gi teko kata ka lum matwi e tat ot ner ka pok odongo nimar ne gionge gi teko kendo ne gingeng ka luoro omakogi angeyo timbeni duto angeyo kata ka ichung kata ka ibet piny kata kiwuok kata kiduogo dala asewinjo kaka iyanya malich kendo kaka isungori omiyo abiro keto mbedo e umi kod rajaki e dhogi mondo awichi idog thuru gi yo mane ibirogo winji hezekia ranyisi amiyi ema e higa mokwongoni unucham gik matwi kendgi kendo e higa mar ariyo unucham orowe moloth e higa mokwongono e higa mar adek unuket kodhi kendo unuka cham bende unupidh mzabibu kendo unucham olembgi jojuda modong nochal gi yath matero tiendene piny kendo nyago olemo e bedene nimar joma nok modong nowuog jerusalem adier oganda mar joma otony noa e got sayun ruoth nyasaye oseketo chunye mondo otim mano kuom mano ruoth nyasaye owuoyo kuom ruodh asuria kama ok nodonj e dala jerusalem kendo ok nobaye gi asere kata monjogo kotingo kuot ok nomonje bende ok noging pith mondo oidhgo ohingane enodog gi yo nobirogo ok nodonj jerusalem nimar anaked ni dalani mondo aresi nikech nyinga kendo nikech daudi jatichna otienono malaika mar ruoth nyasaye nodhi monego joasuria alufu mia achiel gi piero aboro gabich e kambigi kendo kane ji ochiew gokinyi ringre joma otho ema ne ginwango kopie piny mano omiyo senakerib ruodh asuria noa kuno mi odok nineve odakie chieng moro kane oyudo olemo e od nisrok nyiseche yawuote adramalek gi sharezer nobiro monege bange ne giringo mi gidhi e piny ararat esarhadon nodoko ruoth kar senakarib wuon mare ruodhi tuo mar hezekia weche mag ndalo isaya e ndalogo hezekia ne tuo kendo ohewore janabi isaya wuod amoz nobiro ire mowachone niya ruoth nyasaye owachoni ni mondo ilam mwanduni ni yawuoti nimar ibiro tho ok nikwo kane hezekia owinjo kamano nolokore mongiyo kor ot kokwayo ruoth nyasaye niya ruoth nyasaye asayi parie kaka asewuotho e nyimi gi adieri kod chuny mobidhore ka atimo gik malongoni eka ne oywak malit kane isaya pok ochopo e dier laru wach ruoth nyasaye nobirone niya dogi iwach ni hezekia jatend joga ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach daudi kwaru owacho kama asewinjo kwayoni kendo aseneno pi wangi omiyo abiro changi kendo bang ndalo adek inidhi e od ruoth nyasaye abiro medi ndalo moromo higni apar gabich bende abiro resi kaachiel gi dala jerusalem e lwet ruodh asuria kendo abiro rito dalani nikech nyinga kendo nikech daudi jatichna eka isaya nowacho ni jood hezekia ni mondo okel ngowo moswagi omwon e bur mane okuodo hezekia ne gitimo kamano mi hezekia nochango bang mano hezekia nopenjo isaya niya ere gima biro bedona ranyisi ni ruoth nyasaye biro changa kendo ni anadhi e hekalune bang ndalo adek isaya nodwoke ka penje niya diher mondo tipo mar wangchieng manie raidhi odhi nyime ondamo apar koso mondo odog chien ondamo apar mano e ranyisi ruoth nyasaye onyisigo ni enotim gima osewacho hezekia nokone niya en gima yot mondo tipo odhi nyime ondamo apar emomiyo tipo mondo odog mana chien ondamo apar eka isaya janabi nokwayo ruoth nyasaye kamano mi ruoth nyasaye nodwoko tipo chien ondamo apar e raidhi mane ahaz oloso hezekia orwako joote moa babulon weche mag ndalo isaya e ndalogo merodakbaladan nooro joote ir hezekia gi barupe kod mich nikech nowinjo ni yande otuo hezekia norwako jootego monyisogi mwandune duto mane nie ode mar keno kaka fedha gi dhahabu gi gik mangue ngar gi mo nengone tek kod gige mag lweny kaachiel gi gik moko duto mane ni kuonde kenone onge gimoro amora e ode kata e pinye mane ok onyisogi bange janabi isaya nobiro ir ruoth hezekia mopenje niya jogi oa kanye wach ango mokelogi hezekia nodwoke ni gia e piny babulon kuma bor isaya nomedo penje niya ango gineno e odi hezekia nodwoke ni giseneno gik moko duto manie oda onge gimoro amora modong mak anyisogi e kuonde kenona eka isaya nowacho ni hezekia niya winj wach ruoth nyasaye ndalo biro gik moko duto manie odi kwereni osekano nyaka chil kawuono noter babulon bende ruoth nyasaye omedo wacho ni onge gima nodong kata achiel mak oter kuno yawuoti moko nolok wasumbni adier moko kuom yawuoti hie nolok wasumbni mabuoch e od ruodh babulon hezekia ne odwoke niya wach ruoth nyasaye isenyisa ber ne odwoke kamano koparo ni en kue biro siko e ndalone duto tho mar hezekia weche mag ndalo weche moko mag hezekia gi tekone duto kendo kaka noloso yawo gi fereji maduong mane kelo pi jerusalem ondik e kitap weche mag ndalo mag juda hezekia notho moyiki kwerene manase wuode nodoko ruoth kare ruodhi loch manase ruodh juda weche mag ndalo manase ne jahigni apar gariyo kane odoko ruoth morito piny kuom higni piero abich gabich kodak jerusalem min mare ne nyinge hefziba timbe manase ne richo e nyim ruoth nyasaye kaka timbe makuero mag ogendini mane ruoth nyasaye oriembo mondo owe thuolo ni joisrael nochako oloso hembko mane ni kuonde motingore mane hezekia wuon mare oseketho kendo nogero kuonde liswa ni baal nochungo siro milamo miluongo ni ashera kaka ahab ruodh israel notimo bende nolamo sulue duto kotiyonigi nogero kende mag liswa e hekalu mane ruoth nyasaye osewuoyo kuome niya jerusalem ema naketie nyinga bende nogero kende mag misango ni sulue duto e laru ariyo mag od ruoth nyasaye nowango wuode bende kotimogo misango noyie gi jokor wach gi jo nyakalondo kod ajuoke timbene maricho ne ngeny e nyim ruoth nyasaye omiyo mirima nomako ruoth nyasaye siro milamo mane oseloso nochungo ei hekalu ruoth nyasaye nosewuoyo kuom hekaluno kawacho ni daudi gi solomon wuod daudi niya aseyiero hekaluni gi jerusalem kuom dhoudi duto mag israel mondo nyinga obedie nyaka chieng ka joisrael orito gik moko duto mane achikogi kendo gitimogi bende ka giluwo chike duto mane musa jatichna onyisogi ok nariembgi e piny mane amiyo kweregi ne gitamore winjo kendo manase nosemogi ni mondo gimed timbegi maricho e nyim ruoth nyasaye moloyo ogendini mane ruoth nyasaye otieko mondo owe thuolo ni joisrael ruoth nyasaye nomiyo jotichne jonabi owacho niya manase ruodh juda osetimo tim makuero kod richo madongo moloyo mago duto mane joamor otimo chon kendo osemiyo jojuda bende obedo joricho nikech nyisechene manono emomiyo abiro kelo masira malich kuom jerusalem gi juda ka ngato owinjo ite nopopni abiro pimo jerusalem gi tol mane apimogo samaria kendo gi rapim mane apimogo dhood ahab abiro nango jerusalem mapoth mana kaka kungu nango puodho anawit joga awuon modong kendo anachiwgi e lwet wasikgi duto mondo opegi kendo oyakgi nikech gisemiya mirima gi timbegi maricho chakre ndalo mane kweregi owuokie misri nyaka chil kawuono ewi richo duto mane manase otimo komiyogo jojuda obedo joricho e nyim ruoth nyasaye en ni nomedo chuero remb ji mangeny maonge ketho nyaka remo nomol ka ohula e jerusalem weche moko mag manase gi timbene duto gi richo mane otimo ondiki e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag juda manase notho moyike e orundune mane nie puoth uza amon wuode nodoko ruoth kare loch amon ruodh juda weche mag ndalo amon ne jahigni piero ariyo gariyo kane ochako tich morito piny kuom higni ariyo kodak jerusalem min mare ne nyinge meshulemeth nyar haruz jajotba timbe amon ne richo e nyim ruoth nyasaye mana kaka timbe manase wuon mare noluwo yore duto mane wuon mare oluwo kotiyo ni nyiseche manono mane wuon mare tiyonigi kendo kokulorenigi noweyo ruoth nyasaye nyasach kwerene kendo notamore luwe jodong ruoth amon nojame monege e ode jojuda nonego jogo duto mane ojame kendo ne giketo josia wuode mondo obed ruoth kare weche moko mag amon ondiki e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag juda noyike e liende mane nie puoth uza josia nodoko ruoth kare ruodhi loch josia ruodh juda weche mag ndalo josia ne jahigni aboro kane odoko ruoth morito piny kuom higni piero adek gachiel kodak jerusalem min mare ne nyinge jedida nyar adaya jabozkath timbe josia ne longo e nyim ruoth nyasaye kendo noluwo timbe duto mag daudi kwar mare ok oweyo kata achiel kitap chik oyudi e hekalu weche mag ndalo kane josia obedo ruoth kuom higni apar gaboro nooro shafan jagoro wuod azalia wuod meshulam e od ruoth nyasaye kowachone niya dhiyo ir hilkia jadolo maduong inyise mondo okwan kar romb pesa mosekel ei od ruoth nyasaye jorit osechoko kuom ji pesago mondo oket e lwet nyipeche marito tich od ruoth nyasaye mondo gichulgo jotich bao gi jogedo kod jopa kite maloso kuonde mokethore e od ruoth nyasaye kendo mondo gingiewgo yien gi kite mopa milosogo kuonde mokethorego kik penjgi kaka gitiyo gi pesa momigi nikech gin joma ogen kindeno ema hilkia jadolo maduong nowachoe ni shafan jagoro niya aseyudo kitap chik e od ruoth nyasaye mi nomiyo shafan kitabuno mosomo shafan jagoro notero ni ruoth wach niya jotichni osegolo pesa mane oyud e od ruoth nyasaye kendo gisemiyo nyipeche marito tich odno eka nomedo wacho ni ruoth niya hilkia osemiya kitabu moro mi nosome ni ruoth kane ruoth owinjo weche manie kitap chik noyiecho lepe eka nochiko hilkia jadolo gi ahikam wuod shafan gi akbor wuod mikaya gi shafan jagoro kod asaya jatich ruoth niya dhiuru upenj ruoth nyasaye gima biro timorena kendo ni jojuda duto nikech weche manie kitabu mwaseyudoni nyaka bed ni ruoth nyasaye okecho kodwa malich nikech kwerewa ne ok orito chike manie kitabuni kata timo gik moko duto mondikie omiyo hilkia jadolo gi ahikam gi akbor gi shafan kod asaya ne jodhi ir hulda janabi madhako chi shalum wuod tikva wuod harhas jarit lep lemo mane odak jerusalem e migawo mar ariyo ne giwuoyo kode mi nodwokogi niya nyisuru ngat mane oorou ira ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel owacho kama abiro kelo masira e pinyni kendo kuom joma odakie kaluwore gi weche duto manie kitabu ruodh juda osesomo ne gikwinya gi timbegi ka giweya kendo ka giwango ubani ni nyiseche manono emomiyo mirimba nobed mager kuom pinyni kendo ok norum wachuru ni ruodh juda mane oorou mondo upenjne ruoth nyasaye wach ni ruoth nyasaye owacho kama kane iwinjo wechena mane awacho kuom pinyni kod joma odakie ni ginibed joma okuong kendo okwedi chunyi ne yom kendo odembore miyiecho lepi kendo iywak e nyima emomiyo bende asewinjo ywakni noyiki e liendi gi kue kiluwo kwereni kata wangi ok none masira abiro kelo kae ruodhi josia oloso piny juda weche mag ndalo kane jootego odwoko ni ruoth wach noluongo jodongo duto mag juda gi mag jerusalem nodhi e od ruoth nyasaye gi jojuda kod jojerusalem duto joma omew gi jochan machalre kaachiel gi jodolo kod jonabi mi nosomonigi weche duto mane nie kitap singruok mane nie od ruoth nyasaye eka nodhi e bath siro mochung e nyim ruoth nyasaye kosingore ni enoluw ruoth nyasaye gi chunye duto kod tekone duto komako chikene gi wechene kod buchene kamano mondo orit weche mag singruok mondiki e kitabuno mi ji duto bende notimo singruokno eka ruoth nochiko hilkia jadolo maduong gi jadolo maluwe kod jorit dhoot ni mondo gik moko duto milamogo baal gi siro miluongo ni ashera kod sulue ogol e od ruoth nyasaye nowangogi e bath jerusalem e paw aora kidron mi notero buchgi nyaka bethel nogolo jodolo mag nyiseche manono mane ruodhi mag juda oketo mondo owang ubani e hembko mag miech juda kod mag gwenge mokiewo kod jerusalem kendo nogolo joma ne wango ubani ni baal gi wangchieng gi due kod sulue duto nogolo siro milamo miluongo ni ashera e od ruoth nyasaye motero e dho aora kidron e bath jerusalem nowange kanyo aora motoye matindotindo nyaka olokore buru eka nokawo buche mopuko e liete ji ajiya nomuko ut jochode mane nie od ruoth nyasaye mane ji terorego kaka kit lemogi nobet udigo ema ne mon twangoe pasia mag ashera bange josia noluongo jodolo mane nie miech juda kendo noketho hembko mane jodologo wangoe ubani chakre geba nyaka beersheba bende nomuko hembko mar jochiende mane oger e dhoranga joshua jaduong jerusalem bat koracham kidonjo e dala kata obedo ni noluongo jodolo mag hembko mane ni kuonde motingore kamano ne otamogi ni kik gitim misango e kendomarmisango mar ruoth nyasaye man jerusalem noyienigi mana chamo makati ok ketie thowi kaachiel gi jodolo wetegi ruoth josia noketho tofeth manie holo mar benhinom ni kik ji wangie nyithindgi ka misango ni molek nogolo kido mag farese mane ruodhi mag juda oseketo ni wangchieng nomuko kendemagmisango mane nie wi gorofa mar od ahaz mane ruodhi mag juda oloso e laru ariyo mag od ruoth nyasaye notoyogi matindotindo mopuko nginjogi e aora kidron ruoth noketho bende kuonde hembko mane ni yo milambo mar got zeituni man yo wuok chieng mar jerusalem mane solomon ruodh israel ogero ni ashteroth nyasaye kuero mar josidon gi kemosh nyasach jomoab kod milkom nyasach joamon noturo sirni mag kite gi mag yien mane ji lamo motoyogi matindotindo mi kuonde mane gichungie nodino gi choke ji josia nomuko kendomarmisango man bethel kaachiel gi hembkone mane jeroboam wuod nebat oloso notoyo kitene molokore buru kendo nowango siro milamo mane ni kanyo jeroboam nogo ema nomiyo joisrael obedo joricho kane josia owichore noneno liete ewi got nooro ji mogolo choke e lietego mi ne giwangogi e kendomarmisango kamano noketho kendono kaluwore gi wach ruoth nyasaye mane ngat nyasaye okoro kane jeroboam ochung e dho kendo chieng sawo cha eka josia notingo wange moneno liend ngat nyasaye mane okoro wechego nopenjo niya mano liend nga aneno loka cha jodalanoo nodwoke niya en liend ngat nyasaye mane oa juda mokoro gik moko duto misetimo kuom kendomarmisangoni eka josia nowacho niya weyeuru ngato kik gol chokene omiyo ne giweyo chokene kaachiel gi choke janabi mane oa samaria bende josia noketho od lemo mane nie hembko man kuonde motingore mane ruodhi mag israel ogero e miech samaria kamiyogo ruoth nyasaye mirima jodolo duto mane josia onwango e hembko nonego e kendemagmisango eka nodok jerusalem joisrael orito sap pasaka weche mag ndalo ruoth nochiko ji duto ni mondo otim pasaka ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi kaka ondiki e kitap singruok adier pasaka kamano ne pok otim e ndalo mane jobura ritoe israel kata e ndalo mag ruodhi mag israel gi juda e higa mar apar gaboro mar loch josia kende ema ne otimie pasaka makama ni ruoth nyasaye jerusalem mirimb nyasaye osiko kuom jojuda bende josia nogolo jonyakalondo gi ajuoke gi kido mag nyiseche manono miluongo ni terafim gi nyiseche mamoko molos gi lwet dhano kaachiel gitimbe makuero duto mane onwang e piny juda kendo e jerusalem kamano noluwo weche mag chik mane ondik e kitabu mane hilkia jadolo oyudo e od ruoth nyasaye onge ruoth moro kata achiel mane oluwo ruoth nyasaye gi chunye duto kod tekone duto komako chike duto mag musa kaka josia notimo kata kamano chuny ruoth nyasaye ne ok olendo kuom mirima mager mane okechogo gi jojuda nikech timbe maricho mane manase ochwanyego nowacho niya abiro riembo jojuda bende mondo oa e nyima kaka ne ariembo joisrael abiro jwango jerusalem dala mane ayiero kendo abiro wito hekalu mane awacho ni nyinga nobedie tho mar josia weche mag ndalo weche moko mag josia kod timbene duto ondiki e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag juda e ndalo josia ema ne faraoneko ruodh misri odhi kedoe gi ruodh asuria e dho aora yufrate ruoth josia nodhi megido kedo kode kane girado farao nonege joge nogolo ringre megido kotinge e gari ne gikele jerusalem mi giyike e liende owuon eka ji duto nokawo jehoahaz wuod josia moketo ruoth kar wuon mare loch jehoahaz ruodh juda weche mag ndalo jehoahaz ne jahigni piero ariyo gadek kane odoko ruoth morito piny kuom dueche adek kodak jerusalem min mare ne nyinge hamutal nyar jeremia jalibna timbe jehoahaz ne richo e nyim ruoth nyasaye mana kaka timbe kwerene faraoneko notere ribla e piny hamath motueye kuno mondo kik obed ruodh jerusalem kendo noketo ni jojuda osuru moromo kilo alufu adek mag fedha gi kilo mia adek mag dhahabu eka faraoneko noketo eliakim wuod josia mondo obed ruoth kar josia wuon mare kendo noloko nyinge ni jehoyakim jehoahaz notero misri kuma nothoe jehoyakim noketo ni jojuda osuru dirom pesa mane farao dwaro ngato ka ngato nogolo dhahabu gi fedha kaka mwandune obet kamano jehoyakim nochulo fedha gi dhahabu mane farao oketone loch jehoyakim ruodh juda weche mag ndalo jehoyakim ne jahigni piero ariyo gabich kane odoko ruoth morito piny kuom higni apar gachiel kodak jerusalem min mare ne nyinge zebida nyar pedaya jaruma timbe jehoyakim ne richo e nyim ruoth nyasaye mana kaka timbe kwerene ruodhi e ndalo jehoyakim nebukadnezar ruodh babulon nobiro mi jehoyakim nobet e bwo lochne kuom higni adek bange nopiem kode modagi lochne eka ruoth nyasaye nooro mony mag jobabulon gi mag joaram gi mag jomoab kod mag joamon mondo oked gi jojuda kendo ne giketho pinygi chuth kaka ruoth nyasaye nosemiyo jatichne janabi owacho adier gigo notimore kuom jojuda mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni mondo ogolgi e nyime ruoth nyasaye nodagi weyonigi kethogi nikech richo mane manase otimo kopongo jerusalem gi remb joma onge ketho weche moko mag jehoyakim gi timbene duro ondiki e kitap weche mag ndalo mag ruodhi mag juda jehoyakim notho moluwo kwerene mi jehoyachin wuode nodoko ruoth kare ruodh misri ne ok owuok kendo e pinye nimar ruodh babulon nosemaye pinje duto mane nie bwo lochne chakre aora manie tong misri nyaka chop aora yufrate jehoyachin gi jodong juda oter babulon e tuech weche mag ndalo jehoyachin ne jahigni apar gaboro kane odoko ruoth morito piny kuom dueche adek kende kodak jerusalem min mare ne nyinge nehushta nyar elnathan jajerusalem timbe jehoyachin ne richo e nyim ruoth nyasaye mana kaka timbe wuon mare ndalono jolwenj nebukadnezar ruodh babulon nodhi monjo jerusalem kendo ne gilworo dalano kane pod gilworo jerusalem nebukadnezar nodhi kuno owuon mi piny nohewo jehoyachin mochiwore ni ruodh babulon kaachiel gi min mare gi jongadne rieko gi jodonge kod jotende nomake e higa mar aboro mar loch ruodh babulon nebukadnezar nokawo gik mabeyo duto mane nie od ruoth nyasaye kod mane nie kar keno mar od ruoth kendo nongado ongado gik moko duto mag dhahabu mane solomon ruodh israel oloso mane nie od ruoth nyasaye kamano wach ruoth nochopo kare nebukadnezar nodaro jojerusalem duto kotero jodongo kod jomwandu dirom alufu apar e tuech kaachiel gi jotheth kod ji duto molony kuom tich lwedo onge ngato mane odong mak mana joma odhier ruoth kaachiel gi min mare gi monde gi jotende kod jodong gwenge nogolo jogo duto jerusalem kaachiel gi jomwandu duto dirom alufu abiriyo gi jotheth kod joma olony kuom tich lwedo dirom alufu achiel giduto ne gin joma otegno moromo lweny ruodh babulon noketo matania owadgi wuon jehoyachin mondo obed ruoth kar jehoyachin noloko nying matania ni zedekia loch zedekia ruodh juda weche mag ndalo jeremia zedekia ne jahigni piero ariyo gachiel kane odoko ruoth morito piny kuom higni apar gachiel kodak jerusalem min mare ne nyinge hamutal nyar jeremia jalibna timbe zedekia ne richo e nyim ruoth nyasaye mana kaka timbe jehoyakim jojerusalem gi jojuda nomiyo ruoth nyasaye mirima nyaka nogologi e nyime ruodhi jobabulon okawo jerusalem jeremia zedekia nopiem gi ruodh babulon modagi lochne omiyo chieng due apar due mar apar e higa mar ochiko mar loch zedekia nebukadnezar ruodh babulon nobiro gi joge mag lweny mi gimonjo kind ohingni ariyo ka gingado orundu ruoth mi gichiko yo holo mar jordan jolweny mag babulon nolawo zedekia mojuko e paw jeriko mi jolwenje duto oringo oweye ne gimake mi gitere ribla ir ruodh babulon nonywolo yawuowi auchiel nyinggi ne azrikam gi bokeru gi ishmael gi shearia gi obadia kod hanan mago e kar romb yawuot azel weche mag ndalo tho mar saulo gi yawuote samuel noyudo jofilistia kedo gi joisrael kendo joisrael noringo kinegogi e got gilboa jofilistia nojuko saulo gi yawuote jonathan gi abinadab kod malkishua kendo ne ginego yawuotego lweny nohingo saulo mi joasere noyude mochiele kendo ohinye saulo nowacho ni jatingne gilweny nita wuodh liganglani inegago nono joma kia nyasayegi biro nyiera jating gilwenje nodagi nikech noluor ahinya emomiyo saulo nomako liganglane owuon mochwoworee kane jatingne gilweny oneno ni saulo osetho en bende nochwowore e liganglane motho kamano saulo notho kaachiel gi yawuote adek kod joode duto chieng achiel kane joisrael mane odak e holo oneno ni jolweny oseringo kendo ni saulo gi yawuote josetho ne gibolo miechgi kanyo mi gin bende ne giringo bange jofilistia nobiro modak e miergo kinyne kane jofilistia obiro dedo joma otho ne giyudo ringre saulo gi ringre yawuote koriere e got gilboa ne gidedo saulo kendo ne gingado wiye mi gikawo gige mag lweny eka ne gioro joote e piny filistia duto mondo oter wach maberno ni nyisechegi kendo ni jopinygi ne giketo gi saulo mag lweny e od nyisechegi wiye ne giguro e kor hekalu mar dagon nyasachgi kane jojabesgilead owinjo gima ne jofilistia osetimo ni saulo thuondgi duto nowuok modhi oomo ringre saulo gi ringre yawuote ne gikelogi jabesh mi giyiko chokegi kuno e tiend yath moro kendo ne gitueyo chiemo kuom ndalo abiriyo kamano saulo notho nikech noweyo ruoth nyasaye ne ok orito chik ruoth nyasaye kendo kar penjo ruoth nyasaye wach nodhi mana ir jonyakalondo mondo onyise wach mano emomiyo ruoth nyasaye nonege momiyo daudi wuod jesse lochne weche mag ndalo oket daudi ruodh israel samuel bange joisrael duto nochokore gi daudi hebron mi giwachone niya nge ni wan mana remo achiel kodi e ndalo mokadho kane saulo pod ruoth ema nitelo ni joisrael e lwenjegi duto kendo ruoth nyasaye nyasachi nowachoni niya inibed jakwadh joga israel kendo ema nibed jatendgi kuom mano jodong israel duto nobiro hebron ir ruoth daudi kendo daudi notimo kodgi singruok kuno e nyim ruoth nyasaye mi ne giwire gi mo mondo obed ruodh israel kaluwore gi wach mane ruoth nyasaye omiyo samuel owacho daudi okawo dala mar sayun samuel bange daudi gi joisrael duto nodhi jerusalem mane iluongo ni jebus kuma ne jojebus odakie jojebus gogo nowacho ni daudi niya ok nidonj kaeri kata kamano daudi nokawo sayun dala mane ochiel motegno ahinya tinde iluonge ni dala daudi daudi nosewacho niya ngat nokwong nego jajebus ema nobed jatelo kata jaduong lweny joab wuod zeruya ema nokwongo timo kamano mi nokete jatelo daudi nodak e dala mochiel motegnono emomiyo nochak kanyo ni dala daudi nogero udi molwore kochakore gie ohinga mar milo joab noloso kuonde mamoko mane okethore e dalano duong mar daudi koro nomedore ahinya nimar ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ne ni kode thuondi mag daudi samuel koro thuondi madongo moloyo mane konyo daudi gi tekregi duto mondo okete ruoth kaluwore gi wach mane ruoth nyasaye owacho kuom joisrael e magi jashobeam jahakmon ne jatend thuondi adek madongo en ema nonego ji mia achiel gi tong odiechieng achiel ngat mane luwe ne en eleazar wuod dodo jaahohi ne en gi daudi pasdamim kuma ne jofilistia ochokoree ni lweny ne nitie puoth shairi kuno jolweny moko duto noringo jofilistia gin ne gichung gineno jofilistiago e dier puodhono ka girite kendo ne ginego jofilistiago mano e kaka ruoth nyasaye noreso joisrael komiyogi loch maduong kane jolweny mag jofilistia ojot e holo refaim ji adek kuom thuondi piero adek madongo nodhi ir daudi e lwanda man rogo mar adulam kindego daudi ne nie rogo jolweny mag jofilistia nosekawo bethlehem daudi noomo chunye ka siso omake mowacho niya yaye mad ngato kelna pi soko man ranga bethlehem mondo amodhi eka thuondi adekgo nomwomo oganda mar jofilistia ne gidhi omo pi sokono mi gikelo ni daudi nodagi modho pigno moole piny ka misango ni ruoth nyasaye kowacho niya nyasaye mondo orita kik amodh pigni nikech ochalo mana remb jogo mane odhi ome koyie wito ngimagi mano emomiyo daudi notamore modhe gik makamago ema thuondi adekgo ne timo abishai omin joab ema ne jatend thuondi piero adekgo nonego ji mia adek gi tong mi nobedo ngat marahuma kuom thuondigo ne en rahuma moloyo kuomgi mobedo jatendgi kata kamano ne ok ochopo e ranginy mag ji adek kande benaya wuod jehoyada thwon kabzeel marahuma nosetimo timbe thwon mangeny bende nonego thuond moab ariyo chieng moro kane kodh pe osechue nolor e bur moro monegoe sibuor bende en ema nonego jamisri marabet mane borne romo mita ariyo gi nu jamisrino ne nigi tong machal gi lodi benaya nodhine gi odunga noyudho tong e lwet jamisrino monegego timbe machal kamago ema ne benaya wuod jehoyada oyudogo huma kaachiel gi thuondi piero adek kande ne en rahuma moloyo ji piero adekgo kata kamano ne ok ochopo e ranginy mag thuondi adek madongo kande daudi nokete jatend joge mag lweny mane rito ngimane thwond jolweny mag daudi ne gin asahel omin joab gi elhanan wuod dodo jabethlehem gi shamoth jahorad gi helez japelon gi ira wuod ikesh jatekoa gi abiezer jaanathoth gi sibekai jahushath gi ilai jaahohi kod maharai gi heled wuod baana jonetofa gi benjamin gi benaya japirathon gi hurai jagaash piny aore gi abiel jabetharaba gi azmoth jabararim gi eliaba jashaalbon gi hashem jagizon kod jonathan wuod shagee gi ahiam wuod sakar joharar gi elifal wuod ur gi hefer ja mekera gi ahija japelon gi ezbai gi joel owadgi nathan gi mibhar wuod hagri gi zelek ja amon gi naharai ja beerroth mane jating gi lweny mag joab wuod zeruya kod ira gi gareb joithri gi uria jahiti kod zabad wuod alai jatend thuondi piero adekgo ne adina wuod shiza jareuben jatend joreuben jomoko mane ni kodgi ne gin hanan wuod maaka gi joshafat jamithni gi uzia jaasheteroth kod shama gi jeyel yawuot hotham jaaroer kod jadiael wuod shimri gi joha owadgi jotizi gi eliel jamahav kod jeribai gi joshavia yawuot elnaam gi ithma jamoab kod eliel gi obed kod jaasiel jozoba weche mag ndalo thuond daudi mane ni kode ziklag koro magi e joma nobiro ziklag ir daudi kane saulo wuod kish oseriembe e nyime gin bende ne gin thuondi mane konyo daudi lweny ne ginyalo diro asere kata bayo orujre gi bat korachwich kata gi bat koracham ne gin jobenjamin dhoodgi saulo jotendgi ne ahiezer gi bende nobiro ir daudi kane enie rogo e thim ne gin joma rateke motiegore ni lweny mongeyo kedo gi kuodi kod tong ne giger ka sibuoche kendo tiendgi ne yot ka tiend mwanda maringo e got ezer ne jatendgi obadia jalupne eka eliab mar adek mishmana mar angwen jeremia mar abich atai mar auchiel eliel mar abiriyo johanan mar aboro elzabad mar ochiko jeremia mar apar makbanai mar apar gachiel joka gadgo ne jodong oganda lweny ngat matinie moloyo kuomgi muche ne romre gi much ji mia achiel much ngat maduong moloyo ne romre gi much ji alufu achiel jogo ema nongado aora jordan e due mokwongo kane opong moo kendo oimo genge duto ne giriembo ji duto nodak e holni man yo wuok chieng gi yo podho chieng mar aorano jomoko kuom jobenjamin gi jojuda bende nobiro ir daudi e rogo daudi nowuok romonigi mowachonigi niya ka usebiro ira kaka osiepe mondo ukonya arwakou gi mor ka ubiro ni mondo undhoga kendo uketa e lwet wasika onge gima aseketho nyasach kwerewa mondo one wachno kendo ongadnu bura eka roho nolor kuom amasai jatend thuondi piero adek kande mowacho niya wan kodi wan jogi wuod jesse wamosi wamosi wamoso jakonyni bende en nyasachi makonyi eka daudi norwakogi moketogi kuom joge mag lweny kane daudi dhi gi jofilistia mondo giked gi saulo jomanase moko noweyo saulo modok ni daudi kata kamano daudi ne ok okonyo jofilistia nimar kane jotendgi oseporo wach ne giriembe ne giwacho niya dipo kondhogowa kodok ni saulo ruodhe mi okelnwa masira jomanase nodok ni daudi kane odhi ziklag ne gid adna gi jozabad gi jadiael gi mikael gi jozabad gi elihu kod zilthai ngato ka ngato kuomgi ne jatend jolweny alufu achiel mag jomanase gin ema ne gikonyo daudi kedo gi joma ne monje nimar giduto ne gin thuondi mager kendo daudi noketogi jotend jolweny ji ne medo biro ir daudi odiechieng kodiechieng mondo okonye nyaka ne gidoko oganda mangongo mar jolweny thuond daudi mane ni kode hebron jolweny nobiro hebron ir daudi mondo okaw loch saulo omi daudi kaka ruoth nyasaye nosewacho e magi jojuda mane otingo kuodi gi tong ne alufu auchiel gi mia aboro josimeon thuondi mager ne alufu abiriyo gi mia achiel jolawi ne alufu angwen gi mia auchiel kaachiel gi jehoyada jaduong dhood harun mane nigi ji alufu adek gi mia abiriyo kod zadok wuowi mathwon kendo mager mane nigi jodong lweny piero ariyo gariyo moa e dhoodgi jobenjamin owete saulo ne romo ji alufu adek ji mangeny kuomgi nopandore kuom dhood saulo nyaka thone joefraim ne thuondi alufu piero ariyo gi mia aboro man gi huma e dhoutgi jomanase konchiel mane oyier mondo obi oket daudi ruoth ne romo alufu apar gaboro joisakar ne gin joma riek kuom nyiso joisrael gima onego gitim kendo kinde monego gitimee ne gin jotelo mia ariyo nobiro gi jolwenjgi jozebulun ne jolweny molony alufu piero abich man gi gi lweny mopogore opogore ne gin thuondi mager man gi chuny achiel jonaftali ne jotend jolweny alufu achiel gi ji alufu piero adek gabiriyo motingo kuodi gi tong jodan ne ji alufu piero ariyo gaboro gi mia auchiel moikore ni aseikone ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa ne omwomore kuomwa e kinde mokwongo nikech ne ok untie mondo uting sanduk kendo nikech ne ok warite kaka owinjore omiyo jodolo gi jolawi nopwodhore mondo oter sanduk jahaziel jodolo ne goyo tung odiechieng thole e nyim sandug muma mar nyasaye wend daudi ogoyogo ni nyasaye erokamano zaburi chiengno ema ne daudi okwongo chikoe asaf gi owetene mondo opak ruoth wende kod zaburi bende paruru timbene madongo duto moruru nikech nyinge ler joma dwaro ruoth nyasaye mondo obed mamor dwaruru ruoth nyasaye mamiyou teko dwareuru ndalo duto paruru honni gi timbe bende nodhi mondo one joode weche mag ndalo nyasaye otimo singruok gi daudi samuel kane daudi osechako dak e ode mane ogero nowacho ni nathan janabi niya koro adak e ot moger maber gi yiend sida owacho niya ok ema nigerna ot mondo adagie chakre ndalo mane agoloe joisrael e piny misri nyaka chil kawuono pok adak e ot asebet kadak e hema kuonde duto mane awuothoe gi joisrael ne ok apenjo achiel kuom jobura mane aketo mondo obed jokwadh joga israel gimomiyo ok gigerona ot mar yiend sida bende inyis daudi ni ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto owacho kama nagoloi e lek kuma nikwayoe rombe mondo ibed jatend joga israel asebet kodi kuonde duto midhiye kendo asetiekoni wasiki duto abiro miyo nyingi bedo gi huma ka humb joma dongo mag piny kendo abiro miyo joga israel pinygi giwegi anagurgi kuno mi gidagie mak othaggi kendo jomahundu ok nochak ochandgi kaka ne chandogi chon chakre ndalo mane aketoe jobura mondo orit joga israel natiek wasiki duto ruoth nyasaye anamiyi duong kendo anaguedh dhoodi mondo osiki kisetho miluwo kwereni anaket achiel kuom yawuoti kari kendo anagur lochne obed motegno en ema nogerna ot kendo anami lochne osik nyaka chieng anabedne ka wuon mare enobed ka wuoda ok nagol herane kuome kaka ne agolo kuom jal mane okuongoni bedo ruoth anami obed motegno kendo anami lochne gurre kuom joga nyaka chieng nathan nonyiso daudi weche duto mane ofwenyne mi ruoth nodhi e nyim ruoth nyasaye mobet piny nowacho niya ruoth nyasaye nga koso dhooda en ango momiyo imiya duong kama nyasaye gima isetimona pod ikwano ka gima tin nimar bende isewacho ni dhooda nosik kuom ndalo mangeny kendo isenyisa kaka tienge biro nochal ruoth nyasaye ema ingeya oko gi iye ango damed wachoni kuom duong isemiya isemiya duong kama nikech ihera kendo nikech mano ema idwaro
