wasumbni miloko jogi isemiyo nyingi duong kuom timbe madongo kendo malich nikech iseriembo ogendi moko mondo owe thuolo ni jogi mane ireso kigolo e piny misri niloko joisrael mondo obed jogi nyaka chieng kendo ruoth nyasaye ema isedoko nyasachgi koro ruoth nyasaye mi singruok misetimona kaachiel gi dhooda mondo osik nyaka chieng kendo ichop gima isewacho singruoknino mondo ogurre kendo nyingi oyud duong nyaka chieng ka ji wacho niya ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto nyasach israel en nyasachgi adier kamano dhooda nodongi e nyimi nyasacha isenyisa ni ibiro dongo oda kuom mano asebedo gi chir mondo alem e nyingi ruoth nyasaye e nyasaye kendo isesingorina maber kama emomiyo ruoth nyasaye yie iguedh oda mondo osik e nyimi nyaka chieng nimar gima iseguedho nobed gi hawi ndalo duto weche mag ndalo daudi omedo pinye samuel bange daudi noloyo jofilistia mi gibedo moboch kendo nomayogi gath gii mier mokiewo kode noloyo jomoab bende mi gibet e bwo lochne kendo ne gigolone osuru bende daudi noloyo hadadezer ruodh zobahamath kane ruodhno dhi chungo rapar mar lochne e lweny aora yufrate daudi nomaye geche lweny alufu achiel kendo nomako joidh farese alufu abiriyo kod jolweny moko alufu piero ariyo nongado odond farese duto mag geche lweny moweyo mana farese mia achiel kane joaram moa damaski obiro mondo okony hadadezer ruodh zoba daudi nonego ji alufu piero ariyo gariyo kuomgi eka noketo askeche jorit e piny joaramgo mi ne gibedo e bwo lochne kendo ne gigolone osuru kuonde duto mane daudi dhiye ruoth nyasaye ne miyo olocho daudi noyako gilweny mag dhahabu mane jorit hadadezer otingo mokelo jerusalem bende noyako munde mathoth ahinya e tibhath kod kun miech hadadezer mundego ema ne solomon olosogo gima ne iluongo ni nam gi sirni kod gik moko duto mitiyogo e hekalu kane tou ruodh hamath owinjo ni daudi oseloyo jolweny mag hadadezer nooro hadoram wuode ir ruoth daudi mondo omose kendo opake kuom loyo hadadezer nimar hadadezer ne jasik tou hadoram nokelo ni daudi gik moko mag dhahabu gi mag fedha kod mag mula magi bende ruoth daudi nochiwo ni ruoth nyasaye kaachiel gi fedha kod dhahabu noyako kuom ogendni mamoko duto mane oseloyo kaka joedom gi jomoab gi joamon gi jofilistia kod joamalek abishai wuod zeruya nonego joedom alufu apar gaboro e holo kado noketo askeche jorit e piny edom mi joedom duto nobet e bwo loch daudi kuonde duto mane daudi dhiye ruoth nyasaye ne miyo olocho jodong daudi samuel daudi nobedo ruodh israel duto morito piny gi kue kongado bura kare ni joge duto joab wuod zeruya ne jatend jolweny jehoshafat wuod ahilud ne jachan weche zadok wuod ahitub kod ahimelek wuod abiathar ne jodolo savsha ne jagoro benaya wuod jehoyada ne jatend jokereth kod jopeleth kendo yawuot daudi ne jodongo konye weche mag ndalo daudi oloyo joamon gi joaram samuel bange nahash ruodh joamon notho mi wuode nodoko ruoth kare daudi nowacho niya abiro timo ni hanun wuod nahash maber mana kaka wuon mare notimona maber omiyo daudi nooro joote mondo oduog chunye kuom tho wuon mare kane joote daudi ochopo e piny joamon mi gidhi ir hanun mondo giduog chunye jodong amon nowacho ni hanun niya bende iparo ni daudi oseoro jogi mondo omi wuoru duong adier ooyo gibiro mana ni mondo gicheng pinywa eka oyud yo onyalo loyego kuom mano hanun nomako joote daudi molielo tikgi kendo ongado lepgi nyabathe chakre nungogi kalor piny bange noriembogi kane daudi owinjo gima otimore nooro ji mondo oromnigi nikech ne giyudo wichkuot maduong nowacho ni mondo gibed jeriko mondi nyaka yie tikgi dongi eka giduogi hanun gi joamon noneno ni gisemiyo daudi ojok kodgi omiyo ne gioro fedha moromo kilo alufu piero adek mondo giholgo geche lweny gi joma didhgi kuom joaramnaharaim gi joarammaaka kod jozoba ne giwako ruodh maaka gi jolwenje kendo ne giholo gechene mag lweny alufu piero adek gariyo mi jogo nobiro mojot madeba joamon bende nowuok e miechgi kendo ne giyworo ni lweny kane daudi owinjo wachno nooro joab kod joma rateke duto mondo oked kodgi joamon nowuok mi ne giriedo ni lweny e dhoranga dala ruodhi mane obiro konyogi nochanore e pap joab noneno ni lweny olwore omiyo noyiero thuond joisrael moko mochano kochomo joaram jomoko duto modong noketi e lwet abishai owadgi ka gichomo joamon nowachone niya kineno ka joaram tek madwaro loya nyaka ibi ikonya ka joamon dwaro loyi eka nabi akonyi bed gi chir waked matek ni jowa kendo ni miech nyasachwa ruoth nyasaye mondo otim gima oneno ni ber kamano joab gi joge norado gi joaram moriembo kane joamon oneno ni joaram ringo gin bende ne giringo abishai owadgi joab mi gidonjo e dalagi eka joab nodok jerusalem kane joaram oneno ni joisrael oseloyogi ne gioro joote mondo oluong joaram mane odak loka aora yufrate mi ne gibiro ka shobak jatend oganda lweny mar hadadezer otelonigi kane daudi oyudo wach ni gibiro nochoko jolwenj israel duto kanyakla mi giidho loka jordan mondo gikanigi joaram bende noriedo ni lweny kochomo daudi gi jogi mi ne girado joisrael noloyogi mi giringo kendo daudi gi joge nonego joidh farese alufu abiriyo gi jolweny mamoko alufu piero angwen shobak bende notho kane johadadezer oneno ni joisarel oloyogi ne giywagre ni daudi mi gibedo e bwo lochne bang mano joaram nodagi konyo joamon kendo weche mag ndalo daudi okawo dala mar raba samuel e ndalo chakruok oro mane ruodhi thoro wuokie kadhi kedo joab nowuok gi jolwenje mogoyo joamon asasa ne gichopo raba kendo ne gilwore daudi nodong jerusalem joab noloyo raba moketho chuth daudi nogolo osimbo ewi milkom nyasach joamon mi nosidhe e wiye owuon pek mar dhahabu molosego noromo kilo piero adek kendo kidi nengone tek ne ochom kuome bende daudi noyako gik mathoth e dalano kendo nodaro joma odakie moketo e tich payo bao gi kunyo kite kod tongo yien kamano e kaka daudi notimo ni miech joamon duto eka nodok jerusalem gi joge duto joma rabede mane thuondi daudi onego samuel bang mano lweny nowuok gezer e kind joisrael gi jofilistia joisrael noloyo jofilistia e lwenyno sibekai jahusha nonego saf jarefaim lweny nowuok kendo e kindgi gi jofilistia mi elhanan wuod jakir nonego lami owadgi goliath jagiti bond tonge ne chalo lodi lweny nochako owuok gath kama ne nitie ngat gana marabora man gi lith lwedo auchiel gi lith tielo auchiel koni gi koni duto piero ariyo gangwen jalo bende ne jarefaim kane othiano ni joisrael jonathan wuod shimea owadgi daudi nonege jogo duto ne jorefaim daudi gi joge nonegogi duto weche mag ndalo daudi okwano joisrael gi jojuda samuel koro satan ne dwaro hinyo joisrael mi nosundo daudi mondo okwan gi omiyo daudi nochiko joab gi jodong oganda ni mondo odhi okwan joisarel chakre dan yo nyandwat nyaka beersheba yo milambo kendo mondo onyise kar rombgi joab nodwoke niya kata da bed ni ruoth nyasaye omedo joge nyadi mia achiel donge giduto digibed jotichne ango momiyo idwaro kwanogi gima kamano biro mana miyo joisrael doko joketho kata kamano ruoth nochuno joab momiyo owuotho e piny joisrael duto bange nodwogo jerusalem monyiso daudi kar romb ji e piny israel ne nitie ji tara achiel gi alufu mia achiel manyalo kedo e piny juda ne nitie ji alufu mia angwen gi piero abiriyo bende nyalo kedo joab ne ok okwano jolawi gi jobenjamin nikech nosin gi chik ruoth gima nosetimore ne ok longo ni nyasaye mi nokumo joisrael eka daudi nowacho ni nyasaye niya aseketho ahinya kuom gima asetimo koro akwayi ni mondo iwena richona nikech asetimo gima ofuwo mi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni gad jakor wach mar daudi niya dhiyo inyis daudi ni ruoth nyasaye owacho kama aketo gik moko adek e nyimi yier achiel kuomgi monego atimni omiyo gad nodhi ir daudi mowachone niya ruoth nyasaye owacho ni mondo iyier achiel kuom gik moko adekgi higni adek mag kech kata dueche adek wasiki lawoue kendo negou kata ndalo adek ruoth nyasaye owuon kelonu tho ka dera marach biro e piny kendo malaika mar ruoth nyasaye nego ji e piny israel duto koro nyisa gima dadwok jal noora daudi nodwoko gad niya gi masira maduong ber mondo abed e lwet ruoth nyasaye nimar ngwonone duong gi lala kik abed e lwet dhano omiyo ruoth nyasaye nooro tho malit kuom joisrael monego ji alufu piero abiriyo nyasaye nooro malaika mondo oketh jerusalem kane oneno ka malaika kethe noloko parone kuom masira mane odwaro kelo omiyo nowacho ni malaika mane nego ji niya oromo koro duok lweti noyudo ka malaikano ochung kar dino mar ornan jajebus daudi nongiyo malo moneno malaika mar ruoth nyasaye kochung e kind polo gi piny ka en gi ligangla e lwete nodwaro tiekogo jerusalem daudi gi jodonge noriere piny auma ka girwakore gi pien gugru daudi nowacho ni nyasaye niya ema nagolo chik mondo okwan ji kendo e jakwath mosebedo ka timo marach rombe machandoregi otimo ango ruoth nyasaye nyasacha akwayi ni ema mondo ikuma kod dhoodwa igeng tho malitni kik mak jogi eka malaika mar ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni gad mondo ochik daudi odhi kar dino mar ornan jajebus ogerie kendomarmisango ji ruoth nyasaye omiyo daudi notimo kaka ruoth nyasaye nomiyo gad owachone modhi kanyono ornan noyudo diemo ngano kane otingo wange noneno malaika yawuote angwen mane ni kode noringo mopondo kane daudi ochopo machiegni onan nowichore kendo ka noneno ruoth nowuok oa kar dino nodhi mogoyo chonge piny e nyim daudi mokulore nyaka e lowo daudi nowachone niya yie ingiew kar dinoni gi nengo makare mondo agerie kendomarmisango ni ruoth nyasaye mondo tho manego joga orum onan nodwoko daudi niya ruodha kawe kendo itim kode gima idwaro bende ruedhi minyalo timogo misango kod yien mag dino minyalo chwako kaachiel gi ngano minyalo timogo misango mar mogo eki amiyi duto ruoth daudi nodwoko onan niya ooyo abiro mana ngiewe gi nengo makare ok nakaw giri ami ruoth nyasaye kata timone misango gi gima ayudo nono kuom mano daudi nongiewo kar dinono gi onan kuom dhahabu moromo kilo abiriyo eka nogero ni ruoth nyasaye kendomarmisango kanyono motimoe misengni miwango pep gi mag sawo kolamo ruoth nyasaye mi ruoth nyasaye nodwoke gi mach moa e polo molwar e kendomarmisango eka ruoth nyasaye nochiko malaika mondo odwok ligangla e olalo daudi oyiero kama ibiro geroe e hekalu kane daudi oneno ni ruoth nyasaye oseneno kwayone mane okwayo kar dino mar ornan jajebus nochako timo misango kanyo kata obedo ni e ndalogo hema maler mar ruoth nyasaye kod kendomarmisango mane musa oloso e thim ne pod ni e hembko man gibeon daudi ne ok odhi kanyo mondo openj ruoth nyasaye wach nikech ligangla mar malaika mar ruoth nyasaye nobwoge weche mag ndalo omiyo koro daudi nowacho niya e kama od ruoth nyasaye nobedie kaachiel gi kendo joisrael notimie misango daudi oiko gik mibiro gerogo hekalu daudi nogolo chik mondo ochok jodak duto manie piny israel eka noketogi mondo gipa kite kendo giger od nyasaye bende noiko nyinyo modhuro mondo olosgo musmande gi teke miriwogo dhoudi kaachiel gi mula mokalo apima kod yiend sida mak kwan nimar josidon gi joturo nokelone yiend sida mangeny daudi nowacho niya solomon wuoda pod rawera mayot ot midwaro gero ni ruoth nyasaye onego obed maber miwuoro kendo humbe olak e pinje duto omiyo nyaka aikne gik gedo kuom mano daudi noiko gik mogundho ka pok otho bange noluongo solomon wuode mochike ni mondo oger ot ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel kowacho niya solomon wuoda nachano mondo ager ot mamiyogo ruoth nyasaye nyasacha duong ruoth nyasaye nokwera kawachona niya isechuero remo mangeny kendo isekedo lwenje madongo e nyima omiyo ok nigerna ot ininywol wuowi lochne nobed gi kue anamiye kue kamiyogi yueyo e ndalone en ema nogerna ot enobed wuoda kendo anabed wuon mare mi nagur lochne e israel nyaka chieng koro wuoda ruoth nyasaye nyasachi obed kodi kendo oguedhi mondo igerne hekalu kaka nosingore ruoth nyasaye nyasachi mondo omiyi rieko duto mondo irit chikne koseketi ruodh israel inibed gi hawi mana kimako chik kod buche ruoth nyasaye mane musa omiyo joisrael bed gi chir kendo gi jingo kik chunyi nyosre kata kik ibed jaluoro kata obedo ni gi thagruok mangeny koro aseiko ni od ruoth nyasaye dhahabu dirom kilo tara adek kod fedha moromo kilo tara piero adek gabich kaachiel gi mula kod nyinyo mokadho apima yien gi kite bende aseiko bende nyaka imed moko bende gi jotich mangeny kaka jopa kite gi jogedo gi jopa bao kod jotich moko mathoth molony e tije mopogore opogore mag dhahabu gi fedha gi mula kod nyinyo omiyo koro chak tich kendo ruoth nyasaye mondo obed kodi daudi nochiko jodong israel ni mondo okony solomon wuode kowachonigi niya ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ni kodu osemiyou kue kuonde duto kendo osechiwo joma odak e pinyni e lweta mi koro giyie loch ruoth nyasaye gi joge omiyo koro keturu chunyu gi parou kuom dwaro ruoth nyasaye nyasachu chakuru gero hekalu ni nying ruoth nyasaye mondo sandug muma mare kod gik maler mitiyogo kilame oyudie kar bet weche mag ndalo kane daudi koro oseti kendo hike oniang noyiero solomon wuode mondo obed ruodh israel daudi opogo jolawi gi jodolo e migepegi mag tich nochoko jodong israel duto kaachiel gi jodolo kod jolawi jolawi machwo johigni piero adek kata moloyo kanyo nondik nyinggi mi kar rombgi noromo alufu piero adek gaboro alufu piero ariyo gangwen kuomgi noket mondo oti e od ruoth nyasaye alufu auchiel mondo obed jotelo kod jongad bura alufu angwen noket jorit dhorangeye kendo alufu angwen mondo opak ruoth nyasaye gi thumbe mane daudi oloso daudi nopogogi e migepe miluongo gi nying gershon gi kohath kod merari yawuot lawi yawuot gershon ne gin laadan kod shimei laadan nonywolo yawuowi adek nyinggi jehiel nodoko jatelo gi zetham kod joel mago ne jotend dhout laadan yawuot shimei ne gin angwen nyinggi jahath gi ziza gi jeush kod beria jahath ne en jatelo ziza ne jalupne jeush gi beria nokwan kaka dhoot achiel nikech nyithindgi ne nok yawuot kohath ne gin angwen nyinggi amram gi izhar gi hebron kod uziel yawuot amram ne gin harun kod musa harun gi dhoode nowal ni mondo oti tich dolo ni ruoth nyasaye ka gichiwone gik maler kendo timone misango kendo guedho ji e nyinge nyaka chieng joka musa ngat nyasaye ne okwan kuom jolawi yawuot musa ne gershom kod eliezer kuom joka gershom shubael nobedo jatelo kuom joka eleazer rehabia ema notelo eleazer ne onge yawuowi moko rehabia wuode nonywolo yawuowi mangeny kuom joka izhar shelemoth ne jatelo yawuot hebron ne gin jeria mane obedo jatelo gi amaria jalupne gi jahaziel mar adek kod jekameam mar angwen yawuot uziel ne gin mika nobedo jatelo kod ishia jalupne yawuot merari ne gin mali kod mushi yawuot mali ne gin eleazar kod kish eleazar notho moweyo nyiri lilo kendo owetegi yawuot kish nokendogi yawuot mushi ne gin adek nyinggi mali gi eder kod jeremoth mago ne gin jolawi nyinggi ochan kaluwore gi nying jodong dhoutgi ngato ka ngato kuomgi hike piero ariyo kata moloyo kanyo nomi tich e od ruoth nyasaye nikech daudi nosewacho niya ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel osemiyo joge kue kendo koro jerusalem e kar dakne nyaka chieng omiyo koro jolawi ok onego oting sanduk kata gik lemo moko mitiyogo kode kuom wechene mogikgo daudi nochiko mondo ondik jolawi hikgi piero ariyo kata moloyo kanyo tichgi ne en konyo joka harun tiyo e od ruoth nyasaye nomigi tich rito udi mag od nyasaye gi alworane kendo lwoko gik lemo duto kod tiyo tije moko duto mag od nyasaye ne giiko makati miketo e nyim ruoth nyasaye pile kod mogo mayom mitimogo misango gi makati ok ketie thowi kod chapat gi kek moko mikonyruokgo e lemo kendo ne girito gik mipimogo gik moko ne onego giti e nyim ruoth nyasaye pile okinyi godhiambo ka gipake kendo gigoyone erokamano ne gikonyo bende joma ne timo misango miwango pep ni ruoth nyasaye e ndalo sabato kendo ka due opor kendo en ndalo moketi kaka nochangi jolawi nomi bende tich rito hemb romo kod kama ler joka harun owetegi ema nomi tich dolo e od ruoth nyasaye weche mag ndalo migepe mag joka harun e magi yawuot harun ne gin nadab gi abihu gi eleazar kod ithamar nadab kod abihu notho motelo ni wuongi kendo ne ok giweyo yawuowi kuom mano joka eleazar kod joka ithamar kende ema nobedo jodolo daudi nochanogi e migepe mondo opognigi tich ka zadok jaka eleazar gi ahimelek jaka ithamar konye jodong joka eleazar ne ngeny moloyo joka ithamar omiyo dhood eleazar ne nigi jodongo apar gauchiel dhood ithamar jodongo aboro nochangi gi ombulu nimar ne nitie jodong hekalu tindeni jodong nyasaye kuom joka eleazar kendo kuom joka ithamar bende jalawi moro jagoro nyinge shamaya wuod nethaneel nondiko nyinggi duto e nyim ruoth gi jodonge gi zadok jadolo gi mar piero ariyo gangwen maazia mano e kaka nochangi mondo giti e od ruoth nyasaye kaluwore gi chik mane ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel omiyo harun kwargi jolawi moko e magi shubael jaka amram gi jedaya jaka shubael gi ishia jatend joka rehabia gi shelemoth jaka izhar gi jahath jaka shelemoth kuom dhood hebron hebron ne jatelo amaria jalupne jahaziel mar adek kendo jekameam mar angwen jomoko ne gin mika jaka uziel gi shamir jaka mika gi ishia owadgi mika gi zekaria jaka ishia gi mali gi mushi kod jaazia joka merari gi beno gi shoham gi zakur kod ibri yawuot jaazia gi eleazar jaka mali mane onge gi yawuowi gi yawuot kish joka kish gi jeremeel kod mali gi eder kod jerimoth joka mushi mago e dhout jolawi dhoudigo duto madongo kod matindo kanyakla nogoyo ombulu kaachiel gi owetegi joka harun e nyim ruoth daudi gi zadok gi ahimelek kod dhout jodolo gi jolawi weche mag ndalo daudi opogo jower e migepegi mag tich daudi gi jodonge nowalo yawuot asaf gi yawuot heman gi yawuot jeduthun ni tich lemo mondo gikor wach ka gigoyo thumbe gii nyigwerni kod ongengo joma nomi tijno e magi yawuot asaf ne gin zakur gi josef gi nethania kod asarela jatendgi ne asaf mane jakor wach ni ruoth yawuot jeduthun ne gin gedalia gi izri gi isaya gi shimei gi hashabia kod matithia jatend ji auchielgo ne jeduthun wuongi mane koro wach ka gigoyo thum kendo ka gigoyo ni ruoth nyasaye erokamano ka gipake yawuot heman janen mar ruoth ne gin bukia gi natania gi uziel gi shubael gi jerimoth gi hanania gi hanani gi eliatha gi gidalti gi romamtiezer gi joshbekasha gi malothi gi hothir kod mahazioth jogo duto ne yawuot heman mane nyasaye omiye mondo opakego kaka nosesingore nyasaye nomiyo heman yawuowi apar gangwen kod nyiri adek giduto ne gikonyo wuongi wer e od ruoth nyasaye e kinde mag lemo daudi owuon ema ne chiko asaf gi jeduthun kod heman e tijegi jogo duto kaachiel gi owetegi nolony kuom wer ni ruoth nyasaye ne gin mia ariyo gi piero aboro ne gipogo tijgi gi ombulu kendo ne giwer ka gikikore jomadongo gi jomatindo molony kod mapuonjore kaachiel joma noyier gi ombulu ne magi mokwongo ne josef mar ariyo gedalia mar adek zakur mar angwen izri mar abich nethani mar auchiel bukia mar hekalu magi e migepe mag jorit rangeye joka kora ne gin meshelemia wuod kore wuod ebiasaf yawuot meshelemia ne gin zakaria wuod makabayo gi jediael mar ariyo gi zebedia mar angwen gi elam mar abich gi jehohanan mar auchiel kod elioenai mar abiriyo nyasaye noguedho obededom momiye yawuowi nyinggi shemaya wuode makayo gi jehozabad mar ariyo gi joa mar adek gi sakar mar angwen gi nathaneel mar abich gi amiel mar auchiel gi isakar mar abiriyo kod peulthai mar aboro shemaya wuod obededom nonywolo yawuowi nobedo jotelo kuom joodgi nikech ne gin gi rieko yawuot shemaya gogo ne gin othni gi refael gi obed kod elzabad ominene bende ne nigi rieko ne gin elihu gi shemakia mago duto ne gin joka obededom gin kaachiel gi owetegi kod yawuotgi ne gin joma riek kendo mowinjore kod tich hekalu giduto ne gin ji piero auchiel gariyo yawuot meshelemia kod owetene ne gin ji apar gaboro bende ne nigi rieko yawuot hosa jamerari ne gin shimri mane hosa oketo jatelo kata ne ok en kayo kamano gi hilkia mar ariyo gi tebalia mar adek kod zekaria mar angwen kar romb yawuot hosa kaachiel gi owetene ne apar gadek jodong dhoudi ema notelo ni migepe mag jorit rangeye tijgi ne en tiyo e od ruoth nyasaye kaachiel gi owetegi dhoudi madongo gi matindo nogoyo ombulu e kindgi giwegi mondo gipog tich rito rangeye ombuklu mar rangach man yo wuok chieng nolwar kuom shemelia eka ne gigoyo ombulu ni wuode zekaria jabura mariek moyudo rangach man yo nyandwat obededom noyudo rangach man yo milambo yawuote noyudo tich rito od keno hosa noyudo rangach man yo podho chieng kod ranga shekeleth man e yo maidho arita duto noket machalre ndalo duto jolawi auchiel ne rito rangach man yo wuok chieng angwen ne rito man yo nyandwat kendo angwen man yo milambo ariyo ariyo ne rito od keno ka od keno ji auchiel ne rito laru mochiel gi sirni man yo podho chieng angwen kuomgi ne rito yo michopogo e laruno ariyo ne rito laru hie mago ne e migepe mag joka kora gi joka merari mane rito rangeye jolawi moko ne rito od keno mag od nyasaye kod kuonde mikanoe chiwo momus ruoth nyasaye kuom nyikwa laadan jaka gershon jehiel kod owetene zetham gi joel ema ne rito kuonde keno mag od ruoth nyasaye ne gin jotend dhout laadan jaka gershon kuom dhout amram gi izhar gi hebron kod uziel shubael jaka gershom wuod musa ne jatend jorit kuonde keno shelemoth wuod zikri wuod joram wuod isaya wuod rehabia wuod eliezer ne jatend joka eliezer owadgi gershom shelemothno kaachiel gi owetene ema ne rito udi mikanoe chiwo mane daudi gi jodong dhoudi gi jotend ogend lweny madongo gi matindo kod jotend jolweny moko osechiwo ni ruoth nyasaye ne giwalo gik moko kuom gik mane ope e lweny mondo otigo e od ruoth nyasaye bende gik mane samuel janen gi saulo wuod kish gi abner wuod ner kod joab wuod zeruya ochiwo ni ruoth nyasaye ne nie lwet shelemoth kod owetene nikech gin ema ne girito gik moko duto mochiw ni ruoth nyasaye kuom joka izhar kenania kod yawuote ne gin jogoro gi jongad bura e piny israel kuom joka hebron hashabia kod owetene ema nobedo jotend joisrael modak yo podho chieng mar aora jordan ka gingiyo tich ruoth nyasaye kod tich ruoth ne gin ji mariek moromo alufu achiel gi mia abiriyo jeria ne en jatend joka hebrongo e higa mar piero angwen mar loch daudi nonon anywola joka hebron kendo noyud ni kara joma riek nodak jezergilead ne gin joka hebron ruoth daudi noketo jodong dhoudi mariek alufu ariyo gi mia abiriyo joodgi jeria mondo orit joreuben gi jogad kod jomanase konchiel e yore duto mag tich nyasaye kod tich rito piny weche mag ndalo jotend piny israel koro magi e nying joisrael mane rito migepe apar gariyo mane tiyo tich ruoth duto ka giwilore due ka due e higa ngima ne gin jodong dhoudi gi jotend ogend lweny madongo gi matindo kaachiel gi jondiko maggi migawo ka migawo ne nigi ji alufu piero ariyo gangwen jotelo mokwongo ne jeshobeam wuod zabdiel notiyo e due mokwongo ne en nyakwar perez kendo ne en jatend jodong lweny duto e due mokwongo eleazar wuod doidai jaahohi ema notelo e due mar ariyo jatelo mar adek ne en benaya jatend ogend lweny wuod jehoyada jadolo maduong benaya nogo ne en achiel kuom thuondi piero adek kande kendo ne en jatendgi amizabad wuode ema norito migape jatelo mar due mar angwen ne en asahel omin joab bang thone zebadia wuode nokawo kare jatelo mar due mar abich ne en shamhuth jaka zera jatelo mar due mar auchiel ne en ira wuod ikesh jatekoa jatelo mar due mar abiriyo ne en helez japelon jaefraim jatelo mar due mar aboro ne en sibekai jaka zera jahusha jatelo mar due mar ochiko ne en abiezer jaanathoth manie piny benjamin jatelo mar due mar apar ne en maharai jaka zera janetofa jatelo mar due mar apar gachiel ne en benaya japirathon manie piny efraim jatelo mar due mar apar gariyo ne en heldai jaka othniel janetofa jotelogo duto ne tiyo due achiel achiel kendo ngato ka ngato ne nigi migawo moromo ji alufu piero ariyo gangwen jotend dhout israel nene e magi kuom joreuben eliezer wuod zikri ne jatelo kuom josimeon jatelo ne shefatia wuod maaka kuom jolawi ne ne hashabia wuod kemuel kuom joka harun ne en zadok kuom jojuda ne en elihu wat daudi kuom joisakar ne en omri wuod mikael kuom jozebulun ne en ishmaya wuod obadia kuom jonaftali ne en jerimoth wuod azriel kuom joefraim ne en hoshea wuod azazia kuom jomanase konchiel ne en joel wuod pedaya kuom jomanase komachielo nodak gilead jatelo ne en ido wuod zekaria kuom jobenjamin ne en jaasiel wuod abner kuom jodan ne en azareel wuod jeroham mago e kar romb jotend dhout israel daudi ne ok okwano joma hikgi pok ochopo piero ariyo nikech ruoth nyasaye nosesingore ni nomi joisrael bedo mangeny ka sulue mae polo joab wuod zeruya nochako kweno ne ok otieko kwenono nokelo mirimb nyasaye kuom joisrael omiyo ne ok ondik kar rombgi e kitap weche mag ndalo mag loch ruoth daudi azmoth wuod adiel ne jarit kuonde keno mag ruoth jonathan wuod uzia ne rito kuonde keno manie mier madongo gi matindo kendo e miech lweny mochiel gi ohinga ezri wuod kelub ne rito jotich puodho shimei jarama ne rito jotich puothe mag mzabibu zabdi jashefem ne rito olemb mzabibu milosogo divai baalhanan jageder ne rito yiend zeituni gi ngowo mae pewe joash ne rito udi mikanoe mo shitrai jasharon ne jarit kweth dhok mane kwayo sharon shafat wuod adlai ne rito mago mane kwayo e holni obil ja ishmael ne jakwath ngamia jedaya jameronoth ne jarit kenje jaziz jahagar ne jarit jamni matindo jehiel jahakmon gi jonathan owadgi wuon daudi jabura mariek kendo mosomo ema nopuonjo yawuot daudi ahithofel ne jabuch ruoth hushai jaarki ne osiep ruoth bang tho ahithofel jehoyada wuod benaya kod abiathar ne jokawo kare joab ne jaduong jolweny weche mag ndalo daudi omiyo solomon tich gero hekalu daudi nochoko jotend israel duto jerusalem ne gin jodong dhoudi gi jotend joma ne tiyo ni ruoth gi jotend ogend lweny madongo gi matindo gi joma ne rito mwandu kod jamb ruoth gi mag yawuote kaachiel gi jongad bura gi thuondi kod joge duto mane nigi teko eka daudi nochung mowacho niya winjuru owetena gi jothurwa ne achano mondo ager ot sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye nyalo betie mondoo obed raten tiend nyasachwa omiyo ne aiko gik moko duto dagerego nyasaye nowachona niya ok inigerna ot nikech ijalweny kendo isechwero remo kata kamano ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel noyiera kuom joodwa duto mondo abed ruodh israel nyaka chieng nikech dhood juda ema nomiyo loch kuom dhood juda od wuora ema noyiero kuom yawuot wuora ema noyiera mi oketa ruodh israel ruoth nyasaye osemiya yawuowi mangeny kuom yawuowigo duto solomon ema oseyiero mondo obed ruodh israel korito joruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye nowachona niya solomon wuodi ema aseyiero mondo ogerna ot gi lache nikech aseyiere mondo obed wuoda abed wuon mare korito chikna kaka iritogi sani anagur lochne nyaka chieng koro akwayou uduto e nyim nyasaye kendo e nyim joruoth nyasaye duto ni mondo unon matut chike mag ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mondo piny maberni osik maru kendo uweye kodong ni nyithindu nyaka chieng solomon wuoda par nyasach wuoru kendo ichiwri mondo itine gi chunyi duto nimar ruoth nyasaye ngiyo chuny ji duto kendo ofwenyo paro mag dhano kidware iniyude kiweye enojwangi nyaka chieng emomiyo par malongo ni ruoth nyasaye oseyieri ni mondo iger ot moyangne bed gi jingo kendo igere daudi nonyiso solomon wuode kit gedo mar agoch hekalu kod utene gi ut keno gi ut gorofa gi udi maiye kod raum mar sandug muma miluongo ni karngwono nonyise bende paro en go kuom gero laru mag od ruoth nyasaye gi udi mane olwore gi ut keno mag od nyasaye kod udi nokanie mich maler mochiw ni ruoth nyasaye bende nonyise kaka odwaro mondo ochan jodolo gi jolawi e migepegi kendo opognigi tije duto mag od ruoth nyasaye kendo kaka onego los gik mitiyogo e lemo bende nonyise pek mar dhahabu gi fedha monego losgo gik lemo duto kaka si teyni mag dhahabu gi techegi gi si teyni mag fedha gi techegi moro ka moro owinjore gi tije gi mesni mag dhahabu miketoe makati e nyim nyasaye pile gi mesni moko mag fedha kod rachwopi gi nyilerni kod kikombe mag dhahabu maler gi tewni mag dhahabu gi mag fedha gi kendo miwangoe ubani kod gach lweny mar dhahabu maler tiende ni kerubi moyaro bwombegi mondo oumgo sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye daudi nowacho niya magi duto ruoth nyasaye owuon ema onyiso tichna ne en mana dwaro rieko kaka digere bange daudi nowacho ni solomon wuode niya bed gichir kendo gi jingo kik chunyi nyosre kendo kik iluor chak mana tich nikech ruoth nyasaye nyasacha nobed kodi kendo ok nojwangi kata weyi ka pok itieko tije duto mag ode migepe mag jodolo kod jolawi oikore ni tich od nyasaye jotich duto molony bende oikore konyi e tije duto kendo jotelo kaachiel gi ji duto nobed e lueti weche mag ndalo bang mago daudi nowacho ni oganda joisrael mane osechokore niya solomon wuoda nyasaye oseyiero pod en rawera tijni e tich maduong nikech odni ok en mar dhano en mar ruoth nyasaye asetemo kar nyalona maiko gik moko ni tich od nyasacha kaka dhahabu gi mula gi nyinyo gi yien kod kite mabeyo nengogi tek mag loso ot kendo mag gedo bende agolo kuom mwanduna awuon dhahabu moa ofir moromo kilo alufu mia achiel gi fedha maler moromo kilo mia ariyo mondo obawgo kor udi nikech ahero od nyasacha mago notigo tich dhahabu gi tich fedha kod tich moro amora jotich molony dwaro koro ere ngama oyie golo chiwo ni ruoth nyasaye gi chuny achiel kawuono mi jodong dhoudi gi jotelo mane rito dhout israel gi jotend ogend lweny madongo gi matindo kod jotelo mag tich ruoth noyie gi chuny achiel mogolo dhahabu moromo kilo alufu mia ariyo gi pesa moromo darik alufu apar gi fedha kilo alufu mia angwen gi mula kilo alufu mia auchiel gi nyinyo moromo kilo tara angwen mondo ogergo od nyasaye bende joma ne ni kod kite nengogi tek nochiwogi ni jahiel jagershon mondo okangi e kar keno mar od ruoth nyasaye ji duto ne mor ahinya nikech ne gineno ka jogo golo chiwo ni ruoth nyasaye gi chuny achiel daudi ogoyo ni nyasaye erokamano daudi bende ne mor kendo nopako ruoth nyasaye e nyim ogandano kowacho niya ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel nyingi mondo obed gi duong ndalo duto nyaka chieng ruoth nyasaye duong gi pak gi teko gi loch gin magi nimar e wuon gik moko duto manie polo gi piny kendo iduong moloyogi duto mwandu gi duong kuomi kendo ema irito ji duto teko gi nyalo bende ipogo ni ji koro wagoyoni erokamano nyasachwa kendo wapako nyingi maler nga kata joga gin nga gini dimi wagol chiwo gi mor kama ema ichiwo gik moko duto kendo wadwokoni mana gik misemiyowa wan mana welo kendo jodak e nyimi kaka kwerewa bende nobet ndalowa e piny ka chalo gi tipo makadho kendo waonge kar dak mosiko ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa mwandugi duto mwasechoko mondo wagernigo ot oa kuomi kendo gin meki nyasaye angeyo ni inono chuny dhano kendo adiera ema ihero asemiyi chiwogi duto gi mor kendo gi chuny makare koro amedo bedo gi ilo kaneno jogigi bende ka goloni chiwo gi mor nyasach ibrahim gi isaka kod israel kwerewa yie imi jogi obed gi chuny mangwon kama nyaka chieng kendo imi gipari kony solomon wuoda mondo omak chikeni gi bucheni mondo ochopgi duto kendo oger hekalu koro aseikone gik moko solomon odoko ruodh israel kar daudi ruodhi eka daudi nowacho ni ji duto niya denduru ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mi oganda duto nopako ruoth nyasaye nyasach kweregi ka gigoyo chonggi piny mi gikulore nyaka e lowo e nyim ruoth nyasaye kendo e nyim ruoth kinyne ne gitimo ni ruoth nyasaye misengni gi ruedhi alufu achiel gi imbe alufu achiel gi nyirombe alufu achiel kaachiel gi misengni miolo piny kod misengni moko mangeny moromo joisrael duto chiengno ne gichiemo kendo gimetho e nyim ruoth nyasaye gi mor maduong bange ne gichako giketo solomon wuod daudi e kom ruoth kendo ne giwire gi mo mondo obed jatendgi ruoth nyasaye oyiero zadok bende ne owir mondo obed jadolo kuom mano solomon nobedo ruodh joruoth nyasaye kar daudi wuon mare mi nodhi maber kendo joisrael duto nomiye luor jotelo kod jolweny duto kaachiel gi yawuot daudi nosingore ni giniyie loch solomon ruoth nyasaye nomiyo solomon duong onge ruodh israel moro mane osebedogo daudi wuod jesse nobedo ruodh israel duto kuom higni piero angwen e hebron nobedoe ruoth kuom higni abiriyo e jerusalem higni piero adek gadek notho ka hike oniang kendo ka en gi luor kod mwandu mogundho solomon wuode nodoko ruoth kare gik moko duto mane otimore e ndalo loch daudi ondiki e kitap samuel janen gi kitap nathan janabi kod kitap gad bende janen weche duto mag loch daudi gi tekone kod weche israel kaachiel gi mag pinje duto ondiki e kitepego weche mag ndalo solomon okwayo nyasaye rieko ruodhi solomon wuod daudi nogurore e tich ruoth e pinye ruoth nyasaye nyasache ne ni kode kendo nomiye duong ahinya solomon noluongo jotend ogend lweny madongo gi matindo kod jongad bura gi jotelo duto mag israel jodong gwenge eka solomon gi ji duto nochokore kode ne jodhi e hembko mane ni gibeon ni mar hemb romo mane nyasaye romoe gi joge mane musa jatich ruoth nyasaye oloso e thim ne ni kanyo daudi nosegolo sanduk mar nyasaye kiriathjearim motero jerusalem nimar nosegurone hema kuno kendomarmisango mar mula mane bezalel wuod uri wuod hur oloso ne ni gibeon e nyim hema mar ruoth nyasaye solomon kod oganda duto nolamo ruoth nyasaye kanyo solomon noidho mochung e bath kendomarmisango mar mula mane nie nyim hemb romo motimoe misengni miwango pep alufu achiel e nyim ruoth nyasaye gotieno nogo nyasaye nofwenyore ni solomon mowachone niya kwa gima idwaro mondo amiyi solomon nodwoko nyasaye niya ninyiso ni ihero daudi wuora gi hera mosiko kuom ket iketago ruoth kare ruoth nyasaye iseketa ruodh oganda ji thothie ka kwoyo koro yie ichop singruok mane isingorigo ni daudi wuora yie imiya rieko mondo ange kaka datel ni ogandani nimar ere ngamam dinyal rito jogi mangenygi eka nyasaye nodwoko solomon niya nikech chunyi chalo kamano kendo ok ikwayo mwandu kata fedha kata pak kata tho wasiki kata kwayo ni mondo idag aminga isekwayo mana rieko mar ngeyo kaka ditel ni oganda maseketi ruodhgi ero amiyi rieko kod ngeyo bende abiro medi fedha gi mwandu kod pak moloyo ruodhi duto mosekuongoni kata nowuog bangi eka solomon noa e nyim hemb romo kolor hembko mane ni gibeon modhi jerusalem kuma noritoe piny israel ohand farese kod geche lweny solomon oloko ruodhi weche mag ndalo solomon nochako dwaro geche mag lweny gi farese nyaka nobedo gi geche alufu achiel gi mia angwen gi farese alufu apar gariyo moko kuomgi noketo e mier mag geche moko ne en go jerusalem nomiyo fedha gi dhahabu obedo mangeny jerusalem ka kuoyo kendo nomiyo yiend sida odoko mangeny ka ngowo mae pap solomon ne omo farese misri gi koah joohande ne omogi kuno gi nengo moketi gari achiel ne gingiewo misri gi kilo abiriyo mag fedha faras achiel gi kilo ariyo johalago ne terogi ne ruodhi mag johiti gi mag joaram weche mag ndalo solomon otimo winjruok gi hiram ruodh turo ruodhi solomon ne dwaro gero hekalu ni nying ruoth nyasaye kod ode mar ruoth nondiko joting alufu piero abiriyo gi ji alufu aboro mondo opa kite e gode kod nyipeche alufu adek gi mia auchiel solomon nooro ni hiram ruodh turo wach niya kaka nitimo ni daudi wuora kikowone yiend sida mondo ogergo ode yie itimna kamano bende nimar adwaro gero ot moyang ni ruoth nyasaye nyasacha kama jodolo nowangie ubani mangwe ngar e nyim ruoth nyasaye kendo nochiwie makati miketo e nyime pile kendo notimie misengni miwango pep okinyi godhiambo kod miwango e ndalo mag sabato kendo ka due por kendo e ndalo sewni ruoth nyasaye oseketo ni israel nyaka chieng ot madwaro gero nobed maduong nimar nyasachwa duong moloyo nyiseche duto en nga dinyal gerone ot ka kata polo maduong manade ok nyal rome dakie nga dagerne ot modakie mak mana kar wango ubani e nyime emomiyo yie iorna ngato molony kuom loso gik dhahabu gi mag fedha gi mag mula kod mag nyinyo kendo mongeyo loso law maralik gi makwar kod mambulu kendo molony kuom goro gik moko enoti gi jotichna molony man juda gi man jerusalem mane daudi wuora oketo bende orna yiend sida gi saipras gi algum mag lebanon nimar angeyo ni jotichni olony kuom tongo yiend lebanon jotichna noti kaachiel gi jotichni mondo gikna yien mogundho nimar ot madwaro gero nobed maduong kendo miwuoro anami jotichni jotongo gunde alufu piero angwen mag ngano gi gunde alufu piero ariyo mag shairi gi degii alufu angwen mag divai kod depe alufuu angwen mag mo hiram ruodh turo nodwoko solomon gi barua mondikoe niya ruoth nyasaye ohero joge emomiyo oseketi ruodhgi eka nodhi nyime kowacho niya apako ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel jachuech polo gi piny nimar osemiyo ruoth daudi wuowi man gi rieko kod ngeyo biro gero hekalu ni ruoth nyasaye kod ot ruoth dakie koro aseoro ngat molony kendo mariek nyinge huramabi wuod jaturo min mare nyar dan en ngat molony kuom tich dhahabu gi fedha gi mula gi nyinyo gi kidi kod yien kendo ongeyo loso law maralik kata mambulu kata makwar kod law katana maber kendo olony kuom tich goro kod loso kido moro amora momiye onyalo tiyo kod jotichni molony kendo gi jotich daudi wuoru emomiyo ruodha yie iornwa ngano gi shairi gi mo gi divai misewacho wanatong yien lebanon moromo kaka idwaro mi watuegi kanyakla kendo wakwanggi e nam nyaka jopa eka iniomgi kuno kiterogi jerusalem solomon nokwano jodak duto mane nie piny israel kaka daudi wuon mare nokwanogi ne giromo alufu mia achiel gi piero abich gadek kod mia auchiel noketo ji alufu piero abiriyo kuomgi mondo obed joting ji alufu piero aboro opa kite e gode kod nyipeche alufu adek gi mia auchiel kwayogi weche mag ndalo solomon ogero hekalu mar nyasaye ruodhi solomon nochako gero od ruoth nyasaye jerusalem e laru mar ornan jajebus mane nie got moria daudi wuon mare ema noyiero laruno nikech ruoth nyassye nofwenyorene kanyo nochako gedo e due mar ariyo e higa mar angwen mar lochne hekalu mane solomon dwaro gero ni ruoth nyasaye ne romo kama borne ne mita piero adek lachne ne mita apar bor mar agola mane nie nyim hekalu ne romo mita apar maromre gi lach mar hekalu kendo borne modhi malo ne mita apar nobawo iye gi dhahabu maler hekalu nochwado iye gi saipras kendo obawo gi dhahabu maler mogoroe othidhe gi thiwni nolicho hekalu gi kite mamil nengogi tek dhahabu mane ogolo parvein ema nobawogo hekalu duto koda ka sirni gi pewe dhoudi gi kor ot kod dhoudi kendo nogoro kido maket gi malaika miluongo ni kerubi e kor ot kama ler moloyo nogero kama borne ne romo mita apar maromre gi lach mar hekalu duto lachne bende mita apar nobawe gi dhahabu pekne oromo mita piero ariyo pek dhahabu mar musmal mane otiyogo noromo nu kilo nobawo udi mamalo bende gi dhahabu kama ler moloyo nolosoe kerubi ariyo kod bao mobao gi dhahabu bor mar bwombe kerubigo ne romo mita apar nikech bor bwom ka bwom ne mita ariyo gi nu bwom achiel mar kerubi ka kerubi nogik e kor ot bwombege modong noromo e dier ot bwombegi noyarore mi borgi duto ne romo mita apar kerubigo nochung komanyo kama ler noloso pasia gi law mambulu gi maralik gi makwar kod law katana maber motwangie kido mag kerubi tich huram otiyo e hekalu ruodhi noloso sirni ariyo borgi ne romo mita ochiko moketo e nyim hekalu noumo wi siro ka siro gi gima chal gi agulu maduong borne romo mita ariyo gi nu noloso thiwni machal gi tik ngut motueyo kuom agulinigo bange noloso gik monginore onginore mag mula mia achiel mi oliero e thiwnigo nochungo sirnigo e nyim hekalu koketo achiel korachwich machielo koracham mano mane oketo korachwich nochako ni jakin koracham nochako ni boaz weche mag ndalo huram noloso kendomarmisango mar mula borne romo mita apar kendo lachne bende mita apar borne modhi malo mita abich eka nolenyo mula moloso gima duong matingo pi machal gi karaya mochake ni nam lach dhoge ne romo mita abich kendo tutne mita ariyo gi nu alwora mar dhoge mita apar gabich e bwo dhoge ne nitie gik maradadi monginore onginore molwore noriedgi e laini ariyo borgi romo mita apar gabich namno nochue kaachiel gi gik maradadigo norenje e nge ruedhi apar gariyo mag mula ruedhi adek nomanyo nyandwat adek yo podho chieng adek yo milambo kendo adek yo wuok chieng iwgi nodok kaiye mith mula molosego ne romre gi lach lith lwedo angwen dhoge nolos ka dho kikombe machal gi thiep oyungu nonyalo tingo pi dirom depe alufu auchiel bende noloso kareche apar mag luoko moketo abich korachwich abich mamoko koracham karechego ema nilwokoe gik misango miwango nam ema ne jodolo lwokoree huram noloso si teche apar mag dhahabu kaka nochike moketogi e hekalu abich korachwich abich koracham noloso mesni apar bende moketo e hekalu abich korachwich abich koracham kendo noloso tewni mia achiel mag dhahabu noloso laru mar jodolo gi laru maduong kod dhoute mobawo dhoudigo gi mula nam cha noketo e bath hekalu korachwich momanyo kind yo wuok chieng gi yo milambo achien huram noloso agulini gi rajope kod tewni kamano notieko gik mane oloso ni ruoth solomon e od ruoth nyasaye ne gin sirni ariyo gi agulini madongo ariyo mane nie wi sirni gi oserni ariyo mane oumo agulini ariyogo kod gik monginore onginore mia angwen mane oried e laini ariyo e kor oserni bende noloso rachungi gi kareche mane orenj kuom rachungigo kaachiel gi nam achiel cha gi ruedhi apar gariyo mane orenje e gi agulini gi rajope kod rachwopi huramabi noloso ni ruoth solomon gik moko duto mag od ruoth nyasaye gi mula mangangni nolosogi ni ruoth e paw aora jordan e lop chwech manie kind sukoth gi zareda solomon noloso gik mathoth ahinya pek mula molosgigo ne ok ongere solomon noloso gik moko duto mane nie od nyasaye ne gin kendomarmisango mar dhahabu gi mesni mag makati miketo e nyim nyasaye pile gi rachung teyni kod techegi monego liel e nyim kama ler moloyo kaka nochiki kod maupe gi teyni gi ramekni gi rangis teyni gi degi gi tewni mag ubani kod tegni mag mach mago duto nolos gi dhahabu maler pata mag dhoudi maiye midonjogo kama ler moloyo kod mag dhoudi mag kama ler mag hekalu nolos gi dhahabu bende weche mag ndalo solomon oketo sanduk mar nyasaye e hekalu ruodhi kamano solomon notieko tich duto mag ruoth nyasaye eka noomo gik moko duto mane daudi wuon mare osechiwo ni nyasaye mi noketogi kuonde keno mag od nyasaye ne gin fedha gi dhahabu kod gik lemo moko solomon nochoko jodong israel duto jerusalem mondo oom sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye e dala daudi miluongo ni sayun eka joisrael nochokore gi ruoth chieng sawo nitimo e due mar abiriyo higa ka higa kane jodong israel duto osebiro jodolo gi jolawi notingo sandug muma gi hemb romo kod gik moko duto mane nie hema mitiyogo tich nyasaye ruoth solomon gi joisrael duto mane ochokore kode ne ni e nyim sanduk ka gitimo misengni gi rombe kod ruedhi mangeny mokadho akwana jodolo norwako sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye kama olosne e bwo bwombe kerubi e ot iye mar hekalu miluongo ni kama ler moloyo nimar kerubi noyaro bwombegi ewi kar sanduk ka giume kaachiel gi ludhe mitingego ludhegi ne boyo ahinya wigi ne nenore oko e kama ler mane nie nyim ot maiye ne ok ginen oko mar hekalu pod gin kanyo nyaka chil kawuono ne onge gimoro ei sanduk mak mana kite ariyo mopa mane musa oketoe ka ne en horeb kuma ruoth nyasaye notimoe singruok gi joisrael ka ne gia misri kane jodolo owuok oa kama ler bor polo nopongo od ruoth nyasaye duto nonwango ka jodolo duto osepwodhore mondo oti tijgi ok gidewo ndalo mochangie jolawi duto jower nochung yo wuok chieng mar kendomarmisango ne gin asaf gi heman gi jeduthun kod yawuotgi gi jowetegi ne girwako lewni mag law katana maber ka gigoyo ongengo gi thumbe mopogore opogore jodolo mia achiel gi piero ariyo bende ne goyo tung joma ne goyo tunggo kaachiel gi jower ne wer ka pako ruoth nyasaye kendo goyone erokamano ne gigoyo tung gi thumbe mopogore opogore ka gipako ruoth nyasaye gi wer niya ruoth nyasaye ber herane mosiko ochwere jodolo ne ok nyal tiyo tijgi nikech bor polono nimar duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye nopongo hekalu weche mag ndalo solomon oguedho hekalu ruodhi solomon nowacho niya ruoth nyasaye niwacho ni nidag e mudho mandiwa koro asegeroni ot man gi duong mondo idagie nyaka chieng eka ruoth nowichore kendo kane joisrael duto ne ochokore e nyime ochung noguedhogi nowacho niya apako ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel mosechopo singruok mane otimo ni daudi wuora kowachone niya chakre ndalo mane aresoe joga kagologi e piny misri pok ayiero dala moro kuom dhoudi duto mag israel mondo ogernae ot nyinga betie mak mana jerusalem kendo ne ok ayiero ngat moro obed jatend joga israel mak mana daudi ungeyo ni daudi wuora ne dwaro gero ot ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel ruoth nyasaye nowachone niya nitimo maber kuom paro gerona ot kata kamano ok niger odno mana wuodi mibiro nywolo ema nogernago koro ruoth nyasaye osechopo singruok mane otimo nikech osebet kar daudi wuora kendo e ruodh israel mana kaka ruoth nyasaye nosingore mi asegero ot ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel kendo aseketoe sandug muma motingo singruok mane ruoth nyasaye otimo gi joisarel eka solomon nochung e dho kendomarmisango mar ruoth nyasaye e nyim joisrael duto kendo noyaro bedene noseloso raidhi mar mula borne gi lachne mita ariyo gi nu maromre borne modhi malo mita achiel gi nu moketo e dier laru noidhe mogoyoe chonge piny e nyim joisrael duto mane ochokore norieyo bedene malo kowacho niya ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel onge nyasaye moro e polo kata e piny machal kodi irito singruok mitimo gi jotichni mawuotho e yoreni gi chunygi duto kendo iherogi gi hera mosiko isechopo singruok nitimo ni daudi wuora jatichni adier gima niwacho ema koro isetimo emomiyo ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel yie ichop singruok mane itimo ni daudi wuora jatichni kiwachone niya anywolani nobed ruodhi mag israel nyaka chieng mana ka yawuoti oritore kendo owuotho e chikena kaka isewuotho koro ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel wachni iwacho ni daudi jatichni mondo otimre nyasaye bende nidag kod ji e piny ka kata polo maduong manadi ok nyal romi koro ot asegeroni direm marom nadi kata kamano ruoth nyasacha yie mondo iwinj lemona gi kwayona kendo iwinj ywakna makeloni odiechieng gotieno mondo irang ot misewacho ni nyingi nobedie kendo iwinj lemo abiro bedo ka akwayogo kaeri iwinj kwayo kod jogi israel biro kwayi yie iwinjwa e polo kama idakie kiwinjo mondo iwenwa richowa ka ngato otimo ni wadgi marach kendo okete mondo ocham muma mi okuongore e nyim kendomarmisango manie odni yie mondo iwinj e polo kendo ingad buch jotichni kikumo ngat moketho kendo kidwoko richone e wiye owuon jal kare mondo iket kare mimiye pok moromo gi timne maber ka wasigu oloyo jogi israel nikech gisekethoni eka gilokore kendo giyie duongni ka gilami kendo gisayi e odni yie mondo iwinjgi e polo kiweyonigi richogi kendo idwokgi e pinygi mane imiyo kweregi ka polo ongawo koth onge nikech jogi israel osekethoni bange gilemo kaeri kendo giyie duongni ka gilokore giweyo richogi nikech ikumogi yie mondo iwinjgie polo kiweyonigi richogi nyisgi yo maber onego giwuothie kendo imi koth chue e pinyi misemiyo jogi mondo obed mwandugi ka kech kata dera mar tho marach nie piny kata ka cham orochore ewi dongo kata ka bonyo kata kungu nitie kata ka wasikgi oluoro dala moro kata ka tho kata tuo manadi nitie mi ngato olami ka kwayi gimoro korieyo bedene kochomo hekaluni nimar ngato ka ngato ongeyo gima thage kendo chando chunye yie mondo iwinj e polo kama idakie iwene richone kendo ichop lemone kimiye pok moromo gi timbene nikech kendi ema ingeyo chuny ji duto kuom mano mondo giluori kendo giluw chikeni ndalo duto gidakgo e piny mane imiyo kwerewani ka ngama wendo ok achiel kuom jogi israel obiro mondo olem e hekaluni koa e piny mabor nikech nyingi maduong gi lweti motegno kod badi morie yie mondo iwinj e polo kama idakie kendo itim duto ngat wendono okwayi kamano ji duto manie piny mondo onge nyingi kendo olwori mana kaka jogi israel kendo mondo ginge ni hekalu asegeronini en mari adier ka jogi dhi e lweny kedo gi wasikgi kamoro amora miorogie mi gilami ka gichomo dala miseyiero kod hekalu masegeronini yie mondo iwinj gie polo lemo gikwayigo kendo ikonygi ka gitimo gima isekwero nimar onge ngat ok kethi kendo ikecho kodgi michiwogi e lwet wasikgi mondo otergi e tuech e piny mabor kata machiegni eka bange giloko parogi e piny motuegieno mi chunygi olokore kendo gikwayi niya waseketho kwatimo wich teko kod richo mi giduogo iri gi parogi duto kendo gi chunygi duto e piny notuegieno kendo gilemo ka gichomo pinygi nimiyo kweregi kod dala niyiero gi hekalu masegeronini yie mondo iwinj e polo kama idakie lemo gikwayigo kendo ikonygi kiweyo ni jogi richo gisetimo e nyimi nyasacha yie mondo iwinj lemo mikwayigo ka ruoth nyasaye mi jodoloni obed joma owar adier kendo jogi molwori mondo obed mamor nikech iguedhogi ruoth nyasaye kik ilok ngeyi ni ruoth mowir miseyiero par herani mosiko mane iherogo daudi jatichni weche mag ndalo kane solomon osetieko lemo mach noa e polo motieko misango miwango kod misengni mamoko kendo duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye nopongo hekalu jodongo ne ok nyal donjo e hekalu nikech duong mar ruoth nyasaye noponge kane joisarel duto oneno mach kalor piny kod duong mar ruoth nyasaye ka nie hekalu ne gikulore piny e laru ne gilamo nyasaye kendo gigoyone erokamano ka giwacho niya ruoth nyasaye ber herane mosiko ochwere eka ruoth kod ji duto notimo misengni ni ruoth nyasaye ruoth solomon notimo misango gi ruedhi alufu piero ariyo gariyo kod rombe alufu mia achiel gi piero ariyo mano e kaka ruoth kod ji duto noyango hekalu ni ruoth nyasaye jodolo nochung kargi kendo jolawi nopako ruoth nyasaye gi wende mane daudi ochuogo ka giwer niya herane mosiko ochwere ne gigoyo thumbe mane daudi oloso mondo odendgo ruoth nyasaye jodolo bende nogoyo tung ka ochung momanyore gi jolawi solomon noyango ni ruoth nyasaye dier laru mane nie nyim hekalu nimar kanyo ema notimoe misengni miwango kendo owangoe boche mag misengni mag sawo nikech kendomarmisango mar mula noseloso ne tin mane ok nyal timie misengnigo duto e ndalogo solomon kaachiel gi joisrael duto notimo sawo kuom ndalo abiriyo ne en chokruok maduong ahinya moa piny israel duto chakre yo nyandwat kama idonjogo hamath nyaka aora man yo milambo e kind pinygi gi piny misri chieng mar aboro ne gitimo sawo maduong nimar pwodho kendomarmisango notieko ndalo abiriyo kendo sawo bende ndalo abiriyo due piero ariyo gadek due mar abiriyo solomon nomiyo ji thuolo modok miechgi ka mor ahinya nikech gik mabeyo duto mane ruoth nyasaye osetimo ni daudi gi solomon kendo ni joge israel nyasaye ochako ofwenyore ni solomon ruodhi solomon notieko od ruoth nyasaye gi ode owuon bende gik moko duto mane ochano mondo otim e od ruoth nyasaye gi ode owuon notieko maber ruoth nyasaye nofwenyore gotieno mowachone niya asewinjo lemoni kendo aseyiero hekaluni mondo obed kama itimonae misango ka aloro polo ni kik koth chue kata kakelo bonyo mondo ocham piny kata kaoro dera mar tho marach ka joga miluongo gi nyinga obolore ka lama kendo dwara ka giweyo yoregi maricho eka nawinj e polo mi nawenigi richogi kendo naris pinygi ka gilemo e hekaluni anaranggi gi wanga kendo nawinjgi gi ita aseyiero hekaluni kendo asewale obed maler mondo nyinga obedie kendo arange gi chunya duto nyaka chieng kiwuotho e nyima kitimo duto masechiki kendo kimako chikena gi buchena kaka daudi wuoru notimoo eka anagur loch mar nyikwayi mana kaka nasingora ni daudi wuoru kawachone niya ndalo duto nyikwayi nobed ruodhi mag israel kulokoru mi ok umako wechena gi chikena naketo e nyimu mudhi tiyo ni nyiseche mamoko kendo lamogi napudh joisrael ka buya mi nagolgi e piny namiyogi kendoo hekalu asegwedho mondo nyinga oyudgo duongni naketh mondo olal e wanga mi naloke ka ngero kendo gima ji duto jaro ji duto makadho hekalu koro duong kamani nowuor ka gipenjo niya ango momiyo ruoth nyasaye osetimo gima kama ni pinyni kendo ni hekaluni eka nodwokgi niya ne giweyo ruoth nyasaye nyasach kweregi noresogi ka gologi e piny misri mi ne gilamo nyiseche moko kendo gitiyonigi emomiyo nyasaye osekelo masichegi duto kuomgi weche mag ndalo gik mamoko solomon otimo ruodhi kane higni piero ariyo mane solomon ogeroe od ruoth nyasaye gi ode owuon oserumo noloso mier mane hiram omiye moketoe joisarel koro solomon nodhi hamathzoba mokawo dalano noloso tadmor mane nie thim kaachiel gi mier mag keno duto nosegero hamath bende nogero bethhoron mamalo gi bethhoron mamwalo mochielo gi ohinga moketonigi rangeye miloro motegno gi lodi nogero baalath gi mier duto mag keno kaachiel gi mier duto nokanoe gechene mag lweny gi miech joge joidh farese kendo solomon nogero udi duto jerusalem kod lebanon kendo e pinye duto kaka nodwaro ji duto nodong e piny israel kuom johiti gi joamor gi joperizi gi johivi kod jojebus ok joisrael solomon noloko wasumbni michuno mondo oti gi thwon kaka obet nyaka chil kawuono ne gin joma notamo joisrael tieko solomon ne ok oloko joisrael wasumbni noketogi jolweny kod jotend jolweny gi jotend joidh faresene ne en gi jotelo madongo mia ariyo gi piero abich mane rito ji solomon nogolo nyar farao e dala daudi mokete e ot nogerone nimar nowacho niya chiega ok nyal dak e od daudi ruodh israel nikech kuonde duto sanduk osebedoe oyang ni ruoth nyasaye solomon notimo ni ruoth nyasaye misengini miwango pep kod misengini mag sawo e kendomarmisango mar ruoth nyasaye noseketo e nyim agola odiechieng kodiechieng notimo misengni koluwo chik musa notimogi chieng due opor kendo e ndalo sewni adek mag higa gin sap makati ok ketie thowi gi sap jumbe kod sap kiche solomon norito chik mane daudi wuon mare ngat nyasaye oketo nochan jodolo e tich dolo mopogore opogore kendo nomiyo jolawi tich wer kod konyo jodolo kaka ne dwarore odiechieng kodiechieng kendo nopogo jorit rangeye tich rito rangach ka rangach kuom weche duto mane ruoth omiyo jodolo gi jolawi ne onge moro amora mane giweyo kata mana wach keno kamano solomon notieko tich duto chakre chieng keto mise mar od ruoth nyasaye nyaka rumone solomon nodhi eziongeber gi eloth manie dhonam e piny edom mi hiram nooro jotichne motero ni solomon yiedhi kaachiel gi jokwang molony kuom tich nam ne gidhi ofir kaachiel gi jotich solomon kuma ne giomoe dhahabu moromo kilo alufu apar gauchiel mi ne gikelo ni ruoth solomon weche mag ndalo ruoth madhako mar sheba olimo solomon ruodhi kane ruoth madhako mar sheba owinjo humb solomon nobiro jerusalem mondo oteme gi penj matek nobiro gi oganda maduong ahinya kod ngamia motingo gik mangue ngar gi dhahabu mogundho kod kite mabeyo nengogi tek kane obiro ir solomon nopenjo weche duto mane nie chunye solomon nodwoko wechene duto onge moro mane otame dwoko kane ruoth madhako mar sheba oseneno riekone gi ot nosegero gi chiemb ode gi kuonde dak jodonge gi kit tich mag jotichne gi rwakruokgi gi jolos divai mage gi rwakruokgi kod misengni notimo e od ruoth nyasaye dhoge nomoko nowacho ni ruoth niya kara humb timbeni gi riekoni nawinjo e pinya en adier kane pok abiro mi anenogi gi wanga ne ok anyal yie ni gin adier koro aneno ni nonyisa mana dir wach mar riekoni maduong giloyo huma nawinjo mondi kod jotichni johawi mawinjo riekoni ndalo duto apako ruoth nyasaye nyasachi moheri kendo oketi e kom duongne mondo ibedne ruodh israel ruoth nyasaye ohero joisrael kendo odwaro mondo gigurre motegno nyaka chieng emomiyo oseketi ruodhgi mondo ingad bura kare eka nomiyo ruoth solomon dhahabu moromo kilo alufu abiriyo gi gik mangue ngar mogundho kod kite mabeyo nengogi tek solomon ne ok ochako oyudo gik mangue ngar machal gi mago mane ruoth madhako mar sheba omiye bende jotich hiram gi jotich solomon mane odhi ofir omo dhahabu ne kelo yiend algum gi kite mabeyo nengogi tek yiengo ruoth nolosogo raidhi mag od ruoth nyasaye gi mag ode owuon kod thumbe nyatiti gi nyigwerni ne jower wergo e hekalu yien machal kamago ne pok one e piny juda nyaka nene ruoth solomon nomiyo ruoth madhako mar sheba gimoro amora nokwayo kaachiel gi gik moromo mich nokelo eka ruodh sheba nodok e pinye kaachiel gi jotichne mwandu solomon gi humbe ruodhi weche mag ndalo pek mar dhahabu mane ikelo ni solomon higa ka higa ne romo kilo alufu piero ariyo gadek ka ok okwan mago mag osuch johala gi johono kendo ruodhi duto mag piny arabia kod jorit piny solomon ne kelone fedha gi dhahabu ruoth solomon nochuogo kuodi mia ariyo kuot ka kuot nobaw gi dhahabu moromo kilo abiriyo kendo nochuogo okumbini mia adek okumba ka okumba nogaw gi dhahabu moromo kilo adek gi nu magi duto ruoth noketo e od bungu mar lebanon bende ruoth noloso kom duong mangongo mar lakliech mi nobawo gi dhahabu maler kom duongno ne nigi raidhi man gi kuonde minyono auchiel gi raten tielo mar dhahabu momakore gi kom sibuoche ariyo mag dhahabu nochung e bath bede kom koni gi koni kende sibuoche apar gariyo moko nochung moro ka moro e dir raidhi koni gi koni onge piny moro nolosie kom ruoth machal gi mano kikombe solomon duto nolos gi dhahabu kendo gik moko duto mikonyruokgo e od bungu mar lebanon bende nolos gi dhahabu maler fedha ne ok kwan ka gimoro e ndalo mag solomon nimar yiedhi mage ne dhi tarshish gi jotich hiram kendo bang higni adek ne gikelo dhahabu gi fedha gi lak liech gi ongeche kod bimbe kamano ruoth solomon noloyo ruodhi duto mag piny gi mwandu kendo gi rieko ruodhi duto mag piny ne biro ir solomon mondo owinj rieko mane nyasaye omiye higa ka higa ngato ka ngato ne kelone chiwo mag gik molos gi fedha gi dhahabu kaachiel gi lewni kod gilweny gi gik mangue ngar gi farese kod nyumbu solomon ne nigi udi alufu angwen mag farese gi mag geche kod joidh farese alufu apar gariyo moko kuomgi noketo e miech geche moko ne en go jerusalem ruodhi duto ne nie bwo loch solomon chakre aora yufrate nyaka piny filistia gi tong piny misri ruoth nomiyo fedha obedo mangeny ka kuoyo e jerusalem kendo yiend sida bende ne ngeny ka ngowo mae pap solomon ne omo farese misri kod pinje moko duto mane giyudoree tho mar solomon ruodhi weche moko mag solomon chakruokgi nyaka gikogi ondik e kitap nathan janabi kendo e kitabu motingo weche mane ahija jashilo okoro kendo e kitap iddo janen mondikie fwenyruok noneno kuom jeroboam wuod nebat solomon nobedo ruodh israel duto kuom higni piero angwen kodak jerusalem notho moyike e dala daudi wuon mare rehoboam wuode nodoko ruoth kare weche mag ndalo dhout israel mamoko opogore gi jojuda ruodhi rehoboam nodhi shekem nikech joisrael duto nosechokore kuno mondo okete ruoth kane jeroboam wuod nebat owinjo wachno noduogo koa misri nikech ne pod en misri kuma nodhiye koringo ruoth solomon ne giorone wach mondo obi shekem nobiro gi joisrael duto mi ne giwacho ni rehoboam niya wuoru nomiyowa ting mapek omiyo koro ngad ting mapek noketo kuomwa eka wanatini nodwokogi niya dhiuru uduog bang ndalo adek mi ne gia ruoth rehoboam noporo wach gi jodongo yandi ngado rieko ni solomon wuon mare ka pod ngima kowachonigi niya nyisauru gima dadwok jogo ne gidwoke niya kiyie bedo mangwon ni jogi kilombogi kendo iwuoyo kodgi maber eka gibiro bedo jotichni ndalo duto rehoboam nodagi rieko jodongo nongadone noporo wach gi yawuowi mbesene ne ni kode kopenjogi niya ere kaka dadwok jogi mosekwaya mondo angad ting mapek wuora noketo kuomgi ne gidwoke niya dwok joma okwayi mondo ingadnigi ting mapek wuoru nomiyogi kiwachonigi kama lith lweta matung duong moloyo nungo wuora wuora ero nomiyou ting mapek abiro medou moloyo wuora nochwadou gi del abiro chwadou gi thomoni chieng mar adek jeroboam kod oganda duto nobiro ir ruoth rehoboam kaka nochikogi mondo gidog ire ruoth nodwokogi kager noweyo rieko mane jodongo ongadone noluwo rieko mbesene kowacho niya wuora nomiyou ting mapek abiro medou moloyo wuora nochwadou gi del abiro chwadou gi thomoni kamano ruoth ne ok odewo ji nyasaye ema nomiyo gigo otimore kamano mondo ochop singruokne mane omiyo ahija jashilo owacho ni jeroboam wuod nebat kane joisrael oneno ni ruoth ok odewogi ne gidwoke niya waonge wat gi daudi ok wan libamba achiel gi wuod jesse wadoguru dala wan joisrael duto un oganda daudi koro rituru mana dhoodu kendu kamano joisrael duto nodok miechgi ruoth rehoboam nooro adoram mane jarit joma ichuno mondo oti gi thwon joisrael duto nogoye gi kite nyaka otho kuom mano ruoth rehoboam noidho geche piyopiyo moringo nyaka jerusalem mondo otony chakre chiengno joisrael osebet ka dagi loch dhood daudi nyaka chil kawuono mak mana joisrael mane odak e dier jojuda kende ema nobet e bwo loch rehoboam weche mag ndalo kane rehoboam ochopo jerusalem nochoko jolweny moyier alufu mia achiel gi piero aboro kuom jojuda gi jobenjamin ne gidhi kedo gi joisrael mondo gidwok loch ni rehoboam wach ruoth nyasaye nobiro ni shemeya ngat nyasaye niya wuo gi rehoboam wuod solomon ruodh juda kod joisrael duto mae juda gi benjamin kiwachonigi ni ruoth nyasaye owacho kama kik udhi uked gi oweteu ngato ka ngato mondo odog dala nikech gima timoreni oa kuoma ne giwinjo wach ruoth nyasaye mi ne ok gidhi kedo gi jeroboam loch rehoboam ogurore motegno rehoboam nodak jerusalem kendo nogero mier mag siro lweny e juda nogero bethlehem etam tekoa bethzur soko adulam gath maresha zif adoraim lakish azeka zora aijalon kod hebron gin miech juda gi benjamin mochiel gi ohinga nochielogi matek ahinya moketoe jotend jolweny kendo okanoe chiemo gi mo kod divai nokano kuodi gi tonge e miergo duto kendo nolosogi motegno ahinya kamano e kaka norito juda gi benjamin jodolo gi jolawi duto nodak kuom joisrael noduogo ir rehoboam ka gia kuonde duto mane gidakie jolawi noweyo lopgi gi mwandugi mi gidhi juda gi jerusalem nikech jeroboam gi yawuote noriembogi e tich dolo mar ruoth nyasaye jeroboam noketo jodolone owuon e hembko mane ni kuonde motingore kendo mondo odol ni kido mochue mag nyiseche manono kod nyiroye noseloso ji moko kuom dhoudi duto mag israel noketo chunygi kuom lamo ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel ne luwo jodolo gi jolawigo kendo ne gidhi jerusalem mondo gitim misango ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach kweregi kamano ne gitego piny juda kendo kuom higni adek ne gimiyo loch rehoboam wuod solomon obedo motegno nimar kuom higni adekgo ne giwuotho e yor daudi gi solomon rehoboam nokendo mahalath nyar jerimoth wuod daudi min mare ne abihail nyar eliab wuod jesse nonywolone yawuowi nyinggi jeush gi shemaria kod zaham bang mahalath rehoboam nokendo maaka nyar abishalom nonywolone abija gi atai gi ziza kod shelomith rehoboam nohero maaka nyar abishalom moloyo monde duto nokendo mon apar gaboro gi nyiri piero auchiel rehoboam noketo abija wuod chiege maaka jatend owetene nimar nodwaro mondo obed ruoth bang thone notiyo gi rieko moketo yawuote moko e mier mochiel gi ohinga e gwenge duto mag juda gi benjamin nopogonigi mwandu mangeny kendo nokendonigi weche mag ndalo shishak ruodh misri omonjo piny juda ruodhi kane loch rehoboam osegurore motegno en kaachiel gi joisrael duto ne giweyo chik ruoth nyasaye emomiyo e higa mar abich mar lochne shishak ruodh misri nomonjo jerusalem gi geche alufu achiel gi mia ariyo kod joidh farese alufu piero auchiel jolibia gi josuk kod jokush nobiro kode koa misri ne ngeny ok kwan nokawo miech juda mochiel gi ohinga nyaka nochopo jerusalem eka shemeya janabi nodhi ir rehoboam gi jodong juda mane oseringo odhi jerusalem nikech biro mar shishak nowachonigi niya ruoth nyasaye owacho kama aweyou e lwet shishak nikech un bende useweya eka ruoth gi jodong israel nobolore kawacho niya ruoth nyasaye ni kare kane ruoth nyasaye oneno ka gibolore kamano nonyiso shemaya niya gisebolore omiyo ok natiekgi abiro resogi bang ndalo manok kendo ok nato mirimba kuom jerusalem gi lwet shishak kata kamano ginibed e bwo lochne mondo ginge ni tiyona opogore gi tiyo ni ruodhi mag pinyni shishak nomonjo jerusalem mokawo mwandu duto mag od ruoth nyasaye gi mag od ruoth bende nokawo kuodi mag dhahabu mane solomon oloso mi ruoth rehoboam noloso kuodi mag mula kar mago momiyo jotend jorit ranga dala ruoth kane ruoth dhi e od ruoth nyasaye jorit ne tingo kuodigo eka bange ne gidwokogi ka od jorit kane rehoboam osebolore kamano mirimb ruoth nyasaye nodok chien mi ne ok otieke bende weche ne dhi maber e juda ruoth rehoboam norito piny kodak jerusalem kendo lochne nomedo gurore ne en jahigni piero angwen gachiel kane odoko ruoth kendo norito piny kuom higni apar gabiriyo kodak jerusalem dala mane ruoth nyasaye oyiero kuom dhout israel duto mondo nyinge obedie min mare ne nyinge naama nyar amon timbe rehoboam ne richo nikech ne ok oketo chunye kuom ruoth nyasaye weche duto mag rehoboam chakruokgi nyaka gikogi ondiki e kitap weche mag ndalo mag shemaya janabi gi kitap iddo janen ne nitie lweny e kind rehoboam gi jeroboam ndalo duto rehoboam notho moyiki kwerene e dala daudi abija wuode nodoko ruoth kare weche mag ndalo loch abija ruodh juda ruodhi e higa mar apar gaboro mar loch jeroboam abija nodoko ruodh juda norito piny kuom higni adek kodak jerusalem min mare ne nyinge mikaya nyar uriel jagibea ne nitie lweny e kind abija gi jeroboam abija nowuok gi oganda jolweny moyier marateke alufu mia angwen kendo jeroboam nochano jolweny moyier marateke alufu mia aboro momanyore kod joabija abija nodhi mochung ewi got zemaraim manie piny gode mag efraim mokok niya winjuru jeroboam gi joisrael duto donge ungeyo ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel nomiyo daudi gi nyikwaye loch israel nyaka chieng kotimo kodgi singruok ok kethre kata obedo kamano jeroboam wuod nebat jatich solomon wuod daudi nopiem gi ruodhe kendo jomahundu manono noriwore kode mokwedo rehoboam wuod solomon ka ne pod en rawera chunye yom kendo ok nyal sirogi koro uparo ni unyalo dagi loch ruoth nyasaye nomiyo nyikwa daudi mana nikech ungeny kendo un gi nyiroye mag dhahabu mane jeroboam omiyou mondo obed nyisecheu donge useriembo jodolo mag ruoth nyasaye nyikwa harun kod jolawi muketo jodolou kaka jopinje mamoko timo ngato angata mobiro koyiedhore gi nyarwath kata gi imbe abiriyo nyalo doko jadolo ni gik ok nyasaye wan ruoth nyasaye e nyasachwa kendo ok waseweye wan gi jodolo nyikwa harun kod jolawi konyogi giwango ni ruoth nyasaye misengni kod ubani mangwe ngar okinyi godhiambo kendo giketo makati e nyime e mesa mar dhahabu maler kendo girito si taya gi techene mondo oliel otieno kotieno kamano waritoo chik ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa un useweye neuru kaka nyasaye ni kodwa kotelonwa neuru kaka jodolone tingo tungegi mag lweny gibiro goyo mondo warad kodu un joisrael kik uked gii ruoth nyasaye nyasach kwereu nimar ok unyal loye jeroboam nosepando jolweny moko mondo opo jojuda gi yo ka ngegi kamano ogandane mar jolweny ne nie nyim jojuda joma opondo ne ni kange gi kane jojuda ongicho ne gipo ka gineno jolweny koni gi koni mi giywak ni ruoth nyasaye kendo jodolo nogoyo tung eka jojuda nogiyo kendo kane gigiyo kamano nyasaye nokeyo jeroboam kod joisrael duto e nyim abija gi jojuda joisrael noringo jojuda mi nyasaye nochiwogi e lwet jojuda abija kod joge ne onegogi malich ahinya mi joisrael marateke moyier alufu mia abich notho kamano ne olo joisrael chiengno jojuda ne olocho nimar ne gigeno kuom ruoth nyasaye nyasach kweregi abija nolawo jeroboam mokawo mieche moko kaka bethel gi jeshana gi efron kod mier mokiewo kodgi loch jeroboam ne ok ochako obedo motegno kendo e ndalo mag abija bange ruoth nyasaye nochwade motho loch abija nomedo gurore motegno nokendo mon apar gangwen monywolo yawuowi piero ariyo gariyo gi nyiri apar gauchiel koro weche moko mag abija gi timbene duto ondiki e kitap iddo janabi weche mag ndalo loch asa ruodh juda ruodhi abija notho moyiki kwerene e dala daudi asa wuode nodoko ruoth kare piny nokue higni apar ndalo lochne timbe asa ne beyo kendo longo e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasache nogolo kuonde liswa mag nyiseche mag jopinje mamoko noketho hembko mane ni kuonde motingore kendo omuko sirni milamo mag kite gi mag yien nojiwo jojuda mondo oluw ruoth nyasaye nyasach kwerene ka gimako buchene gi chikene noketho hembko duto mane ni kuonde motingore gi kende mag ubani e miech juda duto mi piny nokue e ndalo lochne noyudo thuolo mar chielo miech juda gi ohinga nimar piny nokue lweny ne onge e ndalone nikech nyasaye nomiye kue asa nowacho ni jojuda niya wageruru miechwagi kendo wachielgi gi ohinga man gi kuonde maboyo mag ngicho mi wketnigi rangeye miloro motegno gi lodi piny pod marwa nimar waseluwo ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa mi osemiyowa kue kuonde duto omiyo ne gigedo kendo gidhi nyime maber asa ne nigi jolweny jojuda alufu mia adek motingo kuodi gi tong kod jojuda alufu mia ariyo gi piero aboro motingo okumbni gi atunge jogi duto ne thuondi mager zera jakush nomonjogi kod jolweny tara achiel kod geche lweny mia adek mochopo nyaka maresha asa nodhi mondo oked kode mi ne gichanore ni lweny e paw zefatha maresha asa noywak ni ruoth nyasaye nyasache niya ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa konywa nikech wageno kuomi kendo wabiro rado gi ogandani mana e nyingi ruoth nyasaye e nyasachwa kik dhano adhana loyi eka ruoth nyasaye nomiyo asa gi jojuda oloyo jokush mi jokush noringo ne gilawogi nyaka gera ka ginegogi oyokre nimar ruoth nyasaye gi jolwenje ema notiekogi mi jojuda noyako gik mangeny ahinya ne giketho mier duto mokiewo gi gera nikech luoro moa kuom ruoth nyasaye nomako pinyno ne giyako miego duto nimar ne nitie mwandu mangeny noyudo jogo oseyako ne gituro kuonde dhok kendo ne gipeyo rombe gi ngamia mathoth eka ne gidok jerusalem weche mag ndalo asa oloso piny juda ruodhi roho mar nyasaye nobiro kuom azaria wuod oded modhi romo gi asa nowacho ni asa gi jojuda kod jobenjamin niya ruoth nyasaye ni kodu mana ka pod un kode kudware unuyude kuweye en bende noweu kuom higni mathoth israel nobedo maonge gi jodolo puonjogi kendo onge gi chik ka ginie thagruok ginidog ir ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi kendo ginidware mi giniyude e ndalogo kue nobed maonge ni ngato e yorene duto nimar chandruok maduong nobi kuom ji duto modak e pinyni ginitiekre kendgi ka libamba kedo gi libamba kendo dala kedo gi dala nimar nyasaye nomigi thagruok mangeny un timuru chir lwetu kik jony nimar nochulu kuom tichu kane asa owinjo weche mane azaria wuod oded okorone notimo chir mogolo nyiseche mokwer e piny juda gi benjamin duto kod mier duto nokawo e piny gode mag efraim noloso kendomarmisango mar ruoth nyasaye mane nie nyim agoch od ruoth nyasaye nochoko jojuda gi jobenjamin duto gi jodak joefraim gi manase kod simeon nimar ji mangeny noseweyo israel mobiro ire ka gineno ni ruoth nyasaye nyasache ni kode ne gichokore jerusalem e due mar adek mar higa mar apar gabich mar loch asa chiengno ne gitimo ni ruoth nyasaye misengni gi dhok mia abiriyo mane gigolo kuom gik mane gipeyo ne gisingore mondo giluw ruoth nyasaye nyasach kweregi gi chunygi duto kendo mondo oneg ngato angata matin kata maduong dichwo kata madhako ok dwar luwo ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel ne gitimo singruok ni ruoth nyasaye gi dwol madwong ka gikok kendo ka gigoyo tung gi oporo jojuda duto ne mor nikech singruokno nimar ne gisingore gi chunygi duto ne gidwaro ruoth nyasaye gi siso maduong mi ne giyude kendo nomiyogi kue kuonde duto bende asa nogolo maaka min mare e duongne mar bedo min ruoth nikech noloso kido makuero maket gi nyasaye dhako miluongo ni ashera asa nomuko gima ketno mongade matindotindo kendo nowange e dho aora kidron ne ok oketho hembko mane ni kuonde motingore e piny israel kata kamano chunye nodimbore e nyim nyasaye ndalone duto nokawo fedha gi dhahabu kod gik lemo mi oketo e od nyasaye moko ne gin gik mane wuon mare ochiwo ni nyasaye moko en ema nochiwo asa otimo winjruok gi benhadad ruodh aram ruodhi ne onge lweny nyaka higa mar piero adek gabich mar loch asa weche mag ndalo e higa mar piero adek gauchiel mar lochne baasha ruodh israel nodhi momonjo jojuda kendoo nochielo rama gi ohinga moketoe jolweny mondo ogeng ni ji duto dhi ka asa ruodh juda kata maa kuno eka asa nokawo fedha gi dhahabu kuom mwandu mag od ruoth nyasaye kod mag ode owuon noorogi ni benhadad ruodh aram nodak damaski gi wach niya winjruok mondo obed e kindwa kodi kaka winjruok mane nie kind wuora gi wuoru ero aoroni fedha gi dhahabu yie iketh winjruok mane kindu gi baasha ruodh israel mondo owe kedo koda benhadad noyie kwayo mar ruoth asa mi nooro jotend jolweny mondo omonj miech joisrael noketho ijon gi dan gi abelmaim kod miech keno duto mag naftali kane baasha owinjo gima otimore noweyo gero ohinga mar rama mi tijno nochung eka ruoth asa nodhi gi jojuda duto mi gigolo kite gi yien duto mane baasha gerogo ohinga mar rama mi nochielogo geba gi mizpa e ndalogo hanani janen nobiro ir asa ruodh juda mowachone niya jolweny mag ruodh aram biro tony e lweti nikech nigeno kuom joaram ne ok igeno kuom ruoth nyasaye nyasachi donge jokush gi jolibia ne gin oganda maduong man gi geche gi joidh farese mangeny ahinya ruoth nyasaye nochiwogi e lweti nimar nigeno kuome nikech wang ruoth nyasaye ngiyo piny duto koni gi koni mondo onyis tekone mokonyogo joma chunygi odimbore e nyime nitimo gima ofuwo kuom wachni omiyo chakre kawuono ibiro bedo gi lwenje wachnoo nomiyo asa okecho gi janen mi otueye gi nyororo e od tuech bende asa nochako sando jomoko e ndalogo chakruok weche asa nyaka gikogi ondiki e kitap ruodhi mag juda gi mag israel kane asa osebedo ruoth kuom higni piero adek gochiko tuo nomako tiendene tuoneno nomedore ahinya kata kamano ne ok okwayo ruoth nyasaye mondo okonye nodhi mana kuom ajuoke asa notho higa mar piero angwen gachiel mar lochne moluwo kwerene noyike e liende nokunyo e dala daudi ne gikete e ngango mopong gi gik mangue ngar mane joma olony e tijno oseloso kendo ne giloso mach mangongo ahinya ka gimiyego duong weche mag ndalo loch jehoshafat ogurore motegno jehoshafat nodoko ruoth kar asa wuon mare noikore mondo osir israel omiyo noketo jolweny e miech juda duto mochiel gi ohinga kendo noketo jotendgi e piny juda kod e miech efraim duto mane asa wuon mare osekawo ruoth nyasaye ne konyo jehoshafat nimar jehoshafat noluwo timbe mokwongo mag wuon mare ka ok oluwo baal nogeno nyasach wuon mare komako buchene mak oluwo timbe joisrael emomiyo ruoth nyasaye nomiyo lochne obedo motegno kendo jojuda duto nokelone mich mi nobedo gi mwandu mangeny kod huma maduong chunye nojiwore e yor ruoth nyasaye bende noketho hembko mane ni kuonde motingore kaachiel gi sirni milamo mane nie piny juda e higa mar adek mar lochne nooro banhail gi obadia gi zekaria gi nethaneel kod mikaya jodonge mondo odhi opuonj e miech juda bende nooro shemai gi nethania gi zebadia gi asahel gi shemiramoth gi jehonathan gi adonija gi tobija kod tobadonija jolawi kaachiel gi elishama gi jehoram jodolo ne giwuotho e miech juda duto gi kitap chike mag ruoth nyasaye ka gipuonjogo ji luoro moa kuom ruoth nyasaye nomako ruodhi mag pinje mokiewo gi juda mi ne ok gikedo gi jehoshafat jofilistia moko ne kelo ni jehoshafat mich kaachiel gi fedha gichulogo osuru joarabu bende nokelone imbe alufu abiriyo gi mia abiriyo kod nyuogi alufu abiriyo teko jehoshafat ne medore ameda nogero mier mochiel gi ohinga gi mier mag keno e juda nokano gilweny e miego kendo ne en gi jolweny marateke jerusalem e kar rombgi kaluwore gi dhoutgi jatend jolweny mar dhood juda ne en adna mane nigi jolweny marateke alufu mia adek jalupne ne en jehohanan mane nigi ji alufu mia ariyo gi piero aboro kendo jatelo mar adek ne en amasia wuod zikri nochiwore ni tich ruoth nyasaye en ne en gi jolweny marateke alufu mia ariyo jatend jolweny mar dhood benjamin ne en eliada thwon mager ne en gi ji alufu mia ariyo motingo atung gi okumbini jalupne ne en jehozabad mane nigi jolweny alufu mia achiel gii piero aboro moikore ni lweny mano e kar romb joma ne nie tich ruoth ka ok okwan jogo mane ruoth oketo e miech juda duto mochiel gi ohinga weche mag ndalo mikaya okoro ni ibiro loyo ahab kod jehoshafat ruodhi jehoshafat koro ne nigi mwandu mangeny kod huma maduong ahinya nomiyo jodhoodgi okendore gi jodhood ahab mondo okelgo winjruok bang higni moko nodhi samaria limo ahab mi ahab noyangone rombe gi ruedhi mogundho mondo ocham gi joma nowuotho kohoye mondo owuoth gi joramothgilead nopenjo jehoshafat niya iyie dhi kodwa ramothgilead nodwoke niya ayie joga e jogi wabiro dhi kodi e lweny eka jehoshafat nowacho ni ruodh israel niya mokwongo onego wapenj ruoth nyasaye wach omiyo ruodh joisrael nochoko jonabi mia angwen mopenjogi niya wadhi waked gi joramothgilead koso wawe ne gidwoke niya dhiyo nikech nyasaye biro miyi dalano jehoshafat nopenje niya janabi moro mar ruoth nyasaye onge ka koso dwapenj wach ruodh israel nodwoke ni ee ngat achiel pod odong dipenjnwa ruoth nyasaye wach en mikaya wuod imla asin kode nikech ok okor gik mabeyo kuoma okoro mana gik maricho jehoshafat nowachone niya kik iwuo kamano eka ruodh israel noluongo jatichne moro mowachone niya dhi piyo iluong mikaya wuod imla koro noyudo ka ruodh israel gi jehoshafat ruodh juda obet e alap manie dhoranga samaria ka ngato ka ngato obet e kom duongne korwako lawe mar ruoth kendo jonabi duto ne koro wach e nyimgi zedekia wuod kenaana nosethedho tunge mag nyinyo morwako mi nowacho niya ruoth nyasaye owacho kama ibiro chwowo joaram gi tungegi jonabi duto bende nokoro wach machal kamano ka giwacho niya dhiyo ramothgilead mondo ilo ruoth nyasaye biro chiwe e lweti jaote mane odhi luongo mikaya nowachone niya jonabi duto osekoro wach nyalhodia ka giwacho ni gima ber biro timore ni ruoth bende yie ikor wach maber kaka gisekorono mikaya nodwoke niya akuongora gi nying ruoth nyasaye ni gima nyasaye owachona ema abiro wacho kane mikaya ochopo e nyim ruoth ruoth nopenje ni wadhi waked gi joramothgilead koso wawe nodwoko niya dhi mondo ilo ruoth nyasaye biro chiwogi e lweti ruoth nowachone ni asesiemi nyadidi ni kik iwach miriambo mak mana adiera kende e nying ruoth nyasaye mikaya nowacho niya naneno joisrael duto koke e gode ka rombe maonge jakwath kendo nawinjo ka ruoth nyasaye wacho niya jogi onge gi wuongi mondo gidog e miechgi gi kue ruodh israel nowacho ni jehoshafat niya donge nawachoni ni jali ok dikorna wach maber mana marach mikaya nowacho niya koro winj wach ruoth nyasaye naneno ruoth nyasaye kobet e kom duongne kendo oganda polo duto kochung e bathe koni gi koni ruoth nyasaye nopenjogi niya ere ngama diho ahab ruodh israel odhi ramothgilead mondo otho kuno roho ka roho nochiwo parone nyaka roho moro nosudo mochung e nyim ruoth nyasaye kawacho niya ema abiro hoye ruoth nyasaye nopenje ni ere kaka ibiro hoye nodwoke ni abiro dhi bet roho mar miriambo e dho jonabine duto ruoth nyasaye noyiene ni ee ema ibiro hoye dhiyo itim kamano koro sani ruoth nyasaye oseketo roho mar miriambo e dho jonabini duto kata kamano ruoth nyasaye osengadoni buch masira eka zedekia wuod kenaana nosudo machiegni mothalo lemb mikaya kopenje niya ere kaka roho mar ruoth nyasaye ne nyalo kuoma mondo owuo kodi mikaya nodwoke niya chieng inidonji e ot maiye mondo ipondie eka ninge ruodh israel nowacho ni makuru mikaya uter ir amon jaduong samaria kod joash wuod ruoth mondo jorite wachnigiuru niya ruoth owacho ni mondo uket ngatni e od tuech kendo umiye mana kuon abanga gi pi kende nyaka aduog kangima mikaya nowacho niya kiduogo kingima kara ok asewuoyo gi dho ruoth nyasaye kamano ruodh israel gi jehoshafat ruodh juda nodhi ramothgilead ruodh israel nowcho ni jehoshafat niya kwadhi e lweny abiro rwako lewni moko mondo kik ji ngeya rwak lepi mag ruoth kamano ruodh israel noloko kite kendo ne gidhi e lweny ruodh aram nosechiko jodong lweny jotend gechene ni kik giked gi ngat moro amora mak mana ruodh israel kende kane jotend geche oneno jehoshafat ne giwacho niya jal cha e ruodh israel ne gilokore ire mondo giked kode jehoshafat nogiyo mi ruoth nyasaye nokonye nyasaye nogologi kuome nimar kane jotend geche oneno ni ok en ruodh israel ne giweyo lawe ngat moro nodiro asere morodhno gi kor ruodh israel e kind chumbe mag lweny norwako mi ruoth nowacho ni jariemb gache niya wichri igola e lweny nikech ahinyora malit lweny nomedore chiengno mi ruodh israel noyiengore e gache kochomo jo aram nyaka odhiambo mi notho ka chieng podho weche mag ndalo janabi jehu okwero jehoshafat jehoshafat ruodh juda nodok dalane jerusalem kongima jehu wuod hanani janen nodhi romone mopenje niya bende itimo maber kikonyo joricho kendo ihero joma ok ohero ruoth nyasaye mirima osemako ruoth nyasaye kodi nikech wachni kata kamano kamoro bende iber nimar nigolo sirni milamo e piny kendo iketo chunyi kuom luwo nyasaye jehoshafat oketo jongad bura jehoshafat nodak jerusalem nochako owuok kolimo joge chakre beersheba nyaka piny gode mag efraim modwokogi ir ruoth nyasaye nyasach kweregi noketo jongad bura e miech juda duto mochiel gi ohinga kendo nowachonigi niya paruru gima utimo nimar ok ungad bura e nying dhano ungado e nying ruoth nyasaye nikech ok en kodu kungado bura emomiyo tiuru kuluoro ruoth nyasaye ritreuru kuom gima utimo nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa ok oyie gi ngado buch amwor kata buch nyakonchiel kata chamo asoya bende jehoshafat noketo jolawi gi jodolo moko kod jodong dhout israel e jerusalem mondo ongad bura e nying ruoth nyasaye kendo otheg buche milaruokie od bura ne ni jerusalem jehoshafat nochikogi kama unuti tijeu gi adiera kendo gi chunyu duto kuluoro ruoth nyasaye kamano ka joweteu modak e mier mamoko okelo wach moro e nyimu bed ni en wach nek kata wach ketho chik nyasaye kata buch piny kata buch dini kata chik
