osetimoreni biro siko nyaka karango nyasaye wasikwa biro jarowa kuom kinde marom nadi koso gibiro yanyo nyingi nyaka chieng ere gima omiyo itamori konyowa koso ango momiyo ingwonyonwa lweti nyasaye isebedo ruodhwa nyaka nene kendo isebedo kilocho e piny ngima wuok ne ipogo nam gi tekoni mangongo mi itoyo wiye mag ondiegi nam ayub zab isa adier ne itoyo wiye mag levayathan mi imiyo joma odak e thim ringre mondo ocham nimiyo sokni gi aore omol kendo ema nimiyo aore ok duon oduono ema ne ichueyo odiechieng gi otieno mi iketo wangchieng gi due karegi niketo tong mag piny oro gi chwiri bende ema niketo par ineye nyasaye kaka wasiki mofuwo jari kik ijwang jogi moheri e lwet wasikgi makwiny kendo kik wiyi wil gi jotichni misando par singruok mane itimo kodwa kuonde duto motimo mudho e piny opong gi timbe mahundu kik iwe lo joma ithiro joma odhier kendo jochan mondo opaki nyasaye malo mondo ihul wachni iwuon kiparo kaka joma kiayi jari pile odiechieng duto wiyi kik wil gi koko mar mirima wasiki goyo sa ka sa zaburi nyasaye kumo joricho otingo joma kare malo wagoyoni erokamano nyasaye ee wagoyoni erokamano wahulo kaka iduong kendo walando gik madongo misetimo nyasaye wacho niya ka kinde aseketo mondo ongadie bura ochopo abiro ngado bura kata obedo ni piny oyiengni mi ji duto modakie kihondko omako ema nagur mise mage motegno akwero josunga niya weuru sungoru joricho bende akwero ni owe kawore ee awachonigi giduto mondo giwe timbegi mag sunga gi mag tok teko teko mar ngado bura ok wuog yo wuok chieng kata yo podho chieng bende ok owuog yo nyandwat kata yo milambo nyasaye e jangad bura odwoko ji moko piny moko otingo malo ruoth nyasaye otingo kikombe mar divai mochiek makech e lwete kendo ogamo ni ji mondo omadhi joricho duto onego madhe pep koda ka duche abiro pako nyasach jakobo ee abiro pake gi wer nyaka chieng enotiek teko joricho teko mar joma kare nomedre ameda zaburi nyasaye wuon loch kendo jangad bura nyasaye rahuma e piny juda kendo nyinge duong e piny israel jerusalem e dalane ee odak e got sayun kanyo ema ne oturoe aserni gi okumbni kod ligengni mag wasigu nyasaye mano kaka nyingi duong mano kaka iwuotho motegno ka iduogo ia e gode kuma ne iloyoe wasiki jolweny jochir osedendi kendo koro ginindo mana nindo mar tho onge kata ngat achiel modong dikonyre gi gigi mag lweny kane ibwogogi yaye nyasach jakobo farese gi joithgi nogore piny mi parogi olal ruoth ilich manade ere gima dichung e nyimi ka ikecho ne imiyo bura mingado ongere gie polo piny nobedo moluor kendo oling thi kane ichung mondo ingad bura kendo mondo ire ji duto ithiro e piny ka kata mana mirimb dhano keloni pak kendo jogo motony e lweny nopaki e sewni gitimoni miuru ruoth nyasaye nyasachu gima ne usingoru ni unumiye kendo un ogendini duto modak machiegni keluru mich ni ngama ji duto oluoro en ema omiyo jodongo bolore kendo obwogo ruodhi madongo zaburi teko miyudo kuom paro timbe nyasaye machon madongo aywak ni nyasaye matek ee aywak matek kendo owinja e kinde mane anie chandruok ne alamo ruoth otieno duto ne atingo bedena malo ka alemo chunya ne ok nyal yudo kue kane aparo nyasaye ne ahum nono kendo kata kane aparo matut chunya nyosore anyosa nyasaye ne ok anindi kendo ne aparora ok anyal wuoyo ne aparo ndalo mosekadho higni machon bende ne aparo otieno duto nasiko ka aparo mana kamano ne aparo matut kapenjora niya ruoth biro dagiwa nyaka chieng koso bende nochak ohera kendo en adieri ni ngwonone orumo chutho koso singruok mare ti oweyo wi nyasaye osewil gi bedo mangwon koso koso mirima osemiyo oweyo kecho ji kane aseparo mago duto ne awacho niya gima litna moloyo en ni nyasaye koro onge gi teko ruoth nyasaye anahul timbeni madongo adier anapar honni mane itimo e kinde mokadho anapar gik moko duto isetimo ee anapar timbenigo matut gik moko duto mitimo ler yaye nyasaye onge nyasaye moro maduong ka e nyasaye matimo honni ne inyiso tekoni maduong e kind ogendini kane ireso jogi nyikwa jakobo kod nyikwa josef nyasaye kane pige oneni ne gidoko maluor kendo kude mag nam nowalo boche polo nokelo koth maduong kendo polo noriadore ka mil koni gi koni adier polo noriadore malich e yamb kalausi mi omenyo piny duto piny bende notetni kendo oyiengni nyasaye niwuotho kingado nam matut ger tiendi ne ok nyal ne ne itayo jogi ka jokwath ka gin e lwet musa gi harun zaburi hera nyasaye oherogo joma ok ohere un joga chikuru itu ni puonjna mondo uwinj gima awacho math abiro wuoyo kodu gi ngero ka anyisou tiend midhierni mane otimore chon gin gik wasewinjo wangeyo kendo mane kwerewa ohulonwa ok wanapandgi ni nyithindwa wananyis tieng mabiro teko nyasaye gi timbene madongo kod gik malich miwuoro osetimo nyasaye nomiyo joisrael nyikwa jakobo chikene gi buchene mane ochiko kwerewa mondo opuonj nyithindgi kendo nyithindgigo opuonj tieng mabiro mondo nyikwagi bende opuonjre wechego kamano joma birogo noket genogi kuom nyasaye kendo wigi ok nowil gi gima ne osetimo pile ginirit chikene ok onego gichal gi kweregi mane wigi tek kendo mane odagi luoro nyasaye ne gin joma chunygi yomyom kendo ok ogeno kuom nyasaye joefraim mane kedo gi atung kod asere ne oringo lweny ne ok girito singruok mane gisetimo gi nyasaye kamano ne gitamore rito chikene wigi ne owil gi gik mane osetimo kaachiel gi honni mane osetimo wuok nyasaye notimo honni e thim mar zoan e piny misri mana ka kweregi neno wuok ne obaro nam mi otelonigi nyaka gikadho ka pi ogingore ka ohinga koni koni wuok e kinde mag odiechieng ne otelonigi gi mach maliel ne obaro lwendni e thim mi omiyogi pi mathoth ka pi nam wuok kwan ne omiyo sokni owuok e lwanda mi pi omol ka aora kata kamano pod ne gisiko mana ka gitimo richo e nyime kendo ne gipiem e thim gi ngama duong moloyo wuok kwan ne gitemo nyasaye marayiem ka gikwaye chiemo mondo gineggo kech ne giwuoyo kuome marach ka gipenjore niya bende nyasaye nyalo miyowa chiemo e thim ka adier chutho nogoyo lwanda mi pi obubnie molokore aore koro kuon gi ringo bende domiwa kane ruoth nyasaye owinjo kamano nokecho gi nyikwa jakabo mi omonjogi gi mach adier mirima mager nomake gi joisrael nikech ne ok giyie kuome kendo ne ok gigeno ni doresgi kata kamano nogolo chik mondo dhout polo oyawre joh eka nomiyo manna en chiemo moa e polo ochuenigi ka koth mondo gicham kamano nyasaye nomiyogi chiemb malaika mi gichamo nyaka giyieng bange tekone nomiyo yamb ugue gi yamb milambo okudho moorogi winy mangeny ka kuoyo manie dhonam mi gibedo gi ringo mogundho ka lowo winjgo ne olwar e dier kambi kuonde duto hembe nitie kuom mano ji nochiemo moyieng nikech nyasaye nomiyogi gima ne gigombo kata kamano wuochegi ne ok orumo omiyo kane pod gichiemo nyasaye nokecho kodgi ahinya monego jogi marateke yawuot israel mabeyoe moloyo kata obedo ni ne otimonigi honni madongo kamano ji pod ne osiko timo mana richo kendo ne ok ginyal yie kuom nyasaye mano omiyo nyasaye nongado ndalogi machiek kokelonigi masiche apoya kane ochako negogi joma odong nolokore odok ire kendo olame matek ne gifwenyo ni kara nyasaye maduong moloyo e lwandagi kendo jawargi kata kamano ne giwuonde ka giwachone mana weche mag miriambo joote ne ok giketo chunygi kuome bende ne giweyo singruok mane gisetimo kode en nokechogi mongwononigi kuom richogi mi ok otiekogi kinde mathoth ne omwonyo mirimbe nikech ne ok odwar kecho kodgi ne ongeyo ni ne gin mana ji matho machalo yamo makudho kendo kadho ne gipiem kode e thim ndalo mangeny kendo ne gimiye mirima ndalo mathoth adier ne gitemo nyasaye kinde mangeny nyaka ne gimiyo ngama ler mar israel okecho wigi ne owil gi tekone maduong bende ne ok giparo chieng mane oseresogie kuom wasikgi kendo kaka notimo timbe madongo kod honni e thim zoan e piny misri wuok ne oloko aore remo omiyo jomisri ne ok nyal modho e aorego wuok wuok ne ooro lwangni kuomgi mokayogi ogwende bende nokelo moketho pinygi wuok ne ooro kungu mondo ocham chambgi dede bende nooro mondo oketh puothegi wuok noketho mzabibu maggi gi pe kendo notieko ngopegi gi koyo mangich thi ne onego dhogi gi pe kendo rombe gi diek bende nomiyo polo onego notoyo kuomgi mirimbe mager kokecho ahinya ka ooro malaika maketho gik moko ne ok ogengo mirimbe kendo kata mana weyo ngima jomisrigo ne ok oweyo nonegogi anega gi tuo malich wuok adier nonego nyithindo machwo makayo mag misri duto yawuowi mabeyoe moloyo nyikwa ham wuok joge owuon nogolo oko e piny misri mi otelonigi e thim kaka jakwath telo ni jambe wuok notelonigi maber maonge masira wasikgi nam noimo wuok josh nokelogi e pinye maler kendo e gode mane oseloyo mokawo josh noriembo joma ne odak e pinyno mondo oyaw ni joge thuolo eka ne opoge ni dhout israel mi omiyo gidak e miechgi bura pod ne gipiem apiema gi nyasaye maduong moloyo mi giteme ne gitamore rito chikene mi giweye kendo gindhoge mana kaka kweregi notimo ne gibaro mi giweyo yo mana ka asere modir gi tung mobam ok dimb gima onego ochiel ne giwango iye ka gilemo e hembko man kuonde motingore kendo ne gimiyo nyiego omake ka gilamo kido mag nyiseche manono kane nyasaye oneno kamano nokecho mi odagi joisrael chuth josh jer ne odar moweyo hembe man shilo kama ne osebet kodakie gi ji sam ne oyie ni wasigu mondo okaw sandug muma kama tekone gi duongne maler nitie ne okecho gi joge owuon mi oweyo wasikgi onegogi yawuotgi ne onegi e lweny omiyo ne onge joma kend nyigi jonabi ne onegi gi ligangla kendo mondgi ne ok nyal ywagogi achien ruoth nyasaye ne ochiew ka ngama oa e nindo ne ochalo ngat maratego kongo oilo ne oloyo wasike mi omiyogi wichkuot mosiko ne odagi nyikwa josef joka efraim bende ne ok oyiero ne oyiero mana joka juda kod got sayun ohero ne ogero hekalu mare kanyo machal gi dalane e polo kendo ne ogurore motegno mana ka piny mosiko nyaka chieng sam sam wnda nyasaye noyiero daudi jatichne ka ogole e tich kwayo rombe ne okete ruodh joisrael nyikwa jakobo mondo obed jakwadh joge owuon daudi noritogi gi chunye duto kendo notelonigi gi rieko zaburi lemo mikwayogo nyasaye mondo okech joge ruo wnda jer nyasaye ogendini ok ongeyi osedonjo e piny jogi iwuon gisemiyo hekalu mari maler obedo mogak mi giketho jerusalem chuth giseweyo ringre jogi ni winy gi ondiegi mondo ocham ne ginego jogi mi remo nomol ka pi e jerusalem duto kendo ne onge ngama nyalo yikogi ogendini mokiewo kodwa goyonwa siboi ka nyierowa kendo jarowa nyasaye ibiro kecho kodwa nyaka karango koso mirimbi biro siko ka liel ka mach nyaka chieng ol mirimbi kuom ogendini ok oyie kuomi ee kech gi jogo ok lami gisenegowa wan nyikwa jakobo kendo giseketho pinywa kik ikumwa kuom richo mag kwerewa koro yie ikechwa piyo nikech osejwangwa ni pangla nyasaye jawarwa kechwa mondo nyingi oyud duong ere gima omiyo ogendini ok oyie kuomi onego openjwa niya nyasachu nogo ni kanye nyasaye wadwaro mondo ikum ogendinigo mana e wangwa kwaneno nikech ne gichuero remb jotichni chik iti mondo iwinj ywak joma otue kendo tekoni maduong mondo omi ogony joma ongadnigi buch tho ruoth chul kuor ni ogendini mamokogo nyadibiriyo kuom achaya gichayigo wan jogi wan rombe mag kwedhi wanagoni erokamano nyaka chieng kendo wanahul duongni ni tienge duto mabiro zaburi lemo mikwayogo nyasaye mondo okony joisrael wuok jakwadh israel winjwa itelo ni nyikwa josef ka ngama telo ni jambe rienynwa mibet e kerubi kaka ruoth mabet e kom duongne kony dhout efraim gi benjamin kod manase gi tekoni kendo bi mondo ireswa nyasaye duogwa iri kendo rienynwa mondo wayud resruok ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ibiro sin gi lemo mar jogi nyaka karango isemiyowa pi wang mondo obed chiembwa adier isemiyowa agwata maduong pi wang opongo mondo wamodhi iseweyo jopinje mokiewo kodwa yakowa kendo wasikwa nyierowa anyiera nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto duogwa iri kendo rienynwa mondo wayud resruok ne igolo yadh mzabibu e piny misri mi iriembo ogendini moko e pinygi eka ipidhee kendo ne ibetone kama onego odongie tiendene ne odonjo matut e lowo kendo bedene noyarore mokwako pinyno tipone ne oimo gode kod yiend sida madongodongo bedene konchiel ne oyarore mochopo nam mediterenia bedene komachielo nochopo e aora yufrate koro ere gima omiyo isemuko chiel molwore ngato angata makadho tinde nyalo pono olembene mbithe bende kethe kendo le maa e thim chame nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto duog irwa rangwa gie polo kendo bi mondo ireswa wan yadhi mar mzabibu ee bi ire mzabibu iwuon ema ne ipidho adier kony mzabibu pod yot mane imiyo odongo maber mondo obed mari iwuon wasikwa osetonge momoko kuome mach ranggi gi gero kendo tiekgi ngama iseyiero onego oriti ee rit wuod dhano isemiyo teko mondo otini ok wanachak waweyi kendo konywa wabed mangima mondo wapaki ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto duogwa iri kendo rienynwa mondo wayud resruok zaburi hera mar nyasaye kod wich teko mar joisrael koguru gi mor ni nyasaye jaritwa adier pakuru nyasach jakobo gi wer chakuru goyo thum gi nyidwonge gouru nyatiti kod orutu mamit kwan gouru tung ka due opor kendo ka due otegno kunyisogo ni gin ndalo mag nyasi mano e chik israel mane nyasach jakobo ogolo ne ogolo chikno ni joisrael kane omonjo piny misri awinjo dwol ok angeyo ka wacho niya ne agolo ting mapek e goku mi ne amiyo ubolo odheche mane utiyogo piny wuok kwan kane un e thagruok ne uluonga mi akonyou ne adwokou gie boche polo mapondoe kendo ne amiyou tem e sokni mag meriba un joga winjuru siem asiemougo mano kaka agombo ni mondo uchikna itu un joisrael wuok tchik kik uti ni nyiseche mamoko bende kik ulam nyasaye moro mak mana e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mane ogolou e piny misri ngamuru dhou malach mondo apidhu joga ne ok nyal winjo wachna adier joisrael ne odagi mako chikna kuom mano ne aweyogi mondo gidhi ka wigii tek kamano mondo gitim mana gik gin giwegi ema gidwaro mano kaka agombo ni mondo joga owinja ee mad joisrael luw yorena ka gitimo kamano dalonigi wasikgi piyopiyo mi akum joma sandogi jogo mamon koda dikulre e nyima ka luoro omako kendo digiyud kum mochwere damiu mogo mayomie moloyo obed chiembu kaachiel gi mor kich mothodhi e lwanda mondo ucham nyaka uyieng zaburi wer mikwerogo jongad buch amwor nyasaye e jakom e buch polo kendo oyalo kata mana nyiseche mamoko owachonigi niya nyaka uwe ngado buch amwor bende nyaka uwe chwako joma richo ngaduru bura kare ni joma odhier kod nyithi kiye kendo konyuru jochan gi joma ok nyal konyore kendgi ee resgiuru e lwet joma timbegi richo mano kaka umemoru kendo mano kaka ufuwo uwuotho mana e mudho kendo adiera manie piny oselal joh ne awachonu ni un nyiseche kendo un duto un yawuot ngama duong moloyo ubiro tho mana kaka ji duto tho kendo ngimau norum mana ka ngima ruoth moro amora nyasaye bi mondo irit piny gi adiera nimar ogendini duto gin magi zaburi lemo mar loyo wasik joisrael nyasaye kik iling alinga ok itimo gimoro neye kaka wasiki goyo koko ka piem kodi kendo kaka joma mon kodi nganyoni gitimo cheno maling ling mondo gihiny jogi adier gidwaro hinyo joma ikawo ka mwanduni giwacho niya watiekuru ogandagi mondo wich owil gi israel chuth giwinjore e weche giwacho kendo giriworeni giduto gin joedom gi joishmael gi jomoab gi johagri kaachiel gi jogebal gi joamon gi joamalek gi jofilistia kod joturo joasuria bende josetimo kodgi winjruok mondo okony nyikwa lut bura bura nyasaye timnigi kaka ne itimo ni jomidian kendo kaka ne itimo ni sisera gi jabin e aora kishon ne oneggi endor mi ringregi odong katop kuno bura bura tim ni jotendgi mag lweny kaka ne itimo ni oreb gi zeeb kendo lo ruodhgi duto kaka niloyo zeba gi zalmuna mane jowacho niya wabiro kawo piny nyasaye mondo odok marwa nyasacha kegi ee kegi mana ka mihudhi yamo tero kaka mach wango bungu kata kaka ligek mach kakni e gode e kaka mondo iriembgi gi kalausi kendo mondo ibwoggi gi kalausi mager ruoth nyasaye migi wichkuot maduong nyaka chop gidwog iri mad logi kendo kihondko makgi nyaka chieng mi githo gi wichkuot maduong kamano mondo ginge ruoth nyasaye ni kende e ruoth maduong e piny ngima zaburi gombo mar bedo e od nyasaye ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto mano kaka ahero hekalu mari kendo mano kaka agombo ni mondo abed kuno agombo bedo e laru mar hekalu mar ruoth nyasaye kendo awer matek gi ilo ni nyasaye mangima kata winj abang chieth osegero utegi e hekaluni opija bende nigi kar dakgi giwegi kanyo kama gipidhoe nyithindgi machiegni gi kendoni mar misango ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ruodha kendo nyasacha mano kaka joma odak e hekalu mari gin johawi pile gipaki gi wer mano kaka joma yudo tekogi kuomi gin johawi ee joma keto chunygi kuom dhiyo got sayun gin joma oguedhi adier ka gikadho e holo motwo holono lokore thidhya kendo kodh opon kelone gueth teko medore ni jogo ameda ka gidhi nyime gi wuodhgi gibiro neno nyasach nyiseche e got sayun ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto winj lemona chik iti yaye nyasach jakobo nyasaye guedh ruodhwa ritowa en e ruoth iseyiero mowir gi mo odiechieng achiel ngato obedogo e hekalu mari ber moloyo ndalo gana gi gana mobedogo kamoro nono ber mondo achung kata mana e dhoranga od nyasacha moloyo dak e miech joricho ruoth nyasaye e ohinga wagengorego kendo e okumbawa en ema oguedhowa gi ngwono kod duong ok otuon joma timo gik makare gimoro amora maber ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto mano kaka joma ogeno kuomi gin johawi zaburi lemo mikwayogo nyasaye mondo okech israel ruoth nyasaye iseguedho pinyi kendo isemiyo nyikwa jakobo ochako dhi nyime maber iseweyo ni jogi richogi kendo isengwononigi kuom timbegi mamono ne iweyo kecho kodgi mi chunyi olendo kuom mirima mager mane go nyasaye jawarwa duogwa iri mondo iwe sin kodwa ibiro kecho kodwa nyaka chieng koso koso mirimbi biro siko nyaka karango wan jogi yie idwognwa tekowa mondo wapaki ruoth nyasaye reswa kinyisowago ni iherowa gi hera mosiko achiko ita ni gima ruoth nyasaye wacho osingore ni obiro kelonwa kue wan joge owuon ka ok wadok e timbewa manono adier oikore mar reso jogo miye luor kendo duongne maler biro siko e pinywani hera gi adiera biro riwore kanyakla tim makare kod kue bende biro bedo kaachiel luor dhano oluorogo nyasaye biro chopo malo kendo adiera mar nyasaye biro e piny koa e polo ruoth nyasaye biro miyo wadhi nyime maber kendo pinywa biro nyago cham mogundho tim makare biro telo e nyim ruoth nyasaye kendo biro losone yo mondo oluw zaburi lemo mikwayogo nyasaye ngwonone kinde duto ruoth nyasaye winj ywakna mondo idwoka nikech adhier kendo achando ngama dikonya resa e tho nimar ayie kuomi adier konya nikech jatichni kendo ageno kuomi ruoth nyasaye e nyasacha omiyo kecha alami odiechieng duto pile chunya mondo obed mamor yaye ruoth nyasaye nimar ema aywakni ruoth nyasaye iber kendo ingwono ni ji bende inyiso herani mogundho ni ji duto maywakni chik iti ni lemona ruoth nyasaye adier winj ywakna mondo ikonya aluongi e kinde e chandruok nimar angeyo ni iwinjo lemona ruoth nyasaye onge nyasaye moro romo kodi kata nyalo timo gik itimo fweny ogendini duto isechueyo ruoth nyasaye biro kuloreni kendo gibiro miyo nyingi duong nimar kendi nyasaye ema iduong kendo ema itimo gik malich iwuoro ruoth nyasaye nyisa yori mondo awuothie gi adiera puonja kaka daluori gi chuny achiel abiro paki gi chunya duto ruoth nyasacha bende abiro miyo nyingi duong nyaka chieng nikech hera miherago lich kendo nimar iseresa e bur matut mar tho nyasaye josunga timbegi richo dwaro nega gin joma ok dewi ruoth e nyasaye jangwono kendo makecho ji iyi ok wang piyo kendo inyiso adiera ni gi herani mosiko duog ira mondo ikecha meda teko kendo resa ruoth nyasaye nyisa gima dimi ange ni ihera mondo joma mon koda oyud wichkuot ka gineno ni isekonya kendo imiya yueyo zaburi gueth miyudo kuom dak sayun nyasaye nogero dalane e gode maler ohero dala jerusalem moloyo miech nyikwa jakobo duto dala nyasaye winji gik mabeyo miwuoro owacho kuomi ka akwano ogendini moyie kuoma anakwan koda ka jomisri gi jobabulon kendo ananyis jofilistia gi joturo kod joethiopia ni gin bende gin jojerusalem kuom sayun ji duto nowach niya en min ogendini duto kendo ngama duong moloyo biro miyo ogurore motegno ruoth nyasaye nondikie nying ji duto e piny kendo enokwangi ka jojerusalem ji duto nower kendo nomiel ka wacho niya sokni mawa duto wuok mana kuomi zaburi lemo mar yudo konyruok e tho ruoth nyasaye jawarna aywakni odiechieng gotieno duto pile winj lemona kendo chik iti ni ywakna mondo ikonya nikech thagruok mangeny osemaka kendo mana e lak tho achiel kuom jogo duto machiegni tho kendo tekona duto orumo ojwanga e kind joma otho adier achalo gi ngama onegi monindo ei liel wiyi osewilgo chuth kendo koro ok nyal konyo isewita e pier bur piny en bur motimo mudho kendo matut miwuoro ikuma marach kikecho kendo apaka mag mirimbi nega isemiyo osiepena oringa adier isemiyo achalo ni osiepena gima bwogogi olorna kendo ok anyal wuok wengena kethore nikech chandruok go ruoth nyasaye aluongi pile kendo alami katingo bedena malo bende itimo honni ni joma otho adier koso joma otho nyalo paki bende joma otho winjo wach herani mosiko koso bende giwinjo wach ngwononi e piny joma otho bende honni mitimo nenore kama otimo mudhono koso bende ngwononi nenore e piny wich owilgono ruoth nyasaye aluongi mondo ikonya alami okinyi kokinyi ere gima omiyo idaga ruoth nyasaye ango momiyo ipandona wangi chakre tinna aseyudo chandruok machiegni nega thagruok misemiya osetieko tekona mirimbi mager nega dwaro nyuma ka apaka kendo monj malich misemonjago omiya luoro dwaro nega odiechieng duto gilwora mana ka ataro kendo gigengona koni gi koni isemiyo koda ka osiepena mohera oringa tinde mudho kende e osiepna modong zaburi singruok nyasaye gi daudi ruoth nyasaye abiro pako hera mari gi wer kendo abiro hulo adiera mari ni tienge duto nyaka chieng angeyo ni herani osiko kendo ni adiera mari ogurore mochwere ka polo ne iwacho niya asetimo singruok gi daudi jatichna aseyiero mowir gi mo sam wnda zab joote ka anyise ni kothe biro bet ruoth ndalo duto kendo ni anarit lochne nyaka chieng polo pako honni mitimo ruoth nyasaye malaika magi pako adiera mari onge nyasaye e polo machal kodi yaye ruoth nyasaye ooyo onge moro marom kodi ema malaika miyi luor e buch polo ee oluori moloyo malaika duto man buti ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ere ngama romo kodi gi duong itimo gik moko duto gi adiera yaye ruoth nyasaye gi loch kuom nam kendo ikueyo apaka mage madongo ne igoyo rahab ondieg nam minego wasiki bende ne iloyo gi tekoni mangongo polo gi piny gin magi ema ne ichueyo piny kod gik moko duto manie iye bende ne iketo nyandwat kod milambo got tabor gi got hermon werni gi mor mano kaka iratego adier mano kaka tekoni ngeny lochni otenore kuom tim makare kod ngwononi hera gi adiera opongo gik moko duto mitimo joma lami gi wer kendo modak e ler mar ngwononi gin johawi pile giil odiechieng duto nikech adier timni makare miyogi mor imiyowa loch madongo ee ngwononi ema omiyo walocho nimar ne iyeronwa jarit adier ngama ler mar israel ema ne imiyowa ruoth chon nifwenyori ni jogi miwachonigi niya aseketo osimbo ewi jalweny marahuma sam joote sam aseyiero daudi jatichna mi awire gi mo ka akete ruoth abiro bedo kode kinde duto mondo akonye kendo tekona biro miyo obedo motegno wasike ok nomonje mi nyale kata mana jaricho ok noloye abiro tieko wasike mi aneg jogo duto mapiem kode pile abiro kendo abiro bedone mangwon bende abiro miye locho anayar tong pinye chakre nam mediterenia nyaka aora yufrate enowachna niya e wuora kendo nyasacha bende e lwandana agengorae fweny abiro miyo obed wuoda makayo kendo ruoth maduong moloyoe ruodhi duto anahere mochwere kendo anarit singruok mane atimo kode nyaka chieng pile nyakware moro nobed ruoth kendo lochne nobed mogurore ka polo ka nyikwaye ok omako chikena kendo ok owuotho e yorena bende ka ok gidewo wechena anakumgi kuom richogi kendo anasandgi kuom timbegi mamono ok nawe mak ahero koth daudi kata weyo mak arito singruok mane atimone adier ok naketh winjruokna kode ka ok achopo gima ne awacho ne asingora gi nyinga maler dichiel kendo mogik niya ok anawuond daudi pile enobed gi nyikwayo kendo lochne nosik nyaka chieng enobed mogurore ka due en janeno maradier e kor polo eka nyasaye pod isiko ikecho akecha gi ruoth mane iyiero mowir gi mo isejwange mi iweye iseketho singruok mane itimo gi jatichni kendo isewito osimbone e buru isemuko ohinga mar dalane mi iweyo kuondene mag siro lweny kokethore ji duto makadho kanyo yako gige kendo ogendini mokiewo gi pinye goyone siboi isemiyo wasike olocho mi giduto gibedo mamor isemiyo gi lwenjene olokore gik manono mi oloye e lweny isemaye ludhe mar loch kendo isemuko kom duongne isemiyo odoko moti ka ndalone podi kendo isemiye wichkuot maduong ruoth nyasaye ibiro pando wangi nyaka karango koso ibiro pondo nyaka chieng nyaka karango mirimbi biro wangie ka mach parie kaka ngima dhano chiek kendo kaka ji duto nichueyo ni nyaka tho ere ngama nyalo dak nyaka chieng mak otho koso en nga disir tho mak odhi e liel ruoth nyasaye tinde ere timbeni mane inyisowago ni iherowa ere gik mane isingori ni nitim ni daudi ruoth nyasaye winjie kaka joma mon kodi yanyo ruoth mane iyiero mowir gi mo giyanye kamoro amora modhiye wapakuru ruoth nyasaye nyaka chieng amin zaburi kitabu mar angwen zaburi nyasaye mochwere gi dhano matho ruoth nyasaye nyaka nene isebedonwa kar dak kane pok ochue gode kata kane piny pok obetie e nyasaye nyaka nene kendo manyaka chieng idwoko dhano e lowo kiwacho niya doguru un koth dhano pet higni alufu achiel rumoni piyo mana ka ndalo achiel kata mana ka seche mag otieno manenore ni chiek iywoyo ji mana ka ohula maywoyo gik moko kendo lalgo nono gikadho piyo mana ka lek gichalo buya loth gokinyi kendo dongo mi gol maua bange ner kendo tho godhiambo mirimbi osebwogowa motiekowa iketo richowa mopondo e nyimi kamaa inenogie mirimbi ongado ndalowa machiek omiyo ngimawa orumo ka yamo makudho hik dhano gin piero abiriyo ka ngato nigi ngima maber onyalo dak higni piero aboro hignigo duto kelonwa mana chandruok gi kuyo ngimawa rumo piyo kendo walal nono ere ngama ongeyo teko duto mar mirimbi koso ere ngama ongeyo luoro gero mari kelo kuom mano puonjwa wakwan ndalo ngimawa mondo wabed gi rieko biro bet kinde marom nadi ka pok chunyi olendo ruoth nyasaye yie ikechwa wan jotichni pong chunywa gi hera mosiko okinyi kokinyi mondo wawer kendo wabed mamor kuom ngimawa duto isemiyowa thagruok maduong kuom higni mangeny koro miwa mor maduong maromre gi thagruok mane wabedogono nyiswae tijeni madongo wan jotichni mondo nyithindwa bende one duongni maler ruoth nyasachwa guethni mondo obed kodwa kendo ikonywa e gik moko duto watimo mondo wadhi maber e tijewa duto zaburi dak e tipo mar nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ngat madhi ir nyasaye maduong moloyo mondo oyud resruok kata ngat mosiko e tipo mar ngat manyalo gik moko duto nyalo wacho ni nyasaye niya e kar konyruokna kendo ohingana e nyasacha ageno kuome nyasaye nokonyi adier kuom masiche mopondo kendo kuom tuoche manego ji enoumi gi buombene mi iyue e tipo gi kue adierane biro bedoni ka okumba kod gigi mag lweny ok inibed kiluoro masira moro gotieno kata gima nyalo hinyi apoya godiechieng bende ok iniluor tho magoyo ji ka piny olil kata tuoche manego ji ka piny ler ji gana nyalo podho buti ee ji gana gi gana nyalo tho machiegni kodi onge gima nyalo hinyi inirang aranga mi ine kaka joricho yudo kum ne ikawo nyasaye maduong moloyo kaka kar konyruokni kendo kar dakni omiyo masira moro ok nomaki bende kata mana gimoro marach ok nobi machiegni gi dalani math luka nyasaye biro keto malaikane mondo oriti kendo okonyi kamoro amora midhiye math luka ginitayi gi lwetgi mondo kik ichwany tiendeni e kite luka ininyon sibuoche gi thuonde koda ka sibuoche mager kod thuonde malich man gi kwiri nyasaye owacho niya anawar joma ohera kendo nakony jogo mongeya ka giywakna nadwokgi kendo ka gin e chandruok anabed kodgi anaresgi kendo anami gibed joma oluor anami gidag aminga mondo gibed mamor gi warruok amiyogi zaburi wer mipakogo ber mar nyasaye ruoth nyasaye maduong moloyo goyoni erokamano kendo pako nyingi en ber ee en gima longo hulo herani mosiko okinyi kokinyi kaachiel gi adierani otieno kotieno kigoyoni thumbe mamit ruoth nyasaye timbeni madongo miya mor kendo awer gi ilo nikech gik isetimo mano kaka timbeni dongo yaye ruoth nyasaye kendo mano kaka paroni tut nitie gimoro ngama ofuwo ok nyal ngeyo adier ngama ming ok nyal winjo ni joma timbegi mono dongo ka buya kendo joricho dhi nyime maber kata kamano notiekgi duto chuth nikech ruoth nyasaye ema gi duong nyaka chieng wangeyo ni wasiki biro tho kendo joricho duto nolo mi ke nono isemiyo abedo maratego ka jowi kendo iseguedha kimiya mor aseneno gi wanga ka olo joricho monja bende asewinjo ka giywak joma kare nokar ka yiend othith ginidongi mana ka yiend sida man lebanon gichalo gi yien mopidhi e od ruoth nyasaye dongo maber e hekalu mar nyasachwa pod ginyago olemo kata ka giseti bende gisiko gingich kendo gitegno mano nyiso ni ruoth nyasaye lwandana en jaadiera adier tim moro marach onge kuome zaburi duong mar nyasaye ruoth nyasaye e ruoth adier orwakore gi duong mar loch kendo oumore gi teko mana ka nanga adier piny ogurore motegno kendo ok nyal ngingni ruoth nyasaye kom duongni osebedo mogurore nyaka chon kendo intie nyaka nene kude mag nam walo yaye ruoth nyasaye ee giwalo kendo giwuo ruoth nyasaye man malo ngongo oduong moloyo wuo mar nam kendo en gi teko moloyo apaka ruoth nyasaye chikeni osiko kendo hekalu mari ler ahinya nyaka chieng zaburi nyasaye ngado ni ji duto bura ruoth nyasaye nyasaye machulo kuor nyiswa kaka ichalo e jangad bura ni ji duto koro malo mondo imi josunga gima giromogo nyasaye joricho biro bedo mamor nyaka karango joma timbegi mono biro sungore kendo kawore kuom kinde marom nade ginyono jogi yaye nyasaye ee githiro oganda miseyiero ginego mond liete gi nyithi kiye kaachiel gi jopinje mamoko modak e pinywa giwacho niya nyasaye ok newa adier nyasach jakobo ok dew gima watimo un joga ere kaka unyalo bedo joma ofuwo momemore kamano unupuonjru karango uparo ni nyasaye mane ochueyo ok winj koso koso ngama nochueyo wang donge neno en ema orito ogendini donge okumogi koso ngama puonjo dhano nyalo bedo maonge gi rieko adier kor nyasaye ongeyo ni paro mag dhano nono nyasaye ngat ichiko kendo ipuonjo chikeni en jahawi nikech imiye yueyo e kinde mag chandruok ka joricho ichikonigi obadho nyasaye ok nojwang joge owuon kendo ok nowegi bura nochak ongad kare kendo mi ji makare duto noyiego onge ngat mane ochung mondo okonya kuom joma richo adier onge ngat mane ochwaka kuom joma timbegi mono kuom mano ka dine nyasaye konya dine asedhi piyopiyo e piny ok wuoe pile kane aneno ni tienda dwaro kier nyasaye ne ikonya gi herani mosiko ka gi parruok kendo kihondko omaka ikueyo chunya kendo imiya bedo mamor ibet mabor gi jongad buch amwor miyo timbe maricho nenore ka gik chik oyiego kendo chokore mondo otim ni joma kare timbe mamono mi ngad ni joma onge ketho buch tho ruoth nyasaye ema ibedona kar konyruok e nyasaye obedona lwanda agengorae ibiro kumo jogo kuom timbegi mamono mi itiekgi nikech richogi ee ruoth nyasachwa ibiro tiekogi zaburi wer mipakogo nyasaye biuru wapak ruoth nyasaye gi wer waweruru gi mor ni jaritwa kendo jawarwa wadhiuru e nyime kwagoyone erokamano kendo wawerne wende mag pak gi ilo nikech ruoth nyasaye en nyasaye maduong en e ruoth maduongie moloyo nyiseche duto hohini matut mag piny ni e lwete kendo gode maboyo bende mage en gi loch kuom nam nikech en ema ne olose piny bende mare nikech en ema ne ochueye biuru wakulre piny e nyim ruoth nyasaye jachuechwa mondo walame kwagoyone chongwa piny hib hib nimar en e nyasachwa wan joge kendo oritowa kaka jakwath rito jambe winjuru dwonde kawuono owacho ni wuok kwan kik wiu dok matek kaka ne wi kwereu odoko matek kane gin meriba chieng mane gin masa e thim cha ne gitema kanyo kata obedo ni ne giseneno gik mane atimonigi ne asin kodgi kuom higni piero angwen mi awacho niya gitamore winjo chikena kendo ok gingeyo yorena kwan tchik hib tchik mirima ne omaka mi akuongoira ni ok ginidonj e piny mane adwaro miyogie yueyo zaburi wend pak weche mag ndalo weruru wer manyien ni ruoth nyasaye un ji duto mae piny ngima werneuru weruru ni ruoth nyasaye kendo pakuru nyinge pile nyisuru ji kaka osekonyou huluru ni ji duongne maler mondo ji duto owinj timbene madongo ruoth nyasaye duong kendo nyaka pake malich adier nyaka miye duong moloyo nyiseche mamoko duto nikech nyiseche mag ogendini mamoko duto gin mana gik manono ruoth nyasaye ochueyo polo duong maler gi duong mar loch okete diere kendo teko gi ber duto ni e hekalu mare zab un ji duto modak e piny pakuru ruoth nyasaye dendeuru nikech duongne gi tekone miuru nyinge duong mowinjore kode kendo keluru chiwo e hekalu mare ka ngama ler othinyore un ji duto manie piny kulreuru e nyime kutetni nyisuru ogendini duto niya ruoth nyasaye e ruoth en ema oseguro piny motegno ok nyal ngingni kendo obiro ngado ni ji duto bura kare un polo gi piny beduru mamor nam wuo kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie iyi un pewe beduru mail kaachiel gi gik moko duto un go kendo yien duto mae bunge bende mondo okog gi mor e nyim ruoth nyasaye nikech obiro mondo orit piny adier obiro rito ji duto mae piny gi bura makare kod adiera zaburi loch kod teko mar nyasaye ruoth nyasaye e ruoth adier piny bed mamor un pinje manie dier nam bende beduru gi ilo boche polo gi mudho molil olworo ruoth nyasaye kendo lochne otenore kuom tim makare kod adiera mach otelo e nyime kendo wango wasike koni gi koni mil polo mare menyo piny ngima kendo ka piny onene yiengni gode leny nono ka odok e nyim ruoth nyasaye ruodh piny duto polo hulo timne makare kendo ogendini duto neno duongne maler wichkuot omako ji duto malamo kido mag nyiseche manono ee jogo duto masungore gi gik manono wigi okuot kata mana nyiseche duto kulore e nyim ruoth nyasaye josayun mor kendo joma odak e miech juda nigi ilo nikech buche mingado yaye ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye maduong moloyo ruodh piny ngima kendo iduong moloyo nyiseche mamoko duto nyasaye ihero joma mon gi richo irito ngima jogi kendo iresogi e lwet joricho ler rieny kuom joma kare kendo mor mana ni kuom joma beyo un joma kare duto beduru gi ilo kendo pakuru nyasaye kuom gik mosetimo zaburi wer mipakogo tim makare mar nyasaye weruru wer manyien ni ruoth nyasaye nimar osetimo gik malich miwuoro kendo oselocho gi tekone maler ruoth nyasaye ne onyiso ji ni oselocho mi ne omiyo ogendini ongeyo ratiro kaka oreso ji orito singruok mane otimo kod joisrael gi adiera konyisogo ni oherogi gi hera mosiko ji duto oseneno resruok moa kuom nyasachwa un ji duto modak e piny weruru ni ruoth nyasaye gi ilo ee pakeuru gi wer kukok gi mor weruru ni ruoth nyasaye wende pak gi thum adier gouru thumbe mamit kaachiel gi asili kod tung kukok gi ilo e nyim ruoth nyasaye ruodhwa nam wuo kaachiel gi gik moko manie iyi piny kod ji duto modak e iyi weruru un nembe madongo pamuru kendo un gode weruru gi ilo kanyakla ni ruoth nyasaye nimar obiro mondo orit piny adier obiro rito ogendini duto mae piny gi bura makare kod adiera zaburi adiera nyasasye ritogo israel wuok ruoth nyasaye e ruoth kendo mano miyo ogendini kirni obet e kom duongne ewi kerubi kendo piny yiengni ruoth nyasaye duong e sayun en gi loch kuom ogendini duto ngato ka ngato nopak nyinge maduong kendo malichh mano kaka oler manade en ruoth maduong mohero gik makare osekelo adiera e israel piny nyikwa jakobo ee osekelo tim maber gi bura makare pakuru ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa kendo lameuru e nyim kom duongne mano kaka oler manade musa gi harun ne jodolo mage samuel bende ne achiel kuom joma lame giduto ne giywak ni ruoth nyasaye mi owinjogi wuok ne owuoyo kodgi gi e siro mar bor polo bange ne girito chike kod buche mane omiyogi ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa ne iwinjo ywak jogi mi inyisogi ni e nyasaye ngwono ni ji kata obedo ni ne ikumogi kuom richogi kamano pakuru ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa kendo lameuru e gode maler nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa en nyasaye maler zaburi wer ijiwogo ji mondo opak nyasaye un ogendini duto mae piny weruru ni ruoth nyasaye gi mor lameuru gi ilo kendo biuru nyime kuwer gi mor ngeuru ni ruoth nyasaye e nyasaye en ema ne ochueyowa kendo wan mage adier wan joge kendo oritowa kaka jakwath rito jambe donjuru ei hekalu mare kugoyo erokamano kendo pakeuru e laru mar ode ee goneuru erokamano kendo dendeuru wnda wnda ezra zab jer ruoth nyasaye ber kendo herane mosiko ochwere adierane bende ok norum zaburi ruodh israel osingore ni biro rito pinye gi adiera wer aweroni loso kuom ngwono kod adiera kendo ema aweronigo ruoth nyasaye abiro keto chunya mondo atim tim makare ibiro biro ira karango abiro bedo gi ngima modimbore e oda adier abiro bet mabor gi richo asin gi timbe joma weyo nyasaye kendo ok nariwra kodgi kata matin ok nabed jamganga ngang bende kata mana paro timo richo ok napar anatiek ngato angata maketho nying wadgi gi weche maricho kendo ok nayie gi ngat jasunga mochayo ji anayie mana gi jogo oluoro nyasaye kendo anawe gidag koda ngat jaadiera chutho ema nobed jatichna onge ngat jawuondre nodag e oda kendo ok nane jamriambo e wanga odiechieng kodiechieng ananeg joricho e pinya anariemb joma timbegi mono duto e dala ruoth nyasaye zaburi ywak mar ngat machandore ruoth nyasaye chik iti ni lemona kendo winj ywakna mondo ikonya kik ipandna wangi ka e chandruok chik iti mondo iyie idwoka piyo ka aluongi ngimana lal nono mana ka iro kendo denda wang ka mach chunya ool mana ka lum moner kendo dhoga rach ok anyal chiemo achur matek kendo adong mana choke lilo achalo gi winyo modak kende e thim kata ka tula modak e gunda ariera piny nindo otamore tera achalo gi winyo mongichno kende ewi tado wasika yanya pile odiechieng duto kendo jogo majara kuongo ji gi nyinga buru e chiemba kendo pi wanga ton kuom gima amadho nikech mirimbi mager iseyudha mi iwita mabor ngimana kadho piyo manaa ka tipo mar odhiambo kendo achalo gi lum maner ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyaka chieng kendo tienge duto nopari ibiro malo mi ikech sayun nikech kinde osechopo monego kechee bende mae sa mowinjore jotichni ohero sayun kata obedo ni okethe kamano adier kataa obedo ni odong mana gunda pod gikeche akecha ogendini duto nomi nying ruoth nyasaye duong kendo ruodhi mag piny noluor tekone e kinde ruoth nyasaye nochak ogerie sayun kendo enothinyre gi duong enowinj ywak joge mosejwang kendo enochik ite ni lemogi nyaka ndik gik ruoth nyasaye osetimo mondo joma biro mapok onywol chieng moro opake ruoth nyasaye norango piny gi e kar dakne maler man malo ee nongiyo piny gi e polo mondo owinj ywak joma otue ywakgo kendo mondo ogony jogo mane ongadnigi buch tho kuom mano ji nohul nying ruoth nyasaye e sayun adier ginipake e jerusalem e kinde ogendini gi ruodhigi nochokre kanyakla mondo olame ruoth nyasaye nomiyo abedo mayomno kapod atin kendo osemiyo ngimana ongadore machiek ruoth nyasaye ingima nyaka chieng hib chon gi lala ne ichueyo piny kiketo mise mare kendo ne iloso mise mare gi lweti iwuon gin ginirum isiko mochwere giduto ginidok moti kaka law doko moti kendo inilokgi kaka iloko law mi girum chuth isiko mana kendo hiki ok norum kuom mano nyithindwa nodag gi kue kendo pile inirit nyikwagi zaburi wer mipakogo nyasaye kuom gueth chunya pak ruoth nyasaye dend nyinge maler tekra duto yaye chunya pak ruoth nyasaye kendo wiyi kik wil gi ngwonone duto en ema oweyona richona duto kendo ochango tuochena pep oresa e tho kendo oguedha gi hera kod ngwono en ema omiya gik mabeyo mogundho e ngimana omiyo anenora ngama pod tin kendo man gi teko ka sibuor kata ka ongo ruoth nyasaye ngado ni joma ithiro bura kare kendo omiyogi gik owinjore giyudi ne onyiso musa gik mane ochano mondo otim bende ne omiyo joisrael oneno timbene madongo jak en jangwono kendo okecho ji iye ok wang piyo bende onyiso herane mosiko ok osik ka odhawnwa kinde duto kendo ok osik kokecho bende ok okumwa maromre gi richowa kata chulonwa kuor moromo gi timbewa mamono ok ochulnwa kaka polo bor moyombo piny e kaka hera moherogo joma oluore bende bor moyombo hera duto ogolo richowa kendo owitogi mabor kodwa mana kaka yo wuok chieng bor gi yo podho chieng ruoth nyasaye ohero joma oluore mana kaka wuoro ohero wuode en ongeyo gima ochuewago ongeyo ni wan mana buru ngima dhano chalo mana lum odongo kendo onenore maber ka maua bange yamo kudhe kendo tere mabor mi ngato ok chak nene kendo hera ruoth nyasaye oherogo joma oluore osiko nyaka chieng bende ngwonone ochwere kuom tienge duto morito singruokne kendo omako chikene gi adiera ruoth nyasaye noguro kom duongne e polo en e ruodh gik moko duto pakuru ruoth nyasaye un malaike madongo marateke mawinjo wachne kendo morito chikene un ogend polo duto pakuru ruoth nyasaye ee un jotich matimo gik odwaro pakeuru dendeuru un chuechne duto kamoro amora lochne nitie yaye chunya pak ruoth nyasaye zaburi wer mipakogo nyasaye jachuech yaye chunya pak ruoth nyasaye mano kaka iduong ruoth nyasacha irwakori gi loch kod duong kendo iumori gi ler mana kaka ngato umore gi law ne iyaro polo mana ka hema mi igero dalani e pige man malo boche polo ema iidho ka gachi mar lweny hib ioro yamo ka joreni kendo mil polo ema iketo jotichni iseguro piny ewi mise mare mondo kik ongingni ngang ne irwako nam kuome mana ka ngama orwake gi kandhu mi pi noimo gode kane ikwero pigego ne giringo mi gia adier kane giwinjo kigolo chik kikok ne giwalore gia ewi gode mi giridore ewi holni nyaka kuonde mane iselosonigi eka ne iketonigi tong ok ginyal kadho mondo kik gichak giim piny kendo ema imiyo pi sokni bubni e holni kendo mol e kind gode kamano le e bungu yudo pi modho kendo magwar nego riyo mohewogi winy gero utgi kendo ywak mamit e yien dongo aorego ioro koth gie polo mondo ochue e gode kendo guethni opongo piny imiyo lum loth ni jamni kaachiel gi alode dhano chamoo mondo oyud teko mopurogo eka oyud divai miye mor kod mor zeituni mamiyo obedo mail kaachiel gi kuon mamiyo obedo motegno yiend sida mag lebanon yudo koth mangeny kendo ngich gin yiend ruoth nyasaye mane opidho owuon winy gero utgi e bedegi nyamnaha gedo e bedegi man malo moloyo ngau mae thim dak e gode maboyo lwendni morokore ema apwoche bwokie ne ichueyo due mondo onyis kinde mitimoe sewni chieng bende ongeyo sa opodhoe ne iloso otieno kendo ka piny lil le duto manie bungu wuok oko sibuoche ruto kadhi dwaro chiemo gimanyo chiemo nyasaye miyogi ka chieng wuok gidok e bungu kendo ginindo e gondegi dhano wuok dhi e tichne kendo tiyo nyaka odhiambo ruoth nyasaye isechueyo gik mangeny ahinya mano kaka ne ilosogi gi rieko matut piny opong gi gik misechueyo ne ichueyo nam maduong kendo malach kama gik moko madongo gi matindo mokadho akwana odakie ayub zab isa yiedhi kwangie kendo ondieg nam mane ichueyo miluongo ni levayathan tugoe ema girangi giduto mondo imigi chiemo e sa kech ohewogi chutho kimiyogi gichamo ee kiyawonigi lweti giyieng ka ipandonigi wangi githagore mi gidog e lowo kuma ne giaye ka imiyogi muya gibedo mangima kamano imiyo gibedo gi ngima manyien duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye mondo osik nyaka chieng kendo onego obed mamor gi gik mane ochueyo ka orango piny piny tetni bende ka omulo gode gode dhuolo iro abiro wer ni ruoth nyasaye kuom ngimana duto adier abiro dendo nyasacha e kinde duto pod angima mad obed mamor gi wenda nikech en ema omiyo abedo mail onego tiek joricho e piny adier joma timbegi mono mondo olal nono chunya pak ruoth nyasaye ee wadendeuru zaburi timbe madongo mane nyasaye okonyogo joisrael weche mag ndalo gouru erokamano ni ruoth nyasaye kendo lameuru bende nyisuru ogendini gik osetimo werneuru kendo pakeuru huluru gik madongo duto mosetimo beduru mamor nikech wan joge un duto mutiyo ni ruoth nyasaye beduru mail dhiuru ire mondo okonyu kendo beduru kode kinde duto un nyikwa ibrahim jatichne kendo nyikwa jakobo ngate moyiero paruru honni mage malich kendo madongo kaachiel gi buche mane ongado en e ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa kendo tekone okwako piny ngima obiro rito singruokne nyaka chieng kuom tienge gana gi gana chak chak en singruok mane otimo ni ibrahim kendo mane otimo ni isaka chak ee ruoth nyasaye notimo singruok ok rum ni israel en winjruok mochwere mane otimo ni jakobo kowacho niya anamiyi piny kanaan mondo obed mwanduni gi nyikwayi jonyasaye ne nok kendo ne gin mana jodak e pinyno ne gibayo e pinje gi pinje ka gidak kuonde mopogore opogore chak ruoth nyasaye ne ok oyie mondo ngato othirgi nikech noherogi bende ne okwero ruodhi kowachonigi niya kik umul joga maseyiero kendo kik utim ni jonabi maga marach chak kane ruoth nyasaye okelo kech e pinygi motieko pinygi duto chak ne oyudo osemiyo ongiew josef ka misumba mondo oore otel nyimgi chak ne otueye gi nyororo mohinyo tiendene ngute bende ne otue gi ratege nyaka gima ne osekoro otimore wach ruoth nyasaye ne onyiso ji gima ne josef okoro en adier chak bange ruodh misri ne ogonye ee ruoth mane rito pinje noweye mobedo thuolo chak ne okete jatelo mondo orit pinje duto ne omiye teko duto kuom jodonge kendo mondo ogol chike ni jongad ni ruoth rieko chak chak bange jakobo nodhi misri mi odak e piny nyikwa hamno wuok ruoth nyasaye nomiyo joge nyithindo mangeny kendo nomiyo gibedo motegno moloyo wasikgi ee nomiyo jomisri obedo mamon gi joge mi gibedo ka gitiyo kodgi e yor miganga wuok bange ne ooro jatichne musa kod harun mane oseyiero ne ginyiso jomisri teko mar nyasaye ka gitimo honni e pinygi wuok nyasaye ne ooro mudho e piny mi piny olil ti kata kamano jomisri ne ok odewo chikene wuok ne oloko aore maggi remo mi onego rech pep wuok oguende ne opongo pinygi koda ka ut ruoth wuok wuok nyasaye ne ogolo chik mi lwangni kod kikun opongo piny wuok kar kelo koth e pinygi nokelo mana pe kod mil polo kokethogo yiendgi mag mzabibu kod ngowo kendo koturogo yien mamoko duto wuok ne ogolo chik mi dede mokadho akwana obiro mochamo oboke duto e piny kaachiel gi cham mae puothe pep wuok ne onego nyithindo machwo makayo duto yawuot misri mabeyoe moloyo wuok eka ne otelo ni joisrael mogolo e piny misri ka gitingo fedha gi dhahabu giduto ne dendgi ber kendo gijing jomisri ne obedo mamor nikech ne giluorogi wuok nyasaye ne oyaro bor polo ka pasia mondo ogenggo joge bende ne omiyogi mach mamenyonigi gotieno wuok ne gikwayo gima digicham mi okelonigi aluru kendo nomiyogi chiemo moa e polo mondo gicham giyieng wuok kwan ne obaro lwanda mi pi obubnie kendo pigno nomol e piny mana ka aora notimo kamano nikech ne oparo singruokne maler mane otimo ni jatichne ibrahim kuom mano ne otelo ni joge moyiero mi ogolo oko ka wer gi ilo josh ne omiyogi pinje jomoko nono mi gikawo puothe jogo osepuro mondo gimak chikene mi girit buchene ruoth nyasaye omi duong zaburi gueth nyasaye oguedhogo joge wnda wnda ezra zab jer pakuru ruoth nyasaye bende goneuru erokamano nikech ober kendo herane mosiko ochwere ere ngama nyalo hulo gik moko duto mosetimo koso en nga manyalo pake moromo joma orito chikene kendo pile timo gik makare gin johawi ruoth nyasaye para chieng mikonyo jogi mondo abed achiel kuomgi kiwarogi aneye kaka jogi dhi nyime maber mondo bende abed mamor e ogandani kendo awer kaachiel kodgi wasetimo richo kaka kwerewa notimo adier wasebedo joricho timbegi mono wuok kwerewa ne ok owinjo tiend honni malich mane nyasaye otimo e piny misri wigi ne owil gi timbe mathoth mane nyiso herane mi ne gipiem kode e nam makwar kata kamano ne oresogi kaka ne osesingore mondo onyisgo tekone maduong wuok ne ogolo chik mi nam makwar oduono eka ne otelo ni joge mongade mana ka gima en lowo motwo kamano ne oresogi kuom jogo mane mon kodgi adier nokonyogi e lwet wasikgi pi noimo wasikgi onge kata achiel modong wuok bange joge noyie ni wechene gin adier mi giwerone wende pak piyopiyo nono wigi ne owil gi gima ne osetimonigi mi gichako gitimo gik moko ka pok gipenje mondo ongadnigi rieko kwan wuoro ne omakogi e thim mi gitemo nyasaye ka gikwaye ringo kuom mano ne omiyogi kata kamano ne okelonigi tho malich kwan kane pod gin e thim nyiego ne omakogi gi musa kendo gi harun jatich mowal ni ruoth nyasaye eka piny nobarore momwonyo dathan kaachiel gi abiram kod joode mach ne omwoch kuom joma ne luwogi mi owango joma richogo pep wuok joisrael noloso nyaroya mar dhahabu ka gin horeb mi gilamo kido manonono ne giwilo duong mar nyasaye mana ka kido mar chiayo machamo lum wigi ne owil gi nyasaye mane oresogi gi timbene madongo e misri ee wigi nowil gi honni miwuoro mane otimo e piny nyikwa ham kod gik malich mane otimo e nam makwar kuom mano nyasaye nowacho ni obiro tieko joge musa jatichne moyiero nochung e kinde gi ji mondo ogeng mirimbe kik tiekgi kwan bange ne gichayo piny maber mane omiyogi nikech ne ok giyie ni singruok mar nyasaye en adier ne gisiko mana e hembegi ka gingur angura kendo ne gitamore winjo wach ruoth nyasaye mano nomiyo osiemogi kowachonigi ni obiro miyo githo e thim tlawi kendo obiro keyo nyikwagi e kind ogendini mamoko nono komiyo githo e pinje jogo kwan bange jonyasaye ne oriwore e lamo baal ka gin peor kendo ne gichamo misengni motim ni nyiseche maonge ngima timbegigo nomiyo nyasaye mirima mi tho marach ogoyogi finehas nokumo joma notimo richogo mi tuo marachno norumo gima notimono osemiyo ikwane ka ngama kare kendo pod ibiro kwane kamano kuom tienge duto mabiro kwan joisrael nomiyo nyasaye mirima e sokni mag meriba kendo gima ne gitimono nokelo ni musa chandruok ne gimiyo iye owang mi ochadho wach bura ruoth nyasaye nosechikogi mondo gineg ogendini mokiewo kodgi kar timo kamano ne gikendore akenda kodgi mi giluwo timbegi kuom mano jonyasaye nolamo kido mag nyiseche manono mi mano nolokorenigi obadho ruo ne gichiwo yawuotgi gi nyigi ka misengni ni nyiseche mag jopinje mamoko nono kwan adier ne gichwero remb yawuotgi gi nyigi onge ketho ka gichiwonigi ni nyiseche manono mag kanaan mi piny nodoko mogak nikech remo nochuerno gin bende ne gidoko mogak gi timbegi modwanyorego mi giweyo luwo nyasaye bura kuom mano ruoth nyasaye nokecho kodgi chutho nojok kodgi kata obedo ni gin joge mane oyiero kamano ne ojwangogi e lwet ogendini mamoko nono mi gibedo e bwo loch joma mon kodgi bende wasikgigo ne othirogi mi olokogi wasumbgi ruoth nyasaye nokonyo joge ndalo mangeny gin ne gihero mana piem kode mi richogi odwokogi chien kata kamano kane giywak nowinjogi mi oneno chandruok gin go ne oparo singruok mane otimonigi mi oloko parone nikech herane maduong komiyo joma ne oseterogi e tuech okechogi wnda reswa ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa kendo golwa kuom ogendini mamoko iduogwa e pinywa mondo wapak nyingi maler kendo wayud mor kuom goyoni erokamano wadenduru ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel higni gi higni ji duto mondo owach niya obed kamano pakuru ruoth nyasaye zaburi kitabu mar abich zaburi wer mipakogo nyasaye kuom kony mokelo wnda wnda ezra zab jer gouru erokamano ni ruoth nyasaye nikech ober kendo herane mosiko ochwere konyauru pako ruoth nyasaye un duto osewaro osekonyou e teko wasiku kendo oseduogou kogolou e pinje mamoko chakre yo wuok chieng nyaka yo podho chieng kendo chakre yo nyandwat nyaka yo milambo jou moko nobayo abaya e thim kendo ne ok ginyal yudo mier gidakie kech nokayogi kendo riyo noloyogi mi geno mane gin go orumo kane gin e chandruok kamano ne giywak ni nyasaye mondo okonygi mi ogologi e chandruokgino ne otelonigi e yo mochikore tir nyaka ne gichopo e dala ginyalo dakie onego gigo erokamano ni nyasaye kuom herane mosiko kendo kuom gik miwuoro mane otimonigi ngama riyo oloyo ne omiyo pi modho mi orome ngama odenyo nomiyo oyieng gi gik mabeyo joma moko nodak e mudho kendo e tipo mar tho ne gin joma thagore motue gi nyororo nikech ne gipiem gi nyasaye maduong moloyo ka gidagi mako chikene tich matek ne oologi mi gipodho piny onge ngama ne nyalo konyogi kane gin e chandruok kamano ne giywak ni nyasaye mondo okonygi mi ogologi e chandruokgino ne ogologi oko e mudho kendo e tipo mar tho mi ochodo nyororo mane otuegigo onego gigo erokamano ni nyasaye kuom herane mosiko kendo kuom gik miwuoro mane otimonigi omuko dhorangeye mag mula kendo oturo lodi mag nyinyo joma moko ne tuo nikech richogi adier ne githagore nikech timbegi mamono dhogi ne rach ok ginyal chamo gimoro kendo ne gichiegni tho ka ne gin e chandruok kamano ne giywak ni nyasaye mondo okonygi mi oresogi e chandruokgino ne ooro wachne mi ochangogi kendo ne oresogi e tho onego gigo erokamano ni nyasaye kuom herane mosiko kendo kuom gik miwuoro mane otimonigi onego gigone erokamano gi misengni kendo giwer wende nyiso gik moko duto mosetimo joma moko kwang e nembe gi yiedhi kendo giyudo chiembgi e tich nam gineno gik miwuoro nyasaye osetimo e nembe ne ogolo chik ahiti maduong ochako kudho motago nam apaka ne gingo yiedhi malo kendo nyumo kuonde matut chuny jokwang noridore nikech masira malich mane ojukogino ne gipuore kendo gitagore ka joma omer riekogi duto ne ok nyal konyogi kane gin e chandruok kamano ne giywak ni nyasaye mondo okonygi mi oresogi ne okueyo ahiti mi apaka oling eka ne gibedo mamor nikech nam nokue kamano nyasaye nokelogi maber nyaka e dhowath mane gidwaro gowoe onego gigo erokamano ni nyasaye kuom herane mosiko kendo kuom gik miwuoro mane otimonigi onego gihul duongne e chokruok mar ogandagi kendo gipake e buch jodongo nyasaye miyo piny aora molie doko ongoro kendo omiyo sokni duono mi pinje mokiewo kodgi doko motwo piny momew bende omiyo lokore piny motimo kado ok nyal pur bende omiyo piny motimo ongoro bedo gi pi kendo piny motwo bedo gi sokni omiyo joma odenyo dak kuonde makamago kendo gigero dala mondo gidagie gikomo kendo gipidho mzabibu bende gikeyo maber oguedho joge komiyo ginya mathoth kendo ok oyie mondo jambgi odog piny ka olo jonyasaye mi osandi kithiro malit nyasaye nyiso ni ochayo joma thirogi komiyo gibayo abaya e thim ka giruenyo oreso jochan kuom chandruokgi kendo omiyo ginya mangeny joma kare neno kamano kendo gibedo mamor joricho duto dhogi moko joma riek onego onon wechegi mondo opar hera mosiko mar nyasaye zaburi lemo mar resruok e lwet wasigu zaburi aikora nyasaye adier aikora chuth anawer kendo anapaki chunya chiew un thumbe bende chakuru ywak abiro chiew ka chieng pok owuok ruoth nyasaye anagoni erokamano e kind ogendini ee anapaki e kind ji mae piny herani mosiko kod adierani bor moyombo polo nyasaye nyis tekoni gie kor polo kendo duongni maler bende onenre gie kor polo reswa gi tekoni kendo dwok lemowa mondo joma ihero oyud konyruok nyasaye nowuoyo e kar dakne maler kowacho niya kaka koro aselocho abiro dhi mondo apog dala mar shekem kaachiel gi holo mar sukoth ni joga piny gilead gi piny manase gin maga efraim en oguta juda en ludha mar loch piny moab nobed karacha mar lwok kendo edom nobed kama aboloe wuochena jofilistia anagonigi siboi nyasaye ere ngama biro tera e dala mochiel motegno koso en nga nokela edom bende en adier ni isedagiwa donge ibiro dhi e lweny gi jolwenjwa konywa kedo gi wasikwa nikech kony mar dhano ok nyal gimoro ka nyasaye konyowa wabiro kedo gi chir nikech en ema obiro loyonwa wasikwa zaburi ywak mar ngat manie chandruok nyasaye apako kik iling nimar joricho gi jomriambo josemonja ka hangona wach giwacho gik malich kuoma kendo gibuka maonge gima omiyo kata obedo ni aherogi kendo alemonigi kamano pod gimon amona koda gichula richo kar ber kendo sin kar hera aherogigo giwacho niya mad ngat mamon kode donjne kendo ngat marach ngadne bura koseyale onego oyude gi ketho kendo mad kwan kata mana lemone ka ketho joote hike mondo ongadre machiek kendo ngato machielo mondo okaw tije nyithinde onego dong kiye chiege bende onego bed chi liel onego nyithinde bed jokuecho mawuotho awuotha koseriembgi gia e dalagi mokethi joma osehole gik moko mondo omaye gige duto kendo joma welo mondo oyak gik moko duto mosekano onego kik ngato bedne mangwon kata kik rit nyithinde modong kiye nyikwaye duto mondo otho mi nyinge lal nono kuom tieng mabiro onego nyasaye par richo mag kwerene kendo tamre weyo ni min mare richone pile nyasaye onego par richo ngatno en owuon onego wich wil kode chuth nimar ne ok odewo bedo mangwon ne osando jodhier gi jochan kod joma ok nyal yudo kaka konyore mi onego ne ohero kuongo ji koro en ema onego numba dongne guedho ji bende ne ok ohero omiyo kik ngato guedhe ne orwakore gi kuong ka ngama rwako law mad en ema kuongno dong kuome mana ka pi donjo e okak kendo leny e chokene mana ka mo onego giume mana kaka law umoo ngato kendo oonego gituere kuome ka okanda motueyo pile ruoth nyasaye mano kaka onego ikum wasika mawacho gik malichgo kuoma ruoth nyasacha konya kaka ne isesingori kendo resa nikech herani maber adhier kendo jachan chunya chandore malit ahinya achiegni lal nono ka tipo makadho adier ahungora mana ka yamo mahungo bonyo chongena onyosore nikech achando chiemo kendo denda odhero marach math mar ka ji onena gigoyona siboi gitwenyo umgi ka gijara konya ruoth nyasacha resa nokech herani mosiko yie imi wasikka ngeyo ni ema iseresa kamano gikuonga akuonga yie iguedha mad lo wasika duto jatichni mondo abed gi mor wasika wigi okuodi mi girwak wichkuot ka kandhu abiro goyo erokamano maduong ni nyasaye kendo anapake e chokruok maduong nikech okonyo jochan kendo ogologo e lwet jogo ngadone buch tho zaburi nyasaye oyiero ruoth math mar luka joote kor efes kol hib ruoth nyasaye ne owacho ni ruodha niya bed abeda korachwich ka nyaka chop aket wasiki obed raten tiendi ruoth nyasaye biro miyo lochni yarore chakre sayun kowacho niya bed gi loch kuom wasiki chieng ikedo gi wasiki jou nochiwre mondo okedi kendo yawuotgi nobi iri e gode maler konur mana ka tho mamoko gokinyi hib ruoth nyasaye osekuongore kendo ok nolokre ngang kuom wachne mowacho ni jadolo nyaka chieng e tich dolo mar melkizedek ruoth nyasaye nie badi korachwichh kendo obiro loyo ruodhi moko chieng mirima omake obiro ngado ni ogendini bura mi omi ringre joma otho pong paw lweny adier obiro loyo ruodhi e piny ngima ruodhni nomodh e aora manie bath yo omiyo enoting wiye nikech oselocho zaburi rit nyasaye oritogo joge pakuru ruoth nyasaye abiro goyone erokamano gi chunya duto e chokruok mar joge mano kaka gik ruoth nyasaye timo lich miwuoro ji duto mohero timbenego dwaro ngeyo tiendgi timbene opong gi duong kod luor kendo timne makare ochwere nyaka chieng ruoth nyasaye ok wiwa wil gi timbene madongo ongwon kendo okecho ji ji duto moluore omiyo chiemo bende wiye ok wil gi singruokne osenyiso joge tekone kuom miyogi pinje mag ogendini mamoko nono gik moko duto motimo otimo kare kendo gi adiera bende chikene duto ogurore ok lokre gisiko kinde duto nyaka chieng gin weche mogen kendo mar adier ne okelo warruok ni joge mi otimo kodgi singruok mosiko mano kaka nyinge ler kendo duong ayub nge luoro nyasaye e chakruok mar rieko kendo joma timo kamano yudo rieko mangeny nyaka pake mochwere zaburi gueth ngat makare yudo pakuru ruoth nyasaye ngat moluoro ruoth nyasaye kendo marito chikene gi mor en jahawi nyithinde nobed madongo e piny ee nyikwa ngat maber noyud gueth joode nobed jomwandu man gi gik mathoth kendo en owuon nodhi nyime maber nyaka chieng ongwon kendo okecho ji en e ler marieny e mudho ni joma beyo ngat makonyo ji gi chuny maler kendo matiyo tijene e yo modimbore en jahawi onge gima nyalo yienge bende wich ok nyal wil kode ok oluoro winjo weche makelo kuyo nikech yie en go otegno kendo ogeno kuom ruoth nyasaye ok oluor kendo chunye ok chandre ongeyo ni obiro neno ka olo wasike kor opogo gige ni jochan gi chuny maler ngwonone osiko nyaka chieng obiro bedo gi teko kendo obiro yudo luor joricho koneno kamano igi wang gingicho marach ka gikecho bange gilal nono geno gin go orumo chuth zaburi wer mipakogo nyasaye kuom berne pakuru ruoth nyasaye ee denduru nyinge un jotichne pakuru nyinge pile kendo nyaka chieng chutho nying ruoth nyasaye mondo odendi chakre wuok chieng nyaka podho chieng ruoth nyasaye nigi loch kuom ogendini duto kendo duongne maler oyombo polo onge ngama chal gi ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa odak malo kuma bor kata kamano okulore mondo orang polo gi piny ochungo joma odhier e buru adier ogolo jochan e pidh yugi kendo oketogi gibet gi ruodhi mag joge oguedho dhako onge nyathi mi oloke dhako mamor min nyithindo ruoth nyasaye mondo opaki zaburi honni mane otimore kinde mane joisrael wuok misri wuok e kinde mane joisrael nyikwa jakobo owuokie misri piny jomoko nono juda nodoko kama owal ni ruoth nyasaye israel nodoko mwandune owuon wuok josh nam makwar ne ogoyo wange kuom ruoth nyasaye mi oringo aora jordan ne odok chien moweyo mol gode madongo nochikore ka diek gode matindo bende nochikore ka rombe koro nam ango momiyo ne iringo koso aora jordan ere gimomiyo ne iweyo mol un gode madongo ere gimomiyo ne uchikoru ka diek koso un gode matindo ango momiyo ne uchikoru ka rombe piny yiengni ka ruoth nyasaye biro ee tetni e nyim nyasach jakobo wuok kwan loko lwendni doko degni mag pi kendo loko lwanda mogingore doko soko mamol zaburi nyasaye maradier kod kido manono kendi ruoth nyasaye ema nyaka iyud duong ok wan nikech adiera mari kod herani mosiko ango momiyo ogendini penjowa niya ere nyasachu nogo nyasachwa ni e polo malo kendo otimo gimoro amora modwaro zab fweny nyisechegi lwet dhano ema oloso gi fedha kod dhahabu gin gi dhok ok ginyal wuoyo kendo gin gi wang ok ginyal neno bende gin go ok ginyal winjo kendo gin gi um ok ginyal nguecho gin gi lwedo ok ginyal mako gimoro kendo gin gi tielo ok ginyal wuotho bende gionge gi dwol minyalo winjo joma loso kidogo kaachiel gi jogo mogeno kuomgi chalo mana gi kido mane gilosogo genuru kuom ruoth nyasaye un joisrael en ema okonyou kendo oritou un jodolo nyikwa harun genuru kuom ruoth nyasaye nimar en ema okonyou kendo oritou genuru kuom ruoth nyasaye un ji duto moluore en ema okonyou kendo oritou ruoth nyasaye parowa kendo obiro guedhowa adier obiro guedho joisrael kod jodolo duto nyikwa harun fweny ee obiro guedho ji duto moluore bed ni gin joma dongo kata joma tindo ruoth nyasaye onego omiu nyithindo mangeny un kaachiel gi nyikwau onego ruoth nyasaye mane ochueyo polo gi piny guedhu polo en mar ruoth nyasaye kende piny nomiyo dhano joma otho odhi e piny ji ok losie ok pak ruoth nyasaye wan joma ngima wabiro goyone erokamano pile kendo nyaka chieng yaye pakuru ruoth nyasaye zaburi wer migoyogo ni nyasaye erokamano kuom kony e tho ruoth nyasaye ber kendo ngwon adier ochiko ite ni lemona e sa asaya aywaknee tho ne otueya gi tondene kendo masiche mag liel nolwora parruok gi kihondko nomaka eka ne aywak ni ruoth nyasaye kawacho niya ahombi ruoth nyasaye yie iresa ruoth nyasaye ber kendo ngwon adier nyasachwa en jakech ji orito joma ok nyal konyore kendgi ne okonya kane e chandruok yaye chunya bed gi geno nimar ruoth nyasaye osebedona mangwon oseresa e tho kendo omiyo aweyo ywak bende osekonyo tienda mondo kik chwanyre kuom mano abiro wuotho e nyime e piny joma ngima kor kata kane awacho niya gi masira marach dwaro nega pod ne asiko mana kayie mana kuom ruoth nyasaye kata mana e kinde mane abedo maluor kawacho niya ji duto gin jomriambo pod ne ayie ayia kuom nyasaye ango dachiw ni ruoth nyasaye kuom ber duto mosetimona abiro kelone misango miolo piny mondo agonego erokamano kuom resa bende gik mane asesingora ni nachiwne abiro chiwone e chokruok mar joge duto mano kaka lit ni ruoth nyasaye ka ngate moro otho ruoth nyasaye jatichni isegonya mi abedo thuolo abiro chiwoni misango mar erokamano kendo abiro lami anachiwni gik asesingora ni nachiwni e chokruok mar jogi duto machokore e agolini mag hekalu mari man jerusalem yaye pakuru ruoth nyasaye zaburi wer mipakogo nyasaye kuom herane mosiko rumi un ogendini duto pakuru ruoth nyasaye dendeuru un ji duto mae piny hera mosiko moherowago en hera maduong kendo adierane osiko nyaka chieng pakuru ruoth nyasaye zaburi erokamano migoyo ni nyasaye wnda wnda ezra zab jer gouru ni ruoth nyasaye erokamano nimar ober kendo herane osiko mochwere joisrael mondo owach niya herane mosiko ochwere jodolo nyikwa harun bende mondo owach niya herane mosiko ochwere kendo ji duto oluore mondo owach niya herane mosiko ochwere kane e thagruok ne aywak ni ruoth nyasaye ne odwoka mi ogonya abedo thuolo hib ruoth nyasaye ni koda omiyo ok anabed maluor ere gima dhano ditimna angeyo ni ruoth nyasaye ni koda kendo konya omiyo anane ka olo wasika geno kuom ruoth nyasaye ber moloyo geno kuom dhano adier geno kuome ber moloyo geno kuom ruodhi mag piny ogendini duto ne oketa diere ne atiekogi gi teko mar ruoth nyasaye adier ne giluora koni gi koni ne atiekogi gii tekone ne ginur kuoma ka kich piyopiyo nono ne girumo ka mach mawango kudho ne gimonja marach kendo ne gichiegni loya ruoth nyasaye ne okonya wuok isa en ema omiyo abedo maduong kendo man gi teko en e jawarna winjieuru kaka jonyasaye goyo mahu mar loch e hembegi teko mar ruoth nyasaye osetimo timbe madongo chutho tekone e lweny osemiyo walocho ok abi tho abiro mana bedo mangima mondo ahul gik ruoth nyasaye osetimo osekuma malich miwuoro ok aseweyo atho yawnauru dhoranga hekalu mondo adonj apak ruoth nyasaye e dhoranga ruoth nyasaye joma kare kende ema donjoe ruoth nyasaye apaki nikech ne iwinjo ywakna mi imiyo alocho luka joote pet math mar kidi mane jogedo odagi ema koro osedoko kidi motegno moriwo kor ot mano en tich ruoth nyasaye kendo en gima lichnwa miwuoro ruoth nyasaye osemiyo odiechiengni obedo maber ahinya wabeduru mamor kendo mail math mar joh ruoth nyasaye wakwayi mondo ikonywa mondo wadhi nyime maber math mar luka joh oguedh ngama biro e nying ruoth nyasaye waguedhou gie hekalu mare ruoth nyasaye e nyasaye kendo osemiyowa ler chakuru timo sawo kutingo oboke e lwetu kudhi nyaka e tunge mag kendomarmisango e nyasacha kendo abiro goyoni erokamano bende abiro hulo duongni kaka chalo gouru erokamao ni ruoth nyasaye nikech ober kendo herane mosiko ochwere zaburi ber mar chik nyasaye joma onge ketho kendo matimo kaka chik ruoth nyasaye dwaro gin johawi joma oluwo chikene kendo moluore gi chunygi duto bende gin johawi adier joma kamago ok tim gik maricho giwuotho mana e yore nyasaye isemiyowa chikeni kendo iwachonwa ni onego waluwgi gi adiera mano kaka ageno ni abiro luwo chikeni maber ka arito chikeni duto adimba eka wiya ok nokuodi bende ka asepuonjora bucheni mingado kare anapaki gi chuny malongo anarit chikeni gi adieri omiyo yie kik ijwanga ngang mako chik nyasaye ere kaka ngat pod tin dirit ngimane bed maler dorite mana ka omako wachni ruoth nyasaye atemo tiyoni gi chunya duto omiyo rita mondo kik awe luwo chikeni akano wachni e chunya mondo kik akethi e nyimi ruoth nyasaye apaki yie ipuonja chikeni chike duto isegolo anaol achiel ka achiel chikeni miya mor moloyo mor mwandu mangeny miya aparo chikeni matut kendo arango yore midwaro mondo aluw amor ahinya gi chikeni kendo wiya ok nowil gi wachni mor miyudo kuom chik nyasaye bedna mangwon jatichni mondo adag aminga kendo amak wachni yaw wanga mondo ane weche miwuoro manie chikni anie pinyka mana kuom kinde matin omiyo kik ipandna chikeni siso oloya seche duto kadwaro ngeyo buche mingado ikwero josunga ee joma obaro moweyo chikeni okuong gol kuoma ayany kod ajara ji kawago nikech aserito chikeni kata obedo ni jotelo chokore kachano timona marach jatichni pod apuonjora apuonja chikeni chikeni miya mor kendo gin ema gikelona rieko keto chuny kuom rito chik nyasaye ariera piny e buru koloya omiyo miya ngima kaka nisingori ne ahulo gik moko duto asetimo mi idwoka koro puonja chikeni nyisa kaka onego arit chikeni eka apar chikeni miwuoro kuyo omona yueyo omiyo meda teko kaka ne isingori konya kik aluw yore mag miriambo kendo ngwonna mondo amak chikni aseyiero yor adiera kendo bucheni mingado aseketo e nyima asemako chikeni matek yaye ruoth nyasaye kik iyie wiya kuodi abiro rito chikeni gi chunya duto nikech ibiro meda rieko lemo mar ngeyo chik nyasaye ruoth nyasaye puonja tiend chikeni mondo aritgi kinde duto lerna tiend chikni mondo ariti ee anarite gi chunya duto telna mondo awuoth kaka chikeni dwaro nikech gin ema gimiya mor miya chuny mohero rito chikeni kar bedo gi mwandu rita mondo kik adew gik manono bedna mangwon kaka ne isingori rit singruok mane isingorinago jatichni en singruok itimo ni ji duto moluori gengna ayany aluoro nikech buche mingado beyo mano kaka adwaro ni mondo arit chikeni ngwonna nikech ngat makare geno kuom chik nyasaye ruoth nyasaye nyisa hera maduong miherago kendo resa kaka isesingori eka anyalo dwoko joma yanya nikech ageno kuom wachni miya teko mondo ahul wachni maradiera kinde duto nikech genona ni kuom buche mingado kamano anarit chikni ndalo duto nyaka chieng anadag gi thuolo nikech asetemo rito chikeni bende anahul ni ruodhi chikeni ka aonge gi wich kuot ayudo mor kuom rito chikeni nikech aherogi aluoro chikeni kendo aherogi omiyo anapargi matut bedo gi adiera kuom chik nyasaye par gima ne isingori ni nitimna nikech osemiyo abedo gi geno kata kane anie chandruok singruok mari mane omiya ngima ne ohoyo chunya josunga osebutona ahinya pok alengora maweyo chikni aparo chike mane imiya chon kendo gihoyo chunya yaye ruoth nyasaye ka aneno joricho ka ketho chikni mirima pongo chunya achuogo wende kuom chikeni kamoro amora adakie apari gotieno ruoth nyasaye kendo arito chikni amor nikech arito chikeni chiwruok ni chik nyasaye ruoth nyasaye e gimoro amora adwaro asingora ni abiro rito chikeni akwayi gi chunya duto ni mondo ingwonna kaka isesingori aserango timbena mi asingora ni nyaka aluw chikeni areto mak ariwra mondo arit chikeni ogend joricho oketa diere kata kamano wiya ok nyal wil gi chikni achiew dier otieno mondo apaki nikech buche mingado ni kare e kanyakla mar ji duto tiyoni kendo orito chikeni ruoth nyasaye herani mosiko opongo piny yie ipuonja chikeni ndhadhu mar chik nyasaye iserito singruokni ruoth nyasaye mi itimona maber jatichni miya rieko mar ngado weche kare ngeyo bende mondo imiya nikech ageno mana kuom chikeni kane pok ikuma ne abayo maweyo yoreni koro amako wachni iber manade mano kaka ikecho ji yie ipuonja chikeni josunga ketho nyinga gi weche mag miriambo kata kamano arito chikeni gi chunya duto jogo onge gi rieko chikeni ema miya mor kum misekumago berna nikech okonya mondo apuonjra chikni chik mawuok e dhogi berna moloyo fedha gi dhahabu mogundho adiera mar chik nyasaye ruoth nyasaye ema ne ichueya kendo irita maber ji duto moluori nobed mamor konena nikech ageno kuom wachni ruoth nyasaye angeyo ni buche ingado ni kare kendo ne ikuma nikech jaadiera herani mosiko mondo oho chunya kaka ne isesingorina jatichni kecha mondo abed mangima nikech ahero chikni onego wi josunga kuodi nikech gidonjona kayiem nono chikeni ema abiro paro matut ji duto oluori kendo mohero chikeni mondo obi ira konya amak chikeni gi chunya duto mondo kik ayud wichkuot lemo mar resruok siso oloyo chunya ruoth nyasaye karito mondo iresa kata kamano wachni ema pod ageno wanga koro oowore kuom rango gima ne isingori pod apenjo niya inikonya karango ngat manono mana ka puga mobarore pok wiya owil gi chikeni onego arit nyaka karango ka pok ikumo joma sandago josunga ok ongeyo chikeni osekunyona bugni mondo anyumrae konya nikech ji sanda gi weche mag miriambo chikeni duto gin adier gisechiegni nega ok asejwango chikeni ngwonna nikech herani mosiko mondo arit chikeni yie kuom chik nyasaye ruoth nyasacha wachni ogurore e polo kendo nosik nyaka chieng adiera mari osiko kuom tienge duto kogurore motegno mana kaka piny osiko kama iseketee gik moko duto pod osiko nyaka chil kawuono mana nikech wachni nimar giduto gitiyoni ka dine ni ok chikni e kama morna wuokie dikoro kum mikumago osenega ok anawe chikeni ngang nikech gin ema omiyo isemiyo abedo mangima ruoth nyasaye ngati yie ikonya nimar asetemo rito chikeni joricho kiya mondo onega chikeni ema abiro paro matut angeyo ni kata mana gik mabeyo duto nigi gikogi mak mana chikni kende kende ema onge gi gikone hero chik nyasaye mano kaka ahero chikni apare odiechieng duto gi chikni seche duto omiyo abedo mariek moloyo wasika gi paro matut moloyo kata mana rieko jodongo nikech chikeni ema aparo riekona bende lach moloyo kata mana rieko jodongo nikech arito chikeni asetang ni timbe maricho duto nikech adwaro rito chikeni ok aselengora maweyo chikeni nikech iwuon ema isebedo jakonyna mano kaka chikeni mit adier gimit moloyo mor kich chikeni ema miya rieko omiyo achayo timbe duto maricho ler maa kuom chik nyasaye wachni e taya nyisa kama anyono kendo e ler menyona yo akuongora ni anarit chikeni makare mana kaka ne asingora ruoth nyasaye athagora malit ahinya omiyo miya abed mangima kaka isesingori yie gi lemona mar erokamano kendo puonja chikeni yaye ruoth nyasaye pile ngimana nie masira kata kamano pok wiya owil gi chikni joricho chikona obadho pok alengora maweyo chikeni chikeni gin mwanduna mosiko kendo gin ema gimiyo chunya mor aseketo chunya mondo arit chikeni nyaka thona kue mawuok kuom chik nyasaye amon gi joma nigi chuny ariyo ahero mana chikni e okumbana kendo e kara mapondoe singruok mari ema ageno auru kuoma un joricho mondo arit chike nyasacha miya teko kaka ne isingori mondo abed mangima bende kik iwe gima ageno kadhi mak otimore sira mondo abed gi kue eka arit chikeni pile ruoth nyasaye idagi joma otamore rito chikeni nikech wechegi opong gi miriambo kod kwinyo joricho duto ikwano ka yugi kuom mano ahero chikeni luoro aluorigo miyo denda tetni buche mingado bende miyo kihondko maka rito chik nyasaye asetimo gik makare kendo mabeyo omiyo kik ijwanga e lwet wasika singrina ni inikonya jatichni kendo kik iwe josunga thaga aserango warruok makare mane isingori ni ikelo mi koro wanga ool timna mana kaka herani mosiko obet kendo puonja chikeni jatichni kuom mano miya rieko mondo awinj tiend weche mipuonjo ruoth nyasaye e sa monego itimie gimoro nikech ji otamore winjo chikni ahero chikeni moloyo dhahabu malerie moloyo kuom mano aluwo chikeni duto yore maricho duto amongo siso mar rito chik nyasaye puonj magi lich miwuoro omiyo aritogi gi chunya duto tiend wachni koel kelo ler kendo omiyo weche donjo kata ni ngama riekone tin agamo yueyo ka siso mar winjo chikeni oloya duog ira mondo ibedna mangwon kaka itimo pile ni joma oheri kik iwe apodhi sira kaka isesingori kendo kik iwe richo hewa gola e lwet joma thira mondo abed gi thuolo mar rito chikeni ler mar wangi mondo orieny kuoma kendo opuonja chikeni pi wanga mol ka aora nikech ji ok dew rito chikeni singruok mari osetem mi onwang ni en kare miyo ahere jatichni atin kendo ok gimoro wiya ok wil gi chikeni timni makare nosiki nyaka chieng kendo chikni en adiera pile achandora malit kendo chunya parore chikeni ema kelona mor chikeni ni kare nyaka chieng omiyo miya angegi mondo abed mangima lemo mar resruok aywakni gi chunya duto ruoth nyasaye yie idwoka mondo arit chikeni adier aywakni maweyo chikeni ka arango andhokego chunya chido nikech ok girit wachni ruoth nyasaye neye kaka ahero chikeni omiyo mi mi abed mangima kaka herani mosiko obet mise mar chikni en adiera kendo chikeni miriambo kendo ajokgo chikni ema ahero apaki dibiriyo odiechieng kodiechieng nikech buche makare mingado joma ohero chikeni nigi kue mar adier kendo onge gima nyalo miyo gipodhi ruoth nyasaye ageno ni ibiro wara nikech atimo gik idwaro ee arito chikeni kendo aherogi gi chunya duto amako chikeni kod buche mingado nikech ineno gik moko duto lemo mar yudo konyruok ruoth nyasaye yie iwinj ywakna miya rieko kaka isesingori e wachni lemona otundi e nyimi mondo iresa kaka ne isingori pile anapaki nikech ipuonja chikeni anawer kapako chikeni nikech giduto gin kare pile bed kiikori mar konya nikech nikech wiya ok osewil gi chikeni zaburi lemo mar konyruok kane e chandruok ne aywak ni ruoth nyasaye mi odwoka ruoth nyasaye konya kuom jomriambo gi jomganga un jomriambo nyasaye notimnu ango nokumu machal nadi nokumu mana kichielou gi aserni mabitho mag jolweny kata kiwangou gi mach moowore haa dak e kindu rach mana ka dak e piny meshek kata ka dak e kind jokedar asedak aminga mokadho gi joma ok wapodhi kendo kik onur mi nindo tere adier jarit israel ok nur kendo nindo ok tere ruoth nyasaye biro teloni en e bathi korachwich ka oriti chieng ok nochami godiechieng kendo due ok nochar wangi gotieno ruoth nyasaye biro riti e masiche duto adier obiro riti maber obiro riti kiwuok kendo kiduogo pile kendo nyaka chieng zaburi lemo mikwayogo nyasaye mondo okel kue jerusalem ne abedo mamor kane ji owachona niya wadhiuru e od ruoth nyasaye koro eri wachung e dhorangeyene yaye jerusalem jerusalem noger mondo obed dala ji chokoree gi kue kaachiel dhout israel biroe ee joruoth nyasaye biroe mondo ogone erokamano kaka nochikogi kanyo ema nitie ut ngado bura ruoth nyakwar daudi ngadoe bura ni joge lemuru mondo jerusalem obed gi kue kuwacho niya joma oheri jerusalem mondo odhi nyime maber kue onego obed e ohinga mari kendo dongruok maber bende obed e ut jodongi awacho e nying owetena gi osiepena niya jerusalem kue obed kodi alemo ni mondo idhi nyime maber nikech duong mar od ruoth nyasachwa zaburi lemo mikwayogo nyasaye mondo okech ji ruoth nyasaye ema arangi katingo wanga e polo kuma kom duongni nitie kaka jatich rango ruodhe kendo kaka jatich ot manyako rango wuon ot motiyone e kaka wan bende wasiko kwarangi nyaka chop ikechwa ruoth nyasachwa kechwa ruoth nyasaye yie ikechwa nikech waseyudo ayany marach ka jomwandu josunga jarowa kuom kinde malach zaburi wer mipakogo nyasaye kuom reso joge ka dine bed ni ruoth nyasaye ok jakorwa ango dine otimorenwa joisrael mondo owach niya ka dine bed ni ruoth nyasaye ok jakorwa e kinde mane wasikwa monjowa dine gimwonyowa kwangima ka mirima mager ohewogi kodwa ohula dine oywerowa mabor chutho pi dine oimowa ee dine wanimo e pi mabubni malich wapakuru ruoth nyasaye ok oseyie mondo wasikwa otiekwa wasetony mana ka winyo kare giwegi ditim richo ruoth nyasaye tim maber ni joma kare kendo modimbore chieng mikumoe joricho kum joma timbegi obam bende israel mondo obed gi kue zaburi lemo mipakogo nyasaye kuom dwoko joge e pinygi kane ruoth nyasaye odwokowa sayun ne chalonwa mana lek mano kaka ne wanyiero kendo wawer gi mor bange ogendini mamoko nowuoyo kuomwa niya ruoth nyasaye osetimonigi gik madongo miwuoro adier nyasaye notimonwa gik madongo miwuoro kendo mano kaka ne wabedo mamor ruoth nyasaye chak idwokwa kendo mana kaka koth mikelo dwoko pi e aora mosedwono joma chuoyo ka ywak biro kayo cham gi ilo adier joma ywak kotingo kodhi biro dok e miechgi gi cham ka mor zaburi ber mana kuom nyasaye ka ok ruoth nyasaye ema ogero ot tich gedo odhi kanono kendo ka ok en ema orito dala tich jorito ok nyal gimoro gueth miwuoro yawuowi ngato onywolo ka pod tin chalo gi aserni ngato otingo e lwete ngat man gi aserni mangeny kamago en jahawi ok noloye ka oromo gi wasike e dhoranga dala zaburi gueth miguedhogo olemo mangeny e dalani kendo e sa yawuoti olworo mesa ka chiemo ginichal gi yiend zeituni maloth adier ngat moluoro ruoth nyasaye noguedh mana kamano onego ruoth nyasaye guedhi gie sayun e kinde duto mag ngimani onego idag aminga mondo ine nyikwayi israel mondo obed gi kue zaburi lemo mikwayogo mondo olo wasik israel israel hul kaka wasiki osesandi malit chakre tinni israel wasika osesanda malit wigi okuot kendo dwokgi chien onego gichal gi lum matwi e tat ot two kapok ongadi onge ngama choke kata matueye wiye wiye kamano ji makadho ok nyal wachonigi niya waguedhou e nying ruoth nyasaye kata joisrael genuru kuom ruoth nyasaye nikech herane osiko kendo pile oikore ahinya mar reso ji math tito obiro waro joge israel kuom richogi duto zaburi geno kuom nyasaye kaka nyathi geno kuom min ruoth nyasaye aseweyo ngayi kendo abet mabor gi wang teko ok adwar chandora gi gik madongo kata gi weche matek modhiera ngeyo abolora kendo chunya nigi kue kaka nyathi ling mo e bad min mare e kaka chunya bende ling mo e iya un joisrael genuru kuom ruoth nyasaye pile kendo nyaka chieng zaburi lemo mikwayogo nyasaye mondo oguedh hekalu ruoth nyasaye kik wiyi wil gi daudi parie kaka nothagore malit kendo kaka nosingoreni ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto nyasach israel kowacho niya ok anadhi dala kendo ok anadhi nindo bende ok anayue kendo nindo ok notera nyaka chop ayud kar dak ni ruoth nyasaye nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto kendo nyasach israel wnda ne wawinjo ni sandug muma ni efrata mi ne wayude e paw jaar eka ne wawacho niya wadhiuru kar dak mar nyasaye mondo walem e nyim kom duongne ruoth nyasaye bi idonj kar yueyoni kaachiel gi sandug muma en ranyisi mar tekoni onego jodolo bed joma kare kendo jogi duto onego ogo mahu gi mor ne ihero daudi jatichni omiyo kik ilok ngeyi ni ruoth miseyiero sam wnda zab joote ne ikuongorine matek ahinya kendo ok nilokri ne iwachone niya abiro keto wuodi moro ruoth kendo enorit piny bangi ka yawuoti orito singruokna kendo ka gimako chikena abiro miyogi yawuotgi bende nobed e kom duongni tienge duto ruoth nyasaye notim kamano nikech oseyiero sayun kodwaro ni mondo kar dakne obed kanyo nowacho niya kanyo ema nobed kar yueyona nyaka chieng adier
