kuonde mongadogo aora arnon ginichal mana nyithi winy morwenyo huyo koni gi koni giniwach niya konywauru gi tekou duto kendo tipou mondo ogengnwa chieng makech mondo ochalnwa ka gima en otieno panduru jowa oseriembi kendo kik uyie mondo omak joma oringo lweny weuru mondo jomoab onge mier oyud kar konyruok kuomu kendo pandgiuru mondo kik joyeko yudgi ka thak mithagogo ji oserumo kendo jokeyo osetieko tijgi mi jogo duto mathiro ji oa e piny kom loch nogur kuom ngwono mar nyasaye kendo jangad bura mar adier nyakwar daudi ema nobed e komno enobed ngat madwaro mana adiera kendo timo gik makare mak odeko wasewinjo humb jomoab kaka gin josunga adier wasewinjo kaka gingare malich kendo kaka wechegi opong gi miriambo lilo kuom mano jomoab biro ywak adier gibiro ywak malit giniywag olemb mzabibu motwo mag kirhareseth osekethore chuth kendo giniywag puothe mag heshbon mowe kod mzabibu mosener mag sigma yande divachgi mero jotend ogendini ne gigawore nyaka jazer mi gitundo e thim kod nam kuom mano abiro ywago mzabibu mag sigma mana kaka aywago jezer un joheshbon kod joeleale pi wanga biro lwokou nimar mahu mar lweny ema biro winjore e puotheu mag olembe monyak maber mor kod ilo norum chuth e puotheu mabeyo kendo onge wer nower e puotheu mag olembe bende onge ngama nogo koko gi mor ok unuchak ubi mzabibu kuonde bicho kendo mahu mag mor mugoyo e ndalo keyo biro rumo kuom mano chunya ywago jomoab gi jokirhereseth mana ka ngama goyo thum e liel kata ka jomoab chandore kadhi e hembko manie wi gode mondo otim misengni kendo kata ka gidonjo e hekalu margi mondo gilem onge gima giniyudi mago e weche mane ruoth nyasaye owacho kuom jomoab chon koro owacho niya bang higni adek ok okadho ngang duong mar moab norum kendo ji manok marichoricho ema notony kuom joge mangenygo isaya wach mokor kuom damaski e wach mane nyasaye onyiso e fweny kuom damaski damaski biro kethore chuth mi ute mukre kendo dhurre pidhe pidhe ji ok nodag e mier mage nyaka chieng kendo miergo nodong mana kuonde jamni kwayoe mo onge gima thaggi piny israel ok nochak oobed gi dala mochiel motegno bende damaski ok nochak obed gi ruoth kendo joaram manok modong noneg duto nimar duonggi nolal nono mana kaka duong mar israel biro lal mago e weche mag ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto bura ibiro ngado ni israel e ndalogo duong mar israel nomich matin mana ka ngat tuo ochamo dende kendo chue yande ochuego olal nono kata ka tiang cham moseka adier piny israel nojwang mana ka puothe cham moseka e holo rafaim kendo johulo osehuloe joge manok kende ema nodong mana kaka olembe manok kende ema dong e yath kosepon olembe ariyo kata adek nyalo dong e bede yath man malo midimidi angwen kata abich nyalo dong e bedene moyarore gi piny mago e weche ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto e ndalogo ji nopar nyasaye jachuechgi kendo ginigen kuom ngama ler mar israel ok ginichak giket genogi kuom kendemagliswa lwetgi ema oloso kata kuom gimoro amora gin giwegi ema giseloso bed ni en sirni milamo kata kende mag ubani e ndalogo miechu mochiel motegno nodong nono mi kethre mana ka miech johivi gi joamor mane giweyo ka joisrael obiro mano notimre nimar wiu ne owil gi nyasaye mane oresou adier ne ok uparo lwanda en kar konyruoku emomiyo kata ka upidho cham mabeyo mondo umigo nyisecheu manono duong bende kata obedo ni umiyo chamgo twi mana chieng upidhogieno mi kinyne githiew unuka mana chandruok kod rem ok rum winjuru mano e koko mar ogendini mangeny gimor mana ka nam wuo chikuru itu donge uwinjo kaka ogendini mwomore gimwomore mana ka apaka madongo nyasaye biro kwerogi mi giring gidhi mabor mana ka mihudhi mipiedho e gode kendo yamo tero kata ka buru kalausi keyo kihondko nomak joisrael godhiambo gokinyi wasikgi norum pep mano e pok mowinjore gi joma yakowa isaya wach mokor kuom ethiopia nitie piny moro loka aora mag ethiopia yiedhi ngenyie pinyno oro joote kaluwo aora nael gi yiedhi mohondhi gi odundu un joote jongwech doguru ir jou gin ji maboyo kendo dendgi poth ji oluoro kuonde duto gin ji marateke moloyo ogendini mamoko kendo pinygi aore opogo opogo un ji duto modak e piny unune koting bandeche lweny malo ewi gode kendo unuwinj ka tung ywak ruoth nyasaye nosewachona kama abiro rango piny gie polo kar dakna ka ayueyo mo mana kaka piny kue mo ka chieng liet kata ka tho omoko gokinyi e ndalo keyo ananeg joma dwaro monjou ka pok gichopo mana ka ngama ngado bede mzabibu gi ratong e kinde keyo podi mzabibu osemoyo kendo olembgi chiegni chiek ringregi duto nodong ni winy mae gode mondo ocham e ndako oro kendo ni ondiegi mondo ocham e ndalo chwiri e ndalogo ogandano noter chiwo e nyim ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto gin ji maboyo dendgi poth ji oluoro kuonde duto gin ji marateke maloyo ogendini mamoko kendo pinygi aore opogo opogo ginikel chiwogo e got sayun kama ji lamoe ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto isaya wach mokor kuom misri wach mane nyasaye onyiso fweny kuom misri e neuru kaka ruoth nyasaye biro piyopiyo e boche polo obiro e piny misri emomiyo nyiseche manono mag misri kirni owacho niya abiro thuwo jomisri e kindgi giwegi mi ngato ka ngato gore gi wadgi dala ka dala noked gi dala machielo kendo gweng ka gweng bende noked gi wadgi chuny jomisri nonyosre kendo anaketh rieko gingado mi ginipenj nyiseche manono mondo onyisgi wach bende ginidhi ir ajuoke mopogore opogore anaket piny misri e lwet jatelo mager adier ruoth makwiny ema notigi ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ema awacho kamano aora nael noduon mi two kendo kuonde pi luwo nodum marach aore mamoko mag misri nodwon mi two kendo odundu gi se bende nowang lege duto man aora nael kod gik mopidhi e bathe duto yamo nolalgo nono jolupo duto moywagi adier jogo duto malupo gi olowo e aora nael kaachiel gi mago machiko tonde kuno chunygi nonyosre joma chueyo nengni gi tworo kata gi pamba none marach nikech gigo ok nochieg maber ee jotuengo mag misri nodhier nono kendo jotich duto nobed gi chuny malit mano kaka ufuwo un jotelo mag zoan adier unyalo bedo jongad rieko mag farao mabeyo moloyo omiyo ere kaka unyalo wacho ni farao niya wan yawuot joma riek nyikwa ruodhi machon koro farao ere jogi mariek mondo obi opuonji kendo omi inge gima ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto osechano timo e misri jotend zoan ofuwo adier kendo jodong nof paro e chunygi giwegi ni giriek ok giriek kamano jotend dhout misri osewito jogi ruoth nyasaye osemiyogi chuny mar fuwo emomiyo rieko duto gingado obam kendo gimiyo jomisri kier e gik moko duto gitimo mana kaka ngat momer kier e ngokne jomisri ok nodhi nyime maber e gimoro amora gitimo bed ni jatelo ema time kata ngama chal nade ema time e ndalogo jomisri nobed manyap ka mon ginibed maluor kendo ginikirni ka ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto orieyo lwete kuomgi mondo okumgi piny juda nolokre masira ni jomisri nyinge kende ka jomisri owinjo nogogi gi kihondko nikech gik ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto osechano timonigi e ndalog noyud ka joma odak e mier abich mag misri wuoyo gi dho hibrania ka kuongore ni noluw ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto dala achiel kuomgi noluong ni dala wangchieng e kindego nobedie kendomarmisango mar ruoth nyasaye e dier misri kod siro maler mochung ni ruoth nyasaye e tong piny misri sirono nochung kanyo kaka ranyisi kendo kaka rapar ni ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto e misri mondo ka giywakne e kinde wasikgi thirogi oornigi jawar mondo okonygi kendo oresgi ruoth nyasaye noyangre ni jomisri mondo ongeye kendo chiengno giniyie kuome mi ginitimne misango mar cham kod misengni mamoko bende ginikuongre mi gichop kuongruokgigo ruoth nyasaye nogo jomisri kata kamano enochanggi mana e kinde ogoyogieno pile ka giduogo ire enowinj kwayogi mi ochanggi e kindego ndara maduong nobedie moa misri kadhi asuria joasuria nobi misri kendo jomisri bende nodhi asuria kamano jomisri gi joasuria nolam nyasaye kaachiel e ndalogo duong mar israel nobed maromre gi duong mar misri kod mar asuria kendo pinje adekgo nobed gueth e dier piny ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto noguedhgi ka wacho kama oguedh jomisri joga kendo oguedh joasuria chuechna bende oguedh joisrael gin mwanduna awuon isaya okor wach ni asuria biro loyo misri gi ethiopia sargon ruodh asuria ne ooro jatend lweny mare ashdod mi okawo dalano bang lweny mager e kindeno ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni isaya wuod amoz niya gony pien gugru manie nungonino kendo ilony wuocheni isaya notimo kamano mowuotho duk gi tiende nono bange ruoth nyasaye nowacho niya kaka isaya osewuotho duk kendo gi tiende nono kuom higni adek kobedo ranyisi misieomogo misri kod ethiopia e kaka ruodh asuria nosemb jomisri kod joethiopia osemako duto joma dongo kaachiel gi nyithindo giniwuoth duge gi tiendegi nono ka siandagi neno mi misri noyud wichkuot ji duto nogore nyangenga ka geno gigenogo kuom joethiopia kendo sunga gisungorego ni jomisri dikonygi nolal nono chiengno joma odak donam nowach niya neuru gima osetimore ni joma ne wageno kuomgi mi waringo irgi mondo oreswa kuom ruodh asuria koro wan dwatony nadi isaya wach mokor kuom babulon wach mane nyasaye onyiso e fweny kuom thimm man nam e e fweny malichno nanenoe kalausi mager kaa e thim man yo milambo en piny ji oluoro ne aneno kaka dala mandhogo ji ondhogi ne awinjo ka nyasaye jiwo joelam kod jomedia ni mondo odhi omonj babulon kendo olwore mondo sungane orum kane aneno fwenyno ne apuodora ka rem rama malit mana ka dhako muoch kayo gik mane aneno kendo awinjo ne ogoya gi kibaji mi adhier nono dhoga nomoko kendo natetni ok anyal konyo ne asegeno ni abiro yueyo godhiambo ka chieng opodho kindeno nolokorena mana masira bende naneno ka chiemo oseket piny mi ochan kombe kendo ka jatend jobabulon chiemo kendo metho e sano ne gipo ka oluonggi mondo gimanre gi gigi mag lweny ruoth nyasaye nowachona kama ket jangicho mondo ohul gik oneno ka oneno geche lweny ka biro farese ariyo ariyo ywayo kaachiel gi joma oidho kenje kod ngamia mondo orang ane maber gima timore bange jangicho nokok niya jaduong asebet ka achung kar ngicho odiechieng gotieno duto pile koro echa aneno joidh farese ka biro kaachiel gi geche lweny farese ariyo ariyo ywayo eka nawinjo dwoko niya babulon osepodho osepodho kendo nyisechene manono osemuki moriere piny yaye jothurwa joisrael osenyon ka kal minyono kidino asenyisou gik ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto nyasach israel owachona wach mokor kuom duma e wach mane nyasaye oyiso e fweny kuom duma ne awinjo ngato ka luonga seir ne openjo niya jangicho koro en sa adi mar otieno ne adwoko niya piny chiegni ru obiro yuso kendo kudwaro penjo kendo uduog ira wach mane okor kuom joarabu e wach mane nyasaye onyiso e fweny kuom joarabu un jodedan bworo e thim gi joarabu kod un joma odak tema rwakuru joma oseringo kumiyo chiemoo gi pi nikech giseringo lweny mager minegoe ji gi ligangla kod asere mabith ruoth nyasaye osewacho niya kapok higa achiel orumo ngang duong duto mar joarabu kedar notieki jo asere marateke maggi manok kende ema nodong nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel ema owacho kamano isaya wach mokor kuom holo mar hinom wach mane nyasaye onyiso kuom holo mar hinom e un jojerusalem nyisauru gima omiyo uduto uidho ewi udi yaye dala ji goyoe mahu kendo koko opongo bende ok ginitho e lweny jotendu mag lweny duto noringi kendo nomaki kapok oywayo atungegi kata mana jou marateke bende noring kuma bor mano emomiyo awacho niya weuru ngiya weuru aweya aywag malit kik utem kueyo chunya nikech jowa oserumo aywak nikech ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto oseketo chieng lweny gi koko kod masira nomuk ohinga e holo mar fweny kendo ji nokogi ewi gode kadwaro kony joelam biro kawo aserni maggi kendo joaram biro tueyo farese e gechegi mag lweny jokir bende nokaw kuodigi geche lweny nopong holni mau mabeyo kendo joidh farese noried ni lweny e dhorangeyeu kamano teko mar juda norum chiengno unubed gi chir nikech giu mag lweny mokan e ot miluongo ni od bungu bende unurang ohinga mar dala daudi mondo ulos kuondene mangeny momukore unuchik pi soko mamwalo mondo ochokre kendo unukwan ut jerusalem mi unumuk moko mondo ulosgo ohinga obed motegno bende unukuny yawo e kind ohinga oko kod ohinga maiye mondo pi soko machon odonjie kata kamano ok nupar jachuech gik moko duto kata dewo jal mane oseloso gigo duto chon ok nudew chiengno ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto noluongu mondo uywagi kendo udengi kendo mondo uliel wiu kendo urwak piende gugru kar timo kamano unutug atuga kumetho kendo kuyango dhok gi rombe uchamo ka uwacho niya wachiemuru kendo wamethuru nikech kiny wanatho ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto osebirona e fweny mi awinjo ka okuongore ni richou ok nopwodhi nyaka chop thou mano e wach ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto okor ni eliakim biro kawo kar shebna bange ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto nowachona niya dhiyo ir jakeno nyinge shebna jarit od ruoth mondo ipenje kama ere gima itimo ka koso ere wadu man ka momiyo isekunyo bur mibiro yikie kae chutho ango momiyo ikunyo bur malo e lwanda mondo obed liel ringri biro yueyoe ruoth nyasaye biro tengi oko mana ka ngama tengo nyuogo oko e nanga eka eno gwasi motueyi matek kendo obolus e piny malach mana ka mpira mowit e pap kendo gecheni mag lweny mayande isungorigo nosik mana kuno ruoth nyasaye wachoni niya anagoli e tiji mi adwoki e piny chiengno analuong jatichna eliakim wuod hilkia mondo okaw kari anarwake gi lawi mar duong mi asidhne kilembani kendo enobed wuon jojerusalem gi jojuda anamiye rayaw mar od daudi kendo gima oyawo onge ngama nolor bende gima oloro onge ngama noyaw enobed jatelo nomi joodgi yud duong kendo anagure matek mana ka musmal kuome ema joodgi duto te koda ka modhier nobed kayudoe konyruok mana kaka gik mangeny mopogore opogore liero kongaw e musmal ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto amedo wachoo ni chiengno musmal mane ogur motegnono nopudh oko adier nongadee mi olwar kendo gik moko duto mayande olier kuome nokethi ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano isaya wach mokor kuom turo gi sidon wach mane nyasaye onyiso e fweny kuom turo ema un yiedhi madongo mag turo madhi tarshish ywaguru nikech dhowath mugowoe ibiro kethi chuth ubiro winjo wachni e yo kurawo e chula saiprus un joma odak e dho nam linguru thi ywaguru un joohala mag sidon jotendgi ngado nembe mondo oom cham shihor kendo yudo ohala kuom tingo mwandu mag ogendini dala mar sidon en dhowath mochiel motegno noywagi ka wiye okuot ka wacho niya tinde ok awinj rem mar muoch nyithindo bende ok anywol aonge gi nyithindo yawuowi kata nyiri apidho ka jomisri owinjo masira biro mako turo ginichandre malit mi giwach niya yaye un joma odak e dhonam ywaguru kendo idhuru yiedhi udhi tarshish yande jou dhi e pinje mamoko maboyo mondo oyud kuonde dak koro dalau mane mor kendo humbe olak chon odong mana gunda en nga mosechano kelo masira kuom turo dala pinje moko nie bwoye kendo joohala mage gin joma ogen e piny ngima ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ema osechano kelo masirano kendo okel achaya kuom ji duto moluor ahinya e piny kuom mano pururu lowo un jotarshish nikech ohandu biro rumo ruoth nyasaye oserieyo bade e nam mondo olok loch ruodhi bende osegoolo chik mondo omuk miech kanaan mochiel motegno osewacho niya yaye un josidon dala mothir ok unuchak uubed mamor kata ka ungado nam mudhi saiprus kuno bende ok unuyudie yueyo ranguru uneye piny jobabulon jobabulon ema nolok turo thim ondiegi dakie joasuria ok ema noloke ginidhur lowo mondo ginyon ka giidho ohingane kendo ginimuk ut ruodhi mi giketh dalano chuth ywaguru un yiedhi madongo madhi tarshish nikechh dhowath mugowoe ibiro kethi chakre chiengno wich nowil gi turo kuom higni piero abiriyo maromre gi hik ruoth achiel ka higni piero abiriyogo oserumo turo nochandre ka dhako jachode miwero niya dhako jachode mojwang kaw thumi iwuothgo e dala koni gi koni kigwelo puch mamit kendo kiwero wendi duto mondo chwo ochak opari bang higni piero abiriyo ruoth nyasaye nokech turo mi resi kata kamano dalano nodog e tije machon mi oyud ohala kuom tiyo ni ogendini duto mae piny ngima mana kaka dhako jachode yudo ohala kuom dwanyruok gi chwo ohala moyudo e tijeno nochiw ni ruoth nyasaye ok nokunggi bende ok nokangi nongiew kodgi chiemo mathoth kod lewni mabeyo ni jodolo mag ruoth nyasaye isaya okor wach ni nyasaye biro kumo piny winjuru ruoth nyasaye biro tengo piny mi dong nono obiro bare mi oloke ataro kendo oke joma odakie chiengno jadolo nobed maromre gi ji ajia kendo misumba nobed maromre gi ruodhe jahon gik moko bende nobed maromre gi jangiewo kendo jahol ji nobed maromre gi ngama holo piny nodong nono haa kendo nokethre chuth nikech ruoth nyasaye ema osewacho kamano piny notwo kendo gik mantie noner adier piny duto noner kendo notwo koda ka kuonde motingore duto ji modak e piny osedwanyo piny nikech gidagi rito chike mi giketho muma mochwere mano emomiyo kuong biro mwonyo piny kendo joma odakie none chandruok nikech richogi bende ginilal nono mak mana ji manok kende ema nodong yiend mzabibu noner mi divai mobi manyien nobed matin joma mor bende chunygi nobed malit nyiduonge noling thi bende mahu joma mor goyo norum kendo thumbe ok noywagi onge ngama nochak omadh divai ka wer kendo kongo nobed marach ni jamath dala manono nokethre chuth kendo ot ka ot nolor mondo joyeko kik donjie ji noywagre e wangyore nikech divai nobed maonge tuke duto bende norum kendo mor nobed maonge e piny dalano nodong mana gunda kendo dhorangach notur matindotindo mano e gima biro timore e piny ngima kendo ni oganda ka oganda ji manok kende ema nodong mana kaka olemo manok ema dong e yadh zeituni moyiengi kata e yadh mzabibu mihulo bang keyo ji biro ywak matek yo podho chieng ka gikok niya mano kaka duong mar ruoth nyasaye ngongo kuom mano ji mondo omi ruoth nyasaye duong e pinje man yo wuok chieng kendo nying ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel opaki e dhonembe gi chulni man yo podho chieng wasewinjo ka giwer e tung piny ka tung piny niya mano kaka ngama kare ber chunya pod lit ahinya nimar ji pod osiko ka timo atima richo kendo ndhogruok opongo piny yaye un joma odak e piny masira gi bur kod obadho ema ochomou ka uringo masira ununyumru e bur kendo ka utony mak unyumoru e bur obadho nomaku nikech masira biro lwar kuomu koa e polo kendo piny duto noyiengni marach piny nobarre mi gik moko duto lal nono adier piny notagre mana ka ngat momer kendo noukni mana ka kiru yamo yiengo nopodhi ok nochak ochung kendo nimar richo ji ohinge gi pek chiengno ruoth nyasaye nongad bura mi malaika mae polo nokum e polo kendo ruodhi mae piny nokum e piny enochokgi mana ka joma omaki mi ketgi e od tuech nyaka chop yalgi kendo kumgi due norieny matiptip kendo wangchieng bende noimre nikech ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto nogur lochne e got sayun man jerusalem mi duongne maler norieny e nyim jodonge isaya wer mipakogo ngwono mar nyasaye ruoth nyasaye e nyasacha anating nyingi malo kendo anapaki nikech honni mane ichano chon isetimo gi adiera iseketho mier mi udi momukore odhurore pidhe pidhe adier iseloko mier mochiel motegno pidhe mag kite mi udi mabeyo mag jopinje mamoko osekethore chuth kendo ok nochak oger mano emomiyo oganda makwiny miyi luor adier mier mag ogendini mager oluori nikech isebedo kar konyruok ni ngat modhier machandore ee e kar bwogo koth kendo e tipo gengo chieng e ndalo joma ger monjowa ka koth machwe maduong e ndalo chiri kata ka chieng marieny mager e ndalo oro ema itieko koko mar wasikwa mager mana kaka boche polo gengo liet mar chieng mi wer wasikwago chayowago lal nono kamano ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto biro loso sawo mamit ni ji duto ewi got sayun enobed sawo mar divai mochiek chuth kendo modhing maber kod chiemo mamit motimo mo ewi godni ema ruoth nyasaye nogolie kanik moumo wang ogendini duto enotiek tho nyaka chieng bange enoywe pi wang ngato ka ngato kendo nogol achaye man kuom joge e piny duto ruoth nyasaye ema owacho kamano chiengno ji nowach niya e nyasachwa waserito mondo oreswa adier e ruoth nyasachwa wageno kuome omiyo wabeduru mamor kendo moil nikech osewarowa kendo nikech lwete nobed ewi godni mondo okonywa jomoab nonyon gi tiende mana kaka dhok nyono tiang e kul kanyo ema jomoab norieye bedegi mana kaka ngama goyo abal rieyo bedene ka kwang nyasaye notiek sungagi kaachiel gi gimoro amora lwetgi oseloso ruoth nyasaye nomuk ohinga margi marabora gigengorego mi ruombre piny e buru isaya wer migenogo kony mar ruoth nyasaye wer nower e piny juda chiengno e wan gi dala mochiel motegno kendo resruok ruoth nyasaye osekelonwa ema obedo ohinga mwagengorego yawuru dhorangeye mondo oganda moyie kuom nyasaye odonji joma parogi osiko kuomi nyasaye irito gi kue gin gi kue nikech gigeno kuomi genuru kuom ruoth nyasaye nyaka chieng nikech ruoth nyasaye owuon en lwanda mosiko joma ne odak e dala motingore osedwoko piny kendo osemuko dalagi mi orwombore piny e buru mondo joma ithiro kendo jochan onyone gi tiendgi yor ngat makare oriere tir nikech ema iloso ni joma longo yo onego giluw wan bende waluwo yo mondiki e chikeni kwageni ruoth nyasaye gima chunywa dwaro moloyo en ni mondo nyingi oyud duong otieno duto chunya dwari adier amanyi ka aketo chunya nikech ka ibiro e piny mingado bura eka joma odakie puonjore tim makare jaricho kata da dhial manade pod ok onyal puonjore tim makare omedo ameda timo richo e piny adiera nitie ka ok odew duong mar ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye iselocho joricho ok ne mano gineye hera matut miherogo jogi mondo wigi okuodi kendo mach iseiko ni wasiki otiekgi ruoth nyasaye inimiwa kue nikech gik moko duto wasetimo ema itimonwa ruoth nyasachwa ruodhi moko ok osebedo ka ritowa koro kendi ema walami joma otho ok nochak obed mangima adier joma osenindo e liel ok nochak ochier mano emomiyo isekumoo ruodhigo mi itieko kendo imiyo wich owil kodgi ruoth nyasaye inimed ogandawa ee inimede kiyaro tong pinywa mondo nyingi oyud duong ne wamanyi ruoth nyasaye ka wan e chandruok kendo kane ikumowa ne walami mo kaka dhako winjo rem kendo ywak ka muoch kayo e kaka wachalo ka wan e nyimi ruoth nyasaye wasebedo kwanegore gi tich onge gima wasetimo mana ka dhako mosebedo ka muoch kayo onywolo mana yamo kata obedo ni wasechandore kamano ok wasekelo resruok ni pinywa jogi duto mosetho nochak obed mangima adier ringregi nochier kendo joma onindo e lowo biro chier mi kog gi mor nimar tekoni biro lor kuomgi mana ka tho moko e lum mi piny nogol joma notho chon oko un joga donjuru e uteu mi ulor dhoudi mondo upond matin mi mirimb ruoth nyasaye kadhi nikech ruoth nyasaye biro biro koa kar dakne mondo okum joma odak e piny nikech richogi piny noel remo mosechuer kuome kendo ok nopand joma osenegi isaya okor wach ni nores joisrael mi chokgi kanyakla chiengno ruoth nyasaye nokaw liganglane mabith kendo motegno mi oneggo levayathan kod thuol malich kendo manudore modak e nam chiengno wer nower ema israel e puodho maber mar mzabibu ruoth nyasaye e jaritne kendo akelone pi pile mondo kik pot mzabibu lwar arite gotienoo kendo godiechieng ok onyagna olemo anyalo losogo divai omiyo ochalo mana gi puodho kudho gi pedo ema opongo kuom mano abiro monje mi awange pep mak mana ka joisrael oringo kuoma kaka kar konyruokgi mi gitimo koda winjruok adier onego gitim koda winjruok e ndalo mabiro nyikwa jakobo nogurre motegno ee joisrael nobed ka yath dongo kendo thiewo nyaka nyag olemo mi pong piny ngima bende nyasaye osekumo joisrael matek kaka nokumo joma nosesandogi koso bende osenego joisrael matek kaka nonego wasigu mane onegogi ooyo ose mana riembogi gidhi e piny mabor ka gima yamo mager moa yo wuok chieng ema oterogi kapok richo mag joisrael opwodhi nyaka giketh kendegi mag liswa mi gireg kitegi olokre buru kendo gingad oko yien gi sirni duto milamo dala ochiel motegno nodong gunda enobed dala mojwang maonge ngama odakie kendo nolokre thim jamni nokwa kuno ka chamo bede yien bende mon mamoto nojak bede yien motwo ochwakgo mach mano notimre nikech ogandano onge gi rieko omiyo jachuechgi ok nokechgi adier ngama nochueyogi ok nongwonnigi chiengno ruoth nyasaye nochoku un joisrael achiel achiel chakre aora yufrate nyaka aora nael ka gima ookwanyo olemb yath moyiengi chiengno tung maduong noywagi mi joma olal e piny asuria nobi kaachiel gi joma noter misri e tuech mi ginilam ruoth nyasaye e got maler man jerusalem isaya siem mosiemgo joisrael yaye inine malit dala samaria manie holo momew jomer mag israel sungorego ka osimbgi duongni biro rumo mana ka maua moner dala joge lwokore gi kongo winjuru ruoth nyasaye biro kelo ngat maratego moseyiero mondo oketh pinyu obiro biro mana ka yamb koth makelo pe maketho piny kata mana ka pi ohula mabubni kaywoyo gik moko bange osimbo jomer mag israel sungoregono nonyon piny mi duongne biro rumo ka maua moner kata ka olemo mokwongo chiek ngato angata moneno pono chamo ka rikni chiengno ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ema nobed osimbo maber mar duong ni joge manok modong enomi jongad bura mau bed gi chuny mar ngado bura gi adiera kendo enomi jolwenju kedo matek gi wasigu e dhorangeyeu bed gi chir mathoth siem kod singruok momus jojerusalem koro jotend jerusalem duto bende gin jomer jodolo mage kod jonabine mer kendo kwang nikech kongo makech omiyo gitimo gik mofuwo gitagore ataga ka gineno fweny kata ka gingado bura gingok e mesni kendo kuonde duto gintie onywandore giwacho niya koro ere ngama janabi paro ni biro puonjo koso ere joma biro winjo tiend gima opuonjo mit koparo ni wan nyithindo tinde eka oweyo dhoth onwoyonwa gik mowacho ndalo mangeny kodhum gi weche onge tiendgi chutho kamano e kaka ruoth nyasaye biro loso kodgi kowuoyo gi dhok moro nono ok ginyal winjo chon nyasaye nowachonigi niya achiwonu yueyo maradier kendo joma ool mondo oyue adier mano e yueyo ne gidagi winjo mano omiyo ruoth nyasaye nochak owuo kodgi kadhum gi weche onge tiendgi ka giwinjo wechego ginichwanyre mi gipodh kendo gitur ginimok e obadho mi makgi kendo tergi e tuech kuom mano chikuru itu un josunga jotend jojerusalem uwacho niya wasetimo winjruok gi tho adier wasetimo singruok gi piny joma otho omiyo ka ohula miwachono biro ok obi ywoyowa nikech waseloso miriambo ka kar konyruokwa kendo wuondruok e okumba wagengorego koro ruoth nyasaye wacho kama winjuru abiro keto kidi mar mise e sayun mondikie ni ngama oyie ok norikni en kidi motegno moyier nengone tek momako kor ot anami adiera bed rapim kendo anami tim makare bed tol mipimogo ot kigero kodh pe biro ywero miriambo ugengorugo kendo pi ohula biro mwomo kar konyruoku mi winjruok mane utimo gi tho kethre kendo singruok mane utimo gi piny joma otho rum pi mabubni noywo gik moko mi unuchal gi piny ohula omwomo pile pile ohula nobi mi yweru adier noywou okinyi kokinyi kendo odiechieng gotieno kuwinjo wachni unukirni nimar unubed e thagruok mana ka ngama onindo e kitanda machiek ok nyal riere tir kendo baranget oumorego tin ok nyal ume maber ruoth nyasaye biro malo gi mirima kaka ne oa malo e got perazim kendo kaka ne otimo e holo mar gibeon mondo oti tije magalagala osechano timo ji ok par ni onyalo timo koro weuru sunga nono ibiro tueu gi ratego motegno nimar asewinjo ka ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto golo chik mondo oketh piny duto chikuru itu mondo uwinj wechena uparo ni ngato nyalo siko ka puro apura puodho ok chwowe kodhi koso onyalo buso abusa nyalandra ok opidh gimoro donge ka osetieko buso ochuoyo kothe mopogore opogore moro ka moro gi kare mowinjore kode ongeyo gima onego otim nikech nyasaye ema puonje kendo nyise yo maber monego otimee cham duto ok diem machalre moko idino gi radin moko itengo gi luth ngano en cham mayom omiyo ok dine matek nimar dipo ka onginyore matindotindo chutho ok dine nyalandra kata ka obedo ni iywayo gari kuome mondo tiende gari odine ok tim kamanoo aminga nimar dipo ka orege mayom wachno bende oa kuom nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ngado rieko mabeyo kendo tekone duong isaya jerusalem gi wasike yaye inine malit jerusalem dala mane daudi obworoe kuom higa achiel kata higni ariyo sewni mitimo higa ka higa pod timore bange anakelni masira mi ywagruok gi nduru nobedie kendo inichal gi kendomarmisango remo ochuerie anabed jasiki mi agoni agenga nadwoki piny mi iwuo mana gie lowo kendo wecheni nowuog mana e buru duondi nochal gi dwond ngat jajuogi dwonde pilore ka wuok piny oganda maduong kedo kodi nochal gi buru adier oganda magerno nochal gi mihudhi yamo tero piyopiyo nono ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto biro biro mondo okonyi polo nomor kendo piny noyiengni gi koko maduong kodh yamo bende nobedie gi kalausi kod polo goyo gik moko ogendini mangeny goyoni agenga kendo kedo kodi nolal nono mana ka lek mar otieno yaye jerusalem ginichal gi ngat modenyo leko ni chiemo chiew yudo ni onge gima ochamo kata ka ngat riyo oloyo leko ni modho chiew yudo ni onge pi mosemodho mano e kaka ogendini makedo gi got sayun nochal joisrael gin muofni kendo andhoke nenore ni udhier nono ara galreuru agala kanyo meruru amera ok gi divai bende tagreuru ataga ok nikech kongo nimar ruoth nyasaye osemiyo ubedo gi chuny mar nindo matut ee osedino wengeu tiende ni jonabiu kendo oseumo wiyeu tiende ni jou koronu wach weche duto bironu e fweny chalo gi kitabu modin gi dwogo kichiwo kitabuno ni ngat mongeyo somo mi ikwaye ni mondo osomnigo obiro dwoki ni ok onyal nikech odine kata ka ichiwo kitabuno ni ngat makia somo mi iwachone ni mondo osome obiro dwoki ni ok ongeyo somo bang mano ruoth nyasaye nowacho niya jogi lama mana gi dhogi kende kendo gimiya luor mana gi dhogi oko chunygi bor koda kendo luor giluorago en mana chik mar dhano momak gi wich emomiyo anachak abwog jogi kendo ka atimo gik malich miyo giwuoro rieko mar jogi mariek nolal nono kendo paro matut mar jogi mangado rieko norum yaye unune malit un joma temo pando parogi ni nyasaye kendo kosetimo timbegi e mudho wacho niya ere ngama nenowa koso ere ngama ongeyo gima watimo koro mano kaka uloko weche ataro mana ka gima jachuech bende romre gi lowo mochueyo bende gimoro ochue dikwer ni jachuechne ok ochueye koso agulu bende diwachi ni ngama ochueye onge gi rieko okor wach ni nores joisrael bang kinde matin lebanon biro lokore puodho momew mi yien mabeyo nodongie chiengno joma itgi odinoo nowinj wach ka isomo kitabu kendo joma wengegi osebedo kotimo mudho mandiwa nonen joma muol nochak obed mamor kuom ruoth nyasaye adier joma odhierie moloyo nobed mamor kuom ngama ler mar israel joma ger norum kendo josunga ok nobedie mi jogo duto timbegi mono notieki gin jogo ketho nying ji kendo buto mondo ohiny jongad bura bende gimiyo buch ngat makare iketho katyiem nono kuom mano ruoth nyasaye nyasach joka jakobo kendo mane owaro ibrahim wacho kama koro jakobo ok bi yudo wichkuot kendo kibaji ok nogoye nikech ka nyikwaye oneno gima asetimo ni ogandagi ginimi nyinga duong ee ginidend ngama ler mar jakobo adier ginimi nyasach israel luor joma parogi bayo noyud rieko kendo joma wigi tek bende nopuonji isaya fuwo joisrael nigo kuom geno kuom jomisri ruoth nyasaye wacho niya yaye unune malit un nyithinda jopiem uchano timo gik moko ok meka bende utimo winjruok gi ogendini mamoko ok ahero kamano umedo mana richo ewi richo urikni kudhi misri mondo uyud resruok kuom farao kendo ugengoru e tipo mar misri ok upenja gen mugenogo kuom farao ok nokonyu kendo gengruok mugengorugo e tipo misri nokelnu mana wichkuot nimar kata obedo ni jotelo mage ni zoan kendo jootene chopo nyaka hanes uduto unuyud wichkuot kuom oganda ok nyal konyouno adier ok unuyud konyruok kata ohala moro mana wichkuot kod achaye wach mane nyasaye onyiso e fweny kuom ondiegi manie piny milambo ema jooteugo kadho e piny masira gi parruok malit opongo kama sibuoche mamon nitie kendo sibuoche machwo rutoe bende kama thuonde mager mahuyo odakie kenje gi ngamia otingo mwandugi ka gitero ni oganda ok nyal konyou adier kata ka gitero mwandugi ni jomisri kamano kony ubiro yudo kuomgi romre gi nono mano ema omiyo achako misri ni rahab ondiek budho abudha koro dhiyo mondoo indik wachno kamoro ee ndike mondo obed ranyisi e ndalo mabiro nyaka chieng jogo gin joma jopiem gin yawuowi jomriambo odagi winjo chike ruoth nyasaye ogolo giwacho ni jokor wach niya kik une fweny jonabi giwachonigi ni kik ukor wach moro mar adiera kornwauru mana weche mamit mag wuondruok baruru uwe yo moriere tir mondo kik wachak wawinj wach ngama ler mar israel ngama ler mar israel wacho kama ok usewinjo wachnano bende usando ji kendo utimo timbe mag miganga kuparo ni gik kamago nyalo konyou omiyo richouno biro chalonu okak manie ohinga mabor miyo ohinga barore tiarara kendo podho ka diemo wang mi nginyre matindotindo mana ka agulu motore ok nyal yud take mikwanyogo mach kata pate mitwomogo pi ruoth nyasaye ngama ler mar israel owacho niya kuduogo ira mi ubedo gi kue unuyud resruok bende kudemboru kendo uketo genou kuoma un ubed gi teko kata kamano ne udagi mi uwacho niya ooyo wabiro idho farese mondo waringi mano ber ringuru aringa uyombi kunyalo kata obedo ni uringo matek manade wasiku biro ringo matek mi juku ngat achiel noriemb jou alufu achiel kendo ji abich kobwogou unuring uduto mi uke nono mana ka yien mokelore okelore ewi got nyasaye osingore ni obiro ngwono ni joge kata kamano ruoth nyasaye pod dwaro ngwononu kendo ogombo ahinya mondo okechu nimar en nyasaye jaadiera mano kaka jogo duto mogeno kuome gin johawi un josayun modak jerusalem ok unuchak uywagii ruoth nyasaye biro ngwononu kendo obiro dwokou ka owinjo ywaku kata obedo ni omiyo chiembu gi piu doko matin mi uthagru en en japuonju ok nochak opondnu kendo unubed kunene gi wangu pile kubaro koracham kata korachwich mi uweyo yo unuwinj gi itu uwegi ka dwol moro wachonu gi kangeu niya e yo luweuru bange unukaw nyisecheu manono mubawo gi fedha kata gi dhahabu mi uwiti ka ukwanogi ka gik ok ler kaka tutu kata chieth ruoth nyasaye nokel koth ni chambu kendo nomi puotheu chieg cham mogundho jambu bende nokwa e lege madongodongo kendo ruethu kod kenjeu mupurogo nocham mana ngano mopidhi maber kendo mokirie kado chieng nek maduongno ikethoe kuonde mochiel motegno aore kod sokni mamol nobed ewi gode madongo kod pidhe maboyo duto chiengno due nobed karieny maler ka wangchieng kendo wang chieng nobed ka rieny maler nyadibiriyo moloyo kaka orieny pile nochal mana gi ler mar ndalo abiriyo moriw e odiechieng achiel en chieng ruoth nyasaye nochomie tiende joge kod bedegi motur kendo ochangie adhondegi kum ruoth nyasaye biro kumogo joasuria neuru ruoth nyasaye biro kaa kuma bor mirimbe liel ka mach dhuolore dhoge tetni gi mirima mager kendo lewe otimo mach makakni mawango gik moko duto muche bende chalo gi aora mopong mwomo genge kendo imo ngato nyaka ngute obiro piedho ogendini gi rapiedhi mar tho mi omi giba yo gidwaro luwo mana ka faras michiko gi chuma otue e dhoge un unuwer wende mor mana ka wende miwero e otieno mitimoe sawo maler unubed mamor e chunyu mana kaka jolemo bedo mamor e kinde jago asili otelonigi ka gidhi e god ruoth nyasaye en lwanda mar israel bange ruoth nyasaye nomi winj dwonde man gi duong kendo nonyis bade motimo mach mawango gik moko duto ka lor gi mirima mager ka polo mor gi koth maduong machue gi pe kod yamo mager kihondko nomak joasuria ka giwinjo dwond ruoth nyasaye kendo ka ogoyogi gi ludhe un nubed mamor kugoyo thumbe kendo uwer e kinde duto ruoth nyasaye goyogie mach miwangoe ringre joma otho ne oseik chon mondo owangie molok nyasach asuria kendono duong ahinya kendo odhurie yien mogundho much ruoth nyasaye chalo gi mach maliel ema biro mokoe isaya jomisri gin mana ji ok gin nyasaye mano kaka utimo gima ofuwo un joma dhi misri mondo uyud konyruok uketo genou kuom farese kendo kuom geche mag lweny mangeny ka kuoyo kod joidh farese gana gi gana ok udew ruoth nyasaye ngama ler mar israel kata kwaye mondo otelnu ruoth nyasaye riek kendo onyalo kelo masira bende ok olok parone obiro kumo oganda mar joricho kaachiel gi joma konyogi jomisri gin mana ji ok gin nyasaye bende faresegi gin mana ringo ok gin roho omiyo ka ruoth nyasaye orieyo bade mondo okumgi joma ikonyo kaachiel gi joma konyogi nopodh piny mi gilal nono giduto ruoth nyasaye osewachona niya kaka sibuor kata nyathi sibuor ngur kachamo chiayo mosemako ok odew bende ok oluor kata ka jokwath mangeny ochokore ka goyo koko mondo oriembe e kaka ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto nolor piny mondo oked ewi got sayun bende kaka winyo huyo ode ka rito nyithinde e kaka ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto nobed karito jerusalem ee norite kendo nokonye bende norese yaye joisrael duoguru ir nyasaye useweyo chuth nimar chieng unuwitie nyisecheu manono mag fedha gi dhahabu useloso gi lwetu motimo richo noneg joasuria gi ligangla ok gi ligangla dhano kedogo giniring lweny mi yawuotgi jolweny nolok wasumbni kihondko nomak jodonggi mi dhier nono kendo jotendgi mag lweny bende kibaji nogo ok nyal ringo mano e wach maradier mar ruoth nyasaye maye omoki sayun adier maye ngangni jerusalem isaya jomisri gin mana ji ok gin nyasaye mano kaka utimo gima ofuwo un joma dhi misri mondo uyud konyruok uketo genou kuom farese kendo kuom geche mag lweny mangeny ka kuoyo kod joidh farese gana gi gana ok udew ruoth nyasaye ngama ler mar israel kata kwaye mondo otelnu ruoth nyasaye riek kendo onyalo kelo masira bende ok olok parone obiro kumo oganda mar joricho kaachiel gi joma konyogi jomisri gin mana ji ok gin nyasaye bende faresegi gin mana ringo ok gin roho omiyo ka ruoth nyasaye orieyo bade mondo okumgi joma ikonyo kaachiel gi joma konyogi nopodh piny mi gilal nono giduto ruoth nyasaye osewachona niya kaka sibuor kata nyathi sibuor ngur kachamo chiayo mosemako ok odew bende ok oluor kata ka jokwath mangeny ochokore ka goyo koko mondo oriembe e kaka ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto nolor piny mondo oked ewi got sayun bende kaka winyo huyo ode ka rito nyithinde e kaka ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto nobed karito jerusalem ee norite kendo nokonye bende norese yaye joisrael duoguru ir nyasaye useweyo chuth nimar chieng unuwitie nyisecheu manono mag fedha gi dhahabu useloso gi lwetu motimo richo noneg joasuria gi ligangla ok gi ligangla dhano kedogo giniring lweny mi yawuotgi jolweny nolok wasumbni kihondko nomak jodonggi mi dhier nono kendo jotendgi mag lweny bende kibaji nogo ok nyal ringo mano e wach maradier mar ruoth nyasaye maye omoki sayun adier maye ngangni jerusalem isaya ruoth timne kare winjuru ruoth moro biro biro norit piny e yo makare kendo jotende noti gi adiera adier ngat moro nobed ni ji ka kama gibwogoe koth gi yamo bende noduog chuny ji mana ka aore mamol e piny motwo kata ka tipo mangich mar lwanda maduong man e piny maliet chieng kechie wenge joma neno onge gima nomon neno bende joma winjo nowinj awinja chuny ngat mamwomore nobed gi rieko kendo ngat radwal nolos maber ngat achach ok nochak oluong ni ngat malongo bende ngat jamganga ok nochak oluong ni ngama ogen nimar ngat achach nobed kawuoyo ka ngama achach adier kendo chunye ka paro mana timo timbe manono gik motimo duto nobed gik maricho kendo ka owuoyo owacho miriambo koda ka kuom ruoth nyasaye omono joma odenyo chamo gik onego gicham bende otamo joma riyo oloyo modho ngat achach yorene richo ochano gik maricho e chunye mondo ohiny joma odhier gi weche mag miriambo kendo otamo jochan e adiera monego giyudi ngat jaadiera paro mana gik makare kendo ok adiera kata matin osiem mond jerusalem un mon modak e ngima maber auru malo mondo uwinj gima awacho un nyiri ok dew gimoro e sani pod onge gima badhou bang higa achiel gi ndalo moko manok unubed gi kibaji nikech cham ok nochiegi omiyo ok nuyud gima ukayo un mon sani odak e ngima maber parreuru weuru dhil mudhilgono lonyreuru duk mondo utue piende gugru e nungou kendo ywaguru nikech puotheu momew kod mzabipu nyago olemo mabeyo biro kethore kudho kod pedo ema biro gawore e puothe joga nimar ot ka ot yande mor nitie e dalau maduong nodong nono ji noring owe udi mabeyo madongodongo duto mi dala yande ji thothie nodong nono nobed lek maber ni le mae thim kendo jamni bende nokwae kuonde motingore mochiel motegno mag siro lweny kod kuonde maboyo mag rito nolokre thim kuom ndalo mangeny nyaka chop roho moa e polo malo lor kuomwa eka piny motwo nolokre puothe momew mi yien mabeyo dongie bange adiera gi tim makare nobedi e piny duto kuonde momew koda ka kuonde motimo ongoro mi kue nosik nyaka chieng kendo luoro ok nobedie kamano joga nobed e piny mokue ka gidak gi mor onge koko tik gode otimo bungu nobed mangich maber kendo mier manie pap nobed gi kue koro mano kaka unubed mamor ka ngato ka ngato kuomu chwoyo chambe e bath aora kendo weyo jambe wuotho awuotha kaka ohero isaya ruoth nyasaye biro kelo warruok yaye unune malit un joasuria useketho gik moko un pok okethu bende usendhogo ji un pok ondhogu koro ka usetieko ketho gik moko uun ema ibiro kethu kendo ka utieko ndhogo ji un ema ibiro ndhogu ruoth nyasaye wan kechwa nimar wageno kuomi yie imiwa teko okinyi kokinyi kendo reswa e kinde mar masira ka ji owinjo kitingo dwondi mi imor giringo kendo ka ia malo ogendini ke mwandugi noyaki mi tieki mana kaka bonyo nango lum mi tieki adier ji nopot kuomgi mana ka det bonyo ruoth nyasaye duong moloyo nikech odak e polo malo opongo sayun gi adiera kod tim makare kendo ubiro yiengoru kuome e ndalou duto rieko gi ngeyo ema kelo resruok kendo luor oluorgo ruoth nyasaye e mwandune neuru kaka thuondu ywak e wangyore adier joote museoro mondo odwar kue ywak malit yore madongo odong nono jowuoth ok luwgi singruok duto okethi kendo winjruok motim ok dew dhano bende ok kwan ka gimoro piny ywak kendo dok chien lebanon two kendo kethore sharon bende olokore thim kendo bashan gi karmel oyaki modong nono ruoth nyasaye wacho ni joasuria niya koro abiro malo mondo anyis duongna maler gik uchano timo gin gik manono kendo yamo maliet ka mach biro tiekou pep ogendini nokethi chuth mi lokre pidhe mag choka kendo ginichal gi kudho mobeti mi owang e mach un mudak kuonde maboyo winjuru gima asetimo un un machiegni yieru ni aratego joricho modak sayun biro tetni ka luoro omako adier joma ok dew nyasaye kihondko nomaki mi ginipenjre niya bende nitie ngato kuomwa manyalo dak gi mach mawango gik moko duto koso en nga didag gi mach maliel nyaka chieng ngatno nyakaa bed mana ngat timbene oriere kendo wacho adiera bende ok dwar mwandu miyudo gi malang kendo riembo asoya kucha bende dino ite ni weche mag chwero remo kendo umo wange ni timbe mamono ngat kamano nodag kama otingore mokue got mabor motimo lwendni ema nobed kare mar gengruok kendo enobed koyudo chiemo gi pi morome enone ruoth gi duongne duto kendo norang piny moyarore malach chunye nonyise gik machon kendo nopar kaka ne oluoro wasigu mane ochung e tok ohinga mar dalagi ka chano kaka dimwom ohingano mi yakgi ok enochak one oganda mager dhogi tek winjo kendo mawuoyo kabodho wach ok winjreno ka orango sayun dala mwatimoe sewni enone ni en dala man gi kue ee kongiyo jerusalem enone ni ochalo gi hema ok tungni loyene ogur motegno kendo kata tonde achiel ok ochot kanyo ema duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye nonenree enochalnwa aora malach man gi bade mangeny onge yiedhi nokwang kanyo kikiewo kata noringie gi tanga tondegi ombekni ok nyal rido murungot kata ywayo tanga nimar ruoth nyasaye en jangadnwa bura en e ruodhwa ketonwa chik kendo en ema noreswa bange ngama muofu kod ngama rangol bende noyud pok kuom gik moyaki onge ngat odak kuno nowach ni otuo kendo richo mag ji man kuno nongwonnigi isaya ruoth nyasaye okecho gi edom kod ogendini mamoko un ugendini mae piny biuru ka mondo uchik itu piny ngima kod gimoro amora manie iye mondo owinj wachna nimar ruoth nyasaye nigi mirima mager kod ogendini duto kod jogi mag lweny kuom mano osekuongogi ni mondo oneggi mi tiekgi chuth jogi monegi nowe oko mak oyiki mi ringregi pong piny gi mifuolu kendo rembgi nobubni e gode e ndalono gik moko duto manie polo malo noleny mi lal nono polo bende nodol mana ka kalatas kendo sulue nolwar piny mana ka oboke moner kata ka olemo mochiek ka ligangla mar ruoth nyasaye osetieko tichne e polo obiro lwar kuom joedom en oganda osekuongo mondo otieki ligangla mar ruoth nyasaye notim remo lilo kendo boche nogawre kuome mana ka gima gin boche mag nyiroke imbe kod remb rombe gi diek mitimogo misango nimar ruoth nyasaye biro timo misango bozra dala edom ee obiro neko malich e piny edom kar nego jope ruodhi ema obiro nego kendo kar nego ruedhi oganda mar joma rateke ema nonegi mi remo pong piny kendo piny leny nikech boche nimar ruoth nyasaye oseketo chieng obiro chuloe kuor adier oseketo higa nokumie joedom kuom gima ne gitimo ni sayun aore mag edom nolokre lam kendo lowo man kuno nolokre mach lilo mi pinyno lokre lam maliel otieno gi odiechieng ok nyal negi bende iro nodumie mochwere enodong thim kuom higni gi higni kendo onge ngama nochak oluw kuno nobed kama otenga gi chiew gi tula kod agak ema odakie ruoth nyasaye nopim pinyno mi oyud ni oromo gi kethoo omiyo enodog nono onge ruoth noti pinyno bende jodonge norum pep kudho ema noyugno e udi madongodongo man kuno kendo aila kod pedo nogawre e mier mage mochiel gi ohinga enobed piny marach ondiegi ema nitie kendo tula ema odakie le mae thim kod ondiegi norom kuno kendo kanyo ema jochiende noyudree gik malich mag otieno nodag kanyo mi yud kar yueyo aywer noger ode kuno mi nywolie tonge kendo toye nyithindo noumgi gi buombe mondo kik gimoro chamgi otenga bende nochokre kuno moro ka moro gi wadgi somuru kitap ruoth nyasaye ubiro yudo ni onge achiel kuom gigo nobed maonge kendo roho mare ema nochokgi en ema oseyiero ni moro ka moro kare kendo osepogonigi piny kipimo gi tol pinyno nobed margi nyaka chieng kendo ginidagie tieng gi tieng isaya gueth ruoth nyasaye guedhogo israel thimbe kod pinje motwo nobed mamor kendo maupe mabeyo nothiew kuondego ee ginithiew mangeny kendo piny nopong gi wende mor kuonde yande otwo nobed mangich mana ka gode mag lebanon kata ka lege mabeyo mag sharon kod mag got karmel kendo joisrael none duong maler mar ruoth nyasachgi teguru bede mayomyom kendo rieuru chong monyosore bende nyisuru chuny mool niya beduru motegno kendo kik ubed maluor neuru nyasachu biro mondo ochul kuor ee obiro mondo okum wasiku kaka owinjore kendo oresu bange muofni nonen kendo joma itgi odino nowinj wach rangonde bende nochikre ka nyidiek kendo momni nower gi mor nimar pi nobubni e piny motwo kendo aore nobed ka molie lop kuoyo yande chieng oowo gi liet nolokre dago mar pi kendo sokni nowuog e lowo motwo mi kuonde yande ondiegi ema odakie bed kuonde lum gi odundu gi togo dongoe wangyo maduong nobed e thimno kendo noluonge ni wangyo maler joma ok ler gi joma ofuwo ok nowuothie sibuoche ok nodhi kuno kendo onge kata mana ondiek mager nosud machiegni kode yorno ema joma ruoth nyasaye osewaro nowuothie adier joma ruoth nyasaye osereso noluw yorno ka duogo dala ginidonj sayun ka gikok gi mor kendo ka giil kuyo gi parruok nolal nono isaya senakerib omonjo juda ruodhi weche mag ndalo e higa mar apar gangwen mar loch hezekia senakerib ruodh asuria nomonjo miech juda mochiel motegno duto mokawo ne ooro rabshake kod oganda lweny mangongo ka en lakish mondo odhi jerusalem ir ruoth hezekia kane rabshake ochopo kuno ne ochung fereji magolo pi e yawo mamalo man yo mochiko puodho milyuongo ni pwoth jalwok lewni eliakim wuod hilkia jaduong od ruoth gi shebna jagoro kod joa wuod asa jachan weche mag piny ne jowuok modhi ire kanyo eka rabshake nowachonigi niya nyisuru hezekia ni ruoth maduong ruodh asuria owacho kama ere gima omiyo idhialori kamano iparo ni weche awecha nyalo lokore rieko kod teko miloyogo lweny en nga igeno ni biro konyi piem koda angeyo ni idhialori nikech jomisri nyaka inge ni jomisri chalo gi odundu mobarore ka ngato oyiengoree pilore kendo chwowo lwete mano e kaka farao ruodh misri chalo ni jogo duto mogeno kuome kuwachona ni ugeno kuom ruoth nyasaye nyasachu donge en e nyasaye hezekia hembko gi kuonde mitimonee misengni kochiko jojuda gi jojerusalem ni nyaka lem mana e nyim kendomarmisango man jerusalem kende koro hezekia singri ni ruodh asuria atiyone ayie miyi farese alufu ariyo kapo nono ni inyalo yudo joma idhogi ka jomisri ema igeno ni biro konyi gi geche kod joidh farese ere kaka iparo ni dilo kata mana achiel matinie moloyo kuom jotend lweny mag ruodha koso iparo ni asebiro mana ni mondo amonj amonja jerusalem akethi ka ok ruoth nyasaye ema oyiena ngeni ruoth nyasaye ema nowachona ni mondo abi amonj pinyni akethi eka eliakim gi shebna kod joa nowacho ni rabshake niya wasayi yie iwuo kodwa gi dho aram nikech en dhok mwangeyo wuoyo kodwa gi dho hibrania kae nimar joma ni ewi ohinga nyalo winjowa rabshake ne odwokogi ka penjogi niya uparo ni un kod ruodhu kende ema ne ruodha oora iru mondo awachnu wechegi ooyo oora ir joma nie wi ohinga ochunore ni nyaka cham chiethgi kendo madh lachgi giwegi mana kaka un bende unutim bang mano nochung mokok gi dwol maduong gi dho hibrania niya winjuru wach ruoth maduong ruodh asuria owacho ni kik uyie hezekia wuondu nikech ok onyal resou bende kik uwe ohou ni mondo ugen kuom ruoth nyasaye kowachonu ni adier ruoth nyasaye ema noresu kendo ni ruodh asuria ok nokaw dala maduongni kik uwinj wach hezekia nimar ruodh asuria owacho niya winjreuru koda mondo ubi ira mi ngato ka ngato kuomu nocham olemb mzabipe kod ngope bende nomodh pi e sokone owuon nyaka chop abi mi agolu kendo ateru e piny machal gi pinyuni en piny cham gi mzabibu chiekie maber kendo makati gi divai ngenyie tanguru nono hezekia owitou kowuondou ni ruoth nyasaye biro konyou bende nitie nyasach piny moro mosereso pinye e lwet ruodh asuria nyiseche mag hamath gi arpad ni kanye koso ere nyiseche mag sefarvaim bende ne gireso samaria e lweta kuom nyiseche duto mag pinjego ere moro mosereso pinye e lweta dimi upar ni ruoth nyasaye nyalo reso jerusalem e lweta ji noling thi onge ngat modwoke wach kata achiel nikech ruoth hezekia nosegolo chik ni kik dwoke eliakim wuod hilkia jaduong od ruoth gi shebna jagoro kod joa wuod asaf jachan weche mag piny ne jobiro ir hezekia ka joyiecho lepgi mi ginyise gima ne rabshake owacho isaya nyasaye oreso piny juda e lwet senakerib ruodhi weche mag ndalo kane ruoth hezekia owinjo wechego noyiecho lepe mi orwako pien gugru kendo odhi e od ruoth nyasaye nooro eliakim jaduong ode gi shebna jagoro kod jodolo madongo ir janabi isaya wuod amoz ka jorwako piende gugru mondo odhi owachne niya hezekia owacho ni kawuono en chieng dhier gi kum kod wichkuot wachalo gi dhako muoch kayo onge muya mocholgo nyathi nyalo bet ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachi osewinjo weche rabshake ruodh asuria oseoro mondo oyany nyasaye mangima omiyo koro obiro kumo rabshake nikech weche osewinjo ka rabshake wachogo kuom mano isaya lem ni jowa mapod odong kamano kane jodong ruoth hezekia ochopo ir isaya mowachone wechego ne odwokogi niya dhiuru uwach ni ruodhu ni ruoth nyasaye owacho kama kik iluor weche isewinjo ka ruodh asuria yanyago nikech abiro miye chuny man gi kibaji kowinjo wach moro marach noring odog e pinye kuma nami onegee rabshake nodok moyudo ni ruodh asuria osea lakish odhi monjo libna omiyoo nodhi ire kuno kane ruodh asuria owinjo ni tirhaka ruodh ethiopia obiro monje nochako oro joote ir hezekia ruodh juda kowacho niya kik iyie nyasachi migeno kuomeno wuondi ni ruodh asuria ok nokaw jerusalem chutho isewinjo kaka ruodhi mag asuria oseketho pinje mane gikedogo chuth koro iparo ni ema dikwo kwerena nonego jogozan gi joharan gi jorezef kod joeden nodak telasar koro dak ne nyisechegi okonyogi koso ere ruodhi mag hamath gi arpad gi sefarvaim gi hena kod iva hezekia nokawo barua mane joote okelone mi osomo bange ne odhi e hekalu mi oyaro baruano e nyim ruoth nyasaye kokwaye niya ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto nyasach israel mobet ewi kerubi kaka ruoth bet e komduongne kendi e nyasach ogendini duto mae piny kendo ema nichueyo polo gi piny ruoth nyasaye chik iti mondo iwinji kendo iyaw wangi mondo inen winj weche senakerib yanyigo nyasaye mangima ruoth nyasaye en adier ni ruodhi mag asuria oseketho pinje duto mi gibolo nyisechegi e mach kendo gisekethogi chuth nimar ne ok gin nyiseche kata matin mana tich dhano molos gi yath kata gi kidi koro ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa reswa e lwet senakerib mondo ogendini duto mae piny onge ni kendi e nyasaye eka isaya wuod amoz nooro ni hezekia wach niya ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel owacho ni osewinjo lemo mikwayego nikech wach senakerib ruodh asuria osesiemigo omiyo osewuoyo kuom senakerib kama senakerib dala sayun ochayi kendo jari ee dala sayun twenyoni ume koro en ngano isejaro kendo iyanyo koso en nga isekokne ka ijowo wangi nyaka inge ni en ngama ler mar israel isejaro ruoth nyasaye gi dho jooteni kiwacho niya aseidho gode maboyo mag lebanon mi achopo midimidi ka gi gechena mag lweny mangeny mokadho akwana bende asetongo yiend sida madongo kod yiend saipras mabeyo man kuno asechopo nyaka e chuny bungu kama ni iye mogik kendo yien odichie asekunyo sokni mi amodho pi pinje mamoko bende aore mag misri noduono ka anyonogi gi tienda senakerib kata obedo ni iwacho kamano donge ingeyo ni ruoth nyasaye ema ne achano chon mondo gigo otimre adier ne achanogi chon koro amiyo gitimore ema ne achano mondo imuk mier mochiel motegno olokre gundni joma odakie chalo gi lum e pap maonge gi teko kata ka lum matwi e tat ot ner kapok odongo nimar ne gionge gi teko kendo ne gingeng ka luoro omakogi angeyo timbeni duto angeyo kata ka ichung kata ka ibet piny kata kiwuok kata kiduogo dala asewinjo kaka iyanya malich kendo kaka isungori omiyo abiro keto mbedo e umi kod rajaki e dhogi mondo awichi idog thuru gi yo mane ibirogo winji hezekia ranyisi amiyi ema e higa mokwongoni unucham gik matwi kendgi kendo e higa mar ariyo unucham orowe moloth e higa mokwongono e higa mar adek unuket kodhi kendo unuka cham bende unupidh mzabibu bende unucham olembgi jojuda modong nochal gi yath tero tiendene piny kendo nyago olemo e bedene nimar joma nok modong nowuog jerusalem adier oganda mar joma otony noa e got sayun ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto oseketo chunye mondo otim kamano kuom mano ruoth nyasaye owuoyo kuom ruodh asuria kama ok nodonj e dala jerusalem kendo ok nobaye gi asere kata monjogo kotingo kuot ok nomonje bende ok nonging pith mondo oidhgo ohingane enodog gi yo nobirogo ok nodonj jerusalem nimar anaked ni dalani mondo aresi nikech nyinga kendo nikech daudi jatichna malaika mar ruoth nyasaye nodhi monego joasuria alufu mia achiel gi piero aboro gabich e kambigi kendo kane ji ochiew gokinyi ringre joma otho ema ne ginwango kopie piny mano omiyo senakerib ruodh asuria noa kuno mi odok nineve odakie chieng moro kane oyudo olemo e od nisrok nyasache yawuote adramelek gi sharezer nobiro monege bange ne giringo mi gidhi e piny ararat esarhadon nodoko ruoth kar senakerib wuon mare isaya tuo omako hezekia ruodhi weche mag ndalo e ndalogo hezekia ne tuo kendo ohewore janabi isaya wuod amoz nobiro ire mowachone niya ruoth nyasaye owacho ni mondo ilam mwanduni ni yawuoti nimar ibiro tho ok nikwo kane hezekia owinjo kamano nolokore mongiyo kor ot kokwayo ruoth nyasaye niya ruoth nyasaye asayi parie kaka asewuotho e nyimi gi adiera kod chuny mobidhore ka atimo gik malongoni eka ne oywak malit bange wach ruoth nyasaye nobiro ni isaya niya dhiyo iwach ni hezekia ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach daudi kwaru owacho kama asewinjo kwayoni kendo aseneno pi wangi omiyo abiro medi ndalo moromo higni apar gabich bende abiro resi kaachiel gi dala jerusalem e lwet ruodh asuria kendo abiro rito dalani eka isaya ne owacho ni jood hezekia ni mondo okel ngowo moswagi omwon e bur mokuodo hezekia ne gitimo kamano mi bur nochango bang mano hezekia nopenjo niya ere gima biro bedona ranyisi ni abiro dhi e od ruoth nyasaye isaya nodwoke ni ranyisi ruoth nyasaye onyisigo ni obiro timo gima osewacho e rang ane tipo mar wang chieng manie raidhi mar dhood ahaz abiro dwoko tipono chien ondamo apar kamano wangchieng nodok chien ondamo apar e raidhi mane oyudo oselorie koro weche mag hezekia ruodh juda mane ondiki ka osechango e magi ne aparo ni abiro tho kapod atin kendo ni abiro tieko ndalona duto e piny joma otho ne awacho niya ok anachak aneni ruoth nyasaye e piny joma ngima bende ok nachak ane dhano gi wanga kaka joma ngima neno osepudh oda mi owit kucha mana kaka ipudho kiru mar jakwath ruoth nyasaye isengado ngimana machiek mana kaka jatuengo dolo usi kendo ngado isanda chakre okinyi nyaka odhiambo kendo aywak ka gi rem malit nyaka piny ru chokena duto otur mana ka gima sibuor ema oturo adier isanda chakre okinyi nyaka odhiambo omiyo aywak mana ka opija kata akuru kendo wengena otho bo kuom rango malo ruoth nyasaye winj ywakna mondo ibed jawarna ere kaka dater ywakna ni ruoth nyasaye koso en ango dawachne ka en owuon ema osetimona gigi duto nikech chandruok chunya nigo pod chunya nobed mana kodi ruoth nyasaye ema imiyo chunya yueyo duoga iri mondo abed mangima chutho koro aseneno ni chandruok duto mane aseyudo konya nimar iseresa e tho nikech herani bende isewito richona duto ka diengeyi piny joma otho ok nyal goyoni erokamano adier joma otho ok nyal paki chutho joma osedhi e bur ok nyal geno adiera mari joma ngima kende ema nyalo goyoni erokamano kaka agoyoni kawuononi wuone bende nyiso yawuotgi adiera mari nyasaye ruoth nyasaye oikore mondo oresa kuom mano waweruru wende pak ka wagoyo thumbe e od ruoth nyasaye e ndalo duto mag ngimawa isaya hezekia oyudo joote moa babulon ruodhi weche mag ndalo e ndalo merodakbaladan wuod baladan ruodh babulon nooro joote ir hezekia gi barupe kod mich nikech ne owinjo ni yande otuo koro osedoko mangima hezekia norwako jootego monyisogi mwandune duto mane ni e ode mar keno kaka fedha gi dhahabu gi gik mangue ngar gi mo nengone tek kod gilweny kaachiel gi gik moko duto mane ni kuonde kanone onge gimoro amora e ode kata e pinye mane ok onyisogi bange janabi isaya nobiro ir ruoth hezekia mopenjee niya jogi oa kanye wach ango mokelogi hezekia nodwoke ni gia e piny babulon kuma bor janabi isaya nomedo penje niya ango gineno e odi hezekia nodwoke ni giseneno gik moko duto manie oda onge gimoro amora modong mak anyisogi e kuonde kenona bang mano isaya nowacho ni hezekia niya winj wach ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ndalo biro gik moko duto manie odi kwereni osekano nyaka chil kawuono noter babulon bende ruoth nyasaye omedo wacho ni onge gima nodong kata achiel mak oter yawuoti moko nolok wasumbini adier moko kuom yawuoti hie nolok wasumbni mabuoch e od ruodh babulon hezekia ne odwoke niya wach ruoth nyasaye isenyisa ber ne odwoke kamano koparo ni en kue biro siko e ndalone duto isaya weche mane ruoth nyasaye ohoyogo chuny jojerusalem nyasachu wacho kama houru chuny joga hogiuru wuouru gi jojerusalem gi muolo kuwachonigi ni gisetieko ndalogi mag tuech kendo ni osekumgi moromo ruoth nyasaye osekumogi nyadiriyo kuom richogi duto dwol moro kok niya losuru ni ruoth nyasaye yo e thim losuru ni nyasachwa ndara mopie e piny motwo hohni duto nobugi kendo gode duto nopie yore motimo gogni bende nobed maler kendo kuonde motimo gode nobed pewe eka duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye nofwenyre mi ji duto nonene kaachiel nimar ruoth nyasaye owuon ema owacho kamano dwol moro wacho niya ting dwondi iwuo moro dwoko ni ere gima dawachi wach niya dhano ka dhano chalo gi lum kendo berne duto chalo gi maua manie pap lum ner kendo maua two ka much ruoth nyasaye okudhogi chutho dhano chalo gi lum adier lum two maua bende ner wach nyasachwa osiko nyaka chieng mikelo ni sayun wach maber idh wi got mabor kendo ikogi matek ee mikelo ni jerusalem wach maber ting dwondi ikogi matek ka ok iluor kiwacho ni miech juda niya eri nyasachu ni ka ngeuru ni ruoth nyasaye biro gi teko obiro loyo piny gi tekone maduong neuru obiro gi joge mogonyo e lweny ka wuotho e nyime ka gik moyako ochalo jakwath sembo jambe kotingo nyirombe e bade kendo oriwogi e kore kotelo ni mago man gi nyithindo kotero modho nyasach israel ok pim gi nyasaye moro en nga mane opimo pi nembe e chuny lwete kata mane opimo duong mar polo gi lith lwete en nga mane opimo lowo duto manie piny kata mane opimo gode madongo gi matindo e ratil mak mana ruoth nyasaye ere ngat osengado ni ruoth nyasaye rieko kata mosechung e dire ka puonje bende ruoth nyasaye osedwaroe rieko moro kuom ngato kata dwaro ni mondo ngato opuonje adiera kod yore mabeyo ooyo ok osetimo kamano nikech ogendini duto mag piny ok gimoro kipimo kode giromre mana gi pi maton kaa e dapi kata ka buru momoko e ratil adier chulni gi dhonembe duto yotne mana ka muya yien duto manie piny lebanon kaachiel gi le duto man kuno ok nyal romo timonego misango miwango pep ogendini duto ok gimoro e nyime okwanogi ka gik manono onge tich en nga dipim gi nyasaye koso ango diwachi ni chal kode dochal gi kido ngato ochueyo kendo jatheth dhahabu obawo gi dhahabu mi othedhone thiwni mag fedha koso koso dochal gi yien maber ok tow ngato oyiero mi oluongo japecho molony mondo olosnego kido mopa ok nyal podho donge ungeyo koso pok uwinjo ni nyasaye obet e polo malo kendo ni joma odak e piny chalone mana dede ok osewachnu kamano chakre chon koso pok uparo nyaka ne chue piny ni en ema ne oyaro polo mana ka pasia kendo ogure mana ka hema midakie odwoko ruodhi gi jotelo duto piny mi lokre gima nono ka okudho muya kuomgi giner mi kalausi dhi kodgi mana ka mihudhi nimar gichalo gi kodhi mokom machiegni tiendegi pok ochwowo lowo ngama ler penjo niya koro en nga duporago koso ere ngama dirom koda tinguru wengeu malo e polo mondo upar ane ngama ne ochueyo gigo duto donge en mana jal mane otelo ni oganda mar sulue ka oluongo moro ka moro gi nyinge mana ka gima en jaduong lweny motelo ni jolwenje tekone maduong malich omiyo onge kata mana sulue achiel ok ochung kare un joisrael nyikwa jakobo ere gima omiyo ungur kuwacho niya ruoth nyasaye ok ne yorewa kendo ok ongadnwa bura maber donge ungeyo koso pok uwinjo ni ruoth nyasaye nyasaye mochwere kendo jachuech piny malichni duto ok ol kendo ok nyosre parone tut odhiero dhano ngeyo en ema omiyo joma ool teko adier omedo muya ni joma tekogi orumo joma tindo nyalo ol mi nyosre kata mana yawuowi mopong bende nyalo chwanyore mi podhi joma ogeno kuom ruoth nyasaye tekogi noduogi ginihu ka ongo mana ka gima gin gi buombegi kendo giniringi ok giniol bende giniwuothi tekregi ok norum isaya nyasaye osingore ni obiro guedho joisrael un pinje mae dhonembe kod chulni chikuru itu ka uling thi e nyima ogendini mondo obi abia gibi abia machiegni mondo giwuo ane waduto wanadonj kaachiel kama ingadoe bura ngat moa yo wuok chieng locho kamoro amora modhiye cha ere ngama okele koso en nga moketo ogendini e lwete kendo miyo oloyo ruodhi mi onyon piny okeyogi gi liganglane mana ka buru kendo oriembogi gi asere mana ka mihudhi yamo tero olawogi koriembogi matek mana ka gima ohuyo en okadho maber mak ohinyore koro apenjo ni mano en tij nga koso en nga mamiyo mago duto timore en nga mamiyo tienge luwore nyaka ne piny chakre en mana ruoth nyasaye ema akwongo kendo anie nyamgiko pinje mae dhonembe kod chulni osewinjo wachno modoko maluor kendo ji duto kirni chakre tung piny nyaka tung piny ngato ka ngato konyo wadgi kendo jiwe kawacho ni mondo obed gi chir kamano japecho jiwo jathedh dhahabu kaloso nyasaye manono kendo jal matiyo gi nyundo jiwo jal goyo musmal kawacho ni tich riwo nyinyo osetim maber eka oguro nyasaye manono gi musmal mondo kik oyiengni un joisrael jotichna aseyierou mi agolou e giko piny kuonde mane untie adier un nyikwa jakobo aseyiero kendo koth ibrahim osiepna ne aluongou mondo ua kuonde maboyo aseluongou ni jotichna kendo aseyierou ok awitou kik uluor gimoro nikech kodu kik kibaji gou nimar e nyasachu amiyou teko kendo akonyou bende asirou gi bada korachwich alochogo koro neuru jogu duto mon kodu wigi biro kuot mi gidhier nono adier jogo duto kedo kodu norum mi lal nono unudwar wasikugo ok unuyudgi chutho jogo mane kedo kodu ok nobed gimoro kata matin nikech ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ema amako badu korachwich kendo awachonu niya kik ubed maluor nimar ema akonyou oganda jakobo kudni akuda kik ibed maluor yaye israel onge ndhathe kik kibaji goyi ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano neuru abiro miyo uchalo gi gir diemo ngano manyien lekene bitho unumuk gode madongo gi matindo kutoyogi matindotindo mi gilokre mihudhi unupiedhgi mi yamo notergi mabor kendo kalausi nokegi un unubed mamor nikech ruoth nyasaye ngama ler mar israel joma odhier kod joma chandore manyo pi ok ginwang omiyo dwondgi otwo nikech riyo ruoth nyasaye abiro dwoko kwayogi adier nyasach israel ok najwanggi abiro miyo aore wuogi kuonde motwo motimo kwoyo kendo sokni tuchi e holni bende abiro miyo yewni bedi e piny motimo ongoro mi pi bubni e piny motwo abiro pidho yien mopogore opogore kuonde motwo mondo ji duto one kendo onge ni ruoth nyasaye ngama ler mar israel ema osetimo kamano ruoth nyasaye charo nyiseche manono ruoth nyasaye ruodh joka jakobo wacho niya biuru uwach wachu ane nyisecheu mondo obi onyiswa ane gik matimore onego ginyiswa ane tiend gik mane osetimore nyiswauru ane gik mabiro timore e kinde mabiro mondo wayie ni kara un nyiseche adier timuru ane gimoro maber kata marach manyalo miyo wangeng mi wadhier nono en adier ni ok unyal gimoro kendo gik mutimo onge tich bende ngato angata kwanou ka nyisechene en raura ka un aseluongo ngato yo nyandwat yo wuok chieng mondo obi en ngat mabiro lama enonyon ruodhi mana ka lowo mimwonogo ot kendo nonywasgi mana kaka jachuech nywaso lop agulu en nga mane okoro wachno ni mondo wange koso en nga mane onyisowa chon ni wachno biro timore mondo wayie ni en adier onge ngato mane ohule kata mane owuoyo kuome adier wecheu ne ok owinji kata matin ne asenyiso josayun chon ni ero gibiro kendo ne aoro ni jerusalem jaote materonigi wach maber kane arango nyisecheu ne ok aneno moro manyalo dwoko penjona neyeuru kaka gin gik manono gimoro amora gitimo onge tich nyisechego mana yamo makudho isaya jatich ruoth nyasaye neuru e jatichna atayo en ngat aseyiero kendo chunya morgo aseketo roho mara kuome omiyo obiro kelo adiera ni ogendini ok nokogi kata nduru ok nogo dwonde bende ok nowinji e yore kata mana odundu motore ok notur mi owiti ka gima nono bende ok nosim kata mana taya maliel marachrach enongad bura mana gi adiera ok nochwanyre kata chunye ok nonyosre enokel adiera e piny kendo pinje manie dhonembe rito mondo chikne obi ruoth nyasaye mane ochueyo polo mi oyaro kendo ochueyo piny gi gik mangima duto mantie mi ochiwo muya ni joma odakie kod gik moko duto mangima wacho kama ruoth nyasaye aseluongi ni mondo itim gima kelo resruok asemako lweti mondo ariti kendo anami ibed ngat kelo singruok e kinda gi ji mondo iyaw wenge muofni kendo igol joma otue e mudho kuma gidakie e ruoth nyasaye kendo mano e nyinga ok ayie mondo duong imiya omi nyasaye moro machielo bende ok ayie mondo pak mipakago opakgo gik opa neuru kaka gik mane akoro osetimore koro anyisou gik manyien biro timore adier ahulonugi kapok gitimore pak mipakogo ruoth nyasaye kuom reso ji weruru ni ruoth nyasaye wer manyien kupako nyinge e piny duto un mukwang e nam pakeuru kaachiel gi gik manie nam thim kod mier man kuno mondo obed mamor kaachiel gi kuonde dak mag joarabu kedar un joma odak sela koguru gi mor ewi gode un duto mudak e dhonembe gi chulni pakeuru kamano ji duto mondo omi ruoth nyasaye duong ruoth nyasaye biro wuok oko ka thwon maratego enobed gi mirima mager mana ka jalweny kendo enokogi ka ogoyo sigich lweny mi olo wasike ruoth nyasaye aseling kuom ndalo mangeny ka abedo gi kue kendo ka aterora mo koro abiro ywak ka dhako muoch kayo ka aomo chunya kendo agamo yueyo anatiek gik moko duto manie gode ka amiyo gik mangich duto man kuno two anami aore lokre kuonde motwo kendo adwon yewni duto bange anatel ni muofni e wuodhgi ka amiyo giluwo yore ok gingeyo mudho giwuothoe analoknigi ler kendo anarie yore mobam giluwo mago duto natim mak ok aweyo moro mak atimo joma ogeno mana kuom gik mopa luongo gik maket ka nyisechegi noyud wichkuot kendo nodwok chien kum mane okumgo joisrael ne ok opuonjogi gimoro un joma itgi odino koro winjuru yaye un muofni ranguru mondo unen ere muofu maloyou un joisrael jotichna kata ere ngama ite odino moloyou un jootena aoro koso ere muofu maloyou un joma atimogo singruok mar kue kata ite odino maloyou un jotich ruoth nyasaye useneno gik mathoth ok udewgi un gi onge gima uwinjo ruoth nyasaye noneno ni ber mondo chikne obed gi duong mondo adierane olandre kata kamano jogi gin joma oyaki kendo oter e tuech giduto gisenyumore e obadho mokunynigi mi gilal e ut tuech omakgi mi odhi kodgi mana ka gima gin gik moyaki onge ngama nyalo resogi kata wacho ni mondo odwokgi un joma nyalo winjo wach chikuru itu uwinji ee chakre kawuono chikuru itu en nga mane ochiwo joisrael nyikwa jakobo e lwet joyeko donge en ruoth nyasaye ne giketho e nyime mi gitamore luwo yorene kendo gidagi rito chikne mano ema omiyo noolo mirimbe mager kuom joisrael kokelonigi lweny maliet ka mach ne olworogi gi mach koni gi koni ne ok giwinjo tiend kumno adier ne orewogi kata kamano ne ok gidewo isaya ruoth nyasaye kende e jawar un joisrael nyikwa jakobo ruoth nyasaye mane otimou oganda wacho kama kik ubed maluor nikech asewarou aseluongou gi nyingu omiyo un joga awuon ka ukadho e pige matut kodu adier ka ngado aore ok giniteru bende kata ka uwuotho e mach mangangni ok unuwang nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasachu ngama ler mar israel kendo jaresu achiwo misri gi ethiopia kod seba mondo awarugo akwanou ka gima nengone tek bende un joma ogen ahero omiyo achiwo pinje moko mondo awarugo adier achiwo jomoko nono mondo aresgo ngimau kodu omiyo kik ubed maluor abiro chokou ka agolou yo wuokchieng gi yo podho chieng kaachiel gi nyithindu abiro wacho ni jonyandwat ni mondo oweu jomilambo abiro nyiso niya kik ugengnigi keluru yawuota gi nyiga kugolo kuonde maboyo adier kelgiuru kugologi e tung piny koni gi koni chutho keluru ji duto iluongo gi nyinga asechueyo kendo asetimo oganda gin joma asechueyo mondo ayud duong keluru jogo gin joma nigi wenge ok nyal neno bende gin gi ok ginyal winjo ogendini duto mondo ochokre kaachiel ere nyasachgi mane osekoroe gima kama kata mosehuloe gimoro ka pok otimore weuru gikel joneno mondo onyis ane gik mane gitimo mondo gilo bura ka wachgi en adier ka ok ginyal koro ruoth nyasaye awacho kama gi joneno un joisrael e joneno maga kendo jotichna aseyierou mondo ungeya kendo uket genou kuoma bende mondo unge ni e nyasaye nyasaye moro motelona ne pok obedoe bende moro maluwa ok nobedie kende e ruoth nyasaye onge jawar moro mak mana ema asekoro wach kanyisou malongo gik mabiro timore nyisecheu manono ok osetimo kamano un e joneno maga ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano e nyasaye ok lokre nyaka chieng gima amako onge ngama nyalo kawo bende gima atimo onge ngama nyalo ketho ruoth nyasaye jaresu kendo ngama ler mar israel wacho kama aseoro oganda lweny mondo omonj babulon nikech un kendo abiro miyo jobabulon podh piny auma ka giringo mi koko mar mor gigoyo lokre ywak e ruoth nyasaye ngama ler jachuechu kendo ruodhu yaye israel ruoth nyasaye ema ne apogo nam mondo yo obedie e kind pige mogingore madongo bende ne amiyo geche lweny kod farese odonjo kuno kaachiel gi oganda lweny maratego mongielore piny ok nyal chako chung kendo adier ne githo mana ka taya mosim koro awachonu niya weuru keto chunyu e gik machon kuparo gik osekadho koro adwaro timo gima nyien neuru asechako time donge unene abiro loso yo e piny motwo adier abiro loso yore e piny motimo ongoro le mae thim kaka bwe kod udo nogona erokamano nikech abiro kelo pi e piny motwo mi alos yore e piny motimo ongoro mondo joga moyier oyud pi mamodho gin ji mane atimo ogandana awuon mondo oland weche miya duong neyeuru ni ne ok uluonga mondo akonyu yaye joka jakobo useol koda israel ok usetimona misengni miwango pep mag rombe kendo ok usemiya duong kutimona misengni mamoko ok asechandou mondo utimna misengni mag cham bende ok asemiyou ting mapek ka adwaro ni mondo uwangna ubani ne ok ungiewona niang gi pesau kata dhila gi boche mag misengniu ne ok udhila ne utura mana gi richou kendo ne uola mana gi timbeu mamono kende e jal rucho richou oko mi ok chak par kendo nikech mano e gima ahero timo parnauru gik mane otimore chon mondo wapim wach kaachiel wachuru wecheu ane manyiso ni uonge gi ketho kwaro mokwongo ne otimo richo kendo jonabiu ne opiem koda jodongu bende ne omiyo hekalu mara odoko mogak mano omiyo ne ajwango joisrael nyikwa jakobo mondo otieki mi yud wichkuot isaya ruoth nyasaye e nyasaye kende koro winjauru un jotichna nyikwa jakobo chikuru itu un joisrael oganda aseyiero ruoth nyasaye jachuechu kendo jakonyu mane olosou chakre e ich awacho kama un joka jakobo jatichna bende aluongo ni jojeshurun kik ubed maluor nikech abiro kelo koth mangeny e lowo motwo mobaro okak bende abiro olo rohona kuom kothu ka aguedhogi ginidongi mana ka lum man kama ngich kata ka yien manie bath aora ngat moro nowach niya ngat ruoth nyasaye machielo nowach ni en nyakwar jakobo ngat moro nondik nying ruoth nyasaye e lwete kendo noluongre gi nying israel ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ruodh joisrael kendo jawargi wacho niya e mokwongo kendo neno kendo chunygi thanythany ok ginyal fwenyo tiend gimoro ngat machal kamano onge gi paro kata rieko onyalo penjorego kende niya bath yadhni konchiel ne achwako mi atedogo makati bende asebuloe kwayoni e kinde mowinjore adier abiro konyi e ndalo mar resruok anariti mi achiwi ka ngama kelo winjruok e kinda gi ji mondo ichak idwok piny kare mi ipog ni ji puothe mojwang awacho ni joma ni e tuech niya auru udhi mago manie mudho bende awachonigi ni wuoguru mondo ji oneu giniyud chiemo kamoro amora gidhiye kata mana e gode gi pewe duto motwo mana ka gima gin rombe mikwayo maber kech ok
