neuru ginibi ka gia kuonde maboyo moko noa yo nyandwat gi yo podho chieng moko noa e piny syene yo milambo un polo gi piny koguru gi mor weruru wende locho un gode nimar ruoth nyasaye osekueyo chuny joge machandore kendo obiro kechogi dala sayun wacho niya ruoth nyasaye osejwanga adier wi nyasachwa osewil koda wi dhako bende diwil gi nyathi mane odhodho koso wiye diwil adier gi wuode mane onywolo kata ka obedo ni wiye nyalo wil wiya ok diwil kodi ne asegori e tat lweta kendo ohingani osiko neno anena e wanga jogo geri tiyo piyopiyo joma ne omuki mokethi ringo dhi ting wangi malo mondo irang koni gi koni nyithindi chokore ka biro iri ruoth nyasaye mangima akuongora niya nyithindi nochal gi thiwni dhako rwako kata ka law maber miaha rwakorego kata obedo ni okethi kendo miechi odong gundni kamano ibiro yudo ni idoko matin ok nyal romo jogi dakie bende jogo mane okethi noriemb dhi mabor nyithindi mane omayi nosik kawachoni niya ka eri diny ahinya omiyo dwarnwa piny malach mondo wadagie bange inipenjri niya ere kaka ne ayudo nyithindogi duto nyithinda duto ne omaya mi adong maonge gi nyithindo adier ne oriemb joga mi oter e tuech koro en nga mane opidhogi ka ne adong kenda kamacha koso ere kaka ne ayudogi duto ruoth nyasaye wacho niya koro abiro chungo bendera kaka ranyisi mondo aluonggo ogendini mi gibiro kelo nyithindi ka gitingo e korgi kod e gokgi ruodhi mag ogendnigo kaachiel gi mondgi ema nobed ka pidho nyithindigo ginikulreni piny mi ginang buru manie tiendi eka ininge ni e ruoth nyasaye kendo ininge ni ngama ogeno kuoma ok noyud wichkuot bende dima ngat maratego jok osemako koso dires joma ngat makwiny otueyo ruoth nyasaye adwoko niya joma otue nogol kata mana kuom ngat maratego kendo joma omaki bende nores kuom ngat makwiny anaked gi jogo duto kedo kodi mi are nyithindi e lwetgi anachun joma thiri mondo ocham ringregi giwegi kendo anami gimer gi rembgi mana ka joma divai makech omero mi ji duto nonge ni ruoth nyasaye ema aresou jawaru ngama nyalo gik moko duto mar jakobo isaya ruoth nyasaye wacho niya un joisrael nyithinda en adier ni ne ariembou nikech timbeu maricho bende nitie gima nyiso ni nariembou chuth kaka ngato riembo chiege koso ngato nitie mane achiwoune ooyo ne angiewou mana nikech timbeu mamono kuom mano ere gima omiyo ne ok ayudo ngato kane abiro iru koso kane aluongo ere gima omiyo ngato ne ok odwoka uparo ni bada chiek ok nyal warou kata ni aonge gi teko daresugo ooyo ka akok nam duono bende aore lokore piny motwo mi rech manie igi tho kendo dum marach nikech pi onge aloko polo doko marateng ti mana ka gima aume gi pien kaka jatich ruoth nyasaye timo gima nyasaye dwaro ruoth nyasaye osemiya lep mar puonj mondo ange kaka anyalo hoyo ngat ojony opiago ita mabith gokinyi pilepile ni mondo achik ita ka ngat mipuonjo ruoth nyasaye oseyawo ita mi ok asetamora winjo wachne bende ok aselokora mi aweye ne aloko diengeya ni joma goya kendo nachiwo tika ni joma dwaro pudho wanga bende ne ok apando kiyanya kata kingudho kuoma olawo ruoth nyasaye biro konya omiyo onge ayany moro nyalo hinya kuom mano aseguro wiya matek ka lwanda ka angeyo ni ok nayud wichkuot bende angeyo ni ngat biro pogo wachna kare ni buta kuom mano ngat hedhore piem koda mondo obi waradi adier ngat dwaro kwero wechena mondo owuog ane ruoth nyasaye ema biro chwaka koro ere ngama biro loya gi bura ooyo mano ok nyalre giduto gibiro ti ka law olwenda ochamo ere ngato kuomu moluoro ruoth nyasaye kendo winjo dwond jatichne bende wuotho kuonde motimo mudho ok ne ler kata matin ngat kamano mondo ogen kuom ruoth nyasaye winjuru un duto joma kudho mach kendo moko meny mi liel wuothuru awuotha e ligek mach musekudho kendo e meny usemokono ubiro rieru piny gi rem malit kutho isaya sayun oyudo weche kueyo chuny winjauru un duto joma ohero tim makare kendo ogeno kuom ruoth nyasaye paruru lwanda mane ogoloue ranguru bur mane okuny mogoloue adier paruru ibrahim wuonu kod sara mane onywolou kane aluongo ibrahim ne en mana ngat achiel kende bange ne aguedhe mi amiye odoko oganda maduong ruoth nyasaye naho chuny sayun adier anaguedh kuonde modong gundni mi alok kuonde motimo ongoro bed ka eden puoth nyasaye mor gi ilo kaachiel gi erokamano kod wer mamit nopong sayun winjuru un joga chikuru itu yaye ogandana nimar abiro golo chik mi ami adierana bed taya ni ogendini adiera mara biro machiegni ee resruok akelo nenore ratiro abiro rito ogendini gi bada motegno kendo joma odak e pinje manie dhonembe gi chulni biro ngiya ka gigeno ni abiro ritogi gi tekona tinguru wangu urang polo nikech polo biro lal ka iro piny bende ranguru nimar piny biro ti ka law ka ji modakie tho ka lwangni resruok akelo nosiki kendo teko awarogo ji ok norum winjuru un joma ongeyo tim makare kaka obet kendo keto chunygi kuom chikna kik uluor achaya mag ji kendo ayany giyanyougo kik gou kibaji nikech ibiro tiekgi mi girum mana kaka olwenda tieko law teko awarogo ji nosiki nyaka chieng adier resruok akelo ok norum kuom tienge duto malo malo jiw badi motegno ruoth nyasaye jiwri kaka nijiwori chon e ndalo mokadho donge ema nichwowo ondieg nam miluongo ni rahab mi ingado matindotindo donge ema ne idwono pi ataro mi iloko kuonde matut mag nam obedo yo mondo joma owar okadhie kamano joma ruoth nyasaye osewaro noduog dala ginidonj sayun ka gikok gi mor kendo ka mor mosiko opongo chungi chutho giniwuothi ka gimor kendo ka giil kuyo gi parruok nolal nono awuon ema ahoyou kuom mano ere gima omiyo uluoro dhano adhana matho kendo maonge ndhathe ka lumni ere gima omiyo wiu osewil gi ruoth nyasaye jachuechu mane oyaro polo kendo ochueyo piny ere gima omiyo kibaji osiko ka goyou ndalo duto koso ango momiyo uluoro mirimb ngat masandou kadwaro tiekou uparo ni mirimb ngat sandouno gima nade misumba tich turo ibiro gonyo machiegni ok enotho mi odhi e piny joma otho kata mana chiemo bende ok nochandi e ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mamiyo nam gingore mi apaka wuo nyinga en ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto aseketo wechena e dhou mi apandou e tipo mar lweta ka ayaro polo kendo ka aketo mise mar piny bende ka awachonu un josayun ni un e joga malo malo dala jerusalem ruoth nyasaye osekumi malit ahinya komiyi kikombe mirimbe opongo imadho adier isemadho kikombe mamero ji mi ilungo kuom yawuowi duto isenywolo onge kata achiel manyalo teloni adier kuom yawuowi duto isepidho onge kata achiel ditayi masiche ariyo osemaki achiel en kethruok piny machielo en tho mar kech kod lweny ere ngama nyalo hoyi kendo duog chunyi ruoth nyasaye okumo yawuoti gi kum mager ginindo e yore duto mana ka gima gimer kendo mana ka le obadho omako emomiyo winji miseyudo masira kendo imer ok gi kongo ruoth nyasaye nyasachi kendo ruodhi chwako joge e bura owacho kama nge ni agolo kikombe mamero ji e lweti mi ok nichak imethi e kikombe mar mirimbano nikech aweyo kumi abiro kete e lwet joma sandi kendo thiri mane owachoni niya nind piny mondo wawuoth kuomi kamano ne inindo piny mondo diengeyi olokre yo jowuoth luwo isaya okor wach ni nyasaye nogol sayun e lwet wasike malo malo mondo ibed motegno dala sayun rwak lepi mabeyoe moloyo yaye jerusalem dala maler nimar chakre kawuono joma ok oter nyangu kaachiel gi joma ogak ok nochak odonj kuomi dala jerusalem machalo misumba moriere piny e lowo malo itengri mondo buru oa kuomi adier dala sayun machalo nyako misumba gony tonde motuego nguti ruoth nyasaye wacho ni joisrael niya ne ongiewu maonge gima ochul kuomu omiyo koro ibiro warou maonge chudo moro ee ruoth nyasaye wacho kama mokwongo joga ne odhi misri mondo odagie achien joasuria nosandogi malit kayiem nono koro en ango anenoni aneno ka joga okaw nono maonge gima ochul joma ne omakogi goyonigi siboi kendo odiechieng kodiechieng gitugo gi nyinga marach chieng resruok joga nonge nyinga gininge ni kara en mana ema wuoyo kodgi mano kaka ji mor ka neno jaote makelo wach maber ka wuotho ewi gode jaote wacho ni gik moko koro dhi maber kendo olando wach resruok bende owacho ni josayun niya nyasachu e ruoth kuonde duto winjuru jorito mau nokog gi mor nikech gibiro neno ruoth nyasaye gi wengegi ka duogo sayun un kuonde mokethore mag jerusalem koguru gi mor nikech unuyud ka ruoth nyasaye osekecho joge kendo owaro jerusalem ruoth nyasaye osenyiso tekone mana e nyim ogendini duto ka neno omiyo ji duto modak e tung piny koni gi koni none ka ruoth nyasaye reso joge wuoguru wuoguru ua babulon ka ok umulo gimoro mogak adier un mutingo gik lemo wuoguru babulon chuth kusepwodhoru maler ok unuwuog kurikni kendo ok noriembu nikech ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel ema biro telo nyimu kendo en bende ema obiro dongnu chien sandruok jatich ruoth nyasaye none winjuru jatichna biro dhi nyime maber enotinge malo kendo nomiye duong mangongo kaka ne ji mangeny obwok ka onene nikech rem malit oloko wange mi ondoko gima ok chal dhano e kaka ogendini mangeny nobwogi ka onene kendo ruodhi noling thi e nyime nikech ginine gima ne pok giwinjo isaya en nga moseyioe wach mwalando koso ere ngama ruoth nyasaye osenyiso tekone jatich ruoth nyasaye nodongo e nyime mana ka yath tiendene nie lowo motwo ne oonge gi chia bende ne oonge gi duong moro mane nyalo mako wangwa mi mi wahere ji ne ojare kendo okwere ne ne ngat neno chandruok kendo mongiyo gi rem adier ne wajare mi wakwane ka gima nono ka ngato oneno loko wange kucha eka tuochewa ema ne otingo kendo chandruokwa ema ne ture wan ne waparo ni masira mane oyudono ne en kum mane nyasaye omiye nikech richone owuon kara ne ochwowe mana nikech kethowa ee ne osande nikech richowa sand mane oyudo ema kelonwa kue kendo wachango nikech chwat mane ochwadego waduto ne waselal mana ka rombe ka ngato ka ngato ochiko mana yore owuon en ema ne ruoth nyasaye oketo kuome richowa duto ne osande kendo ne oyie mondo ochwade ne ok owacho gimoro noling thi mana ka rombo mitero kar yengo kata ka rombo manie nyim joma ngado yiere kane osemake mi ongadne bura ne okawe mi otere e tho onge ngama ne openjo gima omiyo inege adier ne ogole oko e piny joma ngima nikech richo mag jowa ne en gi jamoko ka otho kendo ne okunyne bur kama iyikoe joricho onge tim mahundu mane osetimo kata miriambo mane osewuok e dhoge kata kamano ne en dwaro mar ruoth nyasaye ni mondo ogoye mi kete e chandruok ka ochiwo ngimane mondo opwodhgo richo mag joma moko enone ka nyithinde dak aminga kendo gik ruoth nyasaye ochano nodhi maber nikech en bang chandruokne duto enone ler kendo enonge malongo ni osetimo gima kare kaka jatichna en ngat makare omiyo en bende enomi ji mangeny bedo joma kare kotingo richogi kuom mano anamiye pok kaachiel gi joma dongo kendo enopog gik moyaki gi joma rateke nimar ne ochiwore chuth mi otho kendo ne okwane kaka achiel kuom joricho nikech ne otingo richo ji mangeny kochung kar joricho e nyim nyasaye isaya hera mochwere ruoth nyasaye oherogo israel ruoth nyasaye owacho niya wer matek jerusalem machalo gi dhako migumba mane ok onywol adier kog gi mor michalo dhako pok muochh okayo nikech dhako chwore oweyo nobed gi nyithindo mangeny moloyo dhako man gi dichwo med odi obed maduong adier yar rageng mag hembi malach bende tud tondene obed maboyo kendo igur loyene obed motegno nimar ibiro nya kuonde duto kendo nyikwayi noma ogendini pinjegi mi gidag e mier koro owe gundni kik ibed maluor kata kik chunyi nyosre nikech ok niyud wich kuot ndalo biro chopo wiyi nowilie gi wich kuot mane iyudo ka pod itin kendo ok nichak ipar chandruok mane ineno kane idong chi liel nimar jachwechni e chwori nyinge en ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto adier jawarni en ngama ler mar israel iluongo ni nyasach piny ngima ruoth nyasaye oseduoki ire mana ka dhako mane oyudo osejwang chunye lit ahinya ruoth nyasaye penjo niya bende ngato dijwang chiege mane okendo ka en wuowi adier chutho ne ajwangi kuom kinde manok koro abiro dwoki dala gi hera matut kane mirima ohinga ne apandoni wanga kuom ndalo matin koro asekechi gi ngwono mochwere ruoth nyasaye jawarni ema awacho kamano gik mosetimore miyo aparo ndalo mag nowa kaka ne akuongora e ndalogo ni pi mane oimo piny ok nochak oime kendo e kaka koro akuongora ni mirima ok nochak omaka kodi kendo bende ok nachak adhawni kata da bed ni gode madongo lal nono kendo gode matindo gol herana ok nolal nono bende singruok mar kue mane atimo ok nogol kuomi ruoth nyasaye kechoi ema awacho kamano jerusalem manyien winji jerusalem dala mosandi ahiti oyiecho mi odong gunda kokuyo maonge ngama hoyo abiro keto mise mari gi kite motegno mi ageri gi kite mabeyo diriseni abiro loso gi kite makwar mi aket kite mangangni e dhorangeyeni kendo ager ohingani gi kite nengogi tek ruoth nyasaye ema nopuonj joma geri duto kendo nyithindi nodhi nyime maber ahinya enogeri e mise mar tim makare kendo inibed mabor gi kuonde mithiroe ji omiyo ok nibed maluor bende nibed mabor gi masiche mi ok ginisud machiegni kodi ka ipo ni ngato omonji ok nakonye adier ngato angata momonji norum nikech aheri ema achueyo jatheth chwako chuma e mach eka athedhogo gi lweny bende ema achweyo jolweny kedo gi gigo ka kethogo gik moko koro onge gir lweny molosi ni mondo ohinyi nohinyi bende inilo buche duto modonjnie mano e pok jotich ruoth nyasaye yudo adier mano e gueth asemiyogi ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano isaya mich mar kue mochiw nono ni ji duto winjuru un duto riyo oloyo biuru mondo umodhi un joma onge gi chiemo biuru ungiew chiemo ucham ee biuru ukaw akawa divai gi chak nono ok uchulo gimoro ere gima omiyo ungiewo chiemo ok konyu kuketho mwandu kuom gima ok nyal yiengou ka uchiko itu mi uwinjo gima awacho ubiro chamo chiemo mabeyo mi uwinj ndhath gima uchamo biuru ira mondo uchik itu ni gima awacho adier winjuru wachna mondo ubed mangima eka abiro timo kodu singruok mochwere ka asingora ni abiro herou gi chunya duto kaka ne ahero daudi ne akete mondo obed jaote ni ogendini duto ee nakete jatelo kendo japuonj ji kamano un bende unuluong ogendini ok ungeyo mondo obi mi ogendini ok ongeyou noring ka biro iru nikech ruoth nyasaye ngama ler mar israel osemiyou duong dwaruru ruoth nyasaye kapod kinde nitie minyalo yudego adier ywagneuru ka pod en machiegni joma timbegi mono mondo owe timbegi maricho kod paro mochido onego giduog ir ruoth nyasaye mondo okechgi adier onego gidwog ir nyasachwa nimar nongwonnigi richogi duto ruoth nyasaye wacho niya parou ok e parona bende yoreu ok e yorena nimar kaka polo bor moyombo piny e kaka yorena bende boyo moyombo mau kendo e kaka parona bende boyo moyombo parou bende kaka koth chue kendo pe lwar koa e polo mi ok chak dog malo kendo miyo mana piny ngich mondo cham otwi mi thiew kendo nyagi mi kodhi ichwoyo kod cham bedie e kaka wach mawuok e dhoga nochal ok noduog ira ka pok otiyo tije enotim gima ne ochano mi ochop ote mane aoree adier unuwuog babulon gi mor kod kue kendo kuonde mukadhoe gode madongo gi matindo nogo mahu gi mor yien duto mae thim bende nopam lwetgi kuonde koro pedo gi kudho nitie yien mabeyo ema biro dongoe mano nomi ruoth nyasaye bedo gi huma ok nyal lal kendo nobed rapar mosiko nyaka chieng isaya pok miyudo kuom rito singruok mar nyasaye ruoth nyasaye wacho niya rituru chik kendo beduru gi timbe makare nimar piyopiyo nono resruok akelo biro mi timna makare nonere ratiro kolocho jal matimo kamano mak oweyo kendo momako wechego ndalo duto en jahawi adier ngat morito sabato mondo kik kethie bende ok tim gimoro marach en jahawi ngat japiny moro moseyie kuom ruoth nyasaye kik luor kawacho e chunye niya adier ruoth nyasaye biro poga kuom joge nyaka chieng ngama buoch bende kik wachi ni ok gimoro mana yath ok nyagi nikech ruoth nyasaye awacho kama joma buoch marito sabato maga kendo mayiero mondo otim gik adwaro bende morito singruok asetimo kodgi noyud gima ber moloyo yudo nyithindo giniyud rapar e oda kendo e ohingana adier abiro miyogi nying mosiko ok rum nyaka chieng kamano bende e kaka ruoth nyasaye awacho ni jopinje mamoko oyie kuoma ka lama kendo ohero nyinga bende mobedo jotichna morito sabato mondo kik kethie kendo morito singruok atimo kodgi awachonigi ni anakelgi e goda maler mi ami gibed mamor e oda mar lemo kendo nayie gi gik giwacho e kendonamarmisango kaachiel gi misengni gitimona nikech noluong oda ni od lemo mar ogendini duto ruoth nyasaye machoko joisrael moke awacho kama ji duto mane odong mak ochoki pod abiro dwoko dala okwer joisrael kuom lamo nyiseche manono biuru mondo uchiem un le mae pap kod mae thim nikech jotend israel duto chalo gi jorito muofni ok ne gimoro giduto gichalo gi guogi momni ok nyal gueyo gihero nindo ka giriere piny ka gileko adier gichalo guogi mowuor ok yieng gin jokwath ok ongeyo gimoro moro ka moro dhi e yore owuon kadwaro ohande kamoro amora monyalo yudee ngato ka ngato kuomgi wacho niya biuru wamany divai kod kongo makech mondo wamadh wamer kiny bende nobed maber mana kama kata moloyo isaya ji makare tho onge ngama dewo bende joma oyie kuom nyasaye iwito kucha onge ngama penjo adier richo ema yueyo joma kare oko kata kamano gidonjo kama okue giseluwo yo moriere tir mi koro ginindo gi kue e kar yueyo mogik un nyithind ajuoga biuru ka ee un koth ngat jaterre kod dhako jamganga suduru machiegni en nga mujaro kumoyone wangu kendo kumilone lewu donge un nyithindo monywol e richo koth miriambo uoworu gi nyiseche manono e tiend yien mangich duto kendo uwango nyithindu ka misengni e hohni kendo e kind lwendni maboyo oganda israel kar dak mopogni ni e hoho motimo lwendni mapoth kuno ema itimoe misengni miolo piny ni nyiseche manono kendo ema ichiwoe misengni mag cham iparo ni dawe mak asin gi gigo koso bende ewi got moro marabora e kama isedwanyorie kuno bende iseidhoe mitimoe misengni kendo isechungoe nyisecheni manono e nge dhoudi kod e lemb dhoudi adier iseweya mabor mi ichalo nyako molonyore duk kendo inindo e kitanda malach iseloso ka itimo winjruok gi chwo mana nikech mor mar nindo kodgi kaachiel kidwanyori kodgi ndalo mangeny ok kwan ka dendi oowi ne iwirori gi modhi mondo ilomb nyasaye manono miluongo ni molek kendo ne ibukori gi poda mangeny mangue ngar mi ioro jooteni kuonde maboyo koda ka e pinje joma otho kata obedo ni ne iol gi wuoth mabor kamano ne ok iwacho niya gima atimoni onge gi tiende ne ineno ka tekoni oduogo mi ok inyisori en nga iluoro ahinya omiyo iweya ok inyal para kata mana rwaka e chunyini koso idagi luora nikech ne ineno ka aling alinga mi achalo ngama ok oneni koro abiro kwedo timni marach iparo ni berno nyisecheni manonogo ok nokonyi ka iywak adier onge nyasaye moro amora noresi yamo notergi mabor giduto ee kata mana muya matin nono nokudhgi mi tergi mabor joma oloka kar konyruokgi nokaw piny kendo goda maler nobed mwandugi kony kod chang nyasaye kelo bange unuwinj dwol ka wacho niya buguru ndara bugeuru kendo loseuru maber kugolo gik moko duto dichwany joga ngama duong moloyo nyinge ngama ler kendo mosiko nyaka chieng wacho kama adak kama ler kendo man malo gi joma chunygi obolore kendo muol mondo aduog chuny joma muol kendo ajiw teko mar joma obolore ok anabed kadhaw ndalo duto bende ok anabed kakecho nyaka chieng nimar ka da bed ni atimo kamano ji duto mane achueyo ditho kuom kinde moko ne akecho ka aneno ketho joisrael ne agoyogi ka mirima oloya mi apandonigi wanga ne giringo ka joneko mi gidhi kuma gin ema gihero aseneno timbegi pod abiro mana changogi mi aho chunygi kendo amigi yueyo maber bende anakue chuny jogi maywak ruoth nyasaye awacho niya kue mondo obedie ni joma ni mabor kendo ni joma ni machiegni nikech abiro changogi joricho chalo gi nam moduwore adier gichalo mana nam ok nyal kue pige olokore mana chuodho gi yugi nyasaye awacho niya joricho onge gi kue isaya kit tueyo chiemo nyasaye morgo gouru koko matek mak uweyo kuywak mana ka tung huluru ni joga kethogi adier nyisuru joka jakobo richogi kata obedo ni gin joricho kamano pod gidwara pilepile kendo gihero ngeyo yorena mana ka oganda timo gik makare kendo ok oweyo chik nyasaye gikwaya mondo amigi chike makare kendo giwacho ni gimor ka gisudo machiegni koda gipenja niya ere gima omiyo watueyo chiemo ka ok ine mano koso ango momiyo wasandore ka ok ine adwokogi niya winjuru chieng utueyo chiemo utimo gik un uwegi ema udwaro kendo jotichu ema uturo gi tich matek kuom mano tueyo chiemo utueyo kelo mana miero gi lweny kendo miyo ji goyo joma odhier adhong emomiyo tueyo chiemo mutueyono ok nomi winj dwondu e polo malo uparo ni kit tueyo chiemo ayiego en mana sando ringruok ka ngato okulo wiye piny ka togo kata ka onindo e pien gugru mopedho e buru koso mano e gima uluongo ni tueyo chiemo adier koso mano e chieng ruoth nyasaye ayiego donge kit tueyo chiemo adwaro en ni mondo ugony tonde mag richo kendo utur jok duto mondo joma isando oyud yueyo koso donge en ni mondo upog chiembu ni joma kech ohewo kendo urwak joma odhier onge kuonde dak e miechu bende umi joma wuotho duk lewni kendo kik upand wangu ni wedeu kutimo kamano eka ler un go noyawre mana ka ru piny kendo unubed mangima mana ka adhola mosechango timbeu uwegi makare ema notelnu kendo duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye ema nodongnu chien bange ka uluongo ruoth nyasaye nodwoku adier ka uywakne nodwoku niya ka ka uweyo sando ji kendo uweyo achaya kod hango ji kayiem mi umiyo joma kech kayo chiemo kendo ukonyo joma thagore gi gik gichando ler un go norieny e mudho kendo kata mana tipou nobed maler ka odiechieng ruoth nyasaye ema nobed ka telonu pilepile kokonyou kuonde motwo enomi dendu bed mojing mi uchal gi puodho mangich maber kata ka soko pige ok duon nyithindu munywolo nochak oger kuonde nodong gundni mana ewi mise machon mi noluongu ni joger ohinga momukore kendo ni jolos udi mane okethi rito chieng sabato ka urito chieng sabato maler ok utiyo tijeu uwegi kendo ka ok utimo gik un ema udwaro chiengno uhulo ni chiengno en chieng mor kendo chiengg mowal ni ruoth nyasaye kendo umiyo ruoth nyasaye duong kuom weyoo loko ohala kendo kuweyo weche manono unubed moil kuom ruoth nyasaye kendo enoteru ewi piny kama otingore ka ulocho bende enomiu mwandu mane osingore ni nomi jakobo kwaru ruoth nyasaye ema owacho kamano isaya joisrael ohulo richogi bad ruoth nyasaye ok chiek ok nyal reso ji bende ite ok odino ok onyal winjo wach richou ema opogo kindu gi nyasachu adier richou ema osemiyo opandonu wange mondo kik owinj kwayou lwetu omienore gi remo kendo usemulo richo miriambo bende wuok e dhou kendo lew hango wach onge ngama donjo ni wadgi e yo makare kata yalo bura gi adiera ji duto ogeno kuom weche manono kod miriambo gichano weche maricho e chunygi bange nywolo mana chandruok gibutno e tong thuonde kendo gichwoyo mbup otieng chamie tonggo ane ka ok ditho kata temie kitoyo moro mak ineno ka thuol ema owuokie mbupgi ok nyal chuego nanga kendo onge ngama nyalo rwako gik gichueyo tichgi kelo mana chandruok kendo lwetgi odich mana gi timbe mahundu tiendgi rikni ka gidhi timo richo kendo giyot ni chuero remo maonge ketho paro mopongo chunygi en mana paro mamono kendo kamoro amora gidhiyoe masira gi chandruok ema dongie ok gingeyo yo makelo kue kendo adiera onge e timbegi bende yore duto giluwo ogondore ogondore kendo ngama luwo yorego ok yud kue kata matin mano ema omiyo adiera bor kodwa kendo tim makare ok chop kuomwa wagombo mondo wane ler mudho lilo ema waneno adier wadwaro mondo piny oru mudho mandiwa ema wawuothoe wamulo amula kor udi ka muofni adier watuomore atuoma ka joma ok nen wachwanyore godiechieng mana ka gima piny oimore chutho wachalo mana joma otho e kind joma ngima wangur mana ka ondiegi kendo waywagore malit mana ka tula wageno yudo adiera ok wayudi warito resruok pod en mabor ahinya richowa osebedo ka medore ameda e nyim nyasaye chutho timbewa mamono ema nyiso ni wan joricho wangeyo timbewa mamono kendo waparogi wasenganyo mi waketho e nyim ruoth nyasaye adier wasedok chien mi wajwango nyasachwa bende waseparo weche mag miriambo e chunywa kendo mago ema wawuondogo ji bura makare ogol oko kendo tim makare ni kuma bor adiera bende onge kata mana e chirni kendo bura makare orumo e ut bura chuth kuom mano adiera olal nono kendo ka ngato obet motang ni richo ikwane mana ka janeko ruoth nyasaye noneno ni adiera onge omiyo iye nowang noneno ni onge ngama dikony mi mirima mager omake mano omiyo ne olocho gi tekone owuon kendo adierane ema ne okonyorego ne orwakore gi tim makare ka law akor mar nyinyo kendo ne orwako warruok ka ogut lweny bende ne orwako chulo kuor ka ngama rwako law kendo mirima mager ema ne obolo kuome ka law abola obiro timo ni ngato ka ngato mana gima oromo gi timbene ee obiro kumo wasike gi mirima mager kata mana mago modak e dhonembe gi chulni kamano ji man yo podho chieng gi joma ni yo wuok chieng noluor nying ruoth nyasaye kod duongne maler nimar enobi ka aora mwomore much ruoth nyasaye ema tero enobi ka jawar mar sayun ee nobi mondo ore nyikwa jakobo moseweyo richogi ruoth nyasaye ema owacho kamano bende ruoth nyasaye wacho niya singruok abiro timo kodgi e roho mara man kuomu kod wechena aseketo e dhou nosik kodu chakre kawuono nyaka kuom tienge duto mabiro mag nyikwau ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano isaya duong jerusalem biro yudo dala jerusalem malo rieny nikech lerni osechopo kendo duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye oselor kuomi kata obedo ni mudho biro umo piny mi ogendini bed e mudho mandiwa ruoth nyasaye norieny kuomi mi duongne maler nonenre kuomi ogendini gi ruodhigi nobi e lerni mathinyore ting wangi mondo irang koni gi koni nyithindi duto chokore ka biro iri adier yawuoti biro koa kuma bor kaachiel gi nyigi koik e bathe kineno kamano inibed mamor mi chunyi pong gi ilo mwandu mogundho mag ogendini mopogore opogore nokelni gi yiedhi ngamia mangeny moa midian gi efa nopong pinyi giduto ginia sheba ka gikelo dhahabu kod ubani kendo ka gipako ruoth nyasaye gi wer jamni duto mag kedar nochokni rombe mag nebayoth bende nobed jamni mitimogo misengni ayiego e kendona mar misango mi duong maler mar hekalu mara nomedre mago gin ango kwang ka boche polo kata mahuyo ka akuche maduogo e odgigo gin yiedhi moa e pinje manie dhonembe kod chulni biro ka yiedhi madongo mag tarshish otelonigi gikelo yawuoti moa kuma bor ka nigi dhahabu kod fedha gibiro miyogo nying ruoth nyasaye ngama ler mar israel duong nimar osemiyi duong jerusalem jopinje mamoko ok nochak oger ohinga mari kendo ruodhigi nobed jotichni kata obedo ni ne asandi malit ka gi mirima kamano koro asekechi kendo angwononi dhorangeyeni biro siko koyaw kendo ok nochieggi godiechieng kata gotieno mondo ji okelni mwandu mag ogendini ka ruodhigi otelonigi ogendini gi pinje motamore tiyoni biro lal nono mi kethre chuth yien mabeyo mag lebanon bende nokelni mondo omedgo duong maler mar hekalu mara en raten tienda yawuot joma ne sandi biro miyi duong adier joma ne chari biro kulore e tiendi giniluongi ni dala ruoth nyasaye kendo ni sayun dala mar ngama ler mar israel isebedo dala mojwang kendo ji ochayo maonge ngama lim koro abiro miyo ibedo dala man gi duong mosiko kelo ni ji mor ok rum iniyud mwandu mag ogendini koda ka mago mag ruodhi kamano ininge ni ruoth nyasaye e jaresni adier jawarni en ngama nyalo gik moko duto nyasach jakobo kar mula anakelni dhahabu kar nyinyo anakel fedha kar yien anakel mula kendo kar kite anakel nyinyo bende anami jotendi tiyo gi kue kod tim makare timbe mahundu ok nochak owinji kendo e pinyi kata mana tulo moro marach ok nochak omuoch machiegni kodi iniluong ohinga mari ni resruok dhorangeyeni iniluong ni pak wang chieng ok nochak obedni ler mar odiechieng kata due ok nochak orienyni gotieno ruoth nyasaye ema nobedni ler mosiko nyasachi nobedni duong maler wangchieng ok nochak opodhi kendo dueyi bende ok notho nikech ruoth nyasaye ema nobedni ler mosiko mi ndaloni mar ywak norum jogi duto nobed joma kare kendo piny nobed margi nyaka chieng ginichal gi bad yath ema apidho gi lweta awuon mondo okelna duong ji manok nolokre gana apar kendo oganda matin nolokre oganda maduong ruoth nyasaye anami gino timre piyopiyo nono ka kindene ochopo isaya okel ni sayun wach maber mar resruok roho mar ruoth nyasaye ni kuoma nikech ruoth nyasaye oseyiera mowira mondo aland wach maber ni joma odhier oseora mondo akue chuny jogo neno masira bende mondo ahul ni joma omaki ni koro gin thuolo kendo ahul ni joma otue ni koro ogonygi bende oseora mondo ahul ni e higa ruoth nyasaye biro guedhoe joge kod chieng nyasachwa biro chuloe kuor abiro hoyo chuny ji duto man gi lit kendo gik abiro miyogi e magi maua mabeyo kar buru gibukorego kendo mor kar lit gin go kod pak kar bedo gi chuny mool enoluonggi ni yien mag tim makare ruoth nyasaye opidho mondo oyudgo duong ginichak giger kuonde mane omukore kendo ginichak gilos mier mane okethore chon adier ginilos mier mane okethore modong gundni kuom higni mangeny jopinje mamoko nobed jokwadh jambu kendo ginipur puotheu mi gilwer mzabipu un noluongu ni jodolo mag ruoth nyasaye kendo ni jotich nyasachwa unucham mwandu mag ogendini mamoko bende unukaw gigi mabeyo mi ukonyrugo kar bedo gi wichkuot unuyud pok nyadiriyo kendo kar yudo achaya unubed mamor gi poku kamano unuyud pok nyadiriyo e pinyu mi ubed gi mor mochwere nimar ruoth nyasaye ahero adiera amon gi richo kod timbe mamono omiyo abiro miyou pok ok lokre mi atim kodu singruok mochwere nyikwau nongere kendo noyud duong e kind ogendini ji duto monenogi nonge ni un oganda nyasaye oguedho wabeduru mamor kuom ruoth nyasaye gi tekowa duto adier wabed moil kuom nyasachwa nimar oserwakowa gi warruok mana ka ngama orwako nanga kendo mana ka wuon kisera magawo maua e ngute kaka lowo miyo cham twi e kaka ruoth nyasaye bende nomi tim makare kod pak thiew e nyim ogendini duto isaya sayun aheri omiyo ok analing adier aheri jerusalem omiyo ok nawe wuoyo nyaka chop resi mi resruokni rieny ka taya maliel ogendini none ni oseresi kendo ruodhi duto bende none kaka osemiyi duong bange noluongi gi nying manyien ruoth nyasaye owuon ema nochaki inibed kondo maber e lwet ruoth nyasaye adier inibed osimb ruoth e lwet nyasachi ji ok nochak oluongi kendo ni dala mojwang piny bende ok nochak oluongi kendo ni piny mowe noluongi ni dala amorgo kendo noluong pinyi ni dhako mokendi nimar ruoth nyasaye mor kodi kendo pinyi nochal gi dhako man gi chwore kaka wuowi kendo nyako e kaka jal mane ogeri biro kendi adier kaka ngat mokendo mor gi chiege e kaka nyasachi nobed mamor kodi jerusalem aseketo jorit e ohinga mari ok giling odiechieng gotieno duto awachonigi niya un joma paro ni ruoth nyasaye wach kik uyue kata en bende kik uwe oyue nyaka chop ami jerusalem bed dala marahuma ji duto pako ruoth nyasaye osekuongore kotingo bade korachwich man gi teko kowacho niya ok nachak ayie wasiki kaw chambi ocham jopinje mamoko bende ok nochak omadh divai isetiyone matek jogo mosekeyo ema nocham cham gisekayo kendo ginipak ruoth nyasaye bende jogo mosepono olemb mzabibu nomadh divai e laru mar hekalu mara wuoguru wuoguru e dhorangach mondo ulos ni joga yo buguru yo bugeuru maber kendo goluru kite bange tinguru bandera mondo ji one wach ruoth nyasaye osebedo ka lando e tung piny gi tung piny ema nyisuru josayun ni jaresu biro obiro gi joge mogonyo e lweny kawuotho e nyime ka gik oyako noluonggi ni joma owal kendo ni joma ruoth nyasaye osewaro kendo ni dala ok ojwang isaya chieng nyasaye chuloe kuor mano nga mabiro koa bozra e piny edom ka lepe otimo remono orwakore gi lep duong kendo owuotho gi tekone duto ruoth nyasaye ema abiro ka ahulo ni jerusalem oseresi kendo ema gi teko mar waro ji ere gima omiyo lepi duto kwar mana ka lep ngama nyono mzabibu ka biyo gikwar kamano nikech asenyono mzabibu kenda kar bicho onge ngato kata achiel kuom ogendini mane ni koda ne anyono wasika piny ka akecho adier ne anyonogi ka gi mirima mager mi rembgi okirore e lepa mano ema omiyo lepa duto otimo remo ne asechano chieng achuloe kuor kendo higa aresoe joga osechopo ne arango ngama dikonya ne ok ayudo kuom mano ne adhier nono kane ayudo ni onge ngama nyalo konya kata kamano tekona awuon ne omiyo alocho kendo mirimba awuon ema ne okonya ne anyono ogendini piny ka akecho ee ne atongogi atongogi mi rembgi obubni piny gueth ruoth nyasaye biro guedhogo joisrael abiro pako ber mar ruoth nyasaye kod timbene madongo miwuoro ka agoyo erokamano kuom gik moko duto mosetimonwa kendo kuom hera maduong moseherowago wan joisrael notimonwa kamano nikech ngwonone kod herane mogundho ruoth nyasaye nowacho niya jogi gin joga adier gin yawuota ok nyal wuonda omiyo ne odoko jaresgi e chandruok duto onge jaote kata malaika moro mane oresogi mana en ema osebedo ka owarogi gi herane kod ngwonone kotingogi nyaka nene kata kamano ne gidagi lochne mi gimiyo roho mare maler okuyo eka ne olokore jasikgi mi okedo kodgi en owuon bange ne giparo ndalo machon mi gipenjore niya ere nyasaye mane ogolo joge e aora nael ka musa otelonigi adier ere jal mane oketo roho mare kuomgi kendo mane otiyo gi tekone mangongo e dir musa korachwich mobarogo pi e nyimgi mondo nyinge oyud duong mochwere ne omiyo gingado nam mayot mana kaka faras ngado thim kendo mana kaka jamni ridore e holo ok chwanyre roho mar ruoth nyasaye notelonigi ka gidhi kar yueyo mano e kaka ne otelo ni joge mondo nyinge oyud duong lemo mikwayogo ruoth nyasaye mondo okel konyruok ruoth nyasaye rang piny gie polo mondo ine ee rang piny gi kuma ler idakie gi duong tinde ere hera matut yande iherowago cha koso ere tekoni kod kinda mane go chon e wuonwa omiyo kik idagi konyowa kata obedo ni ibrahim ok ongeyowa kendo israel ok oyie ni wan joge ruoth nyasaye e wuonwa kendo e jawarwa nyaka nene ruoth nyasaye ere gima omiyo iweyowa aweya mi wabaro waweyo yoreni koso ango momiyo imiyo chunywa doko matek mondo kik waluori duogi nikech wan wan jotichni wan dhoudi mikwano ka mwanduni ere gima omiyo joricho osedonjo e hekalu mari koso ango momiyo wasikwa osenyono kama ilamie kuom ndalo mangeny osekwanwa ka joma ok nie bwo lochni mana ka gima ok wan jogi iwuon isaya mad ibar polo ilor piny mondo imi gode oleny e nyimi mana kaka mach wango oswekle kendo yienyo pi kitimo kamano eka wasiki diwinj humbi kendo ogendini ditetni ka ibiro kane itimo honni mane ok wagen ni wanane ne ilor piny mi gode oleny e nyimi pok owinjo kata wang pok oneno nyasaye moro rito joge mogeno kuome mak mana ihero ngat matimo tim makare ka mor kendo paro yoreni kata kane ikecho kamano wan ne pod watimo richo atima wasesiko gi richowa ndalo mangeny koro bende niwarwa adier waduto wasebedo ka ngat mogak kendo timbewa duto mabeyo chalo mana gi lewni mochido waduto wasener mana ka oboke kendo timbewa mamono kwadhowa oko mana ka yamo onge ngama lami kata matemo mondo opadre kuomi nikech ipandonwa wangi kendo ijwangowa e richowa kata kamano ruoth nyasaye e wuonwa wan lop chuech e jachwechwa kendo wan duto wan tich lweti ruoth nyasaye kik ibed gi mirima moloyo kaka owinjore kata paro richowa ndalo duto rangwa wahombi nikech wan duto wan jogi miechi maler kendo madongo duto olokore thim kata mana sayun owuon olokore thim adier jerusalem osewe gunda mach osewango hekalu marwa jaber kendo man gi duong mane kwerewa pakie omiyo giwa duto mabeyo osekethore bende diyie weyo gik makamagi yaye ruoth nyasaye koso diling thi kikumowa moloyo kaka owinjore isaya kum mibiro kumogo joma dagi loch nyasaye ruoth nyasaye wacho niya ne antie mondo jogo mane ok dwara omanya adier ne aikora mondo joma ne ok manya oyuda ka awacho ni oganda mane ok lama ni eri eri ne arieyo bada odiechieng duto ka ahombo joma wigi tek mane luwo mana yoregi maricho katimo dwarogi giwegi gin joma ne kwinya pilepile kaneno ka gitimo misengni e puothe kendo giwango ubani e kende molos gi matafali ne gigwom e liete joma otho kendo ne gipondo kuonde mobuto otieno duto bende ne gichamo ring mbidhi kod chiemo moko makuero giwacho ni ji mamoko niya kik usud machiegni kodwa bende kik umulwa nimar waler moloyou joma kamago gin mach maliel aliela ok tho iche thinga odiechieng duto neuru wachno osendiki e nyima ok abi ling abiro kumou kuom richou kaachiel gi richo mag wuoneu ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano ne uwango ubani e gode duto madongo gi matindo kukweda omiyo abiro kwongo pimo pok monego uyudi eka achulu kaka owinjore ruoth nyasaye wacho kama kaka olemo moko mabeyo dilosgo divai nyalo yudore e saga marach ji kwer ni kik wit sagano nimar otingo hawi e kaka abiro timo ni jotichna mi ok natiek oganda duto anami jakobo nyikwayo noluw bange kendo anami juda jocham gikeni nikaw godena ee joga moyier jotichna nokaw pinyno mi dagie joga osebedo ka lama nokwa jambgi e geng sharon kendo holo mar akor nobed leg dhogi un mane ujwanga ruoth nyasaye mi wiu owil gi goda maler kendo uloso sewni ni nyiseche manono miluongo ni gad gi meni kutimonigi misengni miolo piny asengadonu buch tho kendo uduto ibiro negu nikech ne aluongou ne ok udwoka bende ne alosonu ne udagi winja ne utimo timbe mamono ok ayiego kuyiero mana gik adagi kuom mano ruoth nyasaye awacho niya jotichna nochiem un unudeny kendo ginimodhi un riyo nohewu bende ginibed mail un unuyud wichkuot jotichna nower ka chunygi mor un unywasgi ka ukuyo kendo chunyu lit ka joga moyier dwaro kuongo ngato giniluong nyingu ka giwacho ni ruoth nyasaye mondo oneg ngatno kaka ne onegou joga analuong gi nying moro nono maber ngato angata dwaro mondo oyud gueth e piny nyaka kwa mana nyasach adiera mondo oguedhe bende ngat kuongore e piny ka nyaka kuongre mana e nying nyasach adiera nikech wich nowil gi thagruok machon mi lal nono e wanga polo manyien gi piny manyien winjuru achueyo polo manyien kod piny manyien kamano wich nowil gi gik machon kendo ok nochak opargi emomiyo beduru mamor kendo moil nyaka chieng gi gik achueyo nimar achueyo jerusalem obed dala makelo mor kendo achueyo joma odakie mondo obed joma oil abiro bedo mamor gi jerusalem kendo abiro bedo moil nikech joga ywak kod ywagruok ok nochak owinji e jerusalem kendo ok nobedie nyathi matho kapod yom kata ngat maduong matho kapok ndalone orumo bende ka ngato otho ka hike mia achiel nokwane ka ngama otho kapod tin joricho mokwong kende ema notho ka pok hikgi oromo mia achiel ji noger udi kendo ginidagie aminga kendo ginipur puothe mzabibu mi gicham olembgi ok giniger udi ni mondo jomoko nono ema odagie bende ok ginichwo cham ni mondo jomoko nono ema ocham joga moyier nodag aminga mana kaka yath dak mi kuom ndalo mangeny ginicham mwandu luchgi okelo ok giniketh tekregi kayiem bende ok gininywol nyithindo maneno masira nimar gin kaachiel gi nyithindgi gin joma ruoth nyasaye oguedho anadwokgi kapok giluonga kendo anawinjgi kapok gitieko wuoyo ondiek kod rombo nokwa kaachiel kendo sibuor nocham lum mana ka dhiang thuol nocham mana lowo onge gima nohiny ngato kata noketh gimoro e gode maler duto ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano isaya bura ruoth nyasaye biro ngado gi gueth mobiro guedhogo sayun ruoth nyasaye wacho niya polo e koma mar duong piny e raten tienda kuom mano ere kama dugernae ot koso ere kama dayueye gigi duto ema achueyo kendo e wuongi ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano ngat abiro konyo en ngat mamuol chunye otur kendo tetni kowinjo wachna ngat moyango rwath chalre gi ngat monego dhano ngat motimo misango gi rombo bende chalre gi ngat moturo ngut guok kendo ngat mochiwo misango mar cham chalre gi ngat mochiwo remb mbidhi bende ngat mowango ubani kar rapar chalre gi ngat molamo nyiseche manono kendo kaka chunygi mor gi timbe makuerogo e kaka bende abiro yieronigi masiche mondo omakgi ka akelo kuomgi gik giluoro nimar ne alwongo onge ngama dwoka kendo ne awuoyo onge ngama winja ne gitimo timbe mamono ok ayiego eka giyiero mana gik adagi winjuru wach ruoth nyasaye un mutetni kowuoyo owacho kama joweteu mosin kodu kendo modagu nikech uhero nyinga wacho niya ruoth nyasaye mondo onyis duongne maler mondo waneye ane mor un go kata kamano gin ema ginine wichkuot winjuru tulo omuoch e dala jerusalem koko winjore e hekalu en dwond ruoth nyasaye makumo wasike gi kum mowinjore kodgi bende dhako dinywol nyathi ok owinjo rem donywol wuowi kapok muoch okaye adier ooyo gima kamano pok owinji kata pok one ka kamano bende dichue piny moro godiechieng achiel koso oganda bende dinywol dichiel sayun ne onywolo yawuote mana e sa mowinjoe muoch ruoth nyasaye penjo niya dawe sa dhako nywolie chopi mak amiye teko mar nywol ruoth nyasaye ema owacho kamano un duto muhero jerusalem moruru kode adier beduru gi ilo nikech en un duto yande uywage koro beduru mamor kode gi ilo bange unubed mamor kuchamo mwandune mogundho mana kaka nyathi mor kadhodho min ruoth nyasaye wacho niya abiro miyo jerusalem bedo gi kue mamol ka aora kendo mwandu mag ogendini bende abiro olone mana ka aora motiak unubed mamor mana ka nyithindo midhodho kendo miiko e bath kata mipiro e chong kaka min nyathi hoyo nyathine e kaka bende abiro hoyou mi uyud kue e jerusalem ubiro neno kamano mi chunyu bed mamor dendu nobed maber mana ka lumb chwiri ruoth nyasaye ema nami jotichna onge tekona wasika nanyis mirimba neuru kaka ruoth nyasaye biro ei mach ka gechene mag lweny chalo kalausi mondo osand ji gi mirimbe mager ka mach makakni ruoth nyasaye noyal buch ji duto gi mach kod ligangla kamano joma ruoth nyasaye onego nobed mangeny joma pwodhore kendo bedo maler ni mondo odhi e hembko ka moro ka moro luwo wadgi kendo chamo ring mbidhi gi oyieyo kod gik moko makuero norum dichiel ruoth nyasaye ema owacho kamano ruoth nyasaye angeyo timbegi kaachiel gi parogi bende abiro choko ogendini duto gi dhoudi mawacho dhok mopogore opogore kendo ginibi mi gine duongna maler eka anatim ranyisi e kindgi bange anaor jogi moko motony ir ogendini pok owinjo humba kata pok oneno duongna maler mi ginilandnigi duongna maler ogendnigo gi jotarshish gi joput gi jolud gi jomeshak gi jo rosh gi jotubal kod jojavan kaachiel gi joma odak e dhonembe kod chulni man kuonde maboyo jou gigolo kuom ogendini duto ginikelna kaka chiwo ruoth nyasaye ginikelgi jerusalem goda maler ka moko oidho farese moko oidho geche mag lweny gi geche mamoko kendo moko bende oidho kenje kod ngamia mana kaka joisrael kelo misengni e od ruoth nyasaye ka gitingo e tewni maler ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano moko kuomgi analok jodolo kendo moko anami tich jolawi ruoth nyasaye ema owacho kamano kaka polo manyien gi piny manyien nosiki e nyima e kaka dhoodu gi nyingu bende nosiki ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano e kinde ka kinde due opor kendo chieng sabato ka chieng sabato ji duto nobi e nyima mondo olama ruoth nyasaye ema owacho kamano giniwuogi mi gine ringre joma otho mosepiem koda kudni machamogi ok notho kata mach mawangogi bende ok notho kendo ginibed gik ji duto osingo jeremia kitabuni otingo weche kod timbe mag jeremia wuod hilkia ne en achiel kuom jodolo modak anathoth e piny benjamin ruo wnda wach ruoth nyasaye nobirone e higa mar apar gadek mar loch josia wuod amon ruodh juda ruo wnda ruo wnda kendo e ndalo loch jehoyakim wuod josia nyaka due mar abich mar higa mar apar gachiel mar loch zedekia wuod josia kane odar jojerusalem moter e tuech ruoth nyasaye oluongo jeremia jeremia ruoth nyasaye nowachona niya kane pok achueyi e ich ne oyudo aseyieri kendo kane pok onywoli ne asewali mondo iti tichna mi aketi janabi ni ogendini eka nadwoke niya ruoth nyasaye ok angeyo wuoyo nikech pod atin ruoth nyasaye nowachona niya kik iwachi ni pod itin dhiyo adhiya ir ji duto aori kuomgi mondo iwachnigi gik moko duto anyisi kik iluorgi nikech abiro bet kodi kendi riti ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano bange ruoth nyasaye notero lwete momulo dhoga kowachona niya eri aketo wechena e dhogi kawuono amiyi teko kuom ogendini kendo kuom ruodhi mondo ipudhi kendo igo piny mondo imuki kendo ikethi bende mondo iger kendo ipidhi ruoth nyasaye nopenja niya jeremia ineno ango nadwoke ni aneno bad yath machako loth eka ruoth nyasaye nowachona niya iwacho kare bende achako chopo wachna bange nochako openja niya en ango kendo mineno ne adwoke niya aneno agulu kayienyo yo nyandwat kendo ochiegni pukore yo koni ruoth nyasaye nowachona niya masira biro yienyo koa yo nyandwat mi chop kuom ji duto modak e pinyni aluongo ogendini duto man yo nyandwat mondo obi ruodhi maggi bende nobi kendo norenj kombegi mag loch e dhorangeye jerusalem kendo e alwora mar ohinga jerusalem kendo e alwora mag mier moko duto mag juda mano e kaka abiro kumo joma oseketho moweya kendo owango misengni ni nyiseche mamoko ka gilamo gik giloso giwegi emomiyo tim atima chir jeremia kendo dhi iwachnigi gik moko duto asenyisi kik iwe gimiyi luoro nono abiro miyo ibed maluor moloyo e nyimgi ji duto manie pinyni kaka ruodhi mag juda gi jodongo gi jodolo kod ji mamoko duto biro bedo mamon kodi kawuono amiyi teko mondo isirgi ibiro chalo gi dala mochiel motegno kendo gi siro mar chuma kendo gi ohinga mar mula ok giniloyi nikech abiro bet kodi kendo riti ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano jeremia ruoth nyasaye okwayo jojuda mondo oduog ire ruoth nyasaye nowachona ni mondo adhi ahul wachne ni ji duto modak jerusalem kama aparo hera mane ungo koda kane pod un oganda mayom nimar e ndalo mane uluwa e thim piny motwo ok pur ne uhera manaa kaka miaha hero chwore e ndalogo un joisrael nubedo joga awuon kendo nuchalona mana cham okwong dumbo nakumo ji duto mane dwaro hinyou kendo ne akelonigi chandruok ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano winjuru wach ruoth nyasaye un nyikwa jakobo joisrael ruoth nyasaye owacho niya ango marach mane kwereu oneno kuoma mane omiyo giweya ne gilamo nyiseche manono mi gin bende gidoko joma nono ne ok gidewa kata obedo ni ne aseresogi kagologi e piny misri mi atelonigi e thim piny marach motwo masiche ngenyie pinyno otimo gode gi bugni onge ngama wuothoe bende onge ngama odakie ne akelou e piny momew mondo ucham giki monyakie kod gik mabeyo mantie kane udonjo e piny mane amiyouno ne udwanye mi ukethe jodolo noweyo penjo kuma ruoth nyasaye nitie joma ne ongeyo weche chik bende ne ok odewa kendo jotelo nobaro moweya jonabi bende ne koro wach e nying baal kendo ne lamo nyiseche manono emomiyo ruoth nyasaye abiro yalo joga kendo abiro yalou kendo abiro yalo nyikwau koro idhuru yie udhi e chula mar saipras kendo uor joote kedar openjnu wach mondo uwinj ane ka oganda moro oseweyo nyisechegi moluwo nyiseche mamoko kata obedo ni ok gin nyiseche madieri kamano un joga useweya nyasachu mosetingou malo mi ulamo nyiseche ok nyal konyou kuom mano ruoth nyasaye agolonu chik un polo mondo uyiengni malich kuwuoro kendo kudhier nono nikech joga osetimo richo tieng ariyo gisebaro mi giweya soko mar pi maliw mamol kendo gisekunyo yewni mabarore ok nyal tingo pi joisrael ok gin wasumbni bende ne ok onywolgi wasumbni kuom mano ere gima omiyo wasikgi yakogi wasikgigo rutonigi matek mana ka sibuoche giseketho pinygi molokore thim miechgi bende okethore maonge ngama dagie ee jomemfis gi jotapanes josetoyo pat wi joisrael yaye joisrael tim kamano usekelo mana kuomu uwegi ne uweya ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kane atelonu e yo koro ango uparo ni ubiro yudo kuom dhi misri uparo ni ubiro modho pi aora nael koso ango uparo ni ubiro yudo kuom dhi asuria uparo ni ubiro modho pi aora yufrate timbeu uwegi maricho ema biro kelonu kum ee timbe mane uweyago ema biro kelonu bura kamano ubiro ngeyo ni weyo ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kendo chaye en gima lit kendo marach moloyo ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano yaye joisrael chon gi lala ne udagi lochna kendo ne utamoru rito chikna kuwacho ni ok unutina nulemo alema ewi gode maboyo duto kendo e tiend yien duto motimo otiep mi udwanyoru ka dhako jachode ne apidhou ka ngama pidho mzabibu moyier mana ka kodhi maberie moloyo neyeuru kaka koro uchalo uchalo gi mzabibu marach ok nyag olemo mabeyo kata da bed ni ulwokoru gi pi kendo kod sabun mangeny pod anyalo neno kuonde richou otonie ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano ere kaka unyalo wacho ni pok udwanyoru bende ni pok ulamo baal parieuru kaka ne utimo richo e holo kendo neyeuru gik usetimo uchalo ngamia madhako madwaro thuondi tho ringo aringa koni gi koni uchalo kanj thim ok nyal geng kadwaro thuondi onge thwon manyalo thagore ka dware nikech yude yot ka kinde miluwee ochopo un jo israel kik uwe tiendeu dok malit kata kik uwe dwondu two kuringo bang nyiseche manono uwacho niya ok wanyal konyo wasehero nyiseche mamoko kendo nyaka waluwgi kaka wi jakuo kuot ka omake e kaka un joisrael wiu nokuodi kaachiel gi ruodhiu gi jodongu gi jodolo mau kod jonabi mau un duto mawacho ni yath ni e wuonwa kendo wacho ni kidi ni minwa wiu nokuodi ne ubaro mi uweya kendo ne udagi duogo ira eka ka masira omakou ukwaya mondo abi akonyu koro ere nyiseche gogo mane uloso ka un e chandruok mondo okonyu ane ka ginyalo konyou un jojuda un gi nyiseche mangeny ruoth nyasaye apenjou ni ango momiyo uywakna un ema usenganyona uduto ne anego yawuotu mano ne ok opuonjou bende ne ok unyal yie kethou ne unego jonabi mau mana kaka sibuor mager neko chikuru itu maber uduto mondo uwinj gima awachonu un joisrael achalonu thim koso achalonu piny masiche ngenyie ok unyal dak koda maberni ka ok kamano marango uwacho ni ubiro timo mana kaka uhero kendo ni ok unyal duogo ira un joga bende wi nyako nyalo wil gi gik olichorego koso wi miaha nyalo wil gi lawe mar kisera wi joga osewil koda kuom ndalo mangeny mokadho akwana un ungeyo yore muyudogo osiepeu machwo bende kata mana mon jochode bende nyalo puonjore kuomu remb joma odhier kendo maonge ketho otonie lepu gin remb joma ne ok oturo uteu ka kweloe kata kamano uwacho niya waonge ketho kendo adier ruoth nyasaye ok okecho kodwa ngeuru ni ruoth nyasaye abiro kumou kuom wacho ni uonge gi richo kamano ere gima omiyo uloko parou ka ok udewo jomisri mugeno kuomgi ok nokonyu mana kaka joasuria bende ne ok okonyou ubiro e piny misri ka uduto umako wiu nikech wichkuot ruoth nyasaye asedagi joma ugeno kuomgi kendo ok ginikonyu ngang jeremia ruoth nyasaye owacho niya ka ngato oriembo chiege mi chiegeno odhi kendo bange ngat machielo okende chwore mokwongo ok nyal kawe kendo nikech dhakono koro ogak un joisrael useweya mulamo nyiseche mangeny kudwanyoru mana ka dhako madwanyore gi chwo mangeny koro udwaro duogo ira ranguru wi gode malo mondo uneye bende nitie kamoro pok ulemoe kudwanyoru uchalo dhako jachode obet e bath yo karito chwo kata ka jaarabu jamecho mopondo e thim kakiyo joma odwaro yako usedwanyo piny gi timbeu maricho machalo timbe chode mano emomiyo koth ne ok ochue kata mana kodh opon ne ok oton bende uchalo dhako jachode nikech uonge gi wichkuot koro eka uwachona niya wuonwa kendo iseherowa chakre tindowa uwuoyo kamano kuparo ni ok nakechi mochwere kendo ni mirima ok nomaka kodu nyaka chieng un joisrael mano e gima nuwacho kata kamano pod nutimo atima richo duto mane unyalo ochik joisrael gi jojuda mondo olokre ruo wnda e ndalo loch ruoth josia ruoth nyasaye nopenja niya iseneno gima joisrael otimo ka giweya giseidho gode duto kendo gisedhi e tiend yien duto motimo otiep mi gilamoe nyiseche manono mana kaka dhako jachode ringo koni gi koni kadwaro chwo ruoth nyasaye ne aparo ni gibiro duogo ira bang timo mago duto ne ok giduogo kendo owetegi jojuda noneno timbegigo ne gineno bende kaka ne ariembo joisrael nikech ne giweya ka dhako moweyo chwore dwanyore gi chwo mamoko jojuda owetegigo bende joma andhoke ne ok odewo mi gin bende ne giweya kendo ne gidhi gidwanyore ka dhako moweyo chwore dwanyore gi chwo mamoko ne gidwanyo adwanya piny gi timbegi mag lamo kite kod yien kata bang mago duto jojuda andhoke owete joisrael nowuondore ni duogo ira ok ne gidwogo gi chunygi duto ruoth nyasaye nowachona niya kata obedo ni joisrael ne oweya gisenyiso ni gibeyo moloyo jowetegi andhoke jojuda omiyo dhiyo e piny man yo nyandwat mondo iwach ni joisrael kama duoguru ira un joisrael andhokegi aherou gi hera mosiko omiyo ok nasik ka akecho kodu nyaka chieng mak mana ni nyaka uyie ni useketho kendo nyaka uyie ni usepiem gi ruoth nyasaye nyasachu bende yieuru ni usedwanyoru gi nyiseche mamoko e tiend yien duto motimo otiep kendo ne ok uwinjo wachna ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano duoguru ira un nyithinda moseweya nimar ruodhu abiro golo jo manok kuomu e miechu kendo e dhoutu mi adwoku e got sayun abiro ketonu jotelo moluora kendo gibiro ritou gi rieko kod winjruok maber bange kusemedoru kendo unya ji ok nochak owuo kuom sandug muma mar ruoth nyasaye kendo ok unupare kendo ok unudware bende ok unulos moro machal kode e ndalogo noluong jerusalem ni komduong mar ruoth nyasaye kendo ogendini duto nochokre kuno mondo omi nyinga duong ok ginichak gitim tim wich teko bende ok ginibed gi chuny mar timo richo joisrael biro riwore gi jojuda kendo gibiro wuotho kanyakla ka gia yo nyandwat ka giduogo e piny mane amiyo kwereu mondo obed mwandugi nyaka chieng un joisrael aseyie kawou ka yawuota mondo amiu piny maberie moloyo pinje mamoko duto ne aparo ni ubiro luonga ni wuonu kendo ok nuchak uweya un joisrael useweya mana ka dhako moweyo chwore ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano koko gore ewi gode gin joisrael ywak ka kwayo ngwono nimar gisebedo ka giluwo yore maricho ka ok gidew ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi duoguru un nyithinda moseweya mondo aloku joma kare udwoka niya ee waduogo iri nimar e ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa onge resruok wanyalo yudo kuom lemo ewi gode kata kuom joma goyo koko kuonde motingore konyruok wayudo wan joisrael wuok mana kuom ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa chakre tindowa gik moko duto wuonewa osetiyo moyudo kaka jamni kod yawuowi gi nyiri oselalnwa kuom lamo baal nyasach wichkuot onego wanind piny ka wiwa okuot kendo ka timbewa maricho oumowa wan kaachiel gi kwerewa waseketho e nyim ruoth nyasaye nyasachwa chakre tindowa kendo ok wasewinjo wachne jeremia ruoth nyasaye wacho niya un joisrael ka uyie lokoru duoguru ira wituru nyisecheu manono amongo mondo uluw mana ka ukuongoru gi nying ruoth nyasaye gi adiera gi bura makare kendo gi tim malongo ogendini biro kwaya mondo gin bende aguedhgi kaka aseguedhou kendo gibiro miya duong ho ruoth nyasaye wacho ni jojuda gi jojerusalem niya paruru puotheu mbora mondo kik uket kodhi e kind kudho un jojuda gi jojerusalem rituru singruokna kendo timuru gik madwaro nono gik maricho musetimo biro miyo mirimba liel ka mach onge ngama nyalo nego onyis jojuda ni wasigu biro monjogi gouru tung e piny duto kendo koguru matek kunyiso jojuda gi jojerusalem mondo oring odhi e mier mochiel motegno nyisuru ji yo madhi sayun ringuru mondo utony kik udeki nikech ruoth nyasaye kelo masira kaa nyandwat mabiro ketho piny malich jaketh ogendini osewuok oko ka sibuor mowuok e gonde osewuok kama odakie mondo obi oketh pinyu miech juda nodong gundni onge ngama odakie kuom mano rwakreuru gi piende gugru kendo uywagi ka ugoyo nduru nikech mirima mager ruoth nyasaye nigo gi jojuda pok orumo ruoth nyasaye nowacho niya chiengno chuny ruodhi gi chuny jodongo nonyosre kata jodolo bende nobuogi kendo jonabi nongeng kane awinjo kamano nawacho niya ruoth nyasaye isewuondo jojerusalem chuth niwacho ni kue biro betie koro ligangla ema nie ngutwa ndalo biro mibiro nyisie jojerusalem ni yamo maliet moa e thim kudho koni kochomo joruoth nyasaye ok nokudh mo maber minyalo piedhgo cham nobed kalausi ruoth nyasaye okelo ruoth nyasaye owuon ema koro kumo joge neuru wasigu biro mogingore ka boche polo gechegi mag lweny chalo gi kalausi kendo faresegi ringo matek moloyo ongo yaye warumo un jojerusalem lwokuru richo manie chunyu mondo oresu ubiro siko kuparo weche maricho nyaka karango winjuru jaote moa dan ema hulo ni masira biro kendo jago milome moa e gode mag efraim bende wacho kamano nyisuru ogendini kendo landuru wach ni jerusalem ibiro kethi wasigu biro moa e piny mabor kendo gibiro goyo koko ni joma odak e miech juda gibiro timo agenga ni piny juda mana ka joma olworo puodho nikech oganda jojuda oseweya ruoth nyasaye ema owacho kamano un jojuda un ema usekelo masira kuomu uwegi nikech yoreu gi timbeu maricho ee richou ema okelonu masira kum malitni iya nyawni awinjo rem malit yaye chunya chunya diko malit ok anyal ling nikech awinjo tung gi mahu mag lweny masira achiel luwo machielo kendo piny duto okethi piyopiyo nono hembena omuki kendo ragengni maggi oyiech matindo tindo nyaka karango ananeye bandeche mag lweny ka kwadhore kendo nawinjie tung lweny ka ywak ruoth nyasaye wacho niya joga ofuwo kendo ok gingeya gichalo gi nyithindo momemore kendo maonge rieko richo ema gingeyo timo timo gima ber otamogi bange narango piny maneno ni onge gi kido polo bende ne onge gima rienyie ne arango gode madongo maneno ka giyiengni kuonde motingore bende ne rundore koni gi koni naneno ka ji onge kuno kendo winy duto noseringo piny momew noselokore thim kendo mier man kuno noselokore gundni nikech mirima mager mar ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye osewacho ni piny ngima biro dong nono ok nokethe chuth ji duto modak e piny noywagi kendo polo nolokre mudho ruoth nyasaye osewacho kendo ok nolok parone oseparo mogik kendo ok nodog chien ka ji winjo ni joidh farese gi jo asere biro ngato ka ngato noringi jomoko noring odhi e bunge moko noidh lwendni mi pond kuno mier duto nodong nono onge ngama odakie un jojerusalem urumo ere gimomiyo urwakoru gi lewni mabeyo koso ere gima omiyo urwako stadi kendo uwiro wengeu ubisoru maber kayiem nono chodeu oseweyou kendo koro dwaro negou ne awinjo ywak ka mar dhako muoch kayo ee mana kaka mar dhako hango nywol kara ne en mana dwond jerusalem gamo yueyo kendo orieyo bade kawacho niya arumo chunya dwaro nikech jonek lwora mondo onega jeremia richo mag jojerusalem kod mag jojuda un jojerusalem wuothuru e yore mag dalau kendo e chirniu mondo une ane ka nitie kata ngat achiel makare mohero adiera kuyudo ruoth nyasaye nowe ni jodalano richogi kata ka ukuongoru gi nying ruoth nyasaye ukuongoru mana gi miriambo donge adiera ema ruoth nyasaye dwaro ne agoyou piny ne ok udewo ne osandou malit ne utamoru winjo puonjne wiu tek ka lwanda kendo udagi duogo ire bange nowacho niya chutho jogi gin joma ofuwo maonge rieko ok gingeyo yor ruoth nyasaye kod gima nyasachgi dwaro omiyo koro abiro dhi ir jotelo mondo losgo nimar nyaka bed ni gin ema gingeyo yor ruoth nyasaye kod gima nyasachgi dwaro kara gin bende gisedagi loch mar ruoth nyasaye kendo gitamore rito chikne mano emomiyo sibuor moa e bungu biro negogi ee ondiek moa e thim biro kidhogi kendo kwach nowuoth e miechgi ngato angata mowuok oko nokiddh matindo tindo magi duto notimre nikech richogi thoth kendo nikech giseweyo nyasaye nyadingeny ruoth nyasaye nowacho niya ere gima dimi awe ni joga richogi yawuotgi oseweya mokuongore gi nying nyiseche manono ne amiyo joga gik moko duto mane gidwaro pod ne giterore atera ka giketho sechegi gi mon jochode ngato ka ngato oowore kuom gombo chi wadgi mana ka faras moyieng gombo ohewo donge onego akumgi kuom gik kamago donge onego achul kuor ni oganda kama abiro chiko wasikgi mondo ochadh yiend mzabibu maggi ok ginikethgi chuth nimar abiro nyisogi mondo gilwer mana bedegi oko nikech ok gin maga joisrael gi jojuda oseweya adier ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano joruoth nyasaye osekwede ka giwacho niya ok obi timo gimoro onge masira moro kaka lweny kata kech nobi kuomwa giwacho bende ni jonabi nobed ka yamo kudho maonge gi wach moa kuom ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto abiro nyisi jeremia gima biro timore ni jogi nikech gik gisewachogo abiro loko wechena mawuok e dhogi obed mach jogi abiro loko yien mondo mach owanggi pep un joisrael akelo oganda moro maa e piny mabor mondo obi omonju en oganda machon kendo maratego ok uwinj dhogi kata mana weche giwacho bende ok ungeyo jogi jo asere nego ji mathoth kendo giduto gin jolweny marateke gibiro tieko chambu kaachiel gi chiembu pep kendo gibiro tieko yawuotu gi nyiu gibiro tieko jambu kod olembeu mag mzabibu gi ngopeu giniketh miechu mochiel motegno mugeno kuomgi kata e ndalogo ruoth nyasaye awacho ni ok natieku chuth kupenja gimomiyo natimonu gigo duto anadwoku niya kaka nene uweya mutiyo ni nyiseche mag pinje mamoko e pinyu uwegi e kaka unuti ni jopinje mamoko e piny ok maru jeremia nyis joka jakobo gi jojuda niya isa ezek mar winjuru un joma ofuwo man gi wenge ok nen bende man gi ok nyal winjo ayub ruoth nyasaye apenjo kama ere gimomiyo ok unyal luora koso ango momiyo ok unyal kirni e nyima nene aketo kuoyo manie dhonam mondo ogeng nam kendo obed tong mosiko pi ok nyal kadho apaka mag nam nyalo gingore kendo wuo matek ok nyal kadho kata mwomo un wiu tek kendo uhero piem usepiem koda adier muweya ne ok uwacho e chunyu niya ber waluor ruoth nyasachwa miyowa kodh chwiri gi kodh opon e kinde mowinjore kendo miyowa kinde mwakeyoe higa ka higa timbeu maricho oseketho gigo kendo richou osemono gik mabeyo kamago bironu joga moko gin joma richo gichalo jodwar chiko obadho mondo omakgo winy ji ema gimako gipongo utegi gi gik mokwal mana kaka jachik winy mano emomiyo gin gi teko kendo gimew bende emomiyo gichwe kendo dendgi leny timbegi maricho ngeny mokadho akwana ok gikony nyithi kiye mondo oyud bura makare bende ok gingad bura makare ni joma odhier donge abiro kumogi kuom mago duto ee abiro chulo kuor ni ogandani ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano gima lich buogo ji osetimore e pinyni jonabi koro weche mag miriambo jodolo bende chwakogi kendo mano e gima joga ohero gibiro timo ango chieng gigo orumo jeremia masira nomak jerusalem gi juda un jobenjamin ringuru mondo utony ringuru ua jerusalem gouru tung e tekoa kendo mokuru mach ewi bethhakerem mondo onyis ji ni lweny biro nimar chandruok kod masira madwong chiegni biro koa nyandwat un josayun uchalo gi lek maber mar jamni ruodhi biro buoro kanyo gi jogi mag lweny mana kaka jokwath dibi gi rombgi mondo okwa gibiro guro hembegi ka gilworou kendo ngato ka ngato nokaw gima odwaro giniwach niya waikreuru mondo wamonj jerusalem ikreuru wabiro monjogi godiechieng tir eka ginilok parogi ka giwacho niya ooyo sa koro ngeny piny dwaro yuso kendo tipo lor ikreuru nimar wabiro monjogi kawuono gotieno mi wamuk ut jerusalem mabeyo kendo madongo ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto osegolo chik niya tonguru yien kendo uging lowo pidhe pidhe e tiend ohinga mondo umonj jerusalem osewacho bende niya abiro kumo dalani nikech bura makare onge kanyo chuth kaka pi soko bubni pile e kaka richo jerusalem bende osiko ka bubni dalano opong gi lweny kod masiche kendo tuoche gi adhonde ema aneno kanyo puonjreuru kuom mano un jojerusalem nono aweyou mi aloko dalau thim onge ngama dakie ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto nowachona niya duog ire joisrael modong ka ngama dok e puoth mzabibu mondo opon olemo modong ne adwoke niya ere ngama diwinja ka awuoyo kodgi kata ka akwerogi kamano gisedino itgi omiyo ok ginyal winjo gisetamore winjo wachni kendo gitugo mana gi gima iwacho kuom mano ruoth nyasaye mirimbi oponga kendo koro ohewa eka ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni jeremia nira ol mirimba kata mana kuom nyithindo matugo e yore kendo kuom yawuowi mochokore kanyakla mon gi chwo ibiro kawo koda ka joma oti mojwajni utegi gi puothegi kod mondgi bende nomi jomoko nono nimar abiro kumo jopinyni ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano ji duto madongo gi matindo temo yudo pesa e yore mag miganga kata mana jonabi gi jodolo bende migengni ezek gichalo jothieth mathiedho jotuo marachrach mana ka gima ok gituo nimar giwacho ni gik moko beyo chutho gik moko ok beyo jer bende uparo ni wigi nokuot nikech gik makuero mane gitimogo koso ooyo wigi ne ok okuot kataa matin bende gionge gi wichkuot kuom mano ginipodhi kaka jomoko osepodho kendo ka akumogi ginirum ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano ruoth nyasaye wacho ni joge niya chunguru e akek yo mondo urang wangyore machon kupenjo kuma yo maber nitie wuothuru e wangyorno mi unuyud kue gidwoko niya ok wanawuothi e wangyorno ruoth nyasaye noketo jorit mondo ka gigoyo tung ji owinji ji nowacho niya ok wanawinji omiyo ruoth nyasaye nowacho niya winjuru un ogendini mondo unge gima biro timore ni joga un jopiny winjuru akelo masira kuom jogi mana moromo gi timbegi nikech gisedagi wechena kendo ok giserito puonjna ere tiende kelona ubani moa sheba kata gik mangue ngar moa e pinje maboyo ok anayie misengni miwango pep kendo ok anabed mamor gi misengni mamoko gitimona kuom mano ruoth nyasaye owacho kama anami jogi chwanyre mi podhi wuone gi yawuowi biro tho kaachiel gi osiepegi kod joma odak machiegni kodgi ruoth nyasaye awacho niya oganda moro biro moa e piny man yo nyandwat ee oganda marangongo man kuma bor ikore ni lweny gin gi aserni kod tonge giger kendo ok gikech ngato tiend faresegi mor ka apaka mar nam mawuo gikore kedo gi sayun un jojerusalem uwacho niya wasewinjo wachno mi thudhno omako luetewa kibaji goyowa mana ka dhako muoch kayo ok wahedhre wuok oko kata bayo e wangyore nikech wasikwa oikore ni lweny kuondego kendo masiche ngeny koni gi koni ruoth nyasaye awachonu niya un joga rwakreuru gi piende gugru kendo bukreuru gi buru ywaguru malit ka ngama ywago wuode miderma nimar ngat biro tiekou biro poyou jeremia aseketi japim joga pimgi eka mondo ifweny timbegi giduto gin joma wigi tek moseweya gibayo e piny ka gikuodho ji chunygi tek ka mula kendo ka chuma giduto gin joma okethore kata obedo ni obuk mach matek mondo oleny fedha kendo opwodhi en mana ketho kinde kayiem nikech ngiend fedha tamore wuok emomiyo ibiro luongo joga ni fedha mowe nikech ruoth nyasaye aseweyogi jeremia ochik jojuda mondo olok timbegi ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni jeremia mondo odhi ochung e dhoranga hekalu mar ruoth nyasaye ogo milome niya winjuru wach ruoth nyasaye un jojuda duto madonjo e dhorangani ka biro lame ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto kendo nyasach israel owacho ni mondo ulok yoreu gi timbeu maricho eka owe udak kaeri un usiko kuwacho niya hekalu mar ruoth nyasaye hekalu mar ruoth nyasaye hekalu mar ruoth nyasaye wach muwachono en miriambo omiyo kik ugen kuome lokuru yoreu gi timbeu kendo ngato ka ngato mondo otim ni wadgi gima kare weuru sando jopinje mamoko modak kuomu kata nyithi kiye kata mond liete bende kik uchuer remb joma onge ketho kaeri kendo kik ulam nyiseche mamoko nimar mano ditieku chuth kulokoru kamano anyalo weyo udag kaeri e piny mane amiyo kwereu chon mondo obed margi nyaka chieng onge gima uyudo kuom keto chunyu e wach miriambo muwachono ukwelo unego ji uteroru ukuongoru gi miriambo utimo lisweche ni baal kendo ulamo nyiseche manono yande ok ungeyo kusetimo gik kamago eka ubiro e nyima e hekalu nyinga nitieni kendo uwacho niya wasekwo uparo ni unyalo kwo adier ka utimo timbe makuero kamano math mar luka koso uparo ni hekalu mara en kama jomecho pondoe ruoth nyasaye aseneno gik utimo josh zab jer dhiuru shilo dala mane ayiero mokwongo mondo nyinga obedie mondo uneye gima ne atimo kuno nikech richo mag joga israel koro usetimo richogo duto kata obedo ni ne akawo chandruok mi aloso kodu ne ok udewa bende kane aluongou ne ok uyiena omiyo abiro timo ni hekalu mara mugeno kuome mana kaka natimo ni shilo kata mana dalau mane amiyo kwereuni bende abiro timone kamano abiro riembou mondo ua e wanga mana kaka ne ariembo oweteu joefarim duto te mirima omako ruoth nyasaye gi nyiseche manono jeremia kik ulem ni jogi bende kik ikwaya wach moro nikech gin kata kik ihomba nimar ok nawinji donge ineno gik gitimo e miech juda kendo e yore mag jerusalem jer nyithindo modo yien eka wuonegi moko mach mon dwalo mogo mondo olosgo kek obed misango ni nyasaye dhako iluongo ni ruodh polo bende gitimo ni nyiseche mamoko misengni miolo piny mondo gichwanyago iparo ni ruoth nyasaye ema gichwanya ooyo gin ema gichwanyore giwegi kendo gikelo wichkuot kuomgi kendgi emomiyo ruoth nyasaye abiro olo mirimba mager ka eri abiro ologi kuom ji kendo kuom jamni bende abiro ole kuom yien gi cham mirimba biro chalo gi mach mager ngato ok nyal nego kum jojuda noyud kuom wich teko ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto nyasach israel owacho niya chamuru achama misengni monego wang pep kaachiel gi misengni moyienu chamo kane agolo kwereu e piny misri ne ok awacho gimoro kuom misengni miwango pep kod misengni mamoko kata golo chik kuomgi ne ok agolo ne achikogi matek mondo giluora eka abed nyasachgi kendo gibed joga bende nanyisogi ni nyaka gitim gik mane achikogi eka mondo gidhi maber ne ok gidewa bende ne ok giwinjo wachna ne gisiko ka gitimo timbe mag wichkuot kendo kar dhi nyime ne gidok chien chakre chieng mane kwereu owuokie misri nyaka chil kawuono asekawo chandruok mi aoronigi jotichna jonabi kata kamano ne ok gidewa bende ne ok giwinja wigi nomedo doko matek moloyo kata mana wi kweregi jeremia kata obedo ni inyisogi weche duto kamano ok giniwinj wachni kendo kata obedo ni iluongogi ok giniyieni eka bange ininyisgi niya ogandani odagi winjo wach ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi kendo ok giyie mondo opuonjgi ok ginyal wacho adiera nikech adiera oselalnigi yaye jojerusalem yie wiu maboyo en ranyisi ni un joma owalna dhiuru uliego oko kendo udhi uywagi ewi gode nimar ruoth nyasaye asedagi joma akechogogi kendo aseweyogi jojuda osetimo gima rach e nyima giseketo nyisechegi makuero e hekalu mara mi gidwanyo ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano ruo jer tlawi gisegero kendomarmisango miluongo ni tofeth e holo benhinom mondo giwangie yawuotgi gi nyigi ka misango ne ok achikogi mondo gitim kamano bende wach kamano ne ok aparo kata matin mano omiyo ndalo biro chopo ok noluongie kanyo ni tofeth kata ni holo benhirom noluonge ni holo nek nikech giniyik joma otho e tofeth mi pong du onge kama odong winy gi le mae thim ema nocham ringre joma otho kendo ngato ok nobedie diriembgi jer fweny anatiek mor gi ilo duto e miech juda kendo e wang yore man jerusalem kata mana dwond miaha gi chwore ok nowinji nikech noyud ka piny oselokore thim jeremia e ndalono ji nogol choke ruodhi gi choke jodongo mag juda e lietegi kaachiel gi choke jodolo gi mag jonabi kod mag ji mamoko duto mane odak jerusalem chokego nowit oko mondo chieng gi due kod sulue mane gihero kendo gilamo orieny kuomgi kar chokogi mondo oyikgi nowegi aweya gitow ewi lowo ji duto motony e oganda marachni mi odak kuonde duto asekeyogie nogomb mana tho kar bedo mangima ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ema awacho kamano richo gi bura jeremia wach ni joga ni ruoth nyasaye awacho kama ka ngato opodho donge ochako ochung koso ka ngato obaro moweyo yo donge oduogo e yo kendo ka kamano ere gima omiyo gibaro giweya ok ginyal duogo ira ngang gituere kuom nyisechegi manono kendo gidagi duogo ira ne achiko ita mondo awinj wechegi ne ok giwacho adiera kata achiel onge kata ngat achiel kuomgi moseloko chunye kuom timbegi maricho kata moseywagore kuom richo mosetimo ngato ka ngato mwomore e timbene mana ka faras lweny mochodo kochiko wasigu kata ogungo mae kor polo ongeyo ndalogi mag dar kendo kata akuru gi opija gi nyamnaha bende ongeyo ndalo giduogoe joga kia chikena ere kaka ginyalo wacho ni giriek kendo gingeyo chikena jopuonj chik mag miriambo osegajo chikena jorieko wigi okuot wach ogoyogi nyangengo kendo dhogi omoko gisedagi wechena koro ere rieko gik moko dhi nyime maber chutho gik moko ok dhi nyime maber kuom mano gichalo gi jothieth mathiedho jotuo marachrach mana ka gima ok gituo jer bende uparo ni wigi okuot nikech timbe makuero mane gitimogo koso ooyo wigi ok okuot kata matin bende gionge gi wichkuot kuom mano gibiro podho kaka ji mamoko osepodho kendo ka akumogi ginirum ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano abiro tieko joga chutho nikech gichalo yiend mzabibu kata ngowo maonge olemo kata potgi bende osener jonyasaye penjore niya ere gimomiyo wabet abeta biuru wadhi e mier mochiel motegno wathoe nimar ruoth nyasaye osengadonwa buch tho osemiyowa pi motimo kwiri mondo wamodhi nikech timbewa osebedo maricho e nyime ne wageno kue mana kayiem nono bende ne wageno ni wabiro yudo resruok masira ema obwogowa ne wawinjo ka farese mag wasigu futo ka dan kendo ywakgi ne miyo piny duto yiengni wasigugo osebiro mondo oketh pinywa kod gik moko duto mantie kaachiel gi dalawani kod joma odakie ruoth nyasaye owacho niya ngeuru ni abiro kelo thuonde mager kuomu gin thuonde man gi kwiri maricho ok nyal bo omiyo gibiro kayou jeremia ywago juda gi jerusalem akuyo ok anyal yudo kue kendo chunya tuo linguru ane awinjo ka joga ywak kuonde duto gintie ka gipenjo niya ruoth nyasaye oseweyo sayun koso ruodh sayun onge kuno adier ruoth nyasaye ruodhgi dwoko niya ere gima omiyo usemiya mirima kuom lamo nyiseche mag pinje mamoko ji ywak kawacho niya ndalo keyo osekadho mak wayudo gima dwaresrego chunya lit nikech itimo ni joga malit aywak kendo akuyo marach yath tinde orumo e piny gilead koso jathieth onge kuno adier ere gima omiyo pok othiedh joga jeremia mad wiya lokre soko mar pi kendo pi wanga lokre aora mondo aywagi odiechieng gotieno nikech joga mosenegi mad abed ki kiru mar bworo e thim kuma anyalo betie mabor gi joga nimar giduto gin joma terore kendo oganda andhoga lewni chalo gi atung moywa kendo diro miriambo mana kaka atung diro asere bende timbe miganga ema opongo piny ruoth nyasaye owacho niya joga timo richo kinde duto kendo ok gidewa ngato ka ngato nyaka tang ni osiepne kendo onge ngama nyalo geno owadgi nimar owete duto gin jowuond ka jakobo bende ngato ka ngato kuodho osiepne giduto giwuondo kuoma kuom mano ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto awacho ni abiro pwodho joga ka ngat malenyo mula mondo ogol ngiende joga osetimo richo koro ere gima datimnigi lewni chalo gi asere man gi kwiri niya ere gimomiyo piny okethore kendo otwo ka piny motimo ongoro onge ngama wuothoe ere ngama riek manyalo winjo tiend wachni koso en nga isenyiso tiende mondo onyis joma moko ruoth nyasaye nodwoka niya gima kama osetimore nikech joisrael oseweyo chik mane amiyogi ok giseluora bende ok gisetimo gik mane awachonigi ni mondo gitim gisebedo mana ka wigi tek ka gitimo dwarogi giwegi kendo giselamo mondo gimodhi abiro keyogi e kind ogendini ok gingeyo kendo kata kweregi bende ne ok ongeyo bende abiro kelonigi wasigu mondo omonjgi nyaka chop atiekgi chuth ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto wacho niya luonguru mon joywak ee oruru wach mondo mon mongeyo ywak obi gibi piyo mondo gidengnwa nyaka wengewa pong gi pi wang mi owre nikech ywak winjuru ywak maywagore sayun waserumo chuth kendo waseyudo wichkuot miwuoro osedarwa e pinywa kendo miechwa osekethi jeremia nowacho niya un mon chikuru itu ni gima ruoth nyasaye owacho mondo uwinj wachne puonjuru nyiu gi osiepeu wende ywak tho osedonjo gie dirisewa koda ka e miech ruodhiwa kendo osenego nyithindo e pewe oko kod yawuowi e chirni ruoth nyasaye wacho niya ringre joma otho biro dhurore pidhe mana ka owuoyo mool e puothe ginichal gi cham jokeyo osebeto pok ochoki ngeyo nyasaye e mor mar dhano ji mariek kik sungre nikech riekogi joma rateke bende kik sungre nikech tekogi kata joma omew kik sungre nikech mwandugi kor kor ngat madwaro sungore mondo osungre mana nikech ongeya kendo wechena osedonjone nimar ruoth nyasaye ahero ji gi hera mosiko kendo atimo gik makare kendo mowinjore e piny nikech kamano e kaka adwaro ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano ruoth nyasaye wacho ni ndalo biro nokumie ji duto moter nyangu kaka jomisri gi jojuda gi joedom gi joamon kod jomoab kaachiel gi ji duto modak e thim timgi en tito yie wigi nikech tero nyangu mar jogo duto kaachiel gi mar joisrael ok en tero nyangu mar chuny en mana mar ringruok jeremia nyiseche manono kod nyasaye adiera un joisrael winjuru wach ruoth nyasaye osewachonu kik uluw timbe ogendini mamoko kendo kik chunyu parre kuom honni muneno e kor polo kata obedo ni gimiyo ogendini parore gik jogo lamo gin gik manono nimar gin mana yien motong e bungu kendo japecho payogi uluorgi nimar ok ginyal hinyou bende onge gima ber ginyalo timo ruoth nyasaye onge ngato machal kodi iduong kendo nyingi bende duong fweny ruodh ogendini duto ere ngama ok diluori nikech iwinjori gi mogol tarshish kendo gi dhahabu mogol ufaz gin mana tich lwedo irwakogi gi lewni mambulu gi maralik ka jachuech molony ema ochueyo ruoth nyasaye e nyasaye maradier en e nyasaye mangima kendo ruoth piny gi tekone mogure motegno kendo noyaro polo gi riekone omiyo pi man e tok polo wuo kendo otugo boche polo e tung piny duto bende omiyo polo mil ka koth chue kendo ogolo yamo kar kenone mondo kendo adhondewa ok nyal chango ne waparo ni en gima wanyalo dhilgo hembewa osekethore chuth kendo tonde mane otuegigo osechot yawuotwa duto osea modhi mabor koro onge ngama odong dichak gurnwa hembewa duto winjuru wach osebiro koko maduong timore e piny moro yo nyandwat gin jolweny mabiro ketho miech juda mi lokre thim ondiegi ema dakie ruoth nyasaye angeyo ni ngima ngato ok nie tekone owuon bende gitiekowa duto kendo giketho pinywa jeremia jojuda oketho singruok ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni jeremia niya winj weche mag singruok abiro wachoni eka inyis jojuda gi joma odak jerusalem ni ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel okuongo ngato angata motamore rito wach singruokni en singruok mane atimo gi kweregi kane agologi e piny misri e sand mager ka mach makakni ne awachonigi ni ka girito chikena kendo gitimo gik moko duto anyisogi ginibed joga kendo anabed nyasachgi bange eka anachop singruok mane atimo gi kweregi ni namigi piny maber kendo momew koro gintieni jeremia nodwoko ruoth nyasaye niya ee ayie timo kamano eka ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni jeremia ni dhiyo iland wechegi e miech juda kendo e yore mag jerusalem kinyiso ji mondo owinj kendo orit weche mag singruokna chakre kinde mane agoloe kweregi e piny misri nyaka chil kawuono asebedo kasiemogi matek mondo girit wechena ne gitamore winjo kata dewo kar timo kamano ngato ka ngato ka timo timbene mag wich teko ne oyudo ka osechikogi mondo girit singruokno ne gidagi mano emomiyo nakelonigi kum duto mane singruokno otingo bange ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni jeremia niya jojuda gi joma odak jerusalem piem koda gisedok e richo kweregi mane otamore timo gima ne awacho nikech gisebedo ka gilamo nyiseche manono joisrael gi jojuda oseketho singruok mane atimo gi kweregi kuom mano ruoth nyasaye asiemogi ni abiro kelo masira kuomgi kendo onge ngat notony kata ka giywak mondo akonygi ok nadewgi bange jojuda gi joma odak jerusalem biro dhi ir nyisechegi gisebedo ka gitimonigi misengni mondo okonygi nyisechego ok noresgi ka masira obiro jojuda nigi nyiseche mangeny mana ka miechgi kendo joma odak jerusalem bende oseloso kendemagmisango mangeny mana moromo gi yore mag dalagi mondo gitimie misengni ni baal kuom mano jeremia kik ilam ni jogi kata kik isaya mondo akonygi nimar kata ka ginie chandruok mi giluonga ok nadewgi ruoth nyasaye wacho niya joma ahero timo timbe maricho ere gimomiyo oyienigi biro e oda koso giparo ni ginyalo wango obokene kod bedene gi mach mariadore ka mor polo ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ema napidho joisrael gi jojuda kaka ngato pidho yath koro abiro bwogogi gi masira nikech richo gisetimo nyarombo mogol e abila ka kia ni idwaro nego kendo ne ok angeyo ni ichano gik marichogo kuoma ne giwacho niya wanegeuru mondo nyinge olal nono eka nalemo niya ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto e
