janabi nonyiso baruk niya weche ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel owacho kuomi e magi iwacho ni tinde iol nikech ruoth nyasaye osemedoni mana kuyo kuom thagruok go bende iwacho ni iseywak miol ok iseyudo kue ngang kuom mano ruoth nyasaye owacho mondo anyisi kama abiro muko gik moko duto asegero kendo pudho gik asepidho abiro timo kamano e piny ngima idwaro mondo iyud gik dongo dongo onego iwe dwarogi nimar abiro kelo masira ni ji duto e piny initony kamoro amora midhiye ngimani kende ema niresi jeremia weche mokor kuom piny misri ruoth nyasaye nowuoyo gi jeremia kuom ogendini mamoko joisrael isa ezek noloso kuom misri kowuoyo kuom jolweny mag farao neko ruodh misri mane nebukadnezar ruodh babulon oloyo karkemish aora yufrate e higa mar angwen mar loch jehoyakim wuod josia ruodh juda weche gogo e mago jotend jolwenj misri kok niya ikreuru gi okumbni kod kuodi mondo udhi e lweny gawuru fareseu mondo udhi rieduru ni lweny kusidho kondeu piaguru tongeu kendo manreuru gi giu mag lweny ruoth nyasaye penjo niya koro ango aneno ka timoreni gigore nyangengo thuondi oselo omiyo luoro ohewogi kendo giringo matek ok gigo machiemo jonguech ok nyal tony gichwanyore kendo gipodho yo nyandwat aora yufrate en nga gingore ka aora naelni kendo ka aora mwomo gengeni gin jomisri ema gingore ka nael kendo ka aora mwomo genge misri wacho niya abiro gingora mi apong piny kendo aketh mier gi ji modakie chikuru farese mondo odhi kendo geche mag lweny ochak ngwech raduru gi wasigu un thuondi mag ethiopia gi mag put motingo okumbni kod un jo asere molony moa e piny lud kawuono en chieng ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto en chieng mochuloe kuor ni wasike ligangla biro chamogi mi yieng kendo madh rembgi mi mer nimar kawuono ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto timo misango yo nyandwat aora yufrate un jo misri dhiuru e piny gilead umanyie yath yedheu duto ok kony gimoro onge gima nyalo thiedhou ogendini osewinjo ni wiu okuot kendo ywaku opongo piny jolweny gangore kuom jowetegi kendo giruombore piny giduto jer e ndalo mane nebukadnezar ruodh babulon biro mondo omonj misri ruoth nyasaye nowuoyo gi jeremia niya landuru wach e miech misri migdol gi memfis kod tapanhes mondo giikre gisir wasikgi nimar lweny oseketho kuonde machiegni kodu ere gimomiyo nyasachu maratego miluongo ni apis opodho ruoth nyasaye ema osegoye mopodho jolwenju osechwanyore mopodho kendo moro ka moro wacho ni wadgi niya reti wadog dala ir jowa mondo kik watho e lwet wasigu chakuru farao ruodh misri nying manyien ni ruodh sunga nikech en ngat mane thuolo momiye obayo ana ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ruoth akuongora gi nyinga awuon ni kaka got tabor duong moloyo gode moko duto kendo kaka got karmel man nam bende duong e kaka teko ngat mabiro monjou nobed maduong un jomisri ikreuru mondo oteru e tuech memfis ibiro loko gunda mi nobed thim onge ngama odakie piny misri chal gi roya buong kich moa yo nyandwat okayo jolweny jo misri ondiko bende omemore mana ka nyiroye mitueyo dala ne ok ginyono piny mondo gikedi giduto ne giwichore mi giringo nikech ndalo mingadonigie bura nosechopo momiyo masira omakogi jomisri ringo dhi kaywak ka thuol nikech wasigu biro gi tekregi duto gimonjogi gi ledhi mana ka joma dwaro tongo yien kendo gibeto bung misri jolwenjgi ngeny mokadho akwana kendo thoth mohewo bonyo oganda moa yo nyandwat oseloyo jomisri mi wigi okuot ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto kendo nyasach israel wacho niya abiro kumo amon nyasach thebe kaachiel gi jomisri kod nyisechegi mamoko kod ruodhigi bende abiro kumo farao gi ji duto mogeno kuome kachiwogi e lwet nebukadnezar ruodh babulon gi joge mag lweny dwaro negogi achien ji nodag e piny misri kendo kaka ne gisedak e kinde mokadho ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano jer un nyikwa jakobo jatichna kik ubed maluor ee un joisrael kik chunyu parre nikech abiro resou mi agolu e piny mabor kuma otueueno ubiro duogo mi udag gi kue maonge gima thagou kendo ngato ok nobuogu kik uluor nikech kodu abiro tieko ogendini duto kuonde duto asekeyoue un ok natieku kata kamano abiro kumou moromo gi timbeu ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano jeremia weche mokor kuom jofilistia isa ezek joel amos zef zek kane pok farao omonjo gaza ruoth nyasaye nowuoyo gi jeremia kuom jofilistia niya neye kaka pi gingore koa yo nyandwat obiro bubni ka aora mwomo genge kendo obiro imo piny duto kod gimoro amora mantie kaka mier kod joma odakie ji biro goyo nduru mondo okonygi kendo ngato ka ngato manie piny noywag malit giniwinj tiend farese ka diko gi geche maringo kod tiend geche ka mutni wuone nyithindo ok nodog chien mondo oom nyithindgi ginibed maluor maonge gi teko nikech kinde osechopo mikethoe piny filistia kamano konyruok joturo gi josidon geno yudo kuom filistia norum pep nimar ruoth nyasaye abiro ketho jofilistia duto mane oa e dho nembe mag kaftor jogaza oseliel wigi ka nyiso ni gin gi kuyo maduong kendo joashkelon oling thi jofilistia modong noywag nyaka karango giywak niya yaye ligangla mar ruoth nyasaye biro chadho ji nyaka karango onego odog e olalo mondo oyue kanyo doyue nadi asemiye tich mondo oti asechike mondo omonj ashkelon kaachiel gi joma odak e dhonam jeremia weche mokor kuom jomoab isa ezek amos zef ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto kendo nyasach israel nowuoyo kuom jomoab kama ywaguru jonebo nimar dalagi okethi kiriathaim osekaw mi omuk kama ochiel motegno manie dalano joma odak kuno wigi okuot kendo duong mar piny moab oselal wasigu ikore heshbon mondo otiek oganda jomoab dala mar dibon biro ling thi ka oganda mar lweny omonje johoranaim goyo koko ka wacho niya masira warumo piny moab osekethi winjuru nyithindo ka ywak winjuru ywak joma oruwo e yo nyaka chop luhith ywak bende winjore e yo malor horanaim un jomoab ringuru piyo ures ngimau ringuru mana ka ayuer seso e bungu ne ugeno kuom tekou gi mwanduu koro ibiro mako koda ka un kendo kemosh nyasachu ibiro ter e tuech kaachiel gi jodonge kod jodolo mage onge dala kata achiel notony mak okethi kendo holo gi pap duto noyaki mi kethi ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano chunguru kidi mar liel upargo piny moab nimar ibiro kethe piyopiyo kendo mier mage biro dong gundni onge ngama odakie okuong ngat ok otiyo tich ruoth nyasaye gi chunye duto bende okuong ngat ok oneko gi liganglane ruoth nyasaye wacho niya pile jomoab osebet kodak gi kue kendo ok osedargi kiterogi e tuech gichalo gi divai mowe mondo okue e agulu achiel ok olok e agulini mamoko ndhath divai mowe kamano ok kethre osiko asika ka omit kuom mano ndalo biro naorie ji mondo ool jomoab oko kendo okethgi ka ngama puko divai oko kendo toyo aguch divaino matindo tindo bange jomoab noyud ni kemosh nyasachgi ok nyal konyogi mana kaka joisrael noyudo ni bethel nyasachgi mane gigeno kuome ne ok nyal konyogi un jomoab ere gimomiyo uketoru ni un thuondi mosekedo e lwenje mager piny moab gi mier mage osekethi kendo thuondi mage osenegi ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ema awacho kamano piny moab chiegni rumo kendo ibiro kethe mapiyopiyo un joma odak machiegni kode kendo un ji duto mongeyo humbe ywageuru kuwacho niya lochne maratego osekethi kendo humbe gi duongne oserumo un joma odak dibon weuru duong ungo mondo ubed piny e buru nikech jaketh moab osebiro kuomu kendo oketho kuondeu mochiel motegno un joma odak aroer chunguru e dir yo kungicho mondo upenj joma ringo gima osetimore ginidwoku niya piny moab oserumo ywageuru nikech oseyudo wichkuot gouru milome e bath aora arnon ni moab osekethi osengad bura ni mier mae pap kaka holon gi jaza gi mefath gi dibona gi nebo gi bethdiblathaim gi kiriathaim gi bethgamul gi bethmeon gi kerioth kod bozra ee bura oseloyo miech moab duto man mabor koda man machiegni duong mar moab osenginy matinditindo kendo tekone osekethi ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano miuru jomoab kongo mondo omer nikech gisedagi winjo chikna ruoth nyasaye gibiro ngielore e ngokgi giwegi kendo ji biro nyierogi un jomoab parieuru kaka ne unyiero joisrael ne ucharogi mana ka gima gin joma osemaki kaachiel gi jomecho koro un jomoab ayeuru e miechu udhi udag e gode maboyo mondo uchal gi akuru mogero ode e bath lwanda marabora morokore jomoab gin josunga asewinjo kaka gisungore kendo gipakore ka gijaro ji kendo giparo ni gin kende ema giloyo ji moko duto ruoth nyasaye angeyo kaka gisungore sungagino onge tiende kendo gik moko duto gitimo biro rumo mano emomiyo abiro ywago jomoab duto kod jokirheres abiro ywago josibma moloyo kaka ne aywago jojazer yaye dala mar sibma ichalo gi yiend mzabibu bedene oyarore nyaka nam kado mi ochweyo nyaka jazer koro olembeni gi divai mari osekethi mor gi ilo osegol e piny moab momewni divai tinde ok mol kuonde bicho kendo onge joma odong dikog gi mor ka loso divai joheshbon gi joeleale ywak kendo ywakgi winjore nyaka jahaz jozoar bende winje kendo owinjore nyaka horonaim gi elgathshelishya nikech pige mag nimrim oseduono abiro tamo jomoab mondo kik tim ni nyisechegi misengni miwango pep kod misengni mamoko kuonde motingore ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano chunya ywago jomoab kod jokirheres mana ka ngama goyo tung e liel nikech mwandugi duto oselal ngato ka ngato osepwodho wiye kendo olielo tike giduto gisaro luetegi kendo girwako piende gugru ji ywak ewi udi duto kendo e wang yore mag moab nimar aseketho piny moab mana ka ngama nego agulu onge tich ruoth nyasaye ema awacho oseketh moab yaye ywaguru nimar moab oseyudo wichkuot osekethore chuth molokore gima bwogo ji kendo ogendini modak machiegni nyierogo ruoth nyasaye asesingora ni oganda moro biro podho kuom jomoab mana kaka achuth podho kuom gima otho koyaro buombene miechgi gi kuondegi mochiel motegno ibiro kawo chiengno jolweny mag moab nobed gi kihondko mana ka dhako muoch kayo jomoab ibiro tieko chuth mi ok ginichak gibed oganda kendo nikech ne gitamore winjo chikna masiche gi bugni kod obadho ema ochomogi ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano ngato angata temo tony e masira biro nyumore e bugo ngama owuok e bugo obadho biro mako mago duto biro timore ni jomoab chieng akumogie joma ringo ok nyal yudo konyruok temo mondo opondi e dala mar heshbon chon ruoth sihon nodakie gibiro yudo ni dalano osemokie mach mach osewango tong piny kod wi gode mag jomoab mohero lwenygi ywaguru jomoab joma ne lamo kemosh koro osetieki kendo yawuotgi gi nyigi osemak moter e tuech e ndalo biro anami jomoab dhi nyime maber kendo mano e bura ruoth nyasaye osengado ni jomoab jeremia weche mokor kuom joamon ezek amos zef ruoth nyasaye nowuoyo kuom joamon niya joisrael ni kanye donge nitie ngato manyalo reso lopgi ango momiyo giseweyo joamon malamo milkomgi okawo piny jogad mi odakie onge wach kata kamano ndalo biro anami joma odak e dala mar raba winj mahu mar lweny dala maduong mar joamonno nodong gunda kendo mier matindo tindo mokiewo kode nowang chuth bange joisrael nochak okaw pinygi kuom joma nomayogigo ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano un joheshbon ywaguru nikech dalau osekethi un mond raba denguru kendo urwak piende gugru mi uring koni gi koni nimar milkom nyasachu ibiro kaw mi ter e tuech kaachiel gi jodolo mage kod jodonge ere gima omiyo usungoru un joma andhokegi tekou orumo ango momiyo uparo ni un rateke kendo ni onge ngama dihedhre monjou abiro kelonu masiche moa koni gi koni kendo uduto ubiro ringo ngato ka ngato noring mondo ore ngimane kendo onge ngama nochak ochok jolweny mau kanyakla bange achien anami joamon chak dhi nyime maber kendo weche mokor kuom joedom isa ezek amos obad mal ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto nowuoyo kuom joedom kama rieko tinde orumo e piny edom koso donge jorieko maggi ngadonigi rieko koso tinde riekogi olal jodedan wichreuru uringi mondo utony kuonde maboyo nimar abiro tieko nyikwa esau nikech kinde akumogie osechopo ka ji pono mzabibu donge giweyo moko koso ka jokuo obiro kwalo chambu gotieno donge gikawo mana gidwaro un aseyweyou oko gi yuech kendo asefwenyo kuonde upondoe mi koro onge kama unyalo resorue joedom gi wedegi kod joma odak machiegni kodgi osetieki kendo onge kata ngat achiel modong kuom mano onego uwena nyithindu makiye mondo ariti mondu mag liete nyalo konyore kuoma ruoth nyasaye wacho niya ka ji mane ok owinjore kum bende noyudo kum koro un uparo ni dutony mak okumu ooyo nyaka kumu awuon asekuongora ni dala mar bozra nobed gima bwogo ji kendo nolokre thim ji nyiero kendo noluong nyinge ka gima okuong mier matindo mokiewo kode nobed kokethore nyaka chieng ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano jeremia nowacho niya aseyudo wach moa kuom ruoth nyasaye ni oseoro jaote mondo onyis ogendini kama chokuru ogendu mag lweny kendo uikru monjo edom un joedom ruoth nyasaye biro miyo ogandau dok manyap kendo onge ngama biro miyou luor sunga un go osewuondou chutho onge ngama oluorou kaka uparono udak malo e lwendni morokore manie wi gode maboyo kata obedo ni udak malo mabor kaka ongo kamano ruoth nyasaye biro lorou piny ruoth nyasaye ema owacho kamano ruoth nyasaye wacho niya masira malich biro mako joedom mi ngato ka ngato makadho machiegni moneno gik moko duto mosetimore ni pinyno nobwogi ka kihondko omako chak gima ne otimore ni sodom gi gomora kane okethogi kaachiel gi mier mokiewo kodgi e gima biro timore ni piny edom onge ngama nodag kuno kata mana nobworie ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano anabi mana ka sibuor mochomo lek moloth kowuok e bungu moyugno manie geng aora jordan kendo anami joedom mwomre gi nguech kaa bange ngat ayiero jatelo norit ogandano ere ngama inyalo pimo koda koso ere ngama dihedhre piem koda en ruoth mane dikwer wachna omiyo winjuru gima asechano timo ni edom kaachiel gi ji modak e dalagi mar teman kata mana nyithindgi bende noywa oko mi kibaji nogo ngato ka ngato ka olo edom koko nogore matek mi piny noyiengni kendo kokono nowinjre nyaka nam makwar wasigu nomonj bozra mana ka achuth mopodho piny kuom gima otho koa malo e kor polo ka buombene oyarore chiengno jolweny mag edom kihondko nomaki mana ka dhako muoch kayo weche mokor kuom jodamaski isa amos zek ruoth nyasaye nowuoyo kuom jodamaski niya joma odak hamath gi arpad luoro omako kendo chunygi chandore nikech gisewinjo wach marach chunygi lingore mana ka apaka mar nam makwar kendo ok ginyal yudo yueyo jodamaski osedoko manyap kendo gisewichore mondo giring ka kihondko omakogi piny ochamogi kendo giwinjo rem mana ka dhako muoch kayo dala marahuma mane mor chono ji osedarie pep chiengno yawuowi kod jolweny duto noneg e yore mag damaski ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano anamok mach e ohinga mar damaski kendo nawang ut ruoth behhadad pep weche mokor kuom jokedor gi dalagi mar hazor ruoth nyasaye nowuoyo kuom jokedor kod ruodhi mag hazor mane nebukadnezar ruodh babulon oloyo niya dhiyouru umonj jokedar joarabu modak yo wuok chieng mi utieki yakuru hembegi kod jambgi kaachiel gi ragengni mag hembegi kod gimoro amora muyudo e hembego bende peuru ngamia maggi kendo unyisgi ni masira olworogi kuonde duto un johazor asiemou ruoth nyasaye ni ringuru udhi mabor upondi nimar nebukadnezar ruodh babulon osechano tiekou kendo owacho niya biuru mondo wamonj ji maparo ni odak gi kue kendo onge gima nyalo timogi dhorangeyegi ni nono kendo ok lor bende ok riti ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano yakuru ngamia maggi kod jambgi mogundhogo abiro keyo jokedar timgi en tito yie wigi kuonde duto kendo abiro kelo kuomgi masira moa koni gi koni ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano hazor nolokre thim nyaka chieng kama ondiegi ema dakie onge ngama nodag kuno kata mana nobuorie weche mokor kuom piny elam kane zedekia osedoko ruodh juda ruoth nyasaye nowuoyo gi jeremia janabi kuom piny elam nowacho niya abiro nego joasere duto mag elam mosemiyo pinygi teko anami yamo moa kuonde duto kudh kochomo elam mi ake joma odak kuno kuonde duto onge piny moro joma ringo ok nochopie anami joelam bed moluoro wasikgi dwaro negogi anatiekgi gi mirimba mager kendo anaor ogendini mag lweny kuomgi nyaka chop girum chuth ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano anatiek ruodhi kod jotelo mag elam mi agur lochna kuno bange achien anami joelam chak dhi nyime maber ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano jeremia weche mokor kuom jobabulon isa ruoth nyasaye nowuoyo gi jeremia janabi kuom piny babulon niya huluru wach ni ogendini kik umunggi gonigiuru milome chunguru bandera mondo ji onge ni babulon osepodho marduk nyasache osemaki nyiseche mamoko mag babulon oyudo wichkuot nyiseche makuerogo okethi oganda moa yo nyandwat osebiro monjo babulon kendo biro loke thim mi ji kod jamni biro ringo kendo onge ngama biro dakie ruoth nyasaye wacho niya ka kindeno ochopo joisrael gi jojuda nobi kanyakla kaywak kendo ka dwara ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi ginipenj yo madhi sayun kendo ginichik kuno bang mano ginitimna singruok mochwere wigi ok nowilgo ka gisingore ni ginibed joga joga chalo gi rombe molal jokwadhgi owito e gode gisebayo ka rombe maa got moro kadhi e got machielo kendo wigi osewil gi kuma dalagi nitie ji duto moyudogi monjogi wasikgi wacho niya ne gitimo timbe maricho e nyim ruoth nyasaye omiyo gima watimonigi ok rach kweregi nogeno kuom ruoth nyasaye kendo gin bende nonego gisik ka gigeno kuome fweny un joisrael ringuru ua babulon ringuru ua e pinyno un ema ukuong wuok ka nyuogi telo ni kweth adhi jiwo ogendini moko marateke modak yo nyandwat mondo obi omonj babulon gibiro riedo ni lweny mondo giked gi dalano mi gikaw giniba asere ka jodwar josaba gima gibayo ok leng babulon ibiro yaki kendo joma yekogo biro kawo gimoro amora gidwaro ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano un jobabulon ne uyako ogandana kata umor kendo uil ka nyaroya matugo e lek kata ka faras manyiero dalau uwegi biro bedo gi wichkuot maduong jobabulon nobed oganda matinie moloyo ogendini duto bende pinygi nolokre thim pi ongee nikech asekume gi mirimba mager omiyo onge ngat nodag babulon enodong mana gunda ji duto mokadho kanyo nobed maluor mi dhier nono kuom gima osetimorene un joasere rieduru ni lweny mondo uked gi babulon ka ugoyone agenga chieluru babulon gi asere nikech osetimo timbe maricho e nyima ruoth nyasaye gouru sigich lweny e alwora mar dala koni gi koni nimar jobabulon osetingo badgi ni wasikgi ohingane osetuom momukore ruoth nyasaye koro achulo kuor ni jobabulon kuom mano un bende chulnigiuru kuor kendo utimnigi mana kaka ne gitimo ni ji mamoko neggiuru mondo chuoyo gi keyo kik bedie jopinje mamoko modak kanyo biro dok thuchegi nikech lweny ger joisrael chalo gi rombe sibuoche lawo kendo keyo mokwongo ruodh asuria ema nomonjogi mochamogi ka sibuor machamo le eka bange ruoth nebukadnezar nobiro momuodo chokegi emomiyo ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto nyasach israel abiro kumo ruoth nebukadnezar abiro dwoko joisrael e pinygi mi ginichal rombe kwayo e lek maber ka gichamo cham manyak e got karmel kendo e piny bashan kendo ka gichamo gik manyak e piny efraim gi piny gilead mi giyieng ka kindeno ochopo onge richo noyud kuom joisrael kata kuom jojuda nikech joma aweyo ka ngima ema bende anawenigi richogi ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano monjuru jomarathaim kod jopekod mi uneggi kendo utiekgi timuru gik moko duto achikou ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano mahu mar lweny winjore e piny kendo gik moko duto kethore malich babulon ne chalo gi nyundo mane ogoyo piny ngima koro nyundono otur matindotindo jopinje duto obwok kuom gima osetimorene babulon obadho mane achikoni kikia osemaki ne oyudi mi omaki nikech ne ipiem koda ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto aseyawo kama okanie giga mag lweny kendo asegologi gi mirima nikech gi gima onego atim e piny babulon monjuru babulon kuonde duto koni gi koni mondo umuk derene dhururu gik muyako ka pidhe mag cham kethuru dalano kik gimoro dongie neguru jolwenje duto ka rwedhi miyango ywaguru jobabulon nikech sa osechopo monego kumgie joma noringo motony koa babulon nobiro sayun monyisowa kaka ruoth nyasachwa nochulo ni jobabulon kuor kuom gima ne gitimo ni hekalune fweny nyisuru joasere mondo omonj babulon ee ngato ka ngato mongeyo bayo asere olwor dala kendo kik uwe ngato tony chuluru ni babulon kuor kuom gik moko duto mosetimo kendo utimne mana kaka osetimo ni ji mamoko nikech osesungore e nyima ngama ler mar israel kuom mano yawuote nonegi e yore mag dala mi jolwenje notiek pep chiengno ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano babulon isungori ahinya omiyo ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto amon kodi kendo kinde koro osechopo akumie oganda jasungani biro chwanyore mi podhi kendo onge ngama nochunge abiro wango mier mokiewo kode gi mach mi gik moko duto man e alworane kethre ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto wacho niya joisrael gi jojuda ithiro ji duto mane omakogi kwayogi malich kendo ok nyal weyonigi thuolo mondo gia gin gi jawar maratego nyinge ruoth manyalo gik moko duto en owuon ema nolos wachgi mi okel kue e piny jobabulon enomi chandruok ruoth nyasaye wacho niya tho ochopo kuom babulon ee ochopo kuom joge gi kuom jotende kod kuom joge mariek tho ochopo kuom jonabi mage jomriambo gin joma ofuwo manade tho ochopo kuom jolwenje mi luoro omakogi oseketh faresegi gi gechegi mag lweny tho ochopo kuom jolweny mane ondiko mi gilokore mayomyom ka mon oseketh mwandune kendo oyakgi oro ochopo e pinye kendo miyo aorene duono mago duto otimore nikech babulon en piny milamoe nyiseche makuero mabwogo ji kendo miyo ji fuwo fweny kuom mano gibuya gi ondiegi kod winy makuero nodag kuno onge ngama nochak odag kuno nyaka chieng chak gima notimore ni sodom gi gomora kane akethogi kaachiel gi mier mokiewo kodgi e gima biro timore ni babulon onge ngama nodag kuno kata mana nobworie ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano oganda moro biro moa e piny man yo nyandwat ee oganda marangongo man kuma bor ikore ni lweny gin gi asere gi tonge giger kendo ok gikech ngato tiende faresegi mor ka apaka mar nam mawuo giikore kedo gi babulon ruodh babulon owinjo wach mi thudhno omako lwete kendo kibaji goye mana ka dhako muoch kayo ruoth nyasaye abiro biro mana ka sibuor mochomo lek moloth kowuok e bungu moyugno manie geng aora jordan kendo anami jobabulon mwomre gi nguech kawuok e dalagi bange ngat ayiero jatelo norit ogandano ere ngama inyalo pimo koda koso ere ngama dihedhre piem koda jatelo mane dikwer wachna omiyo winjuru gima asechano timo ni dala babulon kod joma odakie kata mana nyithindgi bende noywa oko mi kibaji nogo ngato ka ngato ka olo babulon koko nogore matek mi piny noyiengni kendo ogendini mamoko nowinj kokone jeremia ruoth nyasaye okumo babulon ruoth nyasaye wacho niya abiro kelo yamo maketho babulon kendo tieko joma odakie abiro oro ji moa e pinje mamoko mondo odhi oke babulon mana ka mihudhi yamo keyo chieng masira omake ginimonje koni gi koni mi giwe pinyno nono kik uwe ni jobabulon thuolo mondo oba asere kata kik uwenigi thuolo mondo gimanre gi gigi mag lweny bende kik uwe yawuotgi mak unego tiekgiuru atieka pep ginitho e yore mag miechgi kosechwowgi mohinygi ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto pok ajwango joisrael gi jojuda kata obedo ni gisetimo timbe maricho e nyima kamano ngama ler mar israel koro achulom kuor kendo akumo jobabulon ok onego negu nikech richogi omiyo ringuru ua kuno ukwo ngimau fweny babulon ne chalo gi kikombe mar dhahabu manie lweta mamiyo piny duto mer ogendini nomadho divai manie iye mi wigi okethore koro babulon osepodho apoya mi okethore ywageuru dwaruru yath ni adhondene nimar dipo ka omiyo ochango fweny jopinje mamoko modak kuno nowacho niya ne watemo konyo babulon kata kamano kinde nosekadho koro biuru wawuogi mondo wadog thuchewa nimar osekum babulon gi kum malich mochopo nyaka e polo joisrael owacho ni ruoth nyasaye osenyiso ni gin joma kare omiyo giwacho niya wadhiuru sayun mondo walandie gik ruoth nyasachwa osetimo ruoth nyasaye osewinjo ruodhi mag medium nikech odwaro ketho babulon mondo ochulgo ni babulon kuor kuom ketho hekalu mare jotend jolweny golo chik niya piaguru aserni kendo ikreuru gi tonge chunguro bandera manyiso jolweny mondo omonj ohinga mar babulon jiwuru jorit kendo keturu jolweny kuondegi bende keturu jomoko obuti mondo obuk joma ringo ruoth nyasaye osetimo gima ne owacho ni notim ni jobabulon mana kaka nochano fweny babulon en dala man gi aore mangeny kendo en gi mwandu mogundho kata kamano oserumo kendo tond ngimane osechot ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto osekuongore gi nyinge owuon ni obiro kelo ji mangeny ka bonyo mondo omonj babulon kendo ka giseloye ginikog gi mor ruoth nyasaye nochueyo piny gi tekone mogure motegno kendo noyaro polo gi riekone en ema omiyo pi manie tok polo wuo kendo otugo boche polo e tung piny duto bende omiyo polo mil ka koth chue kendo ogolo yamo kar kenone mondo okudhi gik makamago miyo ji ngeng kendo bedo mofuwo jotheth duto yudo wichkuot kuom gik githedho nikech gin mana nyiseche manono onge gi ngima gin gik manono moromo chayo kendo gibiro rumo chieng ruoth nyasaye biro mondo otiekgi nyasach jakobo ok chal gi gigo nimar en ema ne ochueyo gik moko duto kendo oseyiero joisrael mondo obed joge owuon ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto e nyinge ruoth nyasaye wacho niya babulon e le akedogo ne akonyora kodi kuom chadho ogendinni kendo kuom chadho farese gi joma idhogi kuom turo geche lweny kod joma riembogi kuom nego chwo gi mon kod joma dongo gi joma tindo kaachiel gi yawuowi gi nyiri bende ne akonyora kodi kuom chadho ruodhi gi jodonggi ruoth nyasaye wacho niya ubiro neno ka achulo kuor ni babulon gi joge kuom richo duto mane gitimo sayun babulon ichalo gi got maketho piny ngima ruoth nyasaye jasiki abiro maki mi agoyi piny milokri buru onge kidi moro kata achiel nogol e gundani mondo ogedgo ibiro chalo gi thim nyaka chieng ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano chunguru bandech lweny gouru tung mondo ogendini owinji kendo giikre monjo babulon luonguru jopinje mag ararat gi mag mini kod mag ashkenaz mondo obi ochak lweny kendo yieruru ngato obed jatendgi keluru farese mangeny ka bonyo nyisuru ruodhi mag medium gi jotendgi kod jodonggi kaachiel gi jopinje duto manie bwo lochgi mondo oikre monjo babulon piny tetni kendo yiengni nikech ruoth nyasaye loko babulon thim maonge ngama dakie mana kaka nosechano jolweny mag babulon oringo lweny mopondo mana kuonde mochiel motegno luoro omakogi mi koro gichalo mana mon dhorangeye dala osemuki mowang udi gi mach joote mangeny ringo kaa koni gi koni mondo onyis ruodh babulon ni wasigu osemwomo ohinga kuonde duto gisekawo dhowedhe kendo giwango odundu gi mach mi kibaji ogoyo jolweny mag babulon chieng keyo osechopo machiegni piyopiyo nono wasigu biro negogi mi nyongi ka cham midino ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto kendo nyasach israel ema owacho kamano ruodh babulon nokango jerusalem mochamo osenyodho dalano mobolo kucha mana ka agulu iye ni nono kendo omwonye mana ka ondiek ne okawo mana gik mabeyo modwaro owito mago ok odwar josayun wacho niya muma mondo ocham jobabulon kuom masira gisekelonwa ee jojerusalem wacho niya muma mondo ocham jobabulon kuom rembwa mosechwer kuom mano ruoth nyasaye wacho ni jojerusalem niya abiro doknu mondo achul kuor ni jobabulon nikech un kendo abiro twoyo kuonde pi babulon aye mi aduon aorene babulon nodong gunda ondiegi ema dakie nobed kama bwogo ji onge ngama odakie kendo kibaji nogo ji duto moneno gima osetimorene jobabulon goyo asumbi ka sibuor kendo giruto ka nyithind sibuor kara ka giowore kamano abiro losonigi sawo abiro miyogi gimer mi gibed mamor bange nindo notergi ok ginyal chiew kendo abiro terogi mondo oyanggi mana kakaa iyango jamni ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano osekaw babulon dala maduong piny duto pako oselokore gima bwogo ogendini nam oseime mi oume gi apaka mawuo miech jobabulon osedoko gik mabwogo ji kendo chalo mana gi thim pi ongee ngato ok dagie kata wuothie abiro kumo bel nyasach babulon mi ami ongog oko gik mosekwalo kendo ogendini ok nochak olame kendo ohinga mar babulon osepodho un joisrael ringuru ua kuno ngato ka ngato oring mirimba mager mondo ore ngimane kuwinjo wach moro marach kaka wach lweny kata ni ruoth moro kedo gi wadgi kik chunyu parre kata kik ubed maluor nikech higa ok kadhi mak weche makamago olandore kinde biro anakumie nyiseche manono mag babulon mi piny babulon noyud wichkuot kendo joge duto noneg e lweny fweny mony moa yo nyandwat biro loyo babulon kendo kethe mi gik moko duto manie piny kendo manie polo nokog gi mor ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano fweny babulon nomiyo ji otho e piny ngima omiyo koro ibiro kethe nikech joge nonego joisrael mangeny un joga man babulon useyombo tho koro ringuru ua mak udigni kata ubor koda kamano paruru ruoth nyasaye nyasachu kendo jerusalem bende mondo upar uwacho niya ji oseyanyowa omiyo wiwa okuot nikech jopinje mamoko osedonjo kuonde maler mag hekalu kuom mano ruoth nyasaye awacho ni kinde biro anakumie nyiseche manono mag babulon duto kata da bed ni babulon nyalo idho mi tundi e polo kendo ger udi motegno kuno pod daor ji mondo okethe ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano winjuru ywak man babulon manyiso ni pinyno okethore ruoth nyasaye ema aketho babulon kendo abiro miyo oling thi koko mar jolweny mamonjo dalano chal mana ka apaka mawuo matek gisebiro mondo giketh babulon kendo gisemako jolweny mage mi gituro gigi mag lweny ruoth nyasaye e nyasaye kumo ji kuom richogi omiyo abiro kumo babulon mana marom gi timbene abiro miyo jodonge gi joge mariek gi jotelo kod joge mag lweny bed momer mi nindo tergi mi ok ginyal chiew kendo ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ema awacho kamano ohinga mapek mar babulon ibiro ruomb piny kendo dhorangeyene maboyo nowang pep tich maduong mane ogendini tiyo koro nobed gima nono nikech tichgi duto koro osewang morumo pep ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ema awacho kamano seraya wuod neria nyakwar maseya ne jatich zedekia ruodh juda e higa mar angwen mar loch zedekia noyudo seraya dwaro dhi babulon omiyo jeremia ne oore jeremia nokawo kitabu moro mi ondikoe masiche duto mane biro timore ni babulon kaachiel gi weche mamoko duto mane osewacho kuom babulon nowacho ni seraya niya ka ichopo babulon som ni ji weche duto mondik e kitabuni bange ilem kama ruoth nyasaye isewacho ni ibiro ketho dalani maonge gima ngima kaka dhano kata le nodagie kendo ni obiro dong nono nyaka chieng fweny ka isetieko timo kamano itue ni kitabuno kidi eka iwite e aora yufrate bang mano iwach niya mano e gima biro timore ni babulon kaka kidini onyumore e pi e kaka babulon bende nonyumre e masira ruoth nyasaye biro kelo kuome mi ok nochak owuog kendo mano e giko weche jeremia jeremia loch zedekia ruodhi weche mag ndalo zedekia ne jahigni piero ariyo gachiel kane odoko ruodh juda kendo norito piny kuom higni apar gachiel kodak jerusalem min mare ne nyinge hamutal nyar jeremia jalibna timbe zedekia ne richo e nyim ruoth nyasaye mana kaka timbe due mar apar e higa mar ochiko mar loch zedekia nebukadnezar ruodh babulon nobiro gi joge mag lweny momonjo jerusalem ne gigero kambi oko mar dala eka gichielone ohinga molwore ne gigoyo ni jerusalem agenga nyaka higa mar apar gachiel mar loch zedekia koro kech ne lich e dalano kendo ji ne onge gi chiemo chuth chieng due ochiko due mar angwen ezek jobabulon nomwomo ohinga mar dala mi zedekia notemo ringo gi jolwenje duto gotieno kata obedo ni jobabulon nosedhogo dala koni gi koni kamano ne giluwo rangach mane ni e kind ohingni ariyo ka gingado orundu ruoth mi gichiko holo mar jordan jolweny mag babulon nolawo ruoth zedekia mojuko e paw jeriko mi jolwenje duto oringo oweye ne gimake mi gitere ribla ir ruodh babulon mongadone bura kuno ruodh babulon nogolo chik moneg yawuot zedekia mana e wange koneno e dala ribla e piny hamath jodong juda bende nonegi kuno ezek bange nogolo chik motok wenge zedekia oko kendo notueye gi nyororo motere babulon e tuech nosiko e od tuech nyaka otho jobabulon omako jojuda motero e tuech ruodhi weche mag ndalo jeremia chieng due apar due mar abich e higa mar apar gochiko mar loch nebukadnezar nebuzaradan jangad ni ruoth rieko kendo jatend joge mag lweny nodonjo jerusalem ruo ne owango hekalu mar ruoth nyasaye gi od ruoth kod ut joma dongo duto kendo joge mag lweny nomuko ohinga duto nolworo dalano bange nebuzaradan nomako joma nodong jerusalem motero babulon kaachiel gi joma noseringo modok ni ruodh babulon kod jotich molony mane pod odong kuno jomoko modhier ahinya mane onge gi gimoro noweyo e piny juda mondo oti e puothe mzabibu kendo e puothe mamoko ruo jobabulon notoyo sirni mag mula gi rachungi mane itiyogo e hekalu kod karaya maduong mar mula bende ne ni kanyo bange ne gitero mulago duto babulon bende ne gidhi gi agulini gi rachodhgi gi rangisni gi bakunde mitingoe remb misango gi tep ubani kod gik moko duto mag mula nolos ni tich hekalu jatend jolweny nokawo gik moko duto molos gi dhahabu kata molos gi fedha kata kikombe gi tegni mag mach gi tewni mamoko gi agulini gi rachungi taya gi tewni mag ubani kod tewni mag misengni miolo piny pek mula mane ruoth solomon olosogo sirni ariyo gi karaya maduong kod ruedhi apar gariyo mane orenje karayano ne ngeny mokadho apima sirni ariyogo ne romre moro ka moro borne modhi malo ne romo mita ochiko alwora mare ne romo mita auchiel ne girokore kendo mith moro ka moro ne romre gi lwedo achiel ewi siro ka siro ne nitie gima chalo agulu mar mula borne modhi malo romo mita ariyo gi nu alwora mare ne oketie gik monginore onginore ka machunga bende nolos gi mula siro ka siro ne nigi gik monginorego mia achiel piero ochiko gauchiel kuomgi ne nenore gi kapiny nebuzaradan jatend lweny maduong nomako seraya jadolo maduong gi zefania jadolo maluwe kod ji adek jorit dhood hekalu bende nokawo ngat mane osebedo jatend jolweny gi jagoro mare mane tichne en ndiko nying joma onego obed jolweny kaachiel gi ji abiriyo kuom joma ne ngado ni ruoth rieko kod jodongo piero auchiel mane pod ni jerusalem jogo duto notero ribla ir ruodh babulon mi ruoth nogolo chik mi ogogi kendo oneggi kuno e piny hamath kamano e kaka nodar jojuda e pinygi moter e tuech kar rom ji mane nebukadnezar odaro motero e tuech chal kama e higa mar abiriyo mar lochne nodaro ji alufu adek gi piero ariyo gadek e higa mar apar gaboro mar lochne nodaro ji mia aboro gi piero adek gariyo kogolo jerusalem e higa mar piero ariyo gadek mar lochne nebuzaradan nodaro joyahudi mia abiriyo gi piero angwen gabich kamano ji duto mane odar ne romo alufu angwen gi mia auchiel ogony ruoth jehoyachin kendo omiye duong ruodhi kane jehoyachin ruodh juda osetue higni piero adek gabiriyo evilmerodak ruodh babulon nogonye mano notimore chieng due piero ariyo gabich due mar apar gariyo e higa mane evilmerodak ochakoe tich ruoth evilmerodak norito jehoyachin gi ngwono kendo ne omiye luor maduong moloyo ruodhi duto mane ni babulon e tuech kuom mano jehoyachin nolonyo lep tuech kendo nochiemo e od ruoth ndalone duto odiechieng kodiechieng kuom higni duto mane ongima ne imiye gik moko morome konyorego ywagruok lit dala sayun neno mano kaka dala sayun mane ji ngenyie tinde odong nono chon ogendini ne kwane ka dala maduong koro osedong mana ka chi liel adier chon ne en ruodh mier duto tinde ochalo mana ngama tiyo tich misumba oywak malit otieno duto ka pi wange ridore e lembe kuom joherane duto onge ngama nyalo kueyo chunye osiepene duto osendhoge mi odoko wasike kane jojuda osepodho mi othirgi ne otergi e tuech koro gidak e kind ogendini kuondego bende ok giyudie kue joma ne sandogi duto osejukogi ke gin e thagruok malich kamano yore madhi sayun ywagore nimar onge ngama luwogi kadhi timo sawo kuno kendo dhorangeye odong nono maonge ji jodolo mage omo chunygi malit kendo nyige isando marach mano kaka en gi thagruok malich wasike ema tinde oloye kendo dhi nyime maber ruoth nyasaye ema osekelone chandruok nikech timbene mamono mokadho akwana wasike osemako nyithinde matindo motero mabor e tuech duong duto mane sayun nigo oselal jodonge chalo gi le modenyo ok nyal yudo lum kendo giringo ka gionge teko ka wasikgi lawogi jerusalem paro ndalo mane onenoe chandruok kod chuny lit kane wasigu omako joge onge ngama nobiro mondo okonye wasike ne ogoyone siboyi koneno ni osepodho jerusalem ne timo richo mangeny malich mi olokore mana ka nanga mochido mowiti kendo ji duto mane miye duong tinde ochaye nikech giseneno duge koro ere gima dotim mak mana omo chunye kendo loko wange kucha chilo en go omienore e lepe ne ok odewo gima biro timore achien mano emomiyo podho mosepodhogo lich miwuoro kendo onge ngama nyalo hoyo chunye oywagore niya ruoth nyasaye neye chandruok ango nimar wasika oselocho wasigu osekawo mwandune duto oseneno joma ok joisrael ka donjo e hekalu mare gin ogendini mane ruoth nyasaye ikwero ni kik donji e chokruok maler nimar en chokruok mari jojerusalem duto ywagore ka kwayo chiemo giloko mwandugi mondo giyudgo chiemo odwoknigi tekregi dala jerusalem wacho niya ruoth nyasaye rang ineye kaka ikwana ka gima nono un duto mukadho ok dudewie wach malich machal kama mad urang uneye ka bende nitie chandruok machalo gi mara ruoth nyasaye osesandago malit kokechoni ne ooro mach gie polo modonjo e chokena nochiko obadho momako tiendena mi odwoka chien oseweya ka adong kenda ka tuo ramo denda odiechieng duto osedhogo richona kuoma gi lwete owuon adier ne oketo jok mare e nguta mi pek mar jokno otieko tekra ruoth nyasaye osejwanga e lwet wasika kendo ok anyal sirogi osenyono joga duto marateke kendo oseluongo oganda lweny mangongo mondo otiek yawuota jolweny bende osenyono dala maduong mar juda mana ka ngama nyono olemo mar bicho mano emomiyo aywak ka pi wanga ridore e lemba nimar ngat dikue chunya mi konya ni kuma bor yawuota odhier nono nikech wasika oselocho sayun tingo bedene malo ka ywak onge ngama nyalo kueyo chunye ruoth nyasaye osechiko ni mondo joma modak mokiewo gi joka jakobo odok mamon kodgi jerusalem oselokorenigi ka nanga mochido mowiti dala jerusalem ywagore kama ruoth nyasaye osetimo gima kare dala jerusalem ema asepiem kode mi aweyo chikene linguru linguru un ogendini duto mondo uneye chandruok go nyiga gi yawuota osemak moter e tuech ne aluongo osiepena mondo okonya ne giwuonda awuonda jodolona kod jodonga notho e dalani ka dwaro chiemo mondo oduoggo tekregi ruoth nyasaye neye kaka anie chandruok malit chunya chandore kendo iya nyawni nikech asepiem kodi marach ahinya lweny nego ji oko e thim mana kaka tho bende neko dala e udi kendo nyithindo dong kiye winj kaka achur onge ngama kue chunya kane wasika duto owinjo chandruok go ne gidoko mamor kuom gima nitimo kel odiechieng mane isechiko mondo gin bende gichal koda mondo richogi duto okel e nyimi kendo itimnigi mana kaka isetimona kuom richona duto nikech achur malich ahinya kendo chunya ool chuth ywagruok ruoth nyasaye ema okelo ni sayun thagruok mano mudho mandiwa manade ruoth nyasaye osekumogo sayun ka iye owang hekalu mar israel duongne yande otundo nyaka e polo osewito piny chieng bura ka ok oparo ni en raten tiende ruoth nyasaye oseketho mier duto mag joma jakobo ka ok okechogi nomuko kuonde mochiel motegno e piny juda ka en gi mirima mager ne omukogi nyaka e lowo mokuodo wi jotelo kodwoko loch pinyno chien kane iye owang ne onego joma rateke duto mag israel kendo kane wasigu biro ne ok okonyogi gi tekone maduong oseliel e piny joka jakobo ka mach mawango gik moko duto man bute oseywayo atunge ka omako matek gi bade korachwich mana ka jasigu osenego joma beyo duto mwahero mi oolo mirimbe mager ka mach kuom josayun adier ruoth nyasaye oselokore jasigu mi otieko israel osemuko udi madongo duto kendo mier mochiel motegno oduoko piny bende osekelo ni jerusalem kuyo kod ywagruok osegolo gik moko duto e hekalu mare mi odong nono mana ka kiru mowe e puodho adier kama ler joge chokoree osemuko chuth ruoth nyasaye osemiyo wi ji owil gi sewni madongo kod sabato e sayun kendo osejwango ruoth kod jodolo ka iye owang osedagi kendone mar misango mi ojwango hekalu mare nochiwo ut sayun madongo e lwet wasigu mi gigoyo koko e od ruoth nyasaye mana machal gi koko migoyo chieng sawo maduong ruoth nyasaye osechano mondo omuk ohinga mar sayun ne opime maber kokethe mak oweyo nyaka chop otieke pep omiyo ohingane oruombore piny mi kuyo ema odong dhorangeyene bende osepodho piny kendo ruoth nyasaye oseturo lodi mage matindotindo ruodh sayun kod jodonge oke e kind ogendini mamoko kendo chik nyasaye koro ok ti jonabi mage bende koro ok yud fweny moa kuom ruoth nyasaye jodonge obet piny mi oling thi gisebuko wigi buru kendo girwakore gi piende gugru nyi jerusalem bende okulo wigi piny aseywak ahinya mi wang oowore kendo iya nyawni chunya bende chandore malit nikech masira joga neno rawere gi nyithindo mayom nongno tero kendo gipodho e wangyore mag dala ee nongno terogi kendo gipodho e yore mag dala kaka joma ohinyore giywak ka gikwayo minegi chiemo kod divai kata kamano chunygi chot mana e kor minegi yaye jerusalem ere kaka daho chunyi ere chandruok dapim gi marino koso ango dapimgo mondo aho chunyi yaye sayun adhondi duong ka nam ere ngama dithiedhi fweny mane jonabini oneno mi onyisi ne ok adier ne gin mana miriambo lilo ok ne ginyisi timbeni mamono mondo ichak idhi maber kendo fweny gisenyisi gin mana weche manono wito ji yaye jerusalem ji duto makadho buti pamo lwetgi ka seyi gisicho kendo gitwenyo umgi ka gipenjore niya adier e dala ji luongo ni dala maberie moloyo kendo ni dala makelo mor ni piny ngima wasiki duto yanyi marach kendo jari gisicho kendo gigoyoni siboi ka giwacho niya ero wasetieke e odiechieng wasebet kwarito adier osechopo mi wanene ruoth nyasaye osechano gima notimo chon adier osetimo gima nosiemo ji ni obiro timo oseketho gik moko ka ok odewo kendo omiyo wasigu ogoyoni siboi komedo tekogi sayun dala mochiel gi ohinga ywag ni ruoth nyasaye gi chunyi duto pi wangi mondo omol ka aora odiechieng gotieno kik iyue kata matin kendo pi wangi ki chogi malo gotieno mondo iywag matek bang seche angwen ka seche angwen ka jorit lokoree weche duto manie chunyi ol oko ka pi e nyim ruoth nyasaye ting bedeni malo kilame mondo ore nyithindi nongno tero e wangyore duto yaye ruoth nyasaye rang mondo ineye joma isesando malit bende mon dicham nyithindgi giserito maber koso jodolo gi jonabi dineg adier e hekalu mari joma dongo gi joma tindo duto nindo piny e wang yore nyiga gi yawuota lweny gi kech osenego isenegogi ka gi mirima adier isetiekogi ka ok ikechogi ngang ne iorona wasigu moa kuonde duto mana ka ji machokore e nyasi moro maduong onge kata ngat achiel mane otony ooyo onge ngato mane odong ka ngima chieng mane inie gi mirima ruoth nyasaye ji duto mane anywolo maber kendo apidho wasika osetieko pep ywagruok joisrael ogeno yudo kue kuom ngwono mar nyasaye ema aseneno masira mane ruoth nyasaye okelona kokecho e jal mane oriembo mi ochuno mondo owuothi e mudho mandiwa ema osanda kinde duto odiechieng ngima osemiyo denda dhi adhiya chokena bende oseturo oselwora gi gik mamiya chuny lit kod olo osemiyo adak kuonde motimo mudho mana ka ngat mane otho chon osechiela gi ohinga koni gi koni ok anyal tony kendo osetueya gi nyororo mapek bende kata ka aywak kendo aluonge mondo okonya ok odwar winjo kwayona osegengo yore mane aluwo gi kite mopa omiyo awuotho e yore mogondore obutona mana ka ondiek kata ka sibuor mobuto kama opondo osegengo yora mi abaro tenge kendo okidha matindo tindo mojwanga kucha oseywayo atunge mi ochiela gi aseche osehobo kora gi asere owuodho e olalo asedoko ngat ji duto nyiero gigeta gi wer pile odiechieng duto osemiyo lit gi olo opongo chunya osemiyo laka otur ka amuodo ge kendo osemiyo achamo buru koro chunya onge gi kue mi wiya osewil gi mor yande go kuom mano aywak ni tekra orumo kendo geno mane agenogo kuom ruoth nyasaye bende orumo ka aparo thagruok kod kuyo ango litna malich aparogi pile kendo chunya onyosore gima bende aparo momiyo gi geno en ni hera mosiko mar ruoth nyasaye ochwere kendo ngwonone ok rum ginyien pile okinyi kokinyi chutho adiera mare duong awacho niya ruoth nyasaye kende ema ango omiyo ageno kuome ruoth nyasaye timo maber ni joma ogene kendo dware en gima ber bedo gi kue kirito ruoth nyasaye mondo oresi bende ber mondo ngato oting jok ka pod en wuowi kendo ka nyasaye otueyo jokno kuome ber mondo obed kar kende koling onego obolre chuth nikech kamoro dipo ka oresore bende onego ochiw lembe ni ngat dwaro thale kendo oyie bedo ngama ji yanyo nikech ruoth nyasaye ok nowit ngato nyaka chieng kata obedo ni okumo ji malit ongwononigi bende gi herane mogundho mosiko nimar ok ohero sando dhano kata kumo ruoth nyasaye ok yie mondo osand ngato angata motue kata tamo ngato yudo adiera monego oyudi e nyim ngama duong moloyo kata ketho buch ngato kiyalo en nga dichik gimoro mi timre ka ok ruoth nyasaye ema ochano ni mondo gino otimre donge ber gi rach wuok mana kuoma ngama duong moloyo ka kamano ere gima omiyo dhano adhana mathoni ngur kikume nikech richone ber wanon timbewa kendo wapar ane kaka gibet eka wadog ir ruoth nyasaye kwasudo ir ruoth nyasaye ber wasud ire gi chunywa ok kwatingo mana bedewa malo kende ruoth nyasaye wan e joma osetimo richo mi opiem kodi pok ingwononwa kuom richowa iselawowa ka gi mirima mager mi inegowa mak ikechowa iseumori gi boche polo mondo lemowa kik tund iri bende isemiyo ogendini kwanowa ka yugi miwito wasikwa duto yanyowa marach kendo jarowa luoro kod obadho oritowa kendo kethruok gi masira ochomowa pi wanga mol ka aora nikech joga inego adier pi wanga biro chwer mak chogi nyaka chop ruoth nyasaye rang piny gie polo mi ne chandruokna ka aneno gima otimore ni nyi dalawa duto chunya chandore malit joma ne mon koda kayiem nono oseriemba malit mana ka winy miriembo ne giluta e bur ka angima mi gibolo kite kuoma pi ne oima mi awacho ni atho ne aluongo nyingi yaye ruoth nyasaye kane anie bur matutno kane aywakni ni mondo kik itamri konya ne iwinjoo dwonda ne isudo machiegni kane aluongi kamano mi iwachona ni kik abed maluor ruoth nyasaye isechwaka mi ireso ngimana iseneno gima rach motimna mi ingado bucha kare ne ineno kaka ji chulona kuor kendo niwinjo weche duto mane gihondho kuoma ruoth nyasaye isewinjo ayany giyanyago kaachiel gi gik maricho mane gichano timona isewinjo bende kaka wasika kuodha lingling pile odiechieng duto neye kaka gigeta malit gi wer kinde duto ruoth nyasaye timnigi gima oromo gi timbegi migi bedo gi chuny matek mondo eka ikuonggi lawgi kikecho kendo itiekgi chuth mondo kik gidag e piny misechueyoni yaye ruoth nyasaye ywagruok kum mokumgo sayun orumo mano kaka dhahabu ochido kata mana dhahabu maberie moloyo kite mag hekalu okere e akek yore duto neye kaka yawuot sayun yande beyo ka dhahabu maler tinde ipimo mana gi aguch lowo dhano ema ochueyo kata mana ondieg otoyo bende dhodho nyithindgi joga osedoko makwiny mana ka udo e thim nyathi madhoth riyo oloyo mi lewe omoko e dande nyithindo matindo kwayo chiemo onge ngama migi kata mana nginjo joma yande chamo chiemo mabeyo koro ojwang e wang yore jogo mane odak e ngima maber koro kwanyo chiemo mana e pidh yugi kum joga oyudo lich moloyo kum mane okum go sodom nikech sodom nolok gunda mana piyopiyo nono onge ngama oywago jodong joga yande nigi ngima maber dendgi yande pichni kendo leny ka mo tinde wanggi olil ti mi ka ngato oromo kodgi ok nyal ngeyogi chokegi ogulo kendo dendgi ojwer mana ka luth ji mane otho e lweny ne johawi moloyo joma ne kech oywayo monego kaonge gima cham mon mangwon notedo nyithindgi giwegi adier nyithindgi nolokore chiembgi e ndalo mane masira omakoe joga ruoth nyasaye ne oolo mirimbe mangeny ka iye owang mi omoko mach kuom sayun mowango mise mage duto onge ruoth moro kata mana ngat achiel modak e piny mane oyie ni jasigu didonj e dhorangeye jerusalem mago notimore nikech richo mag jonabi mage kendo nikech timbe mamono mag jodolone mane ochuero remb joma kare ne gibayo ka muofni e wang yore ka gichadhore gi remo ji ok nyal mulo lepgi ji ne goyonigi koko niya dhiuru kucha dhiuru kucha un joma ogak dhiuru kucha kik ubi machiegni kuom mano ne giringo piyopiyo mi gidhi kendo gibayo e kind ogendini ka ok ginyal nwango kuonde dak ruoth nyasaye owuon ema nokeyogi mi ok ochako oparogi kendo bende ne ok ongwono ni jodolo kata kecho jodongo ne ok okecho wengewa ojony ka warango gima dikonywa kara mana kayiem oganda mane warito kwageno ni biro konyowa kara ne ok nyal gimoro wasikwa manyo kuonde waluwo omiyo ok wanyal wuotho e wang yore ndalowa orumo adier chieng thowa osechopo joma lawowa nenore ni ringo matek moloyo ongo huyo e kor polo gilawo gerwa matek e kor gode kendo gibutonwa e thim ruoth mane nyasaye oyiero kendo wakwano ka ngimawa ne gimako e bur mane gikunyo en e jal mane waparo ni dwadag e bwo tipone e kind ogendini un joedom modak e piny uz ero umor kendo uil ngeuru ni kikombe mwamadhoni ema un bende ubiro madho enomeru mi unyis dugu kum mane okumgo josayun kuom timbegi mamono koro orumo ok nochak oriembgi kendo mondoo gibed wasumbni e piny wasikgi un joedom ema ruoth nyasaye nokumu kendo enoel kethou e lela ywagruok lemo mikwayogo ngwono ruoth nyasaye parie gima osetimorenwa rangwa mondo ineye kaka wiwa okuot malit jopinje mamoko osekawo pinywa gi miechwa wachalo gi nyithindo makiye maonge gi wuonegi minewa bende chalo mond liete pi mwamodho gi yien mwachwako wangiewo angiewa gin mawa wawegi wasandore malit gi jok mapek e ngutwa inegowa gi tich ok wanyal yudo yueyo kinde moro ne wawinjore gi jomisri mondo omiwa chiemo kinde machielo bende ne wawinjore gi joasuria kamano kwerewa notimo richo mathoth kendo koro gionge wan ema koro ikumowa nikechh richogigo wasumbni ema tinde tiyowa kendo onge ngama nyalo resowa e lwetgi wayudo chiembwa kwachiwo ngimawa nikech jolweny manyalo monjowa nie thim dendwa liet mana ka mach nikech tuo kech okelonwa mon gi nyiri ne omak gi thwon e sayun kendo e miech juda jodong gweng ne iliero gi luetegi e yien kendo kata mana joma odong ok mi duong yawuowi ichuno mondo oregi wahia bende chandore gi tingo yien mapek jodongo tinde ok chokre e bura yawuowi bende oseweyo goyo thum mor oserumo e chunywa kendo miendwa olokore ywak osimbwa mar duong bende osepodho yaye masira ochomowa nikech wan joricho chunywa lit kendo wangwa lil nikech got sayun osejwang mi ondiegi ema bayoe ruoth nyasaye ilocho nyaka chieng kendo lochni osiko kuom gi mirima mager ezekiel janabi ezekiel oneno duong maler mar nyasaye e fweny due abich due mar angwen e higa mar piero adek kane adak e bath aora kebar kaachiel gi joyahudi mane oter e tuech polo ne oyawore mi nyasaye ofwenyorena ne en due abich mar dueno kane ruoth jehoyachin osetieko higni abich e tuech ema ne wach ruoth nyasaye obiroe ni ezekiel wuod buzi jadolo ka en e piny babulon e bath aora kebar mi owinjo ka teko ruoth nyasaye olor kuome ezekiel ne atingo wanga mi aneno yamb ahiti ka kudho koa yo nyandwat bende ne aneno bor polo maduong kod mach mamil aruya gi ler mokwake koni gi koni e dier majno ne nitie gimori marieny ka mula bende ne aneno gik moko mangima angwen e iye machalo gi dhano mak mana ni moro ka moro ne nigi lela wenge angwen kod buombe angwen tiendegi ne oriere tir kendo ombonggi ne chalo gi ombong nyaroya mil ka mula moywe e bwo bwomb moro ka moro ne nitie lwedo machalo lwet dhano gigo duto kargi angwen ne nigi lela wenge kod buombe machal kama buombe ariyo mag moro ka moro noyarore kamulo buomb jowetene koni gi koni kane gihuyo gidhi adhiya kaachiel ok gilokore moro ka moro ne nigi lela wenge angwen lela wang nyime ne chalo gi lela wang dhano lela wang kor achwich ne chalo gi lela wang sibuor e bathe koracham ne nitie lela wang machalo gi mar rwath yoka ngeye ne nitie moro machalo gi mar ongo moro ka moro nosiko koyaro buombene ariyo komulogo buombe jowetene koni gi koni ariyo mamoko noumogo dende kaka ne gin gi lela wenge angwen moro ka moro ne ginyalo huyo ka gichomo kamoro amora roho dwaro dhiye ok gilokore kata matin ne nenore kagima mach mar mirni kata kar meny rieny e kindgi karingo koni gi koni ne en mach mangangni kendo polo ne mil e iye gik mangimago bende ne ringo koni gi koni ka mil polo kane arango gik mangima angwengo ne aneno tiende molworore ka mag gari mochung e bath moro ka moro tiendego ne rieny ka kidi nengone tek kendo giduto ne gichalre nolosgi ariyo ariyo ka moro ka moro ochung ei wadgi ariwa kamano kane gidhi kamoro gidhi adhiya mak gilokore tiende angwengo ne nigi murudumbe madongo malich wenge man gi teko mar neno opongo kane gik mangimago wuotho tiendego bende wuotho e bathgi kendo kane gidum gia e lowo tiendego bende dum ne gidhi mana kuma roho dwaro dhiye kendo tiendego bende ne dhi kodgi nimar roho mane nie gik mangimago ema bende ne nie tiendego kane gik mangimago wuotho kata ka gichung kata ka gidum gia e lowo tiendego bende ne timo mana kaka gitimo nimar gik mangimago ema ne chiko tiendego ewi gik mangimago malo ne nitie gimoro malich moyarore mil mana ka pe mopedhore buombe ariyo mag gik mangimago ne oyarore e bwo gino ka moro ka moro mulo buomb jowetene koni gi koni buombene ariyo mamoko oumo dende bende kane gihuyo ne awinjo ka buombegi kwadhore matek machalo mana nam maduong wuo kata jolweny mangeny magoyo mahu kata dwond nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto kane gichung buombegi ne lor piny koko ne pod winjore awinja ewi gima oyarore cha ewi gino ne nitie gimoro machalo gi kom duong molos gi kidi nengone tek gimoro machalo gi dhano nobet kuome gima nobet e komno ne rieny ka mula molut e mach chakre tiende nyaka wiye kendo ler mangangni nolwore koni gi koni lerno ne nigi kido duto machalo gi kit lihudu manie kor polo ka koth chue mano e kaka duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye ne chalo ezekiel nyasaye oluongo ezekiel mondo obed janabi kane aneno kamano ne apodho auma eka ne awinjo dwol moro kawacho niya wuod dhano malo mondo alos kodi e kinde mane dwolno wuoyo roho nodonjo kuoma mi achung gi tienda eka ne awinjo ka dwolno pod wuoyo kawacho niya wuod dhano aori ir joisrael osenganyo mopiem koda kaka kweregi nopiem koda e kaka gin bende koro gipiem koda wigi tek kendo ok gimiya luor omiyo aori irgi mondo inyisgi gima ruoth nyasaye awacho kata da bed ni giwinjo wachni kata ok giwinjo gibiro ngeyo ni janabi moro osebet ka ni e kindgi wuod dhano kik iluorgi kata kik iluor gima giwacho gibiro lwori mana ka kudho mi giketi diere kendo inichal mana ka gima idak e kind thomoni kata kamano kik iwe joma wigi tekgo bwogi kata kik iluor gimoro amora giwacho kata obedo ni gin joma wigi tek kamano wachnigi weche duto awachoni ni mondo inyisgi bed ni giyie winjo kata ok giyie wuod dhano winji gima anyisi wiyi kik bed matek ka wi jogo omiyo ngam dhogi mondo icham gima amiyi bang wechego ne aneno lwedo motingo kalatas modol korie kochomo kuma antie ne oyaro kalatasno mi aneno ka weche mag ywak gi kuyo kod masiche ondik e iye kendo e diengeye ezekiel eka nyasaye nowachona niya wuod dhano cham kalatas manie nyimini mondo idhi iwuo gi joisrael kuom mano ne angamo dhoga mi omiya kalatasno mondo acham kowachona niya cham kalatas mamiyini mondo oyiengi kamano ne achame mi awinjo ka omit mana ka mor kich bang mano nyasaye nowachona niya wuod dhanoo dhiyo ir joisrael mondo inyisgi weche duto awachoni ok aori ir oganda mawacho dhok matek ok ingeyo aori mana ir joisrael jou ka da bed ni aori ir ogendini madongo mawacho dhok matek ok ingeyo da gichiko itgi mi giwinjo gima iwacho joisrael ok bi chiko itgi mondo owinj gima iwacho nikech bende ne gitamore winjo wachna giduto gin jopiem kendo wigi tek koro abiro miyo wiyi bedo matek ka wigi bende abiro miyo ibedo motegno moloyo lwanda omiyo kik iluor joma jopiem go kata kik iwe gigoyi kibaji nyasaye ne odhi nyime kawachona niya wuod dhano chik iti maber ahinya mondo ipar weche duto abiro wachoni bange idhi ir jou ungo e tuech mondo inyisgi wechenago bed ni giyie winjo wachni kata ok giyie bende wachnigi ni wechego oa kuom ruoth nyasaye eka roho ne otinga malo kendo kane duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye odum ne awinjo koko maduong ka koko mar yiengni piny kokono ne mar buomb gik mangimago ka moro ka moro kwadhore kuom wadgi kendo ne mar tiende machal gi mag garigo kamor matek e kinde mane roho otinga malono ne iya owang kendo abedo gi chuny lit mi teko mar ruoth nyasaye nobiro kuoma ne adhi telabib kuma ne joma oter e tuech odakie e bath aora kebar mi abet kuno kuom ndalo abiriyo ka adhier nono nikech gik mane aseneno nyasaye oketo ezekiel jarit mar israel ezekiel kane ndalo abiriyogo oserumo ruoth nyasaye ne owuoyo koda ka wachona niya wuod dhano adwaro mondo aketi jarit mar oganda israel tiji biro bedo siemogi gi siem moro amora mamiyi ka awachoni ni ngat timbene mono biro tho mi ok isieme mondo owe yorene marichogo obed mangima enotho ka pod en jaricho kendo ema anakwani ka ngama onege ka isiemo jaricho mi odagi weyo timo timbene mamonogo enotho kapod en jaricho inires ngimani ka ngat makare odonjo e richo mi akelone masira enotho adier enotho nikech richone nimar ok isesieme ok napar timbene makare mosebedo kotimo ema nakwani ka ngama onege ka isiemo ngat makare mondo kik tim richo mi owinji kendo ok otimo richo ok enotho mi bende inires ngimani janabi ezekiel olokore momo ne ayudo ka teko mar ruoth nyasaye obiro kuoma mi awinjo kowachona niya malo mondo idhi oko e holo kuma abiro losoe kodi kuom mano ne awuok mi adhi e holo kendo ne aneno duong maler mar ruoth nyasaye mana kaka ne asenene e bath aora kebar ne apodho auma roho ne odonjo kuoma mi achung eka ruoth nyasaye ne owachona niya dog dala mondo ilorri e ot ibiro tueyi gi tonde mi ok iniwuog idhi oko kuma jou nitie bende abiro tueyo lewi mondo kik ilosi mi isiem joma jopiemgi bange ka achako wuoyo kodi mi amiyi teko mar loso iniwachnigi wechena kinyisogi ni wechego oa kuom ruoth nyasaye ji moko kuomgi nowinji moko ok nodewi nikech gin oganda jopiem ezekiel ezekiel otimo gima nyiso ni ibiro goyo ni jerusalem agenga nyasaye nowacho niya wuod dhano kaw matafari iket e nyimi mondo igorie gima nyiso ni matofarino ochung kar jerusalem bange ikuny bur molwore duto mi idhurne lowo kendo iketne gik moko mochung kaka ranyisi mag kambe jolweny kod lodi mituomogo ohinga bende kaw tap nyinyo mondo iket ka ohinga mar nyinyo e kindi gi matafarino chom matafarino tir mondo ochal gi dala ogone agenga ema ichal gi joma goyone agenga mano nobed ranyisi ni joisrael bange nindi gi
