chunyu pile kuom ruoth nyasachu ruoth nyasaye wacho niya joisraeel bende jomganga mana ka jokanaan gin gi rapim ok ni kare kendo gihero wuondo jongiewo eka giwacho niya wamew nimar waseyudo mwandu kendo onge ngama nyalo wacho ni waseyudogi e yor miganga tlawi ruoth nyasachu mane ogolou misri abiro miyo uchak udag e hembe mana kaka ne udak ka ne aromo kodu e thim ne awuoyo gi jonabi mi amiyogi fweny mangeny koro abiro kelo masira gi lwet jonabi joisrael lamo kido manono gilead joma lamo gik kamago biro tho gitimo misengni gi ruedhi gilgal emomiyo kendemagmisango biro lokore mi dok tuche mag kite manie puothe chak jakobo kwarwa ne oringo modhi e piny aram kuma ne okwayoe jamb ngat moro mondo oyud dhako wuok ruoth nyasaye ne ooro janabi mondo ogol joisrael e tuech adier nooro janabi mondo oritgi joisrael osemiyo ruoth nyasaye mirima mager giwinjore gi tho kuom timbegi maricho kendo nyasaye ok nowenigi richogi obiro kumogi kuom wichkuot gisemiye hosea okor ni joisrael biro rumo pep chon kane joefraim wuoyo ji mamoko tetni dhoodgi ne duong moloyo dhout israel mamoko ji noketho kuom lamo baal kendo gibiro tho nikech wachno eka pod gimedo timo atima richo kendo giloso kido mag fedha mondo gilam gikawo fedha gingo kendo gilosogo kido manono dhano ema oparo moloso gi lwete owuon bange giwacho niya timnigiuru misengni ere kaka ji nyalo nyodho kido manonogo mana kido molos e kit rwath kuom mano ji biro leny nono mana ka onguengo kata ka tho maduono ka nyango tegno ginichal mana gi mihudhi yamo keyo kar dino kendo ka iro mawuok e kendo mi lal nono ruoth nyasaye wacho niya e ruoth nyasachu mane ogolou misri e ndalogo ne ok ungeyo nyasaye moro mak mana kendo kende ne e jawaru tchik ne aritou e thim piny motwo motimo ongoro kane udonjo e piny maber ne uyudo gik moromou muyieng kendo ne udoko josunga mi wiu owil koda omiyo koro abiro monjou ka sibuor kendo abiro buto e bath yo mondo akiu mana ka kwach abiro monjou mana ka ondiek osema nyithinde kendo abiro yiechou tiarara ee abiro kidhou ka diemo wang mana ka sibuor mi anginyu matindo tindo ka ondiek un joisrael abiro tiekou koro ere ngama dikonyu sam ne ukwaya mondo aketnu ruoth gi jotelo ere kaka digires pinyni sam sam ne aketonu ruodhi ka gi mirima kendo asegologi ka akecho ahinya richo kod timbe mamono mag joisrael ondik e kitabu kendo okan maber joisrael nigi thuolo mar chako ngima manyien gimemore ka nyathi idwaro nywolo ok ongeyo kaka onego wuogi kor uparo ni abiro reso jogi kuom tho kata konyogi ni kik gidhi e piny joma otho ooyo tho bi gi masicheni duto kendo piny joma otho bi gi kethruokni duto nimar ok abi kecho jogi kata obedo ni joisrael dhi nyime maber ka buya malandore abiro kelonigi jaketh notiek gigi mabeyo duto mana kaka yamb oro moa e piny motimo ongoro duono sokni duto joisrael nyaka yud kum kuom kethogi nimar gisepiem gi nyasachgi gibiro tho e lweny kendo nyithindgi nochwad piny mi ried iye mondgi mayach hosea ohomb joisrael mondo odog ir nyasaye duoguru ir ruoth nyasachu un joisrael richou osemiyo uchwanyoru mi upodho duoguru ir ruoth nyasaye kendo kar kelone chiwo lameuru kama wenwa richowa duto kendo yie lemowa mi wanapaki kaka wasesingore joasuria ok nyal resowa bende ok wanadwar geche mag lweny mondo waidhi ok wanachak wawach ni gik mwaseloso gi lwetwa niya un e nyisechewa ruoth nyasaye ema itimo ngwono ni joma onge ngama konyogi ruoth nyasaye wacho niya abiro duogo joga ira kendo anahergi gi chunya duto nikech koro ok akecho kodgi abiro chalo ni joisrael kaka koth e piny motwo gibiro moyo ka maua kendo tiendegi biro kar ka yiend lebanon gibiro loth kendo gibiro bedo mabeyo ka yiend zeituni ginidum mamit mana ka yiend sida mag lebanon gibiro chako gidak e tipona mi ginya ka cham kendo ginyag mana ka yiend mzabibu gibiro bedo gi huma mana ka divai mar lebanon joisrael ok nochak olam nyiseche manono kata matin omiyo anawinj lemogi kendo naritgi anagenggi mana ka yath tipone ngich nimar ema amiyogi guethgi duto joma riek mondo owinj weche mondik ka kendo girwakgi e chunygi yore mag ruoth nyasaye oriere tir kendo joma kare luwogi joricho chwanyore kendo podho nikech ok giluwgi joel bonyo oketho piny israel e wach ruoth nyasaye mane omiyo joel wuod pethuel winjuru un joma dongo kaachiel gi ji duto modak e piny juda bende gima kama osetimore e ndalou kata e ndalo kwereu nyisuru nyithindu wachni gin bende ginyis nyithindgi kendo nyithindgigo onyis tieng maluwogi bonyo madongo nochamo oboke bange rumbi mar bonyo pod tindo nochamo oboke mane odong auru malo mondo uywagi un jomergi ywaguru un jomadh divai nikech mzabibu milosogo divai mamit osekethi fweny oganda bonyo maduong osemonjo pinywa gin gi teko mathoth kendo gikadho akwana lekegi bitho mana ka leke sibuor giseketho yiendwa mag mzabibu kendo giselwaro ngopewa gisechamo opoko chuth mi bede odong ka rachere ywaguru mana ka nyako maywago ngat nyocha dwaro kende onge mogo kata gima imadho inyalo chiwo e hekalu mar ruoth nyasaye mondo otimgo misango mar cham kata misango miolo piny mano emomiyo jodolo matimo misengni ni ruoth nyasaye ywak puothe ni nono kendo piny ywak nimar cham okethore kendo yiend mzabibu gi yiend zeituni otwo ywaguru un jopur nikech ngano gi shairi kod cham duto okethore un joma rito puothe mzabibu ywaguru nikech yiend mzabibu kod yiend ngowo osener yien duto osetwo adier komamanga gi othidhe kod yiend olemo mamoko osetwo kendo mor mar ji bende oserumo un jodolo matimo misengni e kendomarmisango rwakuru pien gugru mondo uywagi ee un jotich nyasachwa donjuru e hekalu kendo ninduru kanyo e piende gugru otieno duto nikech onge mogo kata divai e od nyasachu unyalo timogo misango mar cham kata misango miolo piny gouru milome mondo ji ori kech kendo luonguru chokruok mar lemo un jodongo chokuru jojuda duto e od ruoth nyasaye mondo oywagne isa chieng ruoth nyasaye chiegni chieng ngama nyalo gik moko duto keloe masira malich chiengno nobed marach manade cham kethore mana kwaneno mor onge e od nyasachwa kodhi top e lowo motwo onge cham minyalo kano omiyo dere man nono kethore dhok chur manade kendo ngeng angenga nikech lek ongenigi rombe bende kech nego aywakni ruoth nyasaye nikech legewa gi yiendwa otwo pep mana ka gima mach owango kata mana le bende ywakni nikech aore duto oseduono kendo lege otwo mana ka gima mach owango joel gouru tung kendo gouru uwi e sayun got maler mar nyasaye jojuda duto mondo okirni nikech chieng ruoth nyasaye biro machiegni enobed chieng mudho machil chieng mudho mandiwa kendo motimo rumbi rumbi maduong mar bonyo imo gode kendo obiro mangeny mana ka oganda jolweny marateke gima chal kodgi pok obetie bende ok nobedie gichamo oboke mana ka gima mach owango piny pok gichopoe ber ka puoth eden ka giseaye odong motwo tarara onge gima giweyo mak gichamo fweny kirangogi gichalo farese kendo giringo ka farese mag lweny kiwinjogi ka gichikore ewi gode gichalo ka geche maringo kata ka lum motwo mach wango ochangi mana ka oganda lweny maduong moriedo ni lweny ka gibiro ngato ka ngato kirni kendo wenge ji lokore mamarmar gimonjo mier ka jolweny kendo giidho ohinga ka askeche gisiko ka gidhi mana nyime tir ok gibar kamoro bende moro ok tuomre gi wadgi gimwomo gik digenggi mak gichung gimwomo dala lweny kendo gikalo ohinga piyopiyo giidho kor udi mi gidonjo gie dirisni ka jokuo fweny piny yiengni e nyimgi polo bende tetni wang chieng gi due oimore sulue bende ok rieny fweny ruoth nyasaye ruto e nyim ogandane mar lwenyno joge mag lweny ngeny kendo rateke ndalo ruoth nyasaye lich manade ere ngama nyalo siro chiengno ngwono mar ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye owacho niya kata mana sani lokreuru gi chunyu duto mondo uduog ira kuriyo kech kendo kuywak kendo kukuyo chunyu mondo otur eka onyis ni uywagoru kik uyiech ayiecha lepu duoguru ir ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nikech ongwon kendo okecho ji iye ok wang piyo kendo onyiso herane mosiko bende chunye lor kuom kelo ni ji masira dipo ka ruoth nyasaye nyasachu biro loko parone mi oguedhu gi cham mogundho eka unubed gi mogo kod divai unyalo timonego misengni miolo piny gouru tung e got sayun gouru milome mondo ji ori kech kendo luonguru chokruok mar lemo chokuru ji kanyakla mondo giikre ni chokruok maler luonguru joma dongo kendo chokuru nyithindo koda ka pod dhoth kata mana joma nyocha okendo machiegni nyaka e utgi mi bi jodolo tiyo ni ruoth nyasaye ei hekalu nyaka ywagi kochung e kind dhorangach gi kendomarmisango giywak kama ruoth nyasaye kech jogi mwanduni kik iwe ogendini mamoko jarwa mi nyierwa ka giwacho niya nyasachu ni kanye bange ruoth nyasaye nonyiso ni ohero pinye ahinya kendo nokecho joge nowinjo ywakgi modwokogi niya koro abiro miyou cham gi mzabibu kod mo mi unuyieng onge ogendini mamoko nochak ojaru kendo abiro riembo wasiku mane oa nyandwat mi ater e thim motwo moko motelo nariemb mi tho e nam kado man chien notho e nam mediterenia gibiro tow mi githing ji abiro timo kamano nikech gik madongo gisetimo kuom mano lowo kik ibed maluor bed gi mor kendo gi ilo nikech ruoth nyasaye osetimoni gik madongo un le bende kik ubed maluor nikech lege loth kendo yien nyago olemo ee yiend ngowo kod mzabibu nyago olemo mangeny beduru mamor un josayun beduru mail kuom gima ruoth nyasaye nyasachu osetimonu omiyou koth maber moromo cham adier omiyou kodh chwiri gi kodh opon kaka chon cham biro pongo dere kendo divai manyien gi mo biro pongo kuonde keno ema naoronu bonyogo kaka ogandana mar lweny abiro dwokonu gik mane olalnu e higni mane gichamoe puotheu koro ubiro bedo gi chiemo mathoth mucham nyaka uyieng mi unupak ruoth nyasaye nyasachu mosetimonu gik miwuoro bende joga ok nochak ojar kendo bange ununge ni e dieru un joisrael kendo ni ruoth nyasaye e nyasachu maonge moro kendo bende joga ok nochak ojar kendo nyasaye biro olo roho mare kuom ji duto bange naol roho mara kuom ji duto yawuotu gi nyiu nokor wach bende jou madongo nolek lek kendo jou matindo none fweny e ndalogo ema naorie roho mara kata mana kuom jotich machwo gi mamon anatim honni e polo kendo e piny mondo obed ranyisi remo gi mach kod iro madhuolore nobedie math mar luka fweny wangchieng nolokre mudho kendo due nolokre makwar ka remo ka pok chieng maduong miwuoro mar ruoth nyasaye ochopo joote rumi chakre kanyo ngato ka ngato moluongo nying ruoth nyasaye noresi jomoko modak e got sayun notony kuno ee jomoko notony jerusalem mana kaka ruoth nyasaye osewacho joma ruoth nyasaye oluongo nobed mangima joel ruoth nyasaye biro ngado bura ni ogendini ruoth nyasaye owacho niya e ndalono nadwok mwandu jojuda gi mwandu jojerusalem mane olalnigi kendo anachok ogendini duto mi ater e holo jehoshafat tiende ni holo ruoth nyasaye ngadoe bura kanyo ema nangadie buchgi kuom gik gisetimo ni joga israel nikech gisekeyo joga awuon e pinje mamoko mi gipogo pinya e kindgi giwegi ne gigoyo ombulu mondo gipoggo joga kendo ne giuso yawuowi gi nyiri obed wasumbni mondo pesa giyudo gichodgo kendo gimadhgo kongo isa ezek amos zek math luka isa jer ezek amos zef zek un joturo gi josidon kod jofilistia duto ango mutimonani udwaro chulona kuor koso ka kamano kuor mudwaro chulono abiro dwoko e wiu uwegi ka diemo wang usekawo fetha gi dhahapa kendo utero giga nengogi tek kuondeu mag lemo bende usekawo jojuda gi jojerusalem mutero mabor gi pinygi kendo ungiewogi gi joyunani koro adhi gologi kuonde usengiewogie kendo abiro timonu mana kaka natimonigi abiro miyo jojuda ngiewo yawuotu gi nyiu kendo giniusgi ni josabea modak kuma bor ahinya ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano nyis ogendini niya ikreuru ni lweny kendo chokuru jokedo ee luonguru jolweny duto mondo obi isa mika thedhuru kweu obed ligengni kendo thedhuru rabeti mau obed tonge kendo ngama ngoro nyaka nyis ni en thwon returu ubi un ogendini mokiewo mondo uchokru e holo ruoth nyasaye mi jolwenji marateke olor kuno ogendini nyaka ikre mondo obi e holo ruoth nyasaye ngadoe bura nimar kanyo ema ruoth nyasaye abiro betie ka ayalo ogendini duto moa koni gi koni fweny fweny gin gi richo mangeny omiyo betgiuru duto ka cham mibeto chieng keyo nyongiuru ka mzabibu minyono kar bicho mzabibu opongo kendo divai oko ji gana gi gana nie holo mar ngado bura kanyo ema chieng ruoth nyasaye chiegni chopoe wang chieng gi due olokore mudho kendo sulue bende ok rieny ore jojuda amos dwond ruoth nyasaye mor gi ewi got sayun ee omor jerusalem kendo polo gi piny yiengni ruoth nyasaye nores joge israel kobedonigi kama ginyalo gengoree bange un joisrael ununge ni ruoth nyasaye nyasachu adak sayun goda maler kendo jopinje mamoko ok nonyone kendo kindeno yiend mzabibu manyak ahinya nopong gode kendo jamni mathoth noyud e got ka got soko nomol kawuok e hekalu mar ruoth nyasaye mi nomi holo shitim bedo mangich piny misri biro lokore thim kendo piny edom nolokre thim modong nono nikech jopinjego nomonjo piny juda mochuero remb joma onge gi ketho abiro chulo kuor ni jonekgo kendo joketho ok nawe mak akumo ji nodag e piny juda gi jerusalem nyaka chieng kendo ruoth nyasaye nodag e got sayun amos bura mibiro ngado ni ogendini okiewo gi joisrael ruo wnda ruo magi e weche amos mane achiel kuom jokwath nodak tekoa nyasaye nofwenyone wechegi higni ariyo ka pok yiengni piny obetie ka uzia e ruodh juda jeroboam wuod joash e ruodh israel joel nowacho niya ruoth nyasaye ruto sayun ee dwonde mor jerusalem kuom mano lege jamni two kendo wi got karmel mangich ner isa jer zek ruoth nyasaye nowacho niya jodamaski osetimo richo mangeny omiyo abiro kumogi mak orem nikech gisesando jogilead gi sand malit ka giywayo kuomgi bepe mogurie musmande mabitho midinogo cham kuom mano abiro oro mach e dhoo hazael piny aram kendo majno biro wango miech ruodh benhadad mochiel motegno abiro turo lodi mag dhoranga damaski mi ariemb jodong holo aven kod betheden joaram ibi dar mi ter mabor e tuech e piny kir isa jer ezek joel zef zek ruoth nyasaye owacho niya jogaza osetimo richo mangeny omiyo abiro kumogi mak orem nikech ne gikawo oganda ngima mi giketo e lwet joedom kuom mano abiro oro mach e ohinga mar gaza mondo owang kuonde mochiel motegno mag dalano kendo abiro riembo jodong mier mag ashdod gi ashkelon anakum dala mar ekron kendo jofilistia duto modong notho mano e wach ruoth nyasaye isa ezek joel zek math luka ruoth nyasaye owacho niya joturo osetimo richo mangeny omiyo abiro kumogi mak orem nikech ne gidaro oganda moro mi gitero e piny edom e tuech ka ok girito winjruok mar osiep mane gitimo kodgi kuom mano abiro oro mach e ohinga mar turo mondo owang kuonde mochiel motegno mag dalano isa jer ezek obad mal ruoth nyasaye owacho niya joedom osetimo richo mangeny omiyo abiro kumogi mak orem nikech ne gimonjo jowetegi joisrael mi ginego malit kendo ne ok gigengo mirimbgi ne gisiko ka gimako kodgi sadha marach kuom mano abiro oro mach teman mondo owang kuonde mochiel motegno mag bozra jer ezek zef ruoth nyasaye owacho niya joamon osetimo richo mangeny omiyo abiro kumogi mak orem nikech wuoch lowo nomakogi mi giriedo iye mon mayach e piny gilead kuom mano abiro moko mach e ohinga mar raba mondo owang kuonde mochiel motegno mag dalano ji nogo mahu chieng kedo kendo lweny nobed maliet ka mach ruodhgi ibiro daro mi ter e tuech kaachiel gi jodonge amos isa jer ezek zef ruoth nyasaye owacho niya jomoab osetimo richo mangeny omiyo abiro kumogi mak orem nikech ne giwango choke ruodh edom mi giloko buru kuom mano abiro oro mach e piny moab mondo owang kuonde mochiel motegno mag kerioth jomoab biro tho e chuny mahu mar lweny ka jolweny giyo sigich lweny kendo tung ywak abiro nego ruodh moab kaachiel gi jotend pinyno duto mano e wach ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye owacho niya jojuda osetimo richo mangeny omiyo abiro kumogi mak orem nikech gisechayo puonjna kendo gisedagi rito chikena nyiseche manono mane kweregi lamo osemiyo gibaro mi giweya kuom mano abiro oro mach e piny juda mondo owang kuonde mochiel motegno mag jerusalem bura mibiro ngado ni joisrael ruoth nyasaye owacho niya un joisrael usetimo richo mangeny omiyo abiro kumou mak orem nimar ungiewo joma onge gi ketho nikech pok gichulo gopegi joma odhier ok nyal chulo kata mana nengo patpat bende ungiewo ka wasumbni unyono jochan piny kendo udhiro joma odhier oko e yo wuowi gi wuon mare dhi ir dhako achiel jachode mar hekalu ka gidwanyogo nyinga maler kuonde duto ji lamoe ginindo e lewni mosingnigi kuom gope divai ukawo kuom joma ugoyo faini umadho e hekalu mar nyasachu tchik koro eka un ema numiyo atieko joamor raboche ka yiend sida kendo matek ka yiend ober ne atiekogi pep ruoth nyasaye nochako owacho niya ema nagolou e piny misri mi atelonu e thim kuom higni piero angwen kendo namiyou piny joamor mondo obed maru kwan ne aketo yawuotu moko mondo obed jonabi moko naketo obed jonazir donge awacho adier joisrael ne umiyo jonazir omadho divai bende nuchiko jonabi ni kik hul wachna koro abiro diyou piny kama untie mana kaka gari mopong gi cham sikore e lowo jonguech matek ok notony kendo joma rateke nobed mool bende kata mana jolweny mager ok nores ngimagi joasere noringi kendo jongwech matek ok noresre bende joma oidho farese ok notony kata mana jolweny mathuondi moloyo noring duge chiengno amos tich jonabi ruoth nyasaye owacho niya un joisrael winjuru gima awacho kuomu ne agolo dhoutu duto e piny misri kendo un ema asengeyou kendo ritou kuom ogendini duto manie piny kuom mano abiro kumou kuom richou duto uparo ni ji ariyo nyalo chako wuoth kaachiel ka pok giwinjore koso sibuor beende ruto e bungu ka onge gima osemako kata nyathi sibuor nyalo ngur e gono adier ka onge gima ochamo bende winyo nyalo moko e obadho ka ok oketne kudni koso obadho nyalo meko ka onge gima otuge bende tung mar lweny nyalo ywak e dala mak omiyo ji luoro koso gimoro nyalo timore e dala ka ok ruoth nyasaye ema okelo adier onge gima ruoth nyasaye timo ka ok onyiso jotichne jonabi ere ngama ok diluor ka sibuor ruto koso ere janabi diling mak ohulo gima ruoth nyasaye owachone masira biro mako samaria gouru milome e ut ruodhi mag ashdod gi mag misri kuwacho niya chokreuru kanyakla e gode moluoro samaria mondo uneye timbe pogruok matimore e dalano kendo kaka ithiro ji kuno ruoth nyasaye owacho kama jogo ok ongeyo kaka digibed joma obidhore gipongo utgi madongo gi gik moyaki kuom mano wasigu nolwor pinygi kendo noketh kuondegi mochiel motegno kod utgi madongodongo ruoth nyasaye owacho niya kaka jakwath reso lemo ariyo kata rombo ondiek osechamo e kaka nyasaye nores mana joisrael manok modak samaria koro chikuru itu mondo usiem nyikwa jakobo ni ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto wacho kama ruo chieng nakum joisrael kuom richogi naketh kende mag liswa man bethel bende tunge mag kendogo nongad oko mi ginipodh piny anamuk udi midakie ndalo chwiri kod mago midakie ndalo oro udi olich igi gi lak liech nodong gundni kendo ot ka ot maduong nokethi amos winjuru un mond samaria machwe ka dhok makwayo e lege momew uthago joma onge teko kendo usando joma odhier bende ngato ka ngato kuomu rungo chwore ka wacho niya kelna gima anyalo madho kaka ruoth nyasaye en ngama ler osesingore ni ndalo biro wasiku noywaue gi olowu kendo ngato ka ngato kuomu nochal mana gi rech olowu omako ginigolu e dala ka giluwo kama ohinga omukoree mi giniwitu oko joisrael ok opuonjore kuom kum nyasaye omiyogi ruoth nyasaye owacho niya un joisrael kara dhiuru bethel mondo utim atima richo e hekalu kendo dhiuru gilgal mondo utim richo kuno gi tekreu duto keluru jamni mondo utimgo misengni okinyi kokinyi kendo keluru chiwo mar achiel kuom apar chieng mar adek ka chieng mar adek chiwuru makati ok ketie thowi ka misango mar erokamano kendo landuru wach kusungoru kuom misengni muchiwo kuom herou nimar gima kamano ema bernu ka utimo ruoth nyasaye owacho niya ema nakelo kech e miechu duto mi ubedo onge gi chiemo kata kamano ne ok uduogo ira ne atamo koth chuenu e ndalo monego ochuee ne amiyo koth ochue e mier moko puothe mane ok ochuee nowang ji ne e mier moko kendo wuotho kool kadhi e dala moro dwaro pi ne ok giyud moromogi kata kamano ne ok uduogo ira naoro dera morocho chambu ewi dongo bonyo nochamo chambu gi yiendu mag mzabibu gi ngowo kod zeituni kata kamano ne ok uduogo ira ne akelonu yamo marach mar tho machal gi mano mane akelo ni jomisri bende namiyo yawuotu mangeny otho e lweny kendo amayou fareseu ne amiyo mifuond jomotho e kambeu othingou kata kamano ne ok uduogo ira chak ne atieko jomoko kuomu kaka ne atieko sodom gi gomora kendo ne uchalo gi luth moyudh e mach kata kamano ne ok uduogo ira kuom mano un joisrael abiro timonu mana gik kamago nikech abiro timonu kamano omiyo nyaka uikru ni romo ni nyasachu nyasaye ema noloso gode kendo ochueyo yamo onyiso dhano parone bende oloko ler mar odiechieng bedo mudho en e ruodh piny duto kendo nyinge en ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto amos oluong joisrael mondo olokre chikuru itu un joisrael mondo uwinj wend ywak achuogonu oganda israel osepodho ok nochak oa malo opodho piny auma e lope owuon kendo onge ngama ochunge ruoth nyasaye owacho niya dala israel mane jolweny owuokie alufu achiel biro duogoe mana ji mia kende mano mane owuokie ji mia achiel biro duogo mana ji apar ruoth nyasaye wacho ni joisrael niya kudwaro bedo mangima duoguru ira kik udhi bethel kata kik udhi gilgal bende kik ukadh nyaka beersheba nimar jogilgal ibiro daro mi ter e tuech kendo bethel biro lal nono ka udwaro bet mangima dwaruru ruoth nyasaye nono obiro muoch kuom joka josef ka mach en mach mabiro wango joisrael maonge ngama nego ayub ruoth nyasaye ema nochueyo yugni gi ratego kendo en ema omiyo piny ru kendo yuso oluongo pi nam mondo obi kendo oologi e piny en ema omiyo sulue wuok kendo podho kaluwore chakre oluoro budho nyaka ratego mano wach manade kuom un loko bura makare ataro kendo tuono ji gik monego giyudi un umon gi ngama odonjo ni jaketho kendo uchayo ngat mawacho adiera usethiro joma odhier kendo usekawo chambgi moko kaka osuru kuom mano ok unudag e udi mabeyo mag kite musegero bende ok unumadh divai kuom mzabibu mabeyo musepidho nimar angeyo kaka kethou ngeny kendo angeyo kaka richou okadho akwana un usando joma onge gi ketho kendo uchamo asoya bende utamo joma odhier yudo bura makare emomiyo ngat mariek ling alinga nikech piny rach dwaruru ber kik udwar rach mondo ubed mangima kendo ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto obed jakoru adier kaka uparono beduru mamon gi gik maricho heruru gik mabeyo kendo gururu bura makare e ut bura nikech dipo ka ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto otimo ngwono ni joka josef modong kuom mano ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto wacho kama ywak biro bet e yore duto mag dala kendo kuonde duto ji nobed kaywakie kata mana jopur noluong mondo oywagi kaachiel gi joma ongeyo wende ywak ywak nobed e puothe duto mag mzabibu nimar anabi mondo akumu un joma ofuwo dwaro mondo chieng ruoth nyasaye obi uparo ni chiengno nokelnu ango ok nobed chieng ler nobed mana chieng mudho unuchal mana gi ngat sibuor riembo romo gi ondiek kata machal gi ngat modonjo e ot kendo oyiengo lwete e kor ot mi thuol okayo chieng ruoth nyasaye en mana mudho mandiwa adier en chieng molil maonge ler isa amon gi sewni mutimona kendo ajarogi bende ok ahero nyasi mau mag lemo ka utimona misengni miwango pep kod misengni mag cham ok nayiego bende ok narang jambu mutimogo misengni mag sawo weuru baro wiya gi wendeu mag pak nikech ok adwar winjo thumbe mugoyona weuru bura makare omol ka pi kendo tim makare bende omol ka aora ok duon joote apenjou un joisrael bende nutimona misengni kendo ukelona chiwo kuom higni piero angwen mane utieko e thimgo duto koro nyaka uting nyisecheu manono mag sulue sakuth gi kaiwan mane uloso kendo abiro darou mi ateru e tuech e piny man loka machielo mar damaski ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto owacho kamano amos oketh israel mano biro bedo wach marach manade kuom joma odak maber sayun kendo kuom joma ogeno ni gode mag samaria nyalo resogi un joma dongo mag oganda maduong moloyo joma joisrael dhi irgi mondo oyud konyruok dhiuru uneye kalne mi uchwe nyaka hamath eka ulor udhi gath e piny jofilistia uparo ni uber moloyo jopinjego koso pinyu duong moloyo pinjegi un joma ok odewo ni chieng bura biro urikni mana kutimo timbe mahundu un unindo e kitendni molos gi lak liech kendo utaroru e kombe madongo kuchamo nyirombe mugolo kuom jambu kod nyiruedhi machue mopidh maber un muchuogo wende manono kugoyo thum kendo uloso thumbe kaka ne daudi loso umodho divai gi ndope kendo uwiroru gi modhi nengogi tek ok litnu ka joka josef rumo kuom mano ubiro bedo joma ikwongo daro kitero e tuech mano biro bedo giko mar mor mudhialorugono ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto osesingore owuon niya asin gi sunga mar joka jakobo kendo asin gi utgi madongo dongo abiro chiwo samaria dalagi kod gik moko duto man e iye e lwet wasigu ka ji apar odong e ot achiel ginitho giduto kendo ka wat ngat achiel kuom joma othogo obiro mondo ogol ringre wadgi owang nopenj niya pod nitie ngato modong koso dwoko nobed ni ongee ling nimar nying ruoth nyasaye ok nyal hul ruoth nyasaye biro golo chik mi udi madongo nomuki mi lokre pidhe matindo noteng matindo tindo farese bende nyalo ringo e kite koso dhok nyalo puro nam un uloko bura makare mana gima kech kendo tim maber uloko mana gima rach umor kuom loyo dala maonge ndhathe bende usungoru ni un gi teko moloyo kawo karnaim un joisrael abiro kelo oganda moro mondo omonju kendo ginisandu chakre kama idonjogo hamath man yo nyandwat nyaka holo man yo araba yo milambo ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ema awacho kamano amos fweny adek ruoth nyasaye nokona e fweny mi anenoe rumbi mar bonyo monywol e ndalo cham chiegni chiekie e fwenyno naneno ka bonyogo osetieko chamo gimoro amora mangich e piny eka ne awacho niya ruoth nyasaye ngwonni jogi joka jakobo ere kaka ginyalo resore ginok kamano mi chuny ruoth nyasaye nolendo mowacho niya ee ayie gima kamano ok notimre ruoth nyasaye nochako okelona fweny machielo mi aneno ka ooro mach mondo owang nam maduong manie bwo piny kendo mondo otiek gik moko duto manie piny eka naywak niya ruoth nyasaye akwayi ni timo kamano ere kaka joisrael nyalo resore ginok kamano mi chuny ruoth nyasaye nochako olendo mowacho niya mano bende ok bi timore ruoth nyasaye nokelona fweny moro machielo mi anenoe ngato mochung e kor ot kotingo tol mar rapim mipimogo kor ot mondo one ane koriere tir eka ruoth nyasaye nopenja niya amos ango minenono ne adwoke niya aneno tol mar rapim ruoth nyasaye nowacho niya apimo chuny joga israel gi rapim mana kaka ngama pimo kor ot kendo ok nachak awenigi ngang kuonde joka isaka lemoe ibiro kethi kendo kuonde maler duto mag israel biro kethore bende abiro biro mondo aked gi dhood jeroboam amos gi amazia amazia jadolo man bethel nonyiso jeroboam ruodh israel niya amos piem kodi e israel kendo wechene biro ketho piny owacho niya jeroboam biro tho e lweny kendo joisrael ibiro daro e pinygi mi tere e tuech amos owuon ne amazia okwero niya dhi kucha jakorni dhiyo e piny juda mondo ikor wach kuno iyudgo chiembi kik ichak ikor wach bethel ka nikech en hekalu mar pinywa kama ruoth lemoe amos nodwoko amazia niya ok janabi bende mano ok tija mana jakwath kendo jarit yiend ngowo ruoth nyasaye ema nokawa ka akwayo rombe mi owachona niya dhiyo mondo ikor wach ni joga israel kuom mano koro winj wach ruoth nyasaye ikwera ni awe koro wach kuom joisrael kendo ni awe wacho weche manono kuom joka isaka ruoth nyasaye wachoni kama chiegi biro doko jachode e dala samaria kendo yawuoti gi nyigi noneg e lweny lopi nopog gipimo gi rapim iwuon initho e piny moro nono kendo joisrael nodar mi ter e tuech amos fweny mar angwen atonga motingo olemo ruoth nyasaye nokelona fweny machielo mi anenoe atonga motingo olemo ruoth nyasaye nopenja niya amos ineno ango ne adwoke ni aneno atonga motingo olemo mochiek eka ne ruoth nyasaye owachona niya joga israel bende ochiek ni yudo kum kendo ok nachak awegi mak akumogi chiengno wende iwero e od ruoth nolokre mag ywak kendo ringre jomotho nopie kuonde duto piny noling thi okor ni kethruok israel chiegni winjuru un joma nyono jochan kendo temo manyo joma odhier uwacho kendu uwegi niya mad ndalo mag lemo mar due manyien rum piyo mondo waus cham bende upenjoru niya ndalo mag sabato biro rumo karango mondo wagol chambwa warundi eka wanyalo keto nengo mamalo kendo tiyo gi rapim ok ni kare mondo wawuondgo jongiewo wabiro uso cham maricho e nengo maber bange wanyalo ngiewo joma odhier mondo obed wasumbni mana kuom nengo moromo patpat joruoth nyasaye nyasach joka jakobo osekuongore ni wiye ok nowil gi timbegi maricho kuom mano piny biro yiengni kendo ji duto modakie noywagi piny duto biro tetni bende obiro tingore mi opie mana ka aora nael manie piny misri ruoth nyasaye wacho niya chiengno nami chieng podhi odiechieng tir mi piny lokre mudho ka chieng rieny ha anami sewni mau lokre ywak mar tho kendo wendeu mag mor nolokre dengo anami urwak pien gugru uduto kendo uliel wiu unuchal joma ywago wuodgi miderma kendo chiengno nobed malit adier ruoth nyasaye wacho niya ndalo biro anakelie kech e piny ok kech mar chiemo kata riyo mar pi mana riyo mar winjo wach ruoth nyasaye ji nowuoth kadawo chakre nyandwat nyaka milambo ginidigni chakre yo wuokchieng nyaka yo podho chieng ka gimanyo wach ruoth nyasaye ok giniyudi chiengno nyiri jobeyo kod yawuowi bende nopodh piny nikech riyo ji duto makuongore gi nying ashima nyasaye madhako mar samaria kata makuongore gi nyasach dan kendo gi nyasach beersheba nopodh chuth kendo ok nochak oa malo amos buch ruoth nyasaye ne aneno ruoth nyasaye kochung e bath kendo mar misango kowacho niya tuom sirni mag hekalu mondo agola duto oyiengni mukgi mondo gilwar ewi ji ji duto modong anami otho e lweny onge ngat noringi kata notony kata ka gikunyo bur mi gichopo nyaka kar joma otho abiro gologi mana kuno kata ka giidho nyaka e polo abiro lorogi piny ka gipondo ewi got karmel nadwargi nyaka amakgi ka gipondona e bwo pi matut anachik thuol mondo okagi kuro ka wasikgi omakogi ka terogi e tuech anachik mondo oneggi kuno aramo ni ok natimnigi maber nyaka atimnigi marach ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto mulo piny mi piny leny kendo ji duto modakie ywak piny duto tingore malo kendo pie mana ka aora nael ruoth nyasaye gero ute e polo kendo orenjo polo kuom piny oluongo pi nam mondo obi kendo oologi e piny ruoth nyasaye e nyinge ruoth nyasaye wacho niya un joisrael gima atimonu chalo mana gi gima atimo ni joethiopia bende nagolo jofilistia e piny kaftor kendo nagolo joaram e piny kir mana kaka un bende nagolou e piny misri arango piny joisrael motimo richoni kendo abiro tieke e wang piny kata kamano ok anatiek joka jakobo duto te anagol chik mi anapiedh joisrael e kind ogendini duto ka cham mipiedho e odheru kendo kata wang cham achiel ok nolwar piny joga duto joketho ibiro negi e lweny kata mana mago duto mawacho niya nyasaye ok nowe masira chop kuomwa gueth mibiro guedhogo israel joote chiengno anachung e dhood daudi mosebet ka ot molokore gunda analos kuonde momukore mondo oduog maber abiro gere kendo mi alose machal gi kaka nochal chon bange joisrael nolo joedom modong kaachiel gi ogendini mamoko duto chon yande meka ruoth nyasaye mabiro miyo gima kamano timore owacho kamano ruoth nyasaye wacho niya ndalo biro cham nobed mangeny mi nogol pur ka ji pod keyo kendo mzabibu nonyag mathoth mi nochak oket kodhi ka ji pod loso divai yiend mzabibu mangeny mabeyo nonyag mathoth e gode duto mi unubed gi divai mangeny abiro chako amiyo joga israel dag e ngima maber gibiro gero miechgi mane olokore gundni mi gidagie kendo gibiro pidho yiend mzabibu mi gimadh divai gibiro puro puothegi mi gicham gik manyakie abiro pidhogi e lopgi mane amiyogi kendo ok nochak opudhgi obadia joedom obolore magi e weche mane ruoth nyasaye owacho ni obadia e fweny kuom joedom ruoth nyasaye oseoro jaotene ir ogendini kowacho niya biuru mondo wadhi waked gi joedom kendo wasewinjo wachne ruoth nyasaye owacho ni joedom niya abiro miyo udokoe matinie moloyo e kind ogendini duto mi ji duto biro jarou sunga ungo osewuondou udak e mbita mar lwanda motegno kendo dalau ni ewi gode malo mano emomiyo uwacho kendu uwegi niya ere ngama didwokwa piny kata bed ni ugero dalau midimidi malo ka od ongo mi uchal mana gi joma odak e kind sulwe kamano abiro dwokou piny ruoth nuasaye omedo wacho niya ka jokuo obiro gotieno gikawo mana gik gidwaro kendo ka ji pono mzabibu pile giweyo moko un wasiku oseyweyou oko gi yuech yaye joka esau giseyudo mwanduu kata mana mago mupando mi giyako ogendini mane uriworugo osewuondou mi giseriembou ua e pinyu joma ne ubetgo gi kue koro oseloyou kendo osiepeu mane uchiemogo osechikonu obadho ka giwacho kuomu niya riekogi cha duto koro olal kanye ruoth nyasaye owacho niya chieng nakum piny edom anatiek jogi mariek mi onge rieko nodong e piny gode mag esau jolweny mag teman biro bwok mi noneggi maonge kata achiel modong e piny gode mag esau notieku kendo nochau nyaka chieng nikech ne unego oweteu joka jakobo muyakogi chieng mane wasikgi moa e pinje mamoko omuko dhorangeyegi ne uchung achunga ne uricho mana ka wasigu mane oyako mwandu jerusalem mi opogo e kindgi giwegi gi ombulu ne ok onego ubed mamor gi masira mane oweteu jojuda oyudo bende ne ok onego unyiergi chieng rumbgi ne ok onego usungru kuneno ka gin e chandruok chieng mane masira omako joga ne ok onego udonj e dalagi mondo unyiergi ka gin e thagruok kendo uyak mwandugi isa jer ezek amos mal ne ok onego uchung e akek yo mondo ugeng ni joma dwaro tony kendo chieng mane gin e chandruok ne ok onego uketgi e lwet wasikgi chieng ruoth nyasaye abiro ngadoe bura ni ogendini chiegni yaye joedom gik usetimo ema notimnu kendo timbeu maricho nodong mana e wiu uwegi joga oseyudo kum malit ewi goda maler omiyo ogendini molworo joga biro yudo kum malit moloyo ibiro kumogi sidangg mi gilal nono joisrael olocho jomoko modak e got sayun biroo tony kuno mi kanyono nobed kama ler joka jakobo gi joka josef nochal mach mi ginitiek joka esau manaa kaka mach wango tiang mi tieki onge nyakwar esau moro nodong kangima ruoth nyasaye ema asewacho kamano joisrael modak yo milambo nokaw piny gode mag esau kendo joma odak e tiend gode mag juda biro kawo piny jofilistia joisrael nokaw piny efraim gi samaria jobenjamin nokaw piny gilead joisrael mamalo mane odar mi oter e tuech koro ni sefarad biro kawo mich piny man yo milambo joisrael biro dhi e got sayun mondo oresi mi god esau nobed e bwo lochgi ruoth nyasaye ema nobed ruoth jona jona oringo ruoth nyasaye ruo ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni jona wuod amitai niya wuogi idhi nineve dala maduong mondo isiem jodalano nikech richogi osechopo e nyima kane jona owinjo kamano nowuok mondo oring odhi tarshish oa e wang ruoth nyasaye nodhi jopa kuma noyudoe yie madhi tarshish nochulo nengo mar wuoth mi oidho yie mondo odhi tarshish kuma bor gi ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye nomiyo yamo okudho matek e nam mi ahiti mager ne dwaro ketho yie kibaji nogoyo jokwang mi ngato ka ngato nolamo nyasache gik mane gin go e yie ne giwito e nam mondo yie odong mayot sechego noyudo jona oselor e yie piny kendo oriere kuno ka nindo ogoye ngoga jatend yie nopo konwango jona kanyo mopenje niya ango momiyo inindo aninda chungi mondo iywag ni nyasachi dipo ka owinjo moresowa jokwang nowacho e kindgi giwegi niya biuru wago ombulu mondo wangego ni ngano mokelonwa hawi marachni kamano ne gigoyo ombulu mi ombulu nolwar mana kuom jona eka ne gipenje niya ango mitimo ka nyiswa kuma iaye ija kanye nodwokogi niya jahibrania kendo alamo ruoth nyasaye nyasach polo mane ochueyo nam gi piny kane giwinjo kamano ne gidoko maluor ahinya mi giwacho niya mano kaka isetimo gima rach ne giwacho kamano nimar ne gisengeyo ni jona ringo e wang ruoth nyasaye nikech noyudo osewachonigi koro nam ne medo tugore marach moloyo omiyo jokwang nopenjo jona niya watimni ango mondo nam okuenwa jona nodwokogi niya kawauru ubola e nam bange nam biro bedonu mokue nimar angeyo ni ahiti maduongni obironu mana nikech jogo nokiewo yie matek mondo gigow e dho nam ne ok ginyal nimar nam nomedo tugore gi ahiti motamogi mogik ne giywak ni ruoth nyasaye ka giwacho niya ruoth nyasaye yie kik iwe watho kuom nego ngatni kendo kik ikwanwa ka jonek kuom tho ngat ok oketho nimar gima osetimore en mana dwaroni kamano ne gikawo jona mi gibolo e nam eka nam nokue bang mano jokwang noluoro ruoth nyasaye ahinya mi ne gitimone misango kendo gikuongorene math ruoth nyasaye nosechano ni mondo rech mangongo omwony jona omiyo jona noriyo ei rechno ndalo adek odiechieng gotieno jona jona olemo ka goyo erokamano jona nolamo nyasaye gi ei rech kowacho niya ruoth nyasaye ne aywakni ka e masira mi nidwoka naywak ka e piny joma otho mondo ikonya mi niwinjo ywakna niluta e chuny nam mandiwa mi ataro nolwora koni gi koni apaka gi ahiti duto nokadho kuoma naparo ni oriemba e nyimi kendo ni ok nachak ane hekalu mari maler pi nolwora modwaro thunga nam matut noima chuth nadhi piny e tiend gode mi buya mag nam nogajore e wiya ruoth nyasaye nyasacha nanimo e piny moro dhorangeyene olor nyaka chieng kata kamano nigola e bur kangima kane chunya dwaro ne apari ruoth nyasaye kendo lemona nochoponi e hekalu mari maler joma lamo nyiseche manono nyalo weyo gik gigeno kuomgi natimni misango ka apaki gi wer anachul gima asingorani ruoth nyasaye ema reso ji eka ruoth nyasaye nochiko rechno mi ongogo jona e dhonam jona jonineve oweyo richogi ruoth nyasaye nochako owuoyo gi jona kendo kowachone niya wuogi idhi nineve dala maduong mondo isiem jodalano gi wach abiro miyi kamano jona nowuok modhi nineve kaka ruoth nyasaye nochike nineve ne en dala maduong gilala moromo wuodh ndalo adek kia tunge koni nyaka kocha math luka jona nodonjo e dala mowuotho kuom odiechieng achiel eka nogoyo milome kama bang ndalo piero angwen ibiro ketho nineve kane jonineve owinjo gima nyasaye nowacho ne giyiego ne gigoyo milome mondo ji otue chiemo kendo ne girwako piende gugru giduto joma dongo gi joma tindo machalre kane ruoth owinjo wachno noa malo e kome molonyo lepe mag ruoth kendo norwako pien gugru mi obet e buru ruoth gi jodonge nogoyo milome e nineve duto niya onge dhano kata chiayo nobil chiemo kata dhi e kwath kata mana modho pi nyaka girwakre gi pien gugru kendo giywag ni nyasaye gi tekregi duto ngato ka ngato mondo owe yorene maricho kaachiel gi timbene mag miero kamoro nyasaye dipo ka olokore moweyo mirimbe mi ok watho nyasaye noneno gima ne gitimo mokaka ne giweyo yoregi maricho omiyo nolokore mi ok okelo masira kuomgi kaka nosesiemogi jona mirimb jona gi ngwono mar nyasaye wachno nojogo jona ahinya mi iye owang wuok omiyo nowacho ni ruoth nyasaye niya ruoth nyasaye kane pod thurwa donge nawacho ni ibiro timo gima kama mano emomiyo ne atemo ringo mondo adhi tarshish nikech nangeyo ni nyasaye jangwono kendo makecho ji iyi ok wang piyo kendo inyiso hera mosiko bende chunyi lor kuom kelo ni ji masira ruo omiyo koro kaw ngimana ruoth nyasaye da ber katho moloyo bet mangima ruoth nyasaye nopenje niya bende iparo ni ber kikecho kamano jona nowuok modhi obet piny yo wuok chieng mar nineve nogero kiru kanyo mobetie koyueyo chieng korito gima ditimre ni dalano ruoth nyasaye nomiyo otangle otwi e wi tat kiruno mondo okel tipo dimi jona kue omiyo jona nobedo mamor ahinya gi otangleno kinyne kane piny oru nyasaye nomiyo kudni ochwowo otangleno mi otangle otwo kane chieng owuok nyasaye nokelo yamb ugue maliet mi chieng ochamo wi jona kendo nongno otere kuom mano nogombo mondo otho kowacho niya da ber katho moloyo bet mangima nyasaye nopenje niya iparo ni ber kikecho kuom tho otangle nodwoko niya ee ber ka akecho kata mana nyaka tho eka ruoth nyasaye nowachone niya ka inyalo kecho otangle mane otwi otieno achiel otho gi jojerusalem ruo wnda ruo wnda ruo wnda kitabuni ondikie weche mane ruoth nyasaye omiyo mika jamoresheth e fweny kuom samaria gi jerusalem e kinde loch jotham gi ahaz gi hezekia ruodhi mag juda luongo jojerusalem niya winjuru un joma ochokore e dalani mwandu muyudo e yor miganga ema opongo ut joma richo gipimo gik moko gi rapim ok ni kare ok adwar bende uparo ni anyalo weyo ni joma tiyo gi rapim ok ni karego richogi joma jomoko manie dalani mayo joma odhier gin jomriambo mosiko ka hango wach ahanga koro asechako goyou gi goch malit mondo atieku nikech richou kuom mano unuchiem ok unuyieng kendo kech pod nokau akaya ka ugolo gik moko e uteu mondo upandi ok unyal kapo ni ureso gimoro abiro miyo okethre e lweny ubiro chuoyo ok unuka cham kendo ubiro biyo zeituni mi uyud mo ok unukonyru gi morno bende unulos divai ok unumadhi ruo ruo useluwo timbe maricho mag ruodh omri gi mag dhood ahab kendo pok uweyogi omiyo abiro tiekou mi jou bed joma ichayo adier ogendini mamoko duto biro mana charou mika timbe maricho mag joisrael yaye koro achalo ngama kech kayo mobiro pono olemo oyudo ka yath odong nono onge olemo minyalo cham kata mana ngowo mamitna manyak atamalo ji moluoro nyasaye oserumo e piny israel kendo onge kata ngat achiel makare modong ji duto kichore ni chuero remo kendo ngato ka ngato chiko mana ni wadgi obadho gitimo timbe maricho gi chunygi duto jodongo kwayo gik moko mondo omigi kendo jongad bura chamo asoya bende jotelo golo chik mana kaka gin ema gihero kuom mano kata mana timbegi mabeyo kendo modimbore obam kendo chalo mana gi bunge motimo kuthe koro chieng nyasaye kumogie osechopo mana kaka jonabi mage ne osiemogi ni enotim omiyo koro kihondko omakogi kik iyie gi weche wadu kendo kik igen kuom osiepeni bende nyaka itang ni weche miwacho kata mana ni chiegi math luka e ndalogi yawuowi jaro wuonegi nyiri bende kwedo minegi kendo mond yawuowi kwedo weg utegi kamano wasik ngato gin mana joodgi ruoth nyasaye okelo ler gi warruok abiro manyo ruoth nyasaye abiro rito nyasaye jawarna kendo nyasacha biro winjo wachna yaye wasika kik ogona siboi nikech kata obedo ni asepodho abiro chung kendo kata obedo ni adak e mudho ruoth nyasaye nobedna ler aseketho e nyim ruoth nyasaye omiyo ayie mirimbe nyaka ochwaka mi ongadna bura maber kendo ogola oko e ler mi ane ni otimo gima kare kaka nosingore bange wasika mane penja ni ere nyasachi nogono none gima osetimore mi wigi nokuodi eka ananegi ka oselogi kendo onyongi piny ka chuodho e wang yo e ndalo gogo un jojerusalem unuchak uger ohingau kendo unuyar tong pinyu mi jou noduog iru koa kuonde duto ginia asuria yo wuok chieng kod misri yo milambo kendo ginia e dho nembe gi gode duto piny nokethre mi lokre thim nikech timbe maricho mag joma odakie ruoth nyasaye okecho joisrael ruoth nyasaye rit jogi miseyiero kaka jakwath kawo luth kendo kwayogo jambe gidak mana kendgi e thim ka piny momew olworogi koni gi koni mondo gikwa e lege mag bashan gi mag gilead kaka ne gitimo chon timnwa honni kaka nitimo e kinde mane iwuokie misri ogendini one honnigo mondo luoro omakgi kata obedo ni gitek kamano giniling thi kendo ok giniwinj gimoro gininang lowo mana ka thuol kendo giniwuog kuonde gipondoe mana ka gik malak piny giniduog ir ruoth nyasachwa ka giluor kendo ka gitetni ruoth nyasaye onge nyasaye moro maromo kodi iweyo ni jogi iwuon modong richogi kendo ok ikechi nyaka chieng iherowa gi hera mosiko inichak ikechwa kendo mi inyon richowa e tiendi kendo inyumgi e bwo nam initim gima kare kendo iniher joisrael nyikwa ibrahim gi hera mosiko mana kakane isingori ni kwerewa chon nahum mirimb ruoth nyasaye mochulogo kuor isa zef e fweny mane nyasaye omiyo nahum jaelkosh kuom dala mar nineve ruoth nyasaye en nyasaye janyiego kendo jachul kuor gi mirimbe mager okano mirima e chunye mondo ochulgo ni wasike kuor iye ok wang piyo en gi teko mathoth chutho ok onyal weyo joricho mak okumo en gi yore moluwo ei kalausi kendo ei ahiti bende boche polo e buru monyono kogolo chik nembe gi aore duono mi lokre lowo motwo lege mabeyo mag bashan gi karmel two kendo lumbe mangich man lebanon wang gode madongo gi matindo tetni e nyime kendo leny nono piny duto kod joma odakie bende tungni en nga manyalo chomo mirimb ruoth nyasaye tir koso ere ngama nyalo siro gero engo mirimbe oko mana ka aora mar mach kendo lwendni barore abara e nyime ruoth nyasaye ber en e kar konyruok mar adier ni joma dwaro mondo okonygi ka gin e thagruok bende ongeyo ji duto mogeno kuome kendo oresogi e ohula raywoyi joma opiem kode otieko chuth kendo oriembogi koterogi e mudho un joasuria ere gima omiyo upiem gi ruoth nyasaye obiro tiekou en owuon joma mon kode ok nohedhre piem kode kendo giduto giniwang pep mana ka kudho mochoki kata ka tiang motwo ngat machach ni kuomu machano gik maricho kuom ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye wacho niya kata obedo ni wasigu ngeny kendo rateke ibiro negogi mi girum chuth un jojuda kata obedo ni asandou ok anachak asandu kendo koro abiro chodo nyororo motueugo mi agolu e tich misumba ruodh asuria awachone kama asegolo chik mondo nyingi orum chuth yawuoti ok nobed ruodhi kari kendo abiro ketho nyisecheni manie hekalu mari mi ananegi nikech gima nono wach maber owinji ni nineve oselo isa neyeuru kaka jaote ringo kalor e gode kakelo wach maber mar kue owacho niya yaye un jojuda timuru sewni mau kendo chiwuru ni ruoth nyasaye gik mane usekuongoru ni unuchiw nimar joma richo ok nochak olou kendo nikech osetiekgi chuth nahum un joisrael nyikwa jakobo ruoth nyasaye biro dwokonu duong yande un go kata obedo ni joma monjou oseyakou mi okawo olemb mzabipu un jonineve oganda lweny mag wasiku ketho gik moko oselworou moketou diere ranguru yo kendo jiwreuru gi tekou duto jolwenjgi oserwakore gi nengni makwar kendo kuodigi kwar ka remo gechegi mag lweny oriedo kendo rieny mana ka wang chieng giringo ka gimwomore e alap mar dala ka moro ka moro tuomore gi wadgi gichalo gi meny ngangni kendo gimil e dir dala mana ka polo ruodh nineve kok ka golo chik ni jotende gichwanyore ka gireto kendo girikni mondo gidhi gichan jolwenjgi e ohinga dhorangeye mag aore molworo dala oseyawore kendo kibaji goyo joka ruoth chi ruoth ogol oko duk moter e tuech kendo jotichne duto manyiri ywak malit komako wigi nineve koro chalo gi yawo pige dwono nikech jolwenje duto ringo weye okoknigi kowacho ni chunguru onge ngama duogo mwandu mag fedha gi dhahabu oyaki kendo nenore ni gingeny ok rum gin mwandu mabeyoe moloyo chuny ngato nyalo gombo mago duto oyaki motieki onge gima odong kibaji goyo joge kendo chongegi tuomore ka gitetni kendo wengegi olokore makwar haa koro tinde ere dala mane ongere kaka gond sibuor kama thuondi ne nitie kendo kama mon gi nyithindo ne odakie ka onge gima giluoro nineve ne chalo gi sibuor nonego wasike mondo opidhgo nyithinde kod monde mi opongo dalane kod mieche mamoko gi mwandu moyaki kaachiel gi wasumbni okor wach ni nineve ibiro kethi ruoth nyasaye wacho niya asedoko mamon kodi kendo abiro wango gecheni mag lweny nyithindi duto biro tho e lweny kendo gik moko duto mane iyako nomayi bende dwond jotendi mioro ok nowinji nahum mano kaka inine marach yaye dala nineve dala momienore gi remo kendo miriasia gi gik moyaki opongo winjie kaka del michwadogo farese ywak kendo kaka geche mag lweny ringo matek ka tiendegi wuo tiend faras diko piny matek kendo geche lweny chikore ka mwomore ligengni gi tonge ngangni kendo mil joma otho okadho akwana kendo ringregi odhurore pidhepidhe kuonde duto ji chwanyore achwanya kuomgi mago duto otimore nikech timbeni modwanyore ne dala jaber ipong gi timbe mag juok ne indhogo ogendini gi timbeni mag juok gi mag dwanyruokgo ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto wacho niya amon kodi kendo abiro elo lepi nyaka malo e nguti mondo ogendini duto one dugi mi wiyi kuodi abiro bolo kuomi gik mochido modwanyore ka akuodo wiyi mondo ji duto onyieri ji duto moneni nobwogi ka wacho niya mano kaka nineve okethore malich kata kamano onge ngama noho chunyi chutho ere kama diyudie ngama diywagi iparo ni ditony moloyo joamon dala mane ni e aora nael ka pi olworo koni gi koni ka ohinga joethiopia gi jomisri ne e tekre kendo ne gin gi teko mathoth joput kod jolibya bende ne konye kata kamano en bende ne oloye mi omak joge moter e tuech nyithind dalano ne ochwad piny e akek yore mi otho kendo ne ogo ombulu mondo ongego joma dikaw jotende ka wasumbni jodongo mage duto bende ne otue gi nyororo kamano e kaka nineve bende ibiro kwang ka ngat momer mi piny chami kendo inimany kar tony kiringo wasigu kuondeni duto mochiel motegno mag siro lweny nopodhi notiekgi mana ka ngowo mokwongo chiek lwar e dho joma yiengo yath jolwenji nodok manyap ka mon dhorangeye mag pinyi noyawre malach ni wasigu kendo mach nowanggi pep ikreuru ni agenga mabiro umburu pi kendo nyonuru lowo unywasi mondo ogogo matafari mangeny ulosgo kuonde mag siro lweny obed motegno e kinde utimoe gigo mach nowangu mi tieku pep kendo ligangla nonegu mi wasigu notieku mana ka nyithi bonyo chamo gik moko duto giyudo kata obedo ni unywoloru ka dede kamano unulal nono mana kaka rumbi mar dede mahuyo kendo lal nono jou johala ngeny ka sulue e polo kendo jodongu kod jotendu chokore kaachiel mana ka dede mopoto e chiel ka koyo ngich giduto gibiro ringo mi gilal nono mana ka det bonyo ringo ka chieng oowo piny kendo onge ngama ongeyo kuma gidhiye yaye ruodh asuria jodongi oriere piny kotho bende jogi oke e kor gode ka onge ngat machokgi adhondeni ok nyal chango nimar gidhi marach ji duto mowinjo gima otimoreni biro pamo lwetgi gi mor nimar onge kata ngat achiel e piny ngima pok isebedo kisando habakuk habakuk ywagore ni adiera onge e wach mane ruoth nyasaye onyiso janabi habakuk e fweny ruoth nyasaye nyaka karango anyalo ywaknie mondo ikonywa ok iwinja aywakni ka awacho niya masira ok ireswa ere gima omiyo iweyo aneno chandruok machalo kamano koso ango momiyo iweyo aneno timbe mamonogi mecho kod timbe machach ema aneno kendo miero gi lweny olwora koni gi koni kuom mano ji ok luw chik kendo buche ok yal gi adiera nimar joma timbegi mono thoth mohewo joma kare mano emomiyo adiera iloko aloka okor wach ni jobabulon biro sando jojuda joote ruoth nyasaye ne odwoka niya winjuru un joma andhokegi gimoro biro timore ubiro wuoro kendo biru bwogou nimar abiro timo gimoro e ndalou ok unuyie kinyisou ruo abiro kelo jobabulon oganda mager kendo jomrima giwuotho e piny ngima ka gimayo jomoko nono miechgi gin joma ger marach kendo gitimo mana gima gin ema gidwaro onge ngama gengogi faresegi jongwech moloyo kwach kendo ger moloyo ondiegi mawuotho ka piny oselil joidh faresegi kuma bor kendo gihuchore mana ka ongo yudho gima omako kendo joma temo gengogi leny nono koneno kaka gilich gichoko ji gimako mangeny mana ka kuoyo gijaro ruodhi kod jodonggi bende giseyo kuonde mochiel motegno mag siro lweny nikech gidhuro pidhe mag lowo giidhogo ohinga kendo gimuko kuonde mochiel motegnogo bange gikadho piyopiyo mana ka yamo ka gidhi kamoro machielo kata kamano gin joketho nikech gikwano tekregi giwegi ka nyasachgi habakuk ywagore ni ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye nyasacha kendo ngama ler donge e nyasaye nyaka nene kendo mochwere ruoth nyasaye lwandawa ema iketo jobabulon mondo okumwa kingadonwa bura iler ok inyal yie neno richo kata yie nenoo timbe mamono koro ere gima omiyo irango aranga joma andhokegi ok itim gimoro koso ango momiyo iling alinga ka joma richo tieko joma kare moloyogi koro imiyo ji chalo mana gi rech e nam kata gi gik malak piny onge gi jotelo jobabulon mako ji mana kaka jolupo mako rech gi olowu kendo ywayogi gi tol ka mor bange gikulore ni tondegigo kendo giwangonigi ubani ka giwacho niya magi e nyiseche kelonwa mwandu momiyo wadak maber nyasaye koro ibiro weyo gitimo kamano nyaka chieng ka ginego ogendini anega ok idew habakuk ruoth nyasaye odwoko habakuk abiro chung kara adier abiro chung ewi kama oger mabor mar ngicho mi arit mondo ane ane gima nyasaye biro dwoka kuom ywakna eka ne ruoth nyasaye odwoka kama ndik wach mibiro yudo e fweny kigoro maler e kite mopa ngato nyalo somo mayot mi ring nyis joma moko hib fweny mibiro yudono nigi kinde moketne kendo ka kindeno ochopo gigo notimre mana piyopiyo mak orem kata ka ineno ni odeko rite arita nikech notimre maonge kiawa kendo mana e kinde mowinjore rumi gal hib koro e fweny nogo ngat chunye ok ni kare nopodhi ngat makare nobed mangima nikech adierane masiche mabiro mako joma richo andhoke jobabulon sungore ok ginidhi maber gisechoko ogendini mangeny moa e pinje mopogore opogore ka wuoro omakogi ok ginyal yieng kinde biro joma koro gimakogo nongongnigi kawachonigi niya unune malit un jomecho doko momew gi mwandu moyaki kod gik mohol donge joma uholo gik moko biro bandhou gigo koso donge gibiro tucho apoya mi gitengu nyaka udong nono mi ubed wasumbgi kaka ne uyako ogendini mangeny e kaka ogendini duto bende noyaku nikech remo mane uchuero kod timbe mahundu mane utimo e piny kendo e mier kusandogo joma odakie unune malit un muyudo mwandu e yo marach mondo ugergo dalau kama otingore wasigu ok nyal monjoue tim musetimo kutieko ogendini mangeny biro kelonu wichkuot mi ket ngimau e masira kata mana kite manie kor utu noywagrenu kendo yien manie tetu nodwokgi mano kaka unune malit un joma gero mier gi pesa moyud kuom nek gi mecho donge ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto osewacho ni gik ogendini mamoko oseyudo gi luchgi nowang mi lal nono isa kinde biro chopo joma ongeyo duong mar ruoth nyasaye nopongie piny ka mana ka pi mopongo nam unune malit un joma sando jopinje makiewo kodu mi kwang ka joma omer mana ni mondo unyiergi ka giwuotho duk un bende duong un go biro lokore wichkuot nikech ubiro madho kikombe mirimb nyasaye opongo mi ukwang ee nyasaye biro kumou malit mi unubed gi wichkuot marach kar duong mane ungo timbe mahundu mane utimo ni lebanon kendo nek mane unegogo le man kuno nodog e wiu kendo nomi udhier nono nikech usechuero remo e piny kendo e mier bende usetimo timbe mahundu ni joma odakie duto ere ohala muyudo kuom lamo nyiseche manono lwet dhano ema oloso gin mana kido mamiyo ji lal ere ohala ngat molosogi yudo kuomgi chutho oloso mana nyiseche manono ok nyal wuoyo unune malit un joma wacho ni yath mopa mondo ochiew kendo kwayo kidi mondo oa malo bende gik makamago dikelnu wach moa kuom nyasaye adier obawgi gi fedha kod dhahabu kendo gionge gi ngima ruoth nyasaye nie hekalu mare piny duto mondo oling thi e nyime habakuk lemo mar habakuk e lemo mar habakuk janabi ruoth nyasaye asewinjo humbi kendo timbeni miya luoro chak itim timbeni machon mana e ndalogi kendo kata obedo ni ikecho kamano ngwonnwae nyasaye biro koa teman ee ngama ler biro koa got paran duongne maler opongo kor polo kaachiel gi piny othinyore ka ler mar okinyi kendo meny ariyo rieny e bathe koni gi koni kor polo kanyo e kama opandoe duongne maler tho malich otelo e nyime dera luwo bange ka ochung piny yiengni kendo ka ongicho ogendini kirni bende gode duto nyaka nene barore kendo nimo pod owuotho mana kaka ne owuotho chon aneno ka kihondko malich omako jokushan gi jomidian madak e hembe ruoth nyasaye mirima omaki gi aore koso koso ikecho gi nam omiyo ibiro kiidho fareseni kod gecheni ilochogo igolo atung oko kendo ipongo olalo gi asere imiyo ohula baro piny bende ka gode orangi tetni ka luoro omako ohula mwomo ka ridore kendo nam matut wuo matek ka apaka gingore wang chieng gi due ochung achunga keregi ka gineno polo ka mil mana ka gima gin aserni gi tong magi iwuotho e piny gi gero kendo inyono ogendini piny gi mirima ibiro mondo ire jogi kaachiel gi ruoth miseyiero iseketho od jaricho chakre tado nyaka dier ot kimuko mise mare chuth wasikwa nobiro ka kalausi kaparo ni ibiro tiekowa mana kaka inyalo tieko ngat modhier man kar kende kata kamano ne itiekogi mana gi gilwenjegi giwegi ka ingado nam gi fareseni apaka madongo gingore ka awinjo gigi kibaji goya kendo dhoga tetni chokena duto nyosore kendo tiendena kirni ka luoro ohewa ahora mo karito chieng masira biro makoe joma monjowa kata obedo ni ngowo ok thiew kendo mzabibu gi zeituni ok nyagi bende puothe ok chieg cham kendo rombe gi dhok onge dala pod anamor amora kuom ruoth nyasaye kendo anabed moil kuom nyasaye jawarna sam zab ruoth nyasaye e tekra en ema omiyo tienda bedo mayot ka tiend mwanda mondo awuothgo kuonde motingore zefania chieng mirimb ruoth nyasaye ruo wnda e wach ruoth nyasaye mane obiro ni zefania wuod kushi wuod gedalia wuod amaria wuod hezekia e ndalo josia wuod amon ruodh juda ruoth nyasaye wacho niya abiro yweyo gik moko duto manie piny mi lal nono abiro tieko dhano kaachiel gi le bende abiro tieko winy e kor polo kod rech e nam abiro goyo joma timbegi mono piny mi atiek koth dhano chuth ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano abiro kumo jojuda kod jojerusalem duto mondo atiek tich lamo baal duto mitimo ka mi kata mana nying jodolo manono ok nowinji bende abiro tieko ji maidho ewi udi kendo kulore piny kalamo gik mane kor polo kod joma lama ruoth nyasaye kendo kuongore gi nying milkom nyasaye manono kaachiel gi joma oselokona ngegi kendo ok manya kata kwaya mondo akony linguru thi e nyim ruoth nyasaye nimar odiechienge chiegni ruoth nyasaye oseloso misango kendo osepwodho wende owacho niya ka chieng atimoe misango ochopo anakum joka ruoth kod jotendgi madongo kaachiel gi joma luwo timbe jopinje mamoko chiengno abiro kumo jogo duto mamiel e laru mar hekalu kendo mapongo od ruodhgi gi timbe mahundu kod timbe mag wuond chiengno ywak nowinjre e dhorangach miluongo ni dhoranga rech kendo e bath dala koma nyien bende koko maduong nogore e gode kendo ji modak e dala mamwalo noywagi nimar joohala duto orumo kendo joma loko ohand fedha otiek pep chiengno anamany jerusalem kamenye gi taya mi akum joma osiko katimo atima richo kendo wacho ni ruoth nyasaye ok bi timo gimoro kata matin mwandugi noyaki kendo miechgi nokethi giniger udi ok ginidagie kendo ginipidh mzabibu ok ginimadh divachgi odiechieng mangongo mar ruoth nyasaye chiegni en odiechieng marach kendo obiro koringo piyopiyo moloyo jalweny jangwech chiengno en chieng bura kendo en chieng ywagruok gi rem bende en chieng kethruok gi lal kod mudho gi kuyo kaachiel gi rumbi molil kod onguengo malich en chieng tung ywakie kendo sigich lweny winjoree e mier mochiel motegno kendo kuonde moger maboyo mag ngicho ruoth nyasaye owacho niya abiro kelo ni ji thagruok malich kendo ginituomre atuoma ka muofni nikech richo gisetimo e nyima rembgi nochuer ka pi kendo ringregi noriere ka tow e lowo fethgi kata dhahapgi ok noresgi chieng ruoth nyasaye ngadoe bura nyiego mager engo nowang piny duto mi tiek pep kamano enotiek gik moko duto modak e piny mana ka diemo wang zefania okor wach ni piny juda gi ogendini molwore biro podho chokreuru kanyakla un oganda onge gi wichkuotni ka pok oteru kuma bor mi ulal nono ka mihudhi ee chokreuru kapok ruoth nyasaye okelo mirimbe mager kuomu kata kapok chieng mirimbe ochopo dwaruru ruoth nyasaye un jogo duto modak e piny kobolore kendo korito chikene bende dwaruru tim makare bende beduru gi chuny mamuol nimar dipo ka uyudo kar konyruok chieng mirimb ruoth nyasaye isa jer ezek joel amos zek dala mar gaza ibiro nono ashkelon bende biro dong gunda kendo joashdod ibiro riembo mana odiechieng tir ekron ibiro dhuolo gi lop tiende mano kaka unune malit un jo kereth modak e dhonam ruoth nyasaye wuoyo kuomu niya un jofilistia abiro dwoko pinyu piny abiro kethe mi aweye ka onge ngama odakie kendo obiro dong mana kama jokwath kende ema kwayoe kendo kama rombe ema nindoe jojuda modong ema nobed weg piny man e dhonam ginikwa jambgi e dhonam kuno kendo giniyue e ut joaskelon gotieno nimar ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi abiro konyogi mi adwoknigi gueth mane gingo chon isa jer ezek amos jer ezek amos asewinjo ayany jomoab yanyogo joga gi ajara joamon jarogigo bende aseneno kaka gidonjo e lop joga manie tonggi chak kuom mano ruoth nyasaye nyasach israel akuongora gi nyinga awuon ni moab biro chalo gi sodom amon nochal gi gomora mi gibed kuonde aila gi bugni mag pundo ema opongo kendo mokethore nyaka chieng joga modong noyakgi mi kaw pinygi mano ema nobed pok giniyud kuom sunga gin go nikech ne giyanyo joruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ka gikawore malich ruoth nyasaye biro thinyore mondo okumgi marach obiro nego nyiseche duto mag piny gi kech mi ji duto modak e pinje mae dhonembe kod chulni nokulre ka lame ngato ka ngato e dalane isa un joethiopia bende ligangla mar ruoth nyasaye nonegu isa nah kendo norie bade kuom piny man yo nyandwat motiek asuria kendo olok nineve piny motwo mana ka piny ongoro kueth mag jamni nogudre kuno kaachiel gi le duto mag thim achuth gi otenga bende nobed kayueyo ewi sirni modong kochung kuno kendo tula kod agak noywagi e dirise kod dhoudi bende yien mabeyo mane obawgo kor udi nodong kongiengore ji nopenjre niya koro e dala mane mor kendo ogeno kuom lochne cha adier koso en e dala mane sungore e chunye kawacho niya anie kende kendo onge moro maromo koda koro okethore chuth mi olokore mana kama le mae thim ema odakie kendo ngato angata kadho kanyo wuoro ka tango lwete zefania richo joisrael ongwonnigi mano wach malit manade kuom dala jerusalem jasand ji kendo monyorore japiem ne ok onyal yie kwer mane ikwerego kendo ne odagi winjo puonj bende ne ok oyie kuom ruoth nyasaye kata mana sudo machiegni kode ne ok osudo jotende ne chalo gi sibuoche ruto e iye kendo ruodhi mage ne chalo gi ondiegi mawuotho gotieno ok piny ru ni gimoro ka pok gitieko jonabi mage ne joyiem kendo ne ok gin jonabi madiera bende jodolo mage ne ok dew gik mowal ni nyasaye kendo ne giketho chik ruoth nyasaye man jerusalem timo mana gik makare ok otim gimoro marach ongado bura gi adiera okinyi kokinyi mak olewo ngang jaricho wiye ok kuodi ruoth nyasaye wacho kama aseyweyo ogendini ka yuech kendo ohingni gigengorego okethore chuth asemiyo wangyoregi olokore thim onge ngama luwo miechgi bende okethore kendo odong nono onge joma odakie ne aparo ni jojerusalem diwinj chikna omiyo ne awachonigi niya luorauru kendo winjuru puonjna kata kamano ne giketo chunygi mana kuom timo timbegi mamono kuom mano ruoth nyasaye awachonu niya ritauru adier rituru chieng abiro chungie ka ayalou nimar asechano choko ogendini kod dhoudi kanyakla mondo aol kuomgi mirimba duto maliet ka mach kendo mabiro wango piny duto tiek pep bange anapwodh dho ji mondo ruoth nyasaye ema gilama ka gitiyona gi chuny achiel joga malama kendo moke loka aora mag ethiopia nobi kakelona mich chiengno jerusalem ok niyud wichkuot kuom timbeni mamono mane ipiemgo koda nimar e kindeno anagol jogi josunga kendo jongayi mi ok nichak isungri kendo e goda maler joma nawe nobed joma odhier kendo mathagore fweny joisrael modong noyud kar resruok e nying ruoth nyasaye ok ginichak gitim timbe mamono kendo weche mag miriambo miwuondogo ji ok nowuog e dhogi nimar ginichal gi rombe machiemo kendo nindo piny onge ngama bwogo un josayun koguru gi mor joisrael gouru mahu matek ee beduru mamor gi chunyu duto yaye jojerusalem nimar ruoth nyasaye oseriembo wasiku motero kuma bor ruoth nyasaye ruodh israel nie kindu omiyo ok unuchak uluor masira wach nobi ni jerusalem chiengno e josayun kik ubed maluor kendo kik uwe lwetu nyosre ruoth nyasaye nyasachu nie kindu mondo oritu maber mana ka jalweny obiro bedo mamor nikech un mi ochak onyisu herane kower gi mor nikech un mana kaka ne otimo chon ruoth nyasaye wacho niya abiro golo masiche oko kuomu mi ok ginimiu wichkuot kendo winjuru ka kindeno ochopo anakum joma thirou anakony rangonde kendo anachok joma oke mi alok wichkuot mane joga nigo obed pak gi huma e piny ngima ka kinde ochopo monego achokue anakelu dala anamiu pak kod huma e kind ogendini duto mae piny ka adwokonu gueth mane ungo chon mana kuneno ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano hagai ojiw joisrael mondo ochak oger hekalu ezra chieng mokwongo mar due mar auchiel e higa mar ariyo mar loch darius ruoth nyasaye nokelo ni janabi hagai wach mondo onyis zerubabel wuod shealtiel jatend piny juda gi joshua wuod jehozadak jadolo maduong niya ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto wacho kama ogandani wacho ni kinde pok ochopo mar chako gero hekalu mara bange ruoth nyasaye nochako ooro wach ni hagai janabi mondo openj joisrael niya bende en kinde maber adier monego un uwegi udag e utu mugero mabeyo ka hekalunani omukore kama mano emomiyo koro ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto awacho ni nonuru timbeu usechuoyo mathoth ukayo matin bende uchiemo ok uyieng umetho ok romu kendo urwakoru koyo pod chamou achama jatich tiyo kendo chamo msara oketo pesane mana e mifuko motuch emomiyo ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto awacho kama nonuru timbeu dhiyouru e gode mondo ukel yien ugergo hekalu amorgo kendo kama duongna maler nyalo nenoree ugeno yudo gik mathoth uyudo mana manok ka ukelo cham dala akudhogi kucha ruoth nyasaye apenjo ni uparo ni atimo kamano nikech ango adwokou kama atimo kamano nikech hekaluna odong gunda ka un ngato ka ngato nigi ode owuon motimoe gige mano emomiyo polo otwo koth ok chuenu kendo piny otho ok nyag gimoro asehono oro mondo otwo piny kaachiel gi gode mi cham gi mzabibu kod zeituni gi gik moko duto piny nyago ner mondo kech omak dhano gi jamni kendo oketh tije duto dhano oloso zerubabel wuod sheatiel gi joshua wuod jehozadak jadolo maduong kaachiel gi ji moko duto mane oa e tuech nowinjo weche ruoth nyasaye kaachiel gi weche mane hagai owacho kane bang mano ruoth nyasaye nojiwo chuny zerubabel wuod shealtiel jatend piny juda gi chuny joshua wuod jehozadak jadolo maduong kod chuny ji mamoko mane oa e tuech mi ne gibiro mi gichako gero hekalu mar darius weche mane ruoth nyasaye owacho gi dho janabi hagai e magi penj zerubabel wuod shealtiel jatend juda gi joshua wuod jehozada jadolo maduong kod joma moko duto niya ezra bende nitie ngato modong kama gimoro achiel kende ema odong en ni abiro yiengo polo gi piny kod nam bende anayieng ogendini duto mi mwandugi duto nobi ka mi anapong hekalu gi duong maler ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano e wuon apenjogini ka ngato otingo ringo mowal ni tich nyasaye e riak lawe mi riak laweno ogere e makati kata e kado kata e divai kata e mo kata e chiemo moro amora gima ogere kuomeno bende didok mowal ni gi pinyu analok loch ruodhi mi aketh teko mag pinje mamoko kendo anago geche mag lweny piny kaachiel gi joithgi ngato ka ngato noked gi wadgi mi farese kod joma idhogi nonegi chiengno anakawi jatichna loch ruoth darius wach ruoth nyasaye nobiro ni janabi zekaria wuod berekia wuod iddo kawacho niya ruoth nyasaye nokecho ahinya gi kwereu emomiyo wach ni ji ni ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto uduog ira ne ok gichiko itgi kata dewo wechena ne ok gidewo ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano angeyo ni unyalo penja ni kwereu ni kanye kata ni jonabigo pod ngima donge wechena gi chikena mane amiyo moko mabeyo mi anachak aho sayun kendo anatim jerusalem dala ayiero zakaria janabi oneno tunge gi jotheth e fweny ne atingo wanga mi aneno tunge angwen eka ne apenjo malaika mane wuoyo koda ni magi ango ne odwoka ni gin ruodhi mosekeyo jojuda gi joisrael kod jojerusalem bange ruoth nyasaye nonyisa jotheth angwen mi apenjo gima gibiro timo ne odwoka niya gisebiro mondo gibwog kendo gilo tunge angwengo tungego gin ruodhi mane okeyo jojuda onge kata ngat achiel mane nyalo tingo wiye zekaria zekaria janabi oneno ngato man gi tond pimo e fweny ne atingo wanga mi aneno ngato kotingo tond pimo e lwete ne apenje kuma odhiye mi odwoka ni odhi pimo jerusalem mondo one ane kaka borne gi lachne onego obedi kane malaika mane awuoyogo owuok dhi malaika machielo nothinyore kabiro romone mowachone niya ring idhi iwachne wuowi man gi rapimno ni jerusalem biro bedo dala maonge gi ohinga nikech ji mabiro dakie kaachiel gi jamni nobed mangeny mohinge ruoth nyasaye owacho ni obiro bedone ohinga mar josayun modak babulon ruoth nyuasaye manyalo gik mooko duto oherou malich ahinya ka ngato mulou ngatno soko mana wanga owuon emomiyo ruoth nyasaye mane oora gi ote maduong ir ogendini noyakou owacho juda kendo ka mare owuon e piny maler mi ochak otim jerusalem dala moyiero ji duto mondo oling e nyim ruoth nyasaye nimar osechiew moa kar dakne maler zekaria fweny mane zekaria janabi oneno kuom eka malaika mar ruoth nyasaye nowacho ni satan niya yaye satan ruoth nyasaye mondo okweri adier ruoth nyasaye moseyiero jerusalem obed mare owuon mondo okweri ngatni donge chalo gi yien moyudhi kaliel koda nodwogo mochiewa mana ka ngama ochiew e nindo ne openja niya ineno ango ne adwoke niya aneno rachung taya mar dhahabu man gi tawo e wiye rachung tayano otingo teyni abiriyo kendo taya ka taya nigi kuonde abiriyo mirwakoe kitambi fweny bende aneno yiend zeituni ariyo e bathe moro nie dir tawo korachwich machielo nie dire koracham bange napenjo malaika mane wuoyo koda niya jaduong magi ango malaika nodwoka kapenja ni ikia gigi adier ne adwoke ni ooyo jaduong ok angeyogi eka nowachona niya ruoth nyasaye wacho ni zerubabel kama gik moko matimore ok timre kuom teko kata kuom nyalo gitimore mano kaka hekalu ber ruoth nyasaye mondo oguedhe bende wach ruoth nyasaye nobirona niya kaka zerubabel ema oseketo mise mar hekalu e kaka en bende ema obiro tieke kamano ununge ni ruoth nyasaye fweny mar rachung taya fweny malaikano nowachona niya teyni abiriyogo gin wenge mag ruoth nyasaye marango piny ngima bange ne apenjo malaikano niya yiend zeituni ariyo manie bath rachung taya koni gi atingo wanga mi aneno kalatas moban kahuyo e kor yamo eka malaika cha nopenja niya ineno ango ne adwoke ni aneno kalatas moban kahuyo borne oromo mita apar lachne mita abich bange nowachona niya mano en kuong lak e piny ngima weche mondik e bath kalatasno konchiel biro tieko jokuo duto kendo weche mondik e bathe komachielo notiek ji duto kuongore gi miriambo ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto wacho ni anaor kuongno e ut jokuo duto kende e od ngato angata makuongore gi miriambo e nyinga kuongno nosik e udigo mi tiekgi pep koda ka yien gi kite mogergigo dhako manie atonga malaika mane wuoyo koda cha ne oduogo ira mowachona niya ting wangi mondo ineye gima birono kaka chalo ne apenje ni en ango mi odwoka ni en atonga opong gi richo duto motim e piny ngima eka raum mapek molos gi chuma mane oumgo atongano noelore mi apo ka aneno dhako mobet piny malaika nowachona niya dhakono e richo eka ne odhiro dhakono modwoko ei atonga mi ochako oumo dhoge gi raum mapekno bang mano ne aneno mon ariyo mahuyo e kor yamo ka biro irwa gi buombe machalo buombe ogungo ne gikawo atonga mi gidhigo e kor polo malo eka ne apenjo malaika mane wuoyo koda cha kuma giteroe atongano nodwoka niya gitere e piny babulon mondo ogerne ot kuno kendo ka oseger odno norenj atongano kare molosne kanyo zekaria one geche angwen mag lweny e fweny ne achako atingo wanga mi aneno geche lweny angwen ka wuok e kind gode ariyo godego ne mag mula fweny fweny gari mokwongo ne nigi farese silwende mar ariyo ne nigi maratenge fweny mar adek ne nigi farese marachere kendo mar angwen ne nigi marangeye ne apenjo malaika un joma ndaloni weche jonabi osebedo kawacho chakre chieng mane iketoe mise mar hekalu mara mondo ochak oger kendo kane pok kindeno ochopo ji kata jamni ne ok ti tich michulo kendo kane ngato owuok duto ema awacho kamano ginichwo kodhi ka gin gi kue mi mzabibu nonyag olembe kendo lowo nochieg cham koth bende nochuenigi maber kendo anaguedh joma odong kuom jogagi gi gigo duto un jojuda kod joisrael usebedo ranyisi malongo ni ogendini mamoko duto kuom gima timore ni joma akuongo koro abiro resou mi ubed ranyisi mar gima timore ni joma aguedho kuom mano kik ubed maluor beduru gi chir
