miriambo nikech amon gi gik kamago duto ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ema awacho kamano wach ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto nobirona niya kinde mag riyo kech e due mar angwen gi mar abich gi mar abiriyo kod mar apar biro lokore sewni mag mor gi ilo ni jojuda omiyo beduru gi adiera kod kue bende magi e weche ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto kinde biro chopo ogendini madongo moa e pinje marateke kendo e mier madongo nobi jerusalem joma odak e dala moro nodhi ir joma odak e dala machielo mi wachnigi niya wadhiuru ir ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto mondo walame kendo wakwaye mondo oguedhwa kamano ogendini madongo kod ji marateke nobi jerusalem mondo olam ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto kendo okwaye mondo oguedhgi ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto wacho niya e kindego ji apar moa e ogendini mamoko mawacho dhok mopogore opogore nobi ir jayahudi mi mak riak lawe ka wachone niya wadwaro dhi kodi nimar wasewinjo bura mibiro ngado ni ogendini mokiewo gi jojuda isa jer amos isa ezek joel amos math luka wach moa kuom ruoth nyasayee ema ruoth nyasaye osechano kumo piny hadrak kod dala mar damaski piny duto en mar ruoth nyasaye mana kaka dhout israel bende mage dala mar hamath mokiewo gi hadrak bende mare kaachiel gi mier turo gi sidon kata obedo ni joma odak kuondego riek kamano joturom osegero ohinga gigengorego kendo gisedhuro fedha gi dhahabu mana ka lowo ruoth nyasaye biro mayogi mwandugi duto mi wit e nam dala hie mach biro wango mi rum pep isa jer ezek joel amos zef ka dala ashkelon oneno kamano biro bedo maluor gaza bende kihondko biro mako mi geno mane ekron nigo rum ruodhi mag gaza biro lal nono bende ashkelon nodong nono maonge ji modakie kendo ji anywola ema nobed kodak ashdod ruoth nyasaye wacho niya anaketh sunga jofilistia sungorego mi ok ginichak gicham ringo man gi remo kata chamo chiemo moko makuero jogi motony nobed joga mi lokre achiel kuom dhout juda joekron bende nolokre joga kaka ne jojebus olokore anachung e pinya ka jarito mondo ngato kik donji kata wuogi mi wasigu ok nochak olo joga nimar aseneno thagruokgi gi wanga ruodh sayun mabiro math joh un josayun beduru mamor koguru matek yaye jojerusalem nimar ruodhu biro iru kolocho obiro komuol kendo koidho kanyna chutho oidho kanyna matin adier en mana nyathi kanyna zab ruoth nyasaye wacho niya abiro golo geche mag lweny oa e piny israel kendo abiro tieko farese mag lweny man jerusalem bende atunge mag jolweny biro rumo ruodhno nokel kue ni ogendini duto kendo lochne noyarre koa e nam man yo imbo nyaka nam man yo wuok chieng bende koa e aora yufrate nyaka tung piny koni gi koni okor ni nochak oger sayun kendo wuok un abiro duoko jou motue ka agolo e bur motwo maonge pi nikech singruok mane utimo koda gi remb misango un joma otue koro nigi geno duoguru e dalau mochiel motegno ahulo ni abiro guedhou nyadiriyo kuom sand mane osandugo aseloko juda atung kendo asetimo israel asere asekawo yawuoti yaye sayun mi aloko ligangla akedogo gi joyunani ruoth nyasaye biro thinyore ewi joge malo kendo obiro chielo asere mage ka mil polo obiro goyo tung mi odhi gi ahiti moa milambo ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ema nobed okumbagi mi ginilo lweny ka ginyono kite mag orujre piny ginigo koko ka joma omer mi ginineg ji mi rembgi chuer mana ka remb misango miolo gi tawo e tunge mag kendomarmisango kamano ruoth nyasaye nyasachgi nores joge chiengno mana kaka jakwath reso jambe kendo enoketgi e pinye mana ka kite nengogi tek miketo e osimbo mar duong mondo omil mano kaka gin gi mwandu mogundho kod mor maduong cham gi divai biro miyo yawuotgi gi nyigi bed gi del mabeyo zekaria okor ni ruoth nyasaye biro waro joge kwauru ruoth nyasaye koth e kinde mowinjore nimar en ema okelo boche polo morweyo eka koth chue mi dhano gi le yud chiemo math mar nyiseche manono wacho weche maonge tiendgi kende ajuoke neno ranyisi mag miriambo gileko lek ok adiera kendo giwacho weche mawito ji mano emomiyo ji bayo abaya ka rombe kendo githagore nikech gionge jakwath ruoth nyasaye wacho niya mirima omaka gi jotend joga omiyo abiro kumogi ruoth nyasaye abiro konyo jojuda akwano ka jamba mi ami gibed marateke ka farese mag lweny bende ginibed motegno ka kite moriwo kor ot kendo ka loye migurogo hema ginichal gi atung moywa mochiek ni lweny kendo kuomgi ema jotend lweny duto nowuogie ginibed ka jolweny marateke nyono wasikgi ka chuodho kendo ginikedi nikech ruoth nyasaye kodgi bende ginilo kata mana joidh farese mi gikuod wigi abiro miyo jojuda bed marateke kendo abiro miyo joisrael locho bende anachak aguedhgi nikech asekechogi mi ginichal ka gima ne ok ajwangogi nikech ruoth nyasachgi kendo abiro dwoko kwayogi joisrael nochal gi jolweny marateke bende ginibed moil ka joma ometho nyithindgi none kamano mi bed mamor kendo ginipak ruoth nyasaye gi ilo abiro luongogi gi liyo mondo achokgi mi ginibed mangeny mana kaka ne gin chon kata obedo ni nakeyogi e kind ogendini man maboyo kamano ginipara mi gipidh nyithindgi kuondego bange giniduogi anagolgi misri gi asuria kakelogi dala bende anakelgi e piny gilead gi piny lebanon nyaka chop piny pong thich ka gingado nam misri apaka nokue adier kuonde matut duto mag aora nael noduon sunga joasuria sungorego nodwok piny kendo loch mar misri norum ruoth nyasaye ema nami joisrael teko mi ginipaka ka gimiyo nyinga duong ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano zekaria lebanon yaw dhorangeyeni mondo mach owang yiendi mabeyo mag sida ywaguru un yien duto nimar yiend sida osepodho adier yien madongo osekethi un yiend bashan ywaguru nimar bungu yien odichie osebeti winjuru kaka jotelo ywak ka chunygi lit nimar duong yande gingo olal nono adier winjuru kaka giywak ka chunygi lit nimar duong yande gingo olal nono adier winjuru kaka giywak ka sibuoche maruto nimar bung jordan gidakie osekethi jakwath maber gi jakwath marach ruoth nyasaye nyasacha nowachona niya bed jakwadh rombe ibiro yango nikech jokwadhgi giwegi ok dewgi joma ngiewogi bende negogi ok yud kum giloko ringgi pesa kendo giwacho niya opak ruoth nikech waseyudo mwandu ruoth nyasaye nomedo wacho niya ok anakech joma odak e pinyni abiro keto ngato ka ngato e lwet jatende kendo e lwet ruodhe mi jotelogo noketh piny ok anares ji e lwetgi kuom mano ne adoko jakwadh rombe miyango ka atiyo ni joohand rombe bange ne akawo ludhe ariyo mi achako achiel ni ngwono machielo ne achako nio riwruok kamano ne abedo jakwadh rombe kane pok due achiel orumo ne ariembo jokwath adek nikech ne gijoga kendo gin bende chunygi nosin koda bange ne awacho ni rombe niya ok abi medo bedo jakwadhu kendo mago kuomu matho otho athoya kendo mago madwaro lal olal alala mago modong moro ka moro oneg wadgi eka ne akawo ludha miluongo ni ngwono mi aturo ka anyisogo ni singruok mane ruoth nyasaye otimo gi ogendini duto okethi kamano singruok ne okethi chiengno kendo joohand rombe mane ranga nongeyo ni en wach ruoth nyasaye math math ne awachonigi niya ka uyie miyauru pokna ka ok kamano bedgouru kuom mano ne gichula pokna moromo shekel piero adek mag fedha bange ruoth nyasaye nowachona niya ket pesago kar keno mar hekalu omiyo ne akawo shekel piero adek mag fedhago mane giparo ni ema oroma mi aketo kar keno mar hekalu mar ruoth nyasaye bang mano ne aturo luth machielo miluongo ni riwruok ka anyisogo ni aketho riwruok manie kind jojuda gi joisrael ruoth nyasaye nowachona kendo niya kaw gigi ichak iwuondri ni jakwath bed jakwath manono kaka ranyisi ni abiro keto jakwath e piny ok rang rombe matho kata ok many molal kata ok thiedh matuo bende ok kwa mago mangima chamo mana mago machue kendo mwodo koda ka orengegi masira ochomo jakwath manono jwango rombeno ligangla biro lwar e bade kendo e wange korachwich mi bade tal kendo wange korachwich nokethre chuth zekaria re ibiro resogo joisrael en wach ruoth nyasaye kuom israel ruoth nyasaye mane oyaro polo kendo oketo mise mar piny mi omiyo dhano much ngima wacho kama anami jerusalem chal gi agwata mar kongo ogendini mokiewo kode biro madho mi kwang ka joma omer ka ogendinigo goyo ni jerusalem agenga miech juda bende giniluor chiengno ka ogendini duto mag piny ochokore mondo omonj jerusalem naloke obed mapek ka kidi onge ngama nyalo tingo kendo ogendini duto motemo tinge nohinyre marach ruoth nyasaye awacho niya chiengno anago farese duto gi kihondko mi ami joma idhogi lokre joneko anarit jojuda farese mag ogendini mamokogo analok muofni mi dhout juda nowach kendgi niya joma odak jerusalem yudo teko kuom ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto nyasachgi e kindeno anami dhout juda bed ka mach manie bungu kata manie puoth tiang ginitiek ogendini duto mokiewo kodgi koni gi koni jojerusalem nodag gi kue e dalagi ruoth nyasaye nakuong miyo dhoudi duto mag juda locho mondo duong mar dhood daudi kod jojerusalem kik lo duong jojuda mamoko nigo chiengno ruoth nyasaye nabed okumba ni jojerusalem mi kata mana ngama yomyomie moloyo kuomgi nobed motegno ka daudi kendo joka daudi nobed jotend ji mana kaka nyasaye kata malaika mare bende anatiek ogendini duto mabiro mondo omonj jerusalem joh fweny math fweny anami joka daudi gi jojerusalem chuny mangwon kendo mohero lemo eka bange giniteg wanggi kuom jal mane gichwowo mi otho kendo giniywage mana ka joma ywago nyathi miderma adier giniywag malit mana ka joma ywago wuodgi makayo e kindeno ywak nobed malich jerusalem mana ka ywak mane oywaggo hadadrimon e paw megido dhoudi duto e piny noywagi kar kendgi ka mondgi bende ywak kar kendgi joka nathan gi joka lawi kod joka shimei bende noywag kamano ka mondgi bende ywak kar kendgi dhoudi mamoko duto bende noywagi kar kendgi ka mondgi bende ywak kar kendgi zekaria ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto wacho niya ka ndalogo ochopo soko noyawre ni nyikwa daudi kod jojerusalem mondo opwodhgo richogi gi timbegi makuero e kindeno anaruch nying nyiseche manono e piny mi ok nochak opargi kendo bende anatiek jokor wach kod chuny magombo timo timbe makuero bang mano ka ngato pod nodhi adhiya nyime gi koro wach wuon gi min nowachne niya ok inichak ibed mangima kendo nimar isewacho miriambo e nying ruoth nyasaye kamano wuon gi min nochwowe gi tong mi nege kokoro wach ndalogo jokor wach duto wigi nokuodi gi fweny gineno bende ok ginirwak lewni motimo yier jokor wach rwako mondo giwuondgo ji moro ka moro nowach niya ok jakor wach mana japur kendo asebedo kayudo chiemba e lowo chakre tinna ka ngato openje ni mbelni manie korigi manade enodwok niya ne ayudogi e od osiepna ruoth nyasaye ogolo chik mondo oneg jatend pinye math mar ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto owacho niya ligangla malo mondo ichadh jakwadha ee chadh ngat matiyona chutho neg jakwath mondo rombe oke nimar abiro kumo joga moyomno ruoth nyasaye awacho kama mano biro timore e piny duto mi ariyo kuom adek ibiro negi achiel kuom adek nowe ka ngima bange anaket achiel kuom adek nogono e mach mondo opwodhgi maler mana kaka ipwodho fedha adier natemgi mana kaka itemo dhahabu bange ginilama mi anadwok kwayogi awuon anawachnigi ni gin joga gin giniwach ni nyasachgi zekaria gik mabiro timore ni jerusalem kod ogendini mamoko winjuru odiechieng ruoth nyasaye sudo machiegni mwandu jerusalem noyakie mi pog mana e wangu kuneno enochok ogendini duto mondo oked gi jerusalem kendo dalano nokaw mi mwandu manie udi noyaki bende mon nomak gi thwon bath dala konchiel noter e tuech bathe komachielo nowe mana kanyo eka ruoth nyasaye nowuogi mi ked gi ogendinigo mana ka gima okedo e paw lweny chiengno enochung e got zeituni omanyore gi jerusalem yo wuok chieng kendo godno nobarre mi hoho maduong mochakore yo wuok chieng nyaka podho chieng poge ariyo bath got konchiel nodog yo nyandwat bathe komachielo nodog yo milambo unutony kuluwo hohono nimar enochwe nyaka dhoranga dala adier unutony kaka jou notony higni mangeny mokadho ka giringo yiengni piny mane otimore e ndalo uzia ruodh juda bange ruoth nyasaye nyasacha nobi kaachiel gi malaika mage duto chakre chiengno koyo gi pe ok nobedie otieno bende ok nobedie piny nosik mana odiechieng lilo kendo kata ka piny olokore odhiambo ler nosik asika ruoth nyasaye kende ema ongeyo ndalo gigo biro timoree ezek joh fweny chakre chiengno pi maliw nomol kawuok jerusalem moko nochik nam kado man yo wuok chieng moko nochik nam mediterenia man yo podho chieng enosik komol e ndalo chwiri kendo e ndalo oro mana machalre chakre chiengno ruoth nyasaye nobed ruodh piny ngima kendo ji duto nolame ka nyasachgi mi ngeye gi nyinge achiel ruoth nyasaye piny duto mokiewo gi jerusalem nobed mopie ka pap chakre geba kochomo milambo nyaka rimon jerusalem nosik kotingore atinga kama entie chakre dhorangach miluongo ni dhoranga benjamin nyaka dhorangach man yo kama ohinga ogomogo kendo chakre kama oger mabor mar ngicho mar hananel nyaka kuonde mibiyoe mzabip ruoth kuma ohinga ogomogo chon ne nitie dhorangach moro fweny ji nodag jerusalem gi kue ka onge ngama bwogogi ni ibiro kuong dalagi mondo okethi ruoth nyasaye nogo ogendini duto mane okedo gi jerusalem gi tho marach thono nochal kama ringregi notow mana ka gichung gi tiendgi kendo wengegi notow mana e wigi lewgi bende notow mana e dhogi chiengno ruoth nyasaye nogogi gi kihondko malich kendo ngato ka ngato nomak wadgi mondo ogorego jojuda bende nokony jojerusalem e lweny kendo giniyak mwandu mag ogendini mokiewo kodgi kaka fedha gi dhahabu kod lewni mogundho bende tho machalo gi mano mane ogoyo jogo nogo farese gi nyumbu gi ngamia kod kenje manie kambi mag wasigu mi neg pep tlawi bang lweny ji duto motony e ogendini mane omonjo jerusalemgo nobi higa ka higa mondo olam ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ka ruodhgi kendo mondo otim sap kiche ka dhoot moro mar ogendini e piny ok odhi jerusalem mondo olam ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto ka ruodhgi koth ok nochue e pinygi bende ka jomisri ok odhi mi ochopo e dalano giniyud tuo machal gi mano ruoth nyasaye biro kelo ni oganda moro amora ok odhi mondo otim sap kiche mano e kum ibiro kumogo jomisri kod ogendini mamoko ok odhi jerusalem mondo otim sap kiche chakre chiengno kata mana okode mag farese nogorie weche mawacho niya mowal ni ruoth nyasaye kendo agulni mitedogo e hekalu nobed mowal ni tich ruoth nyasaye mana ka tewni mitiyogo e kendomarmisango agulni duto manie jerusalem kod juda nobed mowal ni tich ruoth nyasaye kendo ji duto matimo misengni nokaw moko mondo ochwakie ring misango kamano ka kindeno ochopo onge johala moro amora nochak oyud e hekalu mar ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto malaki ruoth nyasaye ohero jakobo gi nyikwaye e wach ruoth nyasaye mane omiyo malaki mondo onyis joisrael ruoth nyasaye owacho niya aherou usedwoke kupenje ni ere kaka iherowa ruoth nyasaye odwoko ni donge esau gi jakobo ne gin owete kata kamano ahero jakobo gi nyikwaye esau gi nyikwaye asingo aseketho piny gode mag esau mi aloko obedo thim ondiegi dakie ka nyikwa esau joedom owacho ni kata obedo ni miechgi osekethi kamano gibiro gerogi kendo ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto dwoko niya mondo gigergi abiro kethogi kendo mi ji noluong jogo ni oganda mar kethruok ruoth nyasaye okechogo nyaka chieng ubiro neno gigo gi wangu ka timore mi unuwach niya kara ruoth nyasaye nigi teko kata e pinje mamoko ok israel ruoth nyasaye okwero jodolo ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto owacho ni jodolo niya wuowi nyaka mi wuon luor kendo jatich bende nyaka luor ngat otiyone dak umiya duong wuonu koso dak umiya luor ema utiyona usejara eka upenja ni ere kaka wasejari usejara kuom chiwo chiemo chik ok oyiego e kendona mar misango eka upenja ni ere kaka ok usemiya luor usejara kuchayo kendona mar misango uparo ni en gima kare ka ukelo chiayo muofu kata mongol kata matuo mondo utimnago misango ka da bed ni uchiwo chiayo kamano ni ruodhu bende da obedo mamor kodu koso da orwakou koro sani un jodolo kapo ni utemo ni ukwayo nyasaye mondo okonyu ok nowinj kwayou kendo mano en kethou ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto owacho niya da obedo maber ka ngat achiel kuomu oloro dhorangeye mag laru mar hekalu mondo kik umok mach e kendona mar misango kayiem nono ok amor kodu kendo ok nayie misengni muchiwona ji manie tung piny koni gi koni miyo nyinga duong giwangona ubani mangue ngar kuonde duto kendo gichiwona misengni ayiego giduto gimiyo nyinga duong uchaya kuparo ni kendona mar misango en kama odwanyore unyalo chiwoe chiemo moro amora uwacho niya mano kaka waol gi gik makamagi kendo utwenyona umu bende uchiwona jamni mokwal kata mongol kata matuo mondo otimnago misango uparo ni anyalo yie gi chiwo kamago okuong ngat jawuond timona misango gi chiayo modwanyore kamano mondo ochopgo kuongruokne oweyo chiache maber e kul e ruodh ruodhi kendo ogendini duto oluora malaki un jodolo ruoth nyasaye ochikou kama nyaka umi nyinga duong kuom gik mutimo ka ok uwinjo wachna kendo ok utimo kaka awacho abiro kuongou kendo anakuong gik moko duto mabeyo uyudo e tich dolo ee abiro kuongo gigo nikech udagi rito chikna anangad bedeu oko kendo anarwadh owuoch jamni mutimogo misengni e pat wengeu mi nariembu ua e wanga eka ubiro ngeyo ni ema asemiyou chikni mondo singruok mane atimo gi nyikwa lawi osik kogurore motegno kane atimo kodgi singruokna ne achikogi ngima kod dak maber mamiyogi mago duto mondo gimiya luor kamano ne gimiyo nyinga duong kendo giluora ne gipuonjo ji mana weche makare maonge kata wach achiel mar miganga ne gitimo gik makare adwaro kendo ne gikonyo ji mangeny mondo owe timbe maricho en tich jodolo mondo opuonj ji wach mar adiera mar nyasaye kendo ji onego odhi irgi mondo opuonjre chik nyasaye nikech gin jootena ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto un jodolo usebaro muweyo yo makare puonj maru osemiyo ji mangeny ochwanyore bende un jolawi useketho singruok mane atimo kodu mano emomiyo bende asemiyo joisrael jarou kendo chayou nikech ok uluw chikena bende ka uponjo ji wachna ok utimnigi machalre giduto ruoth nyasaye okwedo joisrael kuom weye uwacho niya donge waduto wuonwa en achiel donge nyasaye achiel ema ne ochueyowa ka kamano ere gima omiyo waketho singruok mane nyasaye otimo gi kwerewa ka ngato ka ngato ketho singruok motimo gi wadgi jojuda oseketho singruok mane gitimo ni nyasaye kendo gisetimo gik maricho e israel kendo e jerusalem gisedwanyo kama ler mar ruoth nyasaye mohero kendo gisekendo mon malamo nyiseche mamoko ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto onego otiek ngato angata matimo kamano kendo ongad kare oko chuth kuom oganda joka jakobo kendo kuom joma chiwone misengni bende uywak kendo udengo ka ulwoko kendo mar misango mar ruoth nyasaye gi pi wangu nikech ruoth nyasaye odagi ngiyo misengni muchiwone kata yie kodgi ok oyie eka pod ngato ka ngato kuomu penjo gimomiyo otimo kamano ruoth nyasaye dwoko ni mano timore nikech uketho singruok mane utimo gi mon mane ukendo ka pod un yawuowi ne gin mondeu useketho singruok mane utimonigi kata obedo ni ne usingoru e nyim nyasaye ni ok unuwegi donge nyasaye notimou ringruok achiel kendo chuny achiel kodgi donge otimo kamano mana ni mondo wabed gi nyithindo maluwo nyasaye adier kuom mano nyaka uritru mondo kik ngato kuomu keth singruok mane otimo ni dhako mane okendo ka en wuowi ruoth nyasaye manyaalo gik moko duto nyasach israel owacho niya amon gi weruok manie kind dhako gi chwore ok berna ka ngato timo gima rach kamano ni chiege emomiyo ritreuru mondo ngato ka ngato kuomu kik tim gima rach kamano ni chiege chieng ngado bura chiegni wecheu osemiyo ruoth nyasaye ool kupenjo ni ere kaka usemiyo ool odwokou niya umiyo aol kuwacho ni ruoth nyasaye kwano joma richo ka joma beyo kendo oherogi bende usemiyo aol kupenjo ni ere nyasachwa ngado bura kare malaki ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto dwoko kama abiro oro jaotena otel mondo olosna yo bange ruoth mudwaro nobi apoya e hekalu mare kendo jaote mudwaro nenono nobi mi nohul weche mag singruokna chieng mobiroeno ere ngama nosir koso chieng othinyoree ere ngama noting wiye enochal gi mach malenyo mula mondo obed maler kendo enochal sabun luoko maler enobi mondo ongad bura mana ka ngat malenyo fedha obed maler enopwodh jodolo maler mana kaka ipwodho fedha gi dhahabu bange ginitim ni ruoth nyasaye misengni makare eka ruoth nyasaye nobed mamor gi misengni jojuda gi jojerusalem kelone kaka ne omor kodgi chon ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto owacho niya abiro ngadonu bura kendo bedo janeno kuomu piyo piyo ka ayalo ajuoke gi joma terore gi joma kuongore kayiem gi joma wuondo jotichgi e yor misara kod joma ok oluora timo marach ni mond liete gi nyithi kiye kod jopinje mamoko modak kuomu chudo mar achiel kuom apar ruoth nyasaye omedo wacho niya ruoth nyasaye kendo ok alokra mano emomiyo un nyikwa jakobo pok urumo chuth useweyo chikena mi ok urito mana kaka kwereu noweyo koro ka uduogo ira bende abiro duogo iru ka upenjoru niya ango onego watim mondo wadog ire dhano bende nyalo mayo nyasaye gire koso adwokou niya umaya adier ka upenja niya ere kaka umaya adwokou niya usemaya kuom dagi miya chiwo mar achiel kuom apar kod mag misengni kaka chik dwaro omiyo okuongu uduto nimar oganda duto osemaya giga keluru achiel kuom apar mag giu duto kar keno mar hekalu mondo chiemo obed e oda temieuru timo kamano ane ka ok nayaw dirise mag polo kendo amiu gik mabeyo mogundho onge kama ikete ok nawe kute keth chambu kendo yiendu mag mzabibu nonyag olembe mangeny bange ogendini duto noluongu ni johawi nikech pinyu nobed kama ber dakie pogruok manie kind joma kare gi joma richo ruoth nyasaye owacho kendo niya usewacho weche mag wich teko kuoma eka pod upenja niya ango marach mwasewacho kuomi bende usewacho ni tiyo ni nyasaye onge gi tiende ere tiend timo gima ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto owacho kata ywagruok e nyime kwanyise ni wayie kethowa waneno ka joma josunga ema nigi mor joma timbegi richo dhi maber ahinya bende gitemo nyasaye gi timbegi marichogo onge gima timogi kane joma oluoro ruoth nyasaye owinjo wechego ne giwuoyo e kindgi giwegi kendo ruoth nyasaye nowinjo wechegi nying joma oluoro ruoth nyasaye kendo mamiye duong ne ondik e kitabu moro e nyime ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto owacho niya chieng angadoe bura ginibed joga awuon kendo ginibed mwanduna anabednigi mangwon mana kaka wuoro bedo mangwon ni wuode moluore bang mano unune pogruok manie kind joma richo kendo e kind joma tiyona gi joma ok tina malaki chieng ruoth nyasaye ruoth nyasaye manyalo gik moko duto owacho niya winjuru ndalo biro josunga gi joma richo duto nowangie ka tiang chiengno giniwang adier kendo onge gima nodong kuomgi un joma oluoro nyinga tekona nopilre kuomu ka wangchieng kelo ler mi noresu kendo ler mare nobed gima changou unubed joma ni thuolo kendo mail ka nyiroye moyawnigi abila chieng angadoe bura unulo joma timbegi richo kendo ginichalnu ka buru munyono paruru puonj mag musa jatichna gi chike mane amiye e got horeb ni mondo joisrael duto oluw ka pok chieng maduong kendo malich mar ruoth nyasaye ochopo abiro oro elija janabi mondo ochak okel winjruok e kind wuone gi nyithindo nono abiro mi aketho pinyu chuth
